Matthew: Jesukristo ji'j nyafxiiteywe'sx kimtewap txãatxku pta'sxi' ayte'. Jesukristo' Abrahan Davxid ji'kh yu'.
Abrahana' Isaak neyku yu', naapkaçxha' Isaakha', Jakob neyku yu'. Aça' Jakoba', Judáwe'sx neyku yu'.
Juda' Fxares vxite' Zara neyku yu', aça' njĩ'ja' Tamarku yaase yu'. Fxaresa' Esrom neyku yu', naapkaçxha' Esroma', Aram neyku yu'.
Arama', Aminadab neyku yu', naapkaçxha' Aminadaba' Naason neyku yu'. Aça' Naasona', Salmón neyku yu'.
Salmona' Booz neyku yu', naapkaçxha' njĩ'ja' Rahabku yaase yu'. Booza' Obed neyku yu', aça' njĩ'ja' Rutku yu'. Obeda' Isaí neyku yu',
naapkaçxha' Isaía', jxkaahsa Davxid neyku yu'. Aça' jxkaahsa Davxida', Salomón neyku yu', aça' Salomón njĩ'ja' Urias nyu yu'k nyafxíi txãak yu'.
Salomona' Roboam neyku yu', naapkaçxha' Roboama', Abias neyku yu'. Aça' Abiasa', Asa neyku yu'.
Aça' Asa', Josafxat neyku yu', naapkaçxha' Josafxatha', Joram neyku yu'. Jorama', Uzias neyku yu'.
Uziasa' Jotam neyku yu', naapkaçxha' Jotama', Akaz neyku yu'. Aça' Akaza' Ezekías neyku yu'.
Ezekiasa' Manasés neyku yu', aça' Manasesa' Amón neyku yu', naapkaçxha' Amona' Josías neyku yu'.
Josiasa' Jekoniaswe'sx neyku yu'. Txãa ensutx Israelwe'sxa' Babilonia kiwen jxũna u'jni yuu.
Aça' Jekoniasa' Salatiel neyku yu', naapkaçxha' Salatiela', Zorobabel neyku yu'.
Zorobabela' Abiud neyku yu', aça' Abiuda' Eliakim neyku yu'. Eliakima', Azor neyku yu'.
Azora' Sadok neyku yu', aça' Sadokha', Akim neyku yu', naapkaçxha' Akima' Eliud neyku yu'.
Eliuda' Eleazar neyku yu', aça' Eleazara' Matán neyku yu', naapkaçxha' Matana', Jakob neyku yu'.
Jakoba' Jose neyku yu', naapkaçxha' Jose' Maria nmi'k yu', Kristo Jesus yaasesa njĩ'j.

Abrahan ji'jtx isate', katorce ney u'jweçtek Davxida' upxhna ũsu'. Aça' Davxid ji'jtx isate', ki' vxite katorce ney u'jweçtetx Israelwe'sxa' Babilonia kiwen jxũna u'jni yuu. Txãajũ ki' isani ki' vxite katorce ney u'jweçtek Kristo' upxhna ũsu'.
Jesukristo upxni' na'wẽk yuu: Jesus njĩ'j Maria' José yakh imi'ya' puutx we'wenik ji'phu'. Nawa ih fxi'zemey, nasa ji'phuk Dxus Espiritu kaavxya'ja'jni.
Txajx nmi' Josea' txãawe'sx leytxi kxtey nwẽese'jna fxi'zesak yu'. Nawa Maria nasa ji'phuni yu's khuẽswe'sxtxi pãatxhĩ'khmée, paaçte txuteeya'wak yu' nasa jiyunimeete.
Sa' txã'wẽ yajkxna ũsiyna, ksxa'wte Dxus angel vxyaaçxa na'jĩk:
—José, Davxid ji'j, iidx nyu yuuwa'jsa Maria's jxpa'gaya' wa'lnu, na'wẽ nasa ji'pha' nawa txã' Dxus Espiritu kaavxya'ja'jni'.
Maria nçxi'k ãaga vxyaate', txã'sa' Jesus yasene'ga. Txã'wẽ kxsusni yuuna, txãa pa'gatey txajx nasa pkaltewe'sxtxi nwe'wewa'jsa' jĩnak we'we.
Txã'wẽ yuuk, nawa txãniitey Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa's Dxusíi kaaũusuthe'the' na'wẽk we'we txãa kxtey yuukahnçxáak txã'wẽ yuu.
Txã' na'wẽk we'we:
Teeçx kna'sa' teeçx nçxi'k ji'phuna.
Txã' Emanwel kxsusni yuuna jĩk.
Txãa Emanwel jĩnisa': Dxusa' kwe'sx yakh ũsa' jĩni'.
Txajũ' Josea' deeniijũ yajkxçxa', Dxus angel we'weni's nwẽese'jçxa Maria txajx nyu yuuwa'jsa's nvxihtme'.
Nawa ptam na'wẽ ih yu' fxi'zemeeta', María nçxi'k ãaga yuupkaçx. Sa' Maria nçxi'k ãaga yuute', txã'sa' Jesus yasek ki'p.
Jesusa' Belen çxhabtek upx, Judea kiwete. Txãn ensu txãa kiwesu jxkaahsa' Herodesku yu'. Naapkaçxha' Jerusalen çxhabte maz piçthẽ'j pa'jtx sek kãani kiwejuwe'sx estrelxatx jiisa.
Sa' na'jĩnatx pẽjx:
—¿Mtee ũsna judiuwe'sxtxi jxkaahwa'jsa ãçxh u'se upxsa? Kwe'sxa' txajx upxni's pta'sxsa estrelxa's uytha'w sek kãani kiweju, txãasatha'w weçxaya' yuwé'.
Txã'jĩte', Herodesa' wala kuh yajkxku, txã'wẽy Jerusalen çxhabte nasawa jxukaysa.
Txajũ' jxkaahsa' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx jxukaysatx pa'yaçxa' paapẽjxku:
—Kristo' ¿mteega upxwa'jsa yu'? jĩte', pta'sxtxi:
—Judea kiwete Belen çxhabtek upxwa'jsa yu'. Txajíik Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa' na'jĩna fxi'j:
Judá kiwete Belen çxhab txã'wẽ maa çxhabtewa jxthaakwe ãhmeekwesame'.
Txãa pa'gatey Belen çxhabuh teeçx npiiçthẽ'jsa kasehçxa Adx nasa Israelwe'sxtxi jxpe'jwa'jsa' jĩ'k.
Txã'jĩte', Herodesa' estrelxa's uysaatx paaçte pa'yaçxa pẽjxku:
—¿Makwe txaçx yuuçna estrelxa vxyaani? jĩna wala ew paapẽjxçxak
Belenna kaah na'jĩna neewe'weçxa:
—Kxte me'jwe, sa' wala ew paapẽyine'kwe txãa luuçx ma'wẽsatewa. Sa' ew jiyuçxa', adxa's pta'sxine'kwe, aça' adxwa weçxaya' u'jwe'nja jĩte',
estrelxa's uysaawe'sxa' u'jtx. Naapkaçxha' sek kãani kiweju estrelxa uyne'ta txãa estrelxa' txãawe'sx yaçte vxyaana u'jçxa mteene' luuçx ũsu' txãa kajkwete pa'jçxak kxtee yuju.
Txã'wẽ estrelxa ki' vxyaate', wala weçxatx,
sa' yatte u'kaçxa luuçxa's uytxi njĩ'j yakh. Sa' peejxũkweçxa' luuçxa's weçxatx. Txã'wẽ yũuçxatx txãawe'sx peeswa'j jxũçxa u'jni's phaadeçxa pees: vxyuu beh, incienso vxite' miçxa.
Txã'wẽ yũuniijũ' kus ksxa'wte pta'sxnitx yuu Herodes tasxna ki' sxawedkahmén. Aça' vxite dxi'jsutx sxawedna u'j.
Estrelxa's uysaawe'sx u'jnijũ', José ksxa'wte', Dxus angel vxyaaçxa na'jĩk:
—Kiiteçxa me'j ũphna Egipto kiwen luuçxkuẽ's pe'jçxa petx njĩ'j yã'jçxa. Sa' kxtee ũsune'ga adx ki' pta'sxpkaçx. Txã'wẽme', Herodesa' luuçxkuẽ's ikhya' pakweya'wa' jĩte',
Jose' kusçxáa pe'jna Egipto kiwen u'kh.
Sa' kxteetx ũsu' Herodes uupkaçx. Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa we'weçxa': Egiptoju pa'yath Adx Nçxi'ka's jĩk txãa kxtey yuukahnçxáak txã'wẽ yũu.

Estrelxa's uysaawe'sx txã'wẽ Herodesa's weeçxsa na'wẽ vxite dxi'jsu u'jni's jiyuçxa', seena' wala ũusaçxak. Sa' luuçxtxi kiikhe'kh Belen çxhabtewe'sx vxite' peeku'jsuwe'sx yã'jçxa jxuka, luuçx e'z anxu ji'phsate kãhpkaçx. Estrelxa's uysaawe'sxa' makwe txaçx yã'j yuuçtewa pta'sxne'ta txã'sna jiyuçxak txã'wẽ e'z anxu ji'phsate kãhpkaçx kiikhe'jna ũsu' Herodesa'.
Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Jeremias na'jĩna fxi'jni kxtey yuuk:
Teeçx ahte Ramá yaasesate pthũusek
Seena' pebeena nxus we'weni.
Txã' Rakelku txã'wẽ ũ'ne' txajx luuçx pa'gate,
Sa' kisxi'çme', txã'wẽtx ikhni yuu naa pa'ga jĩ'k.
Egipto kiwete ũsçxa José ksxa'wte', Dxus angel vxyaaçxa na'jĩk Herodes uuniijũ':
—Ãçxha' luuçxa's ikh wẽesawa uuyã'jtx, aça' pe'jçxa sxawedna me'j Israel kiweníi jĩte',
Jose' sxawedna u'kh Israel kiwen luuçx petx njĩ'j yã'jçxa.
Nawa Herodes pa'gate nçxi'k Arkelao Judeate jxkaahna ũste jiyuçxa', ũukhku kxtee pa'jya' yu'. Sa' ksxa'wte' pta'sxnik yuu, txãasak Galilea kiwen u'j.
Kxtee pa'jçxa', teeçx çxhab Nasaret yaasesatek u'p-ya' u'j. Nyafxiitey Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx we'weçxa', Jesusa' Nasareno ya'kxsusuna jĩ'tx txã'jĩni kxtey yuukahnçxáak txã'wẽ yũu.
Txãa ensu' Juan Bautista' Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna pa'kh Judea kiwesu nasa u'pnimeesu.
Sa' na'jĩ'k:
—Pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte misxawedwe. Txã'wẽme', Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena' ãjxã'kh jĩ'k.
Naa Juana'sku we'wena fxi'j Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Isaiasa' na'jĩna:
Nasa u'pnimée kiwesu sus we'weni pthũusek:
Dxus pa'jwa'ja's mpheu'jwe,
Dxi'ja's ku'le phaadena jĩ'k.
Juana' kamelxo khas atxh athçxa kha'txku jxtudu'. Sa' txajx ũ'nisa yu', khã'sx wala çxhi'dx miltxi yu'.
Kxtee wẽse'jya' pa'jtx Jerusalenuwe'sx vxite' Judea kiwesuwe'sx jxuka vxite' Jordan yu'wala utxasuwe'sxwa.
Sa' txã'wẽ pkalsatha'w jĩna Dxusa's perdon pẽjxna pa'jsatxi' Juana' Jordan yu'walate bautisaĩ'k.
Nawa fxariseowe'sx vxite' saduceowe'sx txã'wẽ thegya' yuhte uyçxa', Juana' na'jĩ'k:
—I'kwe'sxa' ul weesweesa ji'ji'kwe txãa pa'ga kastigo seena'sa yuja', aça' txajũ iyuwa'ja's ¿kimga pta'sx?
Txã'wẽ kastigo seena'saju iyuwa'ja's jiyuyã'jçxa', ewçxáa yũuna mfxi'zewe, kxah maawa ew fxi'zeni's uysa': Naawe'sxa' pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus luuçx yuh yuuta sũjutxna.
Txã'jĩte', i'kwe'sxa' na'wẽ iiwejçx yaakxnuwe: Kwe'sxa' Abrahan ji'tha'w na' pkalsameetha'w sũhna yaakxwa'j ji'phmée i'kwe. Na'jĩ'th na': Naa kwet yuhtxwa Abrahan ji'j vxit-ya' ãjana Dxusa'.
Txã'wẽ ew fxi'zemeete', ama' ih yã'j ũsa' fxtũutasxtxi spẽ'thya'. Maa fxtũutasxwa ew yũnsameetxi' spẽ'thçxa ipxte kabwa'jçxáa yuuna.

Adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi' yu'teçxáath bautisaĩ' pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedsatxi'. Nawa adx e'suh vxite yuja' txã' Dxus Espiritu ipx na'wẽsate bautisaĩna. Txã' adxte jxthaakwe ãjawa'jsa', aça' adxa' txajx pelgatxiçxáa yuhtxwa ũsya' seelpimeesath.
Txã' skuutxh kweejxa'jni plaatu's kusete at yã'jçxa ũsa' na' skuutxha's tamaju txudena sũupi'jna. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa skuutxha's jxaawuuna. Nawa tama yu'sa' kabuna ipx bagaçxte yuhwa ũçxhawa'jmeesate jĩ'k.
Naapkaçxha' Jesusa' Galilea kiweju yuhçxa Jordan yu'wala pukate Juan ũsnite pa'kh, Juan yu'te bautisãykahn.
Nawa Juana' Jesusa's bautisãy wẽemeeçxa na'jĩk:
—Wejx yuuwa idx adxa's bautisãywa'jsag, sa' ¿ma'wẽga adxa's pi'ki' idxa's bautisãykahn? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—Dxus jxthãasni's kxtey yuuní wejx ewna jĩte', Juana' kxtey nwẽese'kh.
Aça' Jesusa' yu'te ya'bautisãyçxa kasejeçpkaçxha', cielu' phaatek, aça' Jesusa' uyku Dxus Espiritu tub çxihme na'wẽsa txajx kajkwete kĩjaçte.
Aça' we'weniwa pthũusek cieluju na'jĩna:
—Naaíi Adx Nçxi'k wala wedxnisa'. Txãa pa'ga wala weçxana ũsthu jĩk.
Txajũ' Dxus Espiritu' Jesusa's pe'jna u'kh nasa u'pnimée kiwesu, kxteea' eçxthẽ'j ĩsxii wẽeni fxi'zeya'.
Sa' kuarenta en kuarenta kus kĩhwa ũ'mée u'pçxa', Jesusa' wẽek.
Aça' eçxthẽ'ja' Jesus tasxte utxaaçxa na'jĩnak we'we ewmée vxit wẽeçxa:
—Dxus Nçxi'k dxihçxa', naa kwettxi pan myuukaah jĩte', Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—Dxus librute na'jĩ'k: Nasa' pan yakhçxáa yu' ĩtxi fxi'zemeetxna, naasáa jxuka Dxus we'weni yakh yuuçxáa ĩtxi fxi'zetxna jĩk.
Txajũ' eçxthẽ'ja' Jesusa's pe'jna u'kh Jerusalen çxhabna, sa' kxteea' dxuus yatte ẽete kaateka'jçxa,
na'wẽk jxkaah:
—Dxus Nçxi'k dxihçxa', ay ẽejũ mũph. Txãa pa'gatey Dxus librute na'wẽk we'we':
Dxusa' txajx angeleswe'sxtxi jxkaajana idxa's nwe'wekahn.
Aça' txãawe'sxa' kusete jxpa'gatxna,
Iidx çxida kwette kpã'yuukahmen jĩna fxi'jni' jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—Vxite ahte Dxus librute' na'wẽk we'we':
Idxna jxpe'jsa Dxusa's jxkaahwa'j ji'phmeeg jĩna fxi'jni' jĩk.
Txajũ' eçxthẽ'ja' ki' pe'jna u'kh vxiç walate, sa' txãajũ maa kiwesu çxhabtxiwa seena' zhiçxkwesa's kaavxya'jak.
Sa' na'jĩk:
—Adxa's peejxũkweçxa neewe'wene'ga aça' adxa' na'sa' jxuka idxa's ũsu'nja jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Eçxthẽ'j, adx tasxu mtxutée, txãa pa'gatey Dxus librute na'jĩ'k:
Idxna jxpe'jsa Dxusçxá's neewe'wewa'ja', sa' txãaçxá's selpiwa'ja' jĩna fxi'jni' jĩte',
eçxthẽ'ja' Jesus tasxu txuteek, aça' Dxus angeleswe'sxa' pu'çxya' pa'jtx.
Juan Bautista' kxuuphni ũsa' jĩni's Jesusa' jiyuçxa', Galilea kiwen u'kh.
Nawa Nasaret çxhabte yu' yujumée, Kapernaum çxhabtek u'p-ya' u'j. Txãa çxhaba' Zabulón vxite' Nefxtalí kiwe txãa ja'dasuk ũsu' ĩkh pukaga.
Txã'wẽ yũuk nawa Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Isaias fxi'jni kxtey yuukahnçxáak txã'wẽ yũu. Txã' na'jĩnak fxi'j:
Zabulón Nefxtalí txãawe'sx kiwesu u'psa,
Vxite' ĩkh pukasu dxi'j u'jna ũsa' txãa ja'dasu u'psa,
Vxite' Jordan yu'kuteju, sek kãani ju'guwe'sx,
Vxite' Galilea kiwesu judiu ji'jmeesawe'sx
Txãa nasa' çxhi'dxte ũssa na'wẽ ũsçxawa,
Eena'sa's uytxi.
Sa' uuníi na'wẽçxáa yã'j ũstewa,
Eena'sa' kweethku jĩ'k.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Dxus yuwe's pta'sxya' takhku:
—I'kwe'sxa' pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte misxawedwe. Txã'wẽme', Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena' ãjxã'kh jĩ'k.
Jesusa' Galilea ĩkh pukasu u'jweççxa', e'z pxakhtxi uyku, Adres vxite nyakha's Simon Pedro jĩ'tx txãawe'sxtxi. Txãawe'sxa' wedx uwesaatx yu', txãasatx wedx ukhe's ĩkhte akhna ũsu'.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Adx yakh myuhwe, aça' Dxus jĩi nasaa pkhakhwa'jsa vxitu'nja i'kwe'sxtxi'.
Txã'jĩçpkaçxha', wedx ukhetx nvxihtçxa txãa yakh u'jtx.
Aça' Jesusa' txãajũ wejkuẽ u'jnaçxáa, vxite e'z pxakhtxi uyku, Zebedeo nçxi'kwe'sx Jakobo vxite' Juan txãawe'sxtxi. Txãawe'sxa' barkote ney yakhtxi u'p yu', wedx ukhe's pã'khna. Aça' Jesusa' pa'yak.
Naapkaçxha' barko vxite' txãawe'sx neyna nvxihtna'wa Jesus yakh u'jtx.
Jesusa' Galilea kiwe jxukak pekũh, judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yat-su Dxus jxkaahwa'j yuwe ewsa's pta'sxna, txã'wẽy nasa kĩh weete ãça'satxwa jxuka nuykatxhik.

Txajũ' Siria kiwesuwe'sx jxuka jiyutx Jesus txã'wẽ yũuni's. Txãa pa'gatx fxiyfxiy ãça'satxwa jxuka jxũna pa'j, aka ji'phsa vxite' eçx iiyamunisa vxite' wẽeçxpa'jsa vxite' ẽseya' ãjasameetxwa jxuka. Txã'wẽsatxku Jesusa' nuykatxhi.
Txajũ' Jesus yakh pi'kxna u'juya' nasa wala utxaatx, Galileajuwe'sx vxite' Dekapolis kiwesuwe'sx vxite' Jerusalenuwe'sx vxite' Judea kiwesuwe'sx vxite' Jordan yu'kutejuwe'sx.
Nasa wala kuh kasehte uyçxa', Jesusa' txajx txhitxhnisawe'sxtxi thã'thek pe'jna u'j. Aça' txãawe'sxa' txajx tasxte utxaate',
na'wẽk kaapiya'jya' takh:
Wala yuh weçxa yuja' Dxusa's peejxçxa pakwesáa yakha', txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽ yũusa' Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite u'kaya' ãjawa'jsata' naa pa'ga.
Wala yuh weçxa yuja' ewmeete fxi'zeni's jiyuçxa ũ'nena Dxusa's yaakxsa yakha', txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽ yũusa' Dxus kvxiisxa'jni yuuwa'jsata' naa pa'ga.
Wala yuh weçxa yuja' wa'lmée Dxus tasxte utxasáa yakha', txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽ yũusá' naa kiwe jxuka txãawe'sx jĩiçxaçxáa yuuna pa'jwa'jsa' naa pa'ga.
Wala yuh weçxa yuja' Dxus dxi'pte ew fxi'zewa'ja's yuuçxáa ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa pakwesáa yakha', txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽ yũusaatxi' Dxusa' pu'çxhina.
Wala yuh weçxa yuja' vxitetx peeygãhna fxi'zesa yakha', txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽ yũusa' Dxus peeygãanitx fxi'ze' naa pa'ga.
Wala yuh weçxa yuja' ũuste kĩh pkala's yuhwa ka'ga'jmée fxi'zesa yakha', txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽ yũusa' Dxusa's uyya' ãjawa'jsata' naa pa'ga.
Wala yuh weçxa yuja' puiimée fxi'zewa'ja's pakwesáa yakha', txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽ yũusa' Dxus luuçxta' naa pa'ga.
Wala yuh weçxa yuja' Dxus yakh fxi'zepa'ga yahçena fxi'zesa yakha', txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽ yũuni fxi'zeçxawa Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite u'kawa'jsata' naa pa'ga.
I'kwe'sxa' wala yuh weçxana mfxi'zewe, adxna nwẽese'pha'gaçxáa nasa' wẽesxuna pkxuuna kĩjkĩhwa ewmée nuywe'weçtewa.
Txãa pa'gatey cielute' wala yuh jxpa'gawa'j ji'phi'kwe naa pa'ga. Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa txãniiteywe'sxtxi txã'wẽtx pkxuu na' ãçxhwa txã'wẽyçxáa yuutxna, nawa nxusmée weçxana mfxi'zewe.
I'kwe'sxa' nega na'wẽ naa kiwete pẽethewa'jsa i'kwe. Nawa nega' sxũukãhçxa', ¿ma'wẽ pẽethejekx? Kĩh yũuwa'j yuhwa selpimeena, naasáa puhbçxa nasaa wakhi'khi'jwa'jçxáa yuuna.
I'kwe'sxa' naa kiwete eena' kweethsa i'kwe. Teeçx çxhab thã'j vxiçga ũssa' ¿nasa uynimée ũsma'k?
Lampara's aphçxa txajxa' txã'wẽ ya'pki'ta'çme', wejxwa ãatek ya'txaja', yatte jxuka kweethkahn.
Txã'wẽy i'kwe'sxwa eena' mkweethwe nasaa dxi'pte, kxah i'kwe'sx ew fxi'zeni's uyçxa', Dxus ewsa ũsyuju'ga jĩna we'wetxna i'kwe'sx Tata cielute ũssa's.
Moises ley vxite' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx kaapiya'jni txãatx nwẽese'jya'méene' yuwé' sũhna yaakxnuwe adxa's. Txã'wẽ yũuya' yuwe'çmeeth, wejxwa txãa leya's jxthaakwe ew ãate kaajiyu'jya'th yuwé'.
Isath pta'sxi', cielu petx kiwe yã'jçxa skhẽwpkaçx txãa leytxi' le'çxkuẽçxáa yuhwa e'skhẽ nvxihtmée jxuka nwẽese'jwa'tha'.

Txãa pa'ga maawa txãa ley jxkaahnitx wala le'çxkuẽesa kĩhtewa selpiwa'jmeesa na'wẽ thegte txãatxi' nvxihtçxa, nasatxwa txã'wẽ yũuya' íiçxáa kaapiya'jana na', txã'wẽ yũusa' Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite le'çxkuẽçxáa seelpisa' jĩni yuuna. Nawa txãa leytxi le'çxkuẽçxáa yuhwa nvxihtmée jxuka nwẽese'jçxa vxitetxwa txã'wẽy nwẽese'jya' kaapiya'jsa', Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite wala seelpisa' jĩni yuuna.
Na'jĩ'th na': i'kwe'sxa' kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' fxariseowe'sx fxi'zenite jxthaakwe ew fxi'zemeeçxa', bagaçxte yuhwa Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite u'kaya' ãjameene'kwe.
I'kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxtxi na'jĩna kaapiya'jni's iiwẽse'jne'kwe: Nasa ikhwa'jme'. Txã'wẽme', nasa ikhsatxi's maatxwa kastigãywa'j yuuna jĩ'tx.

Nawa adxa' na'wẽth jxkaaja': Nasa yu's ikhmeeçxawa, peekx yakhthẽ'ja's ũusçxa yaakxpa'gaçxáa txãawa yuuwesa kastigãywa'j yuuna. Meeçxawa peekx yakhthẽ'ja's wáa açewe'wena aça' txã'sa' khuẽswe'sx tasxte jxũna u'jni yuuna. Sa' peekx yakhthẽ'ja's wẽesxute', txã'sa' kastigo infxiernote akhwa'j yuuna.
Txã'wẽ Dxusna peeswa'j ofxreda's jxũna pa'jçxa altalte akhmey yaakiwá'ga iidx yakhthẽ'j idxa's açeni's,
sa' txãa ofxreda's altal pukate nvxihtna'wa u'jwene'ga iidx yakhthẽ'ja's perdon pẽjxya'. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa txãa ofxreda's altalte akhene'ga.

Maawa idxa's açesa pãatxhĩ'khçxa khuẽs tasxna jxũna u'jweçte', khuẽs tasxte pa'jmey dxi'kha mpuutxwe'we khuẽs tasxte jxũna u'khamen. Txã'wẽme' khuẽsa' policiawe'sxtxi dukhte', txãawe'sxa' karcelte txajatxna.
Adxa' isath we'we', txajũyã'ja' kasejxa' ãjameene'ga vxyu nmeh ji'phuni's dukhmeeçxa yu'.
I'kwe'sxa' iiwẽse'jne'kwe na'jĩna nyafxiitey kaapiya'jni's: Ptamsayã'ja' vxite yakh pkal yuuwa'jme' jĩni's.
Nawa adxa' na'wẽth jxkaaja': Vxite yakh yu' pkal yuumeeçxawa, teeçx u'ya's ewmée yajkxçxa thegni yakhçxáa, pkal yã'kh yu' txajx ũuste.
Yafxa' idxa's pkalte kweete'phçxãh yuuçte', kutxi'jçxa mwãatah. Wejxwa teeçx yafxçxá's ivxiituçxa', kakwe jxuka yu' infxiernote akhni yuunimée wejx ewa'.
Meeçxa' paçu kuse txã'wẽ pkalte kweete'phçxãh yuuçte', spẽ'thçxa mwãatah. Wejxwa teeçx kuseçxá's ivxiituçxa', kakwe jxuka yu' infxiernote akhni yuunimée wejx ewa'.
Txã'wẽy nyafxiitey na'jĩna pta'sxni'swa iiwẽse'jne'kwe: Maawa nyu yakh txuteeççxa', txãa txuteni's eçte fxi'jçxa nvxiitwa'ja' jĩnatx kaapiya'ja'.

Nawa adxa' na'wẽth jxkaaja': Nyua' vxite yakh pkal yũuteçxáa nmi'a' txuteeya' ãjana. Txã'wẽme', pkal yũusameete peekxçxáa nmi'a' txuteeçxa', vxite yakh pkalte weteewa'ja's dxi'j phaadesa yuuna. Txãa pa'ga maa piçthẽ'jwa txãa u'y nvxiitnisa yakh ptamuuçxa', txãawa pkaltek wetesá yuuna pa'ja'.
I'kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxtxi na'wẽ kaapiya'jni'swa iiwẽse'jne'kwe: Dxus yase's kxsusçxa jurãyni's ĩsxiimée kxtey yuuwa'ja' jĩ'tx.
Nawa adxa' na'wẽth jxkaaja': Kxtey yuune'jmeeçxa', ma'wẽsaçxáa yuhtxwa kxsusna jurãywa'jme'. Cielu's kxsusna jurãynuwe, txã' Dxus jxkaahna ũsni' naa pa'ga.
Sa' kiwe'swa kxsusna jurãynuwe, txãa kiwe' dxuus çxida txaahwa'j vxitnisa' naa pa'ga. Sa' Jerusalennawa kxsusna jurãynuwe, txãa çxhaba' jxkaahsa çxhaba' naa pa'ga.

Sa' peekx dxikthe's kxsusnawa jurãynuwe, txãa pa'gatey idxa' kĩhte yuhwa seelpimeesag Dxus dxi'pte naa pa'ga. Txãasa teeçx dxkhasçxáa yuhnawa çxihme vxit-ya' ãjawa'jsameeg, sa' khũçxwa vxit-ya' ãjameene'ga.
Jurãywa'j peejxme', isasa's teeçx jwedçxáa mwe'wewe, jiiçxa' jii íith jĩna, jiimeeçxa' jiimeeth jĩna. Txã'wẽme', ĩsxiina we'wenisa' eçxthẽ'j kwe'we'jni'.
I'kwe'sxa' iiwẽse'jne'kwe na'jĩna nyafxiitey kaapiya'jni's: Iidx yafxa's kpã'vxitte', ka'tuwa txã'wẽy myũu. Sa' iidx ki'tha's çxkahdete', ka'tuwa txã'wẽy myũu jĩ'tx.
Nawa adxa' na'wẽth jxkaaja': Idxna ewmée yũusa's ka'tuja' iideewenu. Txã'wẽ yũumée, iidx dxi'pga pehtxate', ka'tu ju'guwe'sxnawa petxakahn mes.
Meeçxawa idxa's pãatxhĩ'khçxa iidx kmiisa's kusa'jaçte', jxkaaçni atxhnawa mes jxũna u'khan.
Teeçx ta'gute pa'j tu'sçxa nvxiht-ya' u'jwa'ja's jxkaathe', e'z ta'gute pa'j nvxiht-ya' me'j.
Maawa kĩhçxáawa idxa's thãaste', mes. Sa' pki'the', wa'lwa'jme' ji'phçxa'.
Nyafxiitey na'jĩna kaapiya'jni'swa iiwẽse'jne'kwe: Nasatxi' mpeeygãh, nawa açesa yuutxi' peeygãanu jĩ'tx.

Nawa adxa' na'wẽth jxkaaja': I'kwe'sxtxi açesatxi' mpeeygãhwe, sa' kxsewna ewmée we'wesatxi' ka'tu' ewçxáa mwe'wewe. Açesatxi' ew yũuna mfxi'zewe. Wẽesxuna pkxuusatxi' txãawe'sx pa'gate Dxusa's mneewe'wewe nwe'wekahn.

Txã'wẽ yũuçxaçxáa i'kwe'sx Tata cielute ũssa luuçxçxa txã'wẽ yuune'kwe. Txã' maa nasatxwa seka's kaakweethe'je'k, ewsa ma'k yuu meeçxa' ewmeesa ma'k yuu nawa jxukaysatx. Sa' txã'wẽy nusnawa kaja'k, ew yũusa ma'k yuu meeçxa' ewmée yũusa ma'k yuu nawa jxukaysatx.
Txã'wẽ i'kwe'sxtxi peeygãasaçxáatx ka'tuwa peeygãhçxa', ew yũusatha'w ¿jĩya' ãjama'kwe? Makwe nasa ewmeesa gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsawe'sxwa txã'wẽ yũuwa'jçxáa yu'sa' ãja'tx aça'.
I'kwe'sx yakhthẽ'jwe'sxçxáatx weçxate', ¿kĩh ew yũuni yaasena? Txã'wẽ yũuwa'j yu'sa' Dxusna jiimeesawa kxteytxi yũ'.
I'kwe'sx Tata cielute ũssa' maa yakhwa jxuka ewsa' naa pa'ga i'kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy mfxi'zewe.
I'kwe'sx ew yũuni's nasa uyçxa ew we'we jxthãasçxa mjĩini's wala mpa'yajkxwe. Txã'wẽ ew we'we jxthãasçxaçxáa ew yũuna fxi'zete', iidx Tata cielute ũssa' kĩh yuhwa dewemeena.

Txãa pa'ga peejxsatx kĩhçxáawa peesu'ççxa', nasa uykahn sũhçxa nasa ksxavxyte txã'wẽ yũunu. Ãateçxáa ew we'wesawe'sxçxáatx txã'wẽ yũ' judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yat-su vxite' klxiikhunsu, nasa' uyçxa' ew yuh yũ'k jĩna tuuthe'j jxthãasçxatx txãawe'sxa' txã'wẽ yũ'. Nawa adxa' isath we'we': Txã'wẽ yũuçxa', nasaa pwe'sx tuuthe'jniçxáatx fxi'ze'.
Nawa peejxsatx kĩhçxáawa peesu'ççxa', kim yuhwa jiyunimeete paaçte txã'wẽ myũu.
Aça' paaçte txã'wẽ yũuçte iidx Tata uyçxa', idxa's deweena.

I'kwe'sxa' Dxus yakh puutx we'weççxa', ãateçxáa ew we'wesawe'sx na'wẽ yũunuwe. Txãawe'sxa' judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yat-su vxite' klxiikhunsu yujuçxatx Dxus yakh puutx we'wena pekũju' nasa uykahn sũhçxa. Isath we'we', txã'wẽ yũuçxa' nasaa tuuthe'jniçxáatx fxi'ze'.
Nawa idxa' Dxus yakh puutx we'weççxa', yat dxiite u'kaçxa vxitxa's aphçxa kim yuhwa uynimeete mpuutxwe'we. Aça' txã'wẽ paaçte puutx we'wete', iidx Tata cielute ũssa' deweena.
Dxus yakh puutx we'weççxa', lxisasáa na'wẽ txã'snaíiçxáa kuh us peenana ũswa'jme'. Dxusa's jiimeesaçxáatx txã'wẽ yũ', wala we'wete', Dxusa' wẽse'jena sũhçxa.
Txãawe'sx na'wẽy yũunuwe. Txã'wẽ yũumeetewa, i'kwe'sx Tata' jiiyã'ja' i'kwe'sx peejini's pẽjxumeyna.
Txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxa' na'wẽçxáa Dxus yakh puutx we'wena na'jĩne'kwe:
Kwe'sx Tata cielute ũssa
Idxa' bagaçxtewa jxtuhthe nes yuune'ga.
Iidx jxkaahwa'j ena'sçxáatha'w ũythasu',
Naa kiwete idx ma'wẽne'ga jxthãasu' txã'snaçxáa kxtey tee yuu cielute na'wẽy.
Kwe'sx ũ'wa'j een isa peejini's meen pees.
Kwe'sx ewmée yũuni's meen peltunaĩ, kwe'sxwa ma'wẽtka'w peltunãy kwe'sxtxi ewmée yũusatx txã'wẽy.
Ewmeete wetekahmén, meen nwe'we.
Txãa pa'gatey idx yuuçxáa kĩhtewa jxuka ãjawa'jsag, sa' bagaçxtewa idx yuuçxáa jxkaahna nes yuuwa'jsag.
Txã'wẽ i'kwe'sxwa ewmée yũusatx peltunãyte', i'kwe'sx Tata cielute ũssawa peltunaĩna i'kwe'sxtxi.
Nawa ewmée yũusatx peltunaĩmeete', i'kwe'sx Tatawa peltunaĩmeena i'kwe'sxtxi.
I'kwe'sxa' yũunaççxa', maa nasawa uykahn sũhçxa ãate kaavxya'ja'jwa'jme'. Ãateçxáa ewtha'w jĩsaçxáatx txã'wẽ yũ' nasa jiyukahn. Isath we'we': Txã'wẽ yũuçxa' nasaa tuuthe'jniçxáatx fxi'ze'.
Nawa idx txã'wẽ yũunaççxa', dxi'pna pçxhĩ'çxçxa dxkhasnawa ew mkid,
kxah idx yũunani's ãate kaavxya'ja'jmeete', nasa jiyumeetxna, naasáa iidx Tata yuuçxáa jiyuçxa idxa's deweena.
Naa kiwete kĩjkĩhwa ji'phuwa'ja's pa'pçxunuwe. Txã'wẽme', wes ũ'we'tx, aça' izwa suwu'tx. Naapkaçxha' peswé' pa'jçxa ji'phuni's kutxi'ji'tx.
Wejxwa cielute ji'phuwa'jçxá's wala mpa'pçxuwe. Kxteea' weswa ũ'meena, aça' izwa suwmeena, pesweewa kutxi'jmeena.
Txãa pa'gatey mtee jxaawni ji'phçxa', kxte yuuçxáak wejx jxthaakwe yajkxna ya'fxi'ze'.
Yafxa' kakwe's ewte kaafxi'ze'jsata'. Txã'wẽ iidx yafxa' ewsaçxá's thegsate', iidx kakwe' ewte sxiigmée fxi'zena.

Nawa iidx yafxa' ewmeesaçxá's thegsate', iidx kakwe' jxuka ewmeete çxhi'dxteçxáa fxi'zena. Txã'wẽ eena'te ew kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa yuu ewmeete çxhi'dxtewe'sxa'sçxáa thegsate', bagaçxte yuhwa eena'te fxi'zewa'ja's ya'ji'phumeena.

Kim yuhwa e'z patrontxi selpiiya' ãjameena. Txã'wẽ vxiteçxá's wedxna fxi'zeçxa', vxite patron yu'sa' açena. Sa' teeçxsa jxkaahniçxá's kxtey yuuçxa', vxite patron jxkaahni yu'sa' kxtey yuuya' ãjameena. Txã'wẽy naa kiwete ji'phuni's pa'pçxuna Dxusnawa selpiina yuuya' ya'ãja'çme'.

Na'wẽth yu'kxpeje': I'kwe'sxa' kĩh yuhwa kuh yajkxmée mfxi'zewe, ¿kĩh ũ'wekxtha'w? sa' ¿kĩh athekxtha'w? sũhna. Txãa pa'gatey ũ'nisate jxthaakwe peejxsa ĩtxi fxi'zeni's ji'phyã'ji'kwe, sa' athnisate jxthaakwe peejxsa kakwe'swa ji'phyã'ji'kwe naa pa'ga.

Mthegwe ẽesu fxuusa vxiçxakwetx. Txãawe'sxa' uja'çmeeta', sa' ũ' pkhakhe'çwameeta', sa' tee jwedte jxaawu'çwameeta'. Txã'wẽtewa i'kwe'sx Tata cielute ũssa' txãa vxiçxakwetxi' peejxmeek sã'jĩ'. I'kwe'sxa' txãa vxiçxakwete jxthaakwe pa'gasa i'kwe, aça' wejx txã'wẽ sã'jĩna.
Txã'wẽ wala pa'pçxuçxa' ¿i'kwe'sx maaçxá' peena medio metro thaakwe walaaya' ãja'kwe'?
¿Kĩjxa'çxáakwe txakwe pa'pçxu' i'kwe'sx athwa'j ropaçxá's? Mthegwe kite tasxtxi. Txãawe'sxa' mjĩ'çmeeta', sa' khaswa pudu'çmeeta', nawa ma'wẽta zhiçxkwe walá'.
Na'jĩ'th na': Jxkaahsa Salomon yuhwa txãa kite tasx na'wẽ yu' zhiçxkwe iijxũme' makwe wala ji'phsaçxawa.

Txã'wẽ kite tasxa' ãçxhíi yu' zhiçxkwe ũsçxawa, kuskusa' ipxte kabwa'jçxáak yu', nawa txã'wẽsa'swa Dxusa' wala zhiçxkwe pheu'ju'k na' i'kwe'sxtxi' wejx thaakwe ew pheu'juna. Txãa sũjxa' ãja'çmeene'kwe.
Txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxa' kĩh yuhwa kuh yajkxmée mfxi'zewe, ¿kĩh ũ'wekxtha'w? sa' ¿kĩh athekxtha'w? sũhna.
Dxusna jiimeesaçxáatx txã'wẽ kuh yajkxna fxi'ze'. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' cielute Tata ji'phi'kwe txã' jxuka jiia' i'kwe'sx peejini's.
Txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxa' Dxus yakh fxi'zewa'ja's khuẽ'y wejx thaakwe mpa'pçxuwe, txajũyã'ja' kĩhwa thẽymée vxyaana.
Ãçxha' jiyui'kwe na' kuskuskhẽwe'sxa's ũythasna pa'pçxunuwe. Txã'wẽme', kuskuskhẽ' pa'pçxuwa'j thaakwe thẽysa pa'jana een isa fxiyfxiysa.
Ma'wẽsatewa jiimeeçxa', ewmeesata' jĩna nuywe'wewa'jme', Dxus dxi'pte i'kwe'sxwa ewmeesa yuuya'mée.
Txã'wẽme', vxitesatx nuywe'wete', Dxusa' i'kwe'sxtxiwa ewmeesata' jĩçxa kastigaĩna nuywe'wepa'ga. I'kwe'sx ma'wẽ juuna' yũute', Dxuswa txã'wẽyçxáa juuna' kastigaĩna.
Iidx yakhthẽ'j yafxte kxtã' le'çxkuẽesa khẽeçxa ũste ¿ma'wẽ uyuki'g iidx yafxte yu' fxtũ pe'la yuu walasa khẽeçxa ũste txã's khuẽ'y kutxi'jmeeçxa'?
Sa' ¿ma'wẽ iidx yakhthẽ'ja's kxtã' le'çxkuẽsa iidx yafxte ji'phgu txã'sa' kutxi'jith jĩna we'weki'g, txã'wẽ iidx yafxte yu' fxtũ pe'la walasa's ji'phçxa'?
Ãakheçxáa ew we'wena u'jusa, iidx yafxte fxtũ pe'la walasa's khuẽ'y mkuutxi'j. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa iidx yakhthẽ'j yafxte kxtã' le'çxkuẽsa's ew uyçxa kutxi'jya' ãjane'ga.
Dxus yuwe's alkutx ũswa'jme', sa' kuçxitxwa ũswa'jme'. Txã'wẽme', jxuka wa'khi'khi'jçxa ũusaçxayã'jçxa', ũssa i'kwe'sxtxi íiçxáa wa'kxya' kũjutxna.
Dxusa's mpẽjxwe, aça' ũsuna, sa' pakweçxa', uyuune'kwe. Vxitxte mtu'kakawe, aça' phaadena.
Txã'wẽ maawa pẽysa' jxpa'gana, aça' pakwesá' uyuuna. Vxitxte tu'kakate', phaadeni yuuna.
I'kwe'sx pwe'sx maaçxa' i'kwe'sx luuçx pan thãaste', ¿kweta's ũsma'kwe?
Meeçxa' wedx thãaste', ¿ula's ũsma'kwe?
I'kwe'sxa' Dxus dxi'pte ewmeesaçxawa, i'kwe'sx luuçxtxi' ewsaçxáa i'kwe peesu', aça' i'kwe'sx Tata cielute ũssa' wejx thaakwe ewsa's peesuna thãassatxi'.

Bagaçxtewa i'kwe'sxtxi maa nasawa ewçxáa yũuna fxi'ze jxthãasçxa', i'kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy maa nasatxwa ewçxáa yũuna mfxi'zewe. Txãa pa'gatey Moises ley vxite' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx fxi'jniwa txã'wẽçxaçxáatx jxkaaja'.
Vxitx pteezte me'kawe. Txã'wẽme', vxituwa'the u'kawa'j vxitxa' wala tape', aça' dxi'jwa txã'wẽy tape'. Kxteea' wala kuhsa u'kana ũsta'.
Naapkaçxha' vxitumée Dxus tasxte pa'jwa'j vxitxa' pteeza', aça' dxi'jwa txã'wẽy pteeza'. Kxtee yu' kuhmeeçxáa u'kana ũsta'.
Dxus jxkaahnisatha'w jĩna ĩsxiisatxi' mpa'yajkxwe. Txãawe'sxa' i'kwe'sx tasxte yu' piisxáa kakwe yakhtxi vxya', nawa ũuste yu' yu'kh eçx weeswée na'wẽsata'.
I'kwe'sxa' txãawe'sx fxi'zeni's jiyune'kwe. Miiyajkxwe: Uwa's çhũçh tasxte ya'ude'çme', sa' brewa's khãas tasxte ya'ude'çme'.
Txã'wẽ fxtũu tasx ewsa' ewsaçxáak yũnu', aça' fxtũu tasx ewmeesa' ewmeesaíiçxáak yũnu'.
Fxtũu tasx ewsa' ũ' ewmeesa's yũnya' ãjameena. Txã'wẽy fxtũu tasx ewmeesa' ũ' ewsa's yũnya' ãjameena.
Maa fxtũu tasxwa ewmée yũnsa's spẽ'thçxa ipxte ya'kabu'k.
Txãa pa'ga txãawe'sx fxi'zeni's uyçxa jiyune'kwe ma'wẽsatewa.
Yuwejuçxáa adxa's ew we'wesa jxuka yu' cielute Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite u'kawa'jsameeta', naasáa adx Tata jxthãasni's kxtey yuusaçxáa cielute u'kawa'jsata'.

Txãasa cielute u'kawa'j en ãhte', wala yuh maawa adxa's na'jĩtxna: Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa mwẽese'j: Kwe'sxa' iidx yuwe's pta'sxtha'w, sa' iidx yase's kxsusçxa eçxthẽ'jtxwa kutxi'tha'w, sa' kim yuhwa ãjanimeesa'swa kaavxya'ja'tha'w maz uswa jĩtxna.
Nawa adxa' na'jĩna pasu'nja: Bagaçxte yuhwa adx jxpe'jnisa yu'çmeei'kwe, naa pa'ga i'kwe'sxtxi' jiimeeth. Ewmée yũuna fxi'zesa' adx tasxtewe'sx meei'kwe.
Maawa adx jxkaahni's wẽse'jçxa kxtey yuusa', yat txajxa' jiisa na'wẽsa yuuna: Txãa yata's kwette kaaçxida'jçxa txahte',
nus pa'jna, wejxa wala kiitena, yu' walaana yuuçxawa, yata's suwme', kwette kaaçxida'jçxa txaahnipa'ga.
Nawa maawa adx jxkaahni's wẽse'jçxawa kxtey yuusame', yat txajxa' jiimeesa na'wẽsa yuuna: Txãa yata's kwetmuseteçxáa txahte',
nus pa'jna, wejxa wala kiitena, yu' walaana yuute', txãa yata' weteçxa jxuka suweek jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesus we'wena jxã'the', nasa' wala kuh yajkxna neeyũutx txajx kaapiya'jni's wẽse'jçxa,
txã'wẽ leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx na'wẽmée, nwẽese'jwa'ja's ũukhnus we'wena kaapiya'pha'ga.
Jesusa' thã'j vxiçu kĩhte', nasa iiméh wala kuh pkhaakhetx.
Aça' teeçx piçthẽ'j wã'jy wee seena' kazxsate ãça'sa Jesus tasxte utxaaçxa peejxũkweçxa na'jĩnak pxthaa we'we:
—Adxa's peeygãhçxa' nuykatxhine'ga naa weeju jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩnak kuseju jxa'dx:
—Ahçemée peeygãanisag, naa pa'ga katxhiçxa mneeyũu jĩçpkaçxha', txãa wã'jy weeju katxhiçxak neeyũu.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk jxkaah:
—Maa yuhtxwa pta'sxmeene'ga, naasáa sacerdote yuuçxáana iidx kakwe's txwesya' me'j. Sa' Moises ma'wẽga jxkaaja' txã'sçxáa kxtey yuune'ga, kxah nasa jxukaysa jiyutxna idx ew katxhiçxa neeyũutewa jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Kapernaum çxhabte pa'the', soldau kpiitan romanowe'sx utxaaçxa' pxthaa we'wek na'jĩna:
—Adx yatte jxpe'jnisa uuya' yã'j ũsa' ẽseya' ãjameeçxa jĩte', Jesus pasçxa':
—Adxa' u'jçxa nuykatxhi'nja jĩk.
Aça' kpiitana' na'wẽk pas:
—Adxa' iidx dxi'pte kĩhte yuhwa seelpimeesath. Txãasath adx yatte iidx pa'jni's thaame', naasáa çxhãçxhana jĩna mwe'we aççxáa adx jxpe'jnisa' katxhina.

Adxwa ma'wẽtka walasa jxkaahnitxi' nwẽese'je', sa' adxna nwẽese'jsa soldauwe'sx iijxpe'th txãawe'sxtxi teeçxsa's me'j jĩte', adx jxkaahni's kxtey yu'k. Sa' vxite's pa'yate', txãawa kxtey nwẽese'je'k. Sa' adxna selpisa's kĩh jxkaathewa kxtey yu'k jĩk.
Txã'wẽ we'weni's Jesusa' wẽse'jçxa', wala kuh yajkxku, sa' na'jĩnak we'we txãa yakh yuusatxi':
—Isath we'we', Israelwe'sx jxukaysa mteewe'sx yuhwa txã'wẽ adx we'weteçxáa katxhina sũhsa yu' iiuymeeth naa piçthẽ'j na'wẽsa yu'.

Na'jĩ'th na', judiu ji'jmeeçxawa wala yuh pa'jatxna sek kãanijũwe'sx vxite' sek khẽenijuwe'sx majũwe'sxwa jxuka, sa' Abrahan, Isaak, Jakob txãawe'sx yakh ũ'ya' kaçxhiitxna cielute Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite.
Naapkaçxha' kxtee ũswa'jsata' jĩnisa yu', kutxi'jçxa çxhi'dx walate akhni yuutxna. Kxteea' seena' yuh pebeena ki'thtxi ksuusu'jutxna ũukhna jĩk.
Sa' Jesusa' ki' we'wek kpiitana's:
—Yatna me'j, aça' idx ma'wẽne'ga jxthãasu' txã' kxtey yuuna jĩçpkaçxha', txãa kpiitan jxpe'jnisa' katxhinik yuu.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Pedro yatnak u'j, sa' kxteea' Pedro nyu njĩ'ja' kakwesekte uuya' ũstek uy.
Aça' kusete jxa'dxku, naapkaçxha' kakweseka' ũçxhak. Txajũ' txãa u'ya' kiiteçxa selpiiya' kasejk.
Sa' txãa en jxuka çxhi'dxiçte', Jesus tasxte wala jxũna pa'jtx eçx iiyamunisatx. Aça' tee dxi'j we'weni yakhçxáa txãa eçxtxi' ũusuh kutxi'kh, sa' ãça'sa jxukaysatx nuykatxhik.
Nyafxíi Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Isaiasa' na'jĩnak we'we:
Txãaíik kwe'sx çxhãçxhamée fxi'zeni vxite' kwe'sx ãça'na fxi'zeni's jxuka txuhde jĩ'k txã'jĩni kxtey yuukahnçxáak txã'wẽ yũu.
Txã'wẽ nasa wala pkhaakhete', Jesusa' ĩkh kuten u'jwe'nja'w jĩnak we'we.
Txã'jĩte', ley kaapiya'jsa teeçxsa Jesus tasxte utxaaçxa', na'jĩk:
—Idx yakh yuu wẽeth idx mtee u'jweçtewa jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Yu'kh niimal yuhwa deewa'j kafx ji'phta', txã'wẽy vxiçxakwewa yat ji'phta'. Nawa Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' mtee yuhwa txajx dxiktheçxáa yuja'swa khikhwa'j ji'phme'.
Naapkaçxha' Jesusna nwẽese'jsa teeçxsa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—Adxa's mkaah adx tata khuẽ'yna pedaawa'j ji'phthu jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Uusaawe'sxa' peekx uusáa pwe'sx ya'pedaatxna. Aça' idxa' adx yakh txutemée myuh jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' barkote khẽek aça' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' pi'kxna u'jtx.
Txã'wẽ ĩkhte u'jweçpkaçxha', wejxaa wala sẽjk, aça' yu'tũçxhasa' barko's aphya'wak yu'. Nawa Jesusa' deenik yu'.
Aça' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' fxĩtxtxi na'jĩna:
—Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa, meen nwe'we. Txã'wẽme', ĩkh dxiikhẽ khẽjeçtha'w jĩte',
na'wẽk pas:
—¿Kĩjxa'kwe txakwe wala ũukhu'? ¿I'kwe'sxa' Dxusna yajkxya' yu' ew jiimeewá'kwe? jĩçxa', kiiteçxa wejxa vxite' ĩkh txãatx we'wek, aça' jxuka yujuk.
Txã'wẽ yũute', barkote u'jsawe'sxa' wala kuh yajkxçxa na'jĩnatx we'we:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿kimna açki'tx wejxa ĩkh txã'wẽsa yuhwa nwẽese'je'? jĩ'tx.

Txajũ' Jesusa' ĩkh kuteju Gadara kiwete pesathe', e'z piçthẽ'j uusáa pedani kafxju kasehçxa Jesus tasxte utxaatx. Txãa e'zsa' eçx iiyamunisatx yu', txãasatx iiméh seena' weeswée yu', txãa pa'ga txãa dxi'jsu kim yuhwa skhẽwya' ãja'çmeeta'.
Txãa eçx iiyamunisa' na'jĩnatx sus we'we:
—Dxus Nçxi'k Jesus, kwe'sx nxuste ũswa'j en ãhmeyna, ¿nxuste akhya' yuwe'wá'ga? jĩ'tx.
Kxsũ thã'jsu kuçxi wala ũsu'tx aphna.
Aça' txãa eçxa' Jesusa's pxthaa we'wetx:
—Kwe'sxtxi neeuççxa', txãa kuçxi ũussu khẽeya' u'khan mkaah.
Txã'jĩte', Jesusa' kxtey yuukaakh. Aça' txãa eçxa' nasa ũusuh kasehçxa txãa kuçxi ũustetx khẽe. Txã'wẽ yũute', txãa kuçxi' penxakhẽ peluçxa ĩkhkhẽ khẽeçxa jxuka uutx.
Aça' kxsũ kuçxi thegsa' ũukhçxa wuwuuçxáa çxhabna u'jçxa pta'sxtxi kĩh yũuni'swa jxuka. Sa' txãa e'z piçthẽ'j eçx iiyamunisawe'sxtxi kĩh yũutewa jxukatx pta'sx.
Txajũ' çxhabte nasa jxuka thegya' u'jtx Jesus ũsnite. Sa' uyçxa' Jesusa's txãawe'sx kiweju kasehna u'khaahtx.
Txajũ' Jesusa' barkote khẽeçxa sxawedçxa txajx çxhabtey ki' pa'kh.
Aça' kxteea' teeçx piçthẽ'j ẽseya' ãjasame'stxi yakhna pa'j. Txã'wẽ yakhna pa'jsawe'sxa' Jesusa' nuykatxhiyujuna sũhni's jiyuçxa', ãça'sa's na'wẽk we'we Jesusa':
—Çxhãçxha myajkx. Iidx pkala' peltunãyni yã'jtx neeyũu jĩte',
ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx maaíi yu' na'wẽtx yajkx: Naa piçthẽ'ja' Dxusa's iiweeçx we'wena ãjawa'jmeea'sku we'we' sũju'tx.
Nawa txãawe'sx yaakxni's Jesus jiyuçxa', na'jĩnak we'we:
—¿Kĩh yuutekwe txã'wẽ ewmée yaaki'?
¿Maa thẽymeesakx? Iidx pkala' peltunãyni yã'jtx neeyũu ¿jĩniá'? Meeçxa': Kiiteçxa me'j ¿jĩniá'?
Makwe thẽysatewa Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' naa kiwete pkaltxi peltunãyya' ãjawa'jsa' naa pa'ga kaajiyu'j ya'wath ãçxha'.
Txajũ' ẽseya' ãjasame's na'wẽk we'we:
—Kiiteçxa, iidx deeni's tu'sçxa yatna me'j jĩte',
txãa ẽseya' ãjasameea' kiitena'wa u'kh txajx yatna.
Txã'wẽ yũuni's nasa uyçxa', ũukhtxi. Sa' Dxusna weçxana tuuthe'jtx txã'wẽ çxhãçxhawa'ja's Dxusa' peesne' sũhçxa.
Jesusa' txajũ u'jçxa', teeçx piçthẽ'j Mateo yaasesa txã'wẽ gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhna u'pte uyçxa', na'wẽk we'we:
—Adx yakh myuh jĩna.
Aça' Mateo' kiiteçxa Jesus yakh u'kh.
Txajũ' Jesusa' ũ'ya' yatte u'kak, aça' gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsawe'sx vxite' pkalsawe'sxwa wala kuh u'katx vxite' Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sx yã'jçxa.
Aça' txã'wẽ yũuni's fxariseowe'sx uyçxa' pẽjxtxi Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi na'jĩna:
—¿Ma'wẽçxaga i'kwe'sxtxi kaapiya'jsa' gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsawe'sx vxite' pkalsawe'sx yakh ũ'wé'?
jĩni's Jesus wẽse'jçxa', na'wẽk we'we:
—Yu'çe'jsa's jxpeejxmeeta' aka ji'phmée wẽt ũssa', naasáa ãça'sa yuuçxáa yu'çe'jsa's jxpeejxta'.

Mpiyawe Dxus librute na'wẽ fxi'jni ũsa' txã'sna: Tajkx ikhçxa Dxusa's weçxana kabni yu'sa' jxpeejxmeeth. Adxa' vxitetx peeygãaniçxá'sthu jxthãasu' jĩ'k. Adxa' nasa ewsatx pakweya' kĩhmeeth, naasáa pkalsatx pakweya'çxáath kĩh, kxah ewmée yũuna fxi'zeni's nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxaweduutxna.
Txajũ' Juan Bautista yakh u'jusawe'sxa' Jesus tasxte utxaaçxa na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—¿Kĩh yuupa'gatka'w kwe'sx vxite' fxariseowe'sx txakwe wala yũuna', naapkaçxha' idx yakh u'jusawe'sx yu' yũuna'çmeeta'? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—Miiyajkxwe: ¿bodate pi'kxnisa' ũ'mée nxusna ũswa'jsatxmanx novxio' txãawe'sx yakh nee ũsiite'? Naasáa novxio's txãawe'sx tasxuh txuhdete yuuçxáa yũunaatxna.
Ropa ĩisxsate tela u'sesa yakh ya'pã'khe'çme'. Txã'wẽme', tela u'sesa' jweeíiçxáak sude' ĩisxsa's, aça' sutenisa' jweeíiçxáa wala suteena.

Txã'wẽy beka u'se aahnisa's slun ĩisxsate ya'awu'çme'. Txã'wẽme', beka u'sesa slun ĩisxsa's sude'k, aça' beka yakh slun yakh e'zíi vxitu'tx. Txãa pa'ga beka u'sesa's slun u'sesate awwa'ja'. Txã'wẽ yu', maa yuhwa vxitumeetxna.
Jesus txã'wẽ we'wena ũspkaçxha', judiu pkhaakhenite npiiçthẽ'jsa' Jesus tasxte peejxũkweçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Adx niisa' uuyã'kh. Nawa idx yuhçxa kuseju jxa'dxwaça', ĩtxi yuuna jĩte',
Jesusa' kiitena'wa txãa yakh u'kh, txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yã'jçxa.
Txã'wẽ u'jweçpkaçxha', teeçx u'y doce anxu kakwe yu'te ãça'na u'jusa Jesus e'ste paaçte kũhçxa, atxh vxiçte kpaajxa'dxku.
Atxh vxiçteçxáawa jxa'dxwaça', katxhi'nja sũhçxak txã'wẽ yũu.
Nawa Jesusa' jiyuçxa txãa u'ya's thegçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Ũukhnuwe, wejxwa katxhini i'kwe neeyũu, txã'wẽ katxhi'nja sũhçxane'kwe txã'wẽ yũu naa pa'ga jĩte', txãa dudtey katxhiçxak neeyũu.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa npiiçthẽ'jsa yatte pa'jçxa uyku pedaaçte nxusna tukawa'jsa músiku jxuka pheu'jçxa ũste. Aça' nasa' nxusna wala ũ'nena ũste',
na'wẽk jxkaah:
—Ayjxu mkaasehwe. Luuçxa' uunime', deeniçxáa ũsa' jĩte', nasa' npeevxysxijkatx.
Nawa Jesusa' nasatx kasejkaahçxa dxiite u'kana'wa, txãa luuçxa's pu'kisuçpkaçxha', kiitek.
Aça' txã'wẽ yũuni's txãa kiwesu jxuka tuuthe'jnik yuu.
Txajũ' Jesus kasehna u'jweçte', uyya' ãjasamée e'ztxi sus we'wena yuwé':
—Davxid Nçxi'k, kwe'sxtxi mpeeygãh jĩna.
Txajũ' Jesusa' yatte u'kate', txãa uyya' ãjasameewe'sxa' utxaana kũhtx. Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk pẽjx:
—¿Uywa'ja's ũsuna sũju'kwe' i'kwe'sxa'? jĩte', txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Txãa sũju'íitha'w jĩtx.
Aça' Jesusa' txãawe'sx yafxte jxa'dxku na'jĩna:
—I'kwe'sx jxthãasni' kxtey yuuna jĩçpkaçxha',
txãawe'sx yafxa' ewuutx. Aça' Jesusa' wala neewe'wek na'jĩna:
—Kim yuhtxwa pta'sxmeene'kwe jĩtewa,
txajũ kasehna' txãa kiwesu jxuka pta'sxtxi Jesus txã'wẽ yũuni's.
Txãawe'sx kasehna u'jweçpkaçxha', Jesus tasxte vxite piçthẽ'j nuypa'jtx, we'weya' ãjasamée eçx iiyamunisa's.
Aça' Jesusa' txãa eçxa's ũusuh kutxi'the', txãa piçthẽ'ja' we'weya' ãjak. Txã'wẽ yũute', nasa' wala kuh yajkxtxi na'jĩna:
—Israel kiwete bagaçxte yuhwa na'wẽsa yu' iiuymeetha'w jĩ'tx.
Nawa fxariseowe'sx yu' na'wẽtx we'we:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' eçxtxi nasa ũusuh kutxi'ji'k, nawa eçxthẽ'j pu'çxteçxáak txã'wẽ yũ' jĩ'tx.

Jesusa' çxhab walasu çxhab le'çxkwesu judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yat iisa kaapiya'jnak pekũju'. Sa' Dxus jxkaahwa'ja'swa pta'sxna vxite' wee ma'wẽsate nasa ãça'satxwa nuykatxhina kĩh akatxwa jxuka kaykase'je'k.
Sa' Jesusa' txãa nasatx thegçxa', txãawe'sxtxi peeygãjk txã'wẽ nxusna çxhãçxhameekuẽ piisxáa namu ji'phmeesa na'wẽ ũspa'ga.
Sa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi na'wẽk we'we:
—Isath we'we', mjĩia' seena' wala', nawa mjĩisa yu' kuh meeta'.
Txãa pa'ga mjĩi namu's mpẽjxwe mjĩiwa'jsa kaakhan jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusa docesatx pa'yaçxa na'wẽ yũuya' ãjawa'ja'sku ũs: eçxtxi nasa ũusuh kutxi'jna kĩh weete ãça'satxwa nuykatxhina, kĩh aka ji'phtewa jxuka yu'çe'jya' ãjawa'ja'sku ũs.
Txãa docesawe'sxa' na'wẽtx yaase yu': Nyafxtewe'sxa' Simonku yu', txã'sa' Pedro jĩ'tx. Vxite' txajx nyakh Adres. Vxite' Zebedeo nçxi'ktxi yu', Jakobo Juan pxakhsa.
Vxite' Fxelipe, Bartolomé, Tomás, vxite' Mateo gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsa. Vxite' Alfxeo nçxi'k Jakobo, vxite' Lebeo txã'snaíiçxáa Tadeo jĩ'tx.
Vxite' Simonku yu', kananista nasa. Vxite' Judas Iskariote, Jesusa's açesawe'sx kusete dukhwa'jsa.
Txãa yakh u'jusa docesatx Jesusa' na'wẽk neewe'weçxa kaah:
—Judiu ji'jmée vxite nasa kiwesu' u'jnuwe, sa' Samaria kiwesu çxhab ũstxna kxsũwa u'jnuwe,
wejxwa Israel ji'j piisxakuẽ na'wẽ jxpubana ũsta' kxsũçxáa me'jwe.
Sa' pta'sxine'kwe Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena' ãjxã'kh jĩna.

Ãça'satxwa nuykatxhine'kwe, uusaatxwa ki' ĩtxi vxitune'kwe, wã'jy wee kazx ji'phsatxwa nuykatxhine'kwe. Eçxtxiwa nasaa ũusuh kutxi'jine'kwe. I'kwe'sx txã'wẽ ãjawa'ja's vxyupa'gamée i'kwe jxpa'ga na', nuykatxhipa'ga vxyu pẽjxmeene'kwe.
Kĩh vxyu yuhwa jxũmée me'jwe.
Ya'ja, spaatu, khãabu txãaçxáa yuhtxwa jxũmée me'jwe, naasáa teeçx kmiisaçxáa jxũçxa me'jwe, txãa pa'gatey mjĩisa' puuçni fxi'zewa'jsa'.
I'kwe'sxa' çxhab wala meeçxa' çxhab le'çxkwesu mtee pa'jçxawa, kxtee paadejene'kwe nasa ewsa tasxsu, vxite ahte u'jwa'j en ãhpkaçx.
Yatte pa'jçxa, ewçxáa we'wena weçxana pa'jane'kwe.
Txãa yatte nasa ew jxpa'gate', Dxus yakh weçxana fxi'zewa'ja's pta'sxine'kwe. Nawa txã'wẽ yũumeete', pta'sxmeene'kwe.

Sa' i'kwe'sxtxi jxpa'gamée, pta'sxni'swa wẽse'jya' wa'lte', yatte ma'k yuu meeçxa' çxhabte ma'k yuu nawa txajũ kasejeççxa', i'kwe'sx çxidate kiwe tuhda's sakweekweçxa kasejene'kwe kxah yuuwesa yuutxna.
Isath we'we', Dxus kastigãywa'j en ãhte', txã'wẽ yũusa nasa' seena' yuh ya'kastigaĩtxna, Sodoma Gomoçxa çxhabsu nasate jxthaakwe.
Mwẽese'jwe, adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi piisxakuẽ na'wẽ kajaçthu yu'kh eçx ksxavxysu. Aça' i'kwe'sxa' ikhwe'sxte ul na'wẽ jxpa'yakx mfxi'zewe, nawa iideewewa'j yu'sa' ji'phmée tub çxihme na'wẽ myuuwe.
Mpa'yajkxwe, txã'wẽme' nasa' i'kwe'sxtxi uweçxa khuẽswe'sx tasxte dukhetxna, sa' judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yat-suwa pãpatxna.

Kxsũçxáa kuutxa'jmée ne'jwe'sx tasxsu vxite' jxkaahsa tasxte yuhwa pe'jna u'jni yuune'kwe, adx yuwe's pta'sxpa'ga. Txã'wẽ yũutewa, kxsũwa txãawe'sx dxi'pte tuuthe'jeíiçxáa ne'kwe adxa's vxite' judiu ji'jmeesa dxi'ptewa.
Txã'wẽ khuẽswe'sx tasxsu kuutxa'the', kuh yaakxnuwe, ãçxha' ¿ma'wẽ pasukxtha'w? sũhna. Txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽ yũuçpkaçxha', Dxusa' i'kwe'sxtxi kaaũusuthe'jena ma'wẽ paswa'ja'swa.
I'kwe'sx ũus yaakxniju we'wemeene'kwe; Dxus Espiritu i'kwe'sxtxi kwe'we'jena.
Peekx nwe'sxíiçxáa txãawe'sx nyakhtxi ahçeçxa kiikhe'jetxna. Aça' neywe'sxa' peekx nçxi'ktxi ahçeçxa kiikhe'jetxna, naapkaçxha' nçxi'kwe'sxa' neywe'sxtxi ahçeçxa kiikhe'jetxna.
Adxna nwẽese'pha'ga naa kiwete nasa jxukay i'kwe'sxtxi açetxna. Txã'wẽtewa, ũukhmée çxhãçxha uu entepkaçx fxi'zesa' txãawe'sx ũusa' Dxus nwe'weni yuutxna.
Txã'wẽ ahçeçxa ikhya' pakweeçpkaçxha', txãa çxhabuh kasehçxa vxite ahte me'jwe. Isath we'we', i'kwe'sx txã'wẽ Israelwe'sx çxhabsu jxuka pekũhmeyna, Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' kĩijana.
Piyasa' maa yuhwa kaapiya'jsate jxthaakwemeeta'. Txã'wẽ selpisa' patronte jxthaakwesame'.

Kaapiya'jsa ma'wẽ pkxuuni yuute', piyasaawa txã'wẽy nxuswa'ja's jxpa'gawa'jsata'. Aça' selpisaawa patron ma'wẽ pkxuuni yuute', txãawa txã'wẽy nxuswa'ja's jxpa'gawa'jsa'. Yat namu's Eçxthẽ'j jĩna kxsusçxa', txajx jxpe'jnisa yuutxi' wejx txã'jĩna we'wetxna.
Txã'wẽ yũutewa, nasatxi' ũukhnuwe. Adx we'weni' kĩh yuhwa txã'wẽ paaçte yu' neeyũuwa'jsame', sa' kĩh yuhwa txã'wẽ sũthçxa jiyunimée yu' neeyũumeena.
Adxa' i'kwe'sxçxáatxthu we'we', nawa txãa we'weni's nasa ma'wẽsatxwa jxuka ãate mwe'wewe. Sa' naa ja'date ayteçxáa we'weni's msuuwa jxuka mwe'wewe.
Kakweçxá's ikhsa's ũukhwa'jme'. Txãawe'sxa' ũus yu'sa' ikhya' ãjameetxna. Wejxwa kakwe petx ũus yã'jçxa infxiernote kaajxa' ãjawa'jsa's wejx ũukhwa'ja'.
E'z vxiçxakwetx teeçx centawote ¿txweyu'çyuhmeetxna' wakx? Txã'wẽ pa'gameekwesaçxawa, maa yuhwa kiwekhẽ wete'çmeeta', i'kwe'sx Tata' txã'wẽ jxthãasmeete yu'.
I'kwe'sx dxikthete dxkhas yuhwa jxuka isani ũsta'.
Ũukhnuwe, i'kwe'sxa' txãa vxiçxakwete jxthaakwe pa'gasai'kwe.
Maawa ũukhmée adx ju'gu we'wesatxi', adxwa adx Tata cielute ũsa' txajx tasxte txãawe'sx ju'gu we'we'nja.
Nawa maawa nasatx ũukhçxa adxa's jiimeeth jĩna ĩsxiijana txã'sa' adxwa txã'wẽyçxáa jiimeeth jĩna we'we'nja adx Tata cielute ũsa' txajx tasxte.
Naa kiwete yahçemée fxi'zewa'ja's nvxiht-ya' kĩhmeeth, nxuste yahçena fxi'zewa'ja's nvxiht-ya'th kĩh.
Adxna nwẽese'pha'gaçxáa neya' nçxi'ka's açena, naapkaçxha' njĩ'ja' niisa's açena, aça' swegra' nkuẽmyu's açena.
Txã'wẽ adxna nwẽese'pha'ga peekx yattewe'sxíiçxáa yaaçeni fxi'zetxna.

Maawa adx yu's yajkxmée naasáa ney vxite' njĩ'j txãawe'sxçxáatx jxthaakwe yaakxsa', adxa's selpiiya' ãjameetxna. Txã'wẽy maawa adx yu's yajkxmée naasáa nçxi'k vxite' niisa txãawe'sxçxáatx jxthaakwe yaakxsa' adxa's selpiiya' ãjameetxna.
Makwe thẽysa uuwa'jma'k pa'j nawa txãatxi' yajkxmée fxi'zesame' adx tasxte selpiiya' ãjameena.

Naa kiwete peekx ĩtxi fxi'zewa'jçxá's ya'nwe'wesa', cielute fxi'zewa'j thaakwe ewsa yu'sa' ivxiituna. Naapkaçxha' adxna nwẽese'pha'ga naa kiwete ĩtxi fxi'zeni's yajkxmée ivxiitusa' cielute ĩtxi fxi'zewa'j yu'sa' ivxiitumeena.
Maawa i'kwe'sxtxi wa'lmée jxpa'gasa', adxnawa jxpa'gasaçxa txã'wẽ yuuna. Sa' adxna jxpa'gaçxa', adxna jxkaahsanawa jxpa'gasa yuuna.

Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa txãawe'sxa' Dxus jxkaahnisata', aça' maawa txãawe'sxtxi wa'lmée ew jxpa'gasa', Dxus peesni's jxpa'gawa'jsata', Dxus yuwe pta'sxsatx peesni's íiçxáa. Sa' nasa ewsatx jxpa'gasa' ewsaçxa txã'wẽ yuuna, sa' nasa ewsatx dewenisa's íiçxáa jxpa'gana.
Isath we'we': Adxna nwẽese'jsa makwe wala ãhmeekwesatewa txã'sna yu'fxizeçxáawa yussa' dewenisa yuuna.
Jesusa' ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa txãa yakh u'jusa docesatx pta'sxna jxã'jçxa', txajũ kasehna u'kh txãa kiwesu çxhab le'çxkwesu kaapiya'jya'.
Aça' Jesus txã'wẽ yũuni's Juan Bautista kxuuphni ũsçxa jiyuçxa', txajx jxpe'jnisatx Jesus tasxna kaakh
na'jĩna pẽjxya':
—Kristo naa kiwete kĩiwa'jsa ũsu'k idxa' ¿txãa dxihgá', meeçxa' vxite ũythasuwá'nja'w? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—U'jçxa Juana's pta'sxine'kwe adx na'wẽ yũuna fxi'ze'th txã'sa' yafxju uyi'kwe sa' kaapiya'jni'swa wẽse'ji'kwe txã'sna:

uyya' ãjasameewa uyu'tx, legsawa katxhiçxa legmeetx neeyũ', wã'jy wee kazx ji'phsawa katxhinitx neeyũ', wẽse'jya' ãjasameewa wẽse'jya' ãja'tx, uuniisawa ki' ĩtxi yu'tx, sa' naa kiwete pxthaakuẽesa yuutxi' Dxus tasxte pa'jwa'ja's pta'sxnik yuu jĩne'kwe.
Aça' adxa's kuh yajkxna jxpubasamée yakh yu' wala yuh weçxa yuja'.
Txajũ' txãa pẽysa Jesus tasxu u'the', Jesusa' Juan ma'wẽsatewa pta'sxku kxtee wẽse'jsa nasatxi' na'jĩna:
—Nasa u'pnimée kiwete', i'kwe'sxa' ¿kĩhnakwe thegya' u'j? ¿Khĩih tasx wejxate ẽse'sesa's wá'kwe thegya' u'j?

Kxte' ¿kĩh ũski sũhçxakwe thegya' u'j? Meeçxa' ¿teeçx piçthẽ'j ropa zhiçxkwesa athçxa u'pna sũhçxa wá'kwe thegya' u'j? I'kwe'sxa' peekx jii i'kwe txã'wẽ ropa zhiçxkwesa athsa' jxkaahsawe'sx yat-suçxáatx u'pu'.
Kxte' ¿kimnakwe uy? Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa's wá'kwe uy. Isa txã'sna yuh uyne'kwe, nawa Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa maatewa jxthaakwesa's i'kwe uy.
Txã'sna we'weçxak Dxus librute na'jĩ':
Adxa' yuwee pta'sxsa kajaçthu iidx yaçte,
Iidx pa'jwa'ja's pheu'khan jĩna fxi'jni'.

Isath we'we', naa kiwete maa nasa yuhwa Juan Bautistate jxthaakwe walasa yu' kasehnimeeta' ãçxpkaçx. Makwe txã'wẽtewa, ãçxh naa ensuwe'sx maatewa jxthaakwe le'çxkuẽesaçxawa Dxus jxkaahnite u'kasa' Juan Bautistate jxthaakwe walasata'.
Juan Bautista pa'jnijũjx Dxus jxkaahni ena' açeni ũsa' ãçxpkaçx, txãa pa'gatx kaaknayu'jya'mée çxhãçxha puiina fxi'ze'.
Nawa Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena's Moises ley vxite' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa txãawe'sxa' txagaçxhíitx pta'sx Juan Bautista pa'phkaçx.
I'kwe'sxa' jiyu wẽeçxa', jxpa'yakx mwẽese'jwe: na'wẽ Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx we'weçxa', Dxus jxkaahwa'j en ãjaçpkaçxha', Elias pa'jana jĩ'tx txãak yu' Juan Bautista'.
Na'wẽ pta'sxya'wath txã'sna wẽse'jwa'jsa ũsçxa', mwẽese'jwe.
Naa ensu nasatxi' ¿ma'wẽ kaaja'da'the wejx ewki? Nawa txãawe'sxa' luuçx le'çxkuẽ na'wẽsata': luuçxçxáatx plaasasu pweesa'jya' kaçxçxa', txãawe'sx namikutx na'jĩna sus we'we':
Zhiçxkwetha'w kuvxí', nawa ku'ju'çmeei'kwe. Sa' nxus nxustha'w memu', nawa ũ'ne'çmeei'kwe jĩnatx we'we'.
Txã'wẽsaçxa i'kwe Juan Bautista's na'wẽ we'we': Eçx ji'phçxak txã'wẽ ũ'we'çmée, sa' vxinowa tudxi'çme' jĩna i'kwe açewe'we'.

Txãa e'su Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa pa'jçxa txã'wẽ ũ'na tudxna yuute', na'wẽi'kwe açewe'we': Wala pũ'we', sa' txã'wẽyku wala tudxi'. Pkalsawe'sx vxite' gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsawe'sx yakh namiku' jĩna i'kwe açewe'we'. I'kwe'sxa' jiimeeçxai'kwe txã'jĩ'. Nawa maawa jiyuwa'jsa yuutxi' Dxusa' kaajiyu'juna adx ma'wẽsatewa jĩk.

Txajũ' Jesusa' juuna'k we'we maa çxhabsuçxahne' wejx wala txã'wẽ kim yuhwa ãjanimeesa's kaavxya'ja'jna ũsu' kxsũuwe'sx nasatx. Txãa nasa' pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedmeene'ta naa pa'ga na'jĩk:

—Korazín çxhabte nasa vxite' Beçaida çxhabte nasa txãawe'sx yakha' wala yuh seena' ũukhũukha'. Txã'wẽ Tiro çxhabte nasa vxite' Sidon çxhabte nasa txãawe'sx ksxavxysu txã'wẽ kim yuhwa ãjanimeesa's kaavxya'ja'jwaça', txãawe'sxa' pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedni yã'j yuutxna.
Nawa na'jĩ'th na': Dxus kastigãywa'j en ãhte', Tiro çxhabte nasa vxite' Sidon çxhabtewe'sxte jxthaakwe txãawe'sxa' ya'kastigaĩtxna.

Aça' Kapernaum çxhabte nasa i'kwe'sx yu' cielute u'kawa'jsa yuhne'tka'w ¿sũju'kwe'? Txã'wẽmée wejx infxiernoteçxáa u'jwa'jsa i'kwe. Txã'wẽ Sodoma çxhabte kim yuhwa ãjanimeesa's kaavxya'ja'jwaça', txãa çxhaba' ãçxpkaçx ũs yuuna.
Txãa pa'ga na'jĩ'th na': Dxus kastigãywa'j en ãhte', Sodoma kiwesu nasate jxthaakwe i'kwe'sxa' ya'kastigaĩne'kwe jĩk.
Txãa ensu' Jesusa' na'jĩnak Dxus yakh puutx we'we:
—Tata, cielute vxite' naa kiwete jxkaahsa idxa' txakwe wala kĩhtewa jxuka jiisawe'sx yuutxi' kaajiyu'jmeeçxawa, pxthaa ãhmeekwesa yuutxi' kaajiyu'jg, txãa pa'gath txakwe wala weçxá' idxa's.
Idxa' txã'wẽg yũu, iidx jxthãasni' txã'wẽne' yu' naa pa'ga.

Adx Tata' kĩhnawa jxuka adxçxaçxáanak dukh. Nawa Dxus Nçxi'k ma'wẽsatewa kim yuhwa ew yu' jiimeeta', naasáa adx Tata yuuçxáa jiia'. Txã'wẽy kim yuhwa ew yu' jiimeeta' adx Tata's, naasáa Nçxi'k yuuçxáa ew jiia' Neya's. Txãasak maawa jiyu wẽesa yuutxi' Nçxi'ka' kaajiyu'ju' Ney kimtewa.
Maawa ũuste wẽtmée wahtxna fxi'zesa' adx tasxte myuhwe jxukaysa, aça' adxa' weçxana thẽymée fxi'zewa'ja's ũsu'nja.
Adx jxkaahni's wa'lmée jxpa'gaçxa, adx na'wẽy fxi'zeya' mpiyawe, txãa pa'gatey adxa' juuna'meekwe ũusuh jxuka peeygãhnath jxkaaja'. Txãa pa'ga weçxana thẽymée fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phune'kwe.
Adx jxkaahni' walame', sa' nwẽese'jwa'jwa thẽymeesata' jĩk.
Txãa ensu' Jesusa' skuutxh ehsuk skhẽuuç yu' sapatu jxkaase ente. Aça' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' wẽeçxa skuutxhtxi çxuktedeçxa ũ'tx.
Txã'wẽ yũute', fxariseowe'sx uyçxa' na'wẽtx we'we Jesusa's:
—¿Uyu'gá' idx yakh u'jusawe'sxa' na'wẽ yuuçta' mjĩi enmée jxkaase entewa? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—I'kwe'sxa' ¿iilẽeymeewá'kwe? Teeçx ente' Davxida' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh wẽeçxa' na'wẽk yũu:
Dxuus yatte u'kaçxa', kxtee pantxi ũ'k txãatxi' kim yuhwa ũ'wa'j ji'phmeeta' naasáa sacerdote yuuçxáatx ũ'wa'jsa yu'.
I'kwe'sxa' Moises leytewa ¿iilẽeymeewá'kwe? Kxte pta'sxçxa', dxuus yatte sacerdotewe'sxa' jxkaase'çmeeta' makwe jxkaase entewa jĩ'k. Txã'wẽ jxkaase ente jxkaasemeete', pkalna ¿sũju'çmeekwe'?
I'kwe'sxa' mjiyuwe: Ayte' dxuus yatte jxthaakwe jxtuhthesa ũsa'.

I'kwe'sxa' jiyu'çmeewá'kwe Dxus librute na'jĩ'k: Vxitetx peeygãaniçxá'sthu adxa' jxthãasu', tajkx ikhçxa altalte kabni's peejxmeeth jĩ'k. Txã'jĩni's jiyuwaça', kwe'sxtxi' ũusaçxana açewe'wemeene'kwe, txã'wẽçxáa yũunisa' pkalme' naa pa'ga.
Txãa pa'gatey sapatu jxkaase entewa Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa jxkaahwa'j ji'pha' jĩk.
Jesusa' txajũ u'jçxa', judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yattek u'ka.
Kxteea' teeçx piçthẽ'j teeçx kuse udxnisa kẽese'jya' ãjasameek u'p yu'. Aça' Jesusa's ewmée vxit wẽeçxa na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—Jxkaase entewa nuykatxhite ¿ewmanx? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—I'kwe'sx teeçx piisxáa ji'phte' txãa piisxá' jxkaase ente ewmeekhẽ khẽete', ¿u'jçxa kutxi'jmeema'kwe jxkaase entewa?
Nasa' piisxaate jxthaakwe pa'gasa', aça' wejx txã'wẽ ew yũuwa'ja' makwe jxkaase entewa.
Txã'wẽ pasçxa txãa piçthẽ'ja's na'wẽk we'we:
—Kuse's mku'le'j jĩte', txã'wẽy yuuk, naapkaçxha' txajx kuse' ewuuk ka'tuwe'sx na'wẽy.
Aça' fxariseowe'sxa' kasehçxa Jesusa's ikhya' puutx we'wetx.
Txã'wẽ yũuçte Jesus jiyuçxa', txajũ kasehna u'kh, aça' nasa wala u'jtx txãa yakh. Jesusa' ãça'sa ma'wẽsatxwa jxukak nuykatxhi,
nawa kim yuhtxwa pta'sxkaahme' nuykatxhisa kimtewa.
Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Isaias we'weni kxtey yuukahnçxáak txã'wẽ neewe'we. Isaiasa' na'jĩk:
Adxna selpiwa'jsa naa piçthẽ'ja'sthu txhitxh.
Txãasa peeygãhna weçxana ũsthu,
Sa' adx Espiritu's ũsu'nja,
Aça' adx ew yũuwa'ja's pta'sxina maa nasatxwa jxuka.
Txã' puiiwameena, sa' ãate susnawa fxi'zemeena.
Txãa pa'ga txajx we'weni' kĩh yuhwa pthũusemeena klxiikhunsu.
Makwe pxthaa ãhmeekwesatewa txã' ahçemeena,
Sa' çxhãçxha fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phmeeyã'thewa, txã' ivxiitumeena,
Naa kiwete zhiçxkwe txajx jxkaahwa'j en ãhpkaçx.
Aça' nasa' ma'wẽsawa jxuka txã'sçxáana ũythasutxna jĩ'k.
Txajũ' Jesus tasxte jxũna pa'jtx uyya' ãjasamée we'weya'wa ãjasamée eçx iiyamunisa's. Aça' Jesusa' nuykatxhite', txãa piçthẽ'ja' uyya' ãjak, sa' we'weya'wa ãjak.
Txã'wẽ yũute', nasa jxukaysa ũukh yajkxna na'wẽtx kuh jwed we'we':
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' Davxid Nçxi'k íina jĩ'tx.
Txã'jĩni's fxariseowe'sx wẽse'jçxa', na'jĩtx:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' eçxtxi nasaa ũusuh kutxi'ji'k nawa eçxthẽ'j pu'çxteçxáak txã'wẽ ãja' jĩ'tx.
Txã'wẽ yajkxna ũste Jesus jiyuçxa', na'wẽk we'we:
—Maa kiwetewa gobierno' peekx nasatxíiçxáa ahçeçxa puiiçxa', çxhãçxhameena. Txã'wẽy çxhab ma'k yuu meeçxa' teeçx yattewe'sx ma'tx yuu nawa puutx yahçena puiiçxa', puutx pçuutxna.
Txã'wẽy eçxthẽ'jwa txajx jxkaahnisa eçx yakhíiçxáa puiiçxa', çxhãçxhamée puutx pçuutxna.

I'kwe'sx adxna we'weçxa', eçxthẽ'j pu'çxteçxáak eçxtxi kutxi'ji' jĩna i'kwe we'we'. Aça' txã'wẽ dxihte', txã'wẽ i'kwe'sx yakh u'jusawe'sxwa eçxtxi kutxi'jya' ãja'tx jĩ'i'kwe aça' txã'wẽ ãjawa'ja's ¿kimki'k ũs? Txã'wẽ i'kwe'sx yakh fxi'zesaíiwa ãate kaajiyu'ju'tx i'kwe'sx jxpubani's.
Adxa' eçxtxi kutxi'ji'th Dxus Espiritu pu'çxte'. Nawa i'kwe'sxtxi Dxusçxaçxáa jxkaahwa'j en ãhne' txãa pa'ga ne'tka txã'wẽ yũ'.
Maawa piçthẽ'j çxhãçxhasa iiyamuni's kusa'jya' u'jçxa', txãa piçthẽ'j çxhãçxhasa khuẽ'yna tudmeeçxa yu', kusa'jya' ãjameena. Txã's khuẽ'yna tudçxa yuuçxáa kusa'jya' ãjana.
Adx ju'gu yuusame' açesaçxa txã'wẽ yuutxna. Sa' adxa's pu'çxsame', yupsaaçxa txã'wẽ yuutxna.
Na'jĩ'th na', nasa kĩhwa ewmée yũuni kĩhwa Dxusna ewmée nuywe'wetewa txãatxi' jxuka ya'peltunaĩna. Nawa Dxus Espiritu's açewe'wete', bagaçxte yuhwa peltunãywa'jmée yuuna.
Sa' maawa Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's ewmée nuywe'wesa's peltunãywa'j yuuna. Nawa Dxus Espiritu's ewmée nuywe'wesa yuuçxáana peltunãywa'jmée yuuna naa kiwete cielutewa.
Fxtũu tasx ewsa' ewku yũnu'. Nawa fxtũu tasx ewmeesa' ewmeek yũnu'. Fxtũu tasx ma'wẽsatewa yũnte yuuçxáak ya'jiyu'.
Ewmeesa luuçx i'kwe'sxa' ¿ma'wẽ ew we'weya' ãjaki'kwe, ũuste yuu ewmeesa ji'phçxa'? Txãa pa'gatey ũuste yaakxni'sku ya'we'we'.
Nasa ewsa' ewsaçxá'sku we'we', txajx ũuste' ewsaçxá's ji'phna naa pa'ga. Naapkaçxha' nasa ewmeesa' ewmeesaçxá'sku we'we', txajx ũuste' ewmeesaçxá's ji'phna naa pa'ga.
Adxa' na'jĩ'th na': Dxus kastigãywa'j ente' jxuka pta'sxi ji'phutxna kĩhwa jxuka ewmée we'weni's.
Idx ma'wẽ we'weni'swa jxuka paapẽyni yuuna, txajũ yuuwema'g yuu meeçxa' yuuwemeema'g yuu nawa ya'jiyuna.
Txajũ' fxariseowe'sx vxite' ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx Jesusa's na'jĩnatx pẽjx:
—Txã'wẽ kim yuhwa ãjanimeesa's kwe'sxtxi mkaavxya'ja' jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Nasa ewmeesa ĩsxiisawe'sxa' kim yuhwa ãjanimeesa'stxi kaavxya'ja'khaja'. Nawa txã'wẽ yũumée Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Jonas fxi'zeniçxáana ya'pta'sxina.
Jonaswa ma'wẽga wedx tutxhte tekh en tekh kus u'pu', txã'wẽy Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusaawa tekh en tekh kus kiwe dxiiga ũsuna.

Dxus kastigãywa'j en ãhte', Niniwe çxhabtewe'sxa' naa ensuwe'sxtxi' ewmeete nvxiitutxna, txãa pa'gatey Jonas Dxus yuwe's pta'sxiçpkaçxha', Niniwetewe'sxa' pkaltxi nvxihtçxa wa'lmée Dxus tasxte utxaatx. Aça' ayte' Jonas na'wẽsaçxáamée jxthaakwesa ũsa', nawa txãa yu'sa' wa'lu'tx.

Txã'wẽy Dxus kastigãywa'j en ãhte', jxu'j kiwete jxkaahsa u'ya' naa ensuwe'sxtxi' ewmeete nvxiituna, txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽ jxu'j kiwejuwa txãa u'ya' yuwe'k Salomon pta'sxniçxá'swa wa'lmée wẽse'jya'. Aça' ayte' Salomonte jxthaakwesa ũsa', nawa txãa yu'sa' wa'lu'tx.
Eçxa' nasa ũusuh kasehçxa kiwe uhdxsu pekũhna u'juçxawa u'pwa'j uymeeçxa':
Sxawedu'nja kasehth txãa yatnay sũju'k. Txajũ' sxawedna pa'jçxa', txãa piçthẽ'ja's uyuuna yata's ma'wẽ ew pheu'jçxa padçxa txaahni ũs yuukx txã'wẽ.

Txajũ' u'jçxa vxite siete eçx txãate jxthaakwe ewmeesatx jxũna pa'jçxa txãa piçthẽ'j ũuste jxuka khẽjetxna, aça' txãa piçthẽ'ja' iiméh jxthaakwe ewmeesa yuuna. Txã'wẽ yuuwa'j en pa'jana naa nasa ewmeesatxi' jĩk.
Jesus txã'wẽ nasatx we'wena ũsiyna, njĩ'j vxite' nyakhwe'sx txãa yakh we'weya' pa'jçxa ekate ũsu'tx.
Aça' kxte ũssa teeçxsa' Jesusa's pta'sxku:
—Iidx mama iidx nyakhwe'sx idx yakh puutx we'weya' pa'jçxa ay ekate ũsta' jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we pta'sxsa's:
—Adx mama adx nyakhwe'sxa' kimtewa jiimeewá'kwe jĩçxa',
txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi kuseju vxijxaçxa:
—Naawe'sxçxáa adx mama, adx nyakhwe'sxta'.
Txãa pa'gatey maawa adx Tata cielute ũsa' txajx jxthãasni's kxtey yuusaaçxáa txã'wẽ adx nyakh, adx npe'sx, adx mama na'wẽsata' jĩk.
Txãa enteyíiçxáa Jesusa' yatuh kasehçxa ĩkhwala pukate ũsya'k u'j.
Aça' txajx ũsnite wala nasa pkhaakhete', Jesusa' barkotek khẽe. Aça' nasa yu' ĩkh pukatee neeyũutx.
Txajũk wala kaapiya'j ejemplo kaaja'da'jçxa na'jĩna:
—Skuutxh uuhsa' ujxa' kasejk.
Aça' uhna u'jweçte', msuuíi yu' dxi'jsutx ũsxi skuutxh fxiwa'. Aça' vxiçxakwe pa'jçxa skuutxh fxiwtxi ũ'tx.
Vxite ahsu' kwet kajkwesutx ũsxi, kiwe wejkuẽçxáa ji'phsu. Aça' kxsũ ũsxisa' wala dud buçxatx kiwe walameene'ta ya'fxihb txãa pa'ga.
Nawa sek açxaate' jxuka uhdxtxi, iiwehçeya' ãjameene'ta naa pa'ga.
Vxite skuutxh fxiwa' çhũçh ksxavxysutx ũsxi, aça' çhũçh khuẽ'y walaaçxa', skuutxha's aphçxa ivxiitutx.
Nawa vxite ahsu' kiwe wala ewsu ũsxitx, sa' wala yũntxi. Maa tasxíi yu' cien, vxite' sesenta, vxite' treinta nxinx txã'wẽtx çut.
Na'wẽ pta'sxni's jiyuwa'jsa ũsçxa', jiyune'kwe jĩk.
Txajũ' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' Jesus tasxte utxaaçxa na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—¿Kĩjxa'ga ejemplo kaaja'da'jçxaçxáa nasatx pta'sxi'? jĩte',
na'wẽk pas Jesusa':
—Dxus jxkaahni ensu ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa kim yuhwa jiyunimeesa's i'kwe'sx yuutxi's kaajiyu'jwa'ja'. Nawa vxite yuutxi's kaajiyu'jwa'jme'.
Txãa pa'gatey jiyuwa'jsa's jweeíiçxáa ãate ya'kaajiyu'juna, wala jiyukahn. Nawa jiyuwa'jmeesa's ya'kaajiyu'jmeena, wejxwa le'çxkweçxáawa jiiwáa yuuna txã's yuhnawa kusa'jni yuuna.
Txãa pa'gath ejemplo kaaja'da'jçxaçxáa we'we'. Txã'wẽ yuukahníi txãawe'sxa' uyçxawa, uysamée na'wẽ jiyu'çmeeta', sa' wẽse'jçxawa wẽse'jsamée na'wẽ nwẽese'je'çmeeta'.
Txãawe'sx fxi'zewa'ja's Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Isaias we'weni' kxtey yuuk. Txã' na'wẽk we'we:
I'kwe'sxa' wẽse'jewá'kwe, nawa jiyumeene'kwe.
Uyuwá'kwe, nawa txãana sũhmeene'kwe.
Txãa pa'gatey txãa nasa ũusa' jxuka ewmeesaçxáa yuuna pa'jni'.
Txãa pa'gatx wẽse'jya' wa'lu',
Sa' txãawe'sx yafxju uykahmén,
Txãawe'sx thũ'wẽjuwa wẽse'khamen,
Yafxa' jxuka aphanita' txãawe'sx ũuste ew jiyukahmén.
Txãa pa'gatx adx tasxte pa'ja'çmée adx nuykatxhikahn jĩ'k.
Nawa i'kwe'sx yakha' wala yuh weçxa yuja' i'kwe'sx yafxju yuu uyi'kwe, sa' i'kwe'sx thũ'wẽju yuu wẽse'ji'kwe naa pa'ga.
Isath we'we', maazkuẽesawa Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa vxite' nasa ewsa nyafxiiwe'sxwa uy wẽetx i'kwe'sx uyna ũsi'kwe txã'sna, nawa uymeeta'. Wẽse'j wẽetx i'kwe'sx wẽse'jna ũsi'kwe txã'sna, nawa wẽse'jmeeta'.
Ãçxha' mjiyuwe skuutxh uuhsa's kaaja'da'jçxa pta'sxni's.
Naa kiwete Dxus jxkaahwa'ja's pta'sxni's wẽse'jçxawa jiyusame', skuutxh fxiw dxi'jsu ũsxisáa na'wẽsata': Nasa' Dxus yuwe's wẽse'thewa, eçxthẽ'ja' pa'jçxa ũusuh kutxi'jina.
Skuutxh fxiw kwet kajkwesu ũsxisa' Dxus yuwe's wala weçxana jxpa'gasa na'wẽsata'.
Nawa Dxus yuwe's açxamée çxhãçxha yaakxsa' çxhãçxha'çmeeta'. Txã'wẽ Dxus yuwe's jxpa'gapa'ga, pkxuuwa'j en pa'theçxáa jxuka fxĩykaja'tx.

Skuutxh fxiw çhũçh ksxavxysu ũsxisa' Dxus yuwe's wẽse'jçxawa naa kiwetewe'sxçxá's wejx wala yajkxna ji'phunisaçxá's pa'pçxusa na'wẽsata'. Aça' txã'wẽsaçxá's wejx wala yajkxte', txãaçxáa jxuka knayu'k Dxus yuwe yu'sa' kaapeçxkana'jna.

Nawa skuutxh fxiw kiwe ewte ũsxisa' Dxus yuwe's wẽse'jçxa kxtey yuusáa na'wẽsata': Skuutxh spiigawa ma'wẽga cien vxite' sesenta vxite' treinta nxinx ji'phu', txã'wẽyku txãawe'sx ũuste Dxus yuwe' wala pena' jĩk.
Jesusa' vxite ejemplo na'wẽk kaaja'da'jçxa pta'sx:
—Naa kiwete Dxus jxkaahni ente Dxus yuwe ewsaçxá's pta'sxtewa, na'wẽ yuuna: Teeçx mjĩisa' txajx kiwete fxiw ewsa'sku uh.
Nawa jxukaysa dejeçpkaçxha', uuthasx namu's açesa pa'jçxa ũ'nimeesa'sku skuutxh ksxavxyte uhçxa u'j.
Aça' skuutxh buçxaçpkaçxha', txãa ksxavxyte jxũth tasx ũ'nimeesawa vxyaak.
Txã'wẽ yũute', selpisaawe'sxa' na'jĩnatx namu's pta'sxya' u'j: Idxa' fxiw ewsaçxá'sgu uh, aça' naa jxũth tasx ewmeesa' ¿ma'wẽ yũuçxaga buçxa? jĩte',
namu' na'wẽk pas: Maa açesa uhne'ta jĩk. Txajũ' selpisaawe'sxa' pẽjxtxi: ¿Txãa jxũth tasx ewmeesa's khubeya' u'jmtha'w? jĩte',
namu' na'wẽk we'we: Kuçx yuunuwe. Txã'wẽme', petx skuutxh tasx yã'jçxa ya'khubeetxna.

Manvxihtwe, peekx walaatxna, skuutxh wakawa'j en ãhpkaçx. Txãa ente adxa' jxkaaja'nja mjĩisatxi', aça' jxũth tasx ewmeesa khuẽ'yna jxuka khubeçxa tudutxna kabwa'j. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa skuutxha's adx yatte jxaawuutxna jĩk.
Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx vxite ejemplo kaaja'da'jçxa:
—Naa kiwete Dxus jxkaajxa' takhni ena' na'wẽsa': Teeçx mjĩisa' mostasa fxiwa's kiwete ujk.
Txãa fxiwa' maa maa fxiwtewa thaakwe le'çxkuẽesa'. Nawa buçxayã'jçxa', maa ũ'tasxtewa jxthaakwek walá'. Aça' txã'wẽ seena' walaate', vxiçxakwe yuhwa pa'jçxa ku'tasu yaatu'tx jĩk.
Vxite ejemplo kaaja'da'jçxa na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Naa kiwete Dxus jxkaahni ena' na'wẽ yũuwa'jsa': Teeçx u'y panu'juççxa', tekh libra skuutxh ũ'wete lewadura's ka'dte ma'wẽ jxuka pẽethejekx txã'wẽ yũuwa'jsa' jĩk.
Jesusa' ejemplo kaaja'da'jçxa yuuçxáak pta'sxi' nasa jxukaysatx. Ejemplo kaaja'da'jmée yu', pta'sxi'çme'.
Txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa na'jĩna fxi'kh txãak kxtey yuu. Na'wẽk fxi'j:
Kim yuhtxwa kaajiyu'jnimeesa ũsyã'jtx yu' naa kiwe's vxitiyna txã'sna pta'sxi'nja ejemplo kaaja'da'jçxa yuuçxáa jĩnak fxi'j.
Txajũ' Jesusa' nasa tasxuh txuteeçxa yattek u'ka, aça' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' utxaaçxa na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—Jxũth tasx ewmeesa's kaaja'da'jna we'weni's ãate mkaajiyu'j jĩte',
Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Fxiw ewsana uuhsa' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusá'.
Aça' uuthasx jĩnisa' naa kiwe'. Fxiw ewsa jĩna we'we'th txãa yu' nasa Dxus jxkaahnite ũswa'jsatxthu txã'jĩ'. Sa' eçxthẽ'j nasa yuutxi' jxũth tasx ewmeesa jĩ'th.
Aça' jxũth tasx ewmeesa's uuhsa yu', eçxthẽ'jíiçxá'. Skuutxh wakawa'j en jĩ'th txãa yu' naa kiwe pçuwa'ja'sthu txã'jĩ'. Aça' ũ'a's pkhakhsa', Dxus angeleswe'sxta'.
Jxũth tasx ewmeesa's ma'wẽta pkhakhçxa ipxte abu' çxhavxykahn, txã'wẽy yũuni yuuna naa kiwe pçuute'.
Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusá' angeleswe'sxtxi kajana txã'wẽ ewmée yũuna vxitetx pkalte kweete'jna ũssawe'sxtxi txajx jxkaahna ũsnijũ kutxi'jçxa
ipx walate akhkahn. Kxteea' seena' yuh pebeetxna ki'thtxi ksuusu'jna.
Naapkaçxha' Dxus jxthãasni's kxtey yuusa' sek na'wẽ eena' kweethetxna Tata cielute jxkaahna ũsnite. I'kwe'sxa' jiyuwa'jsa ũsçxa', jiyune'kwe.

Naa kiwete Dxus jxkaahna ũsni ena' iiméh seena' pa'gasa's kiwe dxiite sũthçxa txaahni na'wẽsa': Teeçx piçthẽ'jwa ma'wẽ txã'wẽ pa'gasa's uyçxa', ãçxhíi yu' jxũna u'jya' ãjameeçxa kxteyçxáa wejx ew sũthçxa txajakx, sa' wala weçxana u'jçxa txajx ji'phuni's jxuka txweyçxa txãa vxyuju kiwe's weyuukx mteene' ewsa's sũthçxa txah txãa kiwe's txã'wẽysa'.
Naa kiwete Dxus jxkaahna ũsni ena' na'wẽsa': Perla zhiçxkwesa's weysaawa ma'wẽ pakweçxa
teeçx perla iiméh pa'gasa's uyçxa', txajx ji'phuni's jxuka txweyçxa txãa vxyuju perla's weyuukx txã'wẽysa'.
Naa kiwete Dxus jxkaahna ũsni ente' na'wẽ yũuwa'ja': Wedx ukhe'swa ma'wẽ ĩkhwalakhẽ akhte', wedx ma'wẽsatxwa jxuka pkhakhekx.
Aça' wedx uwesá' ukhe's tuhmete kutxi'jçxa wedxtxi txhitxhya' kaçxçxa ewsa's kanastate ãsxçxa', ewmeesatxi' ĩkhwalakhẽ ãsxitxki
txã'wẽy yuutxna Dxus angeleswe'sxa' naa kiwe pçuwa'j en ãhte'. Sa' txãawe'sxa' ewmeesatxi' ewsa ksxavxyuh txhitxhçxa ipx walate akhetxna.
Kxteea' seena' yuh pebeetxna ki'thtxi ksuusu'jna.
Txã'wẽ kaapiya'jni's Jesusa' na'jĩnak pẽjx:
—¿I'kwe'sxa' jxuka jiyukwe' na'wẽ pta'sxni's? jĩte', txãawe'sxa':
—Jiyuíitha'w jĩnatx pas.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena's jiyusa' ley kaapiya'jsawa ma'wẽ nyafxíi kaapiya'jni's piyaçxa kaapiya'jni u'sesa'swa jxpa'gaçxa wala jiisa yuukx txã'wẽy e'z jwed jiisa yuutxna jĩk.
Naa ejemplotx Jesusa' pta'sxna jxã'jçxa', txajũ u'kh txajx kiwen.
Kxteea' judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenitek kaapiya'jna ũsu'. Aça' nasa' kuh yajkxna na'jĩ'tx:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿mteeki'k txakwe wala piya txã'wẽ ãjaya'? ¿Ma'wẽ yũuçxaga txã'wẽ kim yuhwa ãjanimeesa's kaavxya'ja'ja'?
Naaíi ¿karpintero nçxi'k meená', aça' njĩ'ja' Maria meená'? Aça' txajx nyakhwe'sxa' Jakobo, Jose, Simon, vxite' Judas txãawe'sxta',
aça' txajx npe'sxwe'sxwa ayte kwe'sx yakh ũsta'. ¿Majũki'k piya na'wẽ kĩhnawa jxuka ãjawa'ja's?
Txã'wẽ jiitx yu', txãa pa'gatx Jesus we'weni's kxtey yuumée. Nawa Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa' peekx kiwesu vxite' peekx yattewe'sx weeçxni yuuçxáa fxi'zetxna maawa jĩçxa',
kim yuhwa ãjanimeesa's jwee yu' kaavxya'ja'jme', txãawe'sxa' txajx we'weni's kxtey nwẽese'jmeeta' naa pa'ga.
Txãa ensu' Herodesa' Galilea kiwetek ne'jwe'sx yu', sa' Jesus kĩjkĩhwa ew yũuni's jiyuçxa',
txãa yakh ũssawe'sxtxi na'wẽk we'we:
—Txãa piçthẽ'ja' Juan Bautistane' ki' ĩtxi yuu. Txãasane' txã'wẽ kim yuhwa ãjanimeesa'swa kaavxya'ja'jya' ãja' jĩk.
Herodesa' Juan Bautista's na'wẽ yũuçxaga ikh: Juana's tudçxa karcelte ktxaaja'kha, nawa Herodes nyakh Fxelipe nyu Herodias pa'gaçxáane' txã'wẽ karcelte ktxaaja'j.
Txãa ensu' Juan Bautista' Herodesa's we'weçxa':
—Iidx yakhthẽ'j nyua's kusa'jçxa iidx nyu na'wẽ jxpe'jwa'j ji'phmeeg jĩte',
Herodesa' Juana's ikhe'nja sũhne'. Nawa nasa jxukaysa Juan ju'guçxaçxáane'ta ũsu', Juana' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsapa'ga. Txãa pa'gane' ũukhçxa ikhmée karcelteçxáa txah.
Nawa teeçx ente' Herodesa' txajx upxni en anxu ãhte fxiesta vxitte', Herodias niisa' nasa pi'kxnisa dxi'pte wala zhiçxkwe ku'jya' kasehne'. Txãa pa'ga Herodesa' iiméh wala weçxaçxa,
kĩh pẽjxtewa jxuka ũsu'nja jĩnane' puutx we'we txãa kna'sa's.
Txajũ' njĩ'j yu'kxpehte', txãa kna'sa' na'wẽga pẽjx Herodesa's:
—Juan Bautista dxikthea's plaatute akhçxa ũsune'ga jĩte',
ne'jwe'sx Herodesa' wala nxusçxawa, txã'wẽ yã'jne' kĩh pẽjxtewa ũsya' puutx we'we nasa pi'kxnisa dxi'pte, txãa pa'ga kxtey yũuya' neeyũuyã'jçxa',
Juan dxikthea's spẽ'thkaahne' karcelte.
Aça' dxikthea's plaatute akhçxa ũste', txãa kna'sa yu' njĩ'ja'sne' dukh.
Txã'wẽ yũute', Juan Bautista yakh pi'kxna u'jusawe'sxa' pa'jçxa uuníi kakwe's jxũna u'jçxa pedaane'ta. Sa' u'jçxa Jesusa's pta'sxne'ta.

Txã'wẽ Herodesa' Juan Bautista's ikhku jĩni's Jesusa' jiyuçxa', barkote khẽeçxa u'kh teeçx ahte kim yuhwa u'pnimeesate pa'jya'. Nawa Jesus mtee pa'jya' u'thewa jiyuçxa nasa' çxhabu kasehçxa Jesus pa'jwa'the pakwena u'jtx çxidaçxáa.
Aça' Jesusa' barkoju kasejeççxa' uyku nasa wala kuh ũste, sa' txãawe'sxtxi peeygãhçxa nuykatxhik ãça'satx pe'jçxa nuypa'jnisatxi'.
Txajũ' kusna kĩjaçte', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' Jesus tasxte utxaaçxa na'wẽtx we'we:
—Kusuçyã'ja', naapkaçxha' aysu' kim yuhwa u'pnimeesa'. Aça' nasatxi' mkaah çxhabsu pa'jçxa kĩhçxáawa weyçxa ũ'kahn jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—Txãawe'sxa' ũ' weyya' u'jwa'j peejxmeena. I'kwe'sx mpuuçwe jĩte',
na'wẽtx pas:
—Kwe'sxa' kĩhwa wala yu' ji'phmeetha'w. Tahç pan e'z wedxçxáa ji'phtha'w jĩte',
Jesusa':
—Txãatxi' mneejxũhwe jĩnak jxkaah.
Txajũ' nasatx kaçxkaakh txaksũ. Sa' tahç pan e'z wedxtxi jxpa'gaçxa, cielute pagayçxa Dxusa's weçxaçxa pantxi pe'ltedek. Txã'wẽ yũuçxak txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi ũs, aça' txãawe'sxa' ũsu'stxi nasatx.
Aça' jxukaysa ũ'çxa txikte', doce kanastate utatx kijxasaatx pkhakh.
Ũ'sawe'sxa' cinko mil piçthẽ'jtx yu', u'ywe'sx vxite' luuçxwe'sxtxi yu'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi barkote yaçte kaakh, sa' txãa yu' kxtee neeyũuk nasa txuteena u'jsatx weçxana.
Txajũ' nasa jxuka txuteena u'the', thã'j vxiçna u'kh txãaçxáa Dxus yakh puutx we'weya'. Jxuka çxhi'dxni yã'thewa, Jesusa' kxtee nee ũsíiçxáak yu'.
Naapkaçxha' barko' ĩkh pxãjũy u'jweçku yu'. Aça' wejxaa wala kiiteçxa, dxi'puh sẽhçxa barko's yupku.
Aça' khikhyna sẽjxa'wate', Jesusa' utxaana kũjk ĩkh kajkwega çxidaçxáa.
Aça' ĩkh kajkwega txã'wẽ yuhte uyçxa', barkote u'jsawe'sxa' ũukhna na'jĩnatx sus we'we:
—Eçxa'stha'w uy jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Ũukhnuwe, adxthu jĩte',
Pedro we'weçxa' na'jĩk:
—Adxthu jĩ'g na' txãa dxihçxa', adxwa txã'wẽy ĩkh kajkwesu çxidaçxáa yujxa' ãjakahn mkaah jĩte',
Jesusa':
—Txã'wẽçxa' myuh jĩnak we'we.
Aça' Pedro' barkojũ sa'jçxa, Jesus tasxte pa'j u'jya' u'jweçku yu' ĩkh kajkwesu.
Nawa wejxa seena' çxhãçxha ũste', ũukhku. Sa' txã'wẽ ũukhpa'gaçxáa ĩkh dxiikhẽ khẽjeççxa', susku we'we:
—Meen nwe'we jĩçpkaçxha',
Jesusa' pu'kisçxa na'jĩk:
—¿Kĩjxa'ga Dxusa's yu' yajkxmée, ũukhwa'jçxá's yajkx? jĩçxa',
Jesusa' barkote Pedro yakh khẽjeçpkaçxha', wejxaa wala' jxuka yujuk.
Aça' barkote ũssa' Jesus tasxte peejxũkweçxa na'wẽtx we'we:
—Isa, idxa' Dxus Nçxi'k yuh yu'ga jĩtx.
Ĩkhuy ktejkaçxa', Genesaret kiwete pa'jtx.
Aça' kxsũ nasa' Jesus pa'jni's jiyuçxa txãa kiwesu nasatx jxuka pta'sxte', nasa' ãça'satx jxuka Jesus tasxte nuypa'jtx,
na'jĩna pxthaa we'wena:
—Iidx atxh vxiçteçxáawa makhya'dxi'j jĩçxa, txã'wẽ jxa'dxsa' jxuka katxhiçxatx neeyũ'.
Fxariseowe'sx vxite' ley kaapiya'jsa txãawe'sxa' Jerusalen çxhabu pa'jçxa', maaíi yu' na'jĩnatx Jesus tasxte utxáa:
—Idx yakh u'jusawe'sxa' ¿kĩh yũuçxata yaçgawe'sx kaapiya'jnitxi' kxtey yu'çmée, txã'wẽ kusekhẽ yu' kaahmée ũ'wé'?
Txã'jĩte', Jesuswa pẽjxku na'jĩna:
—I'kwe'sxwa ¿kĩh yũuçxakwe i'kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx kaapiya'jniçxá's nwẽese'jçxa' Dxus jxkaahni yu'sa' kxtey yu'çmée?
Dxusa' na'wẽk jxkaaja': Iidx tata iidx mama txãawe'sxtxi' peeygãhna pu'çxwa'ja'. Aça' txã'wẽ yũumée neywe'sxtxi açewe'wesa' uu ena's ji'phuna jĩ'k.
Nawa i'kwe'sxa' yaçga kaapiya'jniçxá's nwẽese'jçxa Dxus jxkaahni yu'sa' kxtey yuumée ũsi'kwe.
I'kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxa' na'wẽtx kaapiya'ja': Maa nasawa neywe'sxtxi peeygãhna pu'çxmée, adx ji'phuni i'kwe'sxtxi pu'çxwa'ja's Dxusna dukhe'nja jĩna we'weçxaçxáa, neywe'sxtxi' pu'çxmeetewa ewa' jĩ'tx.
Yuwejuçxáa ew we'weçxa', ũuste yu' ewmeeçxáa yaakxsai'kwe, aça' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Isaiasa' isa yuh Dxus we'weni's na'jĩna fxi'jne':
Naa nasa' yuweju yu' adxa's yaaki'tha'w jĩçxawa, ũusuh yu' adxa's yaaki'çmeeta'.
Naa kiwete nasaa kaapiya'jniçxá's kxtey yuuna ũsçxa, txã'wẽ Dxus jxkaahni'stha'w kxtey yu' jĩte', kxul yuhna jĩ'k.
Txajũ' nasatx pa'yaçxa na'wẽk we'we Jesusa':
—Jiyuya' mwẽese'jwe.
Kĩh ũ'wa tutxhteçxáa khẽesa yu', nasatx ewmeesa vxitu'çme', naasáa ũusuh ewmée yaakxnisa yuuçxáak nasatx ewmeesa vxitu'.
Txajũ' Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' utxaaçxa na'wẽtx we'we:
—Idx txã'wẽ we'wete', fxariseowe'sxa' ũusaçxanatx neeyũu jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Kĩh tasxwa adx Tata cielute ũssa uuhnisamée yu'sa' khubeni yuuwa'ja'.
Aça' ũukhnuwe. Txãawe'sxa' yafx ji'phmeesa, yafx ji'phmeesa nwe'sxtxi pe'jna u'jusaçxáata'. Txã'wẽ yafx ji'phmeesa yafx ji'phmeesa nwe'sxtxi pe'jna u'juçxa', e'zíi kafxkhẽ khẽjetxna.
Txã'jĩte', Pedro' Jesusa's na'jĩnak pẽjx:
—Ejemplo kaaja'da'jçxa we'weni's ãate mpeeta'sx jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—¿I'kwe'sxwa jiyu'çmeewá'kwe?
Kĩh ũ'wa tutxhkhẽçxáak u'jwe', sa' txajũ ki' kaseje'k.
Nawa ũusuh yaakxnisa yuuçxáak nasa's ewmeesa vxitu'.
Txãa pa'gatey ũusujk kaseje' ewmée yaakxnisa, nasatx ikh wẽenisa, ptamçxawa vxitesa yakh fxi'zeni, ma'wẽsa yakhwa pkal yuuna fxi'zeni, pesweeni, ĩsxiina ewmée nuywe'weni, Dxusna açewe'weni.
Txã'wẽ yaakxnisatx nasa's ewmeesa vxitu'. Nawa kusekhẽ yu' kaahmée ũ'nisaçxáa yu', nasatx ewmée vxitu'çme'.
Jesusa' txajũ kasehçxa u'kh Tiro vxite' Sidon kiwen.
Aça' teeçx u'y Kanaanuwe'sx txãa kiwete pa'jçxa u'psa' Jesus tasxte pa'kh pxthaa we'wena:
—Davxid ji'j, ũ'kwe's meen peeygãh. Ũ'kwe niisa's eçx iiyamute', iiméh wala pxthaa yuuna ũsa' jĩtewa,
Jesusa' ma'wẽçxáa yuhwa pasme'. Aça' Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' Jesusa's we'wetx na'jĩna:
—Kwe'sx e'ste kuçx susna yuukahmen yatna mkaah jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩnak pas:
—Piisxakuẽ na'wẽ vxituna ũssa Israelwe'sxçxáatxku pakweya' kaah Dxusa' jĩtewa,
txãa u'ya' sxuuna' yuumée utxaana kũhçxa txajx tasxte peejxũkwek:
—Ũ'kwe's meen pu'çx jĩna.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—Luuçx ũ'wa'ja's kusa'jçxa alkutx ũswa'jme'
jĩtewa, txãa u'y pasçxa':
—Isa yuh we'we'g. Nawa alku' pejka ũ'we'tx mesa tasxsu pan pe'la ũsxisaçxáatxwa jĩte',
Jesus we'weçxa':
—Dxusa' pu'çxyujuna sũhwa'j yuuçxá's i'kwe yaaki', txãa pa'ga i'kwe pẽyni' kxtey yuuna jĩçpkaçxha', txãa dudtey txãa u'y niisa' katxhinik neeyũu.
Jesusa' txajũ kasehçxa Galilea ĩkh pukasuk u'j. Sa' thã'j vxiçtek tejka.
Aça' nasa wala pa'jtx txajx tasxte ãça'satx pe'jçxa, legsa, uyya' ãjasamée, we'weya' ãjasamée, ẽseya' ãjasameetx. Aça' txã'wẽ wala kuh ãça'satx Jesus tasxte nuypa'the', txã' nuykatxhik.

Txã'wẽ we'weya' ãjasameewa we'weya' ãjatx, aça' ẽseya' ãjasameewa katxhitx, aça' legsawa ew u'jya' ãjatx, naapkaçxha' uyya' ãjasameewa uyya' ãjatx. Aça' nasa' wala kuh yajkxna Israelwe'sx Dxusa's wala weçxatx.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi pa'yaçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Naa nasa' ayte adx yakh tekh en yã'j ũsta', sa' kĩh yuhwa ũ'wa'j ji'phmeeta', txãa pa'gath peeygãja', sa' puuçmée yu' kaahme'nja. Txã'wẽme' dxi'the u'jya' çxhãçxhameetxna jĩte',
na'wẽtx pas:
—Nawa ¿kĩhte txakwe wala ũ' uyuukxtha'w nasa txãazkuẽesa ũ'wa'j? Ayte' kim yuhwa u'p kiweme' aça' jĩte',
Jesusa' pẽjxku:
—I'kwe'sxa' ¿maz pan ji'phkwe? jĩte', txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Siete pan, wedx kuhmeekuẽçxáa ji'ptha'w jĩnatx pas.
Aça' nasatxi' kiwesu kaçxkaahçxa',
siete pan vxite' wedxtxi jxpa'gana'wa Dxusa's weçxak. Txã'wẽ yũuçxak pe'ltedeçxa txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi ũs, aça' txãawe'sxa' nasatx ũsu'stxi.
Jxukaysa ũ'çxa txikte', kijxaasa's pkhakhtxi, aça' siete kanastate utak neeyũu.
Ũ'sawe'sxa' kuatro mil ãhtx yu', nawa u'y vxite' luuçx txãawe'sx yuutxi' isaniméek kxaz yu'.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxa Jesusa' nasatx kaahçxa', txãa yu' barkote khẽeçxa Magdala kiwenku u'j.
Fxariseowe'sx vxite' saduceowe'sxwa pa'jçxa', Jesus ewmée yũutewa kpajkxya' sũhçxa pẽjxtxi:
—Cieluju kĩhçxáawa mkaavxya'ja'j jĩna.
Nawa Jesus pasçxa' na'jĩk:
—Kusna sek khẽjeçte', kuskusa' sekuuna, ew kusuça' jĩ'i'kwe.

Sa' kusíi we'weçxa', ãçxha' en ewmée yuuna, tãaphçxáa ũsa' jĩ'i'kwe. Yuwejuçxáa ew we'weçxa', ũuste yu' ewmeeçxáa yaakxsa, en ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa jiyu'i'kwe i'kwe'sxa'. Nawa naa ensu na'wẽ seena'sa vxyaaça' txãa yu'sa' jiyuya' ãja'çmeei'kwe kĩh yũuya' txã'wẽ yũuçtewa.
Naa nasa ewmeesa' cieluju seena'sa's kaavxya'ja'j jxthãasu'tx. Nawa peena yu' kaavxya'ja'jmeete ewna, naasáa Jonasa' ma'wẽga yuu txã'sçxáana ya'pta'sxina jĩna we'weçxaçxáa nvxihtçxa u'kh.
Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' ĩkhwala kuten u'jweççxawa, peçxkanaçxa pan yu' jxũmeeta u'j.
Kxtee pa'jçxa', Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Mpa'yajkxwe, fxariseo vxite' saduceowe'sx lewadura ewmeesa's jĩte',
txãawe'sxa' na'wẽtx puutx paapẽyi':
—Pan jxũmeetha'w aça' kxahne' txã'wẽ we'we' jĩ'tx.
Txã'wẽ we'weni's Jesus jiyuçxa' na'jĩk:
—¿Maa sũhçxakwe pan ji'phmeetha'w jĩna we'wé'? Pan ji'phmeetewa, Dxusa' thẽymée sã'jĩna sũhwa'j yu'sa' ji'phmeewá'kwe.
Adxa' na'wẽ tahç pan yakhçxáa cinko mil nasatx thẽyméeth sã'jĩ aça' kijxaasa's maz kanasta pkhakhçxawa txã'sa' yaakiçmeewá'kwe.
Vxite ente' txã'wẽy siete pan yakhçxáa kuatro mil nasatx thẽymeeth sã'jĩ aça' kijxaasa's maz kanasta pkhakhçxawa yaakiçmeewá'kwe.
I'kwe'sxa' jiyumeewá'kwe adxa' pana's we'weçxa txã'wẽ mpa'yajkxwe fxariseo vxite' saduceowe'sx lewadura ewmeesa's jĩ'çmeeth.
Txajũ' jiyutx Jesusa' txã'wẽ pante ka'dnisa lewadura's we'wemée, fxariseo vxite' saduceowe'sx kaapiya'jni's we'weçxa txã'jĩni's.
Jxkaahsa Fxilipo vxitni çxhab Cesarea ja'dasu pa'jçxa', Jesusa' na'jĩnak pẽjx txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi:
—Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's ¿kimna jĩnata we'we' nasa'? jĩte',
na'wẽtx pta'sx:
—Maaíi yu' Juan Bautistana jĩ'tx. Vxite we'wesa' Eliasna jĩ'tx. Aça' vxite we'wesa' Jeremiasna meeçxa' vxite kasehne' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa jĩ'tx jĩna pta'sxte',
Jesus pẽjxçxa':
—I'kwe'sxa' ¿kimna jĩ'kwe? jĩte',
Simon Pedro' na'wẽk pas:
—Idxa' Dxus ĩtxisa Nçxi'kgu, txajx tasxu yuusa jĩte',
Jesusa' pasku na'jĩna:
—Jonas nçxi'k Simon, idx yakha' wala weçxa yuja'. Idxa's naa kiwete piçthẽ'j kaajiyu'jmeeta'. Adx Tata cielute ũssa yuuk kaajiyu'j adxa' Dxus ĩtxisa Nçxi'ktewa.
Idxa' Pedro yaaseg aça' idxwa ma'wẽga adxa's ew jiyu txã'wẽy maawa ew jiyuwa'ja's idx yakh nvxiitu'nja. Aça' txã'wẽ ew jiyunijũ' eçxthẽ'j yuhwa knaymeena Dxus luuçxtxi'.

Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite pa'jwa'j dxi'ja's phadewa'ja's idxa's ũsu'nja, aça' idxa' maatxwa we'weçxa': Pkaltxi' Dxusa' peltunaĩna jĩte', peltunãyni yũutxna. Nawa peltunaĩmeena jĩte', peltunãynimée neeyũutxna jĩk.
Txajũ' Pedrowe'sxtxi neewe'wek, Jesusa' Dxus tasxu yuusa yuh yu'ga jĩna maa yuhtxwa pta'sxkahmén.
Txãa entek Jesusa' nyafxçxah pta'sx txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi na'jĩna:

—Jerusalenna u'jwa'j ji'pthu. Kxteea' wala pkxuuni yu'nja judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx vxite' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsa txãawe'sx kusete. Txãawe'sxa' ikhetxna, nawa tekh ente' ki' ĩtxi yu'nja jĩna pta'sxte',
Pedro' Jesusa's fxiite pe'jna u'jçxa na'wẽk yu'kxpeh:
—Idxa's txã'wẽ yũuwa'j yu'sa' Dxusa' jxthãasmeewaça', ewna jĩte',
Jesusa' yu'thegçxa na'wẽk we'we Pedro's:
—Eçxthẽ'j, adx tasxuh mtxutée. Idxa' suw wẽenaçxáa ũsgu. Dxus jxthãasni yu'sa' kxtey yuumée, naa kiwega nasaa yaakxniçxá'sgu kxtey yuu wẽje'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi ki' we'wek:
—Maawa adx yakh yuu wẽeçxa', peekx kakwe jxthãasni's kĩhnawa jxuka nvxihtçxa yuuçxáa adx yakh yujxa' ãjane'kwe, makwe pxthaa yuuwa'j seena'sa ma'k yuu nawa txã'sa' ũukhmée.

Txã'wẽme', naa kiwete peekx ĩtxi fxi'zewa'jçxá's ya'nwe'wesa', Dxus yakh fxi'zewa'j yu'sa' ivxiituna. Nawa adx yakh fxi'zepa'gaçxáa naa kiwete ĩtxi fxi'zeni's yajkxmée ivxiitusa', Dxus yakh fxi'zewa'j yu'sa' ivxiitumeena.
Makwe naa kiwetewe'sx yu'sa' jxuka knayçxawa peekx ũus yu's ivxiitute', ¿kĩhteçxá' selpiima'k? Peekx ũusa's ivxiituyã'the', ¿kimçxa' nwe'wema'k?
Jxpa'yakxmeete', Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' ki' kĩijana Ney eena' kweethni pxãhte txajx angeleswe'sx yakh, aça' ma'wẽçxah yũusaaçxawa teeçxsa na'wẽçxah jxpa'gatxna.
Isath we'we', ayte ũssa maaíi yu' nee uumey uyuune'kwe txã'wẽ Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' jxkaajxa' pa'jni's jĩnak pta'sx.
Seis en skhẽwniite', Jesusa' pe'jna u'kh Pedro vxite' pxakhsa Jakobo Juan txãawe'sxtxi teeçx vxiç walate.
Sa' kxtee pa'jçxa', txãawe'sx dxi'pte Jesusa' wala zhiçxkwe yu'pthehçxak vxyaa. Txajx dxi'pa' sek na'wẽk eena' khi'khi', aça' txajx athni ropa' seena' zhiçxkwe çxihme yuuk.
Naapkaçxha' Moises vxite' Elias txãawe'sxa' Jesus yakh puutx we'wenatx vxyaa.
Txã'wẽ uyçxa', Jesusna na'wẽk we'we Pedro':
—Ayte' kwe'sx ũswa'j wala ewa'. Aça' idx ewna jĩte', tekh wa'kuẽ txaja'nja'w, vxite' iidx jĩi vxite' Moises jĩi vxite' Elias jĩi.
Txã'jĩna Pedro' we'wena ũsiyna, tãaph seena' zhiçxkwe çxihmesa kũhçxa aphku. Aça' txãa tãaphte na'jĩnak we'weni pthũuse:
—Na' adx Nçxi'k wala wedxnisa', txãa pa'ga wala weçxana ũsthu. Txã'sa' nwẽese'jna kxtey myuuwe jĩni's
Pedrowe'sxa' wẽse'jçxa', wala ũukhçxa kiwega pkipha wetetx.
Aça' Jesusa' txãawe'sxtxi jxa'dxçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Ũukhmée mkiitewe jĩte',
kiiteçxa' Moiseswe'sxtxi' uymeeyã'tha', naasáa Jesusçxáa yã'kh ũs yu'.
Txajũ' thã'ju sa'jna u'jweççxa', Jesusa' na'jĩnak jxkaah:
—Kim yuhtxwa pta'sxmeene'kwe txã'wẽ uyni's, Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa uuçxawa ki' ĩtxi yuupkaçx jĩte',
Pedrowe'sxa' Jesusna na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx pta'sxçxa', Elias khuẽ'y yaçte pa'jana jĩ'tx, sa' ¿ma'wẽ yuuwa'jsakx açki'tx txã'jĩ'? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Isa, Elias khuẽ'y yuh yaçte pa'jwa'jsa yu'k, aça' isa yuh pta'sxi'ne'ta.
Adxa' na'jĩ'th na', Eliasa' yaçte pa'jyujk. Txã'wẽtewa nasa' jiyumeeçxa, txã'sa' kĩjkĩhwa yũutx. Aça' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáawa wala pkxuuni yuuna txãawe'sx kusetey jĩk.
Aça' Pedrowe'sxa' jiyutx Jesusa' Juan Bautistana yajkxçxa we'weçtewa.
Txajũ' txãawe'sxa' sxawedna kĩjaçte', nasa wala pkhaakhena ũsu'tx. Aça' teeçx piçthẽ'j Jesus tasxte peejxũkwena kũhçxa', na'wẽk pxthaa we'we:
—Adx nçxi'ka's meen peeygãh, wẽeçxpa'jçxa iiméh seena' pxthaa yuuna ũsa'. Maa enteya' ipxkhẽwa khẽje'k, sa' yu'khẽwa khẽje'k.
Aça' idx yakh u'jusawe'sx tasxte jxũna kũhtewa, nuykatxhiya' ãjameeta' jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩnak pas:
—Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'j yu'sa' ji'phmeesata' naa nasa'. ¿Bagaçxpkaçx i'kwe'sx yakh pu'çxna ũs ya'watka? ¿Bagaçxpkaçx ãjamée fxi'ze ya'wakwe? Luuçxa's ayte mneejxũhwe jĩte',
jxũna kũjuçpkaçxha', Jesusa' eçxa's juuna' we'weçxa kutxi'kh luuçx ũusu, aça' txãa dudtey katxhinik neeyũu.
Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' Jesusa'sçxáa fxii pa'yaçxa, na'jĩnatx pẽjx:
—Kwe'sxa' ¿kĩh yũuçxakxtha'w eçxa's kutxi'jya' ãjamée? jĩte',
Jesusa' pta'sxku:

—Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'j yuuçxá's yaakxpa'gamée i'kwe ãjamée. Isath we'we', Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'ja's mostasa fxiw na'wẽ le'çxkuẽesaçxáawa ji'phwaça', naa vxiç wala's we'weni yakhçxáa fxiite ki'pxa' ãjane'kwe. Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'j yuuçxá's yajkxwaça', i'kwe'sx yakha' kĩh yuhwa thẽysameena.
Na'wẽsa eçxa' thẽymée yu' kasehmeena, wala yũunaana Dxus yakh puutx we'wete yuuçxáa kasejena jĩk.
Txajũ' Galilea kiwete ũsçxa', Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi' pta'sxku:
—Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's nasa ewmeesa kusete dukhni yuuwa'ja'.
Aça' ikhetxna, nawa tekh ente' ki' ĩtxi yuuna jĩna pta'sxte', txãawe'sxa' wala nxustxi.
Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh Kapernaum çxhabte pa'the', dxuus yattewe'sx vxyuu pkhakhsawe'sxa' Pedro's thegya' u'jçxa na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—I'kwe'sxtxi kaapiya'jsa' ¿dukheçmeewá' dxuus yattewe'sx vxyu's? jĩte',
Pedro we'weçxa':
—Dukhe'íik jĩnak pas. Sa' Pedro' Jesus ũsni yatte kũjuçpkaçxha', Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—Simon, idxa' ¿maa sũju'ga? Naa kiwete jxkaahsawe'sxa' vxyu kaapkhakhe'jçxa', ¿kimtxi pẽywa'ja' jĩ'ta? ¿Jxkaahsa ji'jwe'sxwa dukhe'ta', meeçxa' txãa ji'jmée ekajuwe'sxçxáa wá'nta dukhe'? jĩte',
Pedro' na'wẽk pas:
—Ekajuwe'sxçxáatx dukhe' jĩk. Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Txã'wẽyã'the', jxkaahsa ji'jwe'sxa' dukhwa'jsameeta'.

Nawa kim yuhtxwa kaaũusçxa'jya'mée idxa' u'jçxa ĩkhwalate wedx yũhza's akhene'ga, sa' nyafxte wedx kãasa's kaawayi'jçxa uyuune'ga teeçx vxyu ji'phna. Txãa yakh dukhene'ga adx pa'gate vxite' iidx pa'gate yã'jçxa jĩk.
Txãa ensu' Jesus yakh u'jusa docesawe'sxa' txajx tasxte utxaaçxa na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—Naa kiwete Dxus jxkaajxa' kĩi ente' ¿maa wejx jxthaakwe walasakxtha'w? jĩte',
