Jesusa' teeçx luuçxkuẽ's pa'yaçxa txãawe'sx ksxavxyte txahçxa
na'wẽk we'we:
—Isath we'we', i'kwe'sxa' iiwejçx yaakxni's nvxihtçxa naa luuçx na'wẽ yuumeeçxa yu', Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite u'kaya' ãjameene'kwe.
Txã'wẽ kĩhtewa ãhmeekwesa naa luuçx na'wẽ yuusa yuuçxáa, Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite' maatewa jxthaakwe walasa yuuna.
Maa nasawa adxna jxpa'gaççxa ma'wẽ weçxana jxpa'gatx txã'wẽy weçxana naa luuçxkuẽ na'wẽsatx jxpa'gana txã' adxna jxpa'gasa yuuna.
Adxna jxpa'gasa ãhmeekwesatx maawa pkalte kweete'jsa's txhikhte skuutxh ũ'khni kweta's tudçxa ĩkh wala dxiikhẽ akhwaççxáa, wejx ewna.
Naa kiwete ewmeesa' bagaçxtewa nes yuutxna. Nawa naa kiwete ewmeesa yakha' seena' yuh ũukhũukha'. Sa' maawa txã'wẽ pkalte kweete'jena txãa yu' weh yuhwa iyumeena.

Txãa pa'ga iidx kuse ma'k yuu meeçxa' iidx çxida ma'k yuu nawa txã'wẽ pkalte kweete'jpçxãh yuuçte', txã'sa' spẽ'thçxa mwãatah. Txã'wẽ pçuwa'jmée ipx walate e'z kuse e'z çxida ji'ph akhni yuu na'wẽ', wejxwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'the çxida ji'phmée legkuẽçxáawa kxtee u'kani wejx ewa'.
Iidx yafx txã'wẽ pkalte kweete'jpçxãh yuuçte', kutxi'jçxa mwãatah. Infxierno ipxte e'z yafx ji'ph ũs na'wẽ', wejxwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'the teeçx yafx yakhçxáawa u'kani wejx ewa'.
Naawe'sx ãhmeekwesa maa yuhtxwa açenuwe. Na'jĩ'th na': naawe'sxtxi pi'kxna u'jusa angeleswe'sxa' cielute adx Tata tasxte nes yuusaata'.
Txã'wẽme', Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' vxitusatx nwe'weya'k kĩh.
I'kwe'sxwaççxáawa ¿na'wẽ yũumeema'kwe? Cien piisxáa ji'phçxa', teeçxsa' vxitute', nowenta y nwewesatx vxiçsũ nvxihtçxa piisxáa vxitusa's pakweya' ¿u'jmeema'kwe?
Sa' uyçxa', vxite vxitusamée nowenta y nwewesate jxthaakwe peeygãhna weçxaane'kwe.
Txã'wẽy i'kwe'sx Tata cielute ũssawa teeçxçxáa yuhwa vxitu jxthãasu'çme' naawe'sx ãhmeekwesatewa.
Iidx yakhthẽ'j idxa's ewmée yũute', txã'sçxáan pa'yaçxa mkaajiyu'j ewmée yũuni's. Iidx we'weni's nwẽese'jewáana aça' iidx yakhthẽ'j yakh kxtee yuwe ewuune'ga.
Nawa nwẽese'jmeewáana aça' testigo teeçx meeçxa' e'z txahçxa txãawe'sx dxi'pte we'wene'ga, kxah txãa e'z testigosa' jiyutxna iidx yuwe ewuuya' pa'pçxuni's.
Txãa e'z testigo dxi'pte nwẽese'jmeete', dxuus yatte jxkaahsawe'sxtxi mpeeta'sx. Aça' txãawe'sxtxiwa nwẽese'jmeeçxa', yakhthẽ'j na'wẽmée Dxusna jiimeesa na'wẽçxáa nvxiitni yuuna.
Isath we'we': I'kwe'sxa' yuwetxi's naa kiwete pheu'the', cielutewa Dxus dxi'pte pheu'jni yuutxna. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' yuwetxi's pheu'jmeete', cielutewa Dxus dxi'pte pheu'jnimée yuutxna.
Na'jĩ'th na': I'kwe'sx kĩh yũune'jçxawa e'zsaçxáawa txã'wẽ yuute ewna jĩna puutx we'weçxa, Dxusa's pi'kine'kwe ma'wẽ yuuwa'ja'swa aça' adx Tata cielute ũssa' kxtey yuuna.
Txãa pa'gatey e'z ma'tx yuu meeçxa' tekh ma'tx yuu nawa adxa's yajkxna pkhaakheçxa ũste', adxa' txãawe'sx ksxavxyte ũswa'jsath jĩk.
Txajũ' Pedro' Jesus tasxte utxaaçxa', na'jĩnak pẽjx:
—Yakhthẽ'j adxa's ewmée yũusa's ¿maz us peltunãywa'j yuukx, meeçxa' sietepkaçxçxáa ewmanx? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Sietepkaçxçxáa ewna jĩya'wameeth. Sietesaçxaçxáa setenta ãhpkaçx peltunãywa'ja' jĩk.
Txãa pa'gatey Dxus jxkaahwa'j en ãhte', na'wẽ yuuna: Teeçx jxkaahsa' txã'sna selpisaawe'sx yuultxi pẽyiçku yu'.
Yuulsatx teeçxsa na'wẽçxah pẽjxna u'jweçpkaçxha', teeçx jxũna kũhtx iiméh seena' wala yuulsana.
Txãa selpisa' kĩh yakh yuhwa dewewa'j ji'phmeek yu'. Aça' patrona' txãa yuulsa's txweykaakh txajx nyu, txajx luuçx, txajx ji'phuni yã'jçxa jxuka txãa yuula's dewewa'j.
Txajũ' selpisa' patron tasxte peejxũkweçxa pxthaa we'wek: Adxa's meen peeygãh. Txãa yuula's jxuka dukhe'nja jĩte',
patrona' peeygãhna yuula's peltunãyçxa ewte nvxihtku.
Nawa txãa peltunãynisa' kasehna u'jçxa', vxite selpisáa txã'sna walameekuẽ yuulsa'sku uy, sa' txhikhte uweçxa ikheçku yu': Adxna yuulgu txã'sna mdukh jĩna.
Txajũ' txãa yuulusa' peejxũkweçxa na'jĩnak pxthaa we'we: Adxa's meen peeygãh, jxuka dukhe'nja jĩtewa,
kxtey yuumée wejxwa karcelna jxũna u'jçxa kxtee txajk txãa yuula's dukhpkaçx.
Txã'wẽ yuuçte vxite selpisaawe'sx uyçxa', wala nxustxi. Sa' u'jçxa pta'sxtxi txã'wẽ ewmée yũusáa patrona's.
Aça' patrona' ewmée yũusa's pa'yaçxa na'wẽk we'we: Selpisáa peethãhwe, adxa' iidx yuula's jxuka peltunãythu, pxthaag we'we txãa pa'ga.
Aça' idxwa txã'wẽy idxna yuulusa's peeygãhna peltunãywa'j ji'phgu, adxwa ma'wẽtka peeygãh idxa's txã'wẽy jĩçxa',
txãa patrona' wala ũusaçxaçxa, kastigãykaakh yuula's jxuka dukhpkaçx.
Txã'jĩçxa', Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Teeçxsa na'wẽçxah ũusuh jxuka peltunaĩmeewá'kwe i'kwe'sx yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi, aça' adx Tata cielute ũssawa txã'wẽy kastigaĩna i'kwe'sxtxi' jĩk.
Txã'wẽ we'wena jxã'jçxa', Jesusa' Galileaju kasehna u'jçxa Judea kiwesu Jordan yu'kutetek pa'j.
Kxte ũste', nasa wala pa'jtx, aça' nuykatxhik ãça'satx.
Naapkaçxha' fxariseowe'sx maaíi yu' Jesus tasxte utxaana kũhçxa na'wẽtx pẽjx, pasya' sxiigte' ewmée vxit-ya' sũhçxa:
—Ptamsaçxawa, nyu kĩjkuẽçxáa ãhmée yũuteçxáa txãapa'ga wãatahte ¿ewmanx? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—I'kwe'sxa' ¿Dxus librute iilẽeymeewá'kwe? Kxtee we'weçxa': Dxusa' nyafxiitey e'zíitx ja'daçxajk vxit piçthẽ'j petx u'y yã'jçxa.
Txãa pa'ga piçthẽ'ja' peekx neywe'sx tasxu txuteeçxa peekx nyu yuuwa'jsa yakh utxaawa'jsa', txã'wẽ e'zçxawa teeçxsaçxáa na'wẽ yuuna pa'jya' jĩ'k Dxus librute'.
Txã'wẽ yũunijũ', e'zmée teeçxçxáak yuuna pa'ja'. Txãa pa'ga Dxus pũpxçxa nvxiitniijũ' ptamsayã'ja' txuteewa'jsameeta'.
Txã'jĩte', na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—Txã'wẽte', Moisesa' ¿kĩjxa'ga peekx nyu yakh txuteeçxa eç vxitçxa nyu's ũsçxa txuteewa'ja' jĩna jxkaaja'? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—I'kwe'sx txã'wẽ Dxus jxkaahni's nwẽese'jmeeçxa nyu yakh txuteena fxi'zepa'ga íiçxáak Moisesa' txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's nvxiht. Nawa txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's nyafxiitey Dxus nvxiitnisa yu'çme'.

Adxa' na'jĩ'th na': Nyu txã'wẽ vxite piçthẽ'j yakh pkal yuuna fxi'zesameete wáa nyu's wãatahçxa vxite u'y yakh ptamuuna na' txã'wẽ vxite yakh ptamuupa'ga pkal kazx yuusáa yuuna. Meeçxawa nmi' wãataanisa u'y yakh maawa ptamuuna na' txã'wẽ u'y wãataanisa yakh ptamuupa'ga pkal kazx yuusaaíiçxáa yuuna jĩte',
Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' na'wẽtx we'we:
—Txã'wẽte', ptamumée fxi'zeni wejx ewna jĩtx.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:

—Txã'wẽ yuja', nawa jxukay yu' ptamumée fxi'zeya' ãja'çmeeta', naasáa kimnane' Dxusa' ptamumée fxi'zewa'ja's nvxiht txãaçxáa ptamumée fxi'zeya' ãjana, vxite' ptamumée Dxusçxáana selpiina fxi'zewa'jsata'.

Na'wẽsa yu' ptamumée fxi'zeya' ãja'tx: Maaíi yu' ptamumée fxi'zeya' upxsatxna, aça' vxitetxi's naa kiwete piçthẽ'jwe'sx íiçxáatx ptamumée fxi'zewa'ja's vxitu', aça' vxite' ptam yuumée Dxusçxáana selpiina fxi'zewa'jsata'. Ptamumée fxi'zeya' ãjasa', ptamumée fxi'zetxna jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesus tasxte luuçxkuẽ nuypa'jtx, luuçx dxikthesu peekizeçxa Dxus kusete neewe'wekahn. Nawa Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' ũusçxa we'wetx nuypa'jsatx.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Luuçxkuẽ adx tasxte yuusaatxi' kuçx yupnuwe, txãa pa'gatey cielute Dxus jxkaahna ũsnisa' naa luuçxkuẽwe'sx na'wẽsa jĩi íiçxá'.
Txã'jĩçxa', luuçxkuẽwe'sx dxikthesu peekizeçxa Dxus kusete neewe'weçxa', txajũ u'kh.
Txãa e'su' teeçx piçtakx Jesus tasxte pa'jçxa na'wẽk pẽjx:
—Kaapiya'jsa wala ewsa, mpeeta'sx. ¿Kĩh ew yũuçxa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phuki'th? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—¿Kĩh yuupa'gaga adxa's ewsa jĩ'? Ew yũusa' teeçx yuuçxáa ũsa' txã' Dxusa'. Aça' pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phu wẽeçxa', Dxus jxkaahnitxi' kxtey myuu jĩte',
piçtakxa':
—¿Maatxna? jĩna pẽjxte', Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Dxusa' na'wẽk jxkaaja': Nasa ikhwa'jme', ptamsayã'ja' vxite yakh pkal yuuwa'jme'. Pesweewa'jme'. Vxitetx ĩsxiina nuywe'wewa'jme'.
Neywe'sxtxi peeygãhna ewçxáa yũuna fxi'zewa'ja'. Peekíi ma'wẽga ya'peeygãja' txã'wẽy mpeeygãh vxite nasatxwa jĩte',
piçtakx pasçxa':
—Txãatxi' le'çxkuẽjũjx kxtey yuunath waláa, aça' ¿kĩh wejx peejxna? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Dxus jxkaahnitxi' jxuka kxtey nwẽese'jsa yuu wẽeçxa', u'jçxa iidx ji'phunitxi' jxuka txweyçxa ji'phmeekuẽsatx mes. Sa' txã'wẽ yũuçxa' cielute ji'phsa yuune'ga. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa adx yakh myuh jĩte',
txãa piçtakxa' txã'wẽ wẽse'jçxa' nxusnak u'j, wala ji'phsa yu'k txãa pa'ga.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi:
—Isath we'we', ji'phsa yakha' wala yuh thẽya' Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite u'kawa'j.
Na'jĩ'th na': kamelxo txakwesa' ¿ma'wẽ yũz kafxga khẽwya' ãjakx? Aça' ji'phsa yakha' txãate jxthaakwe thẽya' Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite u'kawa'j.
Txã'jĩni's wẽse'jçxa', Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' wala kuh yajkxtxi, sa' txãawe'sx pwe'sx na'wẽtx puutx ya'paapẽyi':
—Txã'wẽte', ¿kimçxá' ewte neeyũuya' ãjama'k? jĩte',
Jesus thegçxa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Nasa' Dxus yakhmée yu', ewte neeyũuya' ãjameeyuhtxna. Nawa Dxus yakh yu', kĩh yuhwa thẽysa meea'.
Txã'jĩte', Pedro' na'wẽk pẽjx:
—Kwe'sxa' idx yakh yujxa' kwe'sx ji'phuni's jxuka nvxihttha'w, sa' ¿kĩh jxpa'gakxtha'w? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩnak pta'sx:

—Isath we'we', naa kiwete pkalsa's jxuka yu'pthehçxa ewsaçxaçxáa yuuwa'j en ãhte', Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusá' pa'jçxa jxkaajxa' takheçpkaçxha', adx yakh yuusáa i'kwe'sx docesawa adx yakh jxkaahsa yuune'kwe Israel ji'j docesatx.

Maawa jxukaysa txã'wẽ adx yakh yujxa'çxáa txãawe'sx yat, kiwe, nyakhwe'sx, npe'sxwe'sx, neywe'sx, nyu, nçxi'kwe'sx, niisawe'sx txãatx jxuka nvxiit-sa' txãa nvxiitnisate jxthaakwe wala jxpa'gatxna, sa' pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja'swa jxpa'gatxna.
Nawa jxpa'yakxmeete', makwe yaçtewe'sxçxawa, nmehtewe'sx yuutxna; naapkaçxha' nmehtewe'sx yu', yaçtewe'sx yuutxna jĩk.
Dxus jxkaahni ente mjĩisa' na'wẽ yũuni yuutxna: Teeçx mjĩi namu' kusíi kasehçxa mjĩisa pakweya' u'kh, uuthasxte uwa udewa'jsa.
Sa' mjĩiwa'jsa yakh puutx we'wek teen mjĩini's ãh dukhya'. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa mjĩi ehn kaakh.
Sa' kusíi las nwewe yuuçpkaçxha', ki' kasejk, sa' vxite kĩh mjĩiwa ji'phmée plaasasu u'jusatx uyçxa',
txãatxi' na'wẽk we'we: Me'jwe mjĩiya' adx mjĩi ehte, teen uta mjĩinite ãh dukhe'nja jĩte', txãawe'sxa' u'jtx mjĩiya'.
Txajũ' mjĩi namu' ẽepxãh wala ki' kasejk, sa' kusuçte las trestewa ki' kasejk, txãatxwa txã'wẽy mjĩiya' kaakh.
Txajũ' kusuçte las cinkote plaasasu ki' kasehçxa', vxite uyku kĩh mjĩiwa ji'phmée u'jusatx. Txãawe'sxtxiwa na'wẽk we'we: I'kwe'sxa' ¿kĩh yũuçxa mjĩi ji'phmée u'jukwe teen uta? jĩte',
txãawe'sxa' na'wẽtx pas: Kimwa mjĩiya' pa'yameeta' jĩte', mjĩi namu' kaakh txajx mjĩi ehte: U'jçxa adx mjĩi ehte mjĩine'kwe aça' adxa' wala ew dukhe'nja jĩk.
Txajũ' jxuka kuste', mjĩi namu' pa'yak kxtee kmãaji'jsa's na'jĩna: Mjĩisatxi' pa'yaçxa mdukh, nawa nmeh mjĩiya' pa'jsatx khuẽ'y nyafxte dukhçxa teen uta mjĩisatxi' nmehte dukhna jxã'jane'ga jĩte',
kxtey yuuk. Aça' kusuçte las cinkote mjĩiya' pa'jsa khuẽ'y utxaaçxa teeçxsa na'wẽçxah jxpa'gatx teen uta mjĩinite ãhçxaçxáa.
Txajũ' kusíi mjĩiya' pa'jsa': Kwe'sxa' jxthaakwe jxpa'ga'nja'w sũhna ũsçxawa, txakweíiçxáa jxpa'gaçxa'
ũusçxa we'wetx mjĩi namu's na'jĩna:
Naawe'sxa' nmeh pa'jçxa naasáa teeçx ora yuuçxáatx mjĩi. Nawa dukhni yu'sa' kwe'sx nakweíiçxáatx jxpa'ga. Naapkaçxha' kwe'sx yu' teen utatha'w mjĩi, sekte yaaçxana wantãyna jĩte',
mjĩi namu' na'jĩnak pas: Namiku, idx yakh ewmée yũuçmeeth. Adxa' teen uta mjĩini's ãh dukhe'nja jĩna idx yakh puutx we'wete', ewna ¿jĩmeegá'?
Txãasa iidx mjĩini's ãh dukhni's jxpa'gaçxa me'j. Idxna nakweth dukh txakweçxaçxáa dukheçthu nmeh mjĩiya' pa'jsatxwa.
Nawa adx jĩ'sa' ma'wẽ yũuweçxtewa kxtey yu'nja. Meeçxa' adx ew yũuni's idxa' ¿açe'wá'ga? jĩk mjĩi namu'.
Txã'wẽ yũuwa'jsata' nmehtewe'sxa' yaçtewe'sx yuutxna, naapkaçxha' yaçtewe'sxa' nmehtewe'sx yuutxna. Txãa pa'gatey pa'yanisa yu' wala kuhta', nawa txhitxhnisa yu' kuhmeeta' jĩk.
Jesusa' Jerusalen dxi'the u'jweççxa', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx docesatx fxiite pe'jna u'jçxa na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—I'kwe'sxa' jii i'kwe Jerusalenna u'jweçtha'w. Kxteea' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's uweçxa dukhni yuuna sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j vxite' ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx kusete. Aça' txãawe'sxa' ikhwa'j vxitçxa
judiu ji'jmée vxite nasatx dukhetxna, txãawe'sxa' weeçxna pãpana kluuskhẽ ki'pçxa ikhkahn. Nawa tekh ente' ki' ĩtxi yuuna jĩk.
Txajũ' Jakobo Juan njĩ'j Zebedeo nyua' txãa e'z nçxi'ksa yakh Jesus tasxte peejxũkwena utxaatx, txãawe'sx pẽyni's Jesusa' kxtey yuukahn.
Aça' Jesusa':
—¿Kĩjkwe yũu jxthãasu'? jĩte', Jakobowe'sx njĩ'ja' na'wẽk we'we:
—Idxa' naa kiwete jxkaajxa' kĩhçxa', ũ'kwe luuçx naa e'zsatx iidx pukakhẽ pdxi'p kaçxwa'ja's ũsune'ga jĩte', Jesus we'weçxa':
—I'kwe'sxa' jiimeeçxai'kwe txã'wẽ pẽyi'. Adx na'wẽy pxthaa yuuçxa uuwa'ja's ũukhmée jxpa'gaya' ¿ãjama'kwe i'kwe'sxa'? jĩte':
—Ãja'nja'w jĩnatx pas.
Aça' Jesusa' pta'sxku:

—Isa, i'kwe'sxa' adx na'wẽy pxthaa yuuçxa uuwa'ja's ji'phuyujune'kwe. Nawa txã'wẽ adx pukakhẽ pdxi'p kaçxwa'j yu'sa' adx ũsu'çmeeth. Txã'sa' naasáa adx Tata yuuçxáa ũsuna kiim jĩi pheu'jçxa ji'phna txã'sna jĩk.
Aça' diezsawe'sxa' ũusaçxatx Jakobowe'sx txã'wẽ pẽyni's wẽse'jçxa.
Nawa Jesusa' pa'yaçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—I'kwe'sxa' peekx jii i'kwe, naa kiwete jxkaahsa' txãawe'sx nasatx juuna'tx jxkaaja', aça' txã'wẽy npiiçthẽ'jsawa txãawe'sx jxpe'jnisatx juuna'tx jxkaaja'.
Nawa i'kwe'sx yu' txã'wẽ juuna' jxkaahwa'jsamée i'kwe, wejx yuuwa i'kwe'sxa' walasa yuu wẽeçxa', vxitesa kusete selpisáa yuuwa'j ji'phi'kwe.
Aça' i'kwe'sx maawa txã'wẽ vxitesatx jxkaahsa yuu wẽeçxa', vxitee jxkaahni fxi'zewa'ja'.
Txãa pa'gatey Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa yuhwa txã'sna selpii jxthãasya' kĩhme', wejxwa nasatx nwe'wena selpiiya' kĩhçxak ya'dukh nxuste uuya' jĩk.
Txajũ' Jeriko çxhabuh kasehna u'jweçte', nasa' iimeh wala yuwe'tx Jesus e'ste.
Txãa dxi'the e'ztxi kaçxçxa u'p yu' uyya' ãjasamée. Sa' Jesus skhẽwni's wẽse'jçxa' sustxi we'we:
—Davxid ji'j, kwe'sxtxi meen peeygãh jĩte',
nasa' ũusçxa we'wetx sxuuna' yuukahn. Nawa txãawe'sxa' jweeíiçxáatx sus we'we:
—Davxid ji'j, kwe'sxtxi meen peeygãh jĩna.
Aça' Jesusa' yujuçxa txãa uyya' ãjasameetxi' pa'yaçxa na'wẽk pẽjx:
—¿Kĩjkwe yũu jxthãasu'? jĩte',
txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Kwe'sx yafxtxitha'w phaade jxthãasu' jĩte',
Jesusa' peeygãhçxa txãawe'sx yafxsu jxa'dxiçpkaçxha', txãa dudtey uyya' ãjaçxa Jesus yakh u'jtx.
Jerusalente utxaana pa'jaççxa', Betfxagé çxhabkuẽte khuẽ'y pa'jtx. Txãa çxhabkuẽ' Oliwos vxiç utxagak ũsu'. Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx e'zsatx na'jĩnak kaah:
—Ay dxi'pga çxhabkuẽ ũsa' kxtee me'jwe, sa' kxteea' uyuune'kwe buçxu luuçx njĩ'jsa tudni ũsna txã'sa' jxũkhwedeçxa jxũne'kwe.
Jxũna yuhte uyçxa' pẽyiwáatxna aça' kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa' peejxa', nawa txaçxmeyna kaasxwedu'juna jĩne'kwe.
Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa we'weni' kxtey yuuk. Txã' na'jĩnak fxi'j:
Sion çxhabte nasatx na'jĩna pta'sxine'kwe:
Mthegwe, i'kwe'sxtxi jxkaahsa yuja',
Pxthaakwesa na'wẽ thegna, buçxu luuçxte a'jçxa,
Aça' txãa buçxu njĩ'ja' ktũ'se'jnisa' jĩna fxi'jni'.
Txajũ' txãawe'sxa' u'jçxa Jesus ma'wẽ jxkaathe', kxtey yuutx.
Sa' buçxu njĩ'ja's jxũna pa'jtx luuçx yã'jçxa. Txajũ' buçxu luuçx kastxaja'jnimeesa's txãawe'sx atxhtxi pustxi, aça' Jesusa' txãate a'kh.
Nasa wala kuh pi'kxna u'jsawe'sx yu', txãawe'sx atxhtxi dxi'jsutx pusna u'jwe' Jesus skhẽwwa'jsu. Maaíi yu' ẽjxa spẽ'thçxa txã'wẽytxi dxi'jsu pusna u'jwe'.
Aça' nasa' yaçte u'jsa vxite' e'ste yuusa txãawe'sx jxukaysa na'jĩnatx sus we'wena u'jwe':
—Dxus kaahnisa wala yuh jxtuhthesa yuja' jxkaahsa Davxid ji'j. Dxusa's weçxaaga wala ew yũupa'ga jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Jerusalente u'kate', kxtee nasa jxukaysa seena' wala sustxi na'jĩna paapẽjxna:
—Na' ¿kimna? jĩte',
pta'sxtxi na'jĩna:
—Naaíi Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Jesusa', Galilea kiwesu Nasaret çxhabtewe'sx jĩ'tx.
Txã'wẽ yũuni e'su' Jesusa' dxuus yatte u'kaçxa jxuka eka kasxisxku kxtee txweyna ki' weyna ũssatx. Sa' vxyu yu'pthehna ũsni mesa vxite' tub çxihme txweyna u'pnitxwa jxuka pũsxku.
Sa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Dxus librute' na'wẽk we'we': Adx yata' Dxus yakh puutx we'wena ũswa'jçxá' jĩ'k. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' peswée pkhaakhena ũsni kafx na'wẽçxáa vxitçxa ji'phi'kwe jĩk.
Kxtee dxuus yatte maaíi yu' Jesus tasxte utxaatx, uyya' ãjasamée, çxida legsa, aça' txãawe'sxtxi' nuykatxhik.

Nawa sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx txãawe'sxa' ũusaçxatx, txã'wẽ kim yuhwa ãjanimeesa's kaavxya'ja'the' kxtee dxuus yatte ũssa luuçxa' sus we'weçxa' jxkaahsa Davxid ji'ja's wala weçxa'tha'w jĩna susni's wẽse'jçxa.
Sa' Jesusa's pẽjxtxi:
—Na'wẽ we'wena ũsta' txã'sa' ¿wẽse'je'ga'? jĩte', Jesusa' pasku:
—Wẽse'je'íith. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' ¿iilẽeymeekwe'? txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's Dxus librute na'jĩnak we'we':
Luuçx le'çxkuẽ vxite' çxu'çxsawa txã'wẽ zhiçxkwe tuuthe'jwa'ja'sgu vxit jĩ'k.
Txajũ' Jesusa' kxtee nvxihtçxa u'kh çxhabu kasehna sa' Betania çxhabtek pe'te.
Kuskuskhẽ' Jesusa' çxhabna ki' sxawedna u'jweççxa', wẽek.
Sa' dxi'j pukate higwera fxtũu tasx ũste uyçxa', thegya' utxaak. Nawa kĩh yũn yuhwa uyme', eççxáak ji'ph yu'. Aça' txãa fxtũu tasxa's na'wẽk we'we:
—Ãçxha' peena yu' yũnmeene'ga jĩçpkaçxha', naa dudtey fxtũu tasxa' uhdxku.
Txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' txã'wẽ uyçxa', wala kuh yajkxna na'wẽtx pẽjx Jesusa's:
—Fxtũu tasxa' ¿kĩh yũuçxaga txakwe wala dud uhdx? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:

—Isath we'we': Kuh jwed yajkxmée Dxusa' pasyujuna sũhwa'jçxá's yajkxçxa', adx vxitthu txã'wẽçxáamée, na'wẽ yũuya'wa ãjane'kwe: Naa vxiç wala ayjxu u'jçxa ĩkh walate tee khẽe jĩne'kwe, aça' kxtey yuuna.
I'kwe'sxa' kĩh pẽjxçxawa Dxus yakh puutx we'wene'kwe Dxusa' pasuna sũhna, sa' txã'wẽ yũuçxa' jxpa'gane'kwe jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' dxuus yatte u'kaçxa kaapiya'jaçpkaçxha', sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx kũhçxa' na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—¿Kĩh yũupa'gaga txã'wẽ dxuus yatte jxuka suw? ¿Kimga jxkaah txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's? jĩte',
na'wẽk pas:
—Adxwa i'kwe'sxtxi pẽjx ya'wath, aça' adx pẽyni's pasya' ãjate', adxwa pta'sxi'nja kim jxkaathe txã'wẽ yũuçxawa.
Juana's ¿kimga jxkaah yu'te bautisãykahn? ¿Dxus wá' jxkaah, meeçxa' naa kiwete piçthẽ'jwe'sx wáa ne'ta jxkaah? jĩte', txãawe'sx pwe'sx puutx ya'paapẽyi'tx:
—Dxusne' jxkaah jĩna paste', txã'wẽte' ¿mjĩitekwe nwẽese'jmée? jĩna.
Aça' naa kiwega nasa jxkaahnine' yu' jĩya'wa ãjame'nja'w. Txã'wẽme', nasa jxukaysa Juan ju'guçxaçxáatx we'we', Dxus jxkaahnine' yu' jĩna txãatxtha'w ũukhu' jĩnatx puutx we'we.
Sa' ãjameeçxa', Jesusa's na'wẽçxáatx pas:
—Jiimeetha'w jĩna. Aça' Jesuswa txã'wẽyçxáak pas:
—Adxwa pta'sxme'nja kim jxkaathe txã'wẽ yũuçxawa jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—I'kwe'sxa' ũus miiyajkxwe, na'wẽ kaaja'da'jçxa pẽjxya'wath: Teeçx piçthẽ'ja' e'z nçxi'kku ji'phu', sa' teeçxsa's na'wẽk jxkaah: Ãçxha' adx mjĩi ehte uwa uhdeya' me'j jĩte',
nçxi'k pasçxa': U'j wẽemeeth jĩçxawa, ũus yajkxna u'pçxa', mjĩiya' u'kh.
Txajũ' neya' vxite nçxi'ka'swa txã'wẽy jxkaakh. Aça' txã' na'wẽk pas: Ewna, u'jwe'nja jĩçxawa u'jme'.
Ãçxha' i'kwe'sxtxi ¿ma'wẽga thegu'? ¿Maasaga ney jxthãasni's kxtey yuu? jĩte', txãawe'sx pasçxa': Nyafxte jxkaahnisa nçxi'k jĩtx. Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Isath we'we', gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsawe'sx vxite' u'ywe'sx pkal yuuna fxi'zesa txãawe'sx khuẽ'y Dxus jxkaahnite u'katxna, naapkaçxha' i'kwe'sxa' u'kaya' ãjamée ũsi'kwe.

Txãa pa'gatey Juan Bautista' kaapiya'jna pa'kh pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's. Txã'wẽtewa, i'kwe'sxa' jxpa'gameei'kwe. Naapkaçxha' gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsawe'sx vxite' u'ywe'sx pkal yuuna fxi'zesa txã'wẽsa yu' jxpa'gatx. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' yafxju uyçxawa pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedmeei'kwe.

Vxite ejemplo na'sna mwẽese'jwe: Teeçx kiwe namu' uuthasx vxitku, sa' peeku'j uphçxa teeçx ahte uwa's ku'swa'j txajk, sa' ẽete tejkaçxa jxuka thegwa'j yatwa txajk. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa txãa kiwe's mjĩisatx pki'jçxa jxu'j dxi'kh u'j.
Uwa thẽ'jwa'j en ãhte', txã'sna selpisaatx kaakh kiwee pki'jnipa'ga pẽjxya'.
Nawa kiwee pki'jsawe'sxa' txãa selpisaatx uweçxa maaíi yuutxi' pãpana vxitetx ikhna vxitetxi' kwet wãatatahnatx yũu.
Txã'wẽ yũute', kiwe namu' jweeíiçxáak kuh kaahna ũsu' selpisaatx. Nawa kiwee pki'jsawe'sxa' jxukaytxi txã'wẽçxaçxáatx yũu.
Txajũ' nmehte' txajx nçxi'k yuunak kaah: Adx nçxi'ka's kuçx txã'wẽ yũumeewáatxna sũhçxa.
Nawa kiwee pki'jsawe'sxa' nçxi'ka's uyçxa', txãawe'sx pwe'sx na'wẽtx puutx we'we': Ney uute' naa txã'wẽ kiwe's iiyamuwa'jsa', aça' txã'sa' ikhega kiwe' kwe'sx jĩi yuukahn jĩ'tx.
Txã'jĩyã'jçxa', uweçxa txãa kiwejũ kutxi'jçxa ikhtxi.
Txã'wẽ pta'sxçxa', Jesusa' na'jĩnak pẽjx:
—Txã'wẽ yũute', kiwe namu pa'jçxa', ¿kĩh yũukx kiwee pki'jsawe'sxtxi'? jĩte',
na'wẽtx pas:
—Txãa ewmeesatxi' peeygãhmée ikhçxa txãa kiwe's vxitetx pki'jina kiwee pa'ga namu's wa'lmée dukhwa'jsatx jĩtx.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—I'kwe'sxa' ¿bagaçxte yuhwa iilẽeymeewá'kwe Dxus librute na'jĩna fxi'jni's?
Yat txaahsawe'sxa': Naa kweta's selpime' jĩçxa wãatahtx.
Nawa txãa íik yat makwesanawa çxhãçxha neewewa'jsa yuuna pa'j.
Txã'wẽ neewewa'jsa yuuna pa'jwa'ja's Dxusku vxitçxa nvxiht.
Txãa pa'ga kwe'sx yakha' wala weçxa yuja' ¿jĩ'çmeena'?
Txã'wẽ açepa'ga íiçxáath na'jĩ': Dxus jxkaahni's i'kwe'sxtxi kusa'jçxa vxite nasatx ũsni yuuna, kiwe namu's pki'pha'ga wa'lmée dukhkahn.
Sa' maawa txãa kwet kajkwega wetesa' jxuka çxkateteena, meeçxawa txãa kwet nasa kajkwekhẽ weteçxa' jxuka ku'çxina jĩk.
Aça' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' fxariseowe'sxa' jiyutx txãawe'sxtxi íiçxáa we'weçxa txã'jĩni's.
Sa' tud wẽeçxawa ũukhtxi, txã'wẽ nasa' Jesus ju'guçxaçxáatx ũs yu', Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa' jĩna txãa pa'ga.
Jesusa' vxite ejemplo kaaja'da'jçxak pta'sx na'jĩna:
—Dxus jxkaahni ente' na'wẽ yũuna: Teeçx jxkaahsa' txajx nçxi'ka's kaaba'jçxa fxiesta vxitku.
Sa' txãa jxkaahsa' selpisaatx jxkaakh pi'kxnisatx pa'yakahn. Nawa txãawe'sxa' wa'lçxa yuwe'çmeeta'.
Txã'wẽtewa, ki' jxkaakh vxite selpisaatx na'jĩna: Pi'kxnisatxi' yuukajane'kwe. Ũ'wa'ja's jxuka pheu'jniyã'j ji'pthu, tajkx kaaniisxi'jnisatx kiikhe'th, aça' myuhwe boda fxiestate jĩ'k jĩne'kwe.
Txã'wẽ kxtey yuutewa, pi'kxnisawe'sxa' nwẽese'jmée wejxwa txãawe'sx uuthasxsu vxite' txãawe'sx vxyu knaynisuçxáatx u'j.
Aça' vxite yu' selpisaatx uweçxa wala pãpatx ikhpkaçx.
Txã'wẽ yũute', jxkaahsa' seena' wala ũusaçxak, sa' txajx soldauwe'sxtxi kaakh txãa nasa ikhsatx ka'tuwa ikhçxa txãawe'sx çxhaba's jxuka kabkahn.
Txajũ' jxkaahsa' na'wẽk we'we txã'sna selpisaatx: Boda fxiestate ũ'wa'j jxuka pheu'jniyã'j ũsa', nawa pi'kxnisawe'sxa' wa'lçxa pa'jmeeta'.
Aça' ãçxha' me'jwe klxiikhunsuwe'sxtxi pi'kxya' maatxwa jxuka boda fxiestate yuukahn.
Txã'jĩte', selpisaawe'sxa' klxiikhunsu u'jçxa maatxwa jxuka pkhakhtxi ewsa ma'k yuu meeçxa' ewmeesa ma'k yuu nawa jxuka. Aça' fxiesta yatte jxuka nasa utatx.
Txajũ' jxkaahsa' pi'kxnisatx thegya' u'kaçxa', uyku teeçx piçthẽ'j txã'wẽ boda fxiestate athni ropa yakhmée u'pte.
Sa' na'wẽk we'we: Namiku, idxa' ¿kĩjxa'ga ayte u'ka', boda fxiestate athni ropa ji'phmeeçxa'? Txã'jĩte', txãa piçthẽ'ja' pasmée sxuuna'k neeyũu.
Aça' jxkaahsa' mesate puuçuçsatx na'jĩnak jxkaah: Naa piçthẽ'ja's uweçxa mtudwe çxida petx kuse yã'jçxa, sa' ekaju kutxi'jçxa çxhi'dx walate makhwe, kxte' ki'thtxi ksuusu'jna ũ'nena ũukhkahn.
Txãa pa'gatey wala yuh pa'yatewa, jxukay yu' utxaawa'jsameeta' jĩk.
Txajũ' fxariseowe'sxa' u'jçxa txãawe'sx pwe'sx puutx we'wetx Jesusa's ewmeete nvxiit wẽeçxa.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxa' txãawe'sx ju'gu ũssa vxite' Herodes nasa txãawe'sxtxi' kaahtx Jesusa's na'jĩna pẽykahn:

—Kaapiya'jsa, idxa's jiitha'w, kĩhtewa isasaçxáanag we'we'. Sa' Dxus tasxte pa'jwa'j dxi'ja'swa ew yuuçxáag kaapiya'ja'. Nasaa jxkaahna yu'kxpehnitx nwẽese'je'çmeeg, txãa pa'gatey idxa' nasa ewsa na'wẽ thegsatx jiyumey ju'gu yu'çmeeg.
Idxa' ¿ma'jĩki'g? Jxkaahsa Cesara's vxyu dukhte ¿ewmanx? Meeçxa' ¿dukhmeete wáa ewna? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas txãawe'sx ewmée yaakxni's jiyuçxa':
—Adx dxi'pteçxáa ew we'weçxa', ũuste yu' ewmée yaakxsawe'sx, ¿kĩjxa'kwe adxa's ewmeete nvxiit wẽeçxa txã'wẽ pẽyí'?
Dukhwa'j vxyu's mneejxũhwe jĩte', teeçx vxyu's jxũna kũhtx.
Aça' Jesusa' thegçxa' na'wẽk pẽjx:
—¿Kiim dxi'pa's ki'pnina, sa' kiim yase's fxi'jnina naa vxyute'? jĩte':
—Cesar dxi'pa's ji'pha', sa' txajx yase's fxi'jni' jĩnatx pas. Txajũ' Jesusa' na'wẽk jxkaah:
—Cesar jĩ's Cesara's dukhwa'ja', sa' Dxus jĩ's Dxusna dukhwa'ja' jĩte',
paapẽysawe'sxa' wala kuh yajkxna neeyũutx, sa' txajũ u'jtx.
Txãa entey saduceowe'sx maaíi yu' Jesusa's thegya' pa'jtx. Nasa' uuyã'jçxa' peena yu' ĩtxi yuuwa'jsameeta' jĩna we'wesatx yu' txãa saduceowe'sxa'. Txãasa na'wẽtx paapẽjx:

—Kaapiya'jsa, meen peeta'sx. Moises we'weçxa': Maa piçthẽ'jwa luuçx ji'phumey nyu's nvxihtçxa uute', uusáa nyakha' txãa u'y neeyũusáa yakh kabawa'jsa', aça' txãate luuçxa' uusáa nçxi'k na'wẽ neeyũuna jĩ'k.
Aça' kwe'sxa' jiitha'w siete piçthẽ'j pxakhtxi u'pu'. Aça' nyafxtewe'sxa' kabaçxawa luuçx ji'phumey uuk, txajx nyua's nyakh e'stewe'sx jĩi nvxihtçxa.
Aça' nyakh e'stewe'sxwa txã'wẽyçxáa nyakh tekhtewe'sx jĩi nvxihtçxak uu, sa' txã'wẽçxaçxáatx yũu siete pxakhsay.
Aça' nmehte' txãa u'ywa uuk.
Txã'wẽ uuçxawa ki' ĩtxi yuu ente', ¿maa yakh isa nyu yuuwa'jsakx? txã'wẽ kxaz pxakhsatxíi txãa u'yçxaçxáa iimi'sa' na' jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—I'kwe'sxa' Dxus librute fxi'jni ũsa' txã' isa yuhna sũju'çmeei'kwe, sa' Dxusa' kĩjxa'wa jxuka ãjana sũju'çwameei'kwe. Txãasa jxpubana ũsi'kwe.
Uusaawe'sxa' ki' ĩtxi yuuçxa' peena yu' kabana fxi'zewa'jsameeta'. Txãawe'sxa' cielute ũssa Dxus angeleswe'sx na'wẽsaçxáa yã'tha'.
Nawa uuçxa ki' ĩtxi yuuwa'ja's i'kwe'sxa' iilẽeymeewá'kwe Dxusíiwa na'wẽk we'we:
Abrahan, Isaak, Jakob txãawe'sx Dxusthu adxa' jĩ'k. Uuçxawa ki' ĩtxi yuusaawe'sx Dxusthu jĩçxak txã'jĩ'.
Txã'wẽ wẽse'jçxa', wala kuh yajkxna neeyũutx txã'wẽ zhiçxkwe Jesus kaapiya'pha'ga.
Jesus txã'wẽ saduceowe'sxtxi sxuuna' vxitni's fxariseowe'sx jiyuçxa', pkhaakhetx.
Sa' Dxus ley kaapiya'jsa teeçxsa' Jesus tasxte utxaak pẽjxya' ewmée pastewa jiyu wẽeçxa. Sa' na'wẽk pẽjx:
—Dxus leya' maatewa jxthaakwesa' ¿maana? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Dxusa's ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa txãa yuuçxáana selpiina fxi'zewa'ja' bagaçxte yuhwa txutemée uu entepkaçx.
Naa txã'wẽ jxthaakwesa'.
E'stewe'sxa' txã'wẽydxi'a': Peekíi ma'wẽga ya'peeygãja', txã'wẽy mpeeygãh vxite nasatxwa.
Dxus jxkaahni naa e'zsaçxáa Moises leytxi jxuka ãhsata', txã'wẽy Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx kaapiya'jnitxwa jxuka jĩk.
Fxariseowe'sx pkhaakheçxa kxtee nee ũsiyna,
Jesusa' na'wẽk pẽjx:
—Kristo' ¿kimna sũju'kwe i'kwe'sxa'? ¿Kiim nçxi'kna sũju'kwe? jĩte', txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Davxid nçxi'kna sũju'tha'w jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Txã'wẽte', ¿ma'wẽçxaga Davxida's Dxus Espiritu kaayaki'the' Kristo's we'weçxa' na'jĩ:
Adxna jxpe'jsa Kristo's Dxusa' na'jĩk:
Adx pukate paçu ju'gte mkaaçx,
Idxna açesatx idxçxaçxáana nwẽese'jwa'ja's vxitna jxã'phkaçx jĩk.
Txã'wẽ Davxidíiwa Kristo's we'weçxa': Adxna jxpe'jsa jĩnak kxsusu' aça' Kristo' ¿ma'wẽçxa Davxid nçxi'k yuukx? jĩte',
kim yuhwa teeçx yuweçxáawa pasya' ãjameeta', sa' txajũyã'ja' peena yu' pẽjxmeeta' kim yuhwa.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx petx vxite nasa yã'jçxa:
—Ley kaapiya'jsa vxite' fxariseowe'sx txãawe'sxa' Moises leya's wala ew jiisa txãa leya's nwẽese'jwa'ja's jxkaahsatha'w sũju'tx.

Txã'wẽyã'the', i'kwe'sxa' mwẽese'jwe ley ewsa ma'wẽ jxkaathe' txãa yu'sa' jxuka. Nawa txãawe'sx na'wẽ yu' yũuna fxi'zenuwe. Txãawe'sxa' nasa yuutxi' leya's nwẽese'jwa'ja's jxkaahçxawa txãawe'sx yu' leya's nwẽese'je'çmeeta'.
Tũ'swa'j iiméh wala duhsa pheu'ju'tx txã'sa' kim yuhwa çxhãçxhameena. Txã'wẽsa'stxi nasatx ktũ'se'je', nawa txãawe'sx yu' le'çxkuẽ kuseteçxáa yuhwa at pu'çxhi'çmeeta'.

Maawa uykahn sũhçxa iiwejçx iiwejçx yajkxna ãate yu' kĩhwa yu'tx Dxusna yaakiçtha'w jĩna. Txãasatx Dxus jxkaahni's eçte fxi'jçxa kajate akhçxa dxiktheuy vxite' kusesu tudçxa fxi'ze'. Sa' nasa jiyuni fxi'zeya' sũhçxa athni ropawa thaakwe jxu'jsa iijxũçxatx fxi'ze'.
Fxiesta yat-su pi'kxni u'jçxa', kaçxni wejx ewsaçxáanatx pakwe' iiwejçx yajkxna. Sa' judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenisuwa txã'wẽytxi yu'.
Klxiikhunsu msuuwa nasatx wala ewçxáa we'wena weçxaa jxthãasnatx pekũju', kaapiya'jsa jĩna kxsus jxthãasna.

Nawa i'kwe'sxa' txã'wẽ kaapiya'jsa jĩna kxsus jxthãasna fxi'zenuwe. Txãa pa'gatey i'kwe'sxa' kaapiya'jsamée maa yakhwa jxuka pxakhsaçxáai'kwe, naasáa kaapiya'jsa' teeçx yuuçxáa ji'phi'kwe txã' Dxus kaahni Kristo'.
I'kwe'sxa' naa kiwetewe'sxtxi' kim yuhnawa tata jĩna kxsusnuwe, txãa pa'gatey teeçx Tata yuuçxáa ji'phi'kwe txã' cielute ũsa'.
Sa' npiiçthẽ'j jxpe'jsa jĩna kxsus jxthãasnawa fxi'zenuwe, txãa pa'gatey Npiiçthẽ'j jxpe'jsa' teeçx yuuçxáa ji'phi'kwe txã' Kristo'.
Maatxwa selpiina fxi'zeçxa yuuçxáa jxtuhthesa yuune'kwe.
Txã'wẽme', maawa peekíiçxáa walasath sũhna iiwejçx iiwejçx yaakxsa' ãhmeekuẽsa yuuna, nawa ãhmeekwesath sũhna fxi'zesa' walasa yuuna.

Ley kaapiya'jsa vxite' fxariseowe'sx ãateçxáa ew we'weçxa' ũuste yu' ewmeeçxáa yaakxsa, i'kwe'sx yakha' seena' yuh ũukhũukha', txã'wẽ Dxus jxkaahnite u'kawa'ja's apha'i'kwe maawa u'kakahmén. Sa' vxitesatx ka'ga'jmeeçxa', i'kwe'sxçxáa yuhwa u'kaçmeei'kwe, txãa pa'ga ũukhũukha'.

Ley kaapiya'jsa vxite' fxariseowe'sx ãateçxáa ew we'weçxa' ũuste yu' ewmeeçxáa yaakxsa, i'kwe'sx yakha' seena' yuh ũukhũukha'. Vxiudawe'sx yattxi kusa'jçxa txãa kusa'jnitx kaapeçxkana'jya' sũhçxa wala jxu'j lisa'i'kwe. Txã'wẽ yũupa'ga i'kwe'sxa' jxthaakwe Dxus kastigãyni yuune'kwe.

Ley kaapiya'jsa vxite' fxariseowe'sx ãateçxáa ew we'weçxa' ũuste yu' ewmeeçxáa yaakxsa, i'kwe'sx yakha' seena' yuh ũukhũukha'. Mtee mteewa pekũju'i'kwe nasatx i'kwe'sx ju'gu tuphy wẽeçxa i'kwe'sx kaapiya'jni's pta'sxna. Nawa nasatx knayçxa', txãa nasatxi' i'kwe'sx ũswa'j infxiernotey nvxiit-sa i'kwe yu'.

I'kwe'sx yakha' seena' yuh ũukhũukha', jiimeeçxa na'jĩna i'kwe kaapiya'ja' naa pa'ga: Puutx we'weni's kxtey yu'nja jĩçxa dxuus yata'sçxáa kxsusna jurãyni's kxtey yuumeetewa, kĩh yuumeena. Nawa dxuus yatte vxyuu beja's kxsusna jurãyni's yuuçxá' kxtey yuuwa'j yuja' jĩ'i'kwe.
Jiimée luuku we'wesa, Dxus dxi'pte' ¿kĩh wejx jxthaakwe ewsakx, vxyuu beja' meeçxa' dxuus yata'? E'zíi ¿Dxus jĩiçxaçxáa meetxna'?
Txã'wẽy na'jĩ'i'kwe: Dxuus yatte altala'sçxáa kxsusna jurãynisa's kxtey yuumeetewa, kĩhwa yuumeena. Nawa altalte kabwa'ja's kxsusna jurãynisa's yuuçxá' kxtey yuuwa'j yuja' jĩ'i'kwe.
Jiimée luuku we'wesa, Dxus dxi'pte' ¿kĩh wejx jxthaakwe ewsakx, dxuus yatte altala' meeçxa' altalte kabnisa'? E'zíi ¿Dxus jĩiçxaçxáa meetxna'?
Maawa dxuus yatte altala's kxsusna jurãysa' txã'sçxáana kxsussa yu'çme'. Altalte kabnisa'swa jxukak kxsussa yu'.
Txã'wẽy maawa dxuus yata's kxsusna jurãysa' txã'sçxáana kxsussa yu'çme'. Kxtee ũssa Dxus ĩtxisa's kxsussak yu'.
Txã'wẽy cielu's kxsusna jurãysa' cieluçxáana kxsussa yu'çme'. Dxus jxkaahna ũsni's jxukak kxsussa yu' petx Dxus yã'jçxa.

Ley kaapiya'jsa vxite' fxariseowe'sx ãateçxáa ew we'weçxa' ũuste yu' ewmeeçxáa yaakxsa, i'kwe'sx yakha' seena' yuh ũukhũukha'. I'kwe'sx ũusteçxáa yajkxçxa kaapiya'jçxa', putatxhã' ma'k yuu meeçxa' me'sukwe ma'k yuu komino ma'k yuu txã'wẽsatx diez eç uhdeçxa' teeçx eça's kutxi'ji'kwe Dxus jĩ' jĩna. Nawa Dxus ley jxkaahçxa': Dxus dxi'pte ew fxi'zena, vxite nasatx peeygãhna, Dxusa's ũusuh jxuka yajkxna txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja' jĩ'k txãa isa jxkaahni yu's kxtey yu'çmeei'kwe. Nawa na'wẽ Dxus jĩ' jĩ'i'kwe txãa yu's nvxiitwa'j yu'me'.
Jiimée kaapiya'jsa, fxĩsx le'çxkwesa yuutxi' a'çha'i'kwe, nawa kamelxo walasa yu'sa' uymeeçxa jxkhẽeje'i'kwe.

Ley kaapiya'jsa vxite' fxariseowe'sx ãateçxáa ew we'weçxa' ũuste yu' ewmeeçxáa yaakxsa, i'kwe'sx yakha' seena' yuh ũukhũukha'. Waso ma'k yuu meeçxa' plaatu ma'k yuu txã'wẽsatx ekaju yu' wala ew pkhi'khi'i'kwe, nawa dxiikhẽ yu' vxite jĩitx pesweeçxa abnisaçxáa uta ji'phta'.
Fxariseo jiyu'çmeeg. Dxiikhẽ khuẽ'y pkhi'kxwa'ja' waso vxite' plaatutx, kxah ekajuwa jxuka ate yuuna.

Ley kaapiya'jsa vxite' fxariseowe'sx ãateçxáa ew we'weçxa' ũuste yu' ewmeeçxáa yaakxsa, i'kwe'sx yakha' seena' yuh ũukhũukha'. Uusáa pedani's kajkwekhẽ pçxiime'the', zhiçxkwek vxya'. Nawa dxiite yu' uusáa dxi'thçxáa utak kazx putana ũsu'.
I'kwe'sxa' txã'wẽysa i'kwe. Ãakhẽ yu' nasaa dxi'pte wala ew na'wẽ thegu'i'kwe. Nawa ũuste yu' kazx ewmée yaakxnisaçxáa uta ũsa'.

Ley kaapiya'jsa vxite' fxariseowe'sx ãateçxáa ew we'weçxa' ũuste yu' ewmeeçxáa yaakxsa, i'kwe'sx yakha' seena' yuh ũukhũukha'. I'kwe'sxa' ewkuẽ pheu'jna nes yu' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa vxite' nasa ewsa txãawe'sxtxi pedaní kafxsu.
Sa' na'jĩ'i'kwe: Kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx fxi'zeni ente kwe'sx ũswaça', kwe'sxa' ikhwa'jme'ntka'w yu' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsatxi' jĩ'i'kwe.
I'kwe'sxa' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sxtxi ikhsa nwe'sxi'kwe, txãasa i'kwe txãa ikhsawe'sxtxi' kwe'sx ji'j yaçgawe'sx jĩna we'we'.
I'kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx kĩhne'ta yũusa yu', aça' i'kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy yũuna nes yuune'kwe.
Ul weeswée seena'sa ji'j, ¿ma'wẽ yũuçxa infxiernote kastigãywa'the pa'jmée yuuki'kwe?

Txã'wẽsa yã'ji'kwe na' i'kwe'sxa' maaíitxi' kluuskhẽ ki'pna ikhna, vxitetxi's judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yaçu pãpana, vxitetxi's ahçeçxa çxhab iisa ikhya' pakwena nes yuukahn adxa' kaajxa'wath Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa vxite' kĩhtewa wala jiisa vxite' kaapiya'jsa txãawe'sxtxi.
Txã'wẽ Abela's ikhnijũjx nasa ewsatx ikhya' takhçxa Berekias nçxi'k Zakariasa's Dxus altal pukate ikhi'kwe txãa entepkaçx ikhnisatx i'kwe'sxçxaçxáa yuuwesa yuune'kwe.
Isath we'we' nyafxiitey ikhnisatxi's nasa naa ensuwe'sx txã'wẽ yuuwesa yuutxna.

Jerusalente nasa, i'kwe'sxa' Dxus jxkaahnisa txajx yuwe's pta'sxsawe'sxtxi ikhe'i'kwe, maaíitxi' kwet wãatatahna. Maz uswa pkhakhçxa nwe'we wẽeth i'kwe'sx luuçxtxi, atalxwa ma'wẽga luuçxkuẽtxi's fxuu ku'ta dxiite ãsxi' txã'wẽy, nawa wa'li'kwe.
Mwẽese'jwe: i'kwe'sx ũsni' thegnimée neeyũuna.
Na'jĩ'th na': peena yu' adxa's uymeene'kwe, Dxus tasxu yuusa wala ewsa yuja' jĩna we'wewa'j en ãhpkaçx.
Dxuus yatu kasehçxa Jesusa' u'jweçpkaçxha', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' utxaaçxa we'wetx dxuus yata's pta'sxna.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—Txã'wẽ yuh seena' zhiçxkwe wala'. Nawa na'jĩ'th na': jxuka pçuuna, aça' txãa yattewe'sx teeçx kwetçxáa yuhwa kẽese'jnimeesa yu' neeyũumeena jĩk.
Txajũ' Oliwos vxiçnatx u'j. Kxtee pa'jçxa Jesus kaçxçxa u'pte', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx maaíi yu' na'jĩnatx we'we paaçte:
—Meen peeta'sx, ¿bagaçx txã'wẽ jxuka pçuukx? Sa' iidx kĩiwa'j en vxite' naa kiwe pçuwa'j en ãjaçte', ¿kĩh seena'sa vxyaakx? jĩte',
Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Mpa'yajkxwe, i'kwe'sxtxi kaypuba'jwe'sxte.
Txã'wẽme', wala pa'jatxna adx yase's kxsusna na'jĩna: Dxus kaahnisa Kristoth jĩtxna, sa' txã'wẽ yũuçxa wala kaypuba'jatxna ĩsxiina.
I'kwe'sxa' wẽse'jene'kwe gweçxa msuu msuuwa u'pa' jĩni. Txã'wẽ yũutewa i'kwe'sxa' ũukhnuwe, txã' nmeh en yu' me'.

Gobierno' vxite kiwete gobierno yakh puiitxna, naapkaçxha' puutx jxu'j kiwejũ pwe'sxwa puiitxna. Txã'wẽ mtee mteewa jxuka gweçxa kiiteena. Sa' wẽje enwa pa'jana, wee seena'sawa pa'jana, ehdwa seena'sa u'jwetxna mtee mteewa.
Txã'wẽ seena'sa pa'jçxawa txãa yu' nyafxte nxusya' takhnisaçxáa yuuna.
Txajũ' i'kwe'sxtxi uweçxa dukhetxna pãpana ikhkahn, sa' naa kiwete mteewe'sxwa jxukaysa açetxna adx jxkaahni's nwẽese'pha'gaçxáa.
Txã'wẽ yũute', maazkuẽesawa Dxus tasxu txuteetxna, sa' puutx yahçena vxitesa uweçxa ikhwa'ja's vxitutxna.
Wala ĩsxiisa vxyaatxna, adxa' Dxus kaahni yuhth jĩna nasa maazkuẽesatxwa ĩsxiijatxna.
Sa' ewmée yũuna fxi'zewa'jçxáa txakwe wala pa'the', puutx ya'peeygãhna fxi'zewa'j yu'sa' ivxiitutxna maazkuẽesawa.
Nawa uu entepkaçx Dxus yakh txutemée fxi'zesa' ewte neeyũutxna.
Naapkaçxha' Dxus jxkaahwa'ja's pta'sxnisa' maa kiwetewa jxuka pta'sxni yuuna mteewe'sxwa jxuka jiyukahn. Txã'wẽ yũunijũ nmeh ensa pa'jana.
Na'wẽ yũuwa'ja's jxpa'yakx lẽeyçxa jii mfxi'zewe Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Daniela' pta'sxna fxi'kh dxuus yatte kazx ewmée yũuna pa'jwa'ja's. Aça' txã'wẽ seena' kazxsa pa'jçxa dxuus yatte u'kaçte uyçxa',
Judea kiwesuwe'sxwa jxuka ũphna u'jwene'kwe vxiç walasu ũsya'.
Sa' ẽe yat-su ũssawa sa'jçxa kĩhçxáanawa kutxi'jwa'j en ji'phumeetxna.
Txã'wẽy mjĩi ehsu u'jusawa txajx atxha's nikxya' yatna u'jwa'j ençxáa yuhwa ji'phumeetxna.
Txãa ente' u'ywe'sx nasa ji'phsa meeçxawa luuçx ãpãkuẽ ji'phsawe'sxa' wala yuh pxthaa yuutxna.
I'kwe'sxa' Dxusa's mpẽjxwe txã'wẽ nus ente meeçxawa jxkaase ente ũphna u'jwa'j yuukahmén.
Txã'wẽ txãa ente' seena' yuh wala nxuswa'j yuuna. Naa kiwe's pheu'jiyna bagaçxte yuhwa txã'wẽsa yu' iiu'pume', sa' txã'wẽsa skhẽwniijũyã'ja' peena yu' u'pumeena txã'wẽysa yu'.
Dxusa' en txã'wẽ seena'sa's txaçxmée vxitmeete yu', kim yuhwa ĩtxi neeyũumeetxna. Nawa txajx nasa txhitxhnisatx peeygãhçxa, en txã'wẽ seena'sa's txaçxmeeçxáa vxituna.
Maawa i'kwe'sxtxi we'weçxa', mthegwe Kristo ayte ũsa' jĩtxna, meeçxawa kxtee ũsa' jĩtxna, nawa txã'jĩni's nwẽese'jnuwe.

Txãa pa'gatey wala ĩsxiisa pa'jatxna, adxa' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsath sa' Dxus kaahnisa Kristoth jĩtxna, txã'wẽ kim yuhwa ãjanimeesa's kaavxya'ja'jatxna kaypuba'j wẽeçxa. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa maaíitxi' kaypuba'jatxna Dxus txhitxhnisa yuhtxwa.
Txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's pta'sxyã'th i'kwe'sxtxi dxiikhẽy.
Txãa pa'ga nwẽese'jmeene'kwe makwe txã'wẽ kxtee ũsa' nasa u'pnimeete jĩtewa meeçxa' ay dxiite ũsa' jĩtxna.
Txãa pa'gatey Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa kĩi ente', kpi'sxwa ma'wẽga sek kãanijũ kwehneçxa' sek khẽenijũwa vxya' txã'wẽyçxáa yuuna naa dudte jxukaysa dxi'pte.
Kakwe uuniisa mkaa ũstewa kxtee pkhaakhetxna mẽewẽjxa' ũ'ya'.
Txã'wẽ seena' nxuswa'j en skhẽuuçpkaçxha', seka' çxhi'dxina, aça' a'te' kweethmeena. Naapkaçxha' estrelxa ũsxitxna, ẽe walasu kĩh seena'sawa jxuka kẽese'jni yuutxna.

Txã'wẽ yũunijũ', Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa kĩiwa'ja's kaajiyu'jsa vxyaana cieluju, aça' naa kiwete nasa maazkuẽesawa ũ'netxna Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa txã'wẽ cieluju tãaph pxãhte seena' zhiçxkwe vxyaana yuhte uyçxa.
Sa' txajx angeleswe'sxtxi jxkaajana seena' sus tujkaçxa txajx txhitxhnisatxi' pkhakhkahn naa kiwetewe'sx mtee mteewe'sxwa jxukaysatx.
Naa ejemplo's peçxkananuwe: higwera fxtũu tasxa' eç ubuçxa ki' u'se yeeçuçte uyçxa', yũnya'watewa jiyu'i'kwe.
Txã'wẽy na'wẽ seena'sa vxyaaçte uyçxa', jii mfxi'zewe, pçuwa'j en utxaaçte txã'wẽ yuuna.
Isath we'we', naa ensu nasa' uumey txã'wẽ seena'satx uyuune'kwe.
Cielu naa kiwe jxuka skhẽuutxna, nawa adx we'weni yu' kxtey yuumey yu' skhẽwmeetxna.
Nawa kĩh ente kĩh orate txã'wẽ yũuwa'j yu'sa' kim yuhwa jiimeeta', cielute angeleswe'sx Dxus Nçxi'k txãawe'sx yuhwa, naasáa Dxus yuuçxáa jiia'.
Noe entewa ma'wẽga yuu txã'wẽyçxáa yuuna, Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa kĩi entewa.
Txãa ensu nasa' ĩkh utameyna yu' wala weçxana ũsu'tx ũ'na tudxna kabana Noe arkate u'kapkaçx.
Sa' Dxus kastigo's jiimée ũsíi, ĩkh utate jxuka pçuuçyã'jçxaçxáatx jiyu, txã'wẽyçxáa jiyumeetxna Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa kĩi entewa.
Txãa ente' e'z piçthẽ'j mjĩina ih ũsutxna, aça' teeçxsa's jxũna u'jni yuuna, nawa vxite's nvxiitni yuuna.
Txã'wẽy e'z u'y ih ũ'khna ũsutxna, aça' teeçxsa's jxũna u'jni yuuna, nawa vxite's nvxiitni yuuna.
I'kwe'sxa' jxpa'yakx meswe. Txã'wẽme', kĩh ente kĩh orate Dxus Nçxi'k kĩiwa'jsatewa jiimeei'kwe.
Nawa jxpa'yakx meswe. Yat namuwa ma'wẽ peswée kĩh orate yuhtewa jiyuçxa' dehmée jxpa'yakx ũythasna u'pukx yatte pesweekahmén, txã'wẽy myũuwe.
Txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxwa jxuka pheu'jçxa meswe. Txã'wẽme', yajkxmée ũsiyna Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' kĩhçxáa yuuna.
Selpisáa ¿maa ewki patron neewe'weçxa nvxihtte kxte yattewe'sxtxi kwẽeje'jmée sã'jĩwa'jsa?
Patron neewe'weçxa nvxiitni's jxuka kxtey yuuna ũste patrona' thegna pa'the', txãa selpisáa yakha' wala yuh weçxa yuhna.
Isath we'we': txã'wẽ yũusa's patrona' txajx ji'phuni's jxuka neewe'weçxa nvxiituna.
Nawa selpisáa ewmeesa' patron pa'jya' jxthẽeyuuna sũhçxa
kxte vxite selpisaatx pkxuuna tũusaawe'sx yakh tudxna ũ'na yũuna ũste',
yajkxmée ũsiyna patrona' kĩh ente kĩh oratewa pa'jçxáa yuuna.
Sa' seena' wala nxus nxus kastigãina txã'wẽ yuwejuçxáa ew we'weçxa' ũuste yu' ewmeeçxáa yaakxsawe'sxtxi na'wẽy. Txajũyã'ja' txãa selpisáa ewmeesa' seena' wala pebeena ki'thtxi ksuusu'jna.
Dxus jxkaahwa'j en ãhte', na'wẽ yuuna: Diez kna'sawa ma'wẽta lampara aceite awniisa's atçxa boda yatna u'j novxio's jxpa'gaya', txã'wẽy yuutxna.
Txãa kna'sawe'sx tahçsa' jxpa'yakxmeeçxa pheu'jmeetx u'j, sa' vxite tahçsa' jxpa'yakxçxa jxuka pheu'jçxatx u'j.
Tahçsa' ew ũus yajkxmeeçxa', lampara yu'sa' jxũçxa u'jçxawa aceite yu' jxũmeetx u'j pçuute ki' awwa'j.
Nawa vxite tahçsa' aceite jxũçxatx u'j lamparatewe'sx pçuute' ki' awwa'j.
Novxio pa'jya' jxthẽeyuute', txãawe'sxtxi wala deewẽe yuute' dehtx.
Txajũ' kuspxãh yuuçte', pthũusek na'jĩna sus we'weni: Novxio yujxã'ja', aça' jxpa'gaya' myuhwe jĩni.
Naapkaçxha' kna'sawe'sx kxazíi kiiteçxa lampara's pheu'jtx.
Aça' tahçsa jxpa'yakxmée u'jsawe'sxa' vxite tahçsatx aceite thãastxi: Le'çxkuẽçxáawa peesune'kwe. Txã'wẽme', kwe'sx pki'tanisa' ũçxhaça' jĩnatx we'we.
Nawa kna'sawe'sx jxpa'yakx pheu'jçxa u'jsa' na'wẽtx pas: Ũsme'nja'w. Txã'wẽme', kwe'sx jĩi yuhwa ãhmée ji'ptha'w, aça' i'kwe'sxtxi ũswa'j yu' wejx ãhmeena. Wejx yuuwa me'jwe weyya' jĩ'tx.
Txã'wẽ tahçsa jxpa'yakxmeeçxa aceite weyya' u'jweçpkaçxha', ptamusá novxio' pa'kh. Aça' jxpa'yakx ũythãssawe'sxa' boda yatte novxio yakh u'kaçpkaçxha', vxitxa's aphtxi.
Txãa e'suyã'jtx vxite kna'sawe'sx kũhçxa: Meen phaade jĩna we'we.
Nawa pasçxa': Isa, adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi' jiimeeth jĩk.
I'kwe'sxa' jxpa'yajkx meswe. Txã'wẽme', kĩh ente kĩh orate Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa pa'jwa'ja's jiimeei'kwe.
Teeçx piçthẽ'jwa ma'wẽga vxite kiwen u'jweççxa', txã'sna selpisaawe'sxtxi pa'yaçxa txajx vxyu's neewe'weçxa ũsçxa u'j, txã'wẽ yũuna Dxus jxkaahwa'j en ãhte'.
Txãa piçthẽ'ja' selpisáa teeçxsa's vxyu tahç milku ũs, sa' vxite's e'z milku ũs, sa' vxite's teeçx milku ũs, teeçxsa na'wẽçxah makwesa's sxiigmée iijxũya' ãjawa'jsatewa txakweçxáak ũsçxa u'j.
Teeçx selpisáa tahç mil vxyu jxpa'gasa', txãa vxyu's kmãaji'jçxa ki' vxite tahç mil íik ãh knay.
Txã'wẽy e'z mil jxpa'gasawa ki' vxite e'z mil íik ãh knay.
Nawa teeçx milçxáa jxpa'gasa' patron vxyu's kafxi'jçxa kiwetek pedáa.
Patrona' wala txaçxte ki' sxawedna pa'jçxa', txãa selpisaawe'sxtxi vxyu ũsni's ki' pẽjxku.
Nyafxte' tahç mil vxyu jxpa'gasa khuẽ'y utxaana kũhçxa ki' vxite tahç mil íik ãh kaasxwedu'j na'jĩna patrona's: Idxa' tahç milgu ũs, aça' ki' vxite tahç mil íith knay kmãaji'jçxa jĩte',

patrona' na'wẽk we'we: Idxa' vxyu'sa' psuwmeeg wala ew kmãaji'j. Txã'wẽ le'çxkuẽçxáasanawa psuwmée kmãaji'pha'ga, wejx walasanawa neewe'weçxa iidx kusete nvxiitu'nja. Ãçxha' me'ka adx yakh weçxana ũsya' jĩk.
Txajũ' vxite selpisáa e'z mil jxpa'gasawa kũjk na'jĩna patrona's: Idxa' e'z milçxáag ũs, nawa txã'sa' kmãaji'jçxa ki' vxite e'z mil íith ãh knay jĩte',

patrona' na'wẽk pas: Idxa' vxyu'sa' psuwmeeg wala ew kmãaji'j. Txã'wẽ le'çxkweçxáasanawa psuwmée ewgu kmãaji'pha'ga ãçxha' txãate jxthaakwe walasanawa nvxiitu'nja iidx kusete. Me'ka adx yakh weçxana ũsya' jĩk.
Txajũ' teeçx milçxáa jxpa'gasawa kũjk patrona's na'jĩna: Idxa' wala weesweetewa jiith, sa' iidx uuthasxmeesuwa jxukag pkhakhe' kĩhwa uhmeeçxawa.
Txãa pa'ga ũukhçxa iidx vxyu's jxaawthu kiwete pedaaçxa. Nawa ãçxha' dukheçthu idx makwene'ga ũs txã'sa' jĩte',
patrona' na'wẽk pas: Idxa' seelpimée watxkuẽg. Adxa' txã'wẽ juuna'çxa kĩhwa uhmeeçxawa vxite jĩitx pkhakhsatewa jiith jĩ'g na',
¿mjĩtega adx vxyu's bankoga jxaawmée txãate jxthaakwekuẽ nuypehnaçxa kaasxwedu'jya'? jĩçxa',
kxtee ũssatx na'wẽk jxkaah: Txãa piçthẽ'j vxyu mil ji'phsa's kusa'jçxa diez mil ji'phsa's meswe.
Txãa pa'gatey ji'phsa's jweeíiçxáa jxthaakwe ũswa'ja' wala ji'phukahn. Nawa ji'phmeesa's jxuka kusa'jwa'ja' le'çxkuẽçxáa ji'phuni'swa.
Sa' txãa piçthẽ'j seelpimeesa's uweçxa ekaju çxhi'dx walate makhwe. Kxte' seena' yuh pebeena ki'thtxi ksuusu'jna ũswa'ja' jĩk.
Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' jxkaahsa yuuçxa angeleswe'sx ksxavxyte kĩhçxa txajx jxkaahwa'the kaçxhiina.
Txajũ' nasa' naa kiwete mtee mteewe'sxwa jxuka pkhaakhetxna txajx tasxte, aça' teeçxsa na'wẽçxah txhitxhçxa txudena, piisxáa-thegsawa ma'wẽga fxii txudé' piisxáa vxite' kaplatx txã'wẽy.
Sa' piisxaatxi' paçu ju'gu txahçxa', kaplatxi' jebu ju'gu txajana.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxa jxkaahsa' we'wena paçu ju'gu ũssatxi' na'jĩna: Adx Tata peeygãanisa, i'kwe'sxa' myuhwe txã'wẽ naa kiwe's vxitiyna i'kwe'sx jxkaahwa'j pheu'jni ũsa' txã'sna jxpa'gaya'.
Txãa pa'gatey i'kwe'sxa' adxa's sã'jĩ i'kwe wẽena u'jute'. Sa' yũ'wẽena u'jute', yusi'kwe. Nasa ekajuwe'sx na'wẽ u'jute', deewa'j pki'ji'kwe.
Athwa'j ropa ji'phmée u'jute', ropa ũsi'kwe. Uuya' ũste', thegya' pa'ji'kwe. Karcelte ũste', kxteewa thegya' pa'ji'kwe jĩte',
nasa ew yũusa' na'jĩtxna: Idxa' ¿bagaçx wẽena u'jutetka'w uyçxa ũ' puuç? ¿Bagaçx yũ'wẽena u'jutetka'w tudxwa'j ũs?
Idxa' ¿bagaçx txã'wẽ ekajuwe'sx na'wẽ u'jute uyçxatka'w deewa'j pki'j? ¿Bagaçx txã'wẽ ropa ji'phmée u'jutetka'w ropawa ũs?
¿Bagaçx ãça'na ũstetka'w thegya' pa'j? ¿Bagaçx karcelte ũstetka'w kxteewa thegya' pa'j? jĩtxna.
Aça' jxkaahsa' na'wẽ pasuna: Isath we'we', adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sx makwe wala pxthaa ãhmeekwesaçxawa ayte ũsta' txãatx txã'wẽ yũusa' adxna pu'çxsaçxa i'kwe txã'wẽ yũu jĩna.

Txajũ' jebu ju'gu ũssatxi' jxkaahsa' na'jĩna we'wena: Adx tasxu mtxuteewe, i'kwe'sxa' ewmeetewe'sx yã'ji'kwe. Txãa pa'ga eçxthẽ'j jĩi eçxthẽ'j angeleswe'sx jĩi pheu'jni ũsa' infxierno ipx wala kxtee me'jwe jĩna jxkaajana.
Txã'wẽ adx wẽena u'jutewa, puuçmeei'kwe. Yũ'wẽena u'jutewa tudxwa'j ũsmeei'kwe.
Nasa ekajuwe'sx na'wẽ u'jutewa, deewa'j pki'jmeei'kwe. Ropa ji'phmée u'jutewa, athwa'j ũsmeei'kwe. Ãça'na ũstewa, thegya' pa'jmeei'kwe. Sa' karcelte ũstewa, kxteewa thegya' pa'jmeei'kwe jĩte',

txãawe'sxa' na'wẽ pasutxna: Idxa' ¿bagaçx wẽena u'jutetka'w puuçmée? ¿Bagaçx yũ'wẽena u'jutetka'w tudxwa'j ũsmée? ¿Bagaçx ekajuwe'sx na'wẽ u'jutetka'w deewa'j pki'jmée? ¿Bagaçx ropa ji'phmée u'jutetka'w athwa'j ũsmée? ¿Bagaçx ãça'na ũstetka'w thegya' pa'jmée? ¿Bagaçx karcelte ũstetka'w kxteewa thegya' pa'jmée? jĩtxna.
Aça' jxkaahsa' na'wẽ pasuna: Isath we'we', naa nasa pxthaa ãhmeekuẽsatx kĩhte yuhwa pu'çxmeei'kwe na' adxna pu'çxsameeçxai'kwe txã'wẽ yuu jĩna.
Txãa pa'ga ew yũusame' infxierno ipx pçuwa'jmeete khẽeya' u'jwetxna, naapkaçxha' ew yũusawe'sxa' bagaçxtewa pçuwa'jmée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutxna.
Jesusa' txã'wẽ pta'sxna jxã'jçxa', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi na'jĩnak we'we:
—I'kwe'sxa' jii i'kwe Paskua fxiesta ãjxa' e'z ençxáa yã'j peejxa', aça' txãa ente' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's uweçxa dukhni yuuna kluuskhẽ a'kxçxa ikhkahn jĩk.
Txãa entey sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx, ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx, judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sxa' pkhaakhetx sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j Kaifxas yat patxute,
sa' txãawe'sx pwe'sx puutx we'wetx nasa jiyunimeete paaçte Jesusa's uweçxa ikhya'.
Txãasatx fxiesta ente yu' txã'wẽ ikhya'mée puutx we'we nasa wala suskahmen.
Txãa ensu' Jesusa' Betania çxhabte Simon wã'jy weeju katxhisa yattek ũsu'.
Aça' teeçx u'y utxaana kũjk aceite wẽt putasa's fxraskote uta awniisa wala pa'gasa's atçxa. Sa' Jesus kaçxçxa u'pte', txajx dxikthekhẽk jxuka aw.
Txã'wẽ yũuni's Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sx uyçxa', na'jĩnatx ũusçxa we'we:
—¿Txakwe yuja' wala psuwmanx?
Txã'wẽ yũupkaçxte wejxwa pa'gate txweyçxa txãa vxyu's puuplesatx peeswaçne' wejx ew yu' jĩte',
Jesus wẽse'jçxa' na'wẽk we'we:
—¿Kĩjkwe kuçx susu' naa u'ya's? Na'wẽ yũunisa' psuwnisame'.
Puuplesa' bagaçxtewa i'kwe'sx yakh nes yuutxna. Nawa adxa' i'kwe'sx yakh nes yuuwa'jsameeth.
Naa u'y adx kakwekhẽ aceite wẽt putasa's awku, nawa adx uute pedaawa'ja's pheu'jnaçxáak txã'wẽ yũu.
Isath we'we': Naa kiwete mtee mteewa Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna pekũhsa' naa u'y txã'wẽ yũuni'swa ja'da pta'sxni yuuna peçxkanamée jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesus yakh u'jusa docesatewe'sx Judas Iskariote yaasesa' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx yakh puutx we'weya' u'jçxa
txãawe'sxtxi na'jĩk:
—Jesusna uweçxa dukhte' ¿maz deweeki'kwe? jĩte', txãawe'sxa' treinta vxyutx deweya' neeyũu.
Txajũ' Jesusa's ma'wẽ yũuçxa txãawe'sx kusete dukhya' ãjawa'ja's wala pakwek.
Pan lewadura ji'phmée ũ'ni fxiesta en ãjaçte', Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' txajx tasxte utxaaçxa na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—Paskuate ũ'wa'ja's ¿mteega pheu'j jxthãasu'? jĩte',
na'wẽk jxkaah:

—Jerusalenna me'jwe, kxtee teeçx piçthẽ'ja's jii i'kwe txã'sna na'jĩne'kwe: Kwe'sxtxi kaapiya'jsa' na'jĩnak yuwe kaah: Adx uuwa'j en utxaak, aça' iidx yatte Paskua's yu'skhẽwya'wath adx yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh jĩne'kwe jĩte',
txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' Jesus jxkaahni's kxtey yuutx, sa' ũ'wa'ja's pheu'jtx.
Txajũ' jxuka çxhi'dxiçte', Jesusa' docesawe'sx yakh kaçxku mesate ũ'ya'.
Sa' ũ'na u'pçxa', na'wẽk we'we:
—Isath we'we', i'kwe'sx yakh u'jusa teeçxsa' adxa's açesawe'sx kusete dukhya'wa' jĩte',
txãawe'sxa' wala nxusçxa paapẽjxtxi teeçx teeçxçxah:
—¿Adx ma'th? jĩna.
Aça' Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Maa txã'wẽ adx yakh ja'daçxah kuse's akhena plaatukhẽ txãa txã'wẽ adxa's açesawe'sx kusete dukhwa'jsa'.

Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' ma'wẽ uuwa'jsatewa Dxus librute pta'sxi'k txã'sa' kxtey yuuya'wa'. Nawa adxa's açesawe'sx kusete dukhsa' ¡seena' yuh nxuste khẽjena! Txãa piçthẽ'ja' naa kiwete wejx yuuwa upxmeewaçne' wejx ew yu' jĩte',
Judasa' pẽjxku:
—Meeçxa' ¿adxwá'ntkakx? jĩte', Jesus pasçxa':
—Idxíig jĩk.
Ũ'na u'pçxa', Jesusa' pana's jxpa'gana'wa Dxusa's weçxaçxa pe'ltedek, sa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi ũsu'sku na'jĩna:
—Mẽ'we, naa pana' adx kakwe na'wẽsa' jĩçxa',
waso'swa jxpa'gana'wa Dxusa's weçxaçxa txãawe'sxtxi ũsku na'jĩna:
—Jxukaysa mtudxwe naa wasotewe'sxa's.
Naa wasotewe'sxa' adx ee na'wẽsa'. Dxusa' maazkuẽesa pkaltxiwa khũkhçxa nwe'wewa'ja's vxitku, nawa adx eea's pkawçxa yuuçxáak txã'wẽ nwe'wewa'ja's vxit.
Nawa na'jĩ'th na': ãçxhũyã'ja' peena yu' tudxme'nja naa uwa yu'a's, naasáa adx Tata jxkaahwa'j enteçxáa yã'j ki' i'kwe'sx yakh pkhaakheçxa tudxi'nja jĩk.
Txajũ' Dxusna weçxana memna jxã'jçxa', u'jtx Oliwos thã'j vxiçna.
Aça' kxtee pa'jçxa', Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—Naa kuste' i'kwe'sx jxukaysa adxçxáana nvxihtçxa txuteene'kwe. Txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's Dxus librute na'jĩ'k: Piisxáa-thegsa's ikhte', piisxá' jxuka ũphuutxna jĩ'k.
Nawa adxa' uuçxawa ki' ĩtxi yuuçxa' i'kwe'sx yaçte u'jwe'nja Galilean jĩte',
Pedro' na'wẽk pas:
—Makwe vxite yu' idxçxáana nvxihtçxa txuteetewa, adx yu' txã'wẽ yũume'nja jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Isath we'we', naa kuste atalx we'wemeyna idxa' Jesusa's jiimeeth jĩna tekh us ĩsxiijane'ga jĩte',
Pedro' na'wẽk we'we:
—Makwe idx yakh ja'datey uuwa'jma'k kaseh, nawa idxa's jiimeeth jĩna yu' ĩsxiime'nja.
Aça' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx jxukaysa txã'wẽçxaçxáatx we'we.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh Geçemaní yaasesate pa'jçxa', na'wẽk we'we:
—Ayte mkaaçxwe, naapkaçxha' adxa' Tata yakh puutx we'weya' u'jweçthu jĩçxa',
Pedro vxite' Zebedeo nçxi'k e'zsatx pe'jçxak u'j. Sa' ũuste wala nxus ũusuthete', na'jĩk:
—Txakwe wala pxthaa yuuçxa uuwa'ja's yajkxte', wala nxus yuja'. Aça' i'kwe'sxa' aytee neeyũuçxa dehmée jxpa'yakx me'pwe adx na'wẽy jĩçxa',
Jesusa' jxu'jmée u'jçxaçxáa txkaa pkipha weteçxa Dxus yakh puutx we'wek na'jĩna:
—Tata, idxa's ewuweçxte', adxa's meen nwe'we txakwe wala pxthaa yuuwa'ja's jxpa'gakahmen. Nawa adx jxthãasni yu'sa' kxtey yuumeeçxawa, iidx jxthãasniçxá's kxtey meen yũu.
Txajũ' Jesusa' ki' sxawedku Pedrowe'sx tasxtey, sa' dehna ũste uyçxa' na'wẽk we'we Pedro's:
—Adx yakh jxpa'yakx dehmée ũsya' ãjameewá'kwe teeçx oraçxáawa.
Ewmeete weteya'mée jxpa'yakx dehmée me'pwe Dxus yakh puutx we'wena. I'kwe'sxa' ũusuh yu' çxhãçxhai'kwe yaaki', nawa i'kwe'sx kakwe yu' çxhãçxhaçme' kxtey yuuya'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' ki'kin u'jçxa', na'jĩnak Dxus yakh puutx we'we:
—Tata, txakwe wala pxthaa yuuwa'ja's yu'pthejxa' ewuweçxmeete', iidx jxthãasni kxtey yuuwaççxáa ewna jĩçxa',
Pedrowe'sx tasxte ki' sxawedçxa', txãawe'sx yafx çxhãçxhameete ki' dehna ũstek uy.
Sa' nyafxíi na'wẽyçxáa we'weçxa tekh uswa ki' u'kh, Dxus yakh puutx we'weya'.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxak Pedrowe'sx tasxna sxawedna kũhçxa', na'wẽ we'we:
—Ãçxh yuuçxá' mdejxujíiwe jxkaaseya'. Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's pkalsawe'sx kusete dukhwa'j en ãjk.
Aça' kiiteçxa u'jwega. Adxa's açesawe'sx kusete dukhwa'jsa' yujxã'ja' jĩk.

Jesus kxtee we'wena nee ũsiyna, Judasa' pa'kh. Txã' docesatewe'sxíiçxáak yu'. Aça' txãa yakh nasa wala kuh pa'jtx kçxilx vxite' fxtũ atçxa. Txãawe'sxa' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx jxkaahnisatx yu'.
Judasa' na'jĩnaga yu'kxwe'weçxa pe'jna yuwé' Jesusa's tudkahn:
—Ma'sna dxi'pte adx weçxa'nja txã'sna tudçxa jxũna u'jwene'kwe jĩnaga we'we.
Txãasak Jesus tasxte utxaaçxa na'wẽ we'we:
—Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa jĩna'wa weçxak.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Namiku, ¿kĩjxa' yuhga? jĩçpkaçxha', tudtxi jxũna u'jya'.
Txã'wẽ tuduçpkaçxha', Jesus yakh pi'kxna u'jusa teeçxsa' kçxilxa's jxkuutxi'jçxa sacerdote npiiçthẽ'ja's selpisáa thũ'wẽ's spẽ'thku.
Aça' Jesusa' we'wek:
—Iidx kçxilxa's mjxaaw. Txã'wẽme', jxukay maawa kçxilxuh puiisa', kçxilxteyçxáa uuwa'jsata'.
Adx Tata's maazkuẽe angeleswe'sxwa adxna nwe'wewa'jsa pẽjxte', kxtey yuuna sũju'çmeewá'ga.
Txã'wẽ pẽjxte', kxtey yuuyujuna, nawa Dxus librute' nyafxiitey pta'sxni yã'kh yu' ãçxh na'wẽ tuduçta' txã' kxtey yuukahn, aça' nwe'wewa'jsa pẽjxme'nja.
Txã'jĩçxa' tudsatxku we'we:
—Adxa' pesweethas i'kwe adxa's tudxa' kçxilx petx fxtũ atçxa pa'j. Adxa' kaapiya'jya' een isath dxuus yatte i'kwe'sx ksxavxyte nes yu'. Nawa txagaçxhíi yu' tudmeei'kwe.
Nawa Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx fxi'jçxa nvxiitni kxtey yuukahnçxáa txã'wẽ yuuça' jĩk. Naapkaçxha' Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' txã'sçxáana nvxihtçxa jxuka ũphna u'jtx.
Aça' Jesusa's tudçxa jxũna u'jtx sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j Kaifxas tasxte. Kxteea' ley kaapiya'jsa vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx txãawe'sxtxi pkhaakheçxa ũs yu'.
Aça' Pedro' e'ste jxu'j neeyũuçxak yuhna ũsu', sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j yat patxute u'kapkaçx, sa' kxtee policiawe'sx yakh kaçxçxa neeyũuk kĩh yũutewa uyya'.
Naapkaçxha' sacerdotewe'sx, judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx vxite' jxukay kxtee pkhaakheçxa ũssawe'sxa' Jesusa's kiikhe'jya' sũhçxa kĩhçxáawa ĩsxiiwa'jsa pakwe'tx.
Makwe nasa maazkuẽesa kĩhçxáawa pta'sxna kũhtewa, ĩsxiiniçxáak kaseje'. Nawa nmehte' e'z nasa ĩsxiisa kũhçxa na'wẽtx pta'sx:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' na'jĩ'k: Adxa' naa dxuus yata's pẽtxçxa tekh ente' ki' txaja'nja jĩ'k jĩna pta'sxte',
sacerdote npiiçthẽ'ja' kiiteçxa Jesusa's na'wẽk we'we:
—¿Kĩh yũuçxaga ma'wẽçxáawa pasu'çmée? Meeçxa' ¿isa yuh txã'jĩwá'nta? jĩtewa,
Jesusa' pasme'. Aça' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'ja' na'wẽk we'we:
—Dxus ĩtxisa dxi'pte jurãyçxa isasaçxá's mpeeta'sx. Idxa' ¿Kristo Dxus Nçxi'k dxihgá'? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Idxa' isag we'we'. Adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi na'jĩ'th na': Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's uyuune'kwe Dxus pukate kaçxçxa u'pte sa' cieluju tãaph pxãhte kĩjaçtewa uyuune'kwe jĩte',
sacerdote npiiçthẽ'ja' ũusaçxaçxa peekx athni ropa's sudek na'jĩna:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' txajx yuweju yuu açewe'wek Dxusa's, aça' ¿kĩjxa'çxáa testigo jwee pejiikxtha'w? Txajx açewe'weni's i'kwe'sxíiwa wẽse'ji'kwe.
Sa' ãçxha' ¿maa sũju'kwe? jĩte', txãawe'sxa' na'wẽtx pas:
—Txã' yuuwesa', txãa pa'ga ikhwa'j yuuna jĩtx.
Txajũ' Jesus dxi'pte fxne'sx avxythethçxa uyiitx, aça' vxite' dxi'ptetx uka'ka na'jĩna:
—Idxa' Kristo dxihçxa', mjiyu kimga dxi'pte ujka.
Txã'wẽ yuuçpkaçxha', Pedro' ekaju patxutek kaçxçxa u'pu'. Aça' teeçx kna'sa selpisáa utxaana kũhçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Idxwa Jesus Galileajuwe'sx yakh u'jusag jĩte',
Pedro' jxukaysa dxi'pte:
—I'kwe we'weni's jiimeeth jĩnak ĩsxii.
Txajũ' Pedro' vxitxte kasehna u'jweçpkaçxha', vxite kna'sa selpisaawa uyçxa' kxtee ũssatx na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Naa piçthẽ'jwa Nasarettewe'sx Jesus yakh u'jute uythu jĩte',
Pedro' ki' ĩsxiik jurãyna:
—Txãa piçthẽ'ja's adxa' jiimeeth jĩk.
Txaçxmeynaçxáa kxtee ũssawe'sx Pedro tasxte utxaaçxa na'wẽtx we'we:
—Isa, ĩsxiimée idxwa txãawe'sx yakh u'jusag. Txã'wẽçxaíi iidx we'weni' peedame' jĩte',
ki' jurãyçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Txãa piçthẽ'ja's jiimeeth, isa Dxus uyte.
Txã'jĩna ũspkaçxha', atalx we'wek.
Aça' Pedro' yajkxku Jesus na'jĩna we'weni's: Atalx we'wemeyna, idxa' tekh us ĩsxiijane'ga jiimeeth jĩni's. Txã's yajkxçxa', Pedro' eka kasehçxa seena' wala nxusna ũ'nek.
Txajũ' khikhyna sẽjeçte', sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx txãawe'sxa' puutx we'wetx Jesusa's kiikhe'jya'.
Sa' tudçxa jxũna u'jtx ne'jwe'sx Poncio Pilato tasxte kuutxa'jya'.

Jesusna kuuwe'jsa Judasa' Jesusa's ikhwa'j vxitni's jiyuçxa', iiméh wala nxusku. Txã'wẽ yũumeewaça' ewne' yu' sũhçxa treinta vxyutxi' kaasxwedu'jya' u'kh sacerdotewe'sx vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx tasxna na'jĩna:
—Adxa' ãhmeeth yũu, txã'wẽ piçthẽ'j kĩhtewa yuuwemeesa's ikhkahn kuuwe'pha'ga jĩte', txãawe'sxa' na'wẽtx pas:
—Kwe'sxa' ¿jiitka'wá'? Txã'wẽ yũusa idx jiine'ga jĩçxa jxpa'gameete',
Judasa' txãa vxyu's dxuus yatte wãatahna'wa u'jçxa ya'jythujkku.
Txã'wẽ yũute', sacerdotewe'sxa' txãa vxyu's pkhakhçxa na'wẽtx puutx we'we:
—Naa vxyu's ofxreda kajate akhya' ãjame'nja'w. Txã'wẽme', nasa's kiikhe'jni vxyua' naa pa'ga jĩçxa',
txãa vxyuju mitxh umsáa kiwe'stxi wey, nasa ekajuwe'sx pa'jçxa uusaatx pedaawa'j.
Txãa pa'ga ãçxpkaçx txãa kiwe' ee pkawnisa kiwe' jĩ'tx.
Aça' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Jeremias we'weni kxtey yuuk. Txã' na'wẽk we'we: Israelwe'sx makwetene'ta txweyya' puutx we'we txãa treinta vxyu's jxpa'gaçxatx
mitxh umsáa kiwe's wey, Dxusa' adxa's jxkaakh kiwe weykahn txã'sa' kxtey yuutx jĩnak fxi'j.
Jesusa' ne'jwe'sx tasxte jxũna u'jnik yuu, aça' txã' na'jĩnak pẽjx:
—Idx wáa txã'wẽ judiuwe'sxtxi jxkaahsane'ga jĩte', Jesus pasçxa':
—Idxa' isag we'we'. Adxa' txã'wẽsaíith jĩk.
Txajũ' sacerdotewe'sx vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsa txãawe'sxa' Jesusa's ewmeesag jĩna we'wete', Jesusa' pasu'çme'.
Aça' Pilato' na'wẽk we'we:
—Idxa's na'wẽtx kĩhtewa jxuka ewmeesa' jĩna yuwe ũsu' aça' wẽse'jeçmeewá'ga jĩtewa,
Jesusa' kĩhwa pasme'.
Txã'wẽ pasmeete', ne'jwe'sxa' ma'wẽ yũuya'çxáa yuhwa ãjameeçxa', na'wẽ yũuya'k yajkx.
Fxiesta ensu' ne'jwe'sxa' teeçx preesu txhweete'k ma'sna nasa pẽyitxna txã'sna.
Aça' txãa fxiesta ensu' teeçx preesu jxtuhthesa ũsu'k Barabas yaasesa.
Kxajk Pilato' na'jĩna pẽjx txãawe'sx pkhaakheçxa ũssatx:
—I'kwe'sxa' ¿kimnakwe txhweete jxthãasu'? ¿Barabasna', meeçxa' Kristo jĩ'i'kwe txã'sna wáa kaatxhweete'je'nja?
Txã'wẽ Jesusa's ahçeçxa txajx tasxte dukhtewa jiyuçxak txã'jĩ.
Pilato' jxkaahna u'pnite u'pte', txajx nyua' na'jĩnaga yuwe kaah: Txãa piçthẽ'j yuuwemeesa yakha' kuçx yuumeena. Txã'wẽme', ãçxh kus iiméh seena' ũukhũukh ksxa'wthu txãa piçthẽ'j ma'wẽ yũuwa'jsatewa.
Txã'jĩna pta'sxtewa, sacerdotewe'sx vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsa txãawe'sxa' nasatx knaytxi yu'kxwe'weçxa, txã'wẽ Barabasa's txhweeteçxa Jesusa's kiikhe'jwa'ja's pẽykahn.
Txã'wẽtewa, ne'jwe'sxa' ki' pẽjxku na'jĩna:
—Naa e'zsatxi' i'kwe'sxa' ¿ma'snakwe kaatxhweete'j jxthãasu'? jĩte', txãawe'sxa' na'wẽtx pas:
—Barabasna metxhwete jĩte',
Pilato we'weçxa':
—Barabasa's txhweeteçxa', naa Jesusa's Kristo jĩ'i'kwe txã'sa' ¿kĩh yũutka? jĩte', jxukaysa pasçxa':
—Kluuste mkaafxuçu'j jĩ'tx.
Aça' Pilato' na'wẽk pẽjx:
—¿Kĩhga ewmée yũu? jĩte', txãawe'sxa' ki' sus we'weçxa':
—Kluuste mkaafxuçu'j jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' Pilato' kĩhwa yũuya' ãjanimeeteçxáa nasa' jweeíiçxáa seena' wala suste', yu' jxũukaahçxa nasaa dxi'pte txajx kusetx kweeçxak na'jĩna:
—Naa piçthẽ'j kĩhtewa yuuwemeesa's ikhni's adxa' yuuwemeesath. Txã'sa' i'kwe'sx pasune'kwe jĩte',
nasa jxukaysa we'weçxa':
—Txã'sa' kwe'sx luuçx yã'jçxa jxuka paswa'jsatha'w jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' Pilato' kaatxhweete'kh Barabasa's, nawa Jesusa's kaapeçxukwe'jçxa kluuste fxuçkahn dukhku.
Txã'wẽ yũute', soldauwe'sxa' ne'jwe'sx u'pnite ka'ga'jçxa, soldauwe'sx jxukaysatx pa'yaçxa Jesusa's jxuka kxtadçxatx yuju.
Txajũ' ksũupi'jçxa atxh behsatx kaathe'j.
Sa' çhũçha's korona na'wẽ vxitçxa dxikthete ki'ptxi. Paçu kuseju yu', fxtũu zuzkuẽtx kaatu'j. Txã'wẽ yũuçxatx txajx tasxte peejxũkwe:
—Judiuwe'sxtxi jxkaahsath jĩ'ne'ga jĩna weeçxna.
Sa' fxne'sx avxythethna fxtũ's kusa'jçxa, dxikthegatx pekwe'kwe.
Txã'wẽ Jesusa's weeçxna jxã'jçxa', txãa atxh behsa's ksũupi'jçxa Jesus ropa's ki' kaathe'jtx. Txã'wẽ yũuçxatx kluuskhẽ fxuçya' jxũna u'j.
Txajũ kasehna u'jweççxa', teeçx piçthẽ'j Cirenejũwe'sx Simon yaasesa yakhtxi pu'jykhẽw. Sa' Jesus yakhni kluusa's txã'snatx kxaakhe'j.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxatx pa'j teeçx ahte Golgota yaasesate. Txãa yu' Uusá Dxikthé Dxi'thçxáasa jĩni'.
Kxteea' vxinote yaasa's awçxatx Jesusa's yus wẽe. Nawa txã'sa' yuwete isaçxaçxáa tudxme'.

Kluuskhẽ a'kxçxa', soldauwe'sxa' swerte kaahtx Jesus athni ropa's maa soldau knaytewa jiyuya'. Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa' na'jĩnak we'we txã' kxtey yuuk: Swerte kaahçxa adx ropa's txudeedetx txãawe'sx pwe'sx jĩnak we'we.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxatx kxtee thegna kaçx.
Sa' txajx dxikthé kakwey fxi'jçxa ki'ptxi kĩh yũusate ikhçxawa na'jĩna pta'sxna: Naaíi Jesus Judiuwe'sxtxi Jxkaahsa' jĩnak fxi'jni yu'.
Sa' Jesus pukakhẽ pdxi'ptxi e'z pesweetx ki'pni yuu kluuskhẽ.
Aça' kluus tasxuy uykhẽwsa' na'jĩnatx wẽesxu' dxiktheetx kaawũhna:
—Dxuus yata's pẽtxçxa tekh ente' ki' kiissathẽ'j, idxa' ya'menwe'we. Dxus Nçxi'k dxihçxa', kluusuh msa'j jĩ'tx.
Txã'wẽy sacerdotewe'sx, ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx, fxariseowe'sx, vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx txãawe'sx pwe'sx na'jĩnatx weeçx we'we':
—Vxite yuutxi' nwe'wek, nawa peekíi yu' ya'nwe'weya' ãja'çme'. Israelwe'sxtxi Jxkaahsa dxihçxa', kluusuh sa'jana aç yuuçxáa ĩsxiija'çmeega sũju'nja'w.
Dxus Nçxi'kthu jĩ'k na' Dxusnane' neewe'we', aça' txã'sa' ãçxhíi Dxusa' nwe'wena, nwe'weya' ãjaçxa yu' jĩ'tx.
Aça' kluuskhẽ fxuçni ki'pnisa peswée yuhwa wẽesxu pu'çxhi'tx.
Txajũ' ẽepxãh walajũjx çxhi'dxçxa kusuçte las trestepkaçxku çxhi'dx naa kiwete jxuka.
Aça' las tres ãjaçpkaçxha', Jesusa' na'jĩnak sus we'we:
—Eli, Eli, ¿lama sabaktani?—txã' na'jĩni': Adx Dxusgu sa' ¿mjĩi pa'gaga adxa's thegmée nvxiht? jĩni'.
Aça' kxtee ũssa' txã'jĩni's wẽse'jçxa', na'wẽtx we'we:
—Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Eliasa's pa'yaça' jĩ'tx.
Naapkaçxha' teeçxsa' wuwuuna u'jçxa esponja's vxino puste akhçxa fxtũu vxiçte ki'pçxa yuwete utxak çxazxakahn.
Nawa vxite yu' na'jĩ'tx:
—Kuçx yuunu. Aan Elias pa'jana nwe'weya' jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' Jesusa' ki' seena' sus we'weçxa' uuk.
Naapkaçxha' dxuus yatte txudenisa liensu pesath a'kxnisa' puupxãjkhẽ sutek kute ẽeju kiwete kĩh. Naapkaçxha' ehdwa çxhãçxha u'the', penxa yuhwa upetx,
aça' uusaawe'sx pedaní kafxwa phaatete', Dxusna jxpa'gaçxa uusaawe'sxa' ki' ĩtxi yuutx.
Aça' Jesus uuçxawa ki' ĩtxi yuuniijũ' txãawe'sxa' pedaní kafxu kasehçxa Jerusalente u'kate', maazkuẽesawa uytxi.
Txajũ' kxtee Jesusna jxpa'yakx thegna ũssawe'sx vxite' soldau kpiitan txãawe'sxa' wala ũukhtxi ehd u'jna vxite' kĩhwa seena' yũuni's uyçxa. Sa' na'wẽtx we'we:
—Isa, naa piçthẽ'ja' Dxus Nçxi'k yuh yu'ga jĩ'tx.
Kxteea' kuh u'ytxi ũsu' jxu'ju thegna, txãawe'sxa' Jesusna selpiina u'jusatx yu' Galileajũjx yuusa.
Txãawe'sx ksxavxyte' Maria Magdalena, vxite Maria Jakobo Jose njĩ'j, vxite' Zebedeo nyu txãawe'sxtxi yu'.
Kusna kĩjaçte', teeçx piçthẽ'j wala ji'phsa Jose yaasesa Arimatea çxhabuwe'sxku pa'j. Txãawa Jesus yakh u'jusak yu'.
Txãa piçthẽ'ja' Pilato tasxte u'jçxa', Jesus kakwe's pẽjxku, aça' Pilato' yuwe kaakh tee dukh jĩna.
Txajũ' Josea' Jesus kakwe's spajkxçxa liensu fxinusatek yap.
Sa' kwet penxate u'se kafxi'jçxa ji'phu'k peekx kakwe's pedaawa'j txkaa khikhçxa', u'kani kafxte yu' kwet walasaju aphçxak u'j.
Kxtee txã'wẽ yũuçte', pedaní kafx dxi'puh utxatx thegna u'pu' Maria Magdalena vxite Mariawa.
Jxkaasena fxi'zeya' jxuka pheu'jna jxã'jnijũ kuskuskhẽ' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' fxariseo txãawe'sxa' Pilato tasxte u'jçxa na'wẽtx we'we:
—¿Wẽse'gá', ne'jwe'sx? Txãa ĩisxihthẽ'ja' nee ĩtxi u'juçxa', uuçxawa tekh ente' ki' ĩtxi yu'nja jĩni'stha'w yajkx.

Txãa pa'ga mkaah pedaní kafxte wala ew aphkahn tekh entepkaçx. Txã'wẽ yũumeete', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' kus pa'jçxa kakwe's pesweetxna, sa' e'suyã'ja' na'jĩna we'wetxna nasatx: Uuçxawa ki' ĩtxi yuuga jĩtxna. Aça' txã'wẽ yũuçxa ĩsxiini' nyafxíi ĩsxiinite thaakwesa yuuna jĩte',
Pilato' na'wẽk we'we:
—Soldauwe'sx kxtee ũsta' txãatx pe'jçxa me'jwe, sa' pedaní kafxte wala ew maphwe. I'kwe'sxtxi ma'wẽ wejx ew thegte', txã'wẽ myũuwe.
Txã'jĩte', u'jçxa pedaní kafxte wala ew aphçxa txãa aphni kajkwete selxo ki'ptxi, sa' jxpa'yakx thegna ũswa'jsa soldauwe'sx txahtx.
Jxkaase en skhẽwniijũ kuskuskhẽ mjĩiwa'j en ãanite wala kusíitey Maria Magdalena vxite Maria yakh txãawe'sxa' u'jtx pedaní kafxte thegya'.
Naapkaçxha' ehd seena' çxhãçxha u'kh, txã'wẽ Dxus angel cieluju kĩhçxa pedaní kafxte aphni kweta's kiispa'ga. Sa' txãa yu' txãa kwet kajkwete kaçxçxa
kpi'sx kweneni na'wẽk khikhyna u'p yu', aça' txajx athni ropa' seena' zhiçxkwe çxihme yu'tx.
Aça' soldauwe'sxa' txã'wẽsa's uyçxa', ũukhnite jxuka yayaçxa uuníi na'wẽtx wete.
Aça' txãa u'ywe'sxtxi' Dxus angela' na'wẽk we'we:
—Ũukhnuwe, adxa' jiith, Jesusna kluuste fxuçtxi txã'sna i'kwe'sxa' thegya' yuji'kwe.
Nawa ayte' meeyã'ja'. Uuniijũ ki' ĩtxi yuuçxa u'kh ma'wẽga pta'sx txã' kxtey yuuk. Mkaane'ta khikh txkaa myuhwe thegya'.

Sa' wala dud me'jwe, txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi na'wẽ pta'sxya': Uuçxawa ki' ĩtxi yuuçxa Galilea kiwen u'jweça' i'kwe'sx yaçte. Kxtee puutx uyuune'kwe jĩna pta'sxine'kwe. Txã'wẽ pta'sxwa'th ji'phu i'kwe'sxtxi jĩk Dxus angela'.
Txajũ' u'ywe'sxa' wala dud wuwuuna u'jtx Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi pta'sxya' ũukhnawa ũuste wẽt wẽt yajkxna.
Naapkaçxha' Jesusa' txãawe'sx u'jweçte dxi'the vxyaaçxa weçxana kũjk. Aça' txãawe'sxa' Jesus tasxte peejxũkweçxa txajx çxidatx psxa'dçxa weçxatx.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Ũukhmée me'jwe, sa' adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi pta'sxine'kwe Galilea kiwen u'jçxa kxtee adxa's puutx uyuune'kwe jĩnak pta'sxkaah.
U'ywe'sx txã'wẽ u'jweçpkaçxha', pedaniite thegna ũssa soldauwe'sx maaíi yu' u'jtx Jerusalente sacerdotewe'sxtxi pta'sxya' kĩh yũuni'swa jxuka.
Txajũ' sacerdotewe'sxa' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx tasxte u'jçxa puutx we'wetx. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa soldauwe'sxtxi' wala vxyu dukhtxi.
Sa' na'wẽtx we'wekaah: Kuspxãh kwe'sx deenite Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sx pa'jçxa uuníi kakwe's pesweeta jĩne'kwe i'kwe'sxa'.
Aça' txã'wẽ yuh dehne'ta sũhçxa ne'jwe'sxa' i'kwe'sxtxi ewmeete nvxiit wẽjewáana, nawa kwe'sx u'jçxa txãa yakh puutx we'we'nja'w i'kwe'sx ju'gu txã'wẽ yũukahmén.
Txã'wẽ kwe'we'the', soldauwe'sxa' vxyu's jxpa'gaçxa kxtey yuutx. Aça' txãasatx judiuwe'sxa' ãçxpkaçx txã'wẽçxáa pta'sxi'.
Txã'wẽ yũuyã'the', Jesus yakh u'jusa oncesawe'sxa' Galilean u'jtx, thã'j vxiçte mteene' Jesus pta'sx kxtee.
Sa' Jesusa's uyçxa', peejxũkweçxa weçxatx, nawa vxiteíi yu' txãamée wáana sũhna kuhtx yaaki'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãawe'sx tasxte utxaaçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Cielute vxite' naa kiwetewa adxnaçxaçxáak neewe'weni yuu jxkaahwa'ja's.
Txãasath i'kwe'sxtxi jxkaaja': Me'jwe Dxus yuwe's pta'sxya' maa kiwetewa nasa jxukaysatx. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa' yu'te bautisaĩne'kwe, Dxus vxite' Dxus Nçxi'k vxite' Dxus Espiritu txãawe'sxtxi neewe'weçxa.
Sa' Dxusa's nwẽese'jwa'ja's kaapiya'jane'kwe kĩhtewa jxuka, adx ma'wẽtka i'kwe'sxtxi jxkaah txã'wẽy. Mjiyuwe, ãçxhũyã'ja' een isa bagaçxtewa i'kwe'sx yakh nes yuuya'wath naa kiwe pçuupkaçx jĩk.
Mark: Dxus Nçxi'k Jesukristo fxi'zeni's pta'sxnisa na'wẽk takh:
Txãniitey Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Isaiasa' na'jĩnaga fxi'j Dxus we'weni's:
Teeçx adx yuwe pta'sxsa's kajaçthu iidx yaçte, iidx dxi'ja's pheu'khan.
Nasa u'pnimée kiwesu sus we'wenik pthũuse' na'jĩna:
Dxus pa'jwa'ja's mpheu'jwe, dxi'ja's ku'le phaadena jĩ'k.
Txã'wẽ Isaias we'weni kxtey yuuwa'j ãhte', Juana' nasa u'pnimée kiwesu vxyaak nasatx bautisãyna. Sa' na'jĩnak pta'sxi':
—Pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte misxawedwe, yu'te ya'bautisãyna, kxah i'kwe'sxtxi' Dxusa' peltunaĩna.
Juan we'weni's wẽsẽ'jya' pa'jtx Judea kiwesuwe'sx vxite' Jerusalenuwe'sxwa. Sa' pkalsatha'w jĩna Dxusa's perdon pẽjxna pa'jsatxi' Juana' Jordan yu'walate bautisaĩ'k.
Juana' kamelxo khas atxh athçxa kha'txku jxtudu', sa' txajx ũ'nisa yu' khã'sx wala çxhi'dx miltxi yu'.
Sa' Dxus yuwe's na'jĩnak pta'sxi' nasatx:
—Adx e'suh teeçx yuja' txã' adxte jxthaakwe ãjãwa'jsa'. Adxa' txajx pelgatxi wesçxáa yuhtxwa khihbxa' ãjãwa'jmeesath.
Adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi' yu' yakhçxáath bautisãyya' ãjã', naapkaçxha' txã' i'kwe'sx ũuste Dxus Espiritu's kxu'akhe'jya' ãjãwa'jsa' jĩ'k.
Txãn ensu' Jesusa' Nasaret çxhabu kasejk Galilea kiweju. Sa' Juan tasxte pa'the', Jordan yu'walate bautisãyku.
Aça' yu'ju kasejeççxa', uyku cielu phaateeçte. Naapkaçxha' Espiritu' tub çxihme na'wẽsa txajx kajkwekhẽ kĩjaçtek uy.
Sa' cieluju teeçx na'jĩna we'weniwa pthũusek:
—Idxa' adx Nçxi'k wala wedxnisag. Iidxpa'ga wala weçxana ũsthu jĩk.
Txãa dudtey Espiritu' Jesusa's pe'jna u'kh nasa u'pnimée kiwesu.
Aça' Jesusa' kuarenta enku kxtee u'pu' yu'kh niimal ksxavxyte. Kxtee u'pte', eçxthẽ'ja' pa'kh ewmée vxit wẽeçxa. Aça' txãa e'su' Dxus angeleswe'sxwa pa'jtx pu'çxya'.
Juana's karcelte kxuuphni e'su', Jesusa' Galilea kiwen u'kh Dxus jxkaahwa'ja's pta'sxya'.
Sa' na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Ena' ãjãça'. Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena' utxa ũsa'. Aça' i'kwe'sxa' pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte misxawedwe, sa' Dxus yuwe ewte nvxiitwa'jsa's ũuste myu'akhwe jĩ'k.
Txãa e'su' Jesusa' Galilea ĩkh wala pukasu u'jweççxa', uyku pxakhsatx Simon Adreswe'sxtxi. Txãawe'sxa' wedx uwesaatx yu', txãasatx wedx ukhe's ĩkh walate akhna ũsu'.
Aça' Jesusa' pa'yak:
—Adx yakh myuhwe, aça' i'kwe'sxtxi' Dxus jĩi nasaa pkhakhwa'jsa vxitu'nja.
Txã'jĩçpkaçxha', txãawe'sxa' wedx ukhe's nvxihtna' Jesus yakh u'jtx.
Txajũ' Jesusa' ki' u'jçxa', Zebedeo nçxi'kwe'sx pxakhsatxku uy, Jakobo Juanwe'sxtxi. Txãawe'sxa' wedx ukhe's pã'khnatx u'p yu' barkote.
Aça' pa'yak. Naapkaçxha' txãawe'sxa' ney Zebedeo's vxite pu'çxsa yakh barkote nvxihtna', Jesus yakh u'jtx.
Txajũ' Kapernaum çxhabte pa'jçxa', Jesusa' kaapiya'jya' takhku sapatu jxkaase ensu judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenite.
Aça' Jesus kaapiya'jni's wẽsẽ'jçxa', nasa' wala kuh yajkxna neeyũutx, txã'wẽ leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx na'wẽmée, nwẽese'jwa'ja's ũukhnus we'wena kaapiya'pha'ga.
Txãa pkhaakheni yatte teeçx piçthẽ'j eçx iiyamunisak ũsu', sa' na'jĩnak sus we'we:
—Jesus, Nasarethuwe'sx, kwe'sxtxi' ¿kĩh ya'waga? ¿Ivxiituya' wá'ga yuwé'? Idx kimtewa jiith. Idxa' Dxus kaahnisag jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩnak ũusçxa we'we txãa eçxa's:
—Sxuuna' myũu, sa' naa piçthẽ'j ũusu mkaaseh jĩna jxkaathe',
txãa eçxa' nasa's kaywẽçxpa'jna juuna' kweeyi'jçxa kasejk.
Txã'wẽ yũute', nasa' jxukaysa ũukhçxa na'wẽtx puutx paapẽyi':
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿kimna? Txajx we'weni' ¿kĩhtxki açki'tx eçx yuhwa nwẽesẽ'je'? jĩ'tx.
Jesus txã'wẽ yũuni's wala dud jiyutx Galilea kiwesuwe'sx jxuka.
Txajũ' judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatu kasehçxa', Simon Adreswe'sx yatnak u'j, Jakobo Juan yakh.
Aça' kxtee yu' Simon nyu njĩ'ja' kakwesektek ãçã'na ũsu'. Aça' Jesusa's pta'sxtxi txã'wẽ ãçã'sa ũsa' jĩna.
Txajũ' Jesusa' kũhçxa kuseju pu'kisku, naapkaçxha' dudtey kakweseka' ũçxhak. Txajũ' kiiteçxa selpiiya' kasejk.
Txajũ' çxhi'dxna kĩjaçte', jxuka ãçã'satx Jesus tasxte nuypa'jtx vxite' eçx luuku vxitnisatxwa.
Aça' çxhabte nasa' jxuka kũhtx vxitxte thegya'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' nuykatxhik fxiyfxiy wee ji'phsatxwa, sa' eçx luuku vxit-satxwa wala kutxi'kh nasaa ũusu. Txãa eçxa' Jesus kimtewa jiitx yu' nawa kwe'we'jme'.
Txã'wẽ yũuni khikhiiçte nee çxhi'dxtey, Jesusa' Dxus yakh puutx we'weya' u'kh çxhab ekaju.
Aça' Simona' vxite yakh Jesusna pakweya' u'kh.
Sa' uyçxa' pta'sxku:
—Jxukaysa idxa's jxpeejxta' jĩtewa,
Jesus pasçxa':
—Ay utxasuwe'sx vxitewa peejxta' Dxus yuwe ewsa's, aça' kxsũ u'jwega. Txã'wẽ pta'sxna pekũjxa' íiçxáath naa kiwete kĩh jĩk.
Sa' eçx iiyamuçxa luuku vxit-satx nasaa ũusu kutxi'jna Galilea kiwesu jxuka pekũjk Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna, vxite' judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenisuwa.
Txãn ensu' teeçx piçthẽ'j wã'jy wee seena' kazxsate ãçã'sa Jesus tasxte peejxũkweçxa na'jĩk:
—Adxa's nuykatxhiwá'ga ahçemeeçxa' jĩna pxthaa we'wete',
Jesusa' peeygãhna kuseju jxa'dxçxa':
—Ahçeme'nja, naa pa'ga katxhiçxa mneeyũu jĩçpkaçxha',
txãa wã'jy weeju katxhiçxak neeyũu.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa piçthẽ'ja's wala neewe'weçxa kaakh na'jĩna:

—Adx we'wenitxi' jxpa'yakxçxa, maa yuhtxwa pta'sxmeene'ga, naasáa sacerdoteçxá's iidx kakwe's txwesya' me'j. Sa' txãa weeju katxhipa'ga Dxusna peesune'ga Moises ma'wẽga jxkaah txã'wẽy, kxah nasa jxukaysa jiyutxna idx ew katxhiçxa neeyũutewa jĩnak neewe'we.

Nawa txãa piçthẽ'ja' nasa jxukaysatx pta'sxku, Jesus ma'wẽ yũuni'swa jxuka. Txãa pa'gaçxáa Jesusa' maa çxhabte yuhwa ãate pa'jya' ãjãmeeçxa', çxhab ekaju nasa meesuçxáak u'ju'. Makwe txã'wẽ yũutewa, txajx tasxte yu' majũwe'sxwa pa'jna nestxi yu'.
Maz en skhẽwniijũ' Jesusa' ki'kin pa'kh Kapernaum çxhabte. Aça' nasa jiyutx Jesusa' pa'jçxa teeçx yatte ũsa' jĩni's.
Txãasatx naa dudte nasa wala pkhaakheçxa yat vxitxte jxuka uta, aça' Jesusa' Dxus yuwe's pta'sxku.
Naapkaçxha' pahz piçthẽ'jsa teeçx ẽsẽya' ãjãsameea's yakhçxatx Jesus tasxte nuypa'j.
Nawa nasaa ksxavxyte Jesus tasxte kuutxa'jya' ãjãmeeçxa', yat kajkweju phaadeçxatx Jesus ũsnikhẽ nuykĩh aadasga khikhçxa.
Txajũ' ãçã'sa's nuypa'jsawe'sxa' Jesusa' nuykatxhiyujuna sũhni's jiyuçxa', txãa ãçã'sa's we'wek Jesusa':
—Iidx pkala' peltunãyni yã'jtx neeyũu jĩte',
Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx wẽsẽ'jna u'psa maaíi yu' na'wẽtx yajkx:
—¿Ma'wẽçxaga naa piçthẽ'ja' txã'wẽ we'we'? Dxus yuuçxáa pkaltxi peltunãyya' ãjawa'jsa', aça' jweeju yu' ¿kimçxá' peltunãyya' ãjãma'k? Aça' Dxusa's iiweeçx we'wena ũsa' sũjũ'tx.
Nawa Jesusa' txãawe'sx yaakxni's jiyuçxa na'jĩk:
—¿Kĩh yuutekwe txã'wẽ yaaki'?
¿Maa thẽymeesakx? Iidx pkala' peltunãyni yã'jtx neeyũu ¿jĩniá'? Meeçxa': Kiiteçxa iidx deeni's tu'sçxa me'j ¿jĩniá'?
Makwe thẽysatewa Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' naa kiwete pkaltxi peltunãyya' ãjãwa'jsa' naa pa'ga kaajiyu'jya'wath ãçxha'. Txajũ' ãçã'sa's na'jĩk:
Idxa'sthu we'we': Kiiteçxa iidx deeni's tu'sçxa yatna me'j jĩçpkaçxha',
ãçã'sa' dudtey kiitena'wa txajx deeni's tu'sçxa u'kh, nasa thegna ũsiyna.
Txajũ' jxukaysa wala kuh yajkxna Dxusna weçxana na'jĩ'tx:
—Bagaçx yuhwa na'wẽ yũuni yu's iiuymeetha'w jĩ'tx.
Txãa e'su' Jesusa' ki' u'kh ĩkh wala pukan. Aça' txajx tasxte nasa wala pkhaakhete', Dxus yuwe's kaapiya'kh.
Txãajũ ki' u'jçxa', Alfxeo nçxi'k Levxia'sku uy, gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhna u'pte. Sa':
—Adx yakh myuh jĩna pa'yaçpkaçxha', Levxia' kiitena' Jesus yakh u'kh.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh Levxi yatte ũ'ya' u'kate', gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsawe'sx vxite' pkalsawe'sxwa wala kuhsa pkhaakheçxa' Jesus yakh mesate ũ'ya' kaçxtxi.
Aça' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' fxariseowe'sxa' Jesusa' nasa txã'wẽsa ksxavxyte u'pte uyçxa', pẽjxtxi Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi:
—I'kwe'sxtxi kaapiya'jsa ¿ma'wẽçxaga gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsawe'sx vxite' pkalsawe'sx yakh ũ'wé'? jĩte',
txã'wẽ pẽyiçte Jesus wẽsẽ'jçxa' na'jĩk:
—Yu'çe'jsa's jxpeejxmeeta' aka ji'phmée wẽt ũssa', naasáa ãçã'sa yuuçxáa yu'çe'jsa's jxpeejxta'. Adxa' naa kiwete nasa ewsatx pakweya' kĩhmeeth, pkalsatx pakweya'çxáath kĩh jĩk.
Teeçx ente', Juan yakh u'jusa vxite' fxariseowe'sx yakh u'jusa txã'wẽ yũunaana ũste', nasa' paapẽjxtxi Jesusa's:
—¿Juan yakh u'jusa vxite' fxariseowe'sx yakh u'jusawe'sxa' yũuna'tx, aça' idx yakh u'jusawe'sx yu' ¿kĩh yuuçxata yũuna'çmée? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk kaaja'da'jna pas:
—¿Novxiowe'sx kaba ente pi'kxnisa' yũunaaya' ãjãma'tx? novxio txãawe'sx yakh nee ũsiite'. Kabani fxiesta pçumeyte', yũunaaya' ãjãmeetxna.
Nawa novxio' txãawe'sx tasxu txuteewa'j en pa'jana, txãjũ isa yũunaatxna.
Ropa ĩisx suteniite, tela u'sesa yakh ya'pã'khe'çme'. Txã'wẽme', tela u'sesa' jweeíiçxáak sude' ĩisxsa's.
Txã'wẽy beka u'se aahnisa's slun ĩisxsate ya'awu'çme'. Txã'wẽme', beka u'sesa' slun ĩisxsa's sude'k, aça' beka yakh slun yakh e'zíi vxitu'tx. Txãa pa'ga beka u'sesa's slun u'sesate awwa'ja' jĩk.
Teeçx sapatu jxkaase ente', Jesusa' skuutxh ehsuk skhẽw. Aça' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' skuutxhtxi çxuktedeçxa ũ'tx.
Aça' fxariseowe'sxa' na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—¿Uyu'gá' idx yakh u'jusawe'sxa' ma'wẽçxata mjĩi en meetewa txã'wẽ yũ'? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—I'kwe'sxa' Dxus librute iilẽeymeewá'kwe Davxida' ¿kĩhga yuu? txãa yakh pi'kxna u'jusawe'sx yakh teeçx ente' wẽeçxa'.
Sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j Abiatar ente' dxuus yatte u'kaçxa, kxtee pantxi ũ'k, sa' txãa yakh u'jusatxwa ũsu'sku. Txãa pana' naasáa sacerdotewe'sxçxáa ũ'wa'the jiiçxawa txã'wẽk yũu.
I'kwe'sxa' mjiyuwe: Jxkaase ena' nasatx selpiwa'jsa íiçxá', nawa suwwa'jsa yu' me'.
Txãa pa'ga Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' jxkaahwa'j ji'pha' makwe sapatu jxkaase entewa jĩk.
Vxite sapatu ente' Jesusa' ki'kin judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatte u'kak. Aça' kxte' teeçx piçthẽ'j teeçx kuse udxnisa kẽese'jya' ãjãsameek u'p yu'.
Aça' fxariseowe'sxa' Jesusa's peethegu'natx ũsu', sapatu jxkaase ente nuykatxhite' pãatxhĩ'khya' sũhçxa.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa piçthẽ'ja's pa'yaçxa nasaa pxãhte kxuuju'jçxa',
na'wẽk paapẽjx vxite kxtee ũssatx:
—Sapatu jxkaase entewa pu'çxte ¿ewmanx? meeçxa' ¿pu'çxwa'jmeemanx? Nasa's nwe'wete ¿ewmanx? meeçxa' nwe'wemeete ¿ewmanx? jĩte', txãawe'sxa' pasmée sxuuna'tx neeyũu.
Txã'wẽ fxariseowe'sxa' Jesus we'weni's jxpa'gaya' wa'lte', Jesusa' txãawe'sxtxi ũusçxa thegçxa na'jĩnak we'we txãa piçthẽ'j kuse udxnisa's:
—Kuse's mku'le'j jĩçpkaçxha', txajx kuse' ewuuk.
Txajũ' fxariseowe'sxa' Jesusa's ikhya' puutx we'weya' u'jtx Herodes ju'gsawe'sx yakh.
Naapkaçxha' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh u'kh ĩkh wala pukan. Aça' Galileaju nasa wala kuh u'jtx Jesus e'stey.

Txã'wẽ Jesus kĩjkĩhwa ew yũuni's nasa jiyuçxa', majũwe'sxwa Jesus tasxte pa'jtx thegya', Judeajuwe'sx, Jerusalenuwe'sx, Idumeajuwe'sx, Jordan yu'wala kutejuwe'sx, vxite' Tiro, Sidon çxhab peeku'juwe'sxwa.

Nasa txã'wẽ wala pa'the', maazkuẽe ãçã'satxwa nuykatxhik, aça' jxukaysa Jesusa's kpaajxa'dxçxa katxhi wẽesa txajx tasxteçxaçxáa utxaaçxa akaaçxpçxãhtx yuuna ũsu'. Txãa pa'gak Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi jxkaah teeçx barko ih ji'phukahn akaaçxhiçte kxtee khẽewa'j.

Nasa txã'wẽ wala pa'the', maazkuẽe ãçã'satxwa nuykatxhik, aça' jxukaysa Jesusa's kpaajxa'dxçxa katxhi wẽesa txajx tasxteçxaçxáa utxaaçxa akaaçxpçxãhtx yuuna ũsu'. Txãa pa'gak Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi jxkaah teeçx barko ih ji'phukahn akaaçxhiçte kxtee khẽewa'j.
Aça' eçx iiyamunisawe'sxa' Jesusa's uyçxa, txajx tasxte peejxũkwena na'jĩnatx we'we':
—Idxa' Dxus Nçxi'kgu jĩte',
Jesusa' txãawe'sxtxi' wala juuna' we'wek kimtewa ãate kaajiyu'khamen.
Txãa e'su' Jesusa' thã'the u'kh kuh nasatx pi'kxçxa.
Aça' kxtee kãhçxa', doce nasatx txhitxhku txãa yakh u'juwa'jsa, txãawe'sxtxi' Dxus yuwe's pta'sxya' kaajxa'.
Txã'wẽ txhitxhçxa', ãçã'satxwa nuykatxhina eçx luuku vxit-satxwa ũusu kutxi'jya' ãjãwa'ja's ũsku.
Txãa doce nasa' na'wẽ yaaseta': Simon, txã'sa' Pedro yasek ki'p.
Vxite' Zebedeo nçxi'kwe'sx pxakhsa Jakobo Juanwe'sxtxi yu'. Txãa pxakhtxi' Boanerges jĩnatx kxsuusu', nasa juuna'sa pa'ga.
Vxite' Andrés, Fxelipe, Bartolomé, Mateo, Tomás, Alfxeo nçxi'k Jakobo, Tadeo, vxite' Simón kananista nasa,
vxite' Judas Iskariote, Jesusa's açesawe'sx kusete dukhwa'jsa.
Jesusa' thã'ju sxawedçxa', teeçx yattek u'ka, txajx txhitxhnisawe'sx yakh.
Txã'wẽy nasa iiméh wala kuh pkhaakhete', ũ'wa'j en yuhwa ji'phumeeta'.
Txajũ' Jesus nwe'sxa' txã'wẽ yũuni's jiyuçxa', Jesusa' luuku yuune' sũhçxa pe'jna u'jya' pa'jtx.
Aça' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sxwa Jerusalenu pa'jçxa' na'jĩ'tx:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' eçxthẽ'ja's yuu ũuste ji'pha'. Txã'wẽçxaíik eçxtxi nasaa ũusuh kutxi'jya' ãjã' jĩte',
Jesusa' nasatx pa'yaçxa na'wẽk pta'sx jiyukahn:
—¿Ma'wẽçxa eçxthẽ'ja' eçxthẽ'ja's íiçxáa kutxi'jya' ãjã'kx?
Maa kiwetewa gobierno' peekx nasatx íiçxáa ahçeçxa puiiçxa', çxhãçxhameena.
Txã'wẽy teeçx yattewe'sxwa puutx yahçena puiiçxa', pçuutxna puutx uuna.
Aça' txã'wẽy eçxthẽ'jwa txajx jxkaahnisa eçx yakh íiçxáa puiiçxa', çxhãçxhamée puutx pçuutxna.
Kim yuhwa ewteçxah yu' nkuusa'jya' ãjãmeetxna, yat namu khuẽ'ya's tudmeeçxa yu'. Aça' txã'wẽ tudçxa yuuçxáa nkuusa'jya' ãjãtxna.
I'kwe'sxa' mpa'yajkxwe: Nasa naa kiwete kĩhwa ewmée yũuni kĩhwa Dxusna ewmée nuywe'wetewa txãatxi' jxuka ya'peltunaĩna.
Nawa Dxus Espiritu's açewe'wete', bagaçxte yuhwa peltunãynimée yuuna, uu kiwen kaahwa'jçxáa nvxiituna jĩk.
Nasa we'weçxa': Eçxthẽ'ja's ũuste ji'pha' jĩpa'gak txã'wẽ pta'sx Jesusa'.
Naapkaçxha' pa'jtx Jesus njĩ'j vxite' nyakhwe'sx jxuka. Sa' ekate kũhçxa, Jesusa's pa'yakaahtx.
Aça' Jesus yakh dxiite u'psa' pta'sxtxi na'jĩna:
—Iidx mama iidx nyakhwe'sx pa'jçxa ekate ũsta', sa' idxa'stxi yuukaja' jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—¿Kimtxikwe adx mama adx nyakhwe'sx jĩna we'wé'?
Sa' txã'wẽ pta'sxsatx thegçxa' na'jĩk:
—Adx mama adx nyakhwe'sxa' naata'.
Dxus jxkaahni's nwẽese'jna kxtey yuusáa yuuçxáa, adx nyakh, adx npe'sx, adx mama na'wẽsata' jĩk.
Jesusa' ki'kin ĩkh wala pukate kaapiya'jya' kasehte', nasa iiméh wala kuh pkhaakheçxa utaaçte', Jesusa' barkote khẽeçxak pta'sx. Aça' nasa yu' ĩkh wala pukate neeyũutx wẽsẽ'jna.
Txajũ' kĩjkĩhwa pta'sxku ejemplo yakh kaaja'da'jna. Sa' na'wẽk kaapiya'j:
—Mwẽesẽ'jwe: Skuutxh uuhsa' ujxa' kasejk.
Aça' mteeíi yu' dxi'jsu ãasu neeyũute', vxiçxakwe ũ'tx.
Vxite ahsu' kwet kajkwesutx neeyũu kiwe peççxáa ji'phsu. Sa' kiwe jwetmée ya'fxihbçxa' dudtxi buçxa.
Nawa sek açxaate' jxuka uhdxku, weçe dxiimeene' ji'phu' naa pa'ga.
Vxite ahsu' çhũçh ksxavxysutx ũsxi, aça' çhũçh walaaçxa jxuka aphte', çutmeeta'.
Vxite ahsu' kiwe ewsatek ũsxi, sa' buçxaçxa wala ew çuttxi. Maa tasxíi yu' treinta, vxite' sesenta, vxite' cien nxinxtxi çut.
Na'wẽ pta'sxthu txã'sa' jiyuwa'jsa ũsçxa', jiyune'kwe jĩk.
Txajũ' nasa kuhsa yu' u'the, Jesusçxáak neeyũu, doce txhitxhnisawe'sx vxite nasa yakh. Aça' txãawe'sxa' paapẽjxtxi txãa ejemplo's ma'jĩnitewa jiyuya'.
Aça' Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Dxus jxkaahni ensu ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa kim yuhwa jiyunimeesa's i'kwe'sx yuutxi's kaajiyu'jwa'ja'. Nawa jiyuwa'jmeesatxi's ejemplo yakhçxáa pta'sxwa'ja',
kxah uyçxawa, uysamée na'wẽçxáa neeyũutxna, sa' wẽsẽ'jçxawa, wẽsẽ'jsamée na'wẽçxáa neeyũuçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedmeetxna, aça' txãawe'sxtxi' Dxusa' peltunaĩmeena.
Txajũ' na'wẽk ãate kaajiyu'j:
—I'kwe'sxa' naa ejemplo's jiyu'çmeewá'kwe. Txã'wẽçxa' ¿ma'wẽ vxite ejemplotxwa jiyuki'kwe?
Skuutxh uuhsa' Dxus yuwe's pta'sxsa na'wẽsa'.
Maa nasaíi yu' skuutxh fxiw dxi'jsu ũsxisáa na'wẽsata': Dxus yuwe's wẽsẽ'jçxa ũuste jxpa'gatewa, eçxthẽ'j pa'jçxa txãa yuwe's ũusu kutxi'jina.
Vxite nasa' skuutxh fxiw kwet kajkwesu ũsxisáa na'wẽsata': Dxus yuwe's ãçxhíi yu' weçxanatx jxpa'ga'.
Nawa ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa jxpa'gameeçxa', Dxus yuwe's ahçeçxa pkxuuwa'j en pa'theçxáa txaçxmeyna wete'tx.
