Aça' vxite nasa' skuutxh fxiw çhũçh ksxavxysu ũsxisáa na'wẽsata': txãawe'sxa' Dxus yuwe's wẽsẽ'thewa,
naa kiwete kĩjkĩhwa ji'phu wẽenisaçxáa ũuste jxuka khẽeçxa Dxus yuwe yu'sa' kaapeçxkana'juna.
Nawa maa nasaíi yu' skuutxh fxiw kiwe ewsate ũsxiçxa ma'wẽta maaíi yu' treinta, vxite' sesenta vxite' cien nxinx pehna, txã'wẽ Dxus yuwe ũuste penawa'jsa'.
Txajũ' vxite ejemplo na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Lampara's pki'taçxa ¿kaja dxiite meeçxa' atũu dxiite sũthnisatxná'? Txã'wẽ yũumée, lampara's ãatek ya'txaja', eena' kweethkahn.
Makwe sũttewa, uynimée yu' kĩh yuhwa neeyũumeena. Sa' txã'wẽy makwe ũusteçxáa yaakxnisa'swa jiyunimée yu' neeyũumeena.
Jiyuwa'jsa ũsçxa', jxpa'yakx mwẽesẽ'jwe jĩçxa',
na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Adx kaapiya'jni's jxpa'yakx mwẽesẽ'jwe. I'kwe'sx wa'lmée wẽsẽ'the', Dxusa' jxthaakwe kaajiyu'juna.
Dxus yuwe's jiyuwa'jsa's kaajiyu'jni yuuna. Nawa Dxus yuwe's jiyuwa'jmeesa's kaajiyu'jnimée yuuna jĩk.
Jesusa' vxite ejemplo pta'sxku:
—Dxus naa kiwete jxkaajxa' pa'jnisa' na'wẽsa': Teeçx piçthẽ'j mjĩisa' fxiwa's kiwete uhçxaçxáa
u'jwe'k sa' txaçxku thegya' pa'jaçmée. Aça' uuhnisa' buçxaçxa wala'k, nawa uuhsa yu' jiimeek yu' ma'wẽ buçxana walaaçtewa.
Fxiwa' kiwete ujxã'the', peekxçxáa buçxa'k kĩhwa yuumeetewa, nyafxte' tasx khuẽ'y wala'k, txã'wẽ yuuçxak spiiga kaseje', txãa e'su'k nxinx kaseje',
aça' thẽ'j ente', pkhakhya' kaseje'tx.
Vxite ejemplok pta'sx Jesusa':
—Dxus naa kiwete jxkaajxa' takhnisa's ¿kĩh yakh kaaja'da'ja'kxtha'w aç jiyuki'kwe?
Mostasa fxiw na'wẽsa' aça' txãa yakh kaaja'da'ja'nja'w.
Txãa fxiwa' maa maa fxiwtewa thaakwe musekuẽta',
nawa kiwete ujxã'the', maa ẽjxã tasxtewa jxthaakwek waláa, seena' wala çxhã'px kasehna. Aça' vxiçxakwe yuhwa txãa ẽjxã ksxavxysu yaat-ya' ãjã'tx. Naa kiwete Dxus jxkaajxa' takhnisa' txã'wẽysa'.
Jesusa' Dxus yuwe's txã'wẽk pta'sxi' wala kuh ejemplo kutxi'jna, jiyuwa'jsa' jiyuya' ãjãkahn.
Ejemplo ji'phmée yu' kaapiya'ja'çme'. Nawa txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yuutxi's kĩh ejemplo'swa jxuka khiyu'jçxak nvxiitu'.
Txãa entey çxhi'dxna kĩjaçte', Jesusa' na'jĩk txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi':
—U'jwega ĩkh wala kuten jĩte',
nasatx nvxihtna' Jesusa's pe'jna u'jtx txãawe'sx khẽeçxa u'pni barkote. Aça' vxite barkowa ihtey u'jtx.
Ĩkh wala pxãjũy u'jweçpkaçxha', wejxaa wala kiiteçxa barko's ĩkh dxiikhẽ akhya'wak yu', yu'a's barkote yuutaçxa.
Naapkaçxha' Jesusa' deenik yu', barko e'ste kaçxçxa dxikthe's peedxikiga khikhçxa. Aça' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' Jesusa's fxĩtxtxi na'jĩna:
—Ĩkh dxiikhẽ khẽjeçtha'w aça' ¿kwe'sxtxi' peeygãja'çmeega'? jĩte',
Jesusa' kiiteçxa, wejxa's we'wek yujukahn petx ĩkh yã'jçxa. Naapkaçxha' wejxa yujute', ĩkhwa yujuk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi' na'jĩk: ¿Kĩh yuuçxakwe Dxus yu's yajkxmée txakwe wala ũukhú'? jĩk.
Txã'wẽ wejxa yuhwa nwẽese'the', txãawe'sxa' wala kuh yajkxna neeyũutx na'jĩna:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿kim yujkx, açki'tx wejxa ĩkh txã'wẽsa yuhwa nwẽesẽ'jé'? jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' ĩkh wala kute Gadara kiwete pa'jtx.
Aça' Jesus barkoju kasejeçpkaçxha', teeçx piçthẽ'j eçx iiyamunisa uusáa pedani kafxu kasehçxa Jesus tasxte utxaak.
Txãa piçthẽ'ja' uusáa pedani kafxsuk u'psa yu', aça' txã'sa' kim yuhwa çam kadenaju tudçxa jxpe'jya' ãjã'çmeeta'.
Çxida petx kuse yã'jçxa maazkuẽe uswa tudtewa, nuywejiméek çxuktedeçxa pũsxi'. Aça' kim yuhwa ãjã'çmeeta' tudçxa jxpe'jya' yu'.
En ma'k yuu kus ma'k yuu nawa vxiçsu vxite' uusáa pedani kafxsu weynak pekũjũ' kwet-su kpã'yuuna.
Nawa Jesusa's jxu'the uyçxa', wuwuuna u'jçxa txajx tasxte peejxũkwek
sus we'wena:
—¿Adxa's kĩh yũuya'waga? Jesus, Dxus ĩtxĩsa Nçxi'k. Dxus pa'ga adxa's peeygãhçxa txakwe seena' wala nxuste yu' kaahnu jĩk.
Jesusa' eçx luuku vxit-sa's we'weçxa': Naa piçthẽ'j ũusu mkaaseh jĩpa'gak txã'jĩ'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' pẽjxku:
—¿Kĩh yaasega? jĩte', pta'sxku:
—Legion yaaseth, wala kuhtha'w naa pa'ga jĩk.
Sa' txãa eçx luuku vxit-sa' wala pxthaa we'wek txãa kiwejũ kutxi'khamen.
Txajũ' kxsũ vxiç ja'dasũ wala kuçxi ũsu'tx aphna.
Aça' eçx luuku vxit-sa' na'jĩnatx pxthaa we'we:
—Kuçxi ũuste khẽeya' u'khan kwe'sxtxi mkaah jĩte',
Jesusa' txãa eçx luuku vxit-satx kuçxi ũuste u'kaya' kaakh.
Txajũ' txãa eçx luuku vxit-sa kuçxi ũuste khẽete', kuçxi' luuku yuuçxa penxakhẽ peluçxa yu'teçxaçxáa khẽeçxa jxuka uutx. Txãa kuçxi' dos mil ãhtx yu';
Txã'wẽ yũute', kuçxi thegsa ũukhçxa wala dud pta'sxya' u'jtx çxhabsu vxite' çxhab ekaju jxuka. Aça' nasa' wala pa'jtx thegya', kĩh yũutewa uyya'.
Sa' Jesus ũsnite pa'jçxa uytxi txãa piçthẽ'j eçx luuku vxitnisa' wẽt yã'j ropa ji'ph u'pte. Txã'wẽ uyçxa wala ũukhtxi.
Txajũ' ma'wẽ yũuçxa eçx luuku vxitnisa katxhini vxite' kĩh yũuçxa kuçxi uuni'swa uysaawe'sxa' jxuka pta'sxtxi nasa thegya' pa'jsatxi's.
Txajũ' nasa' Jesusa's ũusçxa we'wetx txãawe'sx kiwejũ u'khan.
Aça' Jesusa' ki' sxawedxa' barkote khẽjeçpkaçxha', eçx luuku vxitnijũ katxhisa' wala pxthaa we'wek pe'jçxa u'khan.
Nawa Jesusa' pe'jna u'jmée na'wẽk jxkaah:
—Iidx yatna me'j, sa' iidx nwe'sxtxi pta'sxine'ga idxa's Dxus peeygãhçxa ma'wẽ ew yũuni'swa.
Txajũ' txãa piçthẽ'ja' u'jçxa, Dekapolis çxhabsu jxuka pta'sxku Jesus ma'wẽ yũuçxa nuykatxhini'swa. Aça' nasa' wala kuh yaaki'tx jxukaysa.
Txajũ' Jesusa' ĩkh wala kutejũ barkote khẽeçxa pesahçxa kxtee ũste', nasa wala pa'jtx txajx ũsnite.
Aça' judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenite npiiçthẽ'jsa Jairo yaasesa' Jesus tasxte peejxũkweçxa
na'wẽk pxthaa we'we:
—Adx niisakuẽ' uuçyã'ja', aça' uukahmén myuh jxa'dxya' iidx kuseju jĩte',
txãa yakh u'kh Jesusa'. Aça' nasa iiméh wala pehnaçxa, dxi'the zuuna'çxáatx u'jweç yu'.
Aça' txãa nasa ksxavxyte teeçx u'y kakwe yu' vxyaate doce anxuyã'j ãçã'na u'jusak kaseh.
Sa' txãa ãçã'sa' wala pxthaa yuusa yu'k yu'çe'jsatx paapẽjxna. Sa' makwe yu'çe weyna txajx ji'phuni jxuka pçuutewa, kĩh yuhwa yu'çe yuumée jweeíiçxáak jxthaakwena u'jweç yu'.
Txajũ' txãa u'ya' Jesus kĩh yũusaatewa jiyuçxa' paaçte e'su kũhçxa, kpaajxa'dxku txajx atxhkhẽ.
Txã'wẽ Jesus atxhkhẽ kpaajxa'dxçxaçxáa katxhi'nja sũhçxak txã'wẽ yũu.
Sa' txã'wẽ jxa'dxiçpkaçxha', kakwe yu' vxyaame', aça' txãa dudtey txajx kakwete wẽt yã'kh yajkx.
Txajũ' Jesusa' teeçx ãçã'sa txajx atxhkhẽ jxa'dxçxa katxhini's jiyuk, sa' nasaa ksxavxyte u'jweçíi yu'thegçxa', na'jĩk:
—¿Kimga adx atxhkhẽ jxa'dx? jĩte',
Pedrowe'sxa' na'wẽtx pas:
—Nasaa ksxavxyte zuuna'çxáa u'jweçgu sa' ¿ma'wẽga kimga jxa'dx jĩna we'wé'? jĩtewa,
Jesusa' nasaa ksxavxysu thegu'gku kim jxa'dxtewa uyya'.
Txajũ' txãa u'ya' txã'wẽ naa dudte ew katxhini's ĩsxiimée pta'sxna ũukhna Jesus tasxte yayan kũhçxa peejxũkwek.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—I'kwe' ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxane'kwe katxhiya' sũhçxa adx tasxte utxáa, txãa pa'ga katxhini i'kwe neeyũu. Ãçxha' ãçã'mée wẽt me'jwe weçxana jĩk.
Jesusa' txã'wẽ we'wena nee ũsiyna, Jairo yatu yuusa kũhçxa' Jairo's pta'sxtxi:
—Iidx niisakuẽ' uuyã'kh, aça' kuçx pa'pçxunu kaapiya'jsa's pe'jna u'jya' jĩte',
Jesusa' wẽsẽ'jçxa, Jairo's kvxiisxa'kh na'jĩna:
—Nxusnu. Adx ewuwa'ja'sçxáa myajkx jĩçxa',
Jesusa' vxite yuutxi's pe'jmée, pxakhsa Jakobo Juan vxite' Pedro txãawe'sxçxáatxku pe'jçxa u'j.
Sa' Jairo yatte pa'jçxa', uyku nasa wala ũ'nena ũste.
Sa' dxiite u'kaçxa we'wek:
—¿Kĩjxa'kwe txakwe wala ũ'né'? Luuçxa' uunime', Ĩ'neeçxáa deeni' jĩte',
nasa' Jesusa's npeevxysxijkatx. Aça' Jesusa' nasatx jxuka eka kutxi'jçxa, txãa luuçx neywe'sx vxite' txãa yakh yuusa tekhsa txãawe'sx yakh uusáa ũsnite utxaaçxa,
kuseju pu'kisçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Talita kumi—txã' na'jĩni': Ijçxa'sthu we'we' mkiiteçx jĩni'.
Txã'jĩçpkaçxha' txãa uusá' kiiteçxa u'juya' ãjãk. Aça' Jesus txã'wẽ uusá's ki' ĩtxĩ vxitte uyçxa', wala kuh yajkxtxi.
Txajũ' Jesusa' wala neewe'wek maa yuhtxwa pta'sxkahmén, sa' txãa luuçxa's puuçkaakh. Txãa luuçxa' doce anxu ji'phsak yu'.
Jesusa' txãa çxhabu kasehçxa', txajx u'pni çxhab Nasaretnak sxawedna u'j txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh.
Sa' sapatu jxkaase ente' judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenitek kaapiya'jna ũsu', aça' nasa jxukaysa wẽsẽ'jçxa', kuh yajkxna na'jĩtx:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿mteega txakwe wala kĩjxa'wa piya? ¿Kim kaapiya'theki'k txakwe wala kĩjkĩh yũuya'wa ãjã'?

Naaíi kwe'sx jiyunisa karpintero' Maria nçxi'k. Sa' txajx nyakhtxiwa jiitha'w, Jakobo, Jose, Judas, Simon txãawe'sxta'. Aça' txajx npe'sxwe'sxwa naa çxhabtey u'pta'. Txã'wẽ kwe'sx jiyunisa' jĩçxatx Jesus kaapiya'jni's nwẽesẽ'jya' wa'l.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we txãa nasatx:
—Mteewe'sxwa Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa yu'sa' wa'lmeetx jxpa'ga'. Nawa peekx kiwetewe'sx yu' jxpa'ga'çmeeta' vxite' peekx nwe'sx, peekx yattewe'sx.
Txã'jĩçxa' kxteea' mazkuẽçxáa nuykatxhiçxaçxáa jwee yu' kĩhwa yũume'.
Sa' Jesusa' nxusnak neeyũu, txã'wẽ txajx kiwetewe'sx nwẽesẽ'jmeete.
Txajũ' Jesusa' vxite çxhabsuk pta'sxya' kaseh.
Sa' txãa yakh u'jusa docesatx pa'yaçxa', eçx luuku vxit-satx nasa ũusu kutxi'jya' ãjãwa'ja's ũsçxa', e'z e'zku kaah.
Nawa khãabuçxá's atçxa kĩh yuhwa tu'sméek u'khaah, ya'ja, vxyu, kaame txã'wẽsatx.
Sa' pelgatxiçxáa paatçxa teeçx kmiisa yakhçxáak u'khaah.
Sa' na'wẽ yũuwa'ja'sku pta'sx: Maa yatte paadejxa' pa'jyã'jçxa', kxteeçxáa paadehna ũsune'kwe txajũ ki' kasehna u'phkaçx.

Sa' mteeíi yu' i'kwe'sx pta'sxni's wẽsẽ'j wẽemeeçxa yat pki'jmeete', txãajũ kasejene'kwe i'kwe'sx çxidate kiwe tuhda's sakweekweçxa, kxah yuuwesa yuutxna. Isath we'we': Dxus kastigãywa'j en ãhte', txãawe'sxa' Sodoma Gomoçxa çxhabtewe'sxte jxthaakwe kastigo's knayuutxna txã'wẽ i'kwe'sxtxi jxpa'gaya' wa'lpa'ga.
Txã'wẽ Jesus jxkaahte', txãawe'sxa' kasehtx Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna, pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte misxawedwe jĩna.
Sa' eçx luuku vxit-satxwa nasa ũusu kutxi'jna maazkuẽe ãçã'satxwa aceite dxikthekhẽ awna nuykatxhitx.
Txã'wẽ Jesus kĩjkĩhwa ew yũuni's ne'jwe'sx Herodes jiyuçxa':
—Juan Bautistane' uuçxawa ki' ĩtxĩ yuu, txãasane' kĩjkĩh yũuya'wa ãjã' jĩte',
vxite nasa we'weçxa':
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Eliasna jĩ'tx. Naapkaçxha' vxite we'weçxa':
—Txãniiteywa ma'wẽta Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa kaseje', txã'wẽysana jĩnatx ũsu'.
Nasa txã'wẽ we'wete', Herodeswa we'weçxa':
—Juan Bautista txhikha's na'wẽ kaaspẽ'the'th txãane' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuçxa kiite jĩk.

Herodesa' Juana's na'wẽ yuuçxaga kiikhe'j: Herodesa' Juana's kadenaju tudçxa karcelte ktxaaja'khu'ga, Herodias ahçeçxa ewmée yuwe ũspa'ga. Txãa Herodiasa' Fxelipe nyuuk yu', aça' Fxelipe yu' Herodes nyakhíiçxáak yu'. Nawa Herodesa' Fxelipe nyu Herodiasa's kusa'jçxa txajx nyu na'wẽk jxpe'j.
Txãa pa'ga ku'ga Juana' Herodesa's na'jĩna yu'kxpeh: Iidx yakhthẽ'j nyu's kusa'jçxa' iidx nyu na'wẽ jxpe'jni' ewme' jĩni's
Herodias jiyuçxa', Juana's ahçeçxa ikh wẽeçxawa ãjã'çmeeku'ga.

Juana's Herodias ikhya' ãjãkahmén, Herodesa' karcelteku'ga ktxaaja'j nwe'wena. Juana' Dxus dxi'pte kĩhte yuhwa jxpubamée wala ew fxi'zesatewa Herodesa' jiine' yu', txãasane' ũukhçxa nwe'we, sa' Juan pta'sxni's Herodesa' kxtey yuuçmeeçxawa wa'lmeeku'ga weçxana wẽsẽ'je'.

Herodesa' txajx upxni en anxu ãa iisak fxiesta vxitu'. Txãasak teeçx ente' fxiesta ki'p txajx jxkaahni npiiçthẽ'jsa vxite' Galileate jxtuhthesatx pi'kxçxa. Txãa fxiestatene' Herodiasa' Juana's ewmée yũuwa'ja's uy.
Txajũ' Herodias niisa' txãa fxiestate pa'jçxa' wala zhiçxkwe ku'jne' pi'kxnasa dxi'pte. Aça' ne'jwe'sx Herodes uyçxa' na'jĩku'ga txãa kna'sa's:
—Ijçxa kĩh pẽjxtewa, adxa' ũsu'nja.
Dxus uyte, içxa pẽyni's kĩhnawa ũsuçxá'nja, meeçxa' adx jxkaahna ũsni kiwe's pẽjxyuhtewa pxãhn txuhdeçxa ũsu'nja jĩte',
txãa kna'sa' kasehna u'jçxa, txajx njĩ'ja'sku'ga paapẽjx:
—¿Kĩh pẽyi'ki'th? jĩna. Aça' njĩ'j pasçxa':
—Juan Bautista dxikthea's mpẽyçxi jĩnaku'ga jxkaah.
Txajũ' txãa kna'sa' Herodes tasxte ki' kũhçxa':
—Ãçxhíi Juan Bautista dxikthea's plaatute akhçxa mah jĩte',
ne'jwe'sx Herodesa': Kĩh pẽjxtewa ũsu'nja jĩna nasaa dxi'pte jurãyyã'jçxa', ĩsxiiya' ãjãmeeku'ga.
Txajũ' Herodesa' dudtey teeçx soldau's kaakhu'ga Juan dxikthea's nikxya'.
Aça' txãa soldau' karcelna u'jçxa', Juan txhikha's spẽ'thçxa, plaatute akhçxa jxũna kũjku'ga txãa kna'sa's ũsya'. Aça' txãa yu' jxpa'gaçxa', txajx njĩ'ja'sku'ga dukh.
Txã'wẽ yũute', Juan yakh u'jusawe'sx jiyuçxa', txãa uuni kakwe's kiisçxa pedaaku'ta. Txã'wẽ yũuni'sne' Herodesa' yajkx.
Txã'wẽ e'z e'z jxkaahnisawe'sxa' Jesus tasxte ki' sxawedna pa'jçxa', txãawe'sx ma'wẽ kaapiya'jna kĩhçxa yũuçxawa Jesusa's jxuka pta'sxtxi.
Txã'wẽ nasa txakwe wala pa'jna ũste', txãawe'sxa' ũ'wa'j en yuhwa uyméetx fxi'zena ũsu'. Txãa pa'gak Jesus we'weçxa':
—Mejkawe, dudte jxkaaseya' nasaa yatmeesu jĩ'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxçxáatx pe'jçxa, barkote khẽeçxa u'kh, nasaa yatmeesu pa'jçxa jxkaaseya'.
Txã'wẽ Jesus u'jweçte nasa wala uyçxa', mtee pa'jya' u'jweçtewa jiyutx. Txãasatx txãawe'sx khuẽ'y yaçte pa'j Jesus pa'jwa'the maa çxhabuwe'sxwa wuwuuçxáa u'jçxa.
Aça' Jesus barkoju kasejeççxa', uyku nasa wala kuh pkhaakhena ũste. Sa' txãawe'sxtxi's peeygãjk txã'wẽ piisxáa namu ji'phmeesa na'wẽ txãawe'sxçxáa ũste. Txajũ' Dxus yuwe's wala kaapiya'kh.
Kxtee kaapiya'jna ũsiyna kusuçte', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' txajx tasxte utxaaçxa na'wẽtx we'we:
—Aysu nasaa yatmeete ũsiyna, kusuça'.
Aça' nasatxi' mkaah, kxah yat-su meeçxawa çxhabkuẽ utxasu ũsta' kxsũ pa'jçxa ũ'wa'j weyuutxna. Txã'wẽme' ayte' kĩhwa ji'phmeeta' jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—I'kwe'sx mpuuçwe jĩnak jxkaah.
Aça' txãawe'sxa' na'wẽtx pas:
—Kwe'sxa' doscientos peso pan weyya' u'jçxa puuçuwá'nja'w jĩte',
Jesusa' pẽjxku:
—¿Maz pan ji'phkwe? Me'jwe thegya' jĩna.
Aça' pan uyçxa', pta'sxtxi:
—Tahç pan, e'z wedxçxáatha'w uy jĩna.
Txajũ' Jesusa' nasatxi' txaksũ kaçxkaakh fxiifxii txuteeçxa.
Aça' cien ãh vxite' cinkwenta kxaztxi fxiifxii txuteeçxa kaçx.

Naapkaçxha' Jesusa' tahç pan e'z wedxtxi uweçxa, cielute pagayçxa Dxusa's weçxana'wa pantxi pe'ltedeçxa txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi' ũsku, nasatx jxuka ũsu'skahn. Sa' wedxtxiwa txã'wẽyku ũsu's jxukaysatx.
Txã'wẽ yũute', jxukaysa ũ'çxa txiktxi neeyũu.
Txajũ' txãa pan vxite' wedx pe'ltedenisa neeyũute' pkhakhçxa', doce kanastate utatx pkhakh.
Aça' nasa yu' piçthẽ'jçxáatx isani cinko mil ãhtx yu'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi barkote kaateka'jçxa yaçte kaakh Beçaidan. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa' txãa yu' kxtee neeyũuk nasa txuteena u'jsatx weçxana.
Sa' nasa jxuka txuteena u'jweçpkaçxha', Dxus yakh puutx we'weya' u'kh thã'the.
Jxuka çxhi'dxna jxã'jaçte', barko' ĩkh pxãjũy u'jweçku yu', Nawa Jesus yu', ĩkh kutetee ũsíiçxáak yu'.
Sa' khikhyna sẽjeçte', Jesusa' uyku Beçaidan u'jsawe'sxtxi's wejxa yupte, barko's kaajxa' çxhãçxhamée ĩkhsu u'jute.
Txajũ', Jesusa' txãawe'sxtxi kpajkxya' ĩkhsu u'jçxa, txãawe'sx pukasu utxa sẽhçxa, barko's phyahçna skhẽuuçku yu'.
Aça' barkote u'jsawe'sxa' txã'wẽ ĩkhsu u'jweçte uyçxa', eçxa'stha'w uy sũhçxa sustxi pebée.
Txã'sa' jxukaysatx uyçxa ũukh. Naapkaçxha' Jesusa' we'wek:
—Ũukhnuwe. Adxthu jĩna.
Txajũ' Jesusa' barkote khẽjeçpkaçxha', wejxa' yujuk. Aça' txãawe'sxa' iiméh wala ũukh yajkxna kuh we'wenatx neeyũu.
Txã'wẽ Dxus Nçxi'kçxa kĩjxa'wa ãjãwa'jsaçxak kuhmée pan yakh nasa txaazkuẽesatx sã'jĩ' sũhwa'j yu'sa' ji'phmeene'ta yu', txãasatx txakwe wala kuh yajkxna neeyũu.
Txajũ' Genesaret kiwete pesahçxa', barko's ĩkh pukatetx tudçxa txah.
Aça' barkoju sa'jaçpkaçxha', txãa kiwesuwe'sx nasa' jiyutx Jesus pa'jni's.
Sa' txãa kiwesu ãçã'satx jxuka pkhakhçxa yakhna pa'jtx Jesus mtee ũstewa.

Txajũ' Jesusa' çxhabna ma'k u'j, meeçxa' yat-su ma'k pa'jya' u'j, meeçxa' dxi'the ma'k u'jweç yuu nawa txajx skhẽwwa'jsutx ãçã'satx khikhe'. Txã'wẽ yũuçxatx skhẽuuçte' wala pxthaa we'we', txajx atxh vxiçteçxáawa ãçã'satx khya'dxi'khan. Aça' maawa txajx atxh vxiçteçxáawa jxa'dxsa', jxuka katxhiçxatx neeyũ'.
Txajũ' fxariseowe'sx vxite' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sxwa Jerusalenu pa'jçxa Jesus tasxte utxaatx thegya'.
Aça' Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' kusekhẽ' yu' kaahmée ũ'weçte uyçxa', açewe'wetx fxariseowe'sxa'.
(Yaçgawe'sx ma'wẽ jxkaathe' Judiuwe'sxa' jxukaysa na'wẽ kuh jwed yũuwa'ja'stxi nwẽesẽ'jẽ' ewmeesa pẽethekahmén jĩçxa:
Merkaujũ pa'jçxa', kusekhẽ yu' kaahwa'ja' jĩ'tx. Sa' waso, mitxh, kĩhwa iijxũni çam yuutxi' jxuka kajkwekhẽ yu' kaahçxa iijxũwa'ja' jĩnatx kaapiya'ja'.)
Txãasatx fxariseowe'sx vxite' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sxa' na'jĩna Jesusa's pẽjx:
—Idx yakh u'jusawe'sxa' ¿kĩh yũuçxata yaçgawe'sx kaapiya'jnitxi' kxtey yu'çmée, kusekhẽ yu' kaahmée ũ'wé'? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—I'kwe'sxa' yuwejuçxáa ew we'weçxa', ũuste yu' ewméeçxáa yaakxsai'kwe aça' Isaiasa' isa yuh Dxus we'weni's na'jĩna fxi'jne':
Naa nasa' yuweju yu' adxa's yaaki'tha'w jĩçxawa,
Ũusuh yu' adxa's yaaki'çmeeta'.
Naa kiwete nasaa kaapiya'jniçxá's kxtey yuuna ũsçxa,
Txã'wẽ Dxus jxkaahni'stha'w kxtey yu' jĩte', kxul yuhna jĩna Dxus we'weni'sku fxi'j Isaiasa'.
I'kwe'sxa' Dxus jxkaahni yu'sa' nvxihtçxa, naa kiwega nasaa kaapiya'jniçxá's i'kwe nwẽesẽ'jna wala ew ki'su' na'wẽ yũuna: waso, mitxh, kĩjkĩhtxwa txã'wẽ i'kwe ki'su' yu' kaahna.
Na'jĩ'th na': i'kwe'sxa' naa kiwega nasaa kaapiya'jniçxá's nwẽesẽ'jna ki'sçxa', Dxus jxkaahni yu'sa' nvxihti'kwe.
I'kwe'sx na'wẽ yũuni's myajkxwe wakx: Moisesa' na'jĩnak fxi'j: Iidx tata iidx mama txãawe'sxtxi' peeygãhna pu'çxwa'ja' jĩ'k. Aça' txã'wẽ yũumée, neywe'sxtxi açewe'wesa' uu ena's ji'phuna jĩ'k.

I'kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxa' na'wẽtx kaapiya'ja': Maa nasawa neywe'sxtxi peeygãhna pu'çxmée, adx ji'phuni i'kwe'sxtxi pu'çxwa'ja's Dxusna dukhe'nja jĩna we'weçxaçxáa, neywe'sxtxi' pu'çxmeetewa ewa' jĩ'tx. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' txã'wẽ yaçgawe'sx kaapiya'jniçxá's kxtey nwẽese'jçxa', Dxus jxkaahni yu'sa' kxtey yu'çmeei'kwe, naasáa Dxus jxkaahnimeeçxáatx i'kwe kĩjkĩhnawa jxuka kxtey yu'.

I'kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxa' na'wẽtx kaapiya'ja': Maa nasawa neywe'sxtxi peeygãhna pu'çxmée, adx ji'phuni i'kwe'sxtxi pu'çxwa'ja's Dxusna dukhe'nja jĩna we'weçxaçxáa, neywe'sxtxi' pu'çxmeetewa ewa' jĩ'tx. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' txã'wẽ yaçgawe'sx kaapiya'jniçxá's kxtey nwẽese'jçxa', Dxus jxkaahni yu'sa' kxtey yu'çmeei'kwe, naasáa Dxus jxkaahnimeeçxáatx i'kwe kĩjkĩhnawa jxuka kxtey yu'.

I'kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxa' na'wẽtx kaapiya'ja': Maa nasawa neywe'sxtxi peeygãhna pu'çxmée, adx ji'phuni i'kwe'sxtxi pu'çxwa'ja's Dxusna dukhe'nja jĩna we'weçxaçxáa, neywe'sxtxi' pu'çxmeetewa ewa' jĩ'tx. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' txã'wẽ yaçgawe'sx kaapiya'jniçxá's kxtey nwẽese'jçxa', Dxus jxkaahni yu'sa' kxtey yu'çmeei'kwe, naasáa Dxus jxkaahnimeeçxáatx i'kwe kĩjkĩhnawa jxuka kxtey yu'.
Jesusa' ki'kin nasatx we'weçxa' na'jĩk:
—Mwẽesẽ'jwe jxukaysa, ew jiyuya':
Kĩh ũ'wa tutxhteçxáa khẽesa yu', nasatx ewmeesa vxitu'çme'. Naasáa ũusuh ewmée yaakxnisa yuuçxáak nasatx ewmeesa vxitu'.
Aça' maawa jiyuwa'jsa ũsçxa', jiyune'kwe jĩçxak nvxiht.
Txajũ' Jesusa' nasatx txuteeçxa' yattek u'ka. Aça' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' jiyumeeçxa' pẽjxtxi txã'wẽ pta'sxni's.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'wena pta'sx:
—¿I'kwe'sxwa jiyu'çmeewá'kwe? Kĩh ũ'wa tutxhteçxáa khẽeçxa', nasatx ewméesa yu' vxitmeena sũju'çmeewá'kwe.
Txãa pa'gatey kĩh ũ'wa ũuste yu' u'kamée tutxhteçxáa khẽeçxa', txajũ ki' kaseje'k jĩk.
Jesusa' txã'wẽ we'weçxa': ũ'nisa yu' kĩhwa jxuka ewsaçxaçxáata' jĩçxak txã'jĩ'.
Nawa ũusuh ewmée yaakxnisa yuuçxáak nasa's ewmeesa vxitu'.
Txãa pa'gatey, kazx yaakxni, ptamsaçxawa vxite yakh kazx yuuna fxi'zeni, kazx yuuni, nasa ikhni,
pesweeni, vxite jĩ's kusa'jçxa ji'phu wẽeni, pthãaweni, ĩsxĩini, vxitetx ahçena fxi'zeni, wẽesxuni, kazx we'wena fxi'zeni, iiwejçx iiwejçx yajkxna fxi'zeni, kĩhtewa ewmeeçxáa yũuna fxi'zeni
txã'wẽ ewmée yaakxnisa' ũustewe'sxta'. Txãasatx txã'wẽ kaaũusuthe'jçxa, nasa's ewmeesa vxitu'.
Jesusa' txãajũ kasehçxa', Tiro Sidon çxhab ja'dasuk pekũjxa' u'j. Sa' kxsũ pa'jçxa', teeçx yatte u'kaçxa, kim yuhwa jiyu jxthãasme'. Nawa kim yuhwa jiyunimeete u'juya' yu' ãjãme'.
Txajũ' teeçx u'y Sirofxenicia kiwetewe'sxa' Jesus pa'jni's jiyuçxa pa'kh. Sa' tasxte peejxũkweçxa pxthaa we'wek:
—Niisa ji'phthu txã'sa' eçx luuku vxit-sak iiyamu. Aça' txãa eçxa's nuukutxi'jine'ga ũusu jĩna pi'kxte',
Txajũ' teeçx u'y Sirofxenicia kiwetewe'sxa' Jesus pa'jni's jiyuçxa pa'kh. Sa' tasxte peejxũkweçxa pxthaa we'wek:
—Niisa ji'phthu txã'sa' eçx luuku vxit-sak iiyamu. Aça' txãa eçxa's nuukutxi'jine'ga ũusu jĩna pi'kxte',
Jesus pasçxa na'jĩk:
—Mũythaswe, luuçx khuẽ'y ũ'kahn. Txã'wẽ luuçx ũ'wa'ja's kusa'jçxa alkutx ũswa'jme' jĩte',
txãa u'y pasçxa':
—Isa yuh we'we'g, txã'wẽ yuja'. Nawa alku' mesa dxiisu ũsçxa', pejka ũ'wẽ'tx luuçx ũ' pe'yaçxáatxwa jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Isa, txã'wẽ yuja'. Aça' me'jwe, i'kwe jxthãasni's uyuune'kwe, eçx luuku vxit-sa' i'kwe niisa ũusu kasejxã'kh jĩte',
txãa u'ya' yatna sxawedçxa uyku, eçxa' ũusu kasehte' wẽt yã'j kamaga ũste.
Jesusa' ki'kin Tiro kiwejũ kasehçxa, Sidon çxhabuy vxite' Dekapolis kiwey uykhẽwna u'jçxa, Galilea ĩkh walatek pa'j.
Kxteea' teeçx piçthẽ'j wẽsẽ'jya' we'weya'wa ãjãsame'stxi Jesus tasxte nuypa'jçxa pxthaa we'we nuykatxhikahn.
Aça' Jesusa' txãa ãçã'sa's nasameete fxii pe'jna u'jçxa, thũ'wẽ kafxte pdxi'p jxa'dxna'wa, txajx fxne'sxa's kuse vxiçte kuuçhe'jna', thunetewa jxa'dxku.
Sa' ũusdxi'na cielute pagayçxa:
—¡Efxata!—jĩk, tee phaate jĩçxak txã'jĩ'.
Txã'jĩçpkaçxha', thũ'wẽ kafxa' phaatetx, aça' thunewa ewuute', ew we'weya' ãjãk.
Txajũ' txãa nasatxi' Jesusa' wala neewe'wek, txã'wẽ yũuni's kim yuhtxwa pta'sxkahmén. Txã'wẽ ew neewe'wetewa, jweeíiçxáatx mtee mteewa pta'sxna jxã'j.
Txã'wẽ yũute', nasa jxukaysa wala kuh jwed yaaki'tx na'jĩna:
—Ãçã' ma'wẽsatxwa jxukak pu'çxhi'. Wẽsẽ'jya' ãjãsameetxwa kwẽesẽ'je'kh, sa' we'weya' ãjãsameetxwa kwe'we'je'kh jĩ'tx.
Txãa entey nasa iiméh wala kuh pkhaakheçxa kĩh yuhwa ũ'wa'j ji'phmeete', Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi pa'yaçxa na'jĩk:
—Naa nasa' tekh en yã'j adx yakh ũsta', nawa kĩh yuhwa ũ'wa'j ji'phmeeta' aça' adxa' peeygãja'th.
Kĩh yuhwa puuçmée yatna kaathe', maaíi yu' jxu'juwe'sxta' na' wẽeçxa dxi'the çxhãçxhameetxna jĩte',
txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx pasçxa':
—¿Ma'wẽ puuçya' ya'ãjãkx, aysũ' nasaa yatçxáa yuhwa meeta' aça'? jĩte',
Jesus pẽjxçxa':
—I'kwe'sxa' ¿maz pan ji'phkwe? jĩte':
—Sieteçxáa ji'ptha'w jĩnatx pas.
Txajũ' Jesusa' nasatx kiwesu kaçxkaahçxa', siete pantxi jxpa'gaçxa Dxusna weçxana'wa, pe'ltedeçxa txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi ũsu'sku, nasa txazkuẽesatx puuçkahn. Aça' txãawe'sxa' kxtey yuutx.
Sa' wedxwa ji'phu'tx kuhmeekwe, aça' Jesusa' Dxusna weçxana'wa, txãa wedxtxi txudeedekaakh.
Aça' jxukaysa txiktxi ũ'. Txãa ũ' kijxaate' siete kanastate utatx pkhakh.
Txãa ente txã'wẽ ũ'sa' kuatro mil ãhtx yu'. Txajũ' Jesusa' nasatx kaahna'wa,
txãa yu' barkote khẽek txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh Dalmanuta kiwen u'jya'.
Kxtee pa'the', fxariseowe'sxwa pa'jçxa Jesus yakh puutx we'wetx. Sa' ma'wẽ yũutewa jiyuya' Jesusa's pẽjxtxi:
—Cieluju kĩhçxáawa mkaavxya'ja'j jĩna.
Txã'jĩte', Jesusa' wala nxus yajkxna na'jĩk:
—Naa nasa' ¿kĩjxa'ki'tx txã'wẽ cieluju kaavxya'ja'j jxthãasu'? Isa yu' txãa nasatxi' kĩhwa kaavxya'ja'jnimée wejx ewna jĩk.
Txã'jĩçxa', nasatx nvxihtna' ki'kin barkote khẽena'wa ĩkh kuten u'kh.
Sa' peçxkanaçxa ũ'wa'j yu' ji'phmée barkote u'jweççxatx yajkx. Naasáa teeçx pançxáatx ji'ph yu'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'wẽk jxpa'yakx kaah:
—Mpa'yajkxwe, Herodes vxite' fxariseowe'sx lewadura ewmeesa's jĩte',
Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' txãawe'sx pwe'sx na'jĩnatx puutx we'we:
—Pan ji'phmeetha'w, txãa pa'gane' txã'jĩ' jĩtx.
Aça' Jesus wẽsẽ'jçxa na'jĩk:
—¿Maa sũhçxakwe txã'wẽ pan ji'phmeetha'w jĩna we'wé'? ¿Ãçxpkaçx jiyu'çmeewá'kwe, pan ji'phmeetewa thẽymée sã'jĩni's yaaki'çmeewá'kwe? ¿I'kwe'sx ũuste khẽje'çmeewá'?
I'kwe'sxa' yafxju yu' uyçxawa, jiyuya' yu' ãjã'çmeewá'kwe, sa' adxa' kĩhnawa thẽymée ãjãni's yaaki'çmeewá'kwe.
Miiyajkxwe wakx: Tahç pantxi txudeedeçxa cinko mil nasatx puuçte', ¿maz kanastakwe pkhakh kijxasaatxi'? jĩte', txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Doce kanastatha'w pkhakh jĩtx.
—Aça' siete pantxi txudeedeçxa kuatro mil nasatx puuçte', ¿maz kanastakwe pkhakh kijxasaatxi'? jĩte', txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Siete kanastate utatha'w pkhakh jĩtx.
Aça' Jesus we'weçxa':
—Txã'wẽ thẽymée yũunisatxi' yaaki'çmeewá'kwe sane'kwe txã'wẽ ũ'wa'j pan ji'phmeetha'w jĩna we'we'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Beçaida çxhabte pa'the', kxteea' teeçx piçthẽ'j uyya' ãjãsame'stxi nuypa'j, nuykatxhikahn pxthaa we'wena.
Aça' Jesusa' txãa uyya' ãjãsamée kusete pu'kisçxa, çxhab eka pe'jna u'jçxa', yafxte fxne'sx sxũsxna'wa yafxte jxa'dxku. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa pẽjxku:
—¿Ma'wẽçxá' uyu'gá'? jĩte', thegu'gçxa':
—Nasa' fxtũu tasx na'wẽçxáatx vxya', nawa ẽsẽ'se'tx jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' ki'kin txajx kuseju yafxte jxa'dxku, aça' yafxa' phaatete' ew uyya' ãjãk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' neewe'wek:
—Çxhabsu u'kameene'ga, sa' maa yuhtxwa pta'sxmeene'ga iidx yafxtxi kim phaadetewa jĩnak yatna kaah.
Jesusa' txãajũ ki' u'kh txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh kasehçxa. Sa' Fxilipo vxitni çxhab Cesarea ja'dasuk pekũjxa' u'jweç yu'. Txajũ' dxi'the u'jweçíi txãawe'sxtxi pẽjxku na'jĩna:
—Adxa's ¿kimna jĩ'ta nasa'? jĩte',
txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Maaíi yu': Juan Bautistana jĩ'tx. Aça' vxite we'weçxa': Eliasna jĩ'tx. Aça' vxite we'wesa': Txãniiteywa ma'wẽta Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa kaseje' txã'wẽysana jĩ'tx jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩnak pẽjx:
—Aça' i'kwe'sxa' ¿kimna sũju'kwe?
Txã'wẽ pẽjxte', Pedro pasçxa':
—Idxa' Kristo, Dxus tasxu yuusag jĩte',
Jesusa' maa yuhtxwa pta'sxkaahme'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' pta'sxku:

—Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' wala pkxuuni pa'ga yuuna, sa' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx vxite' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx ahçeçxa kiikhe'jetxna. Aça' uuçxawa tekh ente' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuna jĩk.
Jesusa' txã'wẽk ew ãate pta'sx. Aça' Pedro' Jesusa's fxiite pe'jna u'jçxa, yu'kxpejk.
Txã'wẽ yu'kxpehte', Jesusa' vxitetx yu'thegçxa', Pedro's na'jĩnak pas:
—Eçxthẽ'j, adx tasxu mtxutée. Idxa' Dxus jxthãasni yu'sa' kxtey yuumée, naa kiwete nasaa yaakxniçxá'sgu kxtey yuu wẽjẽ' jĩçxa',
Jesusa' txãa yakh yuusawe'sxtxi pa'yaçxa na'jĩk:
—Maa nasawa adx yakh yuu wẽeçxa', peekx kakwe jxthãasni's kĩhnawa jxuka nvxihtçxa yuuçxáa adx yakh yujxa' ãjãne'kwe, makwe thẽysa uuwa'j ma'k pa'j nawa txã'sa' yajkxmée.

Nawa naa kiwete ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'jçxá's ya'nwe'wesa', Dxus yakh fxi'zewa'j yu'sa' ivxiituna. Naapkaçxha' Dxus yuwe's nwẽesẽ'jçxa adx yakh fxi'zepa'ga naa kiwete ĩtxĩ fxi'zeni's yajkxmée ivxiitusa', Dxus yakh fxi'zewa'j yu'sa' ivxiitumeena.
Makwe naa kiwetewe'sx yu'sa' jxuka knayçxawa peekx ũus yu's ivxiitute', ¿kĩhteçxá' selpiima'k?
Peekx ũusa's ivxiituyã'the', ¿kimçxa' nwe'wema'k?

Maa nasawa adxa's jxpa'gaya' wa'lna adx pta'sxnitxwa wa'lutxna nasa ewmeesa açewe'wete aça' txã'wẽ yũusa's Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusaawa Dxus angeleswe'sx yakh eena' kweethna kĩhçxa' jxpa'gaya' wa'luna jĩk.
Txajũ' ki'kin we'weçxa' na'jĩk Jesusa':
—Isath we'we', ayte ũssa maaíi yu' uumey uyuune'kwe Dxus naa kiwete jxkaajxa' kĩini's jĩk.
Txajũ' seis en skhẽwniite', Jesusa' thã'j walate pe'jna u'kh Pedro Jakobo Juan txãawe'sx tekhsaçxáatx. Kxtee pa'the', Jesus kakwe' fxiyku zhiçxkwe yu'ptheh txãawe'sx yafxte.
Txajx athni ropa' yãdx na'wẽk zhiçxkwe çxihme yuu; naa kiwete maa yuhwa txã'wẽ zhiçxkwe çxihme yu' thethya' ãjãmeetxna.
Naapkaçxha' Pedrowe'sx yafxte vxyaatx Elias vxite' Moises. Txãawe'sxa' Jesus yakhtxi puutx we'wena ũsu'.
Aça' Pedro' txã'wẽ uyçxa', Jesusa's na'jĩk:
—Ayte' kwe'sx ũswa'j wala ewa'. Aça' tekh wa' txajaga, teeçxsa' iidx jĩi, vxite' Moises jĩi, vxite' Elias jĩi jĩk.
Pedrowe'sxa' weçxaniite ũukhsa na'wẽtx neeyũu, txãasak Pedro' weçxaniite txã'wẽ we'we.
Txajũ' tãaph kĩhçxa aphku, aça' tãaph dxiiju na'wẽk we'weni pthũuse:
—Na' adx Nçxi'k wala wedxnisa', aça' txã'sa' nwẽesẽ'jna kxtey myuuwe jĩçpkaçxha'
Pedrowe'sxa' thegu'gçxawa, Moiseswe'sxtxi uymeeta', naasáa Jesusçxáa yã'j ũstetx uy.
Aça' thã'ju u'jweççxa', Jesusa' Pedrowe'sxtxi' wala neewe'wek:
—Ãçxhíi yu' maa yuhtxwa pta'sxmeene'kwe txã'wẽ uyni's, naasáa Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa uuçxawa ki' ĩtxĩ yuuniijũ pta'sxine'kwe.
Txã'wẽ neewe'weni's kxtey nwẽesẽ'jtx kim yuhtxwa tuuthe'jmée. Nawa txãawe'sx pwe'sx yu' puutx paapẽyĩ'tx: Uuyã'jçxa', ¿ma'wẽ ki' ĩtxĩ yuukx? jĩna.
Txajũ' na'wẽ kaapiya'jni'stxi Jesusa's paapẽjx:
—Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sxa' Elias khuẽ'y yaçte pa'jana jĩ'tx sa' ¿ma'wẽ yuuwa'jsakx açki'tx txã'jĩ'? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:

—Isa, Elias khuẽ'y yuh yaçte pa'jçxa jxuka pheu'jwa'jsa yu'k aça' isa yuh pta'sxi'ne'ta. Txã'wẽy Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's we'weçxa': wala pxthaa yuuna nasa ahçeçxa pkxuuni jĩna Dxus librute fxi'jni ũsa' txãawa isa yuja'.
Eliasa' pa'jana jĩ'tx aça' Eliasa' pa'jyujk, nawa txã'sa' kĩjkĩhwa yũutx Dxus librute ma'wẽ fxi'jni ũsna txã'wẽy.
Txajũ' Jesusa' vxitesa neeyũutx kxtee sxawedna kĩjaçte', nasa wala pkhaakhena ũsu'tx. Aça' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx yu' txãawe'sx yakhtxi wala we'wena ũsu'.
Naapkaçxha' Jesus yuhtewa jiimée ũsiyna, Jesus pa'jaçyã'the uyçxa', nasa' jxukaysa ũukh yajkxnatx weçxaya' utxáa.
Txajũ' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sxtxi' Jesusa' pẽjxku:
—¿Kĩh yũupa'ga txakwe weeçx we'wena ũskwe? jĩte',
txãa nasa wala ksxavxyte teeçxsa' Jesusa's na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Adx nçxi'ka's eçx luuku vxit-sa iiyamute' we'weya' ãjã'çme' txã'snath ayte nuypa'j.

Txãa luuçxa' mtee ũstewa eçx luuku vxit yã'the', ki'thtxi ksuusu'jna yuwesu bu'çxçxáak sẽhna weté'. Txã'wẽ yũuna wala talxiça'. Aça' idx yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi' pi'kxyã'th nuykatxhikahn, nawa ãjãmeeta' jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':

—Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'j yu'sa' ji'phmeesata' naa nasa'. ¿Bagaçxpkaçx i'kwe'sx yakh pu'çxna ũs ya'watka? ¿Bagaçxpkaçx ãjãmée fxi'ze ya'wakwe? Txãa luuçxa's mneejxũhwe ayte jĩte', nuykũhtx Jesus tasxte.
Aça' eçx luuku vxit-sa' txãa luuçxa's kaywẽçxpa'ja'the', kiwesu wetek yuwesu bu'çxçxáa sẽhna.
Txajũ' Jesusa' luuçx neya's pẽjxku:
—Txã'wẽ ãçã'ni ¿makwe txaçx yuuçna? jĩte':
—Le'çxíik txã'wẽ yu'.
Sa' maa entey yu' txaçxmeynak wẽeçxpa'jçxa ipxte khẽena yu'khẽwa khẽena uupçxãh yuuna u'ju'. Aça' kxahth idx yakh ewupçxãhte', ma'wẽçxáawa pu'çxhine'ga peeygãhçxa jĩna pi'ki' jĩte':
—Idx yuu txã'wẽ Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhte yu', kĩhwa jxuka kxtey yuuna txã'wẽ yaakxsa's jĩte',
luuçx neya' susku we'wena pxthaa pi'kx:
—Dxusa' pu'çxyujuna sũju'th, sa' adx ũuste txã'wẽ yaakxwa'ja's jweeíiçxáa wala meen kaajiyu'j jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' nasa wala kuh pkhaakhena utaaçte uyçxa', eçx luuku vxit-sa's na'jĩnak we'we:
—Eçx luuku vxit-sa kwe'we'je'çmeeg, sa' wẽsẽ'jwe'sxte thũ'wẽtxwa aphgu, nawa ãçxha' adx we'weni's nwẽesẽ'jçxa ũusu mkaaseh, peena yu' u'kameene'ga jĩte',
eçx luuku vxit-sa' txãa luuçxa's sus kweeyi'jna kaywẽçxpa'ja'jçxa kasejk. Aça' txãa luuçxa' uuníi na'wẽk wetena neeyũu.
Kxahtx nasa we'weçxa':
—Ãçxha' pejka uuk jĩna we'we'.
Nawa Jesusa' kuseju pu'kisku, aça' txãa luuçxa' kiitek.
Jesusa' txãajũ u'jçxa', teeçx yattek u'ka. Aça' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' pẽjxtxi:
—Kwe'sxa' ¿kĩh yũuçxakxtha'w eçxa's kutxi'jya' ãjãmée? jĩte',
Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Na'wẽsa eçxa' thẽymée yu' kasehmeena, wala yũunaana Dxus yakh puutx we'wete yuuçxáa kasejena jĩk.
Txajũ ki' u'jçxa', Galilea kiwenku u'j. Sa' kxteea' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxik kaapiya'jwa'j ji'phu' naa pa'ga kim yuhwa jiyu jxthãasme'. Sa' dxi'the u'jweççxa', na'wẽk txajx uuwa'ja's pta'sx:
—Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusá's nasa ewmeesa kusete dukhni yuuwa'ja', aça' txãawe'sxa' ikhetxna. Aça' uuçxawa, tekh ente' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuna jĩtewa,
Txajũ ki' u'jçxa', Galilea kiwenku u'j. Sa' kxteea' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxik kaapiya'jwa'j ji'phu' naa pa'ga kim yuhwa jiyu jxthãasme'. Sa' dxi'the u'jweççxa', na'wẽk txajx uuwa'ja's pta'sx:
—Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusá's nasa ewmeesa kusete dukhni yuuwa'ja', aça' txãawe'sxa' ikhetxna. Aça' uuçxawa, tekh ente' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuna jĩtewa,
txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' jiyumeeta', nawa pẽjxya' yu' ũukhtxi.
Sa' Kapernaum çxhabte teeçx yatte pa'jçxa', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi paapẽjxku na'jĩna:
—I'kwe'sxa' dxi'the yuhçxa', ¿kĩjkwe puutx we'we'? jĩtewa,
txãawe'sxa' thaameçxa pasmeeta' txã'wẽ dxi'the yuhçxa', ¿maa wejx jxthaakwe walasakxtha'w? jĩna puutx we'weçxawa.
Txajũ' Jesusa' docesatx pa'yaçxa kaçxçxa pta'sxku:
—Maatewa jxthaakwe walasa yuu wẽeçxa', iiwejçx yajkxmée maatxwa jxuka selpiiçxa yuuçxáa jxthaakwe walasa yuuna.
Txã'jĩçxa' teeçx luuçxkuẽ's txãawe'sx ksxavxyte txahçxa kusete yakhçxa na'wẽk we'we:

—Maa nasawa adxna wa'lmée jxpa'gasa' adx na'wẽy luuçx na'wẽkwesatxwa ahçemée jxpa'gatxna. Txã'wẽ yũusa' adxna jxpa'gasaçxa txã'wẽ yuutxna. Sa' adxna jxpa'gasa' adxçxáana jxpa'gamée, adxna kaahsa'swa jxpa'gasa yuutxna jĩk.
Txajũ' Juana' na'wẽk pta'sx:

—Idx ¿ma'jĩki'g? Kwe'sxa' teeçx piçthẽ'j uytha'w txã' eçx luuku vxit-satx nasaa ũusu kutxi'ji'k Jesusku jxkaaja' jĩna we'weçxa. Nawa txã'sa' jwee yu' txã'wẽ yũukaahmeetha'w kwe'sx yakh u'jusame' naa pa'ga jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Txã'wẽ yũunuwe, txãa pa'gatey adx yase's kxsuusçxa eçx luuku vxit-satx nasaa ũusu kutxi'jsa' adxa's açewe'wemeena kim yuhwa.
Maawa kwe'sxtxi açewe'wesamée yu', kwe'sxtxi pu'çxsa íiçxáatxna.
Na'jĩ'th na': I'kwe'sxa' Dxus luuçxi'kwe naapa'ga maawa i'kwe'sxtxi peeygãhna teeçx tasa yu'çxáawa yusuna txã'sa' dewení yuuna.
—Mpa'yajkxwe, txã'wẽme' luuçxkuẽ adxa's yaakxsatx pkalte kweete'jena txã'sa' txhikhte skuutxh ũ'khni kweta's tudçxa ĩkh wala dxiikhẽ akhwaççxáa, wejx ewna.

Meeçxawa iidx kuse txã'wẽ pkalte idxa's kweete'jeçte', mespẽ'th. E'z kuse yakh uu kiwete khẽe na'wẽ', wejxwa teeçx kuseçxáa ji'phçxawa pçumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'the u'kani wejx ewa'. Txã'wẽme' uu kiwete ipx wala seena'sa bagaçxte yuhwa ũçxhawa'jsame'.
Kxteea' bagaçxte yuhwa wesa' çxhavxyna pçuwa'jsameeta', aça' ipx seena'sawa ũçxhawa'jsame'.

Txã'wẽy iidx çxidawa pkalte kweete'jeçte', txã'swa mespẽ'th. E'z çxida yakh uu kiwete khẽe na'wẽ', wejxwa teeçx çxidaçxáa ji'phçxawa pçumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'the u'kani wejx ewna. Txã'wẽme' infxiernote ipxa' bagaçxte yuhwa ũçxhawa'jsame'.
Kxteea' bagaçxte yuhwa wesa' çxhavxyna pçuwa'jsameeta', aça' ipx seena'sawa ũçxhawa'jsame'.
Txã'wẽy iidx yafxwa pkalte kweete'jpçxãh yuuçte', mkuutxi'j. E'z yafx yakh infxiernote khẽe na'wẽ', wejxwa teeçx yafx yakhçxáawa Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite u'kani wejx ewna.
Txã'wẽme' kxteea' bagaçxte yuhwa wesa' çxhavxyna pçuwa'jsameeta', aça' ipx seena'sawa ũçxhawa'jsame'.
Txãa pa'gatey txãa ipxa' kaapçu'ju'jwa'jsame'.
Nega' wala seelpisa'. Nawa sxũukãhte', ¿ma'wẽ kselpi'jya' ewuutxki? I'kwe'sxa' nega na'wẽy selpiina mfxi'zewe, jxukaysa yakh ewçxáa.

Jesusa' Kapernaum çxhabu kasehçxa', Judea kiwen vxite' Jordan yu'wala kutenku u'j kxsũ pekũjxa'. Sa' Jordan yu'wala kuteju ũste', wala nasa pkhaakhe'tx txajx ũsnite. Aça' kxteewa kaapiya'ja'kh vxite ahsũ na'wẽy.
Naapkaçxha' fxariseowe'sxa' Jesus tasxte utxaaçxa' na'wẽtx paapẽjx, pasya' sxiigte' ewmée vxit-ya' sũhçxa:
—Ptamsaçxawa, nyu's wãatãhte ¿ewmanx? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Jiimeewá'kwe Moises jxkaahni's jĩna pẽjxte',
txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Moises jxkaahçxa', nyu's wãatãjxa' ewuweçxte', nyu kazx yuuna fxi'zeni's eçte fxi'jçxa dukhçxak txuteekaja' jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Moisesa' txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's nvxiht yujk, nawa peekx nyu kĩhwa yũumeetewa wãatãhna fxi'zepa'ga íiçxáak txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's nvxiht, peekxçxáa yu' wãatãjxa' ãjãkahmén.
Nawa Dxusa' nyafxiitey naa kiwe's pheu'jíi e'zíitx ja'daçxajk vxit piçthẽ'j petx u'y yã'jçxa.
Aça' txãa pa'ga piçthẽ'ja' peekx neywe'sx tasxu txuteewa'jsa', nyu yuuwa'jsa yakh utxaaya',
txã'wẽ e'zçxawa, teeçxsaçxáa na'wẽ yuuna pa'jya'. Aça' txã'wẽ yũuniijũ' e'zmée teeçxçxáak yuuna pa'ja'.
Txãa pa'ga Dxus pũpxçxa nvxiitni ptamsayã'txhi' kim yuhwa txuhdeya' ãjãwa'jsameeta' jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' teeçx yatte u'kate', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' txã'wẽ pta'sxni's ki' pẽjxtxi.
Aça' Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Maa piçthẽ'jwa peekx nyu's wãatãhçxa vxite yakh ptamuuçxa', pkalte weteena, peekx nyu's wãatãhçxa vxite yakh ptamuupa'ga.
Aça' u'ywa txã'wẽy nmi'a's wãatãhçxa vxite yakh ptamuuçxa', txãawa pkalteyçxáa weteena peekx nmi'a's wãatãhçxa vxite yakh ptamuupa'ga jĩk.
Txãa e'su' Jesus tasxte luuçxkuẽtx nuypa'jtx Dxus kusete neewe'wekahn. Aça' Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' yuptxi luuçxkuẽtx nuypa'jsatx.
Txã'wẽ yũute', Jesusa' na'jĩnak ũusçxa we'we:
—Luuçxkuẽ adx tasxte yuusaatxi' kuçx yupnuwe, txãa pa'gatey Dxus jxkaahna ũsnisa' naa luuçxkuẽwe'sx na'wẽsa jĩi íiçxá'.
Na'jĩ'th na': maawa luuçxkuẽ na'wẽ Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena's wa'lmée jxpa'gameeçxa yu', bagaçxte yuhwa Dxus tasxte u'kaya' ãjãmeetxna.
Txã'jĩna'wa luuçxkuẽtx yakhna' dxikthesu peekizeçxa Dxus kusete neewe'wek.
Txajũ' Jesusa' vxite ahn u'jweçte', teeçx piçtakx dxi'the wuwuuna kũhçxa', Jesus tasxte peejxũkwek na'wẽ paapẽjxna:
—Kaapiya'jsa wala ewsa mpeeta'sx. Adxa' ¿ma'wẽ yũuçxa pçuwa'jmée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phuki'th? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—¿Kĩh yuupa'gaga adxa's ewsa jĩ'? Naa kiwete' teeçx nasaçxáa yuhwa ewsa yu' meeta'. Dxus yuuçxáa ewsa ũsa'.

Idxa' jiine'ga Dxus jxkaahni na'wẽsatxi': Ptamsa' vxite yakh pkal yuuwa'jme', nasa ikhwa'jme', pesweewa'jme', vxitetx ĩsxiina nuywe'wewa'jme', vxitee jĩitx kusa'jwa'jme'. Neywe'sxtxi peeygãhna ewçxáa yũuna fxi'zewa'ja' jĩte',
txãa piçtakx txã'wẽ wẽsẽ'jçxa' na'wẽk pas:
—Txã'wẽ jxkaahnisatxi' le'çxkuẽjũjx jxuka kxtey yuunath waláa jĩte',
Jesusa' txãa piçtakxa's peeygãhna thegçxa' na'jĩk:

—Na'wẽ yũuwa'jçxáa peejxa': Iidx ji'phuni's jxuka txweyçxa, puuple ji'phmeesatx peesya' me'j. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa', cielute ji'phsa yuune'ga. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa adx yakh myuh, makwe seena' nxussa pa'thewa txãatxi' yajkxmée jĩte',
txãa piçtakxa' wala ji'phsa yu'k, sa' txã'wẽ wẽsẽ'jçxa', wala nxusna u'kh.
Txajũ' Jesusa' nasatx thegçxa' pta'sxku txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi:
—Maawa wala ji'phsa yakha' Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite u'kawa'j wala yuh thẽya' jĩte',
txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx wẽsẽ'jçxa', jiyumée kuh jwed yajkxnatx neeyũu. Aça' Jesusa' ãatek pta'sx:
—Naa kiwete ji'phuniçxá's jxthaakwe yaakxsa yakha' wala yuh thẽya' Dxus jxkaahnite u'kawa'ja'.
Maawa wala ji'phsa' Dxus jxkaahnite wala thẽy u'katxna. Aça' txã'wẽ thẽysa's yajkxte yu', kamelxo yuhwa thẽymée wáa yũz kafxga u'kaya' ãjãtxna jĩk.
Txã'wẽ wẽsẽ'jçxa', wala kuh yajkxna na'wẽtx puutx paapẽyi':
—Txã'wẽte', ji'phsa' ¿kimçxá' cielute u'kaya' ãjama'tx? jĩte',
Jesusa' txãawe'sxtxi thegçxa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Naa kiwete nasa' Dxus ũsnite u'ka wẽeçxa txãawe'sx kakwejuçxáa pa'pçxuçxa' ãjãmeetxna. Nawa Dxusna pi'kxçxa yu', thẽymée ãjãtxna. Dxus yakha' kĩh yuhwa thẽysa meea'.
Txajũ' Pedro' na'wẽk we'we:
—Kwe'sxa' idx yakh yujxa', kwe'sx ji'phuni's jxuka nvxihttha'w kĩhnawa jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Adxa' isath we'we': Dxus yuwe ewsa's jxpa'gaçxa adx yakh fxi'ze wẽeçxa', kĩhnawa jxuka nvxiitutxna yat, kiwe, nyakhwe'sx, npe'sxwe'sx, neywe'sx, nyu, nçxi'kwe'sx, niisawe'sx txã'wẽsatx.

Aça' txã'wẽ yũusa' makwe yahçena fxi'zeçxawa txãawe'sx nvxiitniite puutejka jxthaakwe wala uyuutxna naa kiwetey: yat, kiwe, nyakhwe'sx, npe'sxwe'sx, njĩ'jwe'sx, nçxi'kwe'sx, niisawe'sx txã'wẽysatx. Sa' vxite kiwete', pçumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's jxpa'gatxna.
Nawa jxpa'yakxmeete', makwe yaçtewe'sxçxawa, nmehtewe'sx yuutxna; naapkaçxha' nmehtewe'sx yu', yaçtewe'sx yuutxna jĩk.
Jesusa' Jerusalente pa'jya' u'jweçku yu', aça' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' ũukhçxa e'stetx u'jwe' Jesusa's yaçte akhçxa. Txajũ' Jesusa' docesaçxáatx fxiite pa'yaçxa pta'sxku txã'sa' kĩh yũuya'watewa:

—I'kwe'sxa' jii yã'ji'kwe Jerusalente pa'jya' u'jweçtha'w. Aça' kxte' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's uweçxa dukhni yuuna Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx kusete. Aça' txãawe'sxa' ikhwa'j vxitçxa judiu ji'jmée vxite nasatx dukhetxna ikhkahn.
Aça' txãa nasa' npeevxysxijkana peçxujkwena fxne'sx avxythethna txã'wẽ yũuçxa ikhetxna. Nawa tekh ente' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuna jĩk.
Txajũ' Zebedeo nçxi'kwe'sx Jakobo vxite' Juan txãawe'sxa' Jesus tasxte utxaaçxa na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—Kwe'sxa' idxa'stha'w pẽyi' kwe'sx pẽyni's kxtey yuukahn jĩte',
Jesusa' pẽjxku:
—¿Kĩjkwe yũu jxthãasu'? jĩna.
Aça' txãawe'sx e'zsa' na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—Idxa' naa kiwete jxkaajxa' kĩhçxa', kwe'sx e'zsatx iidx pukakhẽ pdxi'p kaçxwa'ja's ũsune'ga jĩnatx pẽjx.
Aça' Jesus pasçxa':
—I'kwe'sxa' jiimeeçxa i'kwe txã'wẽ pẽyi'. I'kwe'sxa' adx na'wẽy pxthaa yuuçxa uuwa'ja's ũukhmée jxpa'gaya' ¿ãjama'kwe? jĩna pẽjxte',
txãawe'sxa':
—Ãja'nja'w jĩnatx pas.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Isa, i'kwe'sxa' adx na'wẽy pxthaa yuuçxa uuwa'ja's ũukhmée ji'phuyujune'kwe.
Nawa adx pukakhẽ pdxi'p kaçxwa'ja's adx ũsu'çmeeth pẽysatx. Txã'sa' txãn ente kim jxpa'gawa'jsa yuuna txã'sçxáa ũsni yuuna jĩk.
Aça' vxite diezsawe'sx txã'wẽ Jakobowe'sx pẽyni's wẽsẽ'jçxa' ũusaçxatx txãawe'sxtxi'.
Txã'wẽ yũute', Jesusa' pa'yaçxa na'wẽk yu'kxpeh:
—I'kwe'sxa' miiyajkxwe: Naa kiwete jxkaahsa walasa' nasatx jxuka jxkaaja'tx juuna'çxáa yuuna khaawãsxi'jna.
Nawa i'kwe'sxa' txã'wẽy yuuwa'jsameei'kwe. Makwe jxthaakwesaçxawa, wejxwa vxitetx selpiina mfxi'zewe.
I'kwe'sxa' walasa yuu wẽeçxa', vxitee jxkaahni selpisáa myuuwe.
Txãa pa'gatey Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa yuhwa txã'sna selpíi jxthãasya' kĩhme', wejxwa maazkuẽe nasatxwa nwe'wena selpiiya' kĩhçxak ya'dukh nxuste uuya'.

Txajũ' Jerikote pa'jçxa', Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx vxite' kuhsa yakh çxhabu kasehna u'jweçte', teeçx piçthẽ'j uyya' ãjãsameek dxi'j pukate lmusxnu thãasna u'pu'. Txã' Bartimeok yaase yu', Timeo nçxi'k.
Sa' Jesus Nasarethuwe'sx utxaaçte wẽsẽ'jçxa', na'jĩnak sus we'wena u'pu':
—Jesus, Davxid ji'j, adxa's meen peeygãh jĩna.
Aça' nasa yu':
—Sxuuna' myuu, kuçxgu susu' jĩtewa, jweeíiçxáak sus we'we:
—Davxid ji'j, adxa's meen peeygãh jĩna.
Txajũ' Jesusa' tudte yujuçxa, pa'yakaakh. Aça' pa'yatx na'jĩna:
—Kiiteçxa ũukhmée myuh, Jesusa' idxa's pa'yaça' jĩçpkaçxha',
txajx atxha's nvxihtçxa ũphçxak kiiteçxa Jesus tasxte utxáa.
Txajũ' Jesusa' ¿kĩhga yũu jxthãasu'? jĩna pẽjxte', txãa uyya' ãjãsamée pasçxa':
—Adxa' uyya' ãjã wẽjẽ'th jĩk.
Aça' Jesus we'weçxa':
—Kaauyu'juna sũhçxane'ga adxa's pi'kx txãa pa'ga ãçxha' uyna mneeyũu jĩçpkaçxha' uyya' ãjãk, sa' Jesus e'stey u'kh pi'kxna.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Jerusalenna u'jweççxa', e'z çxhabkuẽ Betania Betfxagé utxatek pa'j. Txãa çxhaba' Oliwos vxiç dxi'pgatx neeyũ'. Aça' kxtee pa'jçxa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx e'zsatx yaçte kaakh na'jĩna:
—Çxhab le'çxkuẽ vxya'k kxtee me'jwe. Sa' kxtee pa'jçxa', teeçx buçxu kim yuhwa a'jnimeesa tudni ũsna txã'sna jxũkhwedeçxa jxũna yuweene'kwe.
Txã'wẽ yũuçte kim pẽyiwáatxna aça' kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsak nikxya' kaah nawa ki' kaasxwedu'juna jĩne'kwe.
Txã'jĩte', txãawe'sxa' u'jçxa buçxu's uytxi vxitx pukate dxi'j ju'gu tudni ũste. Aça' jxũna u'jya' jxũkhwedeçtxi yu'.
Naapkaçxha' kxtee thegna ũssa' we'wetx:
—Buçxu's ¿kĩh yũuya' jxũkhwedeçkwe? jĩna.
Txajũ' Jesus ma'wẽne' kwe'we'j txã'wẽy txãawe'sxa' pasteçxáa jxũna kaahtx.
Txajũ' txãa buçxu's Jesus tasxte nuykũhçxa', txãawe'sx atxhtxi tpegu'gçxa pustxi, aça' Jesusa' a'jçxa u'kh.
Naapkaçxha' vxite yu' Jesus u'jwa'j dxi'jsu yaçtetx txãawe'sx atxhtxi pusna u'jwe', aça' vxite' ẽjxã spẽ'thçxatx txã'wẽy dxi'jsu pusna u'jwe' yaçsu.
Naapkaçxha' yaçte u'jsa vxite' e'ste yuusa txãawe'sxa' na'jĩnatx weyna u'jwe':
—Dxus kaahnisa wala yuh jxtuhthesa yuja'.
Wala yuh ew jxkaajana, kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx Davxid na'wẽy. Dxusa's weçxaaga wala ew yũupa'ga jĩ'tx.
Jesusa' txã'wẽk Jerusalente u'ka dxuus yatte pa'j. Sa' dxuus yatte kĩh ũstewa jxuka thegçxaçxáa ki' kasehna u'kh Betania çxhabnay doce txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh, kusuçyã'kh yu' naa pa'ga.
Txajũ' kuskuskhẽ' Jesusa' Betania çxhabu ki' kasehçxa' wẽek.
Sa' higwera-tasx wala yehçsa ũste uyçxa', thegya' u'kh yũn ji'phwáana sũhçxa. Nawa yũnmée eççxáak ji'ph yu', yũn en meek yu' naa pa'ga.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we txãa fxtũu tasxa's:
—Naa fxtũu tasxte yũnni's kim yuhwa ũ'meetxna peena yu' jĩna we'weçte', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' wẽsẽ'jnatx ũsu'.

Txajũ' Jesusa' Jerusalen çxhabte ki' sxawedna pa'jçxa', dxuus yatte u'kaçxa kxtee kĩjkĩhwa txweyna ki' weyna ũssatx eka kasxisxku, vxyu yu'pthehsa mesa vxite' tub çxihme txweysa kaçxni pagutx jxuka pũsxna.
Sa' kxtee kĩjkĩhwa tu'sçxa pa'jsatx kaakũju'jme'.
Txajũ' na'jĩnak yu'kxpeh:
—Dxus librute' na'wẽ fxi'jni ũsa': Adx yata' Dxus yakh puutx we'wena ũswa'j yatçxá' nasa majũwe'sxwa jĩ'k. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' peswée pkhaakhena ũsni kafx na'wẽçxáa vxitçxa ji'phi'kwe jĩte',

Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx wẽsẽ'jçxa', ma'wẽçxáawa yũuçxa ikhya' ãjãwa'ja's pakwetx. Nawa isa ikhya' yu' ũukhtxi, nasa thaakwe kuhsa yu' Jesus kaapiya'jni's nwẽesẽ'jsaçxaçxáa ũspa'ga.
Txajũ' jxuka çxhi'dxiçte', Jesusa' txãa çxhabuh kasehna u'kh.
Kuskuskhẽ kusíi kxuy jxkhẽuuççxa', higwera fxtũu tasxa' weçete pa'j udxni ũstetx uy.
Aça' Pedro' Jesus we'weni's yajkxçxa na'jĩk:
—Mtheg naa higwera fxtũu tasxa's jũ'na we'weçxa': naa fxtũu tasxte yũnni's kim yuhwa ũ'meetxna peena yu' jĩnag we'we txãa fxtũu tasxa' jxuka uhdxga jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—I'kwe'sxa' kĩh pẽyiççxawa, kuh jwed yajkxmée Dxusa' kxtey yuuna sũhnaçxáa mpẽjxwe.
Adxa' isath we'we': maawa Dxusa's txã'wẽ ũusuh jxuka yajkxna, naa vxiç wala ayjxu u'jçxa ĩkh walate me'j khẽeya' jĩtxna aça' kxtey yuuna.
Kxtey yuuwa'ja's adxa' jiiçxath txã'wẽ i'kwe'sxtxi' Dxus yakh puutx we'wekaja' pẽyni's jxpa'gayã'tha'w sũhna.
Sa' Dxus yakh puutx we'wena ũsíi yaakiwá'kwe vxitesa yakh ãhmée yũuni's. Sa' txã'wẽ yajkxçxa', txãa yakh peltunãyya' u'jwene'kwe, kxah i'kwe'sx Tata cielutewe'sxwa i'kwe'sx pkaltxi peltunaĩna.
Nawa i'kwe'sx txã'wẽ vxitesa yakh ãhmée yũuni's peltunaĩmeete', i'kwe'sx Tata cielutewe'sxwa i'kwe'sx pkaltxi' peltunaĩmeena jĩk.
Txajũ' Jerusalente sxawedna pa'jçxa, dxuus yat-su u'jute', sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx Jesus tasxte utxaaçxa',
na'jĩnatx pẽjx:
—Idxa' ¿kimga saga dxuus yatte txã'wẽ juuna' yũu? ¿Kimga txã'wẽ yũuya' jxkaah? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Adxwa i'kwe'sxtxi' pẽjx ya'wath aça' adx pẽyni's pasune'kwe. Txã'wẽ yũ' adxwa pta'sxi'nja kim jxkaathe txã'wẽ yũuçxawa.
Sa' pẽjxku na'jĩna:
—Juan Bautista's ¿kimga jxkaah bautisãyya'? ¿Dxusá', meeçxa' naa kiwega piçthẽ'já'? Mpaaswe jĩnak pẽjx.
Txajũ' txãawe'sx pwe'sx na'jĩnatx puutx we'we':
—Dxusne' jxkaah jĩ'nja'w aça' txã'wẽte' ¿mjĩya'kwe Juan pta'sxni's jxpa'gamée? jĩna pasuna.
Meeçxa' naa kiwetewe'sxne'ta jxkaah jĩwaçwa, kxul yuhna, nasa jxukaysa Juana's we'weçxa': Dxus jxkaahnisa' jĩ'tx.
Txã'jĩna ũukh we'weçxaçxáa:
—Kwe'sxa' jiimeetha'w jĩnaçxáatx Jesusa's pas.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Adxwa pta'sxme'nja kim jxkaathe txã'wẽ yũuçxawa jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' naa ejemplo yakhku kaaja'da'jna pta'sx:

—Teeçx piçthẽ'ja' txajx kiwete uwa wala uhçxa, ktadxíi jxuka uphku, sa' uwa ee thegwa'j yatwa txahçxa uwa thẽ'the ũhdeçxa ku'swa'j yatwa fxii txajk. Txã'wẽ yũuçxak txãa kiwete mjĩiwa'jsatx ew neewe'wena nvxihtçxa jxu'j kiwen u'j.
Txajũ' uwa thẽ'jwa'j en ãhte', txã'sna selpisáa teeçx kaakh kxtee mjĩisatx pẽjxya' txãa jĩi yuuwa'ja's.
Nawa txãa kiwete mjĩisawe'sxa' pẽjxna pa'jsa's uweçxa wala pkxuutx, sa' kĩh yuhwa dukhmeetx kaah.
Aça' kiwe namu' vxite selpisáa ki' kaakh txã'snawa wala wẽesxuna kwet wãatãtãhna dxikthesu kpã'vxittxi.
Txajũ' kiwe namu' ki' kaakh vxite selpisáa, aça' txã'sa' ikhtxi. Txãa e'su' maazkuẽe selpisaawa kaakh, aça' txãawe'sxtxi' maaíi yuutxi' kpã'vxitna, vxitetxi' ikhtxi.
Txã'wẽ yũute', teeçx nçxi'k wala wedxnisa ji'phuk txã'snak nmehte kaah, adx nçxi'ka's pejka nwẽesẽ'jetxna sũhna.
Nawa txãa kiwete mjĩisawe'sxa' txãa nçxi'ka's uyçxa': Naa nçxi'k txã'wẽ naa kiwe's uwewa'jsana, aça' txã'sa' ikhçxa kiwe's kwe'sx iiyamu'nja'w jĩnatx puutx we'we.
Sa' txãa nçxi'ka's uweçxa ikhçxa uuníi kakwe's txãa kiweju kutxi'jtx jĩnak pta'sx.
Txã'wẽ pta'sxçxa Jesusa' pẽjxku:
—Txã'wẽ yũute', kxtee kiwe namu' ¿kĩh yũukx? Txãa sxawedna pa'jçxa, kxtee mjĩisatxi's ikhçxa kiwe's vxitetx ũsuna sũju'th jĩk.
Dxus librute na'wẽ fxi'jni ũsa' txã'sa' iilẽeymeewá'kwe i'kwe'sxa':
Yat txaahsawe'sxa': Naa kweta' seelpime' jĩçxa wãatãhtx.
Nawa txãaíik yat makwesanawa çxhãçxha neewewa'jsa yuuna pa'j.
Txã'wẽ neewewa'jsa yuuna pa'jwa'ja's Dxusku vxitçxa nvxiht,
Txãa pa'ga kwe'sx yakha' wala weçxa yuja' ¿jĩ'çmeena'?
Txajũ' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sxa' txãa ejemplo' txãawe'sxtxi we'wenitewa jiyuçxa', Jesusa's uweçxa tud wẽetx. Nawa nasatx ũukhçxa tudmée u'jtx.
Txajũ' fxariseowe'sx vxite' Herodes nasa txãawe'sxtxi pa'yaçxatx maz kaah Jesus tasxte, kĩh ewmée we'wetewa kpajkxya'.
Aça' txãawe'sxa' na'wẽtx paapẽjx Jesusa's:

—Idxa's kwe'sxa' jiitha'w. Idxa' isasaçxá'sgu we'we', Dxus tasxte pa'jwa'j dxi'ja's kaapiya'jna. Sa' nasaa jxkaahna yu'kxpehnitx nwẽese'je'çmeeg, txãa pa'gatey idxa' nasa ewsa na'wẽ thegsatx jiyumey ju'gu yu'çmeeg. Idx ¿ma'jĩki'g? Jxkaahsa Cesara's vxyu dukhte ¿ewmanx? Meeçxa' dukhmeete wáa ¿ewna? jĩna pẽjxte',
Jesusa' txãawe'sx ũuste ewmée yajkxçxa txã'wẽ pẽyni's jiyuçxa', na'wẽk pas:
—¿Kĩjxa'kwe adxa's ewmeete nvxiit wẽeçxa txã'wẽ pẽyí'? Vxyu's mneejxũhwe wakx, thegya'wath jĩte',
teeçx vxyu's jxũna kũhtx, aça' thegçxa' na'jĩk:
—Ayte' ¿kiim dxi'pa's ki'pnina, sa' kiim yase's fxi'jnina? jĩte', txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Cesar dxi'pa's ki'pçxa Cesar yase's fxi'jni' jĩtx.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk jxkaah:
—Cesar jĩ's Cesara's dukhwa'ja', sa' Dxus jĩ's Dxusa's dukhwa'ja' jĩte', paapẽysawe'sxa' pasya' ãjãmée kuh yajkxnatx neeyũu.
Txajũ' saduceowe'sxtxi paapẽjxya' kũh Jesus tasxte. Txãawe'sxa' uusaawe'sxa' peena yu' ĩtxĩ yuumeetxna sũhna yaakxsatx yu'. Sa' Jesus tasxte kũhçxa', pẽjxtxi:

—Idxa' jiine'ga, Moisesa' na'wẽk fxi'jçxa nvxiht: Maa piçthẽ'jwa nyu ji'phçxawa, luuçx ji'phumey uute', uusáa nyakha' txãa neeyũusáa u'y yakh kabaana aça' txãate luuçx nyafxtewe'sxa' uusáa nçxi'k na'wẽ neeyũuna jĩnak fxi'j.
Kwe'sxa' jiitha'w siete piçthẽ'j pxakhtxi u'p yu'. Sa' nyakh nthẽ'jsa' iiyuuçxawa luuçx ji'phumey uuk.
Aça' nyakh e'stewe'sxa' txãa u'y neeyũusáa yakh kabaçxawa, txãawa luuçx ji'phumey uuk. Sa' tekhtewe'sx nyakhwa txãa u'y neeyũusa's íiçxáak kaba. Nawa txãawa txã'wẽyçxáak yuu.
Aça' sietesay teeçx u'ysaçxaçxáana kabana jxã'jçxawa, txã'wẽçxaçxáatx yuu. Nmehte' txãa u'ywa uuk.
Aça' uusaawe'sx ki' ĩtxĩ yuu ente', txãa u'ya' ¿maa yakh isa nyu yuuwa'jsakx cielute'? jĩnatx paapẽjx.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—I'kwe'sxa' Dxus libru's jiimeei'kwe, sa' Dxus tasxte ma'wẽ fxi'zewa'ja'swa jiimeeçxa' jxpubana ũsi'kwe.
Nawa uusaawe'sxa' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuçxa', nyu ji'phuwa'jsa meeta'. Kxte' kaaptamu'jna ũskiweme', txãa pa'gatey cielute' txãawe'sxa' angeleswe'sx na'wẽsaçxáa yã'tha'.

I'kwe'sxa' jxpubanuwe: Uusaawe'sxa' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuwa'jsa yuhta'. I'kwe'sxíiwa Moises librute iilẽeyne'kwe: Kxte' çhũçh yu'kh behna ũsni pxãjũ na'wẽk Dxusa' we'we: Adxa' Abrahan, Isaak, Jakob txãawe'sx Dxusthu jĩk.
Dxusa' uusaawe'sx Dxusme', txã' ĩtxĩsawe'sx Dxusa'. Aça' i'kwe'sxa' wala jxpubana ũsi'kwe jĩk.
Txã'wẽ pãapẽjxte', Jesus sxiigmée pasuçte wẽsẽ'jna ũsu'k Dxus ley kaapiya'jsa teeçxsa'. Sa' txãawa na'wẽk pẽjx:
—Dxus leya' maatewa jxthaakwesa' ¿maana? jĩte',
Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Dxus ley maatewa jxthaakwesa nyafxtewe'sxa' na'wẽ': Israelwe'sx, mwẽesẽ'jwe: Kwe'sxtxi taki'sa Dxusa' teeçx yuuçxá'.
Txã'sa' ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa txãa yuuçxáana selpiina fxi'zewa'ja' bagaçxte yuhwa txutemée uu entepkaçx.
Aça' e'stewe'sxa' txã'wẽydxi'a': Peekíi ma'wẽga ya'peeygãja', txã'wẽy mpeeygãh vxite nasatxwa. Naa ley e'zsa maatewa jxthaakwesata' jĩte',
Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsa pasçxa':
—Ew yuh pta'sxgu. Dxusa' teeçxçxáa yuh ũsa', aça' vxite Dxus yu' meeta'.

Sa' txã'wẽ ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa txãa yuuçxáana bagaçxte yuhwa txutemée selpiina fxi'zeçxa, txã'wẽy ma'wẽ peekíi ya'peeygãja'kx txã'wẽ vxite nasatxwa peeygãhna fxi'zeni' Dxusna peesna maazkuẽe niimalwa altalte kabnite jxthaakwe ewsa' jĩk.
Txajũ' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsa txã'wẽ jxpa'yakx paste', Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Dxus jxkaahnite u'kaya' utxa ũsgu jĩk.
Aça' txajũyã'ja' vxite yu' peena pẽjxmeeta'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' dxuus yatte nasatx kaapiya'jna na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Dxus ley kaapiya'jsawe'sxa' ¿ma'wẽteki'tx Kristo' Davxid nçxi'ka' jĩna pta'sxi'?
Naapkaçxha' Dxus Espiritu kaayaki'the' Davxida' Kristo's we'weçxa' na'jĩk:
Adxna jxpe'jsa Kristo's Dxusa' na'jĩk:
Adx pukate paçu ju'gte mkaaçx,
Idxna açesatx idxçxaçxáana nwẽese'jwa'ja's vxitna jxã'phkaçx jĩk.
Aça' Kristo' ¿ma'wẽçxa Davxid nçxi'k yuukx? Davxid íiwa Kristo's we'weçxa': Adxna jxpe'jsa jĩk. Txã'wẽ Jesus pta'sxte', nasa txazkuẽesay wala weçxana wẽsẽ'je'tx.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'wẽ yu'kxpehnak kaapiya'j:
—Dxus ley kaapiya'jsawe'sxtxi' jxpa'yakx me'juwe. Txãawe'sxa' ropa jxu'jsa athçxatx nasatx weçxaa jxthãasna pekũju' msuuwa.
Sa' judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenisuwa kaçxni wejx ewsaçxáanatx pakwé', vxite' sã'jĩya' pi'kxni yat-suwa txã'wẽytxi yu'.
Sa' vxiudawe'sx kĩh ji'phuni'swa jxuka kusa'jçxatx txãa pesweni's kaapeçxkana'jya' wala jxu'j we'wena lisá'. Txã'wẽ yũupa'ga txãawe'sxa' wejx jxthaakwe Dxus kastigãyni yuutxna jĩk.
Sa' Jesusa' dxuus yatte vxyu ãsxni dxi'pte kaçxçxa thegnak u'pu' ofxreda ãsxya' kũusatx. Aça' maaíi yu' vxyu wala ji'phsa' seena' wala akhetx.
Naapkaçxha' teeçx u'y vxiuda puuplesa kũhçxa', e'z vxyuu musxkuẽçxáak akh.
Aça' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi pa'yaçxa na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Naa u'y vxiuda' kĩh yuhwa ji'phmeesaçxawa maa maatewa jxthaakwek akh.
Vxite yu' akhe'tx, nawa txãawe'sx peejinimée kijxasaçxáanatx akhe'. Nawa naa u'ya' kĩh yuhwa ji'phmeesaçxawa txajx ũ' weywa'ja's jxukak akh jĩnak pta'sx.
Txajũ' Jesusa' dxuus yatu kasejeçte', txãa yakh u'jusa teeçxsa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—Mtheg, naa yata' na'wẽ seena' wala txaahni' kwet zhiçxkwesa yakh jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Naa yat wala's wá'ga thegu', aça' txã'wẽ yuja'. Nawa jxuka pçuuna, aça' teeçx kwetçxáa yuhwa kẽese'jnimeesa yu' neeyũumeena jĩk.
Sa' txajũ kasehçxa', Oliwos thã'j dxuus yat dxi'ptek neeyũ' kxteetx u'j. Kxtee pa'jçxa Jesusa' kaçxçxa u'pte', Pedro, Jakobo, Juan, Adres txãawe'sxa' na'wẽtx paaçte pẽjx:
—Bagaçx txã'wẽ dxuus yata' pçuwa'jsakx txã'sa' pta'sxwaça', sũju'tha'w. Sa' txã'wẽ yuuwa'j en ãjãçte', ¿kĩhçxa yuukx? txã'snatha'w jiyu wẽjẽ' jĩte',
Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Mpa'yajkxwe kaypuba'jwe'sxte.
Txã'wẽme', wala kasejetxna: Adxíi Kristoth jĩna. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa maaíi yuutxi' wala kaypuba'jatxna.
Sa' i'kwe'sxa' wẽsẽ'jene'kwe gweçxa u'pa' sa' aysuwa gweçxa pa'jana jĩni's, nawa ũukhmeene'kwe. Txã'wẽ kxtey yuuyujuna, nawa nmeh en meea'.

Aça' gobierno' vxite kiwete gobierno yakh puutx puiitxna. Naapkaçxha' puutx jxu'j kiwejũ pwe'sxwa puutx puiitxna. Mtee mteewa seena' ehd u'jwena. Seena' wẽjẽ enwa pa'jana. Sa' nasawa wala susutxna gobiernotx açewe'wena. Nawa pxthaa nxuswa'j en takhnaçxáa txã'wẽ yuuna.

Nawa i'kwe'sxa' jxpa'yakx meswe. Txã'wẽme' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx kusete i'kwe'sxtxi dukhçxa, txãawe'sx pkhaakhenite nuypa'jçxa pkxuutxna. Sa' i'kwe'sxa' adxna selpiiya' utxaapa'ga ahçeçxa ne'jwe'sx tasxsu vxite' jxkaahsa tasxsu kuutxa'jni yuune'kwe. Txã'wẽ kxsũ pa'jçxa', jxkaahsawe'sxtxiwa pta'sxya' ãjãne'kwe adx kaapiya'jni's.
Nmeh en utxaaçte', Dxus yuwe ewte nvxiitwa'jsa's mtee mteewa jxuka pta'sxni yuuna.

Txã'wẽ i'kwe'sxtxi' jxkaahsa kusete dukhya' jxũna u'the', ¿ma'wẽ pasukxtha'w? sũhna kuh yaakxnuwe ũukhna. Dxusa' txãa dudte kaaũusuthe'jena txã'sçxáa mwe'wewe, txãa pa'gatey i'kwe'sx we'wewa'jsameei'kwe. Dxus Espiritu i'kwe'sx ũuste kaayaki'jwa'jsa' i'kwe'sx we'wewa'ja's, aça' txã'sçxáa we'wewa'jsai'kwe.
Naa kiwete nasa' peekx nyakhtxi ahçeçxa kiikhe'jetxna, aça' neywe'sxwa peekx nçxi'ktxi ahçeçxa kiikhe'jetxna. Txã'wẽy nçxi'kwe'sxwa neywe'sxtxi ahçeçxa kiikhe'jetxna.
I'kwe'sxa' adxna selpiipa'gaçxáa naa kiwetewe'sx jxuka yaaçeni fxi'zene'kwe. Nawa uu entepkaçx Dxus yakh txutemée fxi'zeçxa', ewte neeyũune'kwe.

Na'wẽ fxi'jni's jiyuya' jxpa'yakx mlẽeywe: Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Daniela' fxi'kh dxuus yatte kazx ewmée yuuna pa'jwa'ja's. Aça' txã'wẽ kxtey yuuçte uyçxa', Judea kiwete ũssa nasa' çxhab peeku'j yu'khsuçxaçxáa ũphna kasejene'kwe.
Aça' txã'wẽ seena' yuuçyã'the', ẽe yat-su u'psa ũphna sa'jçxawa, kĩh yuhwa kutxi'jwa'j en ji'phumeetxna.
Txã'wẽy mjĩi ehsu u'jusawa txajx atxhçxá'swa yatuh kutxi'jya' pa'jwa'j en ji'phumeetxna.
Txãa ensu' nasa ji'phsa vxite' luuçx ãpãkuẽ ji'phsa' wala yuh nxus pxthaa yuutxna.
I'kwe'sxa' Dxusna mpi'kxwe, txã'wẽ ũphwa'j ena' nus ente yuukahmén.
Txã'wẽme' iiméh seena' wala nxuswa'j en yuuna. Naa kiwe's Dxus pheu'jiyna, bagaçxte yuhwa nxuswa'j en txã'wẽsa yu' u'pu'çme', sa' txãa skhẽwniijũyã'ja' bagaçxte yuhwa txã'wẽy nxussa yu' u'pumeena.

Kwe'sxtxi taki'sa Dxusa' txã'wẽ seena' nxuswa'j ena's txaçxmée vxitmeete yu', naa kiwete nasa kim yuhwa ĩtxĩ neeyũumeetxna. Nawa txã'wẽ seena' nxuswa'j en u'puwa'ja's Dxusa' txaçxmeek vxit txajx nasa txhitxhnisatx peeygãhçxa.
Txajũ' maaíi yu' i'kwe'sxtxi na'jĩtxna: Myuhwe thegya', Kristo' ayte ũsa' jĩtxna. Meeçxawa: Me'jwe thegya', Kristo' kxtee ũsa' jĩtewa, i'kwe'sxa' kxtey yuunuwe.

Txãa ensu' wala ĩsxĩisa kasehçxa: Kristotha'w jĩtxna, naapkaçxha' vxite': Kwe'sxa' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsatha'w jĩna pekũjutxna, kaypuba'j wẽeçxa kĩjkĩhwa kaavxya'ja'jna. Jxpa'yakxmeete', Dxus txhitxhnisa yuhtxwa kaypuba'jatxna.
Aça' txã'wẽ yũuwe'sxte, adxa' dxiikhẽy pta'sxiçthu i'kwe'sx jxpa'yakx ũskahn.
Nawa txã'wẽ nxusni en skhẽwniijũ', seka' çxhi'dxina, aça' a'tewa kweethmeena.
Naapkaçxha' estrelxa' cielujũ ũsxitxna, aça' kĩjkĩhwa seena' walasa ẽe walate ũstxna txãawa jxuka kẽese'jni yuutxna.
Txã'wẽ yũunijũ', Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's uyuutxna tãaph pxãhte seena' zhiçxkwe kweethna kĩjaçte.
Sa' kĩhçxa' txajx angeleswe'sxtxi jxkaajana txajx nasa txhitxhnisa mtee mteewa ũstxna txãatx jxuka pkhakhkahn.
Naa ejemplo's peçxkananuwe: higwera fxtũu tasx u'se yeeçuçte uyçxa', jiyu'i'kwe yũnya'watewa.
Txã'wẽy na'wẽ pta'sxthu txãatx uyçxa', jii mfxi'zewe nmeh ena' utxaaçna sũhna.
Isath we'we': txã'wẽ seena' nxuswa'j ena's uyuutxna naa ensu nasa uumey.
Cielu naa kiwe jxuka skhẽuutxna, nawa adx we'weni' jxuka kxtey yuumey yu' skhẽwmeetxna.
Nawa txã'wẽ Dxus Nçxi'k kĩh orate kĩiwa'jsatewa, txãa en yu'sa' kim yuhwa jiimeeta' cielute Dxus angeleswe'sxwa jiimeeta', aça' Dxus Nçxi'k íi yuhwa jiime', naasáa Dxus yuuçxáa jiia'.
Txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxa' wala jxpa'yakx meswe, Dxusna yuuçxáa neewe'wena. Txã'wẽme' jiimeei'kwe bagaçx kĩiwa'jsatewa.
Txã' na'wẽ yuuna: Teeçx piçthẽ'j jxu'j kiwen u'jweççxa', yatu kasehmey selpisaatx teeçxsa na'wẽçxah mjĩi ũsçxa kxtee jxpa'yakx ũskahn teeçx thegwa'jsa txajana.
Txã'wẽy i'kwe'sxwa wala jxpa'yakx meswe. Txã'wẽme' jiimeei'kwe çxhi'dxiçte ma'k yuu, meeçxa' kuspxãh atalx we'weçte ma'k yuu, meeçxa' kusíi ma'k yuu nawa pa'jçxáa yuuna.
Txã'wẽme' yajkxmée ũsiyna, naa dudte pa'jçxáa wáa yuuna.
I'kwe'sxçxáatx pta'sxmée, jxukaysatxthu pta'sxi' jxpa'yakx ũskahn.

Paskua's ũ'ni vxite' pan lewadura ji'phmée ũ'ni fxiesta txãa e'z fxiesta ãjxa' e'z ençxáak peejx yu'. Txãa ente Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sxa' puutx we'wetx ma'wẽ yũuçxa kimwa jiyunimeete Jesusa's kiikhe'jya' ãjãwa'ja's.
—Nawa fxiesta entemée kiikhe'je'nja'w. Txã'wẽme', nasa wala susutxna jĩnatx puutx we'we.

Naapkaçxha' Jesusa' Betaniate Simon wã'jy weeju katxhisa yattek u'p yu'. Aça' kxtee u'pte', teeçx u'y wẽt putasá kĩh yuhwa ka'dnimeesa wala pa'gasa's atçxak kũh. Sa' fxrasko's uhdçxa Jesus dxikthekhẽk aw.
Aça' kxtee ũssa' maaíi yu' ũusaçxatx txãawe'sx pwe'sx na'jĩna:
—¿Kĩh yũupa'gaçxáaga naa wẽt putasá txakwe pa'gasa's kxul psuwú'?
Wejx yuuwa trescientos pesote txweyçxa puupletx pu'çxya' ewne' yu' jĩnatx txãa u'ya's ahçena wẽesxũu.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—¿Kĩjxa'kwe wẽesxú'? Kuçx yuunuwe. Na'wẽ yũuk txã' kxul vxituni yuume'.
Puupletx peeswaç ewne' yu' jĩ'i'kwe na' puuplesatxi' bagaçxtewa peesya' ãjãne'kwe, i'kwe'sx yakh nes yuutxna naa pa'ga. Nawa adxa' i'kwe'sx yakh nes yuuya'wameeth.
Adx uute adx kakwete sxũsxwa'ja's ma'wẽçxáawa yũuk adx uumeyna.
Isath we'we', naa kiwete mtee mteewa Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna pekũhsa', naa u'y txã'wẽ yũuni'swa ja'da pta'sxni yuuna peçxkanamée jĩk.
Txajũ' txãa yakh u'jusa teeçxsa Judas Iskariote' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx kusete Jesusa's dukhya' puutx we'weya' u'kh.
Aça' txãawe'sxa' wala weçxana vxyu dukhya' neeyũutx. Txajũ' Judasa' ¿ma'wẽ yũuçxa Jesusa's açesawe'sx kusete dukheki'th? sũhna wala yajkxku.
Pan lewadura ji'phmée ũ'ni fxiesta en ãjãçte', Paskua'jwa'j piisxaatx ikhe' txãa ente' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' Jesusa's pẽjxtxi:
—¿Paskuatewe'sxa's ũ'ya' mtee pheu'jya' kaajxa'waga? jĩte',
txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx e'zsatx na'wẽk jxkaah:
—Me'jwe Jerusalenna. Sa' kxtee teeçx piçthẽ'j uyuune'kwe yu' mitxha's yakhçxa u'jweçte. Sa' e'stey u'jwene'kwe,

aça' txãa mtee u'kate', i'kwe'sxwa kxtee u'kaçxa yat namu's pẽyine'kwe: ¿Mtee piesa ũsuki'g Paskuatewe'sxa's pheu'jçxa adx yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh ũ'wa'ja's? jĩnak kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa' yuwe kaah jĩne'kwe.
Aça' txã' pta'sxina ẽe yatte teeçx piesa walasa pheu'jniyã'jsa. Kxtee Paskuate ũ'wa'ja's pheu'june'kwe.
Txã'wẽ jxkaathe', txãawe'sxa' çxhabna u'jçxa' Jesus ma'wẽ jxkaahni's jxuka kxtey uyçxa', Paskuate ũ'wa'ja's pheu'jtx.
Jxuka çxhi'dxiçte', Jesuswa kxtee pa'kh txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh.
Sa' mesate ũ'na u'pçxa', na'jĩk:
—Isath we'we', ayte adx yakh ũ'na u'psa teeçxsa' adxa's açesawe'sx kusete dukhya'wa' jĩte',
jxukaysa nxus we'wena puutx ya'paapẽyĩ'tx:
—Meeçxa' ¿adx wáa txã'wẽ açesawe'sx kusete dukhwa'jsane'tka? jĩnatx jxukaysa txã'wẽçxaçxáa we'we'.
Aça' Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Adx yakh u'jusa teeçxsa' maa txã'wẽ adx yakh ja'daçxah kuse's plaatukhẽ akhena txãa adxa's açesawe'sx kusete dukhwa'jsa'.

Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' ma'wẽ uuwa'jsatewa Dxus librute pta'sxi'k txã'sa' kxtey yuuyujuna. Nawa adxa's açesawe'sx kusete dukhsa' seena' yuh nxuste khẽjena. Txãa piçthẽ'ja' wejx yuuwa naa kiwete kasehmeewaçne' wejx ew yu' jĩnak we'we.
Nee ũ'na u'píi, Jesusa' pana's jxpa'gaçxa Dxusna weçxana'wa pe'ltedeçxa ũsu'sku na'jĩna:
—Mẽ'we, naa pana' adx kakwe na'wẽsa' jĩçxa',
waso'swa jxpa'gaçxa Dxusna weçxana'wa jxukaysatx tudxkaathe', jxukaysa tudtxi txãa wasotewe'sxa's.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Naa wasotewe'sxa' adx ee na'wẽsa', maazkuẽesatewa ãh uwuwa'jsa'. Dxusa' txã'wẽk adx eea's pkawçxa yuuçxáa i'kwe'sxtxi nwe'wewa'ja's nvxiht u'se pheu'jçxa.
Isath we'we': Ãçxhũyã'ja' peena yu' tudxme'nja naa uwa yu'a's, naasáa Dxus jxkaahwa'j ente yuuçxáa ki' tudxi'nja.
Txajũ' Dxusna weçxana memçxa', Oliwos vxiçna u'jtx.
Kxtee pa'jçxa', Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Dxus librute we'weçxa': piisxáa-thegsa's ikhte', piisxá' jxuka ũphuutxna jĩ'k txãa pa'ga naa kuste' i'kwe'sxa' adx tasxu jxuka ũphuune'kwe.
Txã'wẽ yuutewa, adxa' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuçxa i'kwe'sx yaçte u'jwe'nja Galilean jĩte',
Pedro pasçxa':
—Vxite yu' makwe ũukhçxa ũphtewa, adx yu' txã'wẽ yũume'nja jĩk.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Idxa's isath we'we', naa kuste atalx e'z us we'wemeyna, tekh us ĩsxĩijaç yuune'ga adxa's jiimeeth jĩna.
Txã'jĩtewa, Pedro' jweeíiçxáak çxhãçxha we'we':
—Makwe idx yakh ih uune'jçxawa, idxa's jiimeeth jĩna yu' ĩsxĩime'nja jĩte', jxukaysa txã'wẽçxaçxáatx we'we.
Txajũ' teeçx ahte pa'jtx, Geçemaní yaasesate. Sa' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi:
—Ayte me'pwe, naapkaçxha' adxa' Dxus yakh puutx we'weya' u'jweçthu jĩçxa',
Pedro, Jakobo, Juan txãawe'sxçxáatx pe'jçxa u'kh. Txajũ' Jesusa' wala nxus yajkxçxa',
na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Txakwe wala pxthaa yuuçxa uuwa'ja's yajkxte', wala nxus yuja'. Aça' i'kwe'sxa' ayte dehmée me'pwe jĩçxa',
jxu'jmeekuẽ u'jçxa kiwega pkipha weteçxa Dxusna pẽjxku txã'wẽ seena' yuuçxa uuwa'ja's yu'pthejkahn na'jĩna:
Tata, idx yakha' kĩh yuhwa thẽysa yu' meea'. Aça' txã'wẽ seena' nxuste uuwa'jũ meen nwe'we. Nawa adx jxthãasni's kxtey yuumeeçxawa, iidx jxthãasniçxá's kxtey meen yũu jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa tekhsatx thegya' kũhçxa', dehna ũstek uy. Sa' Pedro's we'wek:
—Dehmée u'pkaathe', ¿teeçx oraçxáawa ĩtxĩ u'pmée dehwá'ga?
Ewmeete weteya'mée, Dxus yakh puutx we'wena me'pwe dehmée. I'kwe'sxa' ũusuh yu' çxhãçxhai'kwe yaaki', nawa kakwe yu' çxhãçxhaçme' kxtey yuuya'.
Txajũ' ki'kin Jesusa' u'jçxa', txã'wẽyçxáak we'wena Dxus yakh puutx we'we'.
Sa' thegya' ki' sxawedçxa', txã'wẽy deeni ũstek uyna kũh, txãawe'sx yafxa' dee wẽeçxa çxhãçxhaçmeene'ta naa pa'ga. Txã'wẽ Jesus uyna kũhte, ma'wẽ pasya' yuhwa ãjã'çmeeta'.
Txajũ' tekh uswa txãawe'sxtxi thegna kũhçxa', Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Ãçxh yuuçxá' jxkaaseya' mdejxujíiwe. Nawa ãçxha' pejka en ãjk, Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's ewmeesawe'sx kusete dukhwa'j.
Txã'wẽyã'ja' aça' kiiteçxa mejkawe. Adxa's açesawe'sx kusete dukhwa'jsa' yujxã'ja' jĩk.

Kxtee we'wena nee ũsiyna, Judasa' kũjk. Txãa yu' Jesus yakh u'jusa docesatewe'sxíiçxáak yu', aça' txãa Judas yakh nasa wala kũhtx kçxilx fxtũ txã'wẽ atçxa. Txãawe'sx yu' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx jxkaahnitx yu'.
Judasa' Jesusna uwewa'jsatx na'wẽku'ga yu'kxwe'weçxa pe'jna yuwé': Ma'sna dxi'pte weçxa'nja txã'sna i'kwe'sxa' tudçxa jxũna u'jwene'kwe jĩnaga yu'kxwe'we.
Txajũ' Jesus tasxte utxaana kũhçxa':
—Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa jĩçxa weçxak.
Naapkaçxha' nasa' Jesusa's tudtxi jxũna u'jya'.
Txã'wẽ Jesusa's tuduçte', Jesus yakh u'jusa teeçxsa' kçxilxa's jxkuutxi'jçxa sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jna selpisáa thũ'wẽ's spẽ'thku.
Txajũ' Jesusa' nasatxi' na'jĩk:

—Adxa' een isath dxuus yatte kaapiya'jna ũsu' i'kwe'sx ksxavxyte. Nawa txagaçxhíi yu' tudmeeçxa', ãçxh yu' peswéethasi'kwe kçxilx petx fxtũ atçxa pa'j, tudçxa jxũna u'jya'. Nawa Dxus librute fxi'jni ũsa' txãa kxtey yuukahn txã'wẽ yuuça' jĩnak we'we.
Txajũ' Jesusa' nasatxi' na'jĩk:

—Adxa' een isath dxuus yatte kaapiya'jna ũsu' i'kwe'sx ksxavxyte. Nawa txagaçxhíi yu' tudmeeçxa', ãçxh yu' peswéethasi'kwe kçxilx petx fxtũ atçxa pa'j, tudçxa jxũna u'jya'. Nawa Dxus librute fxi'jni ũsa' txãa kxtey yuukahn txã'wẽ yuuça' jĩnak we'we.
Txajũ' Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' txã'sçxáana nvxihtçxa jxuka ũphna u'jtx.
Naapkaçxha' teeçx piçtakx dee pa'çxni yakhçxáak Jesus e'stey u'jweç yu', aça' txã'snawa tuduçtxi yu'.
Nawa dee pa'çxni's nvxihtçxa, iyuna u'kh sũpxçxáa.
Txajũ' Jesusa's sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j tasxte nuypa'jtx. Aça' kxte' sacerdotewe'sx, judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx jxukay pkhaakhetx.
Aça' Pedro' Jesus e'ste jxu'kh neeyũuna u'jna ũsu', sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j yat patxute pa'phkaçx. Sa' patxute neeyũuk policiawe'sx yakh ipx bajçxna.
Naapkaçxha' sacerdotewe'sx vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx jxukay pkhaakheçxa, Jesus ewmée yũuni's pakwetx, ewmée yũuni's kpajkxçxa kiikhe'jya' sũhçxa. Nawa uymeeta'.
Txã'wẽ uymeetewa maaíi yu': Jesusa' yuuwesa yuja' jĩna yuwe ũsu'tx. Nawa txãawe'sx pta'sxni' isamée fxiyfxiyçxáak kaseje'.
Txã'wẽtewa maaíi yu' na'wẽtx we'weya' yajkx:
—Jesus we'weçxa': Naa dxuus yat nasaa txaahni's pẽtxçxa, tekh ente' ki' vxite txaja'nja nasa vxitnimeesa jĩna we'weni's kwe'sxa' iiwẽsẽ'tha'w jĩnatx pãatxhĩ'khe'.
Makwe txã'wẽ we'wetewa, txãawa isamée íiçxáak kaseje'.
Txajũ' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'ja' kiiteçxa', Jesusa's na'wẽk we'we:
—Na'wẽtx pãatxhĩ'khe' ¿txã'sa' ma'wẽçxáawa pasya'wameegá'? Meeçxa' ¿isa yuh txã'jĩwá'nta? jĩtewa,
Jesusa' teeçx yuweçxáa yuhwa pasme'. Aça' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'ja' ki'kin pẽjxku:
—¿Idxa' Kristo, Dxus Nçxi'k dxihgá'? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Txã'wẽíith. Aça' i'kwe'sxa' uyuune'kwe Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' Dxus pukate kaçxçxa u'pte. Sa' cieluju tãaphte kĩjaçtewa uyuune'kwe jĩk.
Txajũ' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'ja' peekx athni ropa's ũusçxa sudeçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—¿Kĩjxa'çxáa testigo jwee pejiikxtha'w?
I'kwe'sx wẽsẽ'jna ũste na'wẽk Dxusa's açewe'we. Aça' i'kwe'sxa' ¿maa sũjũ'kwe? jĩte', jxukaysa pasçxa':
—Txã'sa' ikhteçxáa ewna jĩtx.
Txajũ' vxite yu' dxi'pte fxne'sx avxythethna dxi'pa's aphçxatx uka'kana na'jĩ':
—Mjiyu wakx ¿kimga idxa's uka'ka'? jĩnatx npeevxysxika'. Aça' policiawe'sxwa txã'wẽytxi dxi'pte uka'ka'.
Pedro' patxute ũste', teeçx u'y sacerdote npiiçthẽ'ja's selpisáa kũhçxa',
Pedro's uyku txã'wẽ ipx bajçxna u'pte. Sa' dxi'pte ew thegçxa, na'jĩnak we'we:
—Idxwa Nasarethuwe'sx Jesus yakh u'jusag jĩte',
Pedro' ĩsxĩik:
—Adxa' txã'sa' jiimeeth kimnane'kwe we'we na'swa jĩçxa', kasehna u'jçxa ekajuk ũsu'. Naapkaçxha' atalx we'wek.
Aça' txãa u'ya' Pedro's ki' uyçxa' kxtee ũssatxi' na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' pejka Jesus yakh yuh u'jusa' jĩnak we'we.
Nawa Pedro yu' ki'kin ĩsxĩik. Aça' txãa e'su' kxtee ũssawa Pedro's na'jĩnatx we'we:
—Isa, idxa' txãa yakh yuh u'jusag. Galileajuwe'sxçxa íig txãjũ nasa na'wẽ we'we' jĩte',
Pedro' ũusçxa we'wena jurãyku:
—Isa Dxus uyte, i'kwe'sx kxsuusu'i'kwe txãa piçthẽ'ja's jiimeeth jĩçpkaçxha',
atalxa' e'z us we'wek. Txajũ' Pedro' Jesus we'weni's yajkxku: Atalx e'z us we'wemeyna, idxa' tekh us ĩsxĩijaç yã'j yuune'ga adxa's jiimeeth jĩni's. Aça' Jesus we'weni kxtey yuute', Pedro' wala ũ'nek.
Txajũ' khikhyna sẽjẽçte', sacerdotewe'sx judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx, Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx yã'jçxa walasa pwe'sx pkhaakheçxa Jesusa's tudçxa jxũna u'jtx Pilato tasxte kuutxa'jya'.
Aça' Pilato' Jesusa's na'jĩnak pẽjx:
—¿Idx wáa judiuwe'sxtxi jxkaahsane'ga? jĩte', Jesusa' pasku:
—Txã'wẽ íith. Isa yuh we'weg jĩk.
Txajũ' sacerdotewe'sxa' Jesusa' kĩhtewa jxuka ewmeesa' jĩnatx yuwe ũsu'.
Aça' Pilato' ki' we'wek Jesusa's:
—Mwẽesẽ'j, idxa's na'wẽtx kĩhtewa jxuka ewmeesa' jĩna yuwe ũsu', aça' ¿ma'wẽçxáawa pasya'wameegá'? jĩte',
Jesusa' teeçx yuweçxáa yuhwa we'weme', aça' Pilato' kujk yajkxna neeyũu.
Pilato' Paskua fxiesta iisa teeçx preesu txhweete'k nasaa pẽyni's.
Txãa ensu' kxte preesu ũsu'k Barabás yaasesa. Txãa piçthẽ'ja' vxite nasa yakh pkhaakheçxa gobierno yakh puíi kiisçxa nasatx wala kiikhe'jsa npiiçthẽ'kh yu'. Txãa pa'gak preesu ũsu'.
Txajũ' kxtee nasa pa'jsa', Pilato's pẽjxtxi fxiesta iisa ma'wẽne' yũ' txã'sa' ãçxwa txã'wẽy yũukahn.
Aça' Pilato' pẽjxku:
—I'kwe'sxa' ¿judiuwe'sxtxi jxkaahsa'skwe txhweete jxthãasu'á'? jĩk.
Nawa Pilato yu' sacerdote ne'jwe'sxa' Jesusa's ahçeçxa dukhtewa jiiçxak txã'wẽ we'we.
Nawa sacerdotewe'sxa' nasa jxukaysatx yu'kxwe'wetx, wejxwa Barabasna mitxhwete jĩkahn.
Aça' Pilato' pẽjxku:
—I'kwe'sx we'weçxa', Judiuwe'sxtxi Jxkaahsa jĩ'i'kwe ¿txã'sa' kĩjkwe yũu jxthãasu'? jĩte',
txãawe'sx sus we'wena pasçxa':
—Txã'sa' kluuskhẽ mkaafxuçu'j jĩtx.
Txajũ' Pilato' pẽjxku:
—Txã'wẽ yũukahna' naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿kĩhga ewmée yũu? jĩtewa, txãawe'sx yu':
—Kluuskhẽ mkaafxuçu'j jĩnaçxáatx sus we'we'.
Aça' Pilato' nasa yakh ew neeyũu wẽeçxa, Barabasa's txhweetekaakh, sa' Jesus yu'sa' kaapeçxukwe'jçxa kluuskhẽ fxuçkahn dukhku.
Txajũ' soldauwe'sxa' Jesusa's jxũna u'jtx txãawe'sx ũsni patxute. Sa' soldauwe'sx jxukaysatx kxteeçxaçxáatx pa'ya.
Khĩçxatx Jesusa's jxkaahsa ropa na'wẽsa kaapã'çxi'jçxa, dxikthete yu' çhũçh korona vxitçxa kaafxĩkhe'j.
Txajũ' na'wẽ sus weyna:
—Judiuwe'sxtxi jxkaahsath jĩ'ne'ga jĩnatx weeçx we'we.
Sa' dxikthega fxtũu zuzsaju pekwe'kwena, fxne'sx avxythethnatx txajx tasxte peejxũkwe'.
Txã'wẽ yũuna jxã'jçxa', jxkaahsa ropa na'wẽsa's ksũupi'jçxa, txajx ropa's ki' kaathe'jtx. Txã'wẽ yũuçxatx kluuskhẽ fxuçya' jxũna u'j.

Aça' çxhabu kasehna u'jweçte', teeçx piçthẽ'j Simon yaasesa's puutx uyçxa soldauwe'sxa' txã'snatx Jesus yakhni kluusa's kxaakhe'jçxa pe'jna u'j. Txãa Simon yu' Alejandro Rufxowe'sx neyku yu', Cirene kiwetewe'sx.
Txajũ' Jesusa's teeçx ahte Golgota yaasesatetx pe'jna u'j. Txãa Golgota yu' Uusáa Dxikthé Dxi'thçxáasa jĩni'.
Kxtee pa'jçxa', vxinote yaasa ka'daçxatx yus wẽe, nawa Jesusa' tudxme'.
Txajũ' kluuskhẽ fxuççxa', soldauwe'sxa' Jesus ropatxi's txudeedeçxa swerte kaahtx txajx kaaçni atxha's maa soldau knaytewa jiyuya'.
Kusíi las nwewetetx Jesusa's kluuskhẽ fxuç.
Sa' kĩh yũusate txã'wẽ kluuskhẽ fxuççxawa pta'sxna fxi'jçxa ki'ptxi kluus vxiçte: Judiuwe'sxtxi Jxkaahsa' jĩna.
E'z nasa seena' yuuwesa yu'tx txãawe'sx yakhtxi Jesusa's pdxi'p kluuskhẽ fxuç.
Aça' Dxus librute fxi'jni' kxtey yuuk: Nasa ewmeesathas yuuwesa yakhku ki'pni yuu jĩna fxi'jni'.
Txajũ' kluus tasxuy uykhẽwsa' dxikthetx kaawũhnatx weeçx we'we':
—Dxuus yata's idxa' pẽtxçxa tekh ente' ki' kiisu'nja ¿jĩ'çmeegá'?
Txã'wẽ ãjãwa'jsaçxa' ¿mjĩitega kluusuh peekíi iyuçxa sa'ja'çmée? jĩ'tx.
Aça' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx, vxite' sacerdotewe'sxwa na'jĩnatx weeçx we'we':
—Vxite yuutxi' nwe'weçxawa, peekíi yu' ya'nwe'weya' ãjã'çme'.

Israelwe'sxtxi jxkaahsa Kristoth jĩ'k na' txã'wẽ dxihçxa', ãçxhíi kwe'sx uyna ũste kluusuh sa'jana aç yuuçxáa txã'wẽ dxih yu'ga sũjũ'nja'w jĩ'tx. Txã'wẽy txãa yakh kluuskhẽ fxuçni u'psawe'sxwa Jesusa's wẽesxu'tx.
Txajũ' ẽepxãh wala ãanite', naa kiwete jxuka çxhi'dxku kusuçte las trestepkaçx.
Txã'wẽ çxhi'dxni las tres ãjãçpkaçxha', Jesusa' na'jĩnak sus we'we:
—Eloi, Eloi ¿lama sabaktani? jĩk. Txã': Adx Dxusgu sa' ¿mjĩi pa'gaga adxçxáana nvxiht? jĩni'.
Aça' nasa kxtee wẽsẽ'jna ũssa' Eliasa's pa'yaça' jĩtx.
Naapkaçxha' teeçxsa' wuwuuna u'jçxa, vxino pussate esponja's akhçxa fxtũute açhçxa Jesus yuwete utxak çxazxakahn. Sa' na'jĩk:
—Sxuuna' thegna meswe, aan Eliasa' kluusuh spajkxya' pa'jana jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' ki'kin sus we'wenitee uuna kãjk.
Naapkaçxha' dxuus yatte txudenisa liensu pesath a'kxnisa' peekxçxáa sutek puupxãjkhẽ kute ẽeju kiwete kĩh.
Aça' kluus dxi'pte ũssa soldau kpiitana' Jesus txã'wẽ sus we'weçxa uuçte uyçxa', na'wẽk we'we:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' isa Dxus Nçxi'k yuh yu'ga jĩk.
Txã'wẽy u'ywe'sxwa jxu'ju thegna ũsu'tx. Aça' txãawe'sx ksxavxyte', Salomé, vxite' Maria Magdalena vxite' Maria Jakobo Josewe'sx njĩ'j txãawe'sxtxi yu'. (Txãa Jakobo's nuuçxsa' jĩ'tx).
Naa tekh u'ysa' Jesusa's selpiina u'jusatx yu' Galilea kiwesu. Nawa txãawe'sxçxáamée, vxite u'ywe'sxwa Jesus yakh ih Jerusalente pa'jsatx ũsu'.
Jxkaasewa'j en ãjãçte', kĩhnawa jxuka pheu'jçxatx nvxiitu'.
Txãa pa'gak kusuçte' José Arimateajũwe'sxa' Pilato tasxte ũukhmée utxáa Jesus kakwe's pẽjxya'. Txãa José yu' judiu ne'jwe'sxsa íiçxáak yu', sa' Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena' dud ãhwaça' sũhna yaakxsak yu'.
Txã'wẽ Jesusa' uuyã'kh jĩni's jiyuçxa', Pilato' wala kuh yajkxçxa soldau kpiitana's pa'yak pẽjxya' txã'wẽ Jesus uudxihtewa jiyuya'.
Txajũ' kpiitana': Jesusa' uuyã'kh jĩna pta'sxte', Pilato' Jesus kakwe's jxũna u'khaakh.
Aça' Josea' Jesus kakwe's spajkxçxa, liensu fxinusa weyçxa kxteek yap. Sa' jxũna u'jçxa kwet kafx u'se phadenisa ji'phuk txkaa khikhçxa, u'kani kafxte yu' kwet walasajuk aph.
Txã'wẽ yũuçte', Maria Magdalena vxite Maria José njĩ'j txãawe'sxa' Jesus kakwe's mkaa khikheçtewa uytxi.
Txajũ' jxkaase en skhẽwniite', Maria Magdalena vxite' Maria Jakobo njĩ'j, vxite' Salomé txãawe'sxa' wẽt putasá weytxi Jesus kakwete sxũsxya' u'jya'.
Txajũ' kuskuskhẽ wala kusíi u'jtx, sa' sek kãjaçte' pedaní kafxte pa'jtx.
Sa' kxtee pa'jaççxa', na'jĩnatx txãawe'sx pwe'sx we'we':
—¿Kim pedaní kafxte aphnisa kwet wala's kiisukx? jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' pedaní kafxte thegçxa', aphnisa kwet wala' kiisçxa pukate ki'pni u'ptetx uy.
Aça' pedaní kafxte u'kaçxa', teeçx piçtakx ropa çxihmesa jxu'jsa athçxa paçu ju'gu kaçxçxa u'pte uyçxa', wala ũukhtxi.
Nawa txãa piçtakxa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Ũukhnuwe. I'kwe'sxa' Jesus Nasarethuwe'sxa's kluuskhẽ fxuçni uuk txã'snai'kwe pakwé'. Nawa txã' ĩtxĩ yuuyã'kh, txãasa ayga meeyã'ja'. Aça' khikhniga mthegwe wakx, kĩhwa meea' jĩçxa' kaakh na'jĩna:
Txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx vxite' Pedro txãawe'sxtxi na'jĩne'kwe: Jesusa' i'kwe'sx yaçte u'jweça' Galilean, aça' kxtee txã'sa' uyuune'kwe ma'wẽga uumeywa pta'sx txã'sa' kxtey yuuna jĩkaathe',
txãawe'sxa' pedaní kafxu wala ũukhna ũphna u'jçxa, kuh yaakxnite vxitesa yuutxi' dxi'the kim yuhtxwa pta'sxmeetx u'j.
Txã'wẽ jxkaase en skhẽwnijũ' Jesusa' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuçxa', Maria Magdalena khuẽ'yna vxyaak, na'wẽ siete eçx luuku vxit-satx kutxi'kh txã'sna.
Aça' txãa u'ya' Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sx tasxna u'jçxa, pta'sxku. Txãawe'sxa' nxusçxa ũ'nenatx u'p yu'.
Sa' Jesusa' ĩtxĩ yuuga aça' ũ'kwe' uythu jĩna pta'sxtewa, weh yuhwa txã'wẽ yũune' sũjũ'çmeeta' txãawe'sxa'.
Txãa entey Jesusa' ki' vxyaak fxiy yuuçxa, txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx e'zsa dxi'the u'jweçte.
Aça' txãawe'sxwa ki' sxawedçxa, Jesusa's txã'wẽ uytha'w jĩna vxitetx pta'sxtewa, txã'wẽ uyne'ta sũjũ'çmeeta'.
Txã'wẽ pta'sxna jxã'jaçpkaçxha', txãa yakh u'jusa oncesa mesate kaçxçxa u'pte ki' vxyaaçxa', na'jĩk:
—¿Kĩh yuuçxakwe adxa'sa' ki' ĩtxĩ yuune' sũjũ'çmée? Adx pta'sxni's ũuste yu'akhya' ãjã'çmeei'kwe, sa' ĩtxĩ yuute uysáa pta'sxtewa txã'wẽ uyne'ta sũjũ'çmeei'kwe.
Txajũ' na'jĩnak jxkaah:
—Me'jwe, Dxus yuwe's pta'sxya' nasa jxukaysatx maa kiwete mteewa jxuka.
Aça' maawa adxa's ũusuh jxuka yajkxna jxpa'gaçxa yu'te ya'bautisaĩna txã' nwe'weni yuuna. Nawa adxa's ũusuh jxuka yajkxna jxpa'gasame' Dxus kastigo's knayuuna.
Adxa's ũusuh jxuka yajkxna jxpa'gasa' na'wẽ yũuya' ãjãtxna: Adx pu'çxte', eçx luuku vxit-satxwa nasaa ũusuh kutxi'jitxna. Sa' yuwe fxiysajuwa we'wetxna.
Ul wesweetxwa kuseju uweetxna. Sa' makwe weneno's tudxtewa, kĩh yuhwa kãaçã'jmeena kakwete. Sa' ãçã'sa kakwete peekiizeçxa, Dxus yakh puutx we'wete', katxhitxna jĩk.
Txã'wẽ yu'kxpehni e'su', kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesusa' cielun pe'jna u'jni yuuçxa, Dxus pukate kaçxku paçu ju'gte.
Aça' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' u'jçxa', Dxus yuwe's mtee mteewa pta'sxtxi. Txã'wẽ kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa pu'çxte', kĩjkĩh yũuya'wa ya'ãjãk, txãa pa'gatx txajx we'weni' isasa yuhna sũhwa'ja's ji'phu'.
Luke: Adx namiku Teófxilo, idxa's khiyu'jna fxi'jaçthu kwe'sx ensu na'wẽ yuuk txã'sna. Txã'sa' txã'wẽ yũuya' takheçíyna, Kristo yakh u'jusawe'sxa' ma'wẽçxahne'ta ew uy txã'wẽytxi txãawe'sxa' kwe'sxtxi pta'sx, aça' txã'sa' maawa txã'wẽyta ew pta'sxna fxi'jçxa nvxiit wẽe. Txãa pa'ga adxwa ma'wẽçxahne' yũu txã'sa' wala ew jxpa'yakx paapẽjxçxa idxna pta'sxna fxi'jaçthu, kxah isa yuh pta'sxi'ne'ta sũjũne'ga.

Adx namiku Teófxilo, idxa's khiyu'jna fxi'jaçthu kwe'sx ensu na'wẽ yuuk txã'sna. Txã'sa' txã'wẽ yũuya' takheçíyna, Kristo yakh u'jusawe'sxa' ma'wẽçxahne'ta ew uy txã'wẽytxi txãawe'sxa' kwe'sxtxi pta'sx, aça' txã'sa' maawa txã'wẽyta ew pta'sxna fxi'jçxa nvxiit wẽe. Txãa pa'ga adxwa ma'wẽçxahne' yũu txã'sa' wala ew jxpa'yakx paapẽjxçxa idxna pta'sxna fxi'jaçthu, kxah isa yuh pta'sxi'ne'ta sũjũne'ga.

Adx namiku Teófxilo, idxa's khiyu'jna fxi'jaçthu kwe'sx ensu na'wẽ yuuk txã'sna. Txã'sa' txã'wẽ yũuya' takheçíyna, Kristo yakh u'jusawe'sxa' ma'wẽçxahne'ta ew uy txã'wẽytxi txãawe'sxa' kwe'sxtxi pta'sx, aça' txã'sa' maawa txã'wẽyta ew pta'sxna fxi'jçxa nvxiit wẽe. Txãa pa'ga adxwa ma'wẽçxahne' yũu txã'sa' wala ew jxpa'yakx paapẽjxçxa idxna pta'sxna fxi'jaçthu, kxah isa yuh pta'sxi'ne'ta sũjũne'ga.

Adx namiku Teófxilo, idxa's khiyu'jna fxi'jaçthu kwe'sx ensu na'wẽ yuuk txã'sna. Txã'sa' txã'wẽ yũuya' takheçíyna, Kristo yakh u'jusawe'sxa' ma'wẽçxahne'ta ew uy txã'wẽytxi txãawe'sxa' kwe'sxtxi pta'sx, aça' txã'sa' maawa txã'wẽyta ew pta'sxna fxi'jçxa nvxiit wẽe. Txãa pa'ga adxwa ma'wẽçxahne' yũu txã'sa' wala ew jxpa'yakx paapẽjxçxa idxna pta'sxna fxi'jaçthu, kxah isa yuh pta'sxi'ne'ta sũjũne'ga.
Judea kiwete ne'jwe'sx Herodes ensu', teeçx sacerdote Zakarias yaasesak u'pu'. Txãa yu', sacerdote ne'jwe'sx Abias ji'kh yu'. Aça' txajx nyu Elisabet yu', Aarón ji'kh yu'.
Ptamíi Dxus jxkaahnitxi' nwẽesẽ'jsatx yu', txãa pa'ga Dxus dxi'pte ew fxi'zesatx yu'.
Nawa txãawe'sxa' luuçx ji'phmeetx yu', Elisabetha' luuçx ji'phuwa'jsameene' yu' naa pa'ga. Khĩçxawa wala thẽ'khwe yã'j yu'tx.
Zakarias yakh ũssawe'sxtxi dxuus yatte selpiwa'j en ãhte', na'wẽk yuu:
Dxuus yat altalte wẽt putasá incienso's kabxa' u'kawa'jsa kimtewa jiyuya', sacerdotewe'sxa' swerte na'wẽsa kutxi'jtx. Aça' kxteea' Zakariasku kaseh.
Txajũ' Zakariasa' Dxus altalte wẽt putasa's kabuçte', nasa pa'jsa' jxukaysa ekajuçxáatx Dxus yakh puutx we'wena ũsu'.
Naapkaçxha' Zakariasa's vxyaak Dxus jxkaahni teeçx angel altal pukate paçu ju'gte.
Aça' Zakariasa' txã's uyçxa', kuh yajkxna wala ũukhku.
Nawa txãa angel yu' na'jĩk:
—Zakarias, ũukhnu. Iidx pxthaa we'weni's Dxus pasçxa kxtey yuuça', aça' iidx nyu Elisabetha' luuçx ji'phuna. Txãa luuçxa's Juan yasene'ga.
Txã'wẽ yuute', idxa' wala weçxana neeyũune'ga, aça' maawa txã'wẽçxaçxáa weçxaatxna txajx upxni's jiyuçxa',
txãa pa'gatey txãa luuçxa' Dxus dxi'pte walasa yuuwa'jsa'. Txãasa kĩhwa ktũ'ju'jwa'jsa yu'sa' tudxmeena, naasáa Dxus Espiritu yuuçxáana ũuste jxuka ji'phuna njĩ'j tutxhu yuu kasehmey.
Sa' Israel kiwesuwe'sxtxi maazkuẽesatxwa taki'sa Dxus tasxtey ki' kuutxa'jana.

Txãa Juana' Dxus Nçxi'k yaçte pekũjuna, sa' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Elias Espiritu kĩhtewa ãjawa'jsa's ji'phu'k txã'sna íiçxáa ji'phuna. Txãasa neywe'sxtxi luuçx yakh kaapui'jmée kaafxi'ze'jena, sa' nwẽesẽ'jsameetxwa nwẽesẽ'jya' kaapiya'jana. Txã'wẽ yũuna nasatx pheu'juna Dxus Nçxi'ka's jxpa'gakahn jĩte',
Zakariasa' na'jĩnak pẽjx:
—Kwe'sxa' ptamíi wala thẽ'jyã'tha'w, aça' ¿ma'wẽ yũuçxa iidx txã'jĩni' kxtey yuune'thewa ew jii neeyũuki'th? jĩk.
Aça' Dxus angela' pta'sxku:
—Adxa' Dxusna selpiina fxi'zesa Gabrielthu. Txãa pa'gak adxa's jxkaah, idxa's naa yuwe ewsa's pta'sxkahn.
Nawa adx pta'sxni's txã'wẽ dxih yuuna sũhmeeg naa pa'ga ãçxhíi we'weya' ewumée neeyũune'ga iidx nçxi'k upxpkaçx jĩk.
Dxuus yat dxiite txã'wẽ jxthẽeyũute', ekaju nasa yu' Zakariasa's ũythasnatx ũsu', ¿kĩh yuuçxaki'k txakwe jxthẽeyũu? sũhna.
Txajũ' Zakariasa' kasehçxa', we'weya' ãjãmeeçxa', kuseju vxijxaçxaçxáak khiyu'ju'. Aça' txã'wẽ yũute', dxuus yat dxiite kĩja' uyyuhne' sũjũ'tx nasa yu'. Sa' Zakariasa' txã'wẽesa neeyũuk.
Dxuus yatte selpiina jxã'jçxa', Zakariasa' txajx yatna u'kh.
Txãa ensu' Zakarias nyu Elisabetha' nasa ji'ph neeyũuçxa', txajx yatu kasehmeek u'pu' tahç a'tepkaçx, naa sũhna:
Ãçxha' ũ'kwe Dxusa' na'wẽk yũu, aça' nasa' ũ'kwe's peena yu' açewe'wemeetxna sũhna.
Elisabetha' nasa ji'ph neeyũuni seis a'teju', Dxusa' angel Gabriela's Galileasu teeçx çxhab Nasaret yaasesatek kaah,
teeçx kna'sa Maria yaasesa yatte pa'jçxa' yuwe pta'sxkahn. Txãa kna'sa yu', teeçx piçthẽ'j Jose yaasesa yakh iimi'ya' puutx we'weçxak u'p yu'. Txãa Jose' jxkaahsa Davxid ji'kh yu'.
Aça' Dxus angela' Maria u'pnite pa'jçxa' na'jĩk:
—Dxusa' ijçxa yakh ũsa', naa pa'ga Dxus bediciona's maa maa u'ytewa jxthaakwe jxpa'gaçxa u'pi'çxa. Txãasa weçxana me'pçxi ewçxáa jĩte',
Maria' Dxus angel we'weni's wẽsẽ'jçxa thegçxa', kujk yajkx ¿ma'wẽteki'k txã'jĩ'? sũhna.
Aça' Dxus angela' na'jĩk:
—Maria, ũukhnuçx, Dxus peeygãanisa i'çxa.
Txãa pa'ga ãçxhíi teeçx luuçx pihç ji'ph neeyũuçxa txã'sa' Jesus yasene'çxka.
