Txãa luuçxa' jxtuhthe walasa yuuwa'jsa'. Txãasa cielute Dxus Nçxi'k ya'kxsusuna. Aça' txã'sa' Dxusa' jxkaahwa'jsa vxituna, yaçgathẽ'j Davxid na'wẽysa.
Kxah Israelwe'sxtxi kiiwey jxkaajana, nawa txajx jxkaahni' bagaçxte yuhwa pçumeena jĩk.
Txajũ' Maria' txãa angela's pẽjxku:
—¿Ma'wẽ txã'wẽ yuja' yũukx? Ũ'kwe' kna'sa nmi' ji'phmeeth açyuja' jĩte',
angela' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Dxus Espiritu' içxa kakwe's txãaçxaçxáa jxuka iiyamuna. Txã'wẽ yuuniteçxáa nasa vxyaana. Txãa pa'ga luuçx upxsa' Dxus jĩi yuuna, sa' Dxus Nçxi'k ya'kxsusuna.
Txã'wẽy içxa pukakhẽ nyakh Elisabethwa luuçx pihç ji'phuya'wa', thẽ'khuẽ yã'jçxawa. Bagaçx yuhwa nasa ji'phusameeçxawa, ãçxha' seis a'te yã'j yuuça' nasa ji'phuni.
Dxus yakha' kĩh yuhwa thẽysa yu' meea' jĩna pta'sxte',
Maria pasçxa':
—Txã'wẽ', ũ'kwe' Dxusna selpisáa ne'tka, aça' ũ'kwe's Dxusa' kxtey yuuna na'wẽg pta'sx txã'sa' jĩk.
Txajũ' Dxus angela' Maria tasxu txuteena u'kh.
Txãa ensuy Maria' jxthẽeyũumée u'kh Judea thã'jsu teeçx çxhab ũsu'k kxtee pa'jya'.
Sa' Zakarias yatte pa'jçxa', Maria' Elisabetha's weçxak.
Maria weçxana we'weni's wẽsẽ'jeçpkaçxha', Elisabet nasa tutxhtewe'sxa' ẽsẽk. Naapkaçxha' Dxus Espiritu' Elisabet ũuste jxuka kaajiyu'kh.
Aça' Elisabetha' Maria's na'jĩnak sus we'we:
—Dxusa' ijçxa's maa maa u'ytewa jxthaakwek bedekĩy, sa' txã'wẽyku içxa nçxi'ka'swa bedekĩy.
Aça' ũ'kwe' ¿kĩhte seelpitka açga ũ'kwe's Nwe'wesa njĩ'ja' thegya' pa'já'?
Içxa weçxana we'weni's wẽsẽ'jeçpkaçxha', ũ'kwe luuçx tutxhtewe'sxa' ẽsẽk weçxana.
Dxus we'weni' kxtey yuuna sũhpa'ga, kxtey yuuya'wa' aça' weçxana mfxi'zeçx jĩk.
Aça' Maria we'weçxa':
Ũ'kwe' ũusuh jxukath Dxusa's weçxá'.
Sa' ũ'kwe Dxus nwe'wesa's ũuste peçxkanameeth weçxana fxi'ze'.
Txã'wẽ makwe pxthaa ãhmeekuẽtewa, Dxusa' peeygãhçxa txã'sna selpiwa'jsa vxitku.
Aça' ãçxhũyã'ja' ũ'kwe's Dxus txhitxhnisak yu' jĩna nes yuutxna maa nasawa jxuka.
Txã'wẽ yaakxkahníiçxáak Dxus txakwe walasa ũ'kwe's txakwe ew yũu.
Txã' wala peeygãasa'.
Txãasa maawa txã'sna nwẽesẽ'jsatxi' bagaçxtewa peeygãhna nes yuuna.
Dxusa' kĩjkĩhnawa jxukak vxit, sa' ũuste iiwejçx yaakxsatxwa kpaasu'jme'.
Jxkaahsatxwa txãawe'sx jxkaahnijũ kutxi'kh,
Sa' kĩhtewa ãhmée pxthaakuẽsatxi' walasak vxit.
Kĩhwa ji'phmée peejiina fxi'zesatxi' txãawe'sx peejini's jxukak ũs.
Sa' wala ji'phsa yuutxi'sa' kĩhwa ji'phmeek nvxiht.
Txã's selpisáa Israel nasatxi' pu'çxku,
Sa' peeygãhna fxi'zewa'ja's peçxkaname'.
Ma'wẽne' kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx Abrahanwe'sxtxi bagaçxtewa ew yũuya' neeyũu, txã'sa' kxteyku yuu jĩk.
Txajũ' Maria' Elisabet yakh tekh a'te u'pçxak txajx yatnay ki' sxawedna u'j.
Txãa ensu' Elisabet ãçã'wa'j ãhte', luuçx pihç ji'phuk.
Aça' Elisabet nwe'sx vxite' namikuwe'sxwa jiyuçxa', weçxaya' u'jtx Dxusa' Elisabetha's txã'wẽ ew yũupa'ga.
Txajũ' teeçx ki'sute', luuçxa's cirkuncidãyya' u'jtx. Sa' ney yase Zakariastxi ki'p wẽe.
Nawa njĩ'j we'weçxa':
—Txã'wẽmée wejxwa Juan yasewa'ja' jĩte', pi'kxna u'jsawe'sx pasçxa':
—I'kwe nwe'sxa' maa yuhwa Juan yaasesa meetx yu' aça' ¿ma'wẽtekwe Juan yase ki'p wẽjẽ'? jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' neya's pẽjxtxi ma'wẽ yasewa'thewa.
Aça' neya' Juan yasewa'ja' jĩnak fxi'jçxa ũs. Txã'wẽ yũute', jxukaysa kuhtx yajkxna neeyũu.
Txãa dudtey Zakarias ki' we'weya' ewuuçxa', Dxusa's seena' wala weçxak.
Txã'wẽ yũute', kxsũ utxasũ u'psa' wala ũukh we'wena neeyũutx. Aça' Judea thã'jsuwe'sxwa txã'wẽ yũuni's jxuka jiyutx puutx ya'pta'sxna.
Txã'wẽ jiyuçxa', na'wẽtx yajkxna puutx paapẽyĩ':
—Isa, txãa luuçxa' Dxus bedekĩynisane' yu' sa' ¿ma'wẽ yũuwa'jsakx? jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' Juan ney Zakariasa's Dxus Espiritu txajx ũuste kwe'we'the', na'jĩnak ãate pta'sx:
Israelwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Dxusa' kĩhtewa jxuka ewsa'.
Kwe'sxa' txajx nasatha'w, aça' nwe'weya' kĩhçxa', ewte nvxihtku.
Dxusna selpisáa Davxid ji'thewe'sx teeçx kaakh kĩhtewa jxuka nwe'weya' ãjãwa'jsa.
Nyafxiitey Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx yakhwa na'wẽk puutx we'we nwe'weya' kaahwa'ja's:
Kwe'sxtxi açesawe'sx kuseju nwe'weçxa ewte nvxiitu'nja,
Sa' kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxtxiwa peeygãhna, txã'wẽ adx puutx we'weni yuutxi' le'çxkuẽçxáa yuhwa peçxkaname'nja jĩ'k.
Sa' kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx Abrahan yakhwa txã'wẽyku na'wẽ puutx we'wena jurãy:
Kwe'sxtxi açesawe'sx kuseju nwe'weçxa ewte nvxiitu'nja, aça' ũukhmée mselpiiwe,
Adx yuuçxáana nwẽesẽ'jna uu entepkaçx jĩ'k.
Aça' adx nçxi'kkuẽ idxa' Dxus ĩtxĩsa yuwee pta'sxsa yuuçxa, kwe'sxtxi Nwe'wesa pa'jwa'ja's pheu'jna pekũjune'ga yaçte.
Kxah nasa' pkalpa'ga peltunãywa'ja's maawa jiyuçxa, ewte neeyũuwa'ja's ji'phutxna.
Kwe'sx Dxusa' peeygãhçxa, cielujuy sek na'wẽ kaakweethe'kh,
Çxhi'dxte uu ente na'wẽ yã'j ũstewa, wẽt eena'te nvxiht-ya'.
Sa' kwe'sxtxiwa jxpubamée ewte kaafxi'ze'jya'k txã'wẽ yũu jĩnak we'we Zakariasa'.
Txajũ' Juana' walaana u'kh Dxus yuwe's jiyuna, sa' nasa u'pnimée kiwesuk u'p-ya' u'j, Israelwe'sxtxi pta'sxya' kasehwa'j en ãhpkaçx.
Txãn ensu' Romate jxkaahsa Augusto Cesara' txajx jxkaahni kiwesu nyafxçxah nasatx jxuka eçte ãsxkahn jxkaakh,
Siriate u'psa ne'jwe'sx Cirenio yaasesa's.
Aça' jxukaysatx u'jwa'j ji'phu' txãawe'sx upxni çxhabte, eçte ãsxkahn.
Txãa pa'gak Jose' Nasaret çxhab Galilea kiweju kasehna u'j Judea kiwen Belen çxhab Davxid upxnite, Jose' Davxid ji'kh yu' naa pa'ga.
Belenna u'jweççxa', txajx nyu yuuwa'jsa Maria yakhku u'j. Nawa Maria' nasak ji'ph yu'.
Aça' Belente ũsíyna, Maria's ãçã'wa'j en ãhte',
kxtee ji'phuk nyafx nçxi'kkuẽ's. Sa' paadeewa'j yat ãhmeete', klaa sã'jĩni yattek luuçxkuẽ's yapçxa khikh.
Belen utxasu kuswa dehméetx piisxáa-thegsa u'p yu'.
Naapkaçxha' Dxus angel teeçx vxyaak txãawe'sx u'pnisu jxuka eena' kweethna. Aça' txãawe'sxa' wala ũukhtxi.
Nawa Dxus angela' na'wẽk we'we:
—Ũukhnuwe, yuwe ewsa jxũna yuhth, txã'sa' maawa jxuka wala weçxaatxna.
Ãçxha' Davxid çxhabte teeçx upxku i'kwe'sxtxi nwe'wewa'jsa txã' Dxus kaahni Kristo'.
Aça' thegya' u'jçxa', uyuune'kwe luuçxkuẽ's yapçxa klaa sã'jĩni yatga khikhni ũste jĩçpkaçxha',
txãa dudtey txãa angel yakh wala kuh angel cielujũwe'sx vxyaatx, Dxusna weçxana:
¡Dxus ẽe walatewe'sxa' seena' yuh ew yuuk!
Naa kiwete nasa wẽtwẽt fxi'zewa'ja's ũsku peeygãhçxa jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' angeleswe'sxa' cielun ki' sxawedna u'jweçpkaçxha', piisxáa-thegsawe'sxa' puutx we'wetx:
—Belenna u'jwega Dxus pta'sxni's thegya' kĩh yũutewa uyu'nja'w jĩna.
Txajũ' wala dud u'jtx Belenna, sa' Mariawe'sxtxi' uytxi txã'wẽ luuçxkuẽ's klaa sã'jĩni yatga khikhçxa u'pte.
Sa' luuçxa's uyçxa', Dxus angel ma'wẽ we'weni'swa jxuka pta'sxtxi Mariawe'sxtxi.
Txajũ' vxitetxwa txã'wẽçxaçxáa pta'sxte', wala kuh we'wena neeyũutx.
Nawa Maria yu', txã'wẽ yũuni's jxuka peçxkanamée ũusteçxáak yajkxna fxi'ze'.
Txajũ' piisxáa-thegsawe'sxa' Dxus angel ma'wẽ pta'sxtewa txã' kxtey yuutewa uyçxa', Dxusa's wala weçxana sxawedna u'jtx.
Upxnijũ teeçx ki'sute' luuçxkuẽ's cirkuncidãyya' u'jçxa txãa entey JESUS yasetx, Maria nasa ji'phumeyna Dxus angel ma'wẽne' yase's pta'sx txã'wẽytxi yase.
Moises leya' nasate ãçã'satx ma'wẽne' ki'skaja' aça' Maria' txãa entxi kxtey yuuçxa', Jose yakh luuçxkuẽ's Jerusalen çxhabna jxũna u'jtx, dxuus yatte Dxusna weçxana neewe'weya'.
Dxus leyte we'weçxa': Nyafxte piçkuẽ yũute', Dxus jĩi nvxiitwa'ja' jĩ'k txãa pa'gatx Dxusna neewe'weya' u'j.
Vxite ahte Dxus leyte we'weçxa': e'z tub çxihme meeçxawa tub luuçx jxũna u'jçxa dxuus yatte ikhwa'ja' jĩ'k aça' txã'wẽy yũuya' u'jtx.

Txãn ensu' Jerusalen çxhabte' teeçx piçthẽ'j Simeon yaasesak u'pu'. Txãa piçthẽ'ja' Dxusna yuuçxáak neewe'wena fxi'zesa yu', ¿bagaçx Israelwe'sxtxi nwe'wewa'jsa pa'jakx? sũhna ũythãsna. Aça' Dxus Espiritu' Simeona's kaajiyu'kh
Nwe'wewa'jsa Dxus kaahni Kristo's uumey uywa'ja's.
Sa' Dxus Espiritu' Simeona's kaayaki'kh dxuus yatna u'jwa'ja's, aça' u'jçxa' uyku txã'wẽ Jesus njĩ'jwe'sxa' Dxus ley jxkaahni's kxtey yuuya' Jesusa's nuypa'jaçte.
Aça' Simeona' txãa luuçxkuẽ's yakhçxa na'jĩnak Dxusna weçxa:
Idxa' adx yakh puutx we'weni's kxtey yuug na' ãçxhã' adx uuwa'ja's ũsune'ga weçxana uukahn.
Nwe'wesa's nasa jxukaysa dxi'pte kaag.
Aça' txã'sa' adx yafxju yuu uythu.
Txãaíi Israel nasa meetxwa eena' kweethwa'jsa' na' Israelwe'sx yuutxi' jweeíiçxáa weçxweçxa kaayaki'jwa'jsa' jĩ'k.
Simeona' txãa luuçxkuẽ's txã'wẽ we'wete', Jose ptamwe'sxa' kuhtx yajkxna neeyũu.
Aça' Simeona' bedekĩyçxa', Jesus njĩ'j Maria's pta'sxku:
—Mwẽesẽ'çx, naa luuçxkuẽ' Israelwe'sxtxi wala kçxhãaçxha'jwa'jsa' nawa txã'sna jiyusamée yu' wala jxpubawa'jsata'. Mpa'yajkxwe wakx txã'sa' wala açetxna.
Aça' maaçxah txã'wẽ açewa'jsatxna aça' maaçxah txã'wẽ jxpa'gawa'jsatewa txã'wẽ yũunisa içxa ũusuy we'thu yãjãni na'wẽ yuuna jĩk.
Kxteea' Fxanwel niisa, Aser ji'kh ũsu' wala thẽ'khuẽsa Ana yaasesa. Txã' Dxusna selpisaak yu' sa' wala kna'satey iimi'k nawa siete anxute' nmi'a' uuk.
Ãçxha' nmi' uuni oçxenta y kuatro anxu', nawa dxuus yatte pu'vxitumée een isak Dxusna selpiina, orãyna nes yu'.
Sa' Ana' utxaana kũhçxa, Dxusna weçxaçxa' pta'sxku Israelwe'sxtxi nwe'wewa'jsa's ũythãsna ũssawe'sxtxi's: Naa luuçx txã'wẽ yũuwa'jsa' jĩna.
Txajũ' Dxus jxkaahni leya's kxtey yuuçxa', Galilea kiwesu txãawe'sx çxhab Nasaretnay Maria Josewe'sxa' sxawedtxi.
Aça' luuçxkuẽ' walaana u'kh Dxus yuwe's jweeíiçxáa piyana, txã'sa' Dxusíi pu'çxhi'ne' naa pa'ga.
Jesus njĩ'jwe'sxa' anxu iisatx Jerusalen çxhabna Paskua fxiestan u'jwe'.
Sa' Jesus doce anxu ji'phpkaçxha', Jerusalen çxhabna fxiestate ki' u'jtx, ma'wẽne'ta anxu iisa u'jwe' txã'wẽy.
Aça' fxiesta pçuute', Maria Jose yakh sxawedna u'jtx. Sa' txãawe'sx jiyunimeete Jesusa' Jerusalentee neeyũuk.
Nawa njĩ'jwe'sx yu', Jesusa' nasa wala ksxavxyte yuhna sũhnaçxáatx teen uta dxi'the u'j.
Txajũ' nwe'sx ksxavxysu jxuka pakweçxawa uymeeçxa', Jerusalen çxhabnay pakweya' sxawedtxi.
Sa' tekh ensu' dxuus yatte ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx ksxavxyte wẽsẽ'jna paapẽjxna u'ptetx uy.
Txã'wẽ luuçxkuẽçxáaçxawa txakwe wala leya's jiiçxa ew paste', jxukaysa kxtee wẽsẽ'jna ũssa' wala kuh yaaki'tx.
Txajũ' njĩ'jwe'sx uyçxa', kuhtx yajkx sa' njĩ'ja' na'jĩk:
—Idxa' ¿kĩjxa'ga pta'sxmée txã'wẽ neeyũu? Kwe'sxa' wala nxusna pakwetha'w jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Adxa' Adx Tata jxthãasniçxá's selpiina u'pthu aça' ¿kĩjxa'kwe adxa's pakwé'? jĩte',
txajx pasni'sa' jiyuya' ãjãmeeta'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' neywe'sx yakh Nasaretnay sxawedna u'jçxa txãawe'sxtxi nwẽesẽ'jnak fxi'ze. Aça' txajx njĩ'ja' ma'wẽ we'weni'swa jiyumeeçxawa txajx ũuste peçxkana yu' meek yajkxna fxi'ze'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' walaana u'kh Dxus yuwe's jweeíiçxáa piyana, sa' Dxus dxi'pte ew yũuçxak fxi'ze, nasaa dxi'ptewa txã'wẽy.

Tiberio Cesar Romate jxkaahna u'pni kince anxusu' Poncio Pilato' Judeate ne'jwe'sxku yu' aça' Herodesa' Galileate ne'jwe'sxku yu'. Naapkaçxha' txajx nyakh Fxelipe' Iturea vxite' Trakonitete ne'jwe'sxku yu'. Aça' Lisaniasa' Abiliniate ne'jwe'sxku yu'.
Naapkaçxha' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx yu' Anas vxite' Kaifxas txãawe'sxtxi yu'. Txãn ensuk Dxusa' txajx yuwe's nasa u'pnimeesu pta'sxya' u'khan pa'ya Zakarias nçxi'k Juana's.
Aça' Juana' Jordan yu'wala utxasu msuu msuuwa jxuka pekũjk nasatx pta'sxna:
—I'kwe'sx pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedçxa yu'te mkhẽewe ya'bautisãyna, i'kwe'sxtxi Dxus peltunãykahn jĩ'k.
Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Isaias na'jĩna fxi'jni' kxtey yuuk:
Nasa u'pnimée kiwesu sus we'wenik pthũuse' na'jĩna:
Dxus pa'jwa'ja's mpheu'jwe,
Txã' thẽymée pa'khan.
Kiwe kafx u'psuwa jxuka yuutawa'j yuuna,
Sa' thã'j wala vxite' vxiç ma'k yuu nawa jxuka uukwe'jni yuutxna.
Dxi'j ta'gusawa ku'le'jni yuutxna.
Dxi'j ewmeesa's pheu'jni yuutxna.
Aça' nasa jxukaysa uyuutxna nwe'wewa'jsa Dxus kaahnisa's jĩna fxi'jni'.
Juan tasxte ya'bautisãyya' pa'jsatxi' na'jĩnak we'we:
—I'kwe'sxa' ul weesweesa ji'ji'kwe, txãa pa'ga kastigo seena'sa yuja' aça' txajũ iyuwa'ja's ¿kimga pta'sx?

Txã'wẽ kastigo seena'saju iyuwa'ja's jiyuyã'jçxa', ewçxáa yũuna mfxi'zewe, kxah maawa uysa': Naawe'sxa' pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawed yuhta sũjũtxna. Txã'jĩte', kwe'sxa' Abrahan ji'tha'w sũhna iiwejçx yajkxna fxi'zewa'jme'. Na'jĩ'th na': I'kwe'sxçxáamée naa kwet yuhtxwa Abrahan ji'j vxit-ya' ãjãna Dxusa'.
Txã'wẽ ewçxáa yũuna fxi'zemeete', ama' ih yã'j ũsa' fxtũu tasxtxi spẽ'thya'. Maa fxtũu tasxwa ew yũnmeena aça' spẽ'thçxa ipxte kabwa'jçxáa yuuna jĩnak yu'kxpeh.
Txã'jĩte' nasa' paapẽjxtxi:
—¿Kĩhçxa yũuna ewçxáa fxi'zekxtha'w? jĩte',
Juan pasçxa':
—E'z atxh ji'phçxa', ji'phmeesa'sa' teeçx ũswa'ja'. Aça' ũ'niwa jxthaakwe ji'phçxa', vxite ji'phmeesa's puuçwa'ja' jĩk.
Txã'wẽy gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsawe'sxwa yu'te ya'bautisãyya' utxaaçxa', Juana's na'wẽtx paapẽjx:
—Mpeeta'sx, kwe'sxa' ¿ma'wẽ yũuna fxi'zekxtha'w? jĩte',
Juan pasçxa':
—Ley makwene' vxyu's pẽykaja' txã'sçxáana mpẽjxwe, ĩsxĩiçxa thaakwe pẽjxmée jĩk.
Txajũ' soldauwe'sxwa maaíi yũ' txã'wẽy pẽjxtxi:
—Kwe'sxa' ¿ma'wẽ yũuna fxi'zekxtha'w? jĩte', txãawe'sxtxiwa pta'sxku Juana':
—Maa nasa yuhtxwa juuna' we'weçxa txãawe'sx jĩitx kusa'jnuwe kĩh yuhnawa. Sa' kĩh yuhwa yuuwemeetewa ĩsxĩiçxa pãatxhĩ'khna fxi'zenuwe. Sa' i'kwe'sxtxi makwe dewetewa txãa yakhçxáa weçxana mfxi'zewe.
Txã'wẽ we'wena ũste', nasa wẽsẽ'jsa yu' wala yajkxna ũsu'tx: Meeçxa' ¿naa wáa Kristona? sũhna.
Aça' Juana' jxukaysatx pta'sxku:

—Adxa' bautisãyna naasáa yu'teçxáath akhe'. Nawa adx e'suh vxite yuja', txã' Dxus Espiritu ipx na'wẽsa's i'kwe'sx ũuste kxu'akhe'jya' ãjãwa'jsa'. Aça' adxa' txajx pelgatxi wesçxáa yuhtxwa khihbxa' ãjãwa'jmeesath.
Txã' yujxa' skuutxh kweejxa'jni plaatu's kusete at yã'jçxa ũsa'. Sa' kweejxa'jçxa skuutxha's jxaawuuna, nawa tama'sa' ipx bagaçxte yuhwa ũçxhawa'jmeesate kabuna jĩk.
Txã'wẽk wala kuh jwed yu'kxpehna Dxus yuwe's pta'sxi' Juana'.

Sa' ne'jwe'sx Herodesa'swa yu'kxpejk txã'wẽ nyakh Fxelipe nyu Herodiasa's kusa'jçxa, txãa yakh nyu na'wẽ fxi'zeçxa vxite' kĩhwa ewmeeçxáak yũuna ũsu'. Aça' txãa pa'gak txã'wẽ yũuwa'jme' jĩna yu'kxpeh Juana'.
Nawa Herodesa' nwẽesẽ'jepkaçxte jweeíiçxáak thaakwe ewmée yũu, Juana's karcelte kaakxuupha'jna.
Txã'wẽ yũumeyna Juana' nasatx yu'te bautisãyna ũste', Jesuswa pa'jçxa yu'te ya'bautisãyku. Sa' oraĩçpkaçxha', cielu' phaatek.
Aça' Dxus Espiritu' Jesus kajkwete tub çxihme na'wẽsak vxyaana kĩh. Naapkaçxha' cieluju na'wẽ we'wenik pthũuse:
—Idxa' adx Nçxi'k wala wedxnisag, aça' iidxpa'ga wala weçxana ũsthu jĩni.
Jesusa' treinta anxu ji'phçxak Dxus yuwe's pta'sxya' takh. Jesusa' Jose nçxi'ka' jĩnisak yu'. Josea', Eli nçxi'kku yu'.
Elia', Matat nçxi'kku yu'. Matatha', Levxi nçxi'kku yu'. Levxia', Melki nçxi'kku yu'. Melkia', Jana nçxi'kku yu'. Jana', Jose nçxi'kku yu'.
Josea', Matatias nçxi'kku yu'. Matatiasa', Amos nçxi'kku yu'. Amosa', Nahum nçxi'kku yu'. Nahuma', Esli nçxi'kku yu'. Esli', Nagai nçxi'kku yu'.
Nagaia', Maat nçxi'kku yu'. Maatha', Matatias nçxi'kku yu'. Matatiasa', Semei nçxi'kku yu'. Semei', Jose nçxi'kku yu'. Josea', Juda nçxi'kku yu'.
Juda', Joana nçxi'kku yu'. Joana', Resa nçxi'kku yu'. Resa', Zorobabel nçxi'kku yu'. Zorobabela', Salatiel nçxi'kku yu'. Salatiela', Neri nçxi'kku yu'.
Neri', Melki nçxi'kku yu'. Melkia', Adi nçxi'kku yu'. Adi', Kosam nçxi'kku yu'. Kosama', Elmodam nçxi'kku yu'. Elmodama', Er nçxi'kku yu'.
Era', Joswe nçxi'kku yu'. Joswe', Eliezer nçxi'kku yu'. Eliezera', Jorim nçxi'kku yu'. Jorima', Matat nçxi'kku yu'.
Matatha', Levxi nçxi'kku yu'. Levxia', Simeon nçxi'kku yu'. Simeona', Juda nçxi'kku yu'. Juda', Jose nçxi'kku yu'. Josea', Jonan nçxi'kku yu', Jonana', Eliakim nçxi'kku yu'.
Eliakima', Melea nçxi'kku yu'. Melea', Mainan nçxi'kku yu'. Mainana', Matata nçxi'kku yu'. Matata', Natan nçxi'kku yu'.
Natana', Davxid nçxi'kku yu'. Davxida', Isaí nçxi'kku yu'. Isaía', Obed nçxi'kku yu'. Obeda', Booz nçxi'kku yu'. Booza', Salmon nçxi'kku yu'. Salmona', Naason nçxi'kku yu'.
Naasona', Aminadab nçxi'kku yu'. Aminadaba', Aram nçxi'kku yu'. Arama', Esrom nçxi'kku yu'. Esroma', Fxares nçxi'kku yu', Fxaresa', Juda nçxi'kku yu'.
Juda', Jakob nçxi'kku yu'. Jakoba', Isaak nçxi'kku yu'. Isaakha', Abrahan nçxi'kku yu'. Abrahana', Tare nçxi'kku yu'. Tare', Nakor nçxi'kku yu'.
Nakora', Serug nçxi'kku yu'. Seruga', Ragau nçxi'kku yu'. Ragaua', Peleg nçxi'kku yu'. Pelega', Heber nçxi'kku yu'. Hebera', Sala nçxi'kku yu'.
Sala', Kainan nçxi'kku yu'. Kainana', Arfxaxad nçxi'kku yu'. Arfxaxada', Sem nçxi'kku yu'. Sema', Noe nçxi'kku yu'. Noe', Lamek nçxi'kku yu'.
Lamekha', Matusalen nçxi'kku yu'. Matusalena', Enok nçxi'kku yu'. Enokha', Jared nçxi'kku yu'. Jareda', Mahalaleel nçxi'kku yu'. Mahalaleela', Kainan nçxi'kku yu'.
Kainana', Enos nçxi'kku yu'. Enosa', Set nçxi'kku yu'. Setha', Adan nçxi'kku yu'. Adan yu', Dxus kuseju yuu pheu'jnisak yu'.
Dxus Espiritu Jesusa's jxpe'jya' jxukate vxyaanijũ', Jesusa' Jordan yu'walaju kasejk, aça' Espiritu' pe'jna u'kh nasa u'pnimeesu.
Kxteea' kuarenta en kĩh yuhwa ũ'mée u'pçxa', wẽek. Aça' eçxthẽ'ja' pa'kh ewmée vxit wẽeçxa.
Sa' pa'jçxa na'jĩk:
—Dxus Nçxi'k dxihçxa', naa kweta's pan myuukaah jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Nasa' pan yakhçxáa yu' ĩtxĩ fxi'zemeetxna, naasáa jxuka Dxus we'weni yakh yuuçxáa ĩtxĩ fxi'zetxna jĩna fxi'jni ũsa' Dxus librute' jĩnak pas.
Txajũ' eçxthẽ'ja' teeçx thã'the Jesusa's pe'jna u'jçxa', txãa vxiçu mtee mtee çxhab walatxwa kaavxya'ja'jçxa,
na'jĩk:
—Naa çxhabtxi petx kiwe kĩjkĩhtxwa jxuka idxçxaçxá's ũsu'nja. Na' jxuka adx kuseteçxaçxáa dukhnisata' aça' maawa adx wedxnisa yu'sa' ũsuçxá'nja.
Idxwa adx tasxte peejxũkweçxa neewe'wene'ga aça', jxuka iidx jĩiçxaçxáa yuutxna jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Idxna jxpe'jsa Dxusçxá's neewe'wewa'ja', sa' txãaçxá's selpiwa'ja' jĩ'k Dxus librute aça' eçxthẽ'j adx tasxu me'j jĩk.
Txãa e'su', eçxthẽ'ja' Jesusa's Jerusalenna pe'jna u'jçxa, dxuus yat ẽete kaateka'jçxa' na'jĩk:
—Dxus Nçxi'k dxihçxa', kute ayjxu mũph kiwekhẽ.
Txãa pa'gatey Dxus librute we'weçxa': Txajx angeleswe'sxtxi jxkaajana idxa's nwe'wekahn.
Aça' angeleswe'sxa' kusete jxpa'gatxna, iidx çxida kwette kpã'yũukahmén jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Dxus librute': Idxna jxpe'jsa Dxusa's jxkaahwa'j ji'phmeeg jĩ'k jĩna paste',
eçxthẽ'ja' ãjãmée yã'jçxa', Jesusa's nvxihtçxa u'kh sa' maz en yu' vxyaame'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Dxus Espiritu jxpe'jni ki' Galileate sxawedna pa'the', txãa kiwesu nasa' jxuka Jesusçxaçxá'stxi we'we' kĩjkĩhwa yũ'k jĩna.
Txajũ' Jesusa' judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenisu Dxus yuwe's kaapiya'the', jxukaysa wala weçxana tuuthe'je'tx.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Nasaretnak u'j, txajx walaní çxhabna. Sa' kxte pa'jçxa', sapatu jxkaase ensu' ma'wẽne' yũ' txã'wẽy, judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenite u'kaçxa yujuk Dxus libru's lẽeyya'.
Aça' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Isaias libru'stxi ũs. Aça' na'wẽ fxi'jnikhẽk libru's phaade:
Dxus Espiritu' adx yakh ũsa',
Txãasak adxa's txhitxh yuwe ewsa's puupletx pta'sxkahn.
Ũuste nxusna u'psatxku kvxiisxa'jya' adxa's kaah,
Yuuwesa preesutx nwe'wewa'ja'sku pta'sxya' kaah,
Sa' uysameetxi' kaauyu'jna,
Pkxuunisatxi' nwe'weçxa,
Jxukasa weçxana neeyũuwa'j anxu ãani's pta'sxya'k kaah jĩni's lẽeyçxa',
Jesusa' libru's aphçxa, judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenite pu'çxsa's dukhna'wa, kaçxku. Aça' jxukaysa judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenite ũssa' ivxiitumeetx Jesusa's thegna neeyũu ũythãsna.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Na'wẽ fxi'jnisa's wẽsẽ'ji'kwe txã' ãçxhã' kxtey yuuwa'j en ãjk jĩk.
Txajũ' jxukaysa Jesusa's ewçxáatx we'wena kuh yajkxna neeyũu, txã'wẽ zhiçxkwe pta'sxte'. Sa' puutx paapẽyi'tx:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿Jose nçxi'k meená'? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':

—Isa yuuwa i'kwe'sxa' adxa's naa sũjũ'ne'kwe: Yu'çe'jsa, idxíi mya'yu'çe'j. Sa' na'jĩya'wane'kwe: Kapernaumte kĩjkĩhwa ew yũuk jĩni's wẽsẽ'je'tha'w txãatxi' txã'wẽy myũu ayte iidx kiwetewa jĩya'wane'kwe jĩçxa',
ki' we'wek:
—Isath we'we': Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa' peekx kiwesu' weeçxni yuuçxáa fxi'zetxna maawa.
Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Elias ensu Israel kiwesu' wala kuh vxiuda ũsu'tx, na'wẽ tekh anxu y medio nus pa'jmeete', wala wẽjẽ pa'kh txãa ensu.
Nawa Dxusa' Eliasa's kxazkuẽ vxiuda tasxsu jxuka yu' kaahmée, naasáa Sidon çxhab wala pukasu Sareptate teeçx vxiuda tasxte yuuçxáak kaah.
Txã'wẽy Israel kiwesu' wã'jy weete wala ãçã'sa ũsu'tx, Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Eliseo ensu. Nawa maa yuhtxwa nuykatxhimée, naasáa Naaman Siria kiwetewe'sx yuuçxá'sku nuykatxhi jĩte',
wẽsẽ'jçxa', judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenite u'psa' wala ũusaçxana,
kiiteçxa Jesusa's çxhabuh kutxi'jtx. Txãa çxhab Nasaret yu', thã'j vxiçgak ũsu', aça' txãa penxa vxiçuhtx ukapajkxya'wa yu'.
Nawa Jesusa' txãawe'sx ksxavxysu uymeyna skhẽwçxa u'kh.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Galileate Kapernaum çxhabte pa'jçxa', sapatu jxkaase ensu' Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna ũsu'k.
Aça' nasa' wala kuh yajkxna wẽsẽ'je'tx, txã'wẽ Dxusa's nwẽese'jwa'ja's ũukhnus pta'sxpa'ga.
Aça' kxte judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenite teeçx piçthẽ'j u'pu'k, eçx iiyamunisa. Txã' susku na'jĩna we'we:
—Jesus Nasarethuwe'sx, kwe'sxtxi' ¿kĩhga yũu wẽjẽ'? Kuçx yuunu. Meeçxa' ¿ivxiituya'wagá'? Idx kimtewa jiith. Idxa' Dxus kaahnisag jĩte',
Jesusa' txãa eçx luuku vxit-sa's juuna'k na'jĩna we'we:
—Sxuuna' myuu, sa' naa piçthẽ'j ũusuh mkaaseh jĩte', txãa eçxa' txãa piçthẽ'ja's nasaa ksxavxysu pẽtxçxa txajx ũusuh kasejk kĩh yuhwa kpã'vxitmée.
Txã'wẽ yũute', jxukaysa ũukhçxa txãawe'sx pwe'sx na'jĩnatx puutx we'we':
—Jesusa' ¿kimki saki'k txã'wẽ juuna' jxkaahna we'weteçxáa eçx yuhwa nwẽesẽ'jçxa' kaseje'? jĩ'tx.
Aça' Jesus txã'wẽ yũuni's msuuwa jxukatx wala tuuthe'je' txãa ja'dasu.
Txajũ' Jesusa' judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenijũ kasehçxa', Simon yattek pa'j. Aça' Simon nyu njĩ'ja' wala kakwesekte ãçã'na ũsu'k. Txajũ' Jesusa's pxthaa we'wena pta'sxtxi.
Aça' Jesusa' ãçã'sa tasxte kũhçxa kakwesek ũçxhakahn we'wek. Naapkaçxha' kakweseka' ũçxhate', kiiteçxa selpiiya' kasejk.
Txajũ' sek khẽjẽçte', nasa kĩjkĩh weeteçxah ãçã'satxwa jxuka Jesus tasxte nuypa'jtx. Aça' ãçã'sa kakwesu kuseju jxa'dxçxaçxáa jxuka nuykatxhik.
Txãa ãçã'sawe'sx maaíi yu' eçx luuku vxit-sa's ũuste ji'phtewa txãa eçxwa suhs na'jĩna kasehtx:
—Idxa' Dxus Nçxi'kgu jĩna. Txãawe'sxa' Dxus Nçxi'ktewa jiitx yu'.
Nawa Jesusa' juuna' we'weçxa jwee yu' kwe'we'jme'.
Khikhiiçte', Jesusa' çxhab eka jxu'j lajkxsuk kaseh. Nawa nasa' kxteewa pakwena pa'jtx, vxite ahsu u'khamén neevxisxaya'.
Nawa Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx txãawe'sxtxi':
—Dxus jxkaahwa'j yuwe's pta'sxwa'j ji'pthu vxite çxhabsuwa. Txã'wẽ yũuya' íiçxáa kaahnisath jĩk.
Txãasak Galilea kiwesu judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenisu Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna pekũh.
Teeçx ente' Jesusa' Genesaret ĩkh pukate ũste', nasa' kxtee zuuna'çxáatx utana pa'j Dxus yuwe's wẽsẽ'j wẽeçxa.
Txajũ' Jesusa' e'z barko ĩkh pukasu namu ji'phmée ũstek uy, namu wedx-uwesaawe'sx yu' kasehçxa, wedx ukhetx thethnatx ũs yu'.
Aça' Jesusa' teeçx barko Simon jĩite khẽeçxa', yu'te wejkuẽ u'jçxak, kxtee kaçxçxa, Dxus yuwe's pta'sx nasatx.
Sa' Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna jxã'jçxa', Simona's na'jĩk:
—Barko's ĩkh wala pxãhte pa'j jxũna u'jçxa txkhẽe ukhe's makh wedx uweya' jĩte',
Simon pasçxa':
—Kwe'sxa' teeçx kus utatha'w mjĩina pe'te, nawa teeçx wedxçxáa yuhwa uwemeetha'w. Nawa iidx jxkaahni's kxtey yu'nja jĩçxa',
kxtey yuute', wedx wala kuh khẽetx, aça' ukhe' suteeçku yu'.
Txajũ' vxite barkote ũssatx pu'çxya' yuukahn kuseju pa'yatx. Aça' txãawe'sxwa kũhçxa', kasxisx pu'çxçxa txãawe'sx jĩitewa ãsxtxi. Nawa e'z barkotey utaçxa dujuaate', ĩkh dxiikhẽ khẽeya'watx yu'.
Txã'wẽ yuute', Simon Pedro' Jesus tasxte peejxũkweçxa na'jĩk:
—Adxa' pkalsath aça' adx tasxu mtxutée jĩk.
Kxaazkuẽe wedx khẽete', Simon Pedro' wala ũukhçxak txã'jĩ', aça' nasa kxtee ũssawa txã'wẽytxi ũukh.
Zebedeo nçxi'kwe'sx Jakobo Juan txãawe'sxa' Simon yakh wedx uwe pu'çxna u'jusatx yu' sa' txãawe'sxwa txã'wẽytxi wala ũukh. Nawa Jesusa' Simona's na'jĩk:
—Ũukhnu, ãçxhũyã'ja' peena yu' wedx uwen u'jumée nasatx Dxus jĩi pkhakhsa yuune'ga jĩte',
barkotx ĩkh pukatee jxuka nvxihtna'wa Jesus yakh u'jtx.
Jesusa' teeçx çxhabte ũste', teeçx piçthẽ'j wã'jy wee seena' kazx ji'phsak pa'j. Sa' Jesusa's uyna'wa, kĩiçhuçxa peejxũkwek na'jĩna:
—Adxa's nuykatxhiwá'ga ahçemeeçxa' jĩte',
Jesusa' kuseju jxa'dxna'wa, na'jĩk:
—Ahçeme'nja, naa pa'ga katxhiçxa mneeyũu jĩçpkaçxha', txãa wã'jy weeju katxhiçxak neeyũu.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk jxkaah:

—Maa yuhtxwa pta'sxmeene'ga, naasáa sacerdoteçxá's iidx kakwe's txwesya' me'j. Sa' txãa weeju katxhipa'ga Dxusna peesune'ga Moises ma'wẽga jxkaah txã'wẽy, kxah nasa jxukaysa jiyutxna idx ew katxhiçxa neeyũutewa jĩnak jxkaah.
Tuuthe'khameetewa, nasa' jweeíiçxáatx Jesus ew yũuni's tuuthe'je'. Aça' wẽsẽ'jya' wala pkhaakhe'tx, ãçã'satxwa kĩh weejuwa nuykatxhikahn.
Nawa Jesusa' nasa u'pnimeesu u'jçxak, Dxus yakh puutx we'we'.

Jesusa' teeçx çxhabte Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna ũste', kxteea' fxariseowe'sx vxite' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sxwa Galileaju Judeaju vxite' Jerusalenu txajũwe'sx pa'jçxatx kxsũ kaçxçxa u'pu'. Aça' Dxus pu'çxni yakha' Jesusa' ãçã'satxwa nuykatxhi'k.
Txajũ' ẽsẽya' ãjãsameea's yakhçxa nuypa'jtx. Sa' Jesus tasxte pa'j nuykũh wẽetx.
Nawa nasa wala ũste', u'kaya' ãjãmeeçxa yat ẽete tejkaçxatx txkhẽ nuykĩh ãçã'sa's Jesus ũsnikhẽ.
Txajũ' ãçã'sa's yakhsawe'sxa' Jesusa' nuykatxhiyujuna sũhni's jiyuçxa', ãçã'sa's na'jĩk:
—Iidx pkala' peltunãyni yã'jtx neeyũu jĩte',

Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' fxariseowe'sxa' ũuste na'wẽtx yajkxna u'pu': Naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿kiimna saga Dxusa's iiweeçx we'wé'? Dxus yuuçxáa pkaltxi peltunãyya' ãjawa'jsa', aça' jweeju yu' ¿kimçxá' peltunãyya' ãjãma'k? sũjũ'tx.
Aça' Jesusa' txãawe'sx ũuste yaakxni's jiyuçxa' na'jĩk:
—¿Kĩh yũutekwe txã'wẽ yaakí'? ¿Maa thẽymeesakx? Iidx pkala' peltunãyni yã'jtx neeyũu ¿jĩniá'? Meeçxa': Kiiteçxa me'j ¿jĩniá'?
Txã'wẽ thẽysatewa Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusá' naa kiwete pkaltxi peltunãyya' ãjãwa'jsa' naa pa'ga kaajiyu'jya'wath ãçxha' jĩçxa', txajũ' txãa ẽsẽya' ãjãsameea's we'wek:
—Idxa'sthu we'we': Kiiteçxa iidx deeni's tu'sçxa yatna me'j jĩte',
dudtey txãa ãçã'sa' kiitena' txajx deeni's tu'sçxa yatna u'kh, Dxusna weçxana tuuthe'jna.
Jxukaysa kxtee ũssa' wala kuh yajkxna we'wena, Dxusçxáanatx weçxana tuuthe'je' sa' txã'wẽ ũukhnawa na'jĩ'tx:
—Bagaçx yuhwa txã'wẽ yũunisa yu'sa' iiuymeetha'w jĩ'tx.
Txãa skhẽwa', Jesusa' kasehçxa', gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsa Levxi yaasesa's vxyu pkhakhnite kaçxçxa u'pte uyçxa':
—Adx yakh myuh jĩte',
Levxia' kiitena'wa kĩhnawa jxuka nvxihtçxa Jesus yakh u'kh.
Txãa e'su', Levxia' txajx yatte fxiesta wala ewsa vxitku Jesusa's pi'kxçxa'. Aça' kxte' gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsawe'sx wala kuhsa vxite' nasa ma'wẽsawa Jesus yakh ih mesate kaçxtxi.
Aça' fxariseowe'sx vxite' ley kaapiya'jsawe'sxa' Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi' na'wẽtx açewe'we:
—I'kwe'sxa' ¿ma'wẽtekwe txã'wẽ gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsawe'sx yakh vxite' pkalsawe'sx yakh ũ'wé'? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Yu'çe'jsa's jxpeejxmeeta' aka ji'phmée wẽt ũssa', naasáa ãçã'sa yuuçxáa yu'çe'jsa's jxpeejxta'.
Adxa' nasa ewsatx pakweya' kĩhmeeth, naasáa pkalsatx pakweya'çxáath kĩh, kxah ewmée yũuna fxi'zeni's nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxaweduutxna jĩk.
Txajũ' txãawe'sxa' Jesusa's na'wẽtx paapẽjx:
—¿Ma'wẽçxata Juan yakh u'jusa vxite' fxariseowe'sx yakh u'jusa txãawe'sxa' tahtatey yũunaana Dxus yakh puutx we'wena fxi'ze'? Naapkaçxha' idx yakh u'jusawe'sx yu' yũunameetx fxi'ze' jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—I'kwe'sxa' ¿ptamu en fxiestate', pi'kxnisatxi' kaayũuna'jya' ãjãma'kwe, novxio txãawe'sx yakh nee ũsiite'?
Nawa novxio' txãawe'sx tasxu txuteewa'j en pa'jana, txajũ isa yũunaatxna jĩçxa',
naa ejemplo's kaaja'da'jnak pta'sx:
—Ropa ĩisx suteniite, tela u'sesa yakh ya'pã'khe'çme'. Txã'wẽme' tela u'sesa' jweeíiçxáak sude' ĩisxsa's.
Sa' txã'wẽy beka u'se aahnisa's slun ĩisxsate ya'awu'çme'. Txã'wẽme' beka u'sesa' slun ĩisxsa's sude'k, aça' beka yakh slun yakh e'zíi vxitu'tx.
Txãa pa'ga beka u'sesa's slun u'sesate awwa'ja'. Txã'wẽ yu', maa yuhwa vxitumeetxna.
Aça' maawa beka jxaawniisa's tudxsa', beka u'sesa's yu' tudxya' wa'lu'k, jxaawniisaçxáa jxthaakwe ewa' jĩçxa.
Teeçx sapatu jxkaase ente', Jesusa' skuutxh ehsu u'jweçte', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' skuutxhtxi ũhdena nxinxtxi sũupi'jçxa ũ'tx.
Aça' fxariseowe'sx maaíi yu' pẽjxtxi:
—I'kwe'sxa' ¿mjĩipa'gakwe mjĩi en meetewa txã'wẽ yũ'? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—I'kwe'sxa' Dxus librute iilẽeymeewá'kwe' Davxida' ¿kĩhga yũu? txãa yakh pi'kxna u'jusawe'sx yakh teeçx ente' wẽeçxa',
dxuus yatte u'kaçxa kxtee pantxi ũ'k, sa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxiwa ũsu'sku. Txãa pana' naasáa sacerdotewe'sxçxáa ũ'wa'the jiiçxawa txã'wẽk yũu.
Aça' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusaawa makwe sapatu jxkaase entewa jxkaahwa'j ji'pha' jĩk.
Vxite sapatu jxkaase ensu', Jesusa' judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenite u'kaçxa, Dxus yuwe's pta'sxya' takhku. Aça' kxte' teeçx piçthẽ'j paçu kuse udxnisak u'p yu'.
Aça' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' fxariseowe'sxa' Jesusa's peethegu'natx ũsu' txã'wẽ sapatu jxkaase entewa nuykatxhite' pãatxhĩ'khya' sũhçxa.
Nawa Jesusa' peethegu'sawe'sx txã'wẽ ũus yaakxni's jiyuçxa', na'jĩk txãa piçthẽ'j kuse udxnisa's:
—Kiiteçxa, nasaa pxãhte myuju jĩte', txãa piçthẽ'ja' nasaa pxãhtek yuju.
Aça' Jesusa' nasa kxte ũssatx na'jĩk:
—I'kwe'sx ¿ma'jĩki'kwe? Sapatu jxkaase entewa, pu'çxte ¿ewmanx? meeçxa' ¿pu'çxwa'jmeemanx? Nasa's nwe'wete ¿ewmanx? meeçxa' nwe'wemeete ¿ewmanx? jĩçxa',
Jesusa' nasatx thegçxa', txãa ãçã'sa's na'wẽk jxkaah:
—Kuse's mku'le'j jĩçpkaçxha' txã'wẽy yũute', txajx kuse' ewuuk.
Nawa vxitesa yu' wala ũusaçxatx, sa' puutx paapẽyi'tx: Jesusa's ¿ma'wẽ yũuçxa ewmeete nvxiitukxtha'w? jĩna.
Txãn ensuy Jesusa' Dxusna pẽjxya' u'kh thã'the sa' teeçx kus utak Dxusna pẽjxna pe'te.
Sa' khikhyna sẽhte', txã'sna pi'kxna u'jusa kuhsatx pa'yaçxa', doce nasa txhitxhku txajx jxkaahwa'j.
Txãawe'sxa' naaçxahtx yu': Simon, txã'sa' Pedro yasek ki'p. Vxite' nyakh Adres, txajũ' Jakobo, Juan, Fxelipe, Bartolomé,
Mateo, Tomas, Alfxeo nçxi'k Jakobo, Simon kananista nasa,
Jakobo nyakh Judas, vxite' Judas Iskariote, Jesusa's açesawe'sx kusete dukhwa'jsa.

Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh thã'j vxiçu jxsa'jna kĩhçxa', teeçx ahte txaktek yuju nasa wala kuhsawe'sx yakh. Txãa nasa' Judea kiwesuwe'sx, Jerusalen çxhabuwe'sx, vxite' ĩkh wala pukasu Tiro Sidon çxhabsuwe'sxtxi Jesus pta'sxni's wẽsẽ'jya' pa'j, aça' vxite' ãçã'sa Jesus nuykatxhikahntxi pa'j.
Sa' eçx luuku vxit-satx ũuste ji'phsawa Jesus kutxi'the', katxhiçxatx neeyũ'.
Aça' nasa jxukaysa kxte ũssa' Jesusa's jxa'dxya' wala pa'pçxu'tx, txã'wẽ jxa'dxçxaçxáa maawa katxhiçtetx uyu', txãasatx txã'wẽy yũu wẽjẽ'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi thegçxa', na'jĩk:
—I'kwe'sxa' kĩhwa ji'phmeeçxawa kuh yajkxmée weçxana mfxi'zewe, txãa pa'gatey Dxus jxkaahna ũsni' i'kwe'sx jĩ' naa pa'ga.
I'kwe'sxa' ãçxhíi yu' wẽena ũsçxawa weçxana meswe, txãa pa'gatey wala sã'jĩni yuune'kwe.
I'kwe'sxa' ãçxhíi yu' nxusna ũsçxawa weçxana meswe, txãa pa'gatey sxijkana fxi'zewa'ja's jxpa'gawa'jsai'kwe.
I'kwe'sxa' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's nwẽesẽ'pha'ga ewmeesathas i'kwe'sx yasetx açewe'wena txãawe'sx tasxu kutxi'jna txã'wẽ yũuçtewa, weçxana mfxi'zewe.
Txãniitey Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sxtxiwa txã'wẽtx pkxuu na' ãçxwa txã'wẽyçxáa yuutxna. Nawa nxusmée weçxana mfxi'zewe, txãa pa'gatey cielute peesni's jxpa'gawa'j ji'phi'kwe.
Nawa ji'phsawe'sx ãçxhíi weçxana fxi'zeni pçunijũ', wala yuh nxuste pa'jane'kwe.
I'kwe'sxa' ãçxhí' wẽt txikna ũsi'kwe, nawa e'su pxthaa yuh wẽjẽne'kwe. I'kwe'sxa' ãçxhí' sxijkana ũsi'kwe, nawa e'su nxusna ũ'nene'kwe.
I'kwe'sx yu', ãçxhíi yu' maa maa nasawa ewçxáa tuuthe'jni fxi'zeçxawa, e'su nxuste neeyũune'kwe. Nyafxiiteywa Dxus yuwe's pta'sxsatha'w jĩna ĩsxĩina u'jusatxi' txã'wẽtx ewsata' jĩna tuuthe'je'.
Nawa ayte wẽsẽ'jna ũssa i'kwe'sxtxi' na'wẽth jxkaaja': Puíi jxpakwesatxi' mpeeygãhwe. Açesatxi' ew yũuna mfxi'zewe.
Ewmée nuywe'wesatxi's ka'tu' ewçxáa mwe'wewe. Wẽesxusatxi' txãawe'sx pa'gate Dxusa's mneewe'wewe.
Idxa's pukakwetga pehtxate', ka'tuwe'sxa'swa petxakahn mes. Maaí' atxha's kusa'jaçyã'the', puiimée kmiisa yuhnawa mes.
Pe'wsa's mes, sa' iidx jĩ's kusa'jçxa', dukhmeetewa pãatxhĩ'khna pẽynu.
Maa nasawa i'kwe'sxtxi ewçxáa yũuna fxi'ze jxthãasçxa', i'kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy maa nasatxwa ewçxáa yũuna mfxi'zewe.
I'kwe'sxtxi peeygãasaçxáatx ka'tuwa peeygãhçxa', ew yũusatha'w ¿jĩya' ãjãma'kwe? Makwe nasa ewmeesaçxawa txã'wẽ peeygãasaçxáatx peeygãjxa' yu' ãjã'tx aça'.
I'kwe'sxtxi ew yũusaçxáatx ka'tuwa ew yũuçxa', i'kwe'sxa' ew yũusatha'w ¿jĩya' ãjãma'kwe? Makwe pkalsaçxawa txã'wẽ ew yũusaçxáatx ew yũuya' yu' ãjã'tx.
Sa' i'kwe'sxtxi ki' kaasxwedu'jya' ãjãwa'jsaçxá's pki'jçxa', i'kwe'sxa' pu'çxsatha'w ¿jĩya' ãjãma'kwe? Makwe nasa ewmeesaçxawa, txã'wẽ kaasxwedu'jya' ãjãwa'jsaçxáatx pki'jya' yu' ãjã'tx.

Wejxwa i'kwe'sxa' puíi jxpakwesaatx peeygãhna fxi'ze ji'phi'kwe, sa' pki'jçxawa jxthaakwe kaasxwedu'juna sũhmée mfxi'zewe. Txã'wẽ ew yũusaatxi' Dxusa' wala deweena, aça' i'kwe'sxa' cielute Dxus luuçx yuune'kwe, txãa pa'gatey Dxus cielutewe'sxa' txã'sna yaakxsamée makwe ewmeesatewa ka'tu' ewçxáa yũuna ũsa'.
I'kwe'sxa' peeygãasa myuuwe, i'kwe'sx Tatawa ma'wẽ peeygãasana txã'wẽy.

Ma'wẽsatewa jiimeeçxa', ewmeesata' jĩna we'wewa'jme', txã'wẽ yũupa'ga i'kwe'sxwa Dxus dxi'pte ewmeesa yuuya'mée. Vxitetx nuywe'wewa'jme', ka'tuwa nuywe'wekahmén. Ãhmée yũusaatx peltunãywa'ja', Dxuswa i'kwe'sxtxi peltunãykahn.
Vxitetx peeswa'ja', ka'tuwa i'kwe'sxtxi Dxusa' peeskahn. Makwe isaçxa vxitetx peeste', ka'tuwa i'kwe'sxtxi Dxusa' txãa isanitey ew uta pu'kisu'sna zuuna' ãsxçxa peesnisa's jxpa'gane'kwe.
Teeçx ejemplo kaaja'da'jçxa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—¿Yafx ji'phmeesa' vxitewa txã'wẽysa's dxi'the pe'jna u'jya' ãjãma'k? ¿E'zíi kafxkhẽ khẽemeema'tx?
Piyasá' kaapiya'jsate jxthaakwesame'. Nawa maawa jxuka piyan jxã'jçxa yuuçxáa, kaapiya'jsa na'wẽy yuuna.
¿Ma'wẽçxa iidx yakhthẽ'j yafxte kxtã' le'çxkuẽesa khẽeçxa ũstewa, uyya' ãjãki'g? iidx yafxte yu' fxtũ pe'la yuu walasa khẽeçxa ũste'.

¿Ma'wẽçxa iidx yakhthẽ'ja's pẽyiki'g: Iidx yafxte kxtã'a's kutxi'ji'nja jĩna? iidx yafxte yu', fxtũ pe'la walasa khẽeçxa u'ptewa txãa yu'sa' uymeeçxa'. Ãakhẽçxáa ew we'wena u'jusathẽ'j, iidx yafxte fxtũ pe'la walasa khuẽ'yna mkuutxi'j, sa' txã'wẽ yũuçxaçxáa iidx yakhthẽ'j yafxte kxtã' le'çxkuẽsa's kutxi'jya' ãjãne'ga.
Fxtũu tasx ewsa', ewsaíiçxáak yũnu', nawa fxtũu tasx ewmeesa', ewmeesa íiçxáak yũnu'.
Fxtũu tasx ma'wẽsatewa yũntek isa ew ya'jiyu'. Brewa's khãas tasxte ya'ude'çme', sa' uwa's çhũçh tasxte ya'ude'çme'.
Nasa ewsa' ewçxáatx we'we', ewsa's ũuste ji'phna txãa pa'ga. Nawa nasa ewmeesa', kazxçxáatx we'we', txãa pa'gatey ũuste yuu, kazxsa u'pna aça' we'wenisa' ũusuhne' kaseje' naa pa'ga.
I'kwe'sxa' adxa's Jxpe'jsa jĩ'i'kwe sa' ¿kĩh yuuçxakwe adx jxkaahni's kxtey yu'çmée?
Maa nasawa adx tasxte utxaaçxa', adx we'weni's nwẽesẽ'jçxa jxkaahni's kxtey yũusa' txã' na'wẽsa':
Teeçx piçthẽ'ja' yu'wala pukate kwet walate kaaçxida'jçxa yat txajk. Txajũ' yu' walaaçxa', kxsũ afxihbna skhẽwçxawa yata's kẽesẽ'jme', kwette kaaçxida'jçxa txaahnipa'ga.

Nawa maa nasawa adx we'weni's wẽsẽ'jçxawa, adx jxkaahni's kxtey yuumeena txã' teeçx piçthẽ'ja' yu'wala pukate yata's kwetmuse kajkweteçxáa txaahni na'wẽsa'. Yu' walaaçxa', tũçxhaçxa txãa yata's pẽtxçxa jxuka suwku.
Txajũ' Jesusa' nasatx Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna jxã'jçxa', Kapernaum çxhabna u'kh.
Txãa çxhabte' teeçx kpiitan ũsu'k romanowe'sx. Sa' txãa kpiitana' teeçx selpisáa ji'phu'k wala peeygãanisa. Nawa wala ãçã'çxa uuya'wayã'kh yu'.
Txajũ' kpiitana' Jesusa' ma'wẽsatxwa nuykatxhi'k jĩni's wẽsẽ'jçxa', judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenite npiiçthẽ'jsatx jxkaakh Jesusa's pxthaa we'weya', txã'sna selpisa's nuykatxhiya' yuukahn.
Aça' txãawe'sxa' Jesusa's utxaaçxa', na'jĩnatx pxthaa pi'kxna we'we:
—Txãa kpiitana'sa' idx pu'çxwaça' ewna sũjũ'tha'w.
Txã' kwe'sxtxi peeygãhçxa pkhaakhewa'j yat yuhwa ktxaaja'kh naa pa'ga jĩte',
Jesusa' txãawe'sx pe'jni u'kh. Nawa yat utxa pa'jaçteçxáa, kpiitana' txajx namikutx kaakha Jesusa's na'jĩkahn:
—Adxa' wala ãhmeekwesath aça' wejx yuuwa adx yatte u'kaya' yuhmée tee yuu.
Adxa' txã'wẽ ãhmeekwesaçxa íiçxáath idxa's adx yuu pakweya' yujxa' thaame. Aça' wejx yuuwa txãjũçxáa yuwejuçxáa mwe'we aççxáa adxa's selpisa' katxhina.

Adxwa jwee npiiçthẽ'jsa jxkaahni's nwẽesẽ'jna ũsthu, nawa jweeju adx jxkaahnisa soldau ji'pthu. Sa' txãawe'sxtxi' teeçxsa's me'j jĩte', adx jxkaahni's kxtey yu'k. Sa' vxite's pa'yate', txãawa kxtey nwẽesẽ'je'k. Sa' adxa's selpisa's kĩh jxkaathewa, kxtey yu'k jĩnak yuwekaah.
Txajũ' na'wẽ kpiitan yuwe kaahni's Jesus wẽsẽ'jçxa', kuh yajkxnak neeyũu. Sa' e'ste yuusatx thegçxa' na'jĩk:
—Isath we'we', Israelwe'sx mteewe'sx yuhwa txã'wẽ adx we'weteçxáa katxhina sũhsa yu' iiuymeeth naa kpiitan na'wẽsa yu' jĩk.
Txajũ' jxkaahnisawe'sxa' yatnay sxawedçxa', kpiitan jxpe'jnisa' katxhyã'j u'ptetx uy.
Txãa e'su', Jesusa' teeçx çxhab Nain yaasesatek pa'jya' u'j, txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx vxite nasa kuhsa yakh.
Sa' çxhabte u'kaçte', teeçx uusá's pedaaya' nasa wala kuh u'jweçtek uy. Txãa uusá' vxiuda nçxi'k txãaçxáasak yu'.
Aça' Jesus uyçxa', txãa vxiuda's peeygãhçxa kvxiisxa'jna:
—Ũ'nenuçx jĩnak we'we.
Sa' Jesusa' utxaaçxa, taula's jxa'dxku. Aça' yakhçxa u'jsa', nee yujutx. Naapkaçxha' Jesusa' uusá's na'jĩk:
—Piçtakx, mkiite jĩ'th idxa's jĩte',
uusá' kaçxçxa we'wek. Aça' Jesusa' njĩ'ja's dukhku.
Na'wẽ yũuni's nasa uyçxa', jxukaysa wala ũukhçxawa, txã'wẽytxi Dxusa's wala weçxana na'jĩ':
—Dxus jxkaahni wala yuhsa kwe'sx ksxavxyte vxyaak jĩ'tx. Sa' ki' we'weçxa':
—Dxusa' txajx nasatx pu'çxya' kĩjk jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' Jesus txã'wẽ yũuni's nasa jxuka jiyutx Nain çxhab peeku'jsuwe'sx vxite' Judea kiwesuwe'sxwa jxuka.
Jesus txã'wẽ yũuni's Juan Bautista' jxuka jiyuk Juan yakh u'jusawe'sx pta'sxte'. Sa' txãa yakh u'jusa e'zsatx pa'yaçxa',
Jesus tasxna kaakh paapẽjxya':
—Idxa' ¿isa Kristo naa kiwete kĩiwa'jsa ũsu'k txãa dxihgá', meeçxa' vxite ũythasuwá'nja'w? jĩnak pẽykaah.
Aça' e'z jxkaahnisa' Jesus tasxte pa'jçxa' txã'wẽy pẽjxtxi:
—Juan Bautista' kwe'sxtxi' kaakh idxa's paapẽjxya': ¿Kristo naa kiwete kĩiwa'jsa ũsu'k txãa dxihgá', meeçxa' vxite ũythasuwá'nja'w? jĩnatx pẽjx.
Sa' txã'wẽ paapẽysawe'sx pa'jaçte', Jesusa' nasa wala kĩjkĩh wee kazxsate ãçã'satxwa nuykatxhik, eçx luuku vxit-satx ũuste ji'phsa vxite' uyya' ãjãsamée maazkuẽesatxwa jxuka nuykatxhik.
Sa' Jesusa' paapẽysawe'sxtxi' na'wẽk pas:

—I'kwe'sx ma'wẽne'kwe wẽsẽ'jna uy txã'wẽy pta'sxine'kwe Juana's na'jĩna: Uyya' ãjãsameewa uyu'tx. Aça' legsawa katxhiçxa legmeetx neeyũ'. Wã'jy wee kazx ji'phsawa katxhinitx neeyũ'. Aça' wẽsẽ'jya' ãjãsameewa wẽsẽ'jya' ãjã'tx. Uuniisawa ki' ĩtxĩ yu'tx. Sa' naa kiwete pxthaakuẽsa yuutxi' Dxus tasxte pa'jwa'ja's pta'sxnik yuu.
Aça' adxa's kuh yajkxna jxpubasame', weçxana fxi'zesa yuuna jĩnak pta'sxkaah.
Juan yuwe kaahnisawe'sx u'the', Jesusa' Juan ma'wẽsatewa pta'sxku na'jĩna:
—Nasa u'pnimée kiwesu' i'kwe'sxa' ¿kĩja'skwe thegya' u'j? ¿Khĩih tasx wejxate ẽsẽ'sesa's wá'kwe thegya' u'j?
¿Khĩmeeçxa' teeçx piçthẽ'j ropa zhiçxkwesa athçxa u'pna sũhçxa wá'kwe thegya' u'j? I'kwe'sxa' jii i'kwe txã'wẽ ropa zhiçxkwesa athçxa wẽt weçxana fxi'zesa' jxkaahni yat-suçxáatx u'pu'.
¿Kim yuunakwe thegya' u'j? ¿Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa's wá'kwe thegya' u'j? Isa txã'wẽ dxih yuuçxa' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsate teeçx jxthaakwe walasa's ne'kwe uy.
Juana's we'weçxak Dxus librute na'wẽ pta'sxi':
Adx yuwee pta'sxsa's iidx yaçte kajaçthu,
Iidx pa'jwa'ja's pheu'khan jĩna fxi'jni'.
Na'jĩ'th na': naa kiwete Dxus yuwe pta'sxsate maa maatewa jxthaakwesa' Juan Bautistak yu'. Txã'wẽtewa, maawa makwe ãhmeekwesaçxawa Dxus jxkaahnite u'kasa yu', Juante jxthaakwesa yuutxna jĩte',
Juan bautisãynisa nasa jxukaysa vxite' gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsa txãawe'sx wẽsẽ'jçxa', Dxusa' maa yakhwa jxuka ewsana sũhnatx neeyũu.
Nawa fxariseowe'sx vxite' ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx Juan bautisãynimeesa yu', txãawe'sxtxi Dxus ew yũu wẽeni yu'sa' jxpa'gamée ahçetx.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Naa ensu nasatxi' ¿kiim yakh kaaja'da'jaki'th? ¿Kiim na'wẽta yu'?

Luuçx le'çxkuẽ na'wẽtx yu'. Txãawe'sxçxáatx plaasasu pweesa'jya' kaçxçxa, vxite luuçxtxi sus pa'yana na'jĩ': Zhiçxkwetha'w tujkana kuvxí' nawa ku'ju'çmeei'kwe. Sa' nxus nxustha'w memu', nawa ũ'ne'çmeei'kwe jĩ'tx. Txã'wẽsata' naa entewe'sxa'.
I'kwe'sxa' Juan Bautista's eçx luuku vxit-sa's ji'phna txãasak pan ũ'mée vxinowa tudxi'çmée jĩ'i'kwe, txã'wẽ kĩhwa ũ'mée tudxpa'gameeçxáa.
Nawa Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa kĩhçxa', ũ'we'th, tudxi'th, aç yu': Naa thẽ'ja' wala pũ'we', wala tudxsa'. Gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsawe'sx vxite' pkalsawe'sx yakh namiku' jĩ'i'kwe.
I'kwe'sxa' jiimeeçxai'kwe txã'jĩ'. Nawa maawa jiyuwa'jsa yuutxi' Dxusa' kaajiyu'juna adx ma'wẽsatewa jĩk.
Teeçx fxariseo' Jesusa's pi'kxku sã'jĩya', aça' Jesusa' txãa fxariseo yatna u'jçxa', mesate kaçxku ũ'ya'.
Naapkaçxha' teeçx u'y iiméh kazx ewmée yũuna u'jusa txãa çxhabtey u'psa jiyuk Jesusa' fxariseo yatte ũ'ya' u'jni's. Sa' teeçx fxrasko aceite wẽt putasana atçxa fxariseo yatte pa'kh.
Sa' ũ'nena utxaana kũhçxa', yafx yu'ju Jesus çxidatx pkhi'kxku. Khĩçxak txajx dxkhasju adxi'jçxa weçxá'. Sa' aceite wẽt putasa's Jesus çxidakhẽ awku.

Txã'wẽ yũuni's fxariseo Jesusa's pi'kxsathẽ'j uyçxa', na'wẽk yajkx: Naa piçthẽ'j isa Dxus yuwe's pta'sxsa dxihwaça', jiyuna naa u'ya' pkalsa ewmeesaçxa txã'wẽ çxidatx pkhi'kxna aceite awna u'ptewa sũjũ'k.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Simon, idxa's na'wẽ we'wewa'j ji'pthu jĩte', fxariseo pasçxa':
—Mwe'we jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Teeçx piçthẽ'ja's e'z nasatx yuul yu' vxyu pki'jçxa. Teeçxsa' kinientos pesok yuul yu'. Aça' vxite' cinkwenta pesok yuul yu'.
Aça' e'zíi txãawe'sx yuultxi dukhya' ãjãmeete', vxyuu pki'jsa' txãawe'sxtxi' peltunãyku. Aça' ¿maa sũjũki'g txãa yuulusa e'zsatx maaki'k wejx thaakwe weçxa pki'jsa's? jĩte',
Simon pasçxa':
—Wala yuulusane' wejx thaakwe weçxa jĩte', Jesusa':
—Isa yuh we'we'g, jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa u'ya's thegçxa' Simona's na'jĩk:
—Adxa' iidx yatte pa'thewa, yu' ũsmeeg adx çxidatx pkhi'kwa'j. Nawa naa u'ya's mtheg, txajx yafx yu'juk pkhi'khi' sa' txajx dxkhasjuk adxi'j.
Adxa's weçxameeg. Nawa naa u'ya' ayte u'kaíin nvxiitnime' adx çxidatx weçxana.
Adx jxkwetkhẽ aceite awmeeg. Nawa naa u'ya' aceite wẽt putasaak aw adx çxidakhẽ.
Na'jĩ'th na', pkal iiméh wala kazxsatewa peltunãyni neeyũusa' txã'wẽyku wala wedxna utxá' peltunãysa's. Nawa walamée peltunãynisa' jwee yu' weçxana utxa'çme'.
Txajũ' txãa u'ya's we'weçxa':
—I'kwe' peltunãyni yã'ji'kwe jĩk.
Aça' pi'kxnasa Jesus yakh ũ'na u'psa' txãawe'sx pwe'sx na'wẽtx puutx we'we':
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿kiimki saki'k pkalsa yuhtxwa peltunaĩ'? jĩ'tx.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we txãa u'ya's:
—Adx peltunaĩna sũhçxane'kwe adx tasxte utxáa naa pa'ga ewte yã'ji'kwe neeyũu na' ãçxha' wẽt weçx weçxa me'jwe jĩk.
Txãa e'su' Jesusa' maazkuẽe çxhabsuwa pekũjk Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena's pta'sxna txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx docesa yakh, çxhab le'çxkuẽsu walasuwa txã'wẽy.

Vxite' u'ywe'sxwa pi'kxna u'ju'tx na'wẽ eçxtxi kutxi'jna kĩh weete ãçã'satxwa nuykatxhik txã'wẽ yuuniisa, aça' txãa ksxavxyte teeçxsa' Maria Magdalena yaasesa txajx ũusuh siete eçxtxi kutxi'kh txãak yu'.
Vxite' Herodesa's pu'çxsa Çxusa nyu Juanak yaasesa yu', vxite' Susanak yaasesa yu'. Kuh u'ysatx Jesusa's pu'çxna u'jusa yu' txãawe'sx ji'phuni kĩjkwe yakhçxáawa.
Txajũ' çxhabuwe'sx wala nasa kasehtx, Jesusa's thegya'. Aça' nasa txaazkuẽe pkhaakhete', Jesusa' ejemplo yakhku pta'sx na'jĩna:
—Skuutxh uuhsa' uujxa' kasejk. Aça' msuuíi yu' maz nxinx dxi'jsu ãasu neeyũute', nasa waakhi'khi'jiçte, vxiçxakwewa fxiwçxa ũ'tx.
Aça' msuuíi yu', kwet-sutx ũsxi. Nawa buçxaçxawa kiwe ew ji'phmeete', tuphaameeçxa jxuka uhdxtxi.
Msuuíi yu', çhũçh ksxavxysutx ũsxi. Aça' çhũçhwa ja'da buçxaçxa' skuutxha's aphçxa ivxiitutx.
Sa' vxite ahsu' kiwe ewsatek ũsxi. Txãa yu' walaaçxa teeçx tasxçxáa cien nxinxtxi ji'phu.
Txajũ' Jesusa' suhsku na'jĩna we'we:
—Jiyuwa'jsa ũsçxa', jiyune'kwe jĩk.
Txajũ' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' Jesusa's pẽjxtxi txãa ejemplo's ma'jĩnitewa jiyuya'.
Aça' Jesus pasçxa' na'jĩk:

—Dxus jxkaahni ensu ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa kim yuhwa jiyunimeesa's i'kwe'sx yuutxi's ãate kaajiyu'ju'nja. Nawa vxite yuutxi' ejemplo yakhçxáath pta'sxi', kxah makwe uyçxawa, uysamée na'wẽçxáa neeyũutxna. Sa' pta'sxni's wẽsẽ'jçxawa, jiyumée neeyũutxna.
Naa ejemplo' na'wẽsa': Skuutxh fxiwa' Dxus yuwe jĩni'.
Aça' maz nxinx dxi'jsu ũsxisá', nasa Dxus yuwe's wẽsẽ'thewa eçxthẽ'ja' kutxi'jina wẽsẽ'jçxa yu'akhni's jĩni'. Txã'wẽ Dxus yuwe's ũusuh kutxi'the', txãawe'sx ũusa' vxituna.
Aça' maz nxinx kwet-su ũsxisá', nasa Dxus yuwe's jxpa'gaçxa maz en yu' weçxana wẽsẽ'jna fxi'zetxna. Nawa ũuste ew yu'akhmeeçxa', thẽysa nxusu en pa'theçxáa, Dxus tasxu ki' txuteetxna jĩni'.

Aça' maz nxinx çhũçh ksxavxysu ũsxisá', nasa wẽsẽ'jçxawa, naa kiwetewe'sx ji'phu wẽeniçxá's yajkxna pa'pçxuna ewmeesuçxáa weçxweçxa fxi'zesa jĩni'. Sa' Dxus yuwe's peçxkanatxna, aça' kxul íiçxáa yuuna.
Nawa nasa ũus ewsa Dxus yuwe's jxpa'yakx wẽsẽ'jçxa nwẽesẽ'jna Dxus yakhçxáa u'juçxa', kĩhsuwa ewçxáa yũuna fxi'zena, txã' maz nxinx yu' kiwe ewsate ũsxisáa na'wẽta'.
Lampara's atũu dxiite aphçxa txajxa' txã'wẽ ya'pki'taçme'. Wejxwa ẽetek ya'txaja' eena' kweethkahn, kxah maawa u'kasa' eena'te u'kakahn.
Makwe paaçte sũthnisaçxawa, kĩh yuhwa ãate vxyaamée yu' neeyũuwa'jme'. Sa' makwe ũusteçxáa yaakxnisa'swa, kim yuhwa ãate jiyunimée yu' neeyũuwa'jme'.
Txã'wẽyã'the', ew mwẽesẽ'jwe. Maawa wa'lmée wẽsẽ'the', jxthaakwe kaajiyu'juna Dxusa'. Nawa wẽsẽ'jya' wa'lsa's, kaajiyu'jnimée yuuna. Jxuka kusa'jni yuuna.
Txajũ' Jesus ũsnite pa'jtx njĩ'j vxite' nyakhwe'sx. Nawa nasa wala ũste', Jesus tasxte utxaaya' ãjãmeeta'.
Aça' kxtee ũssa teeçxsa' Jesusa's pta'sxku na'jĩna:
—Iidx mama, iidx nyakhwe'sx, iidx npe'sxwe'sx idxa's thegya' pa'jçxa ekate ũsta', sa' idxa's peejxta' jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Dxus yuwe's wẽsẽ'jçxa' kxtey yuutxna txã'wẽ yuusaaçxáa, adx mama, adx nyakh, adx npe'sxwe'sx na'wẽsata' jĩk.
Teeçx ente' Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh barkote khẽeçxa':
—Vxite ahn ĩkh kuten u'jwega jĩçxa' u'jtx.
Nawa ĩkh pxãjũy u'jweçpkaçxha' Jesusa' dejk. Naapkaçxha' wejxaa wala seena' kiiteçxa, yu'a's barkote yuutaçku yu'. Aça' barko' ĩkh dxiikhẽ khẽeya'wak yu'.
Txajũ' Jesusa's fxĩtxtxi na'jĩna:
—Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa mkiite, ĩkh dxiikhẽ khẽjẽçtha'w jĩte', Jesus kiiteçxa' wejxaa wala petx ĩkh yã'jçxa yujukaathe', jxuka yujuk, aça' kĩh yuhwamée ewçxáak neeyũu.
Txajũ' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi' na'jĩk:
—¿Mjĩiçxakwe Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhna yajkxmée? jĩte', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' ũukhçxa txãawe'sx pwe'sxçxáatx na'jĩna puutx we'we':
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿kimki açki'tx wejxaa wala ĩkh txã'wẽsa yuhwa nwẽese'je'? jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' pejka Gadara kiwete pesahtx Galilea ĩkh kuteju.

Aça' Jesusa' txãa kiwete pa'jaçte', kxte' teeçx çxhabuwe'sx piçthẽ'j kasejk Jesus yakh puutx uyya'. Txãa piçthẽ'ja' wala txaçxyã'j eçx luuku vxitni u'ju'k. Sa' ropa athmée yattewa u'psameek yu', naasáa uusáa pedaní kwet kafxsuçxáak u'psa yu'.
Sa' Jesusa's uyçxa', tasxte peejxũkweçxa', na'jĩnak suhs we'we:
—Jesus, Dxus ĩtxisa Nçxi'k, adxa'sa' ¿kĩhga yũu wẽjẽ'? Adxa's nxuste ũswa'the akhkahmén pxthaath we'we' jĩk.

Jesusa' txãa eçx luuku vxit-sa's ũusu kaseh kajaçku yu', txãa pa'gak txã'wẽ we'we'. Txãa eçxa' ũuste khẽeçxa nasa's luuku vxitpa'gatx, kadenaju kuse petx çxida yã'jçxa tud wẽe. Nawa kĩh yuhnawa weji'meek çxuktede'. Txã'wẽ yuuçxak txãa eçx luuku vxit-sa' nasa u'pnimeesu jxũna u'jwe' txãa piçthẽ'ja's.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa eçxa's pẽjxku:
—¿Kĩh yaasega? jĩte':
—Legion yaaseth jĩnak pas.
Txãa piçthẽ'j ũuste wala kuh eçx khẽeçxa ũsu'tx, txãasak legion yaaseth jĩna pas.
Sa' txãa eçx luuku vxit-sa' Jesusa's pxthaa we'wetx kafx wala seena' ũukhũukhsakhẽ akhkahmén.
Sa' kxsũ thã'jsũ kuçxi wala ũsu'tx aphna, aça' txãa kuçxi ũussu khẽeya' u'jwa'ja'stxi Jesusa's pẽjx pxthaa we'wena. Aça' Jesusa' kuçxi ũussu khẽeya' u'khaakh.
Txajũ' txãa eçx luuku vxit-sa txãa piçthẽ'j ũusu kasehçxa, kuçxi ũussu khẽete', txãa kuçxi' penxakhẽ peluçxa, ĩkh walakhẽ khẽeçxa jxuka uutx.
Aça' kuçxi thegsa' txã'wẽ yũute uyçxa', ũukhçxa pta'sxya' wala dud u'jtx çxhabna vxite' çxhab peeku'jsuwa jxuka.
Aça' kĩh yũutewa uyya' nasa' thegya' pa'jtx. Sa' Jesus ũsnite kũhçxa', uytxi eçx luuku vxit-sa' txãa piçthẽ'j ũusu jxuka kasehte', Jesus tasxte wẽt yã'j ropa athçxa kaçxçxa u'pte. Sa' wala ũukhtxi.
Aça' txãa piçthẽ'j eçx luuku vxitnisa' ma'wẽ yũuçxa katxhitewa uysa' kxtee thegya' pa'jsatx pta'sxtxi.
Txãa pa'gaçxáa Gadara kiwesuwe'sx jxukaysa ũukhçxa Jesusa's txãa kiweju kasehna u'khaahtx. Txã'jĩyã'the', Jesusa' barkote khẽeçxa ki' sxawedku.
Aça' txãa piçthẽ'j luuku vxitnijũ katxhisa' Jesusa's pxthaa we'wek pe'jçxa u'khan. Nawa Jesusa' txajx yatnak u'khaah na'jĩna:
—Iidx yatna sxawedna me'j, sa' mtuuthe'j idxa's Dxus na'wẽ ew yũuni's jĩte', txãa piçthẽ'j u'jçxa', çxhabsu jxuka pta'sxku Jesus ma'wẽ ew yũuni'swa jxuka.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Galilea kiwetey ki' sxawedna pesathe', nasa ũythãsna ũssa' wala weçxana jxpa'gatx.
Kxte' teeçx piçthẽ'j judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenite npiiçthẽ'jsa Jairo yaasesak pa'j. Sa' txãa piçthẽ'ja' Jesus tasxte peejxũkweçxa', pxthaa we'wek txajx yatna yuukahn.
Kxtee yu' txajx niisa teeçxçxáasa doce anxu ji'phsa ãçã'çxa uuwa'theçxáa yã'kh ũs yu' naa pa'ga. Aça' Jesusa' u'jweçte', txãa yakh u'jsa nasa wala kuh dxi'the utaçxáatx u'jna ũsu'.
Txãa nasa kuh ksxavxyte teeçx u'y doce anxu yã'j kakwe yu' vxyaate ãçã'sak kaseh. Sa' txãa u'ya' txajx vxyu's jxuka pebak yu'çe'jsatx dewena, nanwa maa yuhwa nuykatxhiya' ãjãmeeta'.
Aça' txãa u'ya' Jesus e'ste utxaaçxa, atxh vxiçkhẽ kpaajxa'dxku, naapkaçxha' txãa dudtey kakwe yu'a' yujuk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' paapẽjxku:
—¿Kimga adxa's jxa'dx? jĩna.
Aça' jxukaysa: Maa yuhwa jxa'dxmeetha'w jĩte', Pedro vxite' txãa yakh u'jusa' na'jĩtx:
—Nasaa ksxavxyte zuuna'çxáa u'jna ũsgu sayuja' ¿ma'wẽga kimga jxa'dx jĩna pẽyí'? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Teeçxsa adxa's jxa'dxyujk, txã'wẽ adxa's jxa'dxpa'gaçxáa ãçã'çxawa katxhiçxak neeyũu adx pu'çxte jĩk.
Aça' txãa u'y ma'wẽ yũuni'swa Jesusa' jiyute', txajx tasxte ũukhna yayana kũhçxa peejxũkwek. Sa' nasaa dxi'pte jxuka pta'sxku ãçã'çxa Jesus atxhte jxa'dxçxa' txãa dudtey katxhiçxa neeyũuni's.
Txajũ' Jesus we'weçxa':
—Katxhi'nja sũhçxane'kwe adx tasxte txã'wẽ yũuya' yuwé' txãa pa'ga ãçxha' katxhi'kwe neeyũu na' weçxana me'jwe jĩk.
Kxtee nee Jesus we'wena ũsíyna, judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenite npiiçthẽ'jsa Jairo yatu yuusa teeçx pa'jçxa', Jairo's pta'sxku:
—Iidx niisa' uuyã'kh, aça' Jesusa's kuçx pe'jna yuunu jĩte',
Jesus wẽsẽ'jçxa':
—Nxusnu, adxçxá's myajkx aççxáa iidx niisa' katxhina jĩk.
Txajũ' Jairo yatte pa'jçxa', vxite yuutxi' ka'ga'jmée, naasáa Pedro, Jakobo, Juan, vxite' kna'sa neywe'sxtxiçxáak ka'ga'j.
Kxte' nxus we'wena ũ'nenatx ũsu'. Nawa Jesus we'weçxa':
—Ũ'nenuwe, txãa kna'sa' uunime', naasáa deeniçxá' jĩte',
kxtee ũssa' npeevxysxijkatx, uuníi ũste txã'jĩpa'ga.
Txajũ' Jesusa' uuniisa's kuseju pu'kisna' suhsku we'we:
—Kna'sa, mkiiteçx jĩna.
Naapkaçxha', dudtey ĩtxĩ yuuçxa kiitek, aça' Jesusa' puuçkaakh.
Aça' neywe'sxa' wala kuh yajkxna weçxana thegtxi. Nawa Jesusa' maa yuhtxwa pta'sxkaahme' txã'wẽ uuniitewa ĩtxĩ vxitni's.
Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusa docesatx kxteeçxah pa'yaçxa' kĩh weete ãçã'satxwa nuykatxhiya' ãjãwa'ja's ũsku, eçx luuku vxit-satxwa nasa ũusu kutxi'khan.
Txã'wẽ yuuçxak kaah Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena's pta'sxna ãçã'satxwa nuykatxhikahn.
Sa' na'wẽk yu'kxpeh:
—Dxi'the kĩh yuhwa jxũmée me'jwe khãabu, ya'ja, vxyu, kaame txã'wẽsatx. Kmiisa yuhwa e'z yu' jxũçxa u'jnuwe.
Maa yatte paadejxa' pa'jyã'jçxa', kxteeçxáa paadehna ũsune'kwe txajũ ki' kasehna u'phkaçx.
Maa çxhabteya' i'kwe'sxtxi jxpa'gameete', i'kwe'sx çxidate kiwe tuhda's sakweekweçxa kasejene'kwe, kxah Dxus yuwe's makwe jxpa'gameeçxawa, yuuwesa yuutxna jĩnak yu'kxpeh.
Txajũ' txãawe'sxa' kasehçxa', çxhab le'çxsũ mtee mteewa jxuka Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna ãçã'satxwa nuykatxhinatx pekũh.
Txajũ' ne'jwe'sx Herodesa' Jesus kĩjkĩhwa ew yũuni's jiyuçxa', wala kuh yajkxku, txã'wẽ maaíi yu' Juan Bautistane' uuçxawa ki' ĩtxĩ yuu jĩ'tx txãa pa'ga.
Aça' vxite yu', Dxus yuwe's pta'sxsa Eliasne' ki' vxyaa jĩ'tx. Naapkaçxha' vxite we'weçxa': Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx jwee yaçgaywe'sxne' ki' ĩtxĩ yuu jĩ'tx.
Nawa Herodes yu' na'jĩ'k:
—Adxíith Juan Bautista txhikha's kaaspẽ'the'j txãana. Txãameeçxa' jwee yu' ¿kimçxah txakwe kĩjkĩhwa yũuya' ãjãkx? jĩ'k.
Txãasak Herodesa' txakwe uy wẽjẽ' Jesusa's.
Jesus kaahnisawe'sxa' ki' sxawedna pa'jçxa', txãawe'sx kĩhçxahne'ta yũu txã'sna pta'sxtxi Jesusa's. Txajũ' Jesusa' txãawe'sxçxáatx fxiite pe'jna u'kh Beçaida çxhab ja'dasu nasa u'pnimeesu.
Nawa nasa' jiyuçxa', txãawe'sxwa Jesus e'stey u'jtx. Aça' Jesusa' jxpa'gaçxa', Dxus ma'wẽ jxkaahwa'ja'swa pta'sxku sa' ãçã'satxwa nuykatxhik.
Txajũ' kusuçte', Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sx docesa' na'jĩtx Jesus tasxte utxaaçxa:
—Nasatxi' mkaah, çxhabsu paadee yat-su ũ' weyçxa ũ'kahn. Txã'wẽme' ayte' nasa yat utxameesũ ũstha'w jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—I'kwe'sxíiwa mpuuçwe jĩk. Aça' txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Tahç pan, e'z wedxçxáa ji'ptha'w. Kwe'sxa' çxhabna weyya' u'jmeete yu', ãhmeena naazkuẽesatx puuçwa'j jĩtx.
Nasa yu', piçthẽ'jçxáa cinko mil ãhtx yu'. Nawa Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi' na'jĩk:
—Cinkwenta txuhdeçxa fxiifxii txaksu mkaaçxi'jwe jĩte',
txãawe'sxa' txã'wẽy nasatx jxukay kaykaçxhi'tx.
Txajũ' Jesusa' tahç pan e'z wedxtxi jxpa'gana'wa cielute pagayçxa, Dxusna weçxana orãyku. Sa' pe'ltedeçxa txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi ũsku, nasa jxukaysatx ũsu'skahn.
Txajũ' jxukaysa ũ'çxa txikte', kijxasaatx doce kanastate utatx pkhakh.
Teeçx ente Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakhçxáa fxii txuteena u'jçxa Dxusna orãyna u'pçxa', txãawe'sxtxi pẽjxku:
—Nasa' adxa'sa' ¿kimna jĩ'ta? jĩte',
txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Maaí': Juan Bautistana jĩ'tx. Vxite': Eliasna jĩ'tx. Aça' vxite yu': Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa txãniiteywe'sx uuniiçxawa ĩtxĩ yuusaana jĩ'tx jĩte',
Jesus pẽjxçxa':
—Txajũ' i'kwe'sxa' adxa'sa' ¿kimna sũjũ'kwe? jĩte', Pedro pasçxa':
—Idxa' Kristo, Dxus tasxu yuusag jĩk.
Txajũ' wala neewe'wek Jesusa' Dxus tasxu yuusa Kristo' jĩna maa yuhtxwa pta'sxkahmén.
Txajũ' na'wẽk pta'sx:

—Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusá' wala pkxuuni yuuwa'ja's jxpa'gawa'j pejka peejxyuja', txãa pa'ga judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx vxite' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx ahçeçxa ikhetxna. Nawa uuçxawa tekh ente' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuna jĩnak pta'sx.
Txajũ' jxukaysatx na'jĩk:
—Maawa adx yakh yuu wẽeçxa', peekx kakwe jxthãasni's kĩhnawa jxuka nvxihtçxa yuuçxáa adx yakh yujxa' ãjãne'kwe, makwe pxthaa yuuwa'j seena'sa een isa ma'k pa'jnawa txã'sa' ũukhmée.

Maa nasawa naa kiwete ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'jçxá's ya'nwe'wesa' Dxus yakh fxi'zewa'j yu'sa' ivxiituna. Nawa maa nasawa adx yakh fxi'zepa'gaçxáa naa kiwete ĩtxĩ fxi'zeni's yajkxmée ivxiitusa', Dxus yakh fxi'zewa'j yu'sa' ivxiitumeena.
Nasa' naa kiwetewe'sxçxá's jxuka knayçxa', txajx ũus yu's ivxiitute', ¿kĩhte selpiikx, peekx ũus yu's nwe'wemeete'?
Maa nasawa adxa's jxpa'gaya' wa'lna adx pta'sxnitxwa wa'lutxna aça' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusaawa adx Tata eena' kweethniite Dxus angeleswe'sx yakh jxkaajxa' kĩhçxa', txã'wẽ yũusatxi' jxpa'gaya' wa'luna.
Isath we'we', ayte ũssa uuméy uyuune'kwe Dxus jxkaajxa' kĩini's jĩk.
Txã'wẽ we'weni teeçx ki'su skhẽwniite', Jesusa' thã'the orãyya' u'kh Pedro, Jakobo, Juan txãawe'sx yakh.
Jesusa' orãyna u'piyna, txajx dxi'pa' fxiyku zhiçxkwe yu'ptheh, aça' txajx athni ropawa txã'wẽytxi çxihme kwehnesa yuu.
Txajũ' txãa yakha' e'z piçthẽ'jtx puutx we'wena vxyaa, teeçxsa' Moises vxite' Elias txãawe'sxtxi yu'.
Jxuka zhiçxkwe eena' kweethni pxãhte Jesus ma'wẽ nxus pxthaa yuuçxa Jerusalente uuwa'ja'stxi we'we'.
Pedrowe'sxa' wala dee wẽeçxawa, dehmée u'pçxa' uytxi, Jesus eena' kweethni vxite e'zsa txãa yakh ũssatx.
Txajũ' txãa e'z piçthẽ'jwe'sxa' Jesusa's txuteena u'jweçte', Pedro' na'jĩk:
—Ayte' kwe'sx ũswa'j wala ewa', aça' tekh wa' txajaga, teeçxsa' iidx jĩi, vxite' Moises jĩi, vxite' Elias jĩi jĩk.
Nawa Pedro' ũus yuu yajkxméy we'wesaçxáak yu'.
Naapkaçxha' tãaph kĩhna'wa, jxuka aphku. Aça' wala ũukhtxi tãaph dxiite neeyũuçxa.
Txajũ' tãaph dxiiju na'wẽk we'we:
—Na' adx Nçxi'k wala wedxnisa', aça' txã'sa' nwẽesẽ'jna kxtey myuuwe jĩnik pthũuse.
Txã'wẽ we'wenijũ', Jesusçxáa yã'j ũstetx uy. Sa' txãawe'sxa' sxuuna'tx neeyũu, sa' txãn ensu' kim yuhtxwa pta'sxmeeta' txã'wẽ uyni's.
Sa' kuskuus enkhẽ', thã'ju kĩjaçte', nasa wala kuh Jesusa's pu'thegya' kasehtx.
Aça' teeçx piçthẽ'ja' nasaa ksxavxyte ũssa' sus we'weçxa':
—Adx nçxi'k teeçxçxáa ji'pthu txã'sa' meen theg.
Txã'sa' eçx luuku vxit-sa uweçxa kaywẽçxpa'ja'jna kweeyi'jna wala pkxu'k sa' txhwete wẽjẽ'çme'. Txã'wẽ yũute', yuwesu bu'çxçxáak sẽjẽ'.
Idx yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi' pxthaa we'weyã'th, txãa eçxa's adx nçxi'k ũusu kutxi'khan. Nawa txãawe'sxa' ãjãmeeta' jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'j yu'sa' ji'phmeesata' naa nasa'. ¿Bagaçxpkaçx i'kwe'sx yakh pu'çxna ũs ya'watka? ¿Bagaçxpkaçx ãjãmée fxi'ze ya'wakwe? Mneejxũh iidx nçxi'ka's jĩte',

txãa piçtakxa' Jesus tasxte utxaana kũjũçpkaçxha', txãa eçx luuku vxit-sa' kaywẽçxpa'ja'jçxa pẽtxku. Nawa Jesusa' juuna' we'weçxa eçx luuku vxit-sa's ũusu kutxi'the', txãa piçtakxa' ew katxhik aça' Jesusa' neya's dukhku.
Aça' Dxus txakwe wala ew yũute', jxukaysa wala kuh yajkxtxi.
Na'wẽ yũuni's nasa wala kuh yajkxna ũspkaçxha', Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi' na'wẽk we'we:
—Na'sa' ew wẽsẽ'jçxa peçxkananuwe: Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusá's nasa ewmeesa kusete dukhni yuuwa'ja' jĩtewa,
txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yu' jiyuya' ãjãmeeta', txãawe'sx jiyuwa'jmeene' yu' naa pa'ga. Sa' txã'wẽçxawa pẽjx yu' meeta' ũukhçxa.
Txajũ' Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' txãawe'sx pwe'sx puutx paapẽyi'tx:
—Ayte' kwe'sx pwe'sx ¿maa wejx jxthaakwe walasakxtha'w? jĩna.
Nawa kĩh yajkxçxa txã'wẽ puutx we'weçtewa Jesusa' jiyuçxa', teeçx luuçxkuẽ's txajx pukate txahçxa' na'jĩk:

—Adxa's wedxsa' maawa naa luuçx na'wẽsatx ahçemée jxpa'gasa', adxa's jxpa'gasa yuutxna. Sa' adxa's jxpa'gasa', adxa's jxkaahsanawa jxpa'gasa yuutxna. I'kwe'sx pwe'sx maa txã'wẽ ãhmeekwesa na'wẽ yajkxna fxi'zena txãa yuuçxáa jxthaakwe walasa yuuna jĩk.
Txajũ' Juan we'weçxa':
—Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa mwẽese'j. Teeçx piçthẽ'j iidx yase's kxsusçxa eçx luuku vxit-sa's nasaa ũusu kutxi'jiçte kwe'sxa' uyçxa', txã'wẽ yũunu jĩnatha'w we'we, kwe'sx yakh u'jusameek yu' naa pa'ga jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Maawa kwe'sxtxi açewe'wesamée yu' kwe'sxtxi pu'çxsa íiçxáatxna, aça' txãawe'sxtxi' kuçx txã'wẽ yuunuwe jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesus cielun u'jwa'j en utxaaçte', ũukhmée Jerusalen çxhabna u'jya' kasejk.
Sa' u'jweççxa', yaçte yuwe kaakh, aça' txãawe'sxa' Samaria kiwete teeçx çxhabtetx deewa'j yat pakweya' u'j.
Nawa txãa çxhabtewe'sxa' Jesus Jerusalenna u'jweçte uyçxa', jxpa'ga wẽemeeta'.
Txajũ' txã'wẽ yũute', Jakobo, Juanwe'sxa' Jesusa's na'jĩtx:
—Kwe'sxa' cieluju ipx kaakĩjĩ'jçxa txãa nasatxi' peba jxthãaswaça', kwe'sxa' kxtey yu'nja'w Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Eliaswa ma'wẽga yũu txã'wẽy jĩte',
Jesusa' thegçxa' na'jĩnak yu'kxpeh:
—I'kwe'sxa' jiyu'çmeei'kwe ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa.
Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuuçxawa, adxa' nasatx pebaya' yuwe'çmeeth, naasáa nwe'weçxa ewte nvxiht-ya'çxáath kĩh jĩk.
Txajũ' vxite çxhabnatx u'j.
Txãawe'sx dxi'the u'jweçte', teeçx piçthẽ'j Jesusa's na'jĩk:
—Jxpe'jsa, idx yakh yuu wẽeth, idx mtee u'jweçtewa jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Yu'kh niimal yuhwa deewa'j kafx ji'phta', aça' vxiçxakuẽwa yat ji'phta'. Nawa Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' mtee yuhwa txajx dxiktheçxáa yuja'swa khikhwa'j ji'phme' jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' vxite's pa'yak:
—Adx yakh myuh jĩna.
Aça' txãa pasçxa':
—Jxpe'jsa, mũythãs, adx tata khuẽ'yna pedaaya' u'jweçthu jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Uusaawe'sxa' peekx uusáa pwe'sx ya'pedaatxna. Aça' idxa' Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena'sçxáa pta'sxya' me'j jĩk.
Txajũ' vxite' na'jĩk:
—Jxpe'jsa, adxa' idx yakh yuu wẽeth, nawa adx yattewe'sx khuẽ'ytxi neewe'weya' u'jweçthu jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Maawa mjĩia's takhçxaçxáa e'su yu' thegsa' selpimeena Dxus ma'wẽ jxkaahwa'ja'swa pta'sxya' jĩk.
Txãa e'su' vxite setenta txhitxhçxa, e'z e'zku yaçte kaah, txajx pa'jwa'j çxhabsu mteewa jxuka.
Sa' na'jĩk:
—Isa mjĩiwa'ja' wala yuh ũsa', nawa mjĩisa yu' kuhmeeta'. Aça' mjĩi namu's pxthaa we'wena mpẽjxwe nasa mjĩiwa'jsa txajx mjĩitewe'sx.
I'kwe'sxa' jxpa'yakx me'jwe, piisxakuẽtx alum ksxavxysu na'wẽ kajaçthu naa pa'ga.
Ya'ja, vxyu, pelgatxi txã'wẽsa jxũmée me'jwe. Sa' dxi'the nasa pu'jykhẽw yuhçxawa weçxana jxthẽeyuumeene'kwe.
Kiim yatte pa'jçxawa, ewçxáa we'wena weçxana pa'jane'kwe.
Aça' txãa yattewe'sx açesameeçxa', txã'wẽ weçxana pa'jni's ewçxáa jxpa'gatxna. Nawa jxpa'gameete', txajũ ki' u'jwene'kwe.
Sa' mtee ew jxpa'gatxna, txãa yatte paadejene'kwe, txãawe'sx kĩh sã'jĩni'swa ũ'na, txãa pa'gatey mjĩisa' ũ'wa'ja's jxpa'gawa'j ji'pha'. Aça' i'kwe'sxa' yat iisa paadehna pekũhnuwe.
Maa çxhabtewe'sx i'kwe'sxtxi jxpa'gate', kxtee ũsune'kwe kĩh puuçtewa wa'lmée jxpa'gana.
Sa' kxtee ãçã'satxwa nuykatxhiçxa na'wẽ pta'sxine'kwe: Dxus jxkaahna pa'jwa'j ena' i'kwe'sx yakh utxa ũsa'.
Nawa maa çxhabtewa i'kwe'sxtxi jxpa'gameete', txãa çxhabte jxuka na'jĩne'kwe:

I'kwe'sxa' jxpa'gameeçxawa yuuwesa yuukahn i'kwe'sx çxhabte kxtã'tuhd yuhnawa sakweekweçxa u'jweçtha'w kwe'sx çxidate uweni's. Sa' makwe jxpa'gameeçxawa, jiyuçxa neeyũuçi'kwe: i'kwe'sxtxi Dxus jxkaahna pa'jwa'j ena' utxa ũsa' jĩne'kwe.
Na'jĩ'th na': Dxus kastigãywa'j ente', txãa çxhabtewe'sxa' Sodoma çxhabtewe'sxte jxthaakwe nxus ya'kastigaĩtxna.

Korazín çxhabte nasa, Beçaidatewe'sx yã'jçxa, seena' yuh nxuste neeyũuwa'ji'kwe. Ayte i'kwe'sx dxi'pte na'wẽth ãçã'satx nuykatxhina uusáatx fxĩtxna yũu na' Tiro vxite' Sidon çxhabtewa txã'wẽy yũuwaça', txãawe'sxa' pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedni txaçxyã'j yuuna.
Dxus kastigãywa'j ente', Tiro vxite' Sidon çxhabte nasate jxthaakwe i'kwe'sxa' nxus kastigo's knayuune'kwe.
Aça' Kapernaum çxhabtewe'sxa' cielute u'jwa'jsath sũhna i'kwe yaaki', nawa infxiernote khẽeya' u'jwa'jsai'kwe.
Txãa çxhabtxi' txã'wẽ we'weçxa', setentasawe'sxtxi' na'jĩk:

—Maa nasawa i'kwe'sx pta'sxni's wẽsẽ'jçxa', adxa'swa nwẽesẽ'jsa yuutxna. Sa' maawa i'kwe'sxtxi açesa', adxa'swa açesa yuutxna. Sa' adxa's açesa' adxçxáana ahçemée adxa's kaahsanawa açesa yuutxna jĩnak jxkaah.
Txajũ' setentasawe'sxa' wala weçxana ki' sxawedtxi na'jĩna:
—Eçx luuku vxit-sa yuhwa idx pu'çxte', kwe'sxtxi' nwẽesẽ'je'tx jĩna pta'sxte',
Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Isa yuh pta'sxi'i'kwe adxa' uythu eçxthẽ'ja' cieluju kpi'sx kwehneni na'wẽ wetena kĩjaçte.
I'kwe'sx txã'wẽ yũukahn íiçxáath adxa' kĩhtewa jxuka ãjãwa'ja's ũs, ul weeswée usmitx kĩjkĩh eçx seena'sawa i'kwe'sxtxi kpã'vxit-ya' ãjãkahmén.
Nawa eçx luuku vxit-sa i'kwe'sxtxi nwẽesẽ'pha'gaçxáa yu', weçxweçxa yaakxnuwe. Naasáa cielute i'kwe'sx yase fxi'jni ũsa' txãa pa'ga yuuçxáa weçxweçxa myajkxwe jĩçxa',
Jesusa' txajx ũuste wala weçxak txã'wẽ Dxus Espiritu pu'çxpa'ga. Sa' na'jĩk:

—Tata, idxa's wala weçxa'th, idxa' cielute vxite' naa kiwete jxuka Namug. Txãasag naa kiwete wala jxtuhtesa yuutxi's kaajiyu'jmeeçxawa, ãhmeekwesa yuutxi's jiyuwa'ja's ũsgu. Iidx jxthãasni' txã'wẽne' yu' aça' txã'sa' kxtey yuug.

Adx Tata' kĩjkĩhtewa jiyuwa'ja's adxçxaçxá'sku dukh. Txãa pa'ga kim yuhwa jiyu'çmeeta' Dxus Nçxi'ka's, naasáa Ney yuuçxáa jiia'. Txã'wẽy Tata'swa kim yuhwa jiyu'çmeeta', naasáa Nçxi'k yuuçxáa jiia', sa' maatxwa Nçxi'k íi khiyu'theçxáa jiyuya' ãjãtxna adx Tata's.
Txã'jĩçxa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi thegçxa', na'jĩk txãawe'sxçxáatx:
—Ãçxh i'kwe'sx uyna ũsi'kwe txã'sna txãawe'sx yafxju uysá' wala yuh weçxawa'j ji'phta'. Txãa pa'gatey ãçxh i'kwe'sx uyna ũsi'kwe txã'sa'

nyafxiitey Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx vxite' jxkaahsawe'sxwa wala yuh uy wẽetx, nawa uyya' ãjãmeeta'. Txã'wẽy zhiçxkwe pta'sxni's ãçxh i'kwe'sx wẽsẽ'jna ũsi'kwe txã'snawa wala yuh wẽsẽ'j wẽetx, nawa wẽsẽ'jya' ãjãmeeta' jĩk.
Txajũ' ley kaapiya'jsa teeçxsa Jesus tasxte utxaaçxa', ewmée vxit wẽeçxa na'wẽk paapẽjx:
—Adxa' ¿ma'wẽ yũuçxa pçumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phuki'th? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Dxus leyte' ¿ma'wẽ fxi'jni ũsna açga lẽeyçxa jiyu'çmée? jĩte',
ley kaapiya'jsa' na'wẽk pas:
—Idxna jxpe'jsa Dxusa's ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa bagaçxte yuhwa peena yu' txuteeya'mée utxaaçxa txãa yuuçxá's selpiina mfxi'ze. Sa' idx ma'wẽga ya'peeygãja', txã'wẽy vxite nasatxwa mpeeygãh jĩ'k jĩte',
Jesus we'weçxa':
—Ew yuh pasgu. Txã'sa' kxtey yuuçxa', pçumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phune'ga jĩk.
Nawa ley kaapiya'jsa yu', txajx yuweteyçxáa ewmeete neeyũuyã'jçxa', na'wẽk pẽjx:
—Txãa vxite nasa jĩ'k txãa yu' ¿kimtxna? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa' na'wẽk kwentu'j:
—Teeçx piçthẽ'j Jerusalenu kasehçxa' Jerikon u'jni dxi'jkhẽ u'jweçte', peswée dxi'the yupxa' kasehtx. Sa' kĩjkĩhne' jxũna u'jweç yu', txã's jxuka peswéetx. Sa' kpã'vxitçxa', uuwa'jçxáa yã'jtx nvxiht.
Peswée u'jni txaçxmeyna, teeçx sacerdote kĩhçxa' uyku txãa kpã'vxitnisa's, nawa pu'çxmée dxi'j skhẽwku.
Txã'wẽy Levxi ji'thewe'sxwa kĩhçxa' uyku, nawa txãawa pu'çxmée dxi'j skhẽwku.
Txajũ' teeçx piçthẽ'j Samariatewe'sx txãa dxi'khẽy kĩhçxa', kpã'vxitnisa's uyçxa', wala peeygãjk.
Sa' kpã'yũusa tasxte utxaaçxa', kpã'su aceite vxino yakh awna yu'çe'kh. Txajũ' txajx a'jni jibate yakhçxa ka'ja'kh, sa' paadee yatna pe'jna u'jçxa, kxte' kĩjkĩhwa peejxmeek sã'jĩ.

Kuskuus enkhẽ', txãa Samariatewe'sxa' u'jweççxa', e'z vxyu kutxi'jçxa, yat namu's dewek. Sa' na'wẽk neewe'we: Naa piçthẽ'j kpã'vxitnisa's meen sã'jĩ. Meeçxa' vxyu nvxiituçthu txãa ãhmeewáana nawa ki' sxawedna pa'jçxa, dukhe'nja txãa yuuluni's jĩk.
Jesusa' txã'wẽ pta'sxçxa na'wẽk pẽjx:
—Idx ũus myajkx. Txãa tekhtewe'sxa' ¿maasaga ew yũusana' thegu'? jĩte',
ley kaapiya'jsa pasçxa':
—Kpã'vxitnisa's peeygãasa jĩte', Jesus pasçxa':
—Idxwa txã'wẽy pu'çxna peeygãhna me'ju jĩnak jxkaah.
Txajũ' Jesusa' teeçx çxhab le'çxkuẽtek pa'jya' u'j. Txãa çxhabte teeçx u'y Marta yaasesa' txajx yatte jxpa'gak.
Sa' Marta' teeçx nyakhku ji'phu' Maria yaasesa. Aça' Maria yu', Jesus pta'sxniçxá's wẽsẽ'jya' txajx tasxte kaçxku.
Naapkaçxha' Marta yu', mjĩiniçxá's wala pa'pçxuna ũsçxa', Jesusa's utxaaçxa na'jĩk:
—¿Uyu'çmeegá' na'wẽ ũ'kweçxáa wala mjĩina ũste', ũ'kwe nyakh yu' pu'çxhiçme'. Aça' mpu'çxkaah jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Marta, i'kwe' wala yuh kuh jwed mjĩina tudumée ũsi'kwe.
Nawa jxthaakwe peejxsa yu' teeçx jwed yuuçxá'. Aça' Maria' wejx jxthaakwe peejxsa's wẽsẽ'je'ça' txã'sa' kim yuhwa kusa'jmeetxna jĩnak we'w e.
Teeçx ente' Jesusa' Dxusna orãynak u'pu' teeçx ahte, sa' orãyna jxã'the', txãa yakh u'jusa teeçxsa' na'jĩk:
—Kwe'sxtxi mkaapiya'j, Dxus yakh puutx we'wena orãyya', Juanwa ma'wẽga txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi' kaapiya'ja' txã'wẽy jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Dxus yakh puutx we'wena oraĩççxa', na'jĩne'kwe:
Kwe'sx Tata cielute ũssa,
Idxa' bagaçxtewa wala jxtuhthesag.
Iidx jxkaahwa'j ena'sçxáatha'w ũythasu'.
Naa kiwete idx ma'wẽne'ga jxthãasu' txãa yu' jxuka kxtey tee yuu cielute na'wẽy.
Ãçxh kwe'sx ũ'wa'ja's meen pees.
Kwe'sx ewmée yũuni's meen peltunaĩ, kwe'sxwa peltunãytha'w kwe'sxtxi ewmée yũusatx txãa pa'ga.
Ewmeete wetekahmén meen nwe'we jĩna oraĩne'kwe.
Txajũ' na'jĩnak we'we:
—I'kwe'sxa' namiku yatte kuspxãh u'jçxa': Namiku, tekh pan mpeeki'j.
Dxi'j u'jsa adx namikuk yatte pa'j, aça' kĩh yuhwa ji'phmeeth puuçwa'j, ¿jĩmeema'kwe kĩhwa ji'phmeeçxa'?
Aça' dxiiju passa' na'jĩna: Adx luuçx deeni yã'tha', aça' kuçx susnu. Naapkaçxha' vxitxwa aphni yã'j ũsa', aça' kĩh yuhwa ũsya' ewume'nja jĩçxawa,
jwee kuçx susna nes yuukahmén kiiteçxa kĩh pẽjxtewa jxuka ũsuna. Na'jĩ'th na': Namiku pa'gaçxáa kuspxãh kiiteçxa ew yũumée naasáa kuçx suskahménçxáa txã'wẽ yũuna.
Txãa pa'gath adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi Dxusna pẽykaja' aça' txã' ũsuna. Kĩh peejini'swa pakweçxa' uyuune'kwe. Vxitxte pa'yate' phaadena.
Na'jĩ'th na': maawa Dxusna pẽysa', jxpa'gana. Aça' pakwesa', uyuuna. Aça' vxitxte tu'kakate', phaadena.
Ũus miiyajkxwe: i'kwe'sx luuçx pan pẽjxte', ¿kweta's ũsma'kwe? Meeçxa' wedx pẽjxte', ¿ula's ũsma'kwe?
Meeçxawa ziç pẽjxte', ¿usmitxa's ũsma'kwe?
I'kwe'sxa' Dxus dxi'pte ewmeesaçxawa, i'kwe'sx luuçxtxi' ewsaçxáa i'kwe peesu'. Aça' i'kwe'sx Tata cielutewe'sxa' wejx jxthaakwe ewsa Dxus Espiritu's peesuna pẽysatxi's jĩk.
Jesusa' eçx luuku vxit-sa kwe'we'jsame's piçthẽ'j ũusuh kutxi'the', txãa eçxa' ũusuh kasejk, aça' txãa piçthẽ'ja' we'weya' ãjak. Txã'wẽ yũute', nasa' wala kuh yajkxna neeyũutx.
Nawa vxite yu', na'jĩnatx we'we':
—Eçxthẽ'j pu'çxteçxáak naa piçthẽ'ja' eçx luuku vxit-satxwa nasaa ũusuh kutxi'ji' jĩ'tx.
Naapkaçxha' vxite yu' Jesus kĩh yũutewa jiyuya' sũhçxa cielujũ seena'sa mkaavxya'ja'j jĩte',
Jesusa' txãawe'sx ewmée ũus yaakxni's jiyuçxa', kxtey yuumée na'wẽçxáak we'we:
—Maa gobiernowa peekx nasa yakhíiçxáa puiiçxa', txãawe'sx pwe'sxíiçxáa jxuka pçuutxna. Maa yattewe'sxwa txãawe'sx pwe'sxíiçxáa puutx puiiçxa', txãawe'sx pwe'sxíiçxáa jxuka pçuutxna.
Txã'wẽy eçxthẽ'jwa txãawe'sx pwe'sxíiçxáa puutx puiiçxa', puutx pçuutxna. Adxa'sa' eçxthẽ'j pu'çxteçxáak eçx luuku vxit-satxwa nasa ũusu kutxi'jya' ãjã' jĩ'i'kwe txãa pa'gath txã'jĩ'.
Txã'wẽ dxihte', i'kwe'sx yakh u'jusatxwa eçxthẽ'jíiçxáane' pu'çxhi' eçx luuku vxit-satx kutxi'jya'. Ew yajkxwaç yu', i'kwe'sx yakh u'jusaíiçxáa i'kwe'sx jxpubani's khiyu'jwa'jsata'.
Adxa's eçxthẽ'j pu'çxmée, Dxus pu'çxteth eçx luuku vxit-satx nasaa ũusuh kutxi'ji'. Isa ew jiyuwaç yu', i'kwe'sxtxi Dxus jxkaahwa'j en ãjk txãa pa'ga txã'wẽ yũuçthu.
Teeçx piçthẽ'j çxhãçxhasa' kĩjkĩhwa txajx ji'phuni's ivxiituya'mée sũhçxa puiiwa'j tũ'sçxa yatte yupu'k ka'ga'jya'mée.
Nawa vxite wejx jxthaakwe çxhãçxhasa pa'jçxa', txãa yupsa's knayçxa puiiwa'ja'swa kusa'jna yuuçxa ji'phunitxi's txãak iiyamu.
Adx ju'gumée ũssa', adxa's açesata'. Aça' adx yakh pkhakh pu'çxsame' neeusaçxa txã'wẽ yuuna.
Eçx luuku vxit-sa' nasa ũusu kasehçxa', nasa u'pnimeesuk jxkaasewa'j pakwena u'ju'. Nawa uymeeçxa' naa sũju'k: Adx kasehni yatnay sxawedna u'jwe'nja sũhçxa
ki' sxawedte' txãa nasa ũus yu' yata's ew padçxa txaahni na'wẽ ũstek uyna pa'ja'.
Sa' u'jçxa vxite siete eçx txãate jxthaakwe ewmeesatx nuypa'jçxa, txãa nasa ũuste pejka u'katx. Aça' txãa nasa' jxthaakwek ewmeesa yuuna pa'ja'.
Jesusa' txã'wẽ pta'sxiçpkaçxha', teeçx u'y nasaa ksxavxyte na'jĩnak sus we'we:
—Idxna kçxu'çxusa mama yakha' seena' yuh wala weçxa yuhna jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Txã'wẽme', wejxwa Dxus we'weni's wẽsẽ'jçxa', txajx jxkaahnitxi's kxtey yuusáa yakhçxáa seena' wala weçxa yuja' jĩk.
Txajũ' nasa' Jesus we'weni's wẽsẽ'jya' txajx tasxte pkhaakhesatxi' na'jĩnak we'we:
—Nasa ewmeesa naa ensuwe'sxa' kĩhçxáawa seena'sa kaavxya'ja'khaja'tx. Nawa kĩh yuhwa jwee yu' kaavxya'ja'jmée, naasáa Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Jonas ma'wẽsaga yu' txã'sçxáana khiyu'the ewna.
Jonaswa ma'wẽga Níniwe çxhabte nasa ewmeesatx khiyu'j, txã'wẽy Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusaawa naa ensu nasa ewmeesatx khiyu'jsa'.

Naa ensu nasatx Dxus kastigãywa'j en ãhte', txãniitey jxu'j kiwete jxkaahsa u'ythẽ'ja' ãçxga nasatxi' ewmeete nvxiituna. Txãa u'ya' txakwe jxu'juwe'sx yuhçxawa, wa'lméek Salomon pta'sxniçxá'swa wẽsẽ'jya' pa'j. Naapkaçxha' ãçxh yu' Salomonte jxthaakwesa ayte ũsa' nawa wa'lu'tx naa pa'ga txãa u'ya' ewmeete nvxiituna.

Txã'wẽy Níniwe çxhabtewe'sxwa Dxus kastigãywa'j en ãhte', naa ensu nasatx ewmeete nvxiitutxna. Txãawe'sxa' Jonas pta'sxniçxá'swa wẽsẽ'jçxa', txãawe'sx pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedtxi. Naapkaçxha' ãçxh yu' Jonaste jxthaakwesa ayte ũsa' nawa wa'lu'tx naa pa'ga Níniwe çxhabtewe'sxa' ewmeete nvxiitutxna.
Lampara's atũu dxiite aphçxa txajxa' txã'wẽ ya'pki'taçme', wejxwa ẽetek ya'txaja' eena' kweethkahn, kxah maawa u'kasa' eena'te u'kakahn.
Peekx kakwete yafxa' lampara na'wẽsata'. Aça' iidx yafxa' suwenimée ewçxa' iidx kakwete jxuka eena' kweethna nes yuuna. Nawa iidx yafx ewmée suweniite', iidx kakwe' jxuka çxhi'dxteçxáa neeyũuna.
Iidx kakwete kĩhte yuhwa çxhi'dxsamée jxuka eena'saçxáa ũste', jxuka ew uyuune'ga, lamparawa ma'wẽga ew eena' kweethe' txã'wẽ.
Nawa mpa'yajkx. Txã'wẽme', eena' khikhysa ji'phgu txãa kweethmeete', çxhi'dxteçxáa neeyũune'ga.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txã'wẽ we'wena jxã'the', teeçx fxariseo txajx yatte sã'jĩya' pi'kxku. Aça' Jesusa' u'jçxa ũ'ya' kaçxku.
Txajũ' txãa fxariseo' naasũjk: Naa piçthẽ'ja' wala yuh fxiy yu'k kusekhẽ yu' kaahmée ũ'ya' kaçxku sũjũ'k.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Fxariseowe'sx i'kwe'sxa' plaatu waso ma'k yuu nawa txãa yuutxi' ekakhẽ yu' pkhi'khi'i'kwe. Nawa i'kwe'sx ũus dxiite yu', pesweena kĩjkĩhwa ewmeeçxáa yũunisaçxáa jxuka uta ũsa'.
I'kwe'sxa' jiimeewá'kwe: Dxusa' kakwekhẽ ãakhẽwe'sxçxá's uyçxa', ũustewe'sx yu's uyu'çmeene' ¿sũjũ'wá'kwe?
Txã'wẽ kĩhwa ji'phmeesatx ũusuh jxuka peeygãhna lmusxnu peeswaça', ãakhẽçxáa yaatesa yuumeene'kwe.

Fxariseowe'sx, i'kwe'sx yakha' seena' yuh ũukhũukha', i'kwe'sxa' putatxhã', me'sukwe, kĩjkĩhwa uuthasxte ũsna txãa yu'sa' jxuka diesmo dukhçxawa, Dxus yu'sa' ũusu jxuka wedxna nwẽese'jna fxi'ze'çmeei'kwe naa pa'ga seena' yuh ũukhũukha'. Diesmo's dukhwa'j yuja', nawa Dxusna nwẽese'jni wejx jxthaakwe ewa'.

Fxariseowe'sx, i'kwe'sx yakh seena' yuh ũukhũukha', i'kwe'sxa' judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenisu kaçxni wejx ewsaçxáana i'kwe pakwé', sa' çxhabsu msuuwa ewkuẽçxáa weçxa jxthãasna i'kwe pekũju' naa pa'ga seena' yuh ũukhũukha'.

Ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' fxariseowe'sx, i'kwe'sx yakha' seena' yuh ũukhũukha', i'kwe'sxa' ãajuçxáa ew we'weçxa', ũus dxiiju yu' ewmeeçxáa yajkxna fxi'zepa'ga. I'kwe'sxa' uusáa pedani kafxa's aphnisa na'wẽi'kwe. Txãa kafxa's aphte', nasa' ma'wẽ dxiiga kĩh ũstewa jiimée kajkwesu skhẽuukx txã'wẽçxáa i'kwe jiyunimeete fxi'ze' jĩte',
ley kaapiya'jsa pasçxa':
—Kwe'sxtxig açewe'we' jĩtewa,
Jesusa' ki' we'weçxa':
—Ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx, i'kwe'sx yakha' seena' yuh ũukhũukha', i'kwe'sxwa vxiteçxáatx txã'wẽ kim yuhwa ãjãwa'jmée thẽysa's ũsçxa', i'kwe'sx yu', ma'wẽkuẽçxáa yuhwa pu'çxhiçmeei'kwe naa pa'ga.
Txã'wẽy i'kwe'sx ji'j yaçgawe'sx txã'wẽ Dxus yuwe pta'sxsatx ikhçxa pedaate', i'kwe'sx yu' txãa pedani's zhiçxkwe vxitnai'kwe pheu'ju'.
Sa' txã'wẽ yũuçxa', kwe'sx ji'j yaçgawe'sx ew yuh yuutx jĩçxane'kwe txãawe'sx ikhçxa pedani's zhiçxkwe vxitna pheu'ju' naapa'ga i'kwe'sx yakha' seena' yuh ũukhũukha'.
Kxajíi Dxusa' txã'wẽ yũuni's we'weçxak na'jĩ': Adx yuwee pta'sxsa txãniitey ensuwa kaja'nja, sa' naa ensuwa kaja'nja. Nawa maaíitxi' ikhetxna, sa' vxite yuutxi' wala ahçena pkxuutxna jĩ'k.
Naa ensu nasa' jxukaysa kastigo's knayuutxna,

txã'wẽ Abela's ikhnijũjx Dxus yuwe pta'sxsatx ikhçxa Zakariasa's ikhni entepkaçx ee pkawpa'ga. Txãa Zakarias yu'sa' dxuus yat patxute altal utxatetx ikh. Txãa pa'ga naa ensu nasatx Dxusa' kastigaĩna, txã'wẽ Dxus kaahnisatx ikhpa'ga.

Ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx, i'kwe'sx yakha' seena' yuh ũukhũukha', i'kwe'sxa' txakwe wala leya's jiisatha'w jĩçxawa, vxite yuutxi's kaapiya'ja'çmeei'kwe. Txãasa vxite jiyu wẽesatx i'kwe'sxa' yupnaçxáa ũsi'kwe jĩte',
ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' fxariseowe'sxa' wala ũusaçxaçxa kĩhçxáawa wala paapẽjxtxi,
kĩhteçxáawa ewmée paste' pãatxhĩ'khya' sũhçxa.
Txajũ' nasa iiméh seena' wala pkhaakheçxa jxuka utate', Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx khuẽ'ytxi na'wẽk we'we:
—Fxariseowe'sx ewmée yũuna fxi'zeni's mpa'yajkxwe. Txã'wẽme' txãawe'sxa' ãajuçxáa ew we'weçxa', ũus dxiite yu', ewmeeçxáatx yaaki'.
Nawa makwe paaçte sũthnisaçxawa kĩh yuhwa ãate vxyaamée yu' neeyũumeena, sa' makwe ũusteçxáa yaakxnisawa kĩh yuhwa jiyunimée yu' neeyũumeena.
Txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxa' kim yuhwa wẽsẽ'jnimeete wá'kwe we'we' nawa jxuka pthũusena. Meeçxa' i'kwe'sx ũusteçxáa wá'kwe ewmée yajkx, nawa maazkuẽe yat-suwa jxuka kaajiyu'jni yuuna.
Ãçxha', adx namiku i'kwe'sxtxi na'jĩ'th: Kakweçxá's ikhsatxi' ũukhnuwe. Txãawe'sxa' kakweçxá's ikhçxa', jwee yu' kĩhwa yũuya' ãjãmeetxna.
Nawa pta'sxiçthu kimna ũukhwa'thewa: Naa kiwete ĩtxĩ u'juni's kusa'jçxa', ũusa's infxiernote kaahwa'jsaçxá's ũukhna mfxi'zewe. Txã'sçxáa ũukhwa'ja'.
Tahç vxiçxakuẽtx e'z centawoteçxáak ya'txweyú'. Nawa makwe pa'gameesatewa Dxusa' teeçxçxáa yuhnawa peçxkanaméek thegna fxi'ze'.
I'kwe'sx jxkwette dxkhas yuhwa jxuka isani ũsta'. Aça' i'kwe'sx yu' maazkuẽe vxiçxakuẽtewa jxthaakwe pa'gasai'kwe. Txãasa ũukhmée mfxi'zewe.

I'kwe'sxtxi na'jĩçthu: maawa naa kiwete nasaa dxi'pte thaamemée Kristo jĩith jĩna ãate pta'sxsatxi', adxwa Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' txã'wẽy Dxus angeleswe'sx dxi'pte thaamemée: Na' adx nasata' jĩna pta'sxi'nja.
Nawa maawa naa kiwete nasaa dxi'pte thaameçxa Kristo's jiimeeth jĩna ĩsxĩijana aça' adxwa Dxus angeleswe'sx dxi'pte txã'sa' jiimeeth jĩ'nja.
Maawa Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's makwe açewe'wetewa, ya'peltunaĩna. Nawa Dxus Espiritu's açewe'wete', bagaçxte yuhwa peltunãynimée yuuna.
Na'jĩ'th na': i'kwe'sxtxi judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenisu meeçxa' khuẽswe'sx tasxte kuutxa'thewa, ũukhnuwe kuh yajkxna kĩh we'weki'th sũhna.
Txãa pa'gatey Dxus Espiritu' ma'wẽ we'wewa'ja'swa kaaũusuthe'jena txãa dudte jĩk.
Txajũ' teeçx piçthẽ'j nasaa ksxavxyte ũssa' Jesusa's na'jĩk:
—Adx yakhthẽ'ja's meen we'we, tatawe'sx ji'phuni's pxãhn adx jĩi txudeekahn jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—¿Kimga adxa'sa' txudeedewa'jsa meeçxawa khuẽs na'wẽsa ki'p? jĩçxa',
na'wẽk we'we:
—Mpa'yajkxwe, naa kiwete ji'phuniçxá's yaakxnisa's. Txã'wẽme' naa kiwete kĩjkĩhwa ji'phuçxaçxáa txã'wẽ ĩtxĩ ya'fxi'ze'çme'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'wẽk ejemplo pta'sx:
—Teeçx piçthẽ'j wala ji'phsa u'pu'k. Txajx kiwete uuthasx wala yũnku.
Aça' txãa ji'phsa' yajkxya' kaçxku: ¿Ma'wẽ yũuki'th? Mtee yuhwa adx ũ'a's jxuka jxaawya' ãjãnimeeth sũjũ'k.
Sa' yajkxku: Jiiyã'th ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa. Ũ' jxaaw yattxi pẽtxya'wath, vxite wejx walasa txajxa'. Sa' kĩjkĩh ũ'wa thẽ'the' vxite' kĩh ji'phunitxwa kxtee jxaawu'nja.
Txajũ' adx ũuste na'jĩ'nja: Wala kĩhwa jxaawni ji'phgu, wala kuh anxu selpiwa'j. Ãçxha' mjĩimée kaasena kĩhwa ũ'na weçxweçxa miyajkx sũjũ'k.
Nawa Dxusa' na'jĩk: Ãhmeeg yaaki'. Naa kuste uuya'wag. Aça' iidx ji'phuni jxaawni' ¿kiim jĩi yuuwa'jtxna? jĩk.
Jesus we'weçxa': Txã'wẽk ya'yu' naa kiwete ji'phuniçxá's nuywalaana ũsçxa', Dxus dxi'pte yu' puuplek neeyũ' jĩk.
Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi' na'wẽk yu'kxpeh:
—I'kwe'sxa' ¿kĩhte ũ'wa'j uyuukxtha'w? Sa' ropawa ¿kĩhte uyuukxtha'w? sũhna pa'pçxunuwe.
Txã'wẽ yuukahmeníi ĩtxĩ fxi'zenisa' ũ'nite jxthaakwe ewsa', aça' txã'wẽy kakwewa ropate jxthaakwe ewsa'.

Vxiçxakuẽtx mthegwe wakx. Txãawe'sxa' uja'çwameeta', sa' ũ' jxaaw yatwa txahçxa ũ' pkhakhe'çwameeta'. Nawa Dxusa' txãawe'sxtxi' sã'jĩ'k na' i'kwe'sx yuutxi's wejx txã'wẽ sã'jĩna vxiçxakuẽte jxthaakwesai'kwe naa pa'ga.
I'kwe'sxa' ¿maaçxá' iiméh wala pa'pçxuçxa peena medio metro thaakwe walaaya' ãjama'kwe?
Txã'wẽ ãjameeçxa', ¿kĩjxa'çxáakwe naa kiwetewe'sxçxáatx txakwe wala pa'pçxu'?
Kitetx mthegwe, ropa uyya' mjĩimeeçxawa ma'wẽta zhiçxkwe walá'. Isath we'we': Jxkaahsa Salomon txakwe ji'phsa yuhçxawa txãa kite na'wẽ yu' zhiçxkwesa ropa athme'.
Kite' teeçx en fxi'zena', kuskuuskhẽ' ipxte kabwa'jçxáa yã'thewa txã'wẽk zhiçxkwe pheu'j. Dxusa' txã'wẽy i'kwe'sx yuutxi's wejx ropa ewsa ũsna nes yuuna na's i'kwe Dxusa' txã'wẽ yuuna sũjũ'çmée.
Txã'wẽ yã'the', ũ'wa'j ¿kĩhte uyuukxtha'w? sũhna pa'pçxuna fxi'zenuwe.
Naa kiwete nasaçxáatx kakwete peejiniçxáana yajkxna fxi'ze'. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' cielute Tata ji'phi'kwe txã' jxuka jiiyã'ja' i'kwe'sx kĩh peejini'swa.
Txãa pa'ga wejxwa Dxus jxkaahnitewe'sxa's khuẽ'yna wejx thaakwe mpa'pçxuwe. Naa kiwetewe'sxtxi' wejx pa'pçxumeetewa, pejka yuh ũsni yuuna.
I'kwe'sxa' kuhmeekwe i'kwe nawa ũukhnuwe, txãa pa'gatey i'kwe'sx Tata cielutewe'sxa' i'kwe'sxtxi peeygãhçxa txajx jxkaahna ũsni's i'kwe'sxtxi ũsya'wa'.
Ji'phunisa's txweyçxa jxpeejxsatx mpeeswe. Vxyu jxaawni suwewa'jmeesa mvxitwe. I'kwe'sx ji'phuni cielutewe'sxa' pçumeena, kxteea' kĩh peswée yuhwa u'kameena, sa' çxikaçxáa yuhwa suwmeena.
Mtee jxaawni ji'phçxa', kxte yuuçxáak wejx jxthaakwe yajkxna ya'fxi'ze'.
Jxuka pheu'jçxa lamparatx pki'taçxa ũythasna meswe.
Patrona' boda yatu sxawedna pa'jçxa', vxitxte tu'kakaçpkaçxha', selpisaawe'sxa' dudtey vxitxa's phaadeya' jxpa'yakx ũythasna ũssa na'wẽ myuuwe.
Jxpa'yakx ũste patron pa'the', selpisaawe'sx yakha' wala yuh weçxa yuhna. Isath we'we': Txã'wẽ jxpa'yakx ũssatxi' patrona' pheu'jçxa mesate kaaçxi'jina puuçya'.
Kuspxãh ma'k yuu meeçxa' khikhiiçte ma'k yuu nawa jxpa'yakx ũste pa'the', selpisaawe'sx yakha' wala yuh weçxa yuhna.
Ũus miyajkxwe wakx: Maa yat namuwa peswée kĩh orate txajx yatte pa'jwa'ja's jiyuwaça', dehmée jxpa'yakx ũsçxa' ka'ga'jmeena txajx yatte pesweewe'sxte.
I'kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy pheu'jçxa jxpa'yakx meswe. Txã'wẽme', yajkxmée ũsiyna, Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusá' kĩhçxáa yuuna jĩk.
Txajũ' Pedro' na'wẽk pẽjx:
—Naa ejemplo' ¿kwe'sx jĩiçxáa wáana meeçxa' jxukaysatx wá'ga pta'sxi'? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Maa patronwa yultumu nwẽesẽ'jsa ewsa's neewe'weçxa nvxiituna, txajx yatte mjĩisatx sã'jĩna nes yuukahn.
Aça' patron jxkaahni's kxtey yuuna ũste patron pa'the', txãa selpisáa yakha' wala yuh weçxa yuhna.
Isath we'we': Txã'wẽ yũusa's patrona' txajx ji'phuni's kĩjkĩhnawa jxuka txãa yultumuçxaçxá's neewe'weçxa thegkahn nvxiituna.
Nawa txãa yultumu': Adx patron dud pa'jmeena sũhçxa kxtee mjĩisatx pkxuuya' kiiteçxa, txãa yu' tudxna tũuya' kiitena.
Naapkaçxha' txajx patrona' sxaweduuna txã'wẽ yultumu' patron pa'jwa'ja's jiimeeçxa' ũythasmée ũsiyna. Sa' wala seena' kastigaĩna, nwẽesẽ'jsameewe'sxtxi ma'wẽ kastigaĩkx txã'wẽy.
Maa selpisaawa txajx patron jxthãasni's jiiçxawa kxtey nwẽesẽ'jsame', wala kujus kastigãyni yuuna.

Nawa maa selpisaawa patron jxkaahni's jiimeeçxa' ãhmée yũuna txã'sa' kujusmée ya'kastigaĩna. Maanawa wala ũsçxa', wala ya'pẽyina. Aça' maanawa jxthaakwe kĩhnawa neewe'weçxa', jxthaakwe ew jxpe'khaníi yuuna.
Naa kiwete ipx pki'taya' kĩisa na'wẽth kĩh, behnayã'j ũswaç ma'wẽ wala weçxaaki'th.
Adxa' uuwa'jsath txãasa wala nxusna u'juth uuwa'j en ãhpkaçx.
Naa kiwete puiimée wẽt kaafxi'ze'jya'ne' kĩh ¿sũjũ'wá'kwe adxa'sa'? Nawa txã'wẽ yũuya' kĩhmeeth. Adx pa'gateçxáa maa nasaíi yu' puutx yahçena puiina fxi'zetxna.
Ãçxhũyã'ja' teeçx yattewe'sx tahç nasaçxawa tekhsa' e'zsatx ahçena puutx txã'wẽçxaçxáa puiina fxi'zetxna.

Neya' nçxi'ka's açeyajkxna fxi'zena. Aça' nçxi'ka' neya's txã'wẽy yũuna fxi'zena. Njĩ'ja' niisa's ahçena fxi'zena, aça' niisa' njĩ'ja's txã'wẽy yũuna fxi'zena. Swegra' nkuẽmyu's açena, naapkaçxha' nkuẽmyu', swegra's açena.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
