—I'kwe'sxa' sek khẽenijũ tãaph kiitena yuhte', nus pa'jya'wa' jĩ'i'kwe, aça' kxtey yu'k.
Sa' wejxaaçte', sek ya'wa' jĩ'i'kwe, aça' kxtey yu'k.
¿Ma'wẽ yuuçxa nus pa'jna ki' sek ya'watewa jiisatha'w jĩna ũuste yu' iiwejçx i'kwe yajkxna fxi'ze'? Sa' jiisaçxa' ¿ma'wẽtekwe naa ensu' kĩh yũuçtewa txã's yu' jiyu'çmée?
I'kwe'sxa' ¿mjĩitekwe ewteçxah puutx we'wena yuwe's pheu'ju'çmée?

Maawa idxa's pãatxhĩ'khte', txãa yakh khuẽs tasxte utxaaya' u'jweççxa', dxi'the ewteçxah puutx we'wena yuwe's mpheu'jwe, kxah khuẽs tasxte kuutxa'jmeena. Txã'wẽme', khuẽsa' idxa's policia's dukhena, aça' policia yu', karcelte kxuuphana.
Na'jĩ'th na': Txajũyã'ja' vxyu nmeh ji'phuni's dukhmeeçxa yu', karceluh kasehmeene'ga jĩk.
Txãa ensuy nasa maaíi yu' Jesusa's na'wẽtx pta'sxna utxáa:
—Galileajuwe'sxa' Dxusna weçxana neewe'weya' altalte kabwa'j tajkx ikheçpkaçxha', Pilato' txãawe'sxtxi' ikhkaakh, aça' txãawe'sx eea' takx ee yakh jxuka ka'duk jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Galileaju nasatx txã'wẽ yũute', txãa uusaawe'sxa' Galileasu nasate jxthaakwe pkalsane'ta yu', txãa pa'gatx txã'wẽ uu ena's ji'phu ¿sũjũkwé'?
Na'jĩ'th na': Txãawe'sxçxáa thaakwe pkalsa yu'çmeeta'. Aça' i'kwe'sxwa pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedmeeçxa', txãawe'sx na'wẽyçxáa uuwa'jsai'kwe.
Txã'wẽy diecioçxo nasa Siloete toçxe kajkwekhẽ wetete' uutx txãa uusaawe'sxa' Jerusalen çxhabte u'psawe'sxte jxthaakwe yuuwesane'ta yu', txãa pa'gatx txã'wẽ uu ena's ji'phu ¿sũjũkwé'?
Na'jĩ'th na': txãawe'sxçxáa thaakwe yuuwesa yu'çmeeta'. Aça' i'kwe'sxwa pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedmeeçxa', txãawe'sx na'wẽyçxáa uuwa'jsai'kwe.
Jesusa' naa ejemplo'sku pta'sx:
—Teeçx piçthẽ'ja' higwera fxtũu tasxku txajx kiwete uhni ji'phu'. Sa' thegya' u'kh, yũnwáana sũhçxa. Nawa uyme'.
Txajũ' na'jĩk kxtee uuthasx thegsa's: Naa fxtũu tasx yũnuuçwáana sũhçxa adx thegya' pa'jna ũsni tekh anxuyã'ja', nawa teeçx yũn yuhwa uynimeeth. Aça' mespẽ'th, ¿mjĩya'çxáa kxul ũsya'wana? jĩte',
uuthasx thegsa pasçxa': Menvxiht naa anxuçxáawa, aça' kiwe's luupe'jçxa sxaakwe'je'nja.
Aça' yũnne'jwáana. Txã'wẽ yũute yũnmeete, kaaspẽ'the'jene'ga jĩk.
Teeçx sapatu jxkaase ente', Jesusa' judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenitek kaapiya'jna ũsu'.
Aça' kxte' teeçx u'y diecioçxo anxuyã'j ãçã'na u'jusak ũsu', eçx luuku vxit-sa pkxuute ku'le u'juya' ãjasamée.
Aça' Jesus uyçxa', pa'yak:
—I'kwe' naa weeju katxhiyã'ji'kwe jĩçxa',
Jesusa' ãçã'sa kakwete jxa'dxku. Naapkaçxha' txãa u'ya' dudtey ku'le'ya' ãjãçxa', seena' wala Dxusa's weçxana we'wek.
Jesusa' txã'wẽ sapatu jxkaase entewa ãçã'a's nuykatxhite', judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenite npiiçthẽ'jsa' ũusaçxaçxa nasatx na'jĩk:
—Ki'su' seis en ji'pha' mjĩiwa'j. Aça' katxhi wẽeçxa' vxite ensu myuhwe. Nawa sapatu jxkaase ente yu', katxhiya'çxáa yu' pa'jnuwe jĩnak jxkaah.
Aça' Jesus pasçxa':
—Ãateçxáa ew we'weçxa' ũuste yu' ewmeeçxáa yaakxsawe'sx mpaaswe: I'kwe'sx kla meeçxawa i'kwe'sx jiba tudni ũste', makwe jxkaase entewa jxũkhwedeçxa yu' yusya' ¿jxũna u'jmeema'kwe?
Naa u'ya' Abrahan ji'ja' nawa eçxthẽ'ja' diecioçxo anxuk kaãçã'jna ji'phu'. Aça' makwe jxkaase entewa eçxthẽ'j kuseju kusa'the ¿ewmeemanx? jĩte',
Jesusa's açeyaakxsawe'sxa' wẽsẽ'jçxa', thaametx. Nawa nasa jwee kuhsa yu' weçxa'tx, Jesus txakwe wala ew yũupa'ga.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena' ¿ma'wẽkx sũjũ'kwe? Txã'sa' ¿kĩh yakh kaaja'da'jaki'th?
Nawa na'wẽ': teeçx piçthẽ'j txajx kiwete mostasa fxiwa's uhte', ma'wẽ seena' walaakx. Aça' vxiçxakuẽ yuhwa txãa mostasa ku'tasu yaatutxki txã'wẽsa'.
Ki'kin vxite ejemplo na'wẽsa yakhku kaaja'da'jna pta'sx Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena's:
—Teeçx u'ya' tekh libra skuutxh ũ'wete le'çxkwe lewadura's ka'dte', ma'wẽ jxuka pẽethẽjekx txã'wẽy yuuna jĩk.
Jesusa' Jerusalenna u'jweççxa', çxhabsu msuuwa iikaapiya'kh u'jwe'.
Aça' teeçxsa' na'wẽk pejx:
—Dxus tasxte ewte neeyũuwa'jsa' ¿kuhmeewáatxna? jĩte', Jesus pasçxa':
—I'kwe'sxa' wala yuh mpa'pçxuwe vxitx pteezte u'kaya'. Na'jĩ'th na': Maawa wala yuh u'ka wẽjẽtxna, nawa thẽytewa pa'pçxumeeçxa yu' u'kaya' ãjãmeetxna.

Yat namu' vxitxa's aphyã'the', i'kwe'sxa' ekaju neeyũuçxa' vxitxte tu'kakana na'jĩne'kwe: Vxitxa's meen phaade, kwe'sx u'kaya'watha'w jĩne'kwe. Nawa txãa pasçxa': Adxa' jiimeeth i'kwe'sxa' majũwe'sxne'kwe nawa jĩte',
i'kwe'sxa' na'jĩne'kwe: Kwe'sxa' idx yakh txutemée mteewa u'jusatha'w. Aça' idxa' kwe'sx çxhabsuwa kaapiya'jg jĩwá'kwe.
Nawa txã' na'wẽ pasuna: Na'jĩyã'th na', i'kwe'sxtxi' jiimeeth majũwe'sxne'kwe nawa. Adx tasxu me'jwe, i'kwe'sxa' jxukay ewmée yũusaçxáa i'kwe jĩna.
Aça' i'kwe'sx yu' eka kutxi'jni neeyũuçpkaçxha', Abrahan, Isaak, Jakob vxite' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa txãawe'sx yu' Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite ũste uyçxa', seena' wala ũ'nene'kwe ki'th yuhtxwa ksuusu'jna.
Ekaju neeyũusáa txã'wẽ nxuskahníi sek kãanijũwe'sx, sek khẽenijũwe'sx, majũ majũwe'sxwa jxuka pa'jya'wata', Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite u'kaya'.
Aça' kxtee u'kawa'jsa ãçxh maaíi yu' e'stewe'sx ũsta' txãa yu' yaçte yuutxna, naapkaçxha' yaçtewe'sx yu' e'ste yuutxna jĩk.
Txãa entey maz fxariseowe'sx pa'jçxa', Jesusa's na'jĩtx:
—Me'j ayjxu. Txã'wẽme', Herodesa' idxa's ikhya'wa' jĩna pta'sxte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—U'jçxa na'jĩne'kwe txãa thẽ'ja's: Ãçxh yakh kuskus yakh nee mjĩiwa'j ji'phthu eçx luuku vxit-satx nasa ũusu kutxi'jna ãçã'satxwa nuykatxhina. Sa' tekh ente' mjĩina jxã'ja'nja jĩ'k jĩne'kwe.
Adxa' nee u'juwa'j en ji'phíiçxáath tekh en ãhpkaçx, txãa pa'gatey Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa' Jerusalen ekaju yu' uuwa'j ji'phme'.

Jerusalentewe'sxa' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsatx ikhna Dxus kaahnisatxwa pãpana pkxuui'kwe. Nawa adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi' maazkuẽe uswa pa'yath nwe'weya', atalxwa ma'wẽga luuçxkuẽtx fxuu ku'ta dxiite yu'ãsxi' txã'wẽy yũuya', nawa nwẽesẽ'jmeei'kwe.
Txãa pa'ga mpa'yajkxwe. I'kwe'sx çxhaba' jxuka pçuuna sa' ãçxhũyã'ja' adxa's peena yu' uymeene'kwe, Dxus kaahni jxtuhthe ki' kĩiwa'j en ãhpkaçx jĩ k.
Teeçx sapatu jxkaase ente' Jesusa' fxariseo npiiçthẽ'j yattek ũ'ya' u'j. Aça' vxite fxariseowe'sx yu' peethegu'natx ũsu'.
Txãa yatte' teeçx piçthẽ'j çu'vxy weete ãçã'sak ũsu'.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩnak pẽjx ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' fxariseowe'sxtxi:
—Sapatu jxkaase entewa ãçã'sa's nuykatxhite ¿ewmanx? jĩte',
txãawe'sxa' pasmée sxuuna'tx neeyũu. Aça' Jesusa' txãa ãçã'sa's pa'yaçxa nuykatxhiçxak kaah.
Sa' fxariseowe'sxtxi' na'jĩk:
—I'kwe'sx jiba meeçxawa i'kwe'sx kla kafxte khẽeçxa u'pte', ¿dudtey kutxi'jmeema'kwe jxkaase entewa?
Txã'jĩte', weh yuhwa pasya' ãjãmeeta'.
Fxiestate pi'kxnisa' kaçxni ewsaçxáatx txhitxhiçte uyçxa', Jesusa' na'wẽk yu'kxpeh:
—Boda fxiestate i'kwe'sxtxi pi'kxte', kaçxní ewsu yu' kaçxnuwe. Txã'wẽme' vxite i'kwe'sxte jxthaakwe jxtuhthesa wáa pa'jana,
aça' fxiesta namu' i'kwe'sxtxi kiisuna: Ayte' naajx kaçxwa'jçxá' jĩçxa. Aça' wala thaamena u'jwene'kwe kaçxní açxamée ewkhẽ kaçxya'.
Fxiestate i'kwe'sxtxi pi'kxte', wejxwa nmeh puzakhẽ mkaaçxwe, kxah i'kwe'sxtxi pi'kxsa uyçxa': Namiku, ay yaçkhẽ wejx ewkhẽ myuh kaçxya' jĩte', wala weçxana yaçkhẽ kaçxya' u'jwene'kwe.
Maawa walasath sũhna iiwejçx iiwejçx yaakxsa' thaamewa'jçxáa ji'phuna. Nawa ãhmeekwesa na'wẽçxáa yajkxna fxi'zesa' jxtuhthe wálasa yuuna.
Sa' fxiesta namu pi'kxsa'swa na'jĩk Jesusa':

—Idxa' sã'jĩya' pi'kiççxa', iidx namikuwe'sxtxi yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi pukakhẽ npe'sxtxi meeçxawa utxasuwe'sx vxyu ji'phsatx pi'kxnu. Txã'wẽme' txãawe'sxwa kaasxwedu'ju'tha'w jĩna idxa's txã'wẽy sã'jĩya' pi'kitxna.
Aça' sã'jĩya' fxiesta vxituççxa', wejxwa puuple ãhmeekwesa legsa uysamée txã'wẽsaçxáatx mpi'kx sã'jĩya'.
Aça' txãawe'sxa' ka'tu' txã'wẽy kaasxwedu'jya' ãjãmeetxna idxa's. Nawa weçxana mneeyũu, txãa pa'gatey Dxusa' idxa's deweena Dxus luuçx ki' ĩtxĩ yuu ente' jĩk.
Txã'wẽ pta'sxni's wẽsẽ'jçxa', mesate u'psa teeçxsa' na'wẽk we'we Jesusa's:
—Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite u'kaçxa ũ'sa yakha' wala yuh weçxa yuhna jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk kwentu'j:
—Teeçx piçthẽ'j fxiesta wala vxituççxa', nasa seena' wala kuh pi'kxku sã'jĩya'.
Sa' ũ'wa'j ora ãjãçte', teeçx selpisa's pa'yaya' kaakh: Ũ'ya' myuhwe, jxuka pheu'jniyã'j ũsa' jĩna pa'yakahn.
Nawa jxukaysa wa'lçxa na'wẽçxáatx pas: Nyafxtewe'sx pasçxa': Kiweth wey, sa' thegya' u'jwe ji'phthu. Aça' tee peltunaĩ jĩk.
Aça' vxite we'weçxa': Diez novxilxoth wey, sa' thegya' u'jweçthu. Naa pa'ga tee peltunaĩ jĩk.
Aça' tekhtewe'sxa' na'wẽk pas: Ãçxçxáatha'w ptamúu, sa' yujxa' tuduume'nja jĩk.

Txajũ' selpisá' sxawedna u'jçxa txajx patrona's jxuka pta'sxku. Aça' patrona' wala ũusaçxaçxa txã's selpisa's na'jĩnak jxkaah: Dudtey plaasasu klxiikhunsu ki' u'jçxa puuple ãhmeekwesa legsa yafx puuple uysamée txã'wẽsatx pi'kxçxa ayte pe'jna yuweene'ga jĩk.
Aça' selpisá' u'jçxa ki' sxawedna pa'jçxa': Iidx jxkaahni's kxtey yuuth, aça' pa'jtx. Nawa kaçxwa'j yu' nee ũsiyçxáata' jĩte',
patrona' selpisá's na'jĩk: Ãçxha' çxhab ekaju jxu'juwe'sx vxite' dxi'j u'jsatxwa pi'kxçxa ayte ka'ga'jane'kwe makwe wa'luçtewa ãadxijimée, adx yatte utapkaçx.
Nawa nyafxte pi'kxnisa wa'ltxi txãawe'sx yuutxi' kaapa'ja'jme'nja adx yatte puuçya' jĩk. Txã'jĩnak kwentu'j Jesusa'.
Txajũ' Jesus e'ste nasa wala u'jweç yu'tx, aça' txãawe'sxtxi yu'thegçxa na'jĩk:
—Maawa adx yakh yuusá' txajx ney, njĩ'j, nyu, luuçx, nyakhwe'sx, npe'sxwe'sxtxi nvxihtçxa txã'wẽy iiwejçx yajkxna fxi'zeni's uu entepkaçx nvxihtmeeçxa yu', adx yakh fxi'zeya' ãjãmeena.
Sa' makwe thẽyte uupçxãhtewa txãatxi' yajkxmée, adx yakh yuhmeeçxa yu' adx yakh fxi'zeya' ãjãmeena.
I'kwe'sxa' yat wálasa txajxa'waçxa', jxuka jxã'jwa'j kĩjkĩhwa ãh ũstxmanx sũhna kaçxçxa ¿yajkxmeema'kwe?
Txã'wẽ yũumeete', kiwete pxãhn pa'j mjĩiçxaçxáa nvxihtte', maawa uysa' npeevxysxikatxna:
Jxã'jya' ãjãme' jĩna.
Txã'wẽy maa npiiçthẽ'jwa vxite npiiçthẽ'j yakh puiiya'waçxa', kaçxçxa ũus yajkxmeema'k: Naa diez mil soldau yakhçxáa weinte mil soldautx ¿knayma'th? sũhna.
Sa' ewupçxãhmeete', vxite npiiçthẽ'j utxameyna, yuwe kajana kuçx puiimée ewteçxah neeyũuya'.
Aça' txã'wẽy i'kwe'sxwa dxiikhẽy jxuka ũus yajkxçxa i'kwe'sx ji'phuni's nvxihtmeeçxa yu', adx yakh fxi'zeya' ãjãmeene'kwe.
Nega' selpi'k, nawa jxuka sxũukãhçxa' ¿ma'wẽ selpiikx?
Kiwete sxaakwe'jwa'jçxáa yuhwa selpi'çme', pubwa'jçxáak yu'. Jiyuwa'jsa ũsçxa', jiyune'kwe jĩk.
Gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsawe'sx vxite' pkalsawe'sx jxukaysa Jesus pta'sxni's wẽsẽ'jya' utxaatx.
Txãa pa'gatx Dxus ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' fxariseowe'sxa' Jesusa's na'jĩna nuywe'we:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' wala fxiy yu'k, pkalsawe'sxtxi jxpa'gaçxa txãawe'sx yakhku ũ'we' jĩte',
Jesusa' naa ejemplo'sku pta'sx:
—I'kwe'sxa' cien piisxáa ji'phçxa', teeçxsa' vxyaameete', vxite nowenta y nwewesatx kxsũu nvxihtçxa ¿piisxáa vxitusa's pakweya' u'jmeema'kwe uypkaçx?
Sa' piisxa's uyçxa', yakhçxa wala weçxana
yatte pa'jçxa, namikuwe'sx vxite' kxsũu utxasuwe'sxtxi pa'yaçxa: Adx piisxáa vxitusa's uyyã'th, aça' adx yakh ja'da weçxa mpu'çxwe jĩna ¿pta'sxmeema'kwe?
Na'jĩ'th na': Cielutewa txã'wẽy nowenta y nwewe nasa ewsate jxthaakwe wala weçxa yuja' teeçx nasaçxáawa pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedte'.
Txã'wẽy teeçx u'y diez vxyu musx ji'phçxa', teeçxsa wetete', ¿lampara's pki'taçxa yatte jxpa'yakx padna pakwemeema'k uypkaçx?
Sa' txãa vxyu's uyçxa' txajx namikuwe'sx vxite' kxsũu utxasuwe'sxtxi pa'yaçxa: Ũ'kwe vxyu wetesa's uythu, aça' ũ'kwe yakh ja'da weçxa mpu'çxwe jĩna ¿pta'sxmeema'k?
Na'jĩ'th na': Dxus angeleswe'sxtxiwa txã'wẽy weçxa yuja' teeçx nasaçxáawa pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedte'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' vxite ejemplo na'wẽsak pta'sx:
—Teeçx piçthẽ'j e'z nçxi'kku ji'phu'.
Aça' nuuçxsa' neya's na'jĩk: Tata, iidx ji'phuni adx jĩi yuuwa'ja's txuhdeçxa mah jĩte', neya' txuhdeçxa dukhku.
Aça' jxpa'gani maz enteçxáa txãa nçxi'k nuuçxsa' ney dukhni's jxuka pkhakhçxa jxu'j kiwen u'kh. Sa' kxteea' ewmée yũuna jxuka vxyu's psuwna pebak.
Txã'wẽ vxyu's psuwna pebaaçpkaçxha', wẽjẽ en pa'kh txãa kiwete. Aça' txãa piçtakxa' wẽeya' yajkxku.
Sa' kxsũ mjĩi pakweya' u'kh teeçx piçthẽ'j tasxte. Aça' txãa piçthẽ'j yu' kuçxi sã'jĩya'k kaah txajx tulte.
Txajũ' txãa piçtakxa' wẽeçxa kuçxi ũ'pusnawa ũ' wẽek. Nawa txã'wẽsaçxáa yuhnawa puuçmeeta' txãa piçtakxa's.
Txajũ' ũus yajkxya' kaçxçxa naa sũjk: Adx yu' ayte wẽeçxa uuya'wath, naapkaçxha' adx tata yatte mjĩisa piuna' kĩh yuhwa wẽemée ũstxna maazkuẽeçxawa.
Aça' adx tata yatna ki' sxawedna u'jçxa na'jĩ'nja: Tata, Dxus dxi'pte wala ãhmée yũuth, sa' idxa'swa txã'wẽythu wala ãhmée yũu.
Sa' nçxi'kçxawa ãçxha' iidx peeygãawa'jmeeyã'th. Nawa iidx piun na'wẽçxáawa meen jxpa'ga jĩ'nja sũhnak yajkx.
Txajũ' kiiteçxa ney yatna sxawedna u'kh. Aça' pa'jaçte', neya' jiyuk jxu'the yujíyna. Sa' nçxi'ka's peeygãhçxa pu'thegya' wuwuuna u'jçxa, psxa'dçxak weçxa.
Txajũ' nçxi'ka' na'jĩk neya's: Tata, Dxus dxi'pte wala ãhmée yũuth. Sa' idxa'swa txã'wẽythu wala ãhmée yũu. Nçxi'kçxawa, ãçxha' iidx peeygãawa'jmeeyã'th jĩte',
neya' selpisaatx pa'yaçxa na'jĩnak jxkaah: Ropa ewsa kutxi'jçxa dud mkaathe'jwe. Sa' sultxhikhawa kusete ki'pçxa spaatuwa mpaathwe.
Teeçx tulu piçtakx niisxsa's nikxya' u'jçxa miikhwe, fxiesta vxitçxa ũ'ya'.
Adx nçxi'ka' uuníi na'wẽ yã'jçxawa ki'kin ĩtxĩ yuuk, sa' vxituna u'juçxawa ki' vxyaak jĩçxa', wala weçxana fxiesta vxittxi.
Naapkaçxha' nçxi'k nthẽ'jsa yu' mjĩi ehsu u'juçxa', sxawedna yatte pa'jaççxa', wẽsẽ'kh ku'jna tukani músika zhiçxkwesa's.
Sa' teeçx selpisá's pa'yaçxa pẽjxku: Yatte' ¿kĩh yũuna ũstxna? jĩte',
selpisá' pta'sxku: Iidx nyakh jxu'j kiwen u'jsa ki' sxawedna pa'kh. Txãa pa'ga iidx tata' tulu niisxsa's kiikhe'jçxa fxiesta'jaça' jĩte',
nyakh nthẽ'jsa' wala ũusaçxaçxa yatte u'kaya' wa'lku. Aça' neythẽ'ja' kasehçxa wala pxthaa we'wek u'kakahn.
Txajũ' txãa nçxi'k yu' na'jĩk neya's: Adxa' maazkuẽe anxu iidx tasxte bagaçx yuhwa wa'lmée selpiina ũstewa jiig. Nawa idxa' teeçx kaplakuẽçxáa yuhwa iiũsmeeg, adx namikuwe'sx yakh fxiesta'khan.
Nawa iidx nçxi'k txakwe wala u'y ewmeesa yakh vxyu's psuwna pebasáa yu'sa' tulu niisxsa's ikhçxag fxiesta'ja' jĩte',
neythẽ'j pasçxa': Adx nçxi'k, isa yuh we'we'g. Idxa' bagaçxtewa adx yakh txutemée nesgu yu', naa pa'ga adx ji'phuni' kĩhwa jxuka iidx jĩiçxaçxáata'.
Txã'wẽ iidx nyakh uuníi na'wẽyã'jçxawa ki'kin ĩtxĩ yuuk sa' vxituna u'juçxawa ki' vxyaak txãa pa'ga weçxana pejka fxiesta'jwa'j ji'ptha'w jĩk neya'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'jĩnak kwentu'j txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi:
—Teeçx patron wala ji'phsa' teeçx yultumu ji'phu'k. Aça' txãa yultumu ewmée yũuni's pta'sxtxi: Iidx yultumu' iidx ji'phuni's wala psuwna ũsa' jĩte',

txãa patrona' txajx yultumu's pa'yaçxa na'jĩk: Adx ji'phunitxi' wala psuwna ũsa' jĩ'tx sa' idxa' ¿kĩh yũuna ũsga? Txã'wẽ yã'jçxa', idxna neewe'weni adx ji'phuni's jxuka ki' mdukh adxna. Idxa' peena yu' adx yultumu selpiiya' ãjãmeene'ga jĩte',
yultumu' ũus yajkxya' kaçxku: Ãçxha' ¿kĩh yũuki'th adx mjĩia's patron kusa'the'? Adxa' uuthasxte mjĩiya' yu' jiimeeth sa' lmusxnu thãasna u'jute yu' thaameyuhna.
Aça' patron tasxu kasehnijũ maawa txãawe'sx yat-su pe'jna sã'jĩkahn na'wẽ yũuya'k yajkx:
Patrona's yuulsatx teeçx teeçxçxah pa'yaçxa, nyafxte utxaasa's pẽjxku: Idxa' ¿maz yuulga adx patrona's? jĩte',
Cien taçxo aceite yuulthu jĩk. Aça' yultumu' na'jĩk: Iidx yuuluni eça' ayga ũsa' txã'sa' dud yuh khũkhçxa, yuula's cinkwentaçxáa mki'p jĩk.
Txajũ' vxite'sku pẽjx: Idxa' ¿makwe yuulga? jĩte', cien açxoba skuutxh yuulthu jĩk. Aça' yultumu' na'jĩk: Iidx yuuluní eça' ayga ũsa' txã'sa' dud yuh khũkhçxa, yuula's oçxentaçxáa mki'p jĩk.

Txajũ' txãa yultumu ewmeesa' txã'wẽ dudtey yũuni's patrona' jiyuçxa': Ma'wẽ fxi'zewa'ja'swa dud yuh ũus yaaki'k jĩk. Aça' naa kiwete nasa pkalsa' Dxus luuçxte jxthaakwetx dud ũus yaaki' txãawe'sx ma'wẽ puutx we'wewa'ja'swa.

Aça' adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi' yu'kxpeje'th txã'wẽy yũukahn, naa kiwete ji'phuni's psuwmée jxpa'yakx mkseelpi'jwe namiku vxitna. Kxah naa kiwete ji'phunisa pçuutewa, vxite kiwe pçuwa'jmeete i'kwe'sxtxi jxpa'gawa'jsa ji'phune'kwe.
Maawa le'çxkuẽçxáa ji'phçxawa jxpa'yakx jxpe'jsa', walasa'swa txã'wẽy jxpa'yakx jxpe'jena. Aça' maawa le'çxkuẽçxáatewa jxpa'yakxmée psuwna jxpe'jsa', walasa'swa txã'wẽyçxáa jxpa'yakxmée psuwuuna.
Txã'wẽ naa kiwete ji'phuni'sçxáa yuhwa jxpa'yakxmée psuwna fxi'zeçte', i'kwe'sxtxi' ¿kim neewe'weçxa nvxiitukx pçuwa'jmée ji'phuwa'ja's?
Peekx jĩimée vxite jĩi yuhtxwa jxpa'yakxmée psuwna fxi'zeçte', ¿kim ũsukx i'kwe'sx jĩi yuuwa'ja's?

Maa selpisáa yuhwa e'z patrontxi selpiiya' ãjãmeena. Txã'wẽ vxiteçxá's wedxna fxi'zeçxa', vxite patron yu'sa' açena. Sa' teeçxsa jxkaahniçxá's kxtey yuuçxa', vxite patron jxkaahni yu'sa' kxtey yuuya' ãjãmeena. Txã'wẽy Dxusna selpiina naa kiwete ji'phuni'swa pa'pçxuna e'z ahtey yajkxna fxi'zeya' ãjãmeena jĩte',
fxariseowe'sxa' naa kiwete ji'phuniçxá's wejx pa'pçxuna fxi'zesa wẽsẽ'jçxa', Jesusa's weeçx we'wetx.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩk fxariseowe'sxtxi':
—I'kwe'sxa' naa kiwete nasaa dxi'pte yu' wala ewsa na'wẽ fxi'ze'i'kwe. Nawa Dxusa' i'kwe'sx ũus yaakxnitxi' jxuka jiia'. Naa kiwete nasaçxáa i'kwe'sxtxi' ewsata' jĩte', Dxus yu' txã'jĩmeena.
Moises ley vxite' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx kaapiya'jni' Juan Bautista entepkaçxtxi ũsu'. Kxajuk yuwe u'sesa' Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena's pta'sxni yuu, aça' maawa Dxus jxkaahnitewe'sx yuuya' wala pa'pçxu'tx.
Makwe cielu pçuuna, kiwewa pçuuna, nawa Dxus jxkaahni ley yu' weh yuhwa yu'pthehwa'jsame' bagaçxte yuhwa jĩk.
Maa piçthẽ'jwa peekx nyu's wãatãhçxa vxite yakh ptamuuçxa', txã' pkal yuuna. Aça' maa piçthẽ'jwa txãa u'y wãatãanisa yakh ptamuuçxa', txãawa pkal íiçxáa yuuna.
Txajũ' Jesusa' vxite kwentu na'wẽsak pta'sx:
—Teeçx piçthẽ'j wala ji'phsa u'pu'k. Sa' ropa ewsa yuuçxáa athçxa een isak wala weçxana fxiesta vxitu'.
Txãa ji'phsa yat vxitxte teeçx puuple wã'jyçxáa uta ji'phsa Lasaro yaasesak kiwete kaçxçxa u'pu'.
Txãa puuple yu' wẽeçxa ji'phsa mesa tasxsu kĩh ũ' pe'laçxáawa ũsxisatx ũ'wẽn ũythasna u'pte', alku' kũhçxa txãa wã'jytxi teçxi'tx.
Nawa teeçx ente' txãa puuple' uuk. Aça' angeleswe'sxa' jxũna u'jtx wẽt ũsnite Abrahan yakh ũskahn. Txãa e'su' ji'phsawa uuk, aça' txã'sa' pedaatx.
Aça' ji'phsa' uusaawe'sx ũsni ksxavxyte pxthaa yaaçxana ũsçxa', pesayçxa jxu'the uyku Lasaro yu' Abrahan yakh wẽt weçxana u'pte.

Txajũ' na'jĩnak sus we'we: Tata Abrahan, adxa's meen peeygãh. Seena' yuh wala pa'ga yuuna ũsthu naa ipx wala açxate. Aça' Lasaro's mkaah txajx kuse vxiççxáanawa yu'te tuupha'jçxa adx thunete tuupha'jya' yuukahn jĩte',

Abrahan pasçxa': Nçxi'k, miiyajkx. Idxa' nee ĩtxĩ u'juy yu', wala yuh wẽt weçxana fxi'zesa yu'g. Naapkaçxha' Lasaro yu' wala pxthaa yuuna nxuste fxi'zek. Nawa ãçxha' ayte wẽt weçxana ũsa', naapkaçxha' idxa' wala yuh pxthaa yuuna ũsgu.
Pxthaag we'we' nawa penxa thkafx wala txuhdena ũsa', aça' ayjxuwe'sx kxtee pesah wẽeçxawa ãjãmeetxna, sa' txajuwe'sxwa ayte pesajxa' ãjãmeetxna jĩte',
çxhavxysáa pasçxa': Txã'wẽyã'the', Tata Abrahan, idxa'sthu pxthaa we'we', aça' Lasaro's meen kaah adx tata yatna,
kxte' tahç nyakh ji'pthu txãawe'sxtxi pta'sxya' adx ayte nakwe wala pxthaa yuuna ũsthu kxtee yuukahmén jĩte',
Abrahan pasçxa': Txãawe'sxa' Moises vxite' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx fxi'jnitx ji'phta' na' txãatx wẽsẽ'jetxna jĩte',
çxhavxysáa pasçxa': Tata Abrahan, txã'wẽ yuhta'. Nawa maaçxáawa uusaawe'sx ksxavxyu ĩtxĩ yuuçxa txãawe'sxtxi' pta'sxya' u'jwaça', pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte ki' sxaweduutxna jĩk.
Aça' Abrahan pasçxa': Moises vxite' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa txãawe'sxtxi nwẽesẽ'jmeeyã'jçxa', makwe uusaawe'sx ksxavxyu ki' ĩtxĩ yuuçxa pta'sxtewa, kxul yuhna jĩk.
Jesusa' na'wẽk kaapiya'j txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi:
—Nasatx pkalte kweete'jsa yu' bagaçxtewa nes yuutxna. Nawa pkalte kweete'jsa' wala yuh nxus kastigo knayuuna.
Aça' txãa pkalte kweete'jsa's skuutxh ũ'khni kweta's txhikhte tudçxa ĩkh wala dxiikhẽ wãatãhwaç yuuçxáa wejx ewna, naa le'çxkwesatx pkalte kweete'khamen.
Txã'wẽ yũuya'mée jxpa'yakx me'juwe.
Meeçxawa idxa's wáa ãhmée yũuna iidx yakhthẽ'j aça' txã'sa' myu'kxpeh. Txajũ' ãhmée yũusa': Meen peltunaĩ jĩte', idxa' peltunãywa'j ji'phgu.
Makwe teenteçxáa sietepkaçx ãhmée yũuçxawa, kxaz usíi idxa's perdon pẽjxya' pa'the', idxa' peltunãywa'j ji'phgu jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—Dxusçxáana wejx çxhãçxha yajkxna fxi'zekahn kwe'sxtxi' meen pu'çx jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'ja's mostasa nxinx na'wẽkuẽçxáawa ji'phwaça', naa fxtũu tasxa's khubeteçxáa ĩkh walate me'j khẽeya' jĩte', txãa fxtũu tasxa' kxtey yuuna jĩk.
I'kwe'sxa' teeçx selpisáa ji'phte', txã' mjĩi ehsu u'juçxa kusuçte pa'the': Myuh ayte kaçxçxa ũ'ya' ¿jĩma'kwe?
Txã'jĩmée wejxwa na'wẽ kajane'kwe: Adx ũ'wa'j ĩiçe'jçxa mesate pheu'jçxa mtxah. Sa' adx ũ'na jxã'the, idxa' ũ'wene'ga jĩne'kwe.
Patrona' ¿selpisa's weçxama'k txã'wẽ kxtey yuupa'ga? Weçxameena.
Txã'wẽy i'kwe'sxa' Dxusa's selpiwa'jsai'kwe na' makwe txajx jxkaahni's jxuka kxtey yuuçxawa, weçxaa jxthãaswa'jsameei'kwe jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Jerusalenna u'jweççxa', Samaria vxite' Galilea kiwesuk skhẽwna u'j.
Aça' teeçx çxhabte' diez piçthẽ'j wã'jy wee kazx ji'phsatx Jesusa's puutx uyya' kaseh. Nawa jxu'theçxáa yujuçxa,
na'jĩnatx sus we'we:
—Kwe'sxtxi meen peeygãh jĩte',
Jesusa' txãawe'sxtxi' na'wẽk jxkaah:
—I'kwe'sx kakwetx sacerdotewe'sxtxi txwesya' me'jwe jĩna jxkaathe', txãawe'sxa' dxi'the u'jweçtxi yu', naapkaçxha' txãa wã'jy we' naa dudte jxuka wẽetku.
Aça' teeçxsa' katxhiyã'jçxa', dxi'juu sxawedku Dxusa's sus we'wena weçxana.
Sa' Jesus tasxte kũhçxa' peejxũkwek: Weçx ew yũug jĩna. Txãa piçthẽ'j yu' Samariajũwe'sxku yu'.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—¿Diezsaíi jxuka katxhimeewá'nta? Vxite nwewesa yu' ¿mteeta yuu?
¿Naa piçthẽ'j vxite ajũwe'sxçxáa wá' Dxusna weçxaya' sxawed? jĩçxa',
txãa piçthẽ'ja's na'jĩk:
—Kiiteçxa me'j. Idxa' katxhinig neeyũu, txã'wẽ Dxusa' nuykatxhina sũhçxane'ga kxtey nwẽesẽ'j naa pa'ga jĩk.
Txajũ' fxariseowe'sxa' Jesusa's na'jĩnatx pẽjx:
—¿Bagaçx Dxusa' isa naa kiwete jxkaajakx? jĩte', Jesus pasçxa':
—Dxus naa kiwete jxkaahni's yafxju yu' ãate ya'uymeena.
Dxusa' jxkaajxa' pa'jçxa: Ãçxha' ayte ũsa' meeçxawa kxtee ũsa' jĩna ya'we'wemeena. Txãa pa'gatey i'kwe'sxa' Dxus jxkaahni enteyã'j ũsi'kwe.
Txajũ' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi na'jĩnak yu'kxpeh:
—I'kwe'sxa' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa naa kiwete kĩini's dud uy wẽjẽne'kwe, nawa dud yu' uymeene'kwe.
I'kwe'sxtxi' nasa yu' na'jĩwáatxna: Ayte ũsa' meeçxa' kxtee ũsa' jĩtewa, u'jmeene'kwe sa' nwẽesẽ'jwameene'kwe.
Kpi'sx kwehnewaççxáa ma'wẽ naa dudte majũwa jxuka vxyaakx, txã'wẽyçxáa yuuna Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa pa'jwa'j en ãhte'.
Nawa txãa en ãhmeyna, Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' wala pa'ga yuuna naa ensu nasa yaaçeni.
Noé ensuwa ma'wẽga yuu, txã'wẽyçxáa yuuna Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa pa'jwa'j ensuwa.
Noé ensu nasa' kĩh yuhwa peejxmée ũ'na ptamuuna vxite' txãawe'sx niisatx kaaimi'a'jnatx ũsu'. Nawa Noé barkote u'kaçpkaçxha', nus wala pa'jçxa ĩkh utate' jxuka uutx.
Lot ensuwa txã'wẽytxi yũuna ũsu', kĩh yuhwa peejxmée ũ'na, uuthasx vxitna, txweyna, yatwa txã'wẽytxi wala txahna ũsu'.
Nawa Lot Sodomajũ kasejeçpkaçxha', cielujũ asufxre behna kĩhçxa jxukaysatx kabku.
Txã'wẽyçxáa yuuna Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa vxyaa entewa.
Txãa ente' ẽeyatte wáa u'psa yuuna, nawa sa'jçxa kĩhçxáanawa dxiiju kutxi'jwa'j ençxáa yuhwa ji'phumeena. Sa' maaíi yu' çxhab ekaju wáa u'ju yuuna, nawa yatna sxawedwa'j ençxáa yuhwa uymeena.
Lot nyuuwa ma'wẽga yuu txã'sna miiyajkxwe.
Txãa ente' maa nasawa naa kiwete ĩtxĩ fxi'zeniçxá's yaakxsa', Dxus yakh ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'j yu'sa' ivxiituna. Nawa maawa naa kiwete ĩtxĩ fxi'zeni's yaakxsame', Dxus yakh ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phuna.
Na'jĩ'th na': Txãa kuste' teeçx kamaga e'z wáa dehna ũs yuutxna. Nawa teeçxsa's pehna u'jni yuuna, naapkaçxha' vxite yu' neeyũuna.
Txã'wẽy e'z u'y wáa kxteeçxah ũ'khna ũs yuutxna. Nawa teeçxsa's jxũna u'jni yuuna, naapkaçxha' vxite yu' neeyũuna.
Meeçxa' e'z piçthẽ'j wáa kxteeçxah mjĩina ũs yuutxna. Nawa teeçxsa's jxũna u'jni yuuna, naapkaçxha' vxite yu' neeyũuna jĩte',
Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—¿Mtee txã'wẽ yuukx? jĩtx. Aça' Jesus pasçxa':
—Kakwe kha'tx mkaa uuna ũstewa, mẽewẽjxa' ãate pkhaakhetxna jĩk.
Dxusa's peçxkanamée bagaçxtewa txãa yakh puutx we'wena nes yuukahn naa ejemplo'sku pta'sx Jesusa':
—Teeçx çxhabte teeçx khuẽs u'pu'k, Dxusa's yaakxsamée sa' nasatxwa peeygãja'çme'.
Txãa çxhabte' teeçx u'y vxiudak u'pu', sa' khuẽs tasxte pãatxhĩ'khya' u'jna nesku yu': Ũ'kwe's meen nwe'we, açesa wala pkxu'tx jĩna.
Maazkuẽe uswa pa'thewa, txãa khuẽsa' pu'çxme', nawa na'wẽk yajkx: Dxusnawa yaakiçmeeth sa' nasa maa yuhtxwa peeygãasameeth.
Nawa naa vxiuda' wala kuçx tahtatey pa'ja'k aça' pu'çxhi'nja peena yu' pa'khamén jĩk.
—Khuẽs ewmeesa yuhwa txã'wẽk pu'çxya' yajkx jĩk Jesusa'.
Dxusa' ¿txã'wẽyçxáa pu'çxmeema'k txajx txhitxhnisatxi'? Txã'wẽ kus ma'k yuu en ma'k yuu nawa pxthaa we'wena nes yuute' pu'çxya' jxthẽeyuumeena.
Na'jĩ'th na': Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa naa kiwete sxawedna kĩi entewa ¿txã'wẽ Dxus yakh pu'vxitumée neewe'wesa ũsma'tx yuu? jĩk.
Jesusa' na'wẽk vxite ejemplo pta'sx txã'wẽ maaíi yu' wala ewsatha'w sũhna vxite yuutxi' ahçena fxi'zesawe'sxtxi:
—E'z piçthẽ'jtx dxuus yatte Dxus yakh weçxana puutx we'weya' u'ka. Teeçxsa' fxariseo', aça' vxite' gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsak yu'.

Fxariseo yu' yujuçxa na'jĩnak Dxus yakh puutx we'we': Dxus, idxa's wala weçxa'th, adxa' vxite nasa na'wẽmeeth. Txãawe'sxa' pesweeta', ewmée kazxsata'. Sa' nyu ji'phçxawa vxite yakh pkal yuusata'. Aça' adxa' txã'wẽsameeth. Naa piçthẽ'j ayte ũsa' gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsa txã'wẽsaçxáa yuhwa meeth.
Sa' ki'sute e'z us yũuna'th. Adx knayni kĩjkĩhnawa diesmo dukhe'th idxa's jĩk.
Naapkaçxha' gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsa yu' jxu'theçxáa yujuçxa cielute yuhwa pagaymée naasáa txajx peçxuteçxáak iikakana Dxusa's na'jĩ': Dxus, adxa's meen peeygãh. Wala yuuwesath jĩnaçxáak we'we'.

Na'jĩ'th na': Gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsa we'weni's Dxusa' pasne'. Nawa fxariseo yu' pasnimeene' yatna sxawedna u'j. Maawa iiwejçx iiwejçx yajkxçxa we'wesa', jxthaakwe ãhmeekwesa yuuna. Nawa maawa ãhmeekwesa na'wẽ yajkxna we'wesa' iiwejçx yaakxsate jxthaakwe ewsa yuuna jĩk.
Txajũ' nasa' Jesus tasxte txãawe'sx luuçxkuẽtx nuypa'jtx Dxus kusete neewe'wekahn. Aça' Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' ũusçxa we'wetx luuçxkuẽtx nuypa'jsatx.
Nawa Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi pa'yaçxa na'jĩk:
—Luuçxkuẽ adx tasxte yuhte', kuçx yupnuwe, txãa pa'gatey Dxus jxkaahna ũsnisa' naa luuçxkuẽwe'sx na'wẽsa jĩi íiçxá'.
Isath we'we', maawa luuçxkuẽ na'wẽ Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena's wa'lmée jxpa'gameeçxa yu', bagaçxte yuhwa Dxus tasxte u'kameetxna jĩk.
Txajũ' teeçx piçtakx npiiçthẽ'jsa na'wẽk paapẽjx Jesusa's:
—Idxa' wala ewgu kĩhsuwa jxuka, txãa pa'ga na'wẽth paapẽyi': ¿Ma'wẽ yũuçxa pçumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phuki'th? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—¿Kĩh yuupa'gaga adxa's ewsa jĩ'? Naa kiwete' teeçxçxáa yuhwa ewsa yu' meeta'? naasáa Dxus yuuçxáa ewsa ũsa'.

Pçumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phu wẽeçxa', Dxus jxkaahnitxi' jiig txãatxi' kxtey myuu. Txã' naata': Ptamsayã'ja' vxite yakh pkal yuuwa'jme'. Nasa ikhwa'jme'. Pesweewa'jme'. Vxitetx ĩsxĩina nuywe'wewa'jme'. Neywe'sxtxi peeygãhna ewçxáa yũuna fxi'zewa'ja' jĩte',
txãa piçtakx pasçxa':
—Txãatxi' le'çxkuẽjũjx jxuka kxtey yuunath waláa jĩk.
Aça' Jesus wẽsẽ'jçxa' na'wẽk jxkaah:
—Txã'wẽtewa, nee peeji'. Iidx ji'phuni's jxuka txweyçxa, puuplesatx peesune'ga. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa', cielute ji'phsa yuune'ga. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa adx yakh myuh jĩte',
txãa piçtakxa' wala nxusna neeyũuk, wala ji'phsa yu'k txãapa'ga.
Txã'wẽ nxuste', Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—Maawa wala ji'phsa yakha', wala yuh thẽya' Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite u'kawa'ja'.
Aça' txã'wẽ thẽysa's yajkxte yu', kamelxo yuhwa thẽymée wáa yũz kafxga u'kaya' ãjatxna.
Txã'jĩte', na'wẽtx we'we:
—Txã'wẽ thẽyte', ¿kim ewte neeyũuya' ãjãkx? jĩ'tx.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—I'kwe'sxçxáa yu' ãjãmeene'kwe. Nawa Dxus yakh yu', kĩh yuhwa thẽysa meea' jĩte',
Pedro' na'wẽk we'we:
—Kwe'sxa' idx yakh yujxa' kwe'sx ji'phuni's jxuka nvxihttha'w jĩk.
Aça' Jesus pasçxa' na'jĩk:
—Isath we'we': Dxus jxkaahni's nwẽesẽ'jya' maawa yat, neywe'sx, nyakhwe'sx, nyu, nçxi'kwe'sx txã'wẽsatx nvxihtçxa',
naa kiwete nee ũsíi txãa nvxiitnisate jxthaakwe jxpa'gatxna, sa' vxite kiwete' pçumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutxna jĩk.
Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx docesatx fxiite pa'yaçxa na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Ãçxha' Jerusalente pa'jya' u'jweçtha'w, aça' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sxa' fxi'jtx Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusá's ma'wẽ yũuwa'thewa txã' jxuka kxtey yuuna.
Dxus Nçxi'ka's vxite nasatx dukh ya'wata', aça' txãawe'sxa' npeevxysxijkana wẽesxuuna fxne'sx avxythethna yũuya'wata'.
Sa' wala peçxujkwena yuuçxa ikhetxna. Nawa tekh ente' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuna jĩtewa,
txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' weh yuhwa jiyumeeta' sa' txã'wẽ kxtey yuutxna sũjũ'çwameeta'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Jeriko çxhabte pa'jaçte', teeçx piçthẽ'j uysaméek dxi'j pukate kaçxçxa lmusxnu pẽjxna u'pu'.
Sa' nasa wala skhẽwna susuçte wẽsẽ'jçxa', pẽjxku:
—¿Kĩh yuuçna? jĩna.
Aça' nasa pasçxa':
—Jesus Nasarethuwe'sx aysu skhẽuuça' jĩte',
uysame' na'jĩnak sus we'we:
—¡Jesus, Davxid ji'j, adxa's meen peeygãh! jĩna pxthaa we'wete',
nasa yaçte u'jsawe'sx yu':
—Sxuuna' myuu jĩnatx wẽesxu we'we. Nawa txãa yu' jweeíiçxáak sus we'we:
—¡Davxid ji'j, adxa's meen peeygãh! jĩna.
Txajũ' Jesusa' nee yujuçxa pe'jya' kaakh. Sa' utxaana kũhte', na'jĩk:
—¿Kĩhga yũu jxthãasu'? jĩte':
—Adxa' uyya' ãjã'çmeeth, txãasath uy wẽjẽ' jĩk.
Aça' Jesus we'weçxa':
—Kaauyu'juna sũhçxane'ga adxa's pi'kx, txãa pa'ga ãçxha' uyna mneeyũu jĩçpkaçxha',
txãa dudtey uyya' ãjãk, sa' Dxusna wala weçxana Jesus e'stey u'kh. Txã'wẽ uyya' ãjãte nasa uyçxa', txãawe'sxwa txã'wẽytxi Dxusa's wala weçxa.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Jeriko çxhabte pa'jçxa', txãa çxhabsu skhẽuuçku yu'.
Aça' kxte' teeçx piçthẽ'j wala ji'phsa Zakeo yaasesak ũsu'. Txãa yu' gobierno jĩi vxyu pkhakhsa npiiçthẽ'jsak yu'.
Txãa Zakeo' Jesus kimtewa jiyuya' puutx uy wẽeçxawa, nasaa wala ksxavxyte' ãjãme', txãa yu' le'çxkuẽek yu' naa pa'ga.
Sa' yaçte wuwuuçxa, sikómoro fxtũu tasxtek tejka Jesusa's uyya'.
Aça' Jesusa' kxuy uykhẽuuççxa', fxtũu tasxte pagayçxa Zakeo's we'wek:
—Dudçxáa txajũ miisa'j, adxa' iidx yatte ãçxhíi pa'jwa'j ji'pthu jĩte',
Zakeo' dudçxáa sa'jçxa, Jesusa's weçxanak txajx yatte jxpa'ga.
Txã'wẽ yũute' nasa jxukaysa açewe'wetx: Jesusa' txãa piçthẽ'j pkalsa yattek pa'jya' u'j jĩna.
Txajũ' Zakeo' yujuçxa na'jĩnak we'we:
—Adx ji'phuni's puupxãhn txuhdeçxa puupletx peesu'nja, sa' maaíitxi's ĩsxĩiçxa jxthaakwe wá'ntka vxyu kusa'j nawa kusa'jnite pahz us jxthaakwe kaasxwedu'ju'nja jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' Abrahan ji'kh yuu naa pa'ga naa yattewe'sx ewte neeyũuwa'j en pa'kh ãçxha'.
Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' txã'wẽ vxituna ũssatx pakweçxa ewte nvxiht-ya' íiçxáath kĩh jĩk.
Jesus we'weni's wẽsẽ'jsa yu', naa sũhnatx ũsu': Jesusa' Jerusalente pa'jaça' na' ãçxha' txãa jxkaahsa yuuna sũhnatx ũsu'.
Naa pa'ga na'wẽk kwentu'jna pta'sx:
—Teeçx piçthẽ'j jxtuhthesa jxu'j kiwen u'kh, kxtee pa'jçxa jxkaahsa yuuçxa ki' sxawedxa'.
Nawa u'jmey, diez selpisaatx pa'yaçxa, kxazíitx txakweçxaçxáak vxyu ũsçxa na'jĩna neewe'we: Adx sxawedna pa'phkaçx naa vxyu yakh mjĩine'kwe nuypehnaya'. Txã'jĩçxak jxkaahsa yuuya' jxu'j kiwen u'j.
Nawa txajx kiwete nasa' jxkaahsa ki'pni's wa'lçxa, na'jĩnatx pãatxhĩ'khya' kaah txajx e'stey: Naa piçthẽ'j kwe'sxtxi jxkaahni's peejxmeetha'w jĩtewa,
pejka jxkaahsa yuuçxa ki' sxawedku txajx kiweníi. Sa' pa'jçxa' selpisaatx vxyu ũsne' txãatx pa'yak, nasa iisa maz nuypehnatewa jiyuya'.
Aça' nyafxtewe'sx kũhçxa' na'jĩk: Iidx vxyu ũsgu txãate diezthu jxthaakwe nuypehna jĩte',
jxkaahsa pasçxa': Wala ew selpiig. Txã'wẽ walameekuẽsa'swa ew jxpe'pha'ga, diez çxhabte jxkaahwa'jsa ne'jwe'sx ki'pu'nja jĩk.
Txajũ' vxitewa utxaaçxa na'jĩk: Iidx vxyu ũsgu txãate tahçthu jxthaakwe nuypehna jĩte',
jxkaahsa pasçxa': Idxa' tahç çxhabte jxkaahwa'jsa ne'jwe'sx yuune'ga jĩk.
Txajũ' tekhtewe'sxwa utxaaçxa na'jĩk: Iidx vxyu ũsgu txã'sa' panxwelote yapçxa jxaawthu. Txã' ayga ũsa'.
Idxa' wala juuna' yu'g, txã'wẽ mjĩimeeçxawa vxyu pẽyi'g sa' iidx uuthasxmeetewa kxtee u'kaçxa jxuka pkhakhe'g. Aça' ũukhçxa iidx vxyu'sa' kmãaji'jmeeth jĩte',
jxkaahsa pasçxa': Idxa' seelpimeeg. Iidx yuweteyçxáa ewmeete neeyũuçgu. Adxa' juuna'saçxa' mjĩimeeçxawa vxyu pẽjxna adx uuthasxmeetewa pkhakhsatewa jiiçxa',
¿kĩh yũutega adx vxyu'sa' bankoga jxaawmée? pehnate adx sxawedna pa'jçxa' jxthaakwe kutxi'khan jĩk.
Sa' txãa jxkaahsa' na'jĩnak we'we kxtee ũssatx: Txãa vxyu's kusa'jçxa diez vxyu ji'phsa's meswe jĩte',
txãawe'sx pasçxa': Txã' vxyu walayã'j ji'pha', aça' ¿ma'wẽ txã'síiçxáa ũsukxtha'w? jĩtewa,
jxkaahsa pasçxa na'jĩk: Maawa jxpa'yakx jxpe'jçxa nuypenasa's jxthaakwe ũswa'j yuuna. Nawa jxpe'jya' ãjãmeeçxa nuypenasame's jxuka kusa'jwa'j yuuna, le'çxkuẽçxáa ji'phtewa.
Sa' adxa's ahçeçxa jxkaahsa yuukahmén pãatxhĩ'khsawe'sxtxi' ayte pe'jna kũhçxa adx uyna ũste miikhwe jĩk.
Txãa ejemplo's pta'sxna jxã'jçxa', Jerusalente pa'jya' u'kh.
Sa' Betfxagé vxite' Betania çxhab ũsu'tx Oliwos vxiç utxaga kxtee pa'jya'çxáa txãa yakh u'jusa e'zsatx kaakh
na'jĩna:
—Naaga çxhab ũsa' kxtee me'jwe. Sa' kxtee pa'jaççxa', teeçx buçxukuẽ uyuune'kwe kim yuhwa a'jnimeesa tudni ũsna. Txã'sa' jxũkhwedeçxa jxũna yuweene'kwe.
Jxũna yuhte', maaíi yu' pẽyiwáatxna aça': Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsak nikxya' kaah jĩne'kwe.
Aça' txã'jĩte' u'jçxa', Jesus ma'wẽne' we'we txã'wẽy uytxi.
Txajũ' buçxu's jxũkhwedeçte', namuwe'sxa' pẽjxtxi:
—¿Kĩjxa' buçxu's jxũkhwedeçkwe? jĩte',
txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsak nikxya' kaah jĩtx.
Sa' Jesus tasxte jxũna kũhçxa', txãawe'sx atxhtxi pusçxa Jesusa's ka'ja'jtx.
Txajũ' Jesus u'jwa'j dxi'jsu yaçtetx txãawe'sx atxhtxi pusna u'jwe'.
Sa' Oliwos vxiç e'skhẽ u'jweçpkaçxha', Jesus yakh yuusa nasa' Dxusa's wala weçxana weyya' takhtxi txã'wẽ Jesusa' kĩjkĩhwa ew yũuna u'juni's uyçxa.
Sa' na'jĩnatx weyi':
—¡Dxus kaahni wala yuh ew jxkaahwa'jsa yuja'! ¡Dxus cielutewe'sxa's weçxaaga wala ew yũupa'ga! jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' nasaa ksxavxyte yuusa fxariseowe'sxa' na'jĩtx:
—Iidx e'ste kuçx susna yuusatx mwe'we, sxuuna' yuukahn jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Makwe txãawe'sx yu' sxuuna' yuutewa, kweta' Dxusa's tuuthe'jetxna jĩk.
Txajũ' Jerusalente utxa pa'jçxa', çxhaba's thegçxa ũ'nek
na'jĩna:
—I'kwe'sxa' wẽt kfxi'ze'jwa'jsa's jiyuçxa naa ente jxpa'gawaça', wala yuh ewna. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' jiimée ũsi'kwe na' jxpa'gameene'kwe.
Naa pa'ga i'kwe'sxtxi' nxuswa'j en pa'jana, aça' txãa ente' çxhaba's jxuka yupna ktadxiiçxa
çxhaba's kĩh yuhwa nvxihtmée jxuka suwuutxna kxtee ũssatx ikhna. Sa' teeçx kwetçxáa yuhwa kẽese'jnimée yu' neeyũumeena, i'kwe'sx ksxavxyte Dxus kĩhtewa, jxpa'gameei'kwe naa pa'ga jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' dxuus yatte u'kaçxa kxtee txweyna ũssatx jxuka eka kasxisxku
na'jĩna:
—Dxus librute na'wẽ fxi'jni': Adx yata' Dxus yakh puutx we'wena ũswa'j yatçxá' jĩna fxi'jni'. Nawa i'kwe'sx yu' peswée pkhaakhena ũsni kafx na'wẽçxáa vxitçxa ji'phi'kwe jĩk.

Jesusa' een isak dxuus yatte u'kaçxa kaapiya'ja'. Naapkaçxha' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' çxhabte ne'jwe'sx txãawe'sx yu': ¿Ma'wẽ yũuçxa ikhekxtha'w? jĩnatx puutx we'wena ũsu'.
Nawa ikhya' yu' ãjã'çmeeta', nasa jxukaysa Jesus ju'guçxaçxáatx ũsu' naa pa'ga.
Teeçx ente' Jesusa' dxuus yatte Dxus yuwe ewte nvxiitwa'jsa's pta'sxna ũste', sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j vxite' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsa vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsa txãawe'sx pa'jçxa'
na'jĩnatx pẽjx:
—Idxa' ¿kim jxkaathega dxuus yatte txã'wẽ juuna' yũu? Kim jxkaathe txã'wẽ yũuçxawa mpeeta'sx jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—Adxwa i'kwe'sxtxi' pẽjx ya'wath aça' txã'sa' mpaaswe.
Juan Bautista's ¿kimga jxkaah yu'te bautisãykahn? ¿Dxus wá' jxkaah meeçxa' naa kiwete piçthẽ'j jxkaahni wá' yu'? jĩte',
txãawe'sx pwe'sx na'jĩnatx puutx we'we':
—¿Ma'jĩna pasukxtha'w? Dxusne' jxkaah jĩwaçwa, txã'wẽ Dxus jxkaathe' ¿mjĩya'kwe Juan pta'sxni's jxpa'gamée? jĩna.
Aça' naa kiwete nasane'ta jxkaah jĩte', kwe'sxtxi kwet wãatatahçxa ikhetxna, nasa' jxukaysa Juana's ew jiita' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsatewa. Txãasa kwe'sxtxi' txã'wẽ yũutxna jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' Jesusa's pasçxa':
—Juana's kimne' jxkaah bautisãykahn nawa jiimeetha'w jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Adxwa kim jxkaathe txã'wẽ yũuçxawa pta'sxme'nja jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' naa ejemplo'sku pta'sx:
—Teeçx piçthẽ'ja' txajx kiwete jxuka uwa uhçxa mjĩisatx ew neewe'weçxa wala txaçx u'kh.
Sa' uwa thẽ'jeçte', kiwe namu' teeçx selpisa's kaakh kiweepa'ga pẽjxya'. Nawa kiwe's mjĩisawe'sxa' txãa selpisa's pãpãçxa kĩh yuhwa dukhmée kaahtx.
Aça' kiwe namu' vxite selpisa's ki' kaakh. Nawa txã'snawa txã'wẽy iiwẽesxuna pãpãçxa kĩh yuhwa dukhmée neeutx.
Txajũ' kiwe namu' ki' vxite selpisa's kaakh. Nawa kiwe's mjĩisawe'sxa' txã'snawa kpã'vxitçxa dukhmée neeutx.
Txã'wẽ yũute', nmehte' kiwe namu' na'jĩk: Ãçxha' ¿kĩh yũuki'th? Meeçxa' adx nçxi'k wedxnisa's kaja'nja. Aça' txã'sa' ũukhçxa txã'wẽ yũumeewáatxna jĩçxak kaah.
Aça' mjĩisawe'sxa' kiwe namu nçxi'ka's uyçxa', txãawe'sx pwe'sx na'jĩnatx puutx we'we: Ney uute', kiwe's naathẽ'j iiyamuwa'jsana. Aça' ikhega, khĩçxa kiwe's kwe'sx iiyamu'nja'w jĩçxa
eka kutxi'jçxa ikhtxi jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txã'wẽ pta'sxçxa' pẽjxku:
—Txã'wẽ yũute', kiwe namu' txãa mjĩisawe'sxtxi' ¿kĩh yũukx?
Txã'wẽ yũupa'ga kiwe namu' txãa mjĩisawe'sxtxi' jxuka ikhçxa kiwe's vxitetx ũsuna jĩte', txã'wẽ pta'sxni's wẽsẽ'jçxa na'jĩtx:
—Dxusa' kxtee pa'j yu' wedxmeena jĩ'tx.
Txã'wẽ paste', Jesusa' txãawe'sx dxi'psu thegçxa na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Txã'wẽ yuune'jmeete', ¿kĩjxa'çxáaki'k Dxus librute na'wẽ we'we'?:
Yat txaahsawe'sxa': Naa kweta' selpime' jĩçxa wãatãhtx,
Nawa txãa íik yat makwesanawa çxhãçxha neewewa'jsa yuuna pa'j.
Aça' maawa txãa kwette iikasa' jxuka çxkateteetxna. Meeçxawa txãa kwet nasaa kajkwekhẽ weteçxa', jxuka ku'çxina jĩna fxi'jni'.

Txajũ' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j vxite' ley kaapiya'jsawe'sxa' jiyutx txãa ejemplo' txãawe'sxtxi we'wenitewa. Sa' ũusaçxaçxa txãa dudtey Jesusa's tud wẽetx. Nawa Jesus ju'gusa nasa wala kuh ũste', ũukhçxa kĩhwa yũumeeta'.
Nawa kĩhteçxáawa ewmeete nvxiht-ya' sũhçxa thegsa kaahtx. Aça' txãawe'sxa' Jesusa's ew paapẽysa na'wẽ yuh we'wena utxaatx, jxkaahsa's ewmée we'wetewa jiyuçxa' ne'jwe'sxa's pãatxhĩ'khya' sũhçxa.
Sa' na'jĩnatx paapẽjx:

—Kwe'sxa' idxa's jiitha'w. Idxa' isasaçxá'sgu pta'sxi', Dxus tasxte pa'jwa'j dxi'ja's kaapiya'jna. Sa' nasaa jxkaahna yu'kxpehnitx nwẽese'je'çmeeg, txãa pa'gatey idxa' nasa ewsa na'wẽ thegsatx jiyumey ju'gu yu'çmeeg.
Ãçxha' na'wẽtha'w jiyu wẽjẽ': Jxkaahsa Cesara's vxyu dukhte ¿ewmanx? meeçxa' dukhmeete ¿ewmanx? jĩte',
ewmée yajkxçxa txã'wẽ pẽjxna ũstewa Jesusa' jiyuçxa na'jĩk:
—¿Kĩjxa'kwe adxa's ewmeete nvxiit wẽjẽ'? jĩçxa
txãawe'sxtxi' teeçx vxyu musx pẽjxku. Sa':
—Naa vxyu' ¿kiim dxi'pa's ji'phna, sa' kiim yase's fxi'jnina? jĩte', txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Cesar dxi'pa's ji'pha' sa' txajx yase's fxi'jni' jĩtx.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk jxkaah:
—Cesar jĩ'sa' Cesara's dukhwa'ja'. Sa' Dxus jĩ'sa' Dxusna dukhwa'ja' jĩk.
Txã'wẽ nasaa dxi'pte isasaçxáana paste', Jesusa's ewmée vxit-ya' ãjãmeeçxa, kuh yajkxna sxuuna'tx neeyũu.
Txajũ' saduceowe'sx maaíi yu' Jesus tasxte paapẽjxya' pa'jtx. Nasa' uuyã'jçxa' peena yu' ĩtxĩ yuumeetxna sũhsatx yu' txãa saduceowe'sxa', txãasatx na'wẽ pẽjx:
—Moisesa' na'jĩnak fxi'jçxa nvxiht: Maa piçthẽ'jwa luuçx ji'phumey nyu's nvxihtçxa uute', uusáa nyakha' txãa u'ya's iiyuuna, aça' txãate luuçxa' uusáa nçxi'k na'wẽ neeyũuna jĩnak fxi'j.
Aça' kwe'sxa' jiitha'w siete piçthẽ'j pxakhtxi u'pu', sa' nyakh nthẽ'jsa' iiyuuçxawa luuçx ji'phumey uuk.
Aça' nyakh e'stewe'sxku iiyuu txãa u'ya'síiçxáa. Nawa txãawa luuçx ji'phumey uuk.
Txajũ' nyakh tekhtewe'sxwa txãa u'ya's íiçxáak iiyuu. Txãawa luuçx ji'phumey uuk. Txã'wẽçxaçxáatx sietesay txãa u'yçxaçxá's iiyuuna jxã'j. Nawa maa yuhwa luuçx ji'phumey uutx.
Aça' nmehte' txãa u'ywa uuk.
Aça' uusaawe'sx ki' ĩtxĩ yuu ente', txãa u'ya' ¿maa yakh isa nyu yuuwa'jsakx? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Naa kiwete nasa' ptamuuna txãawe'sx luuçxtxiwa kaaptamu'ju'tx.
Nawa vxite kiwete pçumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'the pa'jya' ãjãsa' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuçxa' txãawe'sxa' ptamuwa'jsameeta', sa' txãawe'sx luuçxtxiwa kaaptamu'jna ũswa'jsameeta',
txãa pa'gatey txãawe'sxa' Dxus angeleswe'sx na'wẽsa yã'tha', sa' Dxus luuçx yã'tha' na' ĩtxĩ yuuyã'jçxa' peena yu' uuwa'jsameeta'.

Txã'wẽ uusaawe'sxa' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuwa'jsate íiçxáak Moisesíiwa jiyukahn na'wẽ fxi'jçxa nvxiht txajx librute. Kxteea' Dxusa' çhũçh yu'kh behna ũsni pxãjũ we'weçxa': Abrahan, Isaak, Jakob txãawe'sx Dxusthu jĩk.
Dxusa' uusaawe'sx Dxusme', naasáa ĩtxĩsawe'sx Dxusçxá'. Dxus tasxte' maa yuhwa uumée ĩtxĩ ũsta' jĩnak pta'sx.
Txajũ' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx we'weçxa':
—Wala ew pta'sxgu jĩçxa,
peena yu' kĩhwa jwee yu' pẽjxmeeta'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'wẽk pẽjx:
—¿Ma'wẽteta Kristo' Davxid nçxi'ka' jĩna we'we' nasa'?
Naapkaçxha' Salmos librute Davxid we'weçxa yu' na'jĩ'k:
Adxna jxpe'jsa Kristo's Dxusa' na'jĩk:
Adx pukate paçu ju'gte mkaaçx,
Idxna açesatx idxçxaçxáana nwẽese'jwa'ja's vxitna jxã'phkaçx jĩk.
Davxida' Kristo's we'weçxa': Adxna jxpe'jsa jĩk, aça' Kristo' ¿ma'wẽ yuuçxa Davxid nçxi'k yuukx?
Nasa jxukaysa wẽsẽ'jna ũssa ksxavxyte Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi na'jĩnak we'we:

—Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sxtxi' mpa'yajkxwe. Txãawe'sxa' ropa jxu'jsa athçxa plaasasu msuuwa weçxa jxthãasnatx pekũjũ'. Sa' judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenisuwa kaçxní wejx zhiçxkwe ewsaçxáanatx pakwé'. Maa yat-su sã'jĩya' pi'kxtewa, txã'wẽytxi kaçxwa'j ewsaçxáana pakwé'.
Sa' vxiudawe'sx yattxiwa kusa'ja'tx, kĩjkĩh ji'phuni'swa jxuka. Nawa ewsata' sũjkahn wala jxu'j lisa'tx. Txã'wẽ yũupa'ga txãawe'sxa' wejx jxthaakwe Dxus kastigãyni yuutxna jĩnak pta'sx.
Wala ji'phsawe'sx dxuus yatte ofxreda wala ãsxiçtek uy Jesusa'.
Txã'wẽy teeçx vxiuda puuplesawa kũhçxa', e'z vxyuu musxkuẽ akheçte uyçxa'
na'jĩk:
—Isath we'we', naa vxiuda puuple' maatewa jxthaakwek wala akh.
Vxite yu' akhçxawa, neeyũusáa peejxmeesaçxáan yã'jtx akhe'. Nawa naa u'ya' kĩh yuhwa ji'phmeesaçxawa txajx ũ' weywa'ja's jxukak akh jĩk.
Txajũ' kxtee ũssa maaíi yu' dxuus yata's thegçxatx we'wena ũsu': Ofxreda peesni yakh wala yuh zhiçxkwe pheu'jna txaahni' jĩte', Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Ãçxhíi yu' txã'wẽ yuh zhiçxkwe thegna ũsa', nawa kĩh yuhwa nvxihtmée jxuka suwní yuuwa'j en pa'jana. Aça' teeçx kwetçxáa yuhwa kẽesẽ'jnimée yu' neeyũumeetxna naa yattewe'sx jĩk.
Txã'jĩte':
—¿Bagaçx txã'wẽ yuukx? meeçxawa txã'wẽ yũuwa'j en ãjãçte' ¿kĩhçxa yuukx? jĩna pẽjxte',
na'wẽk pta'sx:
—I'kwe'sxtxi kaypuba'jwe'sxte mpa'yajkxwe. Txã'wẽme' wala kasejetxna Dxus kaahnisatha'w jĩna na'jĩna: Adxa' Kristoth, aça' ãçxha' nmeh en ãjk jĩtxna. Nawa txãawe'sxtxi' nwẽesẽ'jnuwe.
I'kwe'sxa' wẽsẽ'jene'kwe gweçxa seena'sa yuja' jĩni, nawa txã' nyafxtewe'sxçxáata' aça' ũukhmeene'kwe. Nmeh en yu' ãhméy txã'wẽ yuuna.
Txajũ' ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa jxuka pta'sxku na'jĩna:
—Txãn en ãjãçte', gobierno' vxite kiwete gobierno yakh puiitxna. Naapkaçxha' puutx jxu'j kiweju pwe'sxwa puiitxna.
Sa' msuu msuuwa seena' ehd u'jwena. Wẽjẽwa txã'wẽ wala pa'jana. Naapkaçxha' kakwete wee seena'sawa pa'jana. Sa' cieluju kĩjkĩhwa seena'saçxáa vxyaatxna.

Nawa txã'wẽ seena' yũuwa'j en pa'jmeyna, i'kwe'sxtxi ahçeçxa preesu'jya' pakweetxna. Sa' judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenisuwa jxũna u'jwetxna: Nasa ewmeesa' jĩna. Txã'wẽ yũuna karceltewa txajatxna, i'kwe'sxa' adxna nwẽesẽ'pha'gaçxáa jxkaahsawe'sx tasxsu vxite' ne'jwe'sx tasxsuwa kuutxa'jni yuune'kwe.
Txã'wẽ yũute', Dxus yuwe's txãawe'sxtxiwa pta'sxwa'j en ji'phune'kwe.
I'kwe'sxa' txãawe'sxtxi' ¿ma'wẽ pasukxtha'w? sũhna kuh yajkxmeene'kwe,
txãa pa'gatey adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi açesawe'sxtxi ma'wẽ paswa'ja'swa kaaũusuthe'je'nja. Aça' txãawe'sxa': Ĩsxĩija'g jĩya' ãjãmeetxna maa yuhwa.
Sa' i'kwe'sx nwe'sxíi yuhwa açeni yuune'kwe, tatawe'sx, yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, namikuwe'sx preesu'jutxna. Aça' maaíi yu' ikhni yuune'kwe.
I'kwe'sxa' adxna nwẽesẽ'pha'ga naa kiwete jxukaysa açeni yuune'kwe.
Nawa i'kwe'sx dxkhasçxáa yuhwa vxitumeetxna teeçxçxáa yuhwa.
I'kwe'sxa' uu entepkaçx Dxus yakh txutemée fxi'zeçxa', Dxus tasxte ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phune'kwe.
Jerusalen çxhaba's soldauçxaçxáa jxuka ktadxiiçxa ũste uyçxa', ãçxha' naa çxhaba' jxuka pçuwa'jsana sũhna jii ũsune'kwe.
Naapkaçxha' Judeasuwe'sxa' ũphna u'jwetxna yu'khsu, aça' Jerusalen çxhabtewe'sxwa txãa çxhabu ũphna kasejetxna, vxite' çxhab ekajuyã'j ũssa' çxhabte u'kameetxna.
Txã'wẽme' txãn ensu' kastigo seena'sa yuuna Dxus librute ma'wẽga pta'sxi' txã' jxuka kxtey yuuna.
Aça' txãn ensu' nasa ji'phsa meeçxawa luuçx ãpãkuẽ ji'phsa' wala yuh pxthaa yuutxna, txã'wẽ txãa nasatx kastigo seena'sa pa'the', naa kiwete wala yuh nxuswa'j yuuna.
Maaíitxi's gweçxate ikhetxna, sa' vxite yuutxi's preesu'jçxa jxu'j kiwen jxũna u'jwetxna. Naapkaçxha' Jerusalen çxhaba's vxite nasa u'kaçxa jxuka suwçxa kxtee makwe txaçxwa ũsutxna.
Txã'wẽ yũunijũ' sek a'te estrelxa txãasu seena'çxáa vxyaatxna. Aça' naa kiwete nasa mtee mteewe'sxwa jxuka jxpubana iiméh wala ũukhutxna txã'wẽ ĩkh wala seena' yuuna susni's wẽsẽ'jçxa.
Txã'wẽ seena' yuuçte', naa kiwete nasa' ũukhçxa ũus yu'swa ivxiitutxna, naapkaçxha' ẽe walate kĩjkĩh ũssawa jxuka seena' kẽesẽ'jni yuutxna.
Txajũ' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's uyuutxna, tãaph pxãhte sek na'wẽ seena' zhiçxkwe khikhyna kĩjaçte.
Txã'wẽ seena' yuuya' takheçte', i'kwe'sxa' ũukhmée weçxana ũythasna meswe, jwee yu' jxthẽeyuumée nwe'weni yuune'kwe jĩk.
Txãa e'su' vxite ejemplo pta'sxku:
—Mthegwe higwera fxtũu tasx meeçxawa vxite fxtũu tasxtxi.
Sa' txãa fxtũu tasx yeeçuçte uyçxa', yũnya'watewa jiyu'i'kwe.
Txã'wẽy adx pta'sxni kxtey yuuçte uyçxa', Dxus naa kiwete kĩiwa'j en utxaaçna sũhna jii meswe.
Isath we'we': naa ensu nasa uumeyna, txã'wẽ kxtey yuuna.
Cielu naa kiwe jxuka skhẽuutxna, nawa adx we'weni' jxuka kxtey yuumey yu', skhẽwmeetxna.
Wala jxpa'yakx meswe, ewmée yũuna tũuna kĩjkĩhwa naa kiwetewe'sxçxá's yajkxna fxi'zenuwe. Txã'wẽme' Dxus yu's yajkxmée ũsiyna, Dxus kĩiwa'j en ãhçxáa yuuna.
Niimalwa jiimeeçxa' ma'wẽga yajkxte khẽje', txã'wẽyçxáa Dxus kĩiwa'j ena' kpaakina naa kiwete nasa mtee mteewe'sxtxiwa jxukaysatx.
I'kwe'sxwa wala jxpa'yakx meswe, na'wẽ seena' yuuya'wa' txajũ iyuya'. Dxus yakh puutx we'wena nes myuuwe bagaçxtewa, sa' txã'wẽ yũuçxa' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa tasxte utxaaya' ãjãne'kwe jĩk.
Jesusa' en yu' dxuus yattek kaapiya'ja', nawa kus yu' Oliwos vxiçnak u'jwe'.
Aça' nasa' een isa kuusíitx dxuus yatte pa'ja' Jesus kaapiya'jni's wẽsẽ'jya '.
Pan lewadura ji'phmée ũ'ni Paskua fxiesta ãjãçku yu'.
Aça' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' ley kaapiya'jsawe'sxa': Jesusa's ¿ma'wẽ yũuçxa ikhekxtha'w? jĩnatx txãawe'sx pwe'sx puutx we'wena ũsu'. Nawa nasa wala kuh Jesus ju'gusa ũste', ũukhu'tx.
Naapkaçxha' eçxthẽ'ja' Judas Iskariote ũuste u'kak. Txãa Judas yu', Jesus yakh u'jusa docesatewe'sxíiçxáak yu'.
Txajũ' txãa Judasa' puutx we'weya' u'kh sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' dxuus yatte thegsawe'sxtxi, Jesusa's txãawe'sx kusete dukhya'.
Aça' txã'wẽ puutx we'wete', txãawe'sxa' vxyu dukhya' neeyũutx Judasa's.
Txajũ' Judasa' nasa uynimeete paaçte dukhwa'ja's pakwek.
Txajũ' pan lewadura ji'phmée ũ'ni fxiesta en ãjk. Txãa ente' piisxáa luuçxtxi ikhe' Paskuatewe'sx.
Aça' txãa ente' Jesusa' na'jĩnak jxkaah Pedro Juanwe'sxtxi:
—Me'jwe Paskua fxiestate ũ'wa'ja's pheu'jya' jĩte',
txãawe'sxa' pẽjxtxi:
—¿Mteega pheu'j jxthãasu'? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Çxhabna u'jçxa kxtee pa'jaççxa', teeçx piçthẽ'j uyuune'kwe yu' mitxha's yakhçxa u'jweçte. Sa' e'ste u'jwene'kwe yatte u'kapkaçx.
Sa' kxtee pa'jçxa', yat namu's na'jĩne'kwe: Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa' pẽjxya'k kaah: Paskua fxiestate txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh ũ'wa'j ¿mtee piesa pheu'jni ũsna? jĩkaja'k jĩne'kwe.
Aça' yat namu' ẽe yatte piesa walasa pheu'jniyã'jsa's pta'sxina. Kxtee ũ'wa'ja's pheu'june'kwe jĩnak jxkaah.
Aça' Pedrowe'sxa' u'jçxa', Jesus ma'jĩni'swa jxuka kxtey uyçxa Paskua fxiestate ũ'wa'ja's pheu'jtx.
Txajũ' ũ'wa'j ora ãhte', Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh kaçxku mesate ũ'ya'.
Sa' na'wẽk we'we:
—¡Mazkuẽ uswa wala yuh yaaki'th, adxa's uu en pa'jmeyna, naa Paskua fxiestate i'kwe'sx yakh nmeh ũ'wa'ja's!
Na'jĩ'th na': ãçxha' ayte peena yu' naa Paskua fxiestatewe'sxa's ũ'me'nja, Dxus ki' jxkaajxa' pa'jwa'j en ãhpkaçx.
Txajũ' waso's uweçxa Dxusna weçxana orãyçxa', na'jĩk:
—Jxpa'gaçxa jxukaysa mtudxwe naa wasotewe'sxa's.
Na'jĩ'th na': ãçxha' ayte peena yu' uwa yu'a's tudxme'nja, ki' Dxus jxkaajxa' pa'jwa'j en ãhpkaçx.
Txajũ' pana'swa Dxusna weçxana orãyçxa', pe'ltedeçxa txãawe'sxtxi ũsu'sku na'jĩna:
—I'kwe'sx pa'gate adx kakwe' dukhwa'j yuuya'wa', aça' naa pana' adx kakwe na'wẽsa'. I'kwe'sx pa'gate adx pxthaa yuuçxa uuni's yajkxna txã'wẽ myũuwe bagaçxtewa.
Ũ'na jxã'jçxa', waso's jxpa'gaçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Adx eea's pkawçxa yuuçxáak Dxusa' i'kwe'sxtxi nwe'wewa'ja's u'se pheu'jçxa nvxiht. Aça' naa wasotewe'sxa' adx ee na'wẽsa'.
Aça' ãçxha' adx yakh ũ'na u'pa' ay mesate txãa piçthẽ'ja' adxa's açesawe'sx kusete dukhya'wa'.
Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusá' ãçxha' pejka uuya'wayuja'. Adx uuwa'ja's ma'wẽne' Dxus nvxiht txã' kxtey yuuya'wa'. Nawa adxa's açesawe'sx kusete dukhsa' ¡seena' yuh nxuste khẽjena! jĩte',
Jesus yakh u'jusa pwe'sx puutx ya'paapẽyi'tx na'jĩna: Kwe'sx ksxavxytewe'sx ¿kim txã'wẽ dukhya'wakx? jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' txãawe'sx pwe'sx na'wẽ yũuwa'ja'stxi puutx ya'paapẽyi':
—Ayte kwe'sx ksxavxytewe'sx ¿maa wejx jxthaakwe walasakx? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Naa kiwete jxkaahsawe'sxa' wala juuna'çxáa yuuna jxkaaja'tx. Txã'wẽtewa txãawe'sx yuutxi's wala ewsata' jĩ'tx nasa yu'.

Nawa i'kwe'sxa' txã'wẽ yũuna jxkaahwa'jsameei'kwe, wejxwa i'kwe'sxa' maaíi yu' jxthaakwe walasa ũsçxawa, nuuçxsa na'wẽ yuuwa'j ji'phi'kwe. Aça' maawa jxkaahwa'ja's ji'phsa', selpisáa na'wẽçxáa yuuwa'j ji'phi'kwe.

¿Maa wejx jxthaakwe walasakx? ¿Puuçte mesate ũ'ya' kaçxsá wejx jxthaakwe walasamanx, meeçxa' puuçsa wáa wejx jxthaakwe walasana? Isa ew yajkxte', mesate ũ'ya' kaçxsá jxthaakwe walasana. Nawa adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi selpisáa na'wẽçxáa ũsthu.
Adxa' bagaçxtewa nxuste thẽyte fxi'zeçtewa i'kwe'sxwa adx yakh ja'da pxthaa yuuna nesi'kwe yu' nvxihtmée.
Txãa pa'ga adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi ũsu'nja jxkaahwa'ja's, adxa'swa ma'wẽga adx Tata jxkaahwa'ja's ũs txã'wẽy,
kxah adx jxkaahna ũsnite pa'jçxa', adx yakh ih mesate ũ'wene'kwe, sa' Israelwe'sx ji'j docesatx jxkaahsa yuune'kwe.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Simona's na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Simon, idxa' wala yuh mpa'yajkx. Txã'wẽme' eçxthẽ'ja' i'kwe'sxtxi pẽjxku skuutxh kweejxa'jsa na'wẽ yuuya'.
Nawa adxa' iidx pa'gate Dxusa's neewe'weth, Dxusçxáana yajkxna fxi'zekahn. Aça' idxa' Dxus tasxte ki' sxawedçxa', yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi kçxhãaçxha'jane'ga Dxus yakh txutemée fxi'zewa'ja's jĩte',
Simon pasçxa':
—Adxa' karcelna ma'k yuu meeçxa' uuwa'j ma'k yuu nawa adxa' kĩhte yuhwa txuteme'nja jĩte',
Jesus ki' we'weçxa na'jĩk:
—Pedro, idxa's na'jĩ'th na': ãçxhíi atalx we'wemeyna, idxa' tekh us ĩsxĩijaçyã'j yuune'ga adxa's jiimeeth jĩna.
Txã'wẽ pta'sxçxa' Jesusa' na'wẽk pẽjx:
—Adxa' teeçx ente' i'kwe'sxtxi' Dxus yuwe pta'sxya' kaahçxa' kĩh yuhwa ji'phmeeth kaah, ya'ja, vxyu, pelgatxi txã'wẽsatx. Aça' i'kwe'sxtxi' dxi'the ¿kĩhçxá' peejiigá'? jĩte', txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Kwe'sxtxi' kĩh yuhwa peejime' jĩtx.
Aça' Jesus we'weçxa' na'jĩk:
—Ãçxha' ya'ja ma'k yuu, vxyu ma'k yuu, kçxilx ma'k yuu nawa ji'phsa' jxũçxa me'jwe. Aça' kçxilx ji'phmeesa' atxha's txweyçxa kçxilx mweywe.
Txã'wẽme' Dxus librute we'weçxa': Ewmeesathas yuuwesa yakhku ki'pni yuu jĩk naa pa'ga ãçxha' adxa's jxuka txã'wẽy yuuya'wata' jĩte',
txãawe'sx we'weçxa':
—Ayte e'z kçxilx yu' ũsta' jĩte', Jesus pasçxa':
—Txã'wẽçxa'. Txãaçxáa ewtxna jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa' ũ'na jxã'jçxa', txajũ kasehçxa', Oliwos vxiçna ki' u'kh. Aça' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxwa e'stey u'jtx.
Kxtee pa'jçxa na'jĩk:
—Dxus yakh puutx we'wena me'pwe, ewmeete weteya'mée jĩçxa',
txãawe'sx tasxu jxu'jmeekuẽ txuteena u'jçxa peejxũkweçxa na'jĩnak Dxus yakh puutx we'we:
—Tata, idxa's ewuweçxte', seena' nxuste uuwa'ju meen nwe'we. Nawa adx jxthãasni's kxtey yuumeeçxawa, iidx jxthãasniçxá's kxtey meen yũu jĩte',
Dxus angel cielujũwe'sx kvxiisxa'jna kçxhãaçxha'jya' kĩjk.
Txã'wẽme' wala yuh pxthaa nxusna Dxus yakh puutx we'wena u'pu'k naa pa'ga pẽ'ç yuhwa ee na'wẽsak wala pkaw.
Sa' Dxus yakh puutx we'wena jxã'jçxa' kiiteçxa u'kh Pedrowe'sxtxi thegya'. Nawa txãawe'sxa' deenitx yu', wala nxusçxa.
Aça' kũhçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—¿Kĩjxa'kwe dejé'? Kiiteçxa Dxus yakh puutx we'wena me'pwe, ewmeete weteya'mée jĩk.
Jesusa' kxtee we'wena nee ũsiyna, nasa wala kũhtx. Aça' Jesus yakh u'jusa Judas yu' txãa nasa yaçte kũhçxa, Jesus tasxte utxaak pukakwette weçxaya'.
Aça' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—¿Judas, idxa' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's weçxani yakh wáa kuuwe'jya'wane'ga? jĩte',
Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' Jesusa's pẽjxtxi:
—¿Txãa nasatxi's kçxilx yakh puiimtha'w? jĩtx.
Txajũ' Jesus yakh u'jusa teeçxsa yu' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'ja's selpisáa thũ'wẽ's spẽ'thku paçuwe'sxna.
Aça' Jesusa' we'wek:
—Kxtee pa'j yu' yũunu jĩçxa', txãa thũ'wẽ spẽ'thnite jxa'dxçxa', ki' kaywẽtu'kh.
Sa' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j vxite' dxuus yatte thegsawe'sx vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx preesu jxũna u'jya' pa'jsatx we'wek:
—Adxa' ¿pesweethas i'kwe'sxa' kçxilx petx fxtũ atçxawá'kwe adxa's preesu jxũna u'jya' yuwé'?
Adxa' i'kwe'sx yakh een isath dxuus yatte ũsu', nawa txagaçxhíi yu' tudxa' utxaameeçxa', jxuka çxhi'dxni naa orate yu' pejka preesu'jya' pa'ji'kwe jĩk.
Txajũ' Jesusa's tudçxa jxũna u'jtx sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j yatna. Aça' Pedro' Jesus e'ste jxu'j neeyũuçxak u'jna ũsu'.
Kxtee pa'jçxa' patxute ipx yuthçxatx bajçxya' kaçx. Aça' Pedrowa txãawe'sx yakh ih bajçxya' kaçxku.
Aça' teeçx u'y selpisá' Pedro txã'wẽ ipx pukate bajçxna u'pte', dxi'pte ew thegçxa na'jĩk:
—Naa piçthẽ'jwa Jesus yakh u'jusa' jĩte',
Pedro' ĩsxĩik:
—Adxa' jiimeeth txãa piçthẽ'j kxsusu'i'kwe txã'sa' jĩk.
Txajũ' txãa e'su' vxitewa uyçxa na'jĩk:
—Idxwa txãawe'sx yakh u'jusag jĩte', Pedro pasçxa':
—Isa, adxa' txãawe'sx yakh u'jusameeth jĩk.
Txãa skhẽwni teeçx orate' vxitek na'jĩna we'we:
—Ĩsxĩimeete, naa piçthẽ'ja's uythu Jesus yakh u'jute. Txãa yakh u'jusaçxaíi, Galileajuwe'sxa' jĩte',
Pedro pasçxa':
—Kĩhne'ga we'we' na'swa jiyuçmeeth. Txã'jĩna we'wena nee ũsiyna, atalx we'wek.
Aça' Jesusa' tuphiçxa Pedro dxi'pte thegte', Pedro' yajkxku Jesus we'weçxa': Ãçxh atalx we'wemeyna, tekh us ĩsxĩijaçyã'j yuune'ga jĩni's.
Txajũ' Pedro' eka kasehçxa seena' wala nxusna ũ'nek.
Txajũ' Jesus ũphwe'sxte yupna ũssa yu' weeçx we'wenatx pãpã'.
Sa' yafxtxi tudçxatx dxi'pte uka'ka' na'jĩna:
—Aan jiyune'ga kim uka'kaçtewa.
Txã'jĩnatx wala kuh jwed we'wena wẽesxu'.
Sa' khikhyna sẽjẽçte', judiu nthẽ'jsa sacerdotewe'sx, Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsa txãawe'sx pkhaakheçxatx Jesusa's kxtee kuutxa'jçxa pẽjx:
—Mpeeta'sx, idxa' ¿Kristo dxihgá'? jĩte', Jesus pasçxa':
—Txã'wẽíith jĩtewa, isane' we'we' sũhmeene'kwe.
Sa' i'kwe'sxtxi adx paapẽjxwaçwa, pasya'wameei'kwe. Sa' adxa's txhweteya'wameei'kwe.
Nawa ãçxhũyã'ja' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusá' Dxus ĩtxĩsa pukate kaçxya' u'jwena jĩk.
Aça' jxukaysa na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—Na'jĩ'g na', idxa' Dxus Nçxi'kthu jĩne'ga jĩte', Jesus pasçxa':
—Txã'wẽíith. I'kwe'sxa' isa i'kwe we'we' jĩk.
Aça' txãawe'sx we'weçxa':
—¿Kĩjxa' jwee vxite testigo peejiikxtha'w? Kwe'sx thũ'wẽju yuutha'w txajx we'weni's wẽsẽ'j jĩ'tx.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxa' Jesusa's Pilato tasxna jxũna u'jtx.
Kxtee pa'jçxa' na'jĩnatx pãatxhĩ'kh:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' nasatx kaypuba'jna ũstetha'w uy, sa' Romate gobierno's dukhwa'jme'. Sa' Dxus txhitxhçxa kaahnisa adxthu jxkaahwa'jsa jĩ'k jĩte',
Pilato' pẽjxku:
—Idxa' ¿judiuwe'sxtxi jxkaahsa dxihgá'? jĩte', Jesus pasçxa':
—Txã'wẽ íith, isag we'we' jĩk.
Aça' Pilato' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx nasa jxukaysatx na'wẽk we'we:
—Naa piçthẽ'j yuuwe yuuni's uyu'çmeeth jĩtewa,
txãawe'sx yu' jweeíiçxáatx sus we'wena na'jĩ':
—Judeate nasa jxukaysatx jxuka kaypuba'jna jxã'jaça' txajx we'weni yakh, Galileaju takhçxa ãçxha' aysuwa jxuka pekũjuça' txã'wẽ yũuna jĩ'tx.
Txã'wẽ we'wete Pilato wẽsẽ'jçxa', nasatx pẽjxku:
—Txãa piçthẽ'ja' Galileajũwe'sxwáana jĩna.
Aça':
—Txajũwe'sxí'k jĩna pta'sxte', Galileate ne'jwe'sx Herodes tasxnak kaah, txãn ensu' Herodeswa Jerusalenteyku ũsu' naa pa'ga.
Aça' Herodesa' Jesusa's uyçxa', wala weçxak, txã'wẽ Jesusa' kĩhwa yu'k jĩni's wẽsẽ'jçxa' nyafxíik Jesus yakh puutx uy wẽena ũsu', cieluju kĩhçxáawa kaavxya'ja'the' txãawa uyu'nja sũhçxa.
Txajũ' Jesusa's kĩjkĩhwa wala pẽjxku, nawa pasme'.
Kxteewa sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' Dxus leya's kaapiya'jsawe'sx kũhçxa wala juuna' we'wena yuwee ũstxi.
Aça' Herodesa' txajx soldauwe'sx yakh Jesusa's weeçx we'wena ahçeçxa jxkaahsa ropa na'wẽ zhiçxkwesa kaathe'jçxatx npeevxysxijkana ũsu'. Txã'wẽ yũuçxak Herodesa' Pilato tasxtey Jesusa's ki' kaah.
Pilato yakh Herodes yakha' nyafxíi yu' iipuiisatx yu', nawa txãn ente txã'wẽ yũuçxa' yuwe ewuutx.
Txajũ' Pilato' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx çxhabte nasa jxukaysatx kaapkhakhe'jçxa,
na'jĩnak we'we:
—I'kwe'sxa' naa piçthẽ'ja' nasatx kaypuba'jna ũsa' jĩçxa adx tasxte nuypa'ji'kwe. Aça' adxa' i'kwe'sx wẽsẽ'jna ũstey jxuka paapẽjxthu. Nawa kĩhte yuhwa ewmée yũuni's yu' uymeeth.
Aça' Herodeswa ewmée yũuni's uymeeçxa', ki'kin kaasxwedu'kh. I'kwe'sxíiwa jiyui'kwe naa piçthẽ'ja' yuuwesa kasehme'. Aça' ¿ma'wẽ ikhwa'j yuukx?
Txãa pa'ga ikhmée kaapeçxukwe'jçxaçxáa kaatxhweete'je'nja jĩte',
nasa jxukaysa na'jĩnatx sus we'we:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja's ikhçxa Barabasçxá's mitxhwete jĩ'tx. (Pilato' anxu iisak txãa fxiestate teeçx preesu txhweeté' nasa weçxaakahn naa pa'gatx txã'jĩ'.)
nasa jxukaysa na'jĩnatx sus we'we:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja's ikhçxa Barabasçxá's mitxhwete jĩ'tx. (Pilato' anxu iisak txãa fxiestate teeçx preesu txhweeté' nasa weçxaakahn naa pa'gatx txã'jĩ'.)
Txãa Barabas yu' çxhabte gobierno's puíi kiisçxa nasatx wala kiikhe'pha'ga karceltek txaahni ũsu'.
Txajũ' Pilato' Jesusa's txhweete wẽeçxa nasatx ki' pẽjxku.
Nawa txãawe'sx yu' jweeíiçxáatx sus we'we:
—Kluuste pejka mkaafxuçu'j yuh jĩna.
Aça' Pilato' tekh uswa nasatx ki' we'wek na'jĩna:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿kĩhga ewmée yũu? Adxa' makwe paapẽjxçxawa, ewmée yũuni's yu' uymeeth ikhkahn yuuwa. Txã'wẽ yuuwesa kasejeçme' aça' kaapeçxukwe'jçxaçxáa kaatxhweete'je'nja jĩtewa,
txãawe'sx yu' jweeíiçxáatx sus ũusçxa we'wena kluuste fxuçkaah. Sacerdotewe'sx nasa jxukaysa txã'wẽ sus we'weni yakhçxáa pejka knaytxi txãawe'sx pẽyni's.
Txajũ' Pilato' txãawe'sx pẽyni's kxtey yuuk,
sa' gobierno's puíi kiisçxa nasatx kiikhe'jsa yu'sa' karceluh kaakutxi'jçxa Jesus yu'sa' txãawe'sx kusete nvxihtku, kĩh yũu wẽeçxawa kxtey yuukahn.
Jesusa's kluuste fxuçya' jxũna u'jweççxa', teeçx piçthẽ'j Cirenejũwe'sx Simon yaasesa çxhabte pa'jaçte pu'jykhẽwçxa', kluusa's txã'sna kxaakhe'jçxatx Jesus e'stey pe'jna u'j.
Txã'wẽ yũuya' u'jweçte, nasa wala kuh u'jweç yu'tx. Txãa ksxavxyte u'ywe'sxwa txã'wẽtx wala kuhsa nxusçxa sus ũ'nena u'jna ũsu'.
Aça' Jesusa' txãawe'sxtxi yu'thegçxa':
—Jerusalente u'ywe'sx, adxa's nxusçxa ũ'ne na'wẽ' wejx yuuwa i'kwe'sx fxi'zewa'ja's yajkxçxa mnxuswe, i'kwe'sx luuçx pa'gate.
Txã'wẽme' naa kiwete nxusu en yuja'. Txãa en pa'the', txãawe'sx luuçx pxthaa yuuçte uyçxa' na'jĩtxna: Bagaçx yuhwa nasa ji'phuçxa kçxu'çxu'jsamée yakha' txakwe nxus yuhmeena jĩtxna.
Txajũ' nasa' nxusna ũukhna vxiç wala upeçxa jxuka ikh jxthãasutxna, sa' thã'j le'çxkwesatxwa txã'wẽy yũu jxthãasutxna.
Fxtũu tasx buçxaçteçxáa yuhwa na'wẽtx yũ' na' fxtũu tasx ewsa ukawa'j en ãhte yu' wejx txã'wẽ yũutxna jĩk.
Jesus yakh ikhya' e'z piçthẽ'j wala yuuwesatx jxũna u'jtx.
Sa' teeçx ahte Uusáa dxikthé dxi'thçxáasa jĩnisate pa'jçxa', Jesusa's kluuskhẽ ki'ptxi, txã'wẽy e'z yuuwesatxwa teeçxsa's paçu, vxite's jebu.
Txã'wẽ kluuste fxuçuçte', Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—Tata, meen peltunaĩ adxa's açesawe'sxtxi. Txãawe'sxa' jiimeeçxatx txã'wẽ yũ' jĩk.
Txajũ' soldauwe'sxa' swerte kaahtx, Jesus athni ropa's maa soldau knaytewa jiyuya'.
Naapkaçxha' nasa kuhsa kxtee thegna ũssa vxite' judiu npiiçthẽ'jwe'sxwa Jesusa's weeçx we'wena npeevxysxijkatx na'jĩna:
—Vxitetxwa nwe'weya' ãjã'k na' ãçxha' peekíi kluusuwa iyuna, Dxus txhitxhçxa kaahnisa dxihçxa' jĩ'tx.
Aça' soldauwe'sxwa weeçx we'wena utxaaçxa', vxino ewmeesa's yus wẽena
na'jĩ'tx:
—Idxa' judiuwe'sxtxi jxkaahsa dxihçxa', peekíi kluusu iyuçxa msa'j jĩ'tx.
Kluus vxiçte' griego, latin, hebreo yuweju fxi'jni na'jĩ'k: Naaíi Judiuwe'sxtxi Jxkaahsa' jĩ'k.
Txajũ' yuuwesa kluuskhẽ a'kxni u'psa teeçxsa' na'jĩk Jesusa's iiwẽesxuna:
—Idxa' Kristo dxihçxa', peekíi kluusu iyuçxa kwe'sxtxiwa meen nwe'we jĩte',
vxite' ka'tu pukakhẽ u'psa yu' na'jĩnak pas:
—Idxa' yuuwesaçxa txã'wẽ seena' kastigãyni u'pçxawa, Dxusa's ũukhu'çmeewá'ga txã'wẽ wẽesxu'.
Kwe'sxa' isa yuuwesayuhtha'w, txãa pa'ga kastigãyni u'ptha'w. Nawa naa piçthẽ'ja' kĩhte yuhwa yuuwesa meek yu' jĩçxa',
Jesusa's na'wẽk we'we:
—Iidx jxkaahwa'the pa'jçxa', adxa's yaakine'ga jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Isath we'we', Dxus ũsnite ãçxhíi adx yakh ũsune'ga jĩk.
Txajũ' ẽepxãh yuuçpkaçxha', naa kiwete jxuka çxhi'dxku kusuçte las trestepkaçx.
Seka' kweethme', naapkaçxha' dxuus yatte txudenisa liensu pesath a'kxnisa' puupxãjkhẽk sute.
Naapkaçxha' Jesusa' na'jĩnak sus we'we:
—Tata, iidx kusete adx ũusa's nvxiituçthu jĩna'wa uuk.
Txã'wẽ yũute', soldau kpiitan uyçxa', na'jĩnak Dxusna weçxa:
—Isa, naa piçthẽ'ja' yuuwemeesa yuh yu'ga jĩk.
Aça' nasa jxukay kxtee ũssawa txã'wẽ yũute uyçxa', ¿txã'wẽ yuja' yuumanx? sũhnatx nxusna ũukhna u'j.
Aça' Jesusa's jiisawe'sx vxite' Galileajũjx Jesus yakh yuusa u'ywe'sxa' jxu'juçxáatx thegna ũsu' txã'wẽ yũuçte.
Kxte' teeçx piçthẽ'j José yaasesa ũsu'k. Txãa yu' Judea kiwete Arimatea çxhabtewe'sx judiu npiiçthẽ'j walasatewe'sxku yu'.
Txãa Jose' isa bagaçx Dxus jxkaajxa' takhekx sũhna ũythassak yu'. Txã'wẽçxaíik vxite judiu npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx Jesusa's ikhya' puutx we'weçte', txãa yu' wa'l.
Txajũ' txãa Jose' Pilato tasxte u'jçxa Jesus kakwe's pẽjxku.
Sa' kluusuh spajkxçxa liensute yapçxa kwet penxa u'se phaadeni kim yuhwa pedanimeegak khikh.
Txã'wẽ sapatu jxkaasewa'j en jxuka ãjãçku yu'.
Aça' u'ywe'sx Galileajũjx Jesus yakh pi'kxna yuusa' txãawe'sxwa u'jçxa kwet kafx pedani's uytxi Jesus kakwe's mkaa khikheçtewa.
Sa' yatna sxawedna u'jçxa, Jesus kakwete sxũsxwa'j jxuka pheu'jçxatx sapatu jxkaase ente ki'sna fxi'ze, Dxus jxkaahni's kxtey nwẽesẽ'j na.
Jxkaase en skhẽwnijũ kuskuskhẽ wala kusíi u'ywe'sxa' Jesus kakwete sxũsxwa'j pheu'jnisa's atçxa pedaní kwet kafxna u'jtx. Vxite u'ywa txãawe'sx yakh ja'da pi'kxna u'jtx.
Kxtee pa'jçxa', kafxte aphnisa kweta's fxiite ki'pni u'pte uyçxa',
kafxte u'katx. Nawa Jesus kakwe yu'sa' uymeeta'.
Sa' wala ũukhna ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja's yuuwa jiimeetx ũsu', naapkaçxha' e'z piçthẽ'jtx ropa zhiçxkwe zmeena' çxihmesa athçxa txãawe'sx pukate vxyaa.
Aça' wala ũukhçxa kiwekhẽtx kĩiçhu, naapkaçxha' txãa piçthẽ'jwe'sxa' na'jĩtx:
—Uusaawe'sx ksxavxyu ĩtxĩ yuusa's ¿kĩjxa'kwe pakwé'?
Ayte meeyã'ja'. Uuçxawa ki' ĩtxĩ yuuyã'kh. Galileate ũsçxa' na'jĩnak we'we txã'sa' miiyajkxwe:
Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's ewmeesawe'sx kusete dukhni yuuna, aça' txãawe'sxa' kluuskhẽ ki'pçxa ikhetxna. Aça' uuçxawa tekh ente' ki' ĩtxĩ kiiteena ¿jĩna pta'sxmeená'?
Txã'jĩte' Jesus we'weni's yajkxtxi.
Sa' pedaniijũ sxawedna u'jçxa ma'wẽ uyni'swa jxuka pta'sxtxi oncesatx, sa' Jesus yakh u'jusa vxitesatxwa pta'sxtxi.
Txã'wẽ pta'sxsa yu' Maria Magdalena, Juana, Jakobo njĩ'j Maria, vxite' u'ywe'sx ja'da u'jsa txãawe'sxtxi yu'.
Nawa Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sx yuutxi' luuku we'weni na'wẽçxáane' pthũuse' txãa u'ywe'sx pta'sxnisa yu', aça' isane'ta we'we' sũjũ'çmeeta'.
Txã'wẽtewa Pedro' wuwuuçxak thegya' u'j pedaní kafxte, sa' dxiiga kuyçxa', liensuçxá's puçte ki'pni u'pte uyçxa': ¿Txã'wẽ yuja' yuumanx? sũhna wala kuh yajkxna yatna sxawedku.
Txãa entey Jesus yakh u'jusa e'zsa' Emaus çxhabnatx u'jweç yu'. Txãa çxhaba' Jerusalenuh once kilometro ãh jxu'khak ũsu'.
Txãa e'zsa' jũ'nakhẽ kĩjkĩh yũuni'swa jxuka yajkxnatx puutx we'wena u'jweç yu'.
Txã'wẽ dxi'the we'wena u'jweçpkaçxha', Jesusa' vxyaaçxáa yuuçxa txãawe'sx yakh ja'da u'kh.
Txã'wẽtewa, txãawe'sx yu' uyçxawa, kimtewa jiyumeeta'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' pẽjxku:
—¿Kĩjkwe txakwe puutx we'wena u'jwe'? ¿Kĩh yuupa'ga txã'wẽ nxusna u'jweçkwe? jĩte',
Kleofxas yaasesa teeçxsa' na'jĩnak pas:
—Jũ'nakhẽçxáa Jerusalente txã'wẽ seena' nxus nxus yũunisa's majũwe'sxwa jxukatx jiyu, aça' idxçxáawá'ga jiyumée neeyũu kxtee ũsçxawa jĩte',
Jesusa' pẽjxku:
—¿Kĩhga yuu? jĩna. Aça' txãawe'sxa' pta'sxtxi jxuka:
—Jesus Nasarethũwe'sxa's seena' nxusnxus vxitçxa ikhni'stha'w ji'phu. Txã' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa kĩjkĩh yũuya'wa ãjãsak yu', sa' Dxus dxi'pte vxite' nasaa ksxavxytewa txã'wẽk ewçxáa yũuna fxi'zesa yu'.
Txã'wẽtewa sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' kwe'sx npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx yu' txã'sa' ikhwa'jçxáa vxitçxa dukhtxi, aça' kluuste fxuççxa ikhtxi.
Kwe'sx yu' Israelwe'sxtxi nwe'wewa'jsana sũjũ'tha'w, nawa kxtey yuume'. Txã'wẽ nxus yũuni ãçxha' tekh en yã'j yuuça'.
Aça' u'ywe'sx kwe'sx yakh ih pkhaakhena u'jusa maaíi yu' pedaní kafxte thegya' u'jçxa
ki' sxawedçxa', kwe'sxtxi khãawãsxi'tx txãawe'sx pta'sxçxa': Uusáa kakwe yu's uymeeçxawa, angeleswe'sxçxáatxtha'w uy, aça' Jesusa' ĩtxĩ yuuk jĩ'tx jĩnatx kwe'sxtxi pta'sx txãa pa'gatha'w ũukh.
Aça' kwe'sx yakh u'jusa piçthẽ'j maaíi yu' pedaní kafxna u'jçxa u'ywe'sx ma'wẽne'ta pta'sx txã'wẽyçxáatha'w uy. Nawa Jesus yu'sa' uymeetha'w jĩnatx pta'sx jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx we'weni's nakwe txaçxtewa, jiyuya' ãjã'çmée íiçxáai'kwe.
Kristo' cielute u'kamey, ¿seena' nxus pxthaa yuuwa'jsa yu'çmeená'? jĩçxa',
Dxus librute ma'wẽ fxi'jni'swa jxuka pta'sxya' takhku, txã's ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa Moises we'wenijũjx takhçxa mtee pa'jne'ta Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx fxi'jçxa nvxiht kxtee pa'j.
Sa' txãawe'sx pa'jwa'j çxhabte pa'the', Jesus yu' u'jnik u'jweç yu'.
Aça' txãawe'sxa' na'jĩnatx neevxisxa:
—Kwe'sx yakh ayte me'ka dejxa'. Txã'wẽme' kusuçyã'ja' na' çxhi'dxina jĩte', Jesusa' txãawe'sx yakh u'kak kxtee dejxa'.
Sa' txãawe'sx yakh mesate u'pçxa', Dxusna weçxana'wa pana's pe'ltedeçxa txãawe'sxtxi ũsu'sku.
Txã'wẽ yũunijũtx kimtewa jiyu. Naapkaçxha' Jesus yu' naa dudte txãawe'sx yafxju vxyaame'.
Aça' txãawe'sx pwe'sx na'jĩnatx puutx pta'sxi':
—Jesusne' yu' aça' isa yuhne' kwe'sx ũuste seena' weçxweçxa ũusuthe' dxi'the yuhçxa Dxus librute fxi'jni's pta'sxiçte' jĩ'tx.
Sa' txãa oratey kiitena'wa ki' Jerusalen çxhabna sxawedçxa Jesus yakh u'jusa oncesawe'sxtxi uyna pa'jtx vxite nasa yakh pkhaakheçxa u'pte.
Aça' kxtee pkhaakhena u'psa yu' e'zsa Emausu sxawedsatx pta'sxtxi na'jĩna:
—Isa, kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuyuhga aça' Simonwa uyka jĩte',
Emausu sxawedna pa'jsawa pta'sxtxi dxi'the ma'wẽ puutx uyçxa we'weni'swa jxuka, sa' pana's txudedeçpkaçxha' ma'wẽ yũuçxa Jesustewa jiyuçxawa jxuka pta'sxtxi.
Txãawe'sxa' kxtee we'wena u'píyna, Jesusa' txãawe'sx pxãhte vxyaaçxáa yuuçxa na'jĩnak weçxa:
—Ũukhmée weçxana meswe jĩte',
txãawe'sx yu': anximusa's ne'tka'w uy sũhçxa ũukhuçtxi yu'.
Aça' Jesus we'weçxa':
—¿Kĩh yuutekwe ũukhú'? Sa' pta'sxte', ¿kĩh yuuçxakwe isa yuhna sũjũ'çmée?

Mthegwe adx kuse petx adx çxida yã'jçxa. Vxitemée, adxthu. Aça' adxa's ew jiyuya' mjxa'dxwe. Adxa' anximusmeeçxa', dxi'th ji'phsath, sa' kakwe'swa ji'phsath. I'kwe'sx yafxte ma'wẽtka vxya' txãa yu'sa' jxuka ji'pthu.
Txã'jĩçxa', kuse petx çxida yã'jçxa ktheegu'kh.
Nawa txãawe'sxa' kuh yajkxna weçxaniiteçxáa Jesusna sũhna yaakxwa'j yu'sa' ji'phumeeta'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—¿I'kwe'sxa' ũ'wa'j kĩhçxáawa ji'phmeekwe'? jĩte',
wedx khakhni pe'la vxite' çxhi'dx mil txã'wẽsa'stxi ũs.
Aça' jxpa'gaçxa' txãawe'sx dxi'ptey uyna ũste ũ'k.
Sa' na'jĩnak we'we:

—Adxna na'wẽ yũuk txã'snath adxa' i'kwe'sx yakh nee u'juy pta'sx. Moises ley fxi'jni vxite' Dxus yuwee pta'sxsawe'sx librute fxi'jni vxite' Salmos librute fxi'jni ũsta', adxa's ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa txã' jxuka kxtey yuuna jĩnath pta'sx.
Txajũk Dxus librute fxi'jni's isa ew kaajiyu'j,
sa' na'jĩk:
—Kristo' uuwa'jsa', nawa tekh ente' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuna uusaawe'sx ksxavxyuh.
Aça' txã'wẽ yũuni's Jerusalenu pta'sxya' takhçxa maa maa kiwetewa jxuka pta'sxitxna, kxah nasa' pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedte', Kristo' txãawe'sxtxi peltunaĩna jĩna fxi'jni ũsa'.
Aça' i'kwe'sxa' adx ma'wẽ yũuçxa ki' ĩtxĩ yuuni's uysaai'kwe na' txã'sa' pta'sxwa'j ji'phi'kwe.
Nawa mwẽesẽ'jwe: adx Tata i'kwe'sx jĩi kaajxa' neeyũuk txã'sa' kaja'nja jxpa'gakahn. Nawa txã'sa' jxpa'gamey yu', ay Jerusalentee meswe jxpa'gapkaçx jĩk.
Txãa e'su' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi pe'jna u'kh çxhab eka Betaniate pa'j. Sa' kusetx kiisçxa jxukaysatx bedekĩyku.
Txã'wẽ yũuçpkaçxha', cielun pe'jna u'jnik yuu txãawe'sxçxáatx nvxihtçxa.
Aça' txãawe'sxa' Jesus yuh yu'ga jĩna weçxana Jerusalen çxhabnay wala wẽtwẽt yajkxna sxawedtxi.
Sa' pu'vxitumeetx dxuus yatte Dxusna weçxana nes yu'.
John: Nyafxiitey naa kiwe meeíin, Kristo' ũsyã'kh yu'. Txã' Dxus yakhku ũsu', sa' Dxus íiçxáak yu'.
Nyafxiiteya' txã'wẽk Dxus yakh ũssa yu'.
Dxusa' txã'sna neewe'weçxak kĩjkĩhnawa jxuka kvxiitu'j. Txãa pa'ga naa kiwete kĩjkĩhwa ũssa' jxuka txajx vxitniçxaçxáata'. Dxus yakh ũssa kĩjkĩhnawa vxitmeewaça', kĩh yuhwa mee yuutxna.
Uuçxa ki' ĩtxi yuuwa'ja's txãak ji'phu', sa' txãa íiçxáak nasatx eena'te kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa yu'.
Txãa eena'sa' çxhi'dxte kweethku, aça' çxhi'dxsa' fxĩçxhaya' ãjame'.
Txãa eena'sa's tuuthe'jsa' teeçx piçthẽ'j Juan yaasesak yu' Dxus kaahni.
Txã' txãa eena'te kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa's tuuthe'jsak yu', maawa txajx tuuthe'jni's wẽse'jçxa Kristo's ũuste jxpa'gakahn.
Juan yu' eena'te kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa meek yu', naasáa eena'te kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa's tuuthe'jsaçxáak yu'.
Naapkaçxha' nasatx eena'te kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa Kristo' naa kiwete vxyaaççxáak yu'.
Sa' vxyaaçxa' naa kiwete fxi'zena ũsu'k. Txã'wẽtewa, naa kiwetewe'sxa' jiyumeeta', makwe txajx vxitnisaçxawa.
Txajx vxitni kiwete vxyaatewa, txajx ji'j jĩnisa' jxpa'gameeta'.
Makwe txajx ji'j jĩnisa jxpa'gameetewa, maaíi yu' txã's nwẽese'jçxa ũuste jxpa'gatx. Aça' txã'sna jxpa'gasatxi's Dxusa' txajx luuçx yuuwa'ja's ũsku.
Txãa pa'ga txãawe'sxa' naa kiwete neywe'sx kakweju kakwe yakh upxhi'tx neywe'sx jxthãasni txã'wẽsameeta', txãawe'sxa' Dxus luuçx yuuna pa'jsata'.

Nyafxiitey Dxus yakh ũssa' nasaa kakwe's jxpa'gaçxa kwe'sx yakh ũsu'k, isasaçxá's pta'sxna peeygãhna. Txãa pa'ga kwe'sxa' txajx fxi'zeni wala zhiçxkwesa's uytha'w, txãasa jiitha'w Dxus Nçxi'k teeçxçxáasatewa.
Txã'snak Juana' tuuthe'jna na'jĩna we'we:
—Adxa' na'snath pta'sxi' i'kwe'sxtxi: Adx e'ste yuja' txã' adx naa kiwete upxmeyna we'sxku yu', txãa pa'ga adxte jxthaakwesa' jĩnak pta'sx.
Aça' kwe'sxa' txajx peeygãani makwe ne' yu' txã'sa' jxukatha'w jxpa'ga jxukaysa.
Nyafxí' juuna' jxkaahnisa ley Moises nvxihtku txã'sçxáanatha'w jxpa'ga, naapkaçxha' Jesukristo' isa Dxus peeygãani'sku nuypa'j txã'snatha'w jxpa'ga.
Nawa maa yuhwa Dxusa's iiuymeeta'. Txã'wẽtewa Dxus Nçxi'k teeçxçxáasa Ney yakh ih ũssa' kwe'sxtxi' kaajiyu'kh Dxus ma'wẽsatewa.
Jerusalente judiuwe'sxa' pẽjxya' kaahtx sacerdote vxite' levxitawe'sxtxi Juan kimtewa jiyuya'.
Aça' Juana' ãatek pta'sx:
—Adxa' Kristomeeth jĩna.
Txajũ' ki'kin pẽjxtxi:
—Txã'wẽçxa' ¿kimga? ¿Txãniitey Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Elias wá'ga? jĩte', Juan pasçxa':
—Txã'wẽmeeth jĩk.
Aça' ki'kin pẽjxtxi:
—Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa' pa'jana jĩ'tx txãa wá'ga jĩte':
—Txãameeth jĩnak pas.
Txajũ' ki' pẽjxtxi:
—Txã'wẽçxa' idxa' ¿kimga? Idxa' kĩh yũuna fxi'zesaçxawa mpeeta'sx. Txã'wẽme', kwe'sxtxi jxkaahsatx pta'sxya' u'jwa'j ji'ptha'w jĩte',
Juan pasçxa':
—Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Isaiasa' na'jĩnak we'we: Nasa u'pnimée kiwesu sus we'weni pthũusena: Dxus pa'jwa'ja's mpheu'jwe jĩna, nawa adx tuuthe'jna pekũhwa'ja's pta'sxnak txã'jĩ.
Juana's paapẽjxya' pa'jsa' fxariseowe'sx kaahnisatx yu',
sa' ki'kin paapẽjxtxi:
—Txã'wẽ Kristomeeth, sa' Eliaswa meeth, sa' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa pa'jana jĩ'tx txãameeth jĩ'g sa' ¿kĩjxa'çxáaga nasatx yu'te bautisaĩ'? jĩte',
Juan pasçxa':
—Adxa' yu'teçxáath bautisaĩ'. Nawa i'kwe'sx ksxavxyte teeçx ũsa' txã'sa' jiimeene'kwe.
Txã' adx e'su vxyaana, nawa txã' adxte jxthaakwesa'. Aça' adxa' txajx pelgatxi tudni wesçxáa yuhtxwa khihbxa' ãhmeekwesath jĩnak pas.
Juana' Jordan yu'wala kuteju sek kãani ju'gu Betábara yaasesatek txã'wẽ bautisãyna ũsu', aça' kxteetx txã'wẽ paapẽjxya' pa'jna ũsu'.
Kuskuskhẽ' Juana' Jesus yuhte uyçxa', na'wẽk we'we:
—Mthegwe, naaíi Dxus kaahni piisxakuẽ', jxukaysa pkaltxi txudewa'jsa.
Aça' adxa' txã'sna we'weçxath txã'wẽ pta'sx: Adx e'su teeçx piçthẽ'j vxyaana, txã' adxte jxthaakwesa', txã' naa kiwete adx upxmeyna we'sxku yu' txãa pa'ga.
Txã'sa' adxíi yuuwa jiimeeth yu' kimtewa. Nawa Israelwe'sx txã's jiyukahn yu'teçxáawa bautisãyna ũsu'th.
Juana' ki'kin we'wek na'jĩna:
—Dxus Espiritu's uythu cieluju tub çxihme na'wẽsa Jesus kajkwekhẽ kĩijaçte.

Txã'wẽtewa, adxa' nee jiimée íiçxáath yu' kimtewa. Nawa adxa's bautisãyya' kaahsa' pta'sxku: Espiritu's uyuune'ga teeçx piçthẽ'j kajkwete kĩijaçte', aça' txãa piçthẽ'ja' isa Dxus Espiritu's nasaa ũuste kxu'akhe'jsa yuuna jĩnak pta'sx.
Aça' ãçxha' uyçxa', jiyuth Dxus Nçxi'ktewa, sa' txã'snath tuuthe'je'.
Vxite kuskuskhẽ' Juana' ki' kxtey ũsu'k txãa yakh u'jusa e'zsa yã'jçxa.
Sa' Jesus jxkhẽuuçte uyçxa', Juana' na'jĩk:
—Mthegwe, naaíi Dxus kaahni piisxakuẽ'.
Txã'jĩni's wẽse'jçxa', txãa e'zsa' Jesus e'stey u'jtx.
Aça' Jesusa' yu'thegçxa', txajx e'ste yuusatx uyku, sa' na'wẽk pẽjx:
—¿Kĩjkwe pakwé'? jĩte', txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Kaapiya'jsa, ¿mteega u'pu'? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Mejkawe thegya' jĩk. Aça' txãawe'sxa' u'jçxa' jiyutx mtee u'psatewa. Sa' txãa yakh kxtee neeyũutx, kusuçyã'kh yu' naa pa'ga.
Juan we'weni's wẽse'jçxa Jesus e'stey u'jsa teeçxsa' Adresku yaase yu', Simon Pedro nyakh.
Aça' Adresa' txajx nyakh Simon khuẽ'yna nyafxte pta'sxya' u'kh:
—Dxus tasxu yuusa Kristo jĩni's yuutha'w uy jĩna.
Txajũ' Adresa' txajx nyakh Simona's pe'jna kũjk Jesus ũsnite. Aça' Jesus uyçxa' na'jĩk:
—Idxa' Jonas nçxi'k Simon yaaseg, nawa ãçxha' Cefxas yaseni neeyũune'ga. Cefxas yu', Pedro jĩni'.
Vxite kuskuskhẽ' Jesusa' Galilea kiwen u'jweççxa', Fxelipe's uyçxa':
—Adx yakh myuh jĩnak pi'kx.
Fxelipe yu', Beçaida çxhabte u'psak yu', Adres Pedrowe'sxwa txãa çxhabteywe'sxtxi yu'.
Aça' Fxelipe' Natanaela's pta'sxya' u'jçxa' na'jĩk:

—Moisesa' teeçx piçthẽ'ja' vxyaana jĩnak fxi'j ley librute, aça' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa txãniiteywe'sxwa txã'snaíiçxáatx tuuthe'jna fxi'j txã'stha'w kwe'sxa' puutx uy. Txãa piçthẽ'ja' Jose nçxi'k Jesusa', Nasaret çxhabtewe'sxa' jĩte',
Natanael pasçxa':
—Nasarette', ¿maaçxá' nasa ewsa kasejxa' ãjama'k? jĩte', Fxelipe pasçxa':
—Mejka wakx thegya' jĩk.
Txajũ' Natanael utxaana kũjuçte Jesusa' uyçxa', na'jĩk:
—Naa piçthẽ'j yuuçxa' Israel nwe'sx jxpubasamée nasa ewsa yuh yu'ga.
Txã'jĩte', Natanaela' pẽjxku:
—¿Ma'wẽ yuuçxaga adxa's jiyu? jĩte', Jesus pasçxa':
—Fxelipe pa'yameyna, idxa's uythu higwera fxtũu tasxte u'pte jĩte',
Natanaela' na'wẽk pas:
—Idxa' Dxus Nçxi'kgu, Israelwe'sxtxi jxkaahsa jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Txã'wẽ higwera fxtũu tasxte u'pte idxa's uythu jĩteçxáa ¿adx kimtewa jiyuwá'ga? Txã'wẽyã'jçxa', naajũyã'ja' Dxus kaavxya'ja'jnitx wejx walasatx uyuune'ga jĩk.
Sa' ki' we'weçxa':
—Adxa' isath we'we': cielu phaateçxa ũste', Dxus angeleswe'sxa' kĩhna tejkana ũste uyuune'kwe Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa kajkwekhẽ jĩk.

Tekh en skhẽwniite', Galilea kiwesu Kaná çxhabte ptamusáa ũsu'tx. Aça' Jesuswa pi'kxni pa'jçxa ũsu'k, txãa yakh ih u'jusawe'sx yã'jçxa. Jesus njĩ'jwa kxtee ũsu'k, naapkaçxha' vxino pçuute', Jesusa's na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Vxino pçuk jĩk.

Tekh en skhẽwniite', Galilea kiwesu Kaná çxhabte ptamusáa ũsu'tx. Aça' Jesuswa pi'kxni pa'jçxa ũsu'k, txãa yakh ih u'jusawe'sx yã'jçxa. Jesus njĩ'jwa kxtee ũsu'k, naapkaçxha' vxino pçuute', Jesusa's na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Vxino pçuk jĩk.

Tekh en skhẽwniite', Galilea kiwesu Kaná çxhabte ptamusáa ũsu'tx. Aça' Jesuswa pi'kxni pa'jçxa ũsu'k, txãa yakh ih u'jusawe'sx yã'jçxa. Jesus njĩ'jwa kxtee ũsu'k, naapkaçxha' vxino pçuute', Jesusa's na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Vxino pçuk jĩk.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—¿Kĩh yũukahnkwe adxa's txã'wẽ pta'sxi'? adx en yuu ãhmeya' jĩte',
njĩ'ja' kxtee selpisaawe'sxtxi na'jĩk:
—Txãa ma'wẽ jxkaathe', kxtey myũuwe jĩna.
Kxte' seis kiwe mitxh walasatx ũsu'. Txãa yu' judiuwe'sx khweeçxawa'j yu' awnisatx yu'. Mitxh iisa oçxenta meeçxawa cien litro yu' khẽesatx yu'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' jxkaakh kxtee selpisaawe'sxtxi':
—Naa mitxhsu jxuka yu' uta mawwe jĩte', kxtey yuutx.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we txãawe'sxtxi': Naa mitxhte le'çxkuẽ pa'kxçxa boda namu's me'jwe yusya' jĩte', txãawe'sxa' kxtey yuutx.
Txajũ' boda namu' tudxçxawa, jiyume' yu'a's txã'wẽ vxino vxitnitewa. Kxtee selpisaawe'sxçxáatx jii yu', yu'a's txã'wẽ vxino vxitnisatewa. Txajũ' boda namu' ptamusa's pa'yaçxa
na'jĩnak we'we:
—Maawa vxino ewsa's khuẽ'ytxi nyafxte yusu' pi'kxnisatx, txãa e'sutx vxino açxamée ewsa's yusu'. Nawa idxa' txã'wẽ yũumée vxino wejx ewsa'sgu nmehte yus jĩk.
Jesusa' Galilea kiwesu Kaná çxhabtek txã'wẽ kim yuhwa ãjãnimeesa's kaavxya'j. Txã'wẽ yũuçxak txajx ewuni's khiyu'j, aça' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' jiyutx Jesus kimtewa.
Txãa e'su' Jesusa' Kapernaum çxhabnak u'j, txajx njĩ'j vxite' txajx nyakhwe'sx, txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yã'jçxa.
Judiuwe'sx fxiesta Paskua en ãjãçte', Jesusa' Jerusalen çxhabna u'kh.
Sa' dxuus yatte u'kaçxa', bwey, piisxáa, tub çxihmetx txweyna ũstek uy, vxite' vxyuu yu'pthehna ũssatx.
Sa' Jesusa' txã'wẽ yũuna ũste uyçxa', kha'txa pheu'jçxa eka kasxisxku nasa vxite' niimaltxi jxuka. Sa' txã'wẽy vxyuu yu'pthehna ũsni mesatxwa jxuka pũsxku petx vxyu yã'jçxa.
Sa' kxtee tub çxihme txweysatxi' na'jĩk:
—Naatxi' ayjxu jxuka mkaasxisxwe. Adx Tata yatte' txweyna vxyuu yu'pthehna ũswa'jme'.
Txã'jĩte', Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' yajkxtxi Dxus librute na'wẽ fxi'jni's: Dxuus yatte' ewmée yũuni's weh yuhwa peejxmeeth jĩni's.
Txajũ' judiuwe'sxa' ũusçxa we'wenatx pẽjx:
—Kim jxkaathe txã'wẽ yũuçxawa, kwe'sxtxi mpeeta'sx jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Naa dxuus yata's pẽtxtewa, adxa' tekh ente' ki' kiisya' ãjãwa'jsath.
Txajũ' judiuwe'sxa' iiweeçx we'wena na'jĩtx:
—Naa dxuus yata's kuarenta y seis anxutetx txahna jxã'j, aça' idxa' ¿tekh enteçxáa txajxa' ewuudxijíima'g?
Nawa Jesusa' txajx kakwe'sku dxuus yata' jĩna we'we'.
Aça' uuçxa ki' ĩtxi yuute', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' yajkxtxi txã'wẽ we'weni's. Sa' Dxus libru' isane' we'we', aça' Jesuswa isasa's íiçxáane' we'we' sũhna ewtxi jiyu.
Judiuwe'sx fxiesta ente Jesus Jerusalente ũste', nasa wala kuh jiyutx Jesusa' Dxus tasxu yuusatewa, txã'wẽ kim yuhwa ãjãnimeesa's kaavxya'ja'pha'ga.
Nawa Jesusa' txãawe'sx ma'wẽsatewa jxuka jiiyã'kh yu', txãasak txã'wẽ jiyutx sũju'çmée.
Txãa nasa' txã'wẽsata' jĩna pta'sxi peejx yu'çme', txãa pa'gatey nasaa ũus yaakxnitx jxuka jiiyã'kh yu' naa pa'ga.
Teeçx fxariseo Nikodemo yaasesa u'pu'k. Txã' judiu npiiçthẽ'jsatewe'sxku yu'.

Txãa piçthẽ'ja' Jesus tasxte kus pa'jçxa', na'jĩk: Jiitha'w idxa's Dxusne' txã'wẽ kaah, kwe'sxtxi kaapiya'khan. Dxus pu'çxmeewaça', kim yuhwa ãjawa'jsame's kaavxya'ja'jmeena, idx na'wẽg yu' txã's jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—Isath we'we', maawa ki' upxmeeçxa yu', Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite u'kaya' ãjameena.
Txã'jĩte', Nikodemo' na'wẽk pẽjx:
—Nasa ĩisxyã'jsa' ma'wẽ ki' upxya' ãjakx? Njĩ'j tutxhte ki' u'kaçxa upxya' ãjama'k? jĩte',
Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Adxa' naa kakwe upxwa'ja's we'we'çmeeth. Maawa Dxus jxkaanite u'ka wẽeçxa', yu'te vxite' Dxus Espiritute upxwa'ja'sthu txã'jĩ'.
Nasaa kakwe' nasaa kakweteyçxáak upxhi', naapkaçxha' Dxus luuçxa' Dxus Espiritutek upxhi'.
Maawa ki' upxwa'ja' jĩ'th aça' fxiy yuh txã'wẽ we'we'k sũhna yaakxnu.
Wejxa'swa ma'wẽga susni's wẽse'jçxawa, majũ yuhte ki' maa dxi'j u'jweçtewa ya'jiyu'çmée, txã'wẽyku Dxus Espiritute upxni's ya'jiyu'çmée jĩte',
Nikodemo' jiyuya' ãjameeçxa' ki' pẽjxku:
—¿Ma'wẽ txã'wẽ yuja' ki' ya'upxhikx? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Idxa' Israelwe'sxtxi kaapiya'jsaçxawa, na'wẽsa yuutxi' ¿jiimeewá'ga?
Isath we'we': Dxus Espiritute upxnisa' wejxa na'wẽsaçxá' txã' ma'wẽsatewa iiuythu sa' jiiçxath txã'jĩ'. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' jiyu'çmeei'kwe.
Naa kiwetewe'sxtxi we'wena pta'sxte jiyumeeçxa', ¿ma'wẽ jiyuki'kwe cielutewe'sxna pta'sxte'?
Maa yuhwa cielute u'kasa yu' meeta', naasáa cielujũ kĩisa yuuçxáa cielute u'kasa', Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa txã' cielutewe'sxa' naa pa'ga.
Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's ẽekhẽ a'kxçxa ki'pni yuuna, Moiseswa ma'wẽga nasa u'pnimée kiwete ũsçxa' ul weeswe's fxtũukhẽ a'kxçxa ki'p txã'wẽy,
kxah maawa jxukay txã'sna uyçxa ũuste jxpa'gasa', bagaçxte yuhwa pçuwa'jmée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutxna vxitumée.

Dxusa' naa kiwete nasatx iiméh wala peeygãhçxa yuuçxáak txajx Nçxi'k teeçxçxáasanawa naa kiwete kaah, kxah maawa txã'sna ũuste jxpa'gaçxa' bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phukahn vxitumée.
Dxusa' naa kiwete txajx Nçxi'ka's kaahçxawa, nasatx ewmeete nvxihtxa' kaahme', wejxwa nwe'weya'k kaah.
Maawa Dxus Nçxi'ka's ũuste jxpa'gasa', ewteyã'j neeyũutxna. Nawa txã'wẽ Dxus Nçxi'k teeçxçxáasana ũuste jxpa'gasame', ewmeeteyã'j neeyũuwa'jsata'.
Maawa ũuste jxpa'gasame', ewmeeteyã'jtx nvxiitni yu', txã'wẽ eena'sa naa kiwete kĩhtewa, ewmeeçxáa yũuna ũsçxa', çxhi'dxteçxáa wejx fxi'ze wẽepa'ga.
Sa' maawa jxukay ewmeeçxáa yũuna ũssa', eena'sa's ahçeçxa utxa'çmeeta' eena'te, txãawe'sx ewmée yũuni ãate vxyaakahmen.
Nawa ew yũuna fxi'zesa yu' eena'sa's utxa'tx, txãawe'sx ew yũuni' Dxus jxkaahnisatewa ãate vxyaakahn.
Txãa e'su' Jesusa' Judea kiwen u'kh txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yã'jçxa. Sa' kxte' maz en ũsu'k nasatx yu'te bautisãyna.
Juanwa bautisãynak ũsu' teeçx ahte Enon yaasesate Salim utxate, txãa ja'dasu yu' ũsu'k naa pa'ga. Aça' Juana' nasa wala kuh yu'te bautisãyku.
Karcelte kxupmeynaçxáak txã'wẽ bautisãy.
Txajũ' judiuwe'sxa' Juan yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi paapẽjxtxi txã'wẽ bautisãyni's.
Aça' txãawe'sxa' Juana's pta'sxtxi na'jĩna:
—Kaapiya'jsa, mwẽese'j. Sek kãani ju'gu Jordan yu'wala kutete ũste pta'sxgu txãa piçthẽ'jwa ãçxha' bautisãyna ũsa', aça' nasa jxukay txãa yakhçxaçxáa u'jweçta' jĩte',
Juana' na'wẽk pas:
—Kim yuhwa txã'wẽ tuuthe'jni yuumeena, Dxus jxkaahnimeesa yu'.
