I'kwe'sxa' yaçtey adx pta'sxni's jiiyã'ji'kwe: Adxa' Kristomeeth, naasáa txajx yaçte kaahnisaçxáath jĩni's.

Naa ejemplo's mjiyuwe: Ptamu ente' novxio' novxia yakhku u'pu'. Aça' novxio namiku' pukate u'pçxa' wala weçxweçxa yaaki'k novxio we'weni's wẽse'jçxa. Adxwa txã'wẽythu wala weçxweçxa yaaki', Jesusa's tuuthe'jni's wẽse'jçxa.
Txã' jweeíiçxáa tuhthesa yuuna u'jwena, naapkaçxha' adxa' jweeíiçxáa ãhmeekwesa yuuwa'th.
Cielujũ kĩisa' maatewa jxthaakwe tuhthesa'. Kiwete ũssa' naa kiwetewe'sxta', sa' naa kiwetewe'sxçxá'stxi pta'sxi'. Nawa cielujũ kĩisa' maatewa jxthaakwe tuhthesa'.
Txã'wẽçxaíik txajx wẽse'jçxa uyni's pta'sxi', nawa kim yuhwa nwẽese'je'çmeeta' txajx we'weni's.
Nawa txajx pta'sxni's maaçxáawa nwẽese'jwaça', Dxusa' isak pta'sxi' sũhna jiyuna pa'jatxna.
Txã'wẽ Dxus jxkaahnisa' Dxus kwe'we'jni'sku we'we', txã'sa' Dxusa' txajx Espiritu's makwewa ũsu'k txãa pa'ga.
Neya' Nçxi'ka's wedxçxa kĩhnawa jxuka txajx kusete nvxihtku.

Aça' maawa Dxus Nçxi'ka's ũuste jxpa'gasa' pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutxna. Nawa Dxus Nçxi'ka's nwẽese'jsame' pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phumeetxna, naasáa Dxus kastigo seena'saçxá's jxpa'gawa'jsata'.
Txã'wẽ Jesus tasxte nasa wejx wala utxaate', Jesusa' Juante jxthaakwe bautisãyni's fxariseowe'sxa' jiyutx.
Isa yu' Jesusa' bautisaĩ'çme', naasáa txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxçxáatx bautisaĩ'.
Nawa txã'wẽ fxariseowe'sx jiyuni's Jesus wẽse'jçxa', Judeajũ kasehna u'kh, Galilea kiwen.
Nawa Galilea kiwen u'jweççxa', Samaria kiwegak khẽwna u'jwa'j ji'phu'.
Sa' Samaria kiwesu' teeçx çxhab Sikar yaasesa ũsa' txãa çxhab peeku'thek pa'j txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yã'jçxa. Txãa Sikar çxhaba' Jakob kiwe ũsku txajx nçxi'k Jose's txãa utxatek neeyũ'.
Txãa kiwete' Jakoba' txãniitey yu' kutxi'jni kafx nvxihtna ũsu'ne', aça' Jesusa' ẽepxãh wahtxna u'jweççxa', kxteek jxkaaseya' kaçx.
Naapkaçxha' teeçx u'y Samariasuwe'sxa' yu' pa'kxya' pa'the', Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Yu' mpeeswe tudxwa'j.
Txãapkaçxha' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' çxhabna ũ' weyya' u'jnitx yu'.
Aça' txãa u'ya' na'jĩnak pas:
—Idxa' judiu nasag, sa' ¿ma'wẽtega ũ'kwe's yu' thãasu'? ũ'kwe' Samariasuwe'sxthu açyuja' jĩk. (Judiuwe'sxa' Samariasuwe'sxtxi ahçeçxa we'we'ççxáa yuhwa meeta'.)
Txajũ' Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Dxusa' kĩh ũsya'watewa jiyuçxa txã'wẽy yu' thãassa' kimtewa jiyuwaça', adxa's yu' thãasune'kwe, aça' adxa' yu' pçuwa'jmeesa's peesu'nja jĩte',
txãa u'ya' na'wẽk pas:
—Naa kafxa' wala dxiia', aça' idxa' yu' pa'kxwa'j ji'phmeeg. Sa' ¿ma'wẽga ũ'kwe's yu' pçuwa'jmeesa's peesu'nja jĩ'?

Kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx Jakobku naa kafxa's phaade yu' pa'kxwa'j, aça' txajx nçxi'kwe'sxwa kxteetx pa'ki' tajkxtxi yuswa'j vxite' txãawe'sx tudxwa'j yã'jçxa. Aça' idxa' ¿kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx Jakobte jxthaakwe wáa walasane'ga? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Jxukay maawa ayte yu'a's tudxsa' yũ'wẽena nes yuutxna.
Nawa adx peesni yu'a's tudxçxa', bagaçxte yuhwa yũ'wẽemeetxna. Txãa pa'gatey adx peesni yu'a' txãawe'sx ũuste yu'ĩçh na'wẽ nes yuuna, pçuwa'jmée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phukahn.
Txã'jĩte' txãa u'ya' na'jĩnak pas:
—Txã'wẽte', txãa yu'a's mpees, kxah yũ'wẽewame'nja, sa' peena yu' naa kafxte pa'kxya' pa'jme'nja.
Aça' Jesus we'weçxa':
—I'kwe nmi'a's me'jwe pa'yaya', sa' txãa yakh yuweene'kwe ayte' jĩte',
txãa u'ya':
—Nmi' ji'phmeeth jĩnak pas.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Nmi' ji'phmeeth jĩçxa' isa yuh we'we'i'kwe.
Txã'wẽ nyafxíi yu' tahç nmi'i'kwe ji'phu', nawa ãçxwe'sxa' nmi' me', aça' isa yuh we'wei'kwe.
Txã'wẽ wẽse'jçxa', txãa u'ya' na'jĩnak pas:
—Idxa' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsaíi ne'ga sũju'th.
Kwe'sx yaçgathẽ'jwe'sxa' naa vxiçtetx Dxusa's neewe'weya' pkhaakhe'. Nawa judiuwe'sx yu', Jerusalenteçxáa Dxusa's neewe'weya' pkhaakhewa'ja' jĩ'i'kwe jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Ew mjiyuwe: naa vxiçte meeçxawa Jerusalenteçxáa Dxusa's neewe'wewa'jme'. Dxusa's mteewa neewe'wewa'j en ãjana.
Samariatewe'sxa' Dxusa's ma'wẽ neewe'wewa'ja'swa jiimeei'kwe. Nawa judiuwe'sxa' jiiçxatha'w Dxusa's neewe'we', nwe'wesa' judiu nwe'sxa' naa pa'ga.
Dxusa's neewe'wewa'j en ãjana jĩ'th txãa ena' ãjxã'kh. Aça' maawa ĩsxiimée ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa Dxusa's ũusteçxáa neewe'wesa' ew yuutxna, kwe'sx Tata' txã'wẽ yũuni'sku jxthãasu' naa pa'ga.
Dxusa' kwe'sx na'wẽy kakwe ji'phme' na' mtee mteewa ũsa', aça' txã'sna neewe'wesa' ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa neewe'wewa'ja' jĩte',
txãa u'ya' na'wẽk pas:
—Ũ'kwe' jiith Kristo Dxus tasxu yuhna, aça' txãa pa'jçxa jxuka ew pta'sxina jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—I'kwe yakh puutx we'wena u'psa adxíi Dxus tasxu yuusath jĩk.

Naapkaçxha' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' sxawedna pa'jtx. Sa' Jesusa' txã'wẽ txãa u'y yakh puutx we'wena ũste uyçxa', kuh yajkxnatx neeyũu. Nawa ¿kĩjxa'ga txãa u'y yakh puutx we'we'? jĩna maa yuhwa paapẽyi'çmeeta'.
Txajũ' txãa u'ya' mitxha's kxtee txahna' u'kh çxhabsu nasatx pta'sxya':
—Naa kiwete ma'wẽ fxi'zeni'swa teeçx piçthẽ'j jiyuk txã'sa' myuhwe thegya'. Txã' Kristo íina jĩna pta'sxte',
çxhabtewe'sxa' thegya' u'jtx Jesus ũsnite pa'j.
Naapkaçxha' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' Jesusa's na'jĩnatx we'we:
—Idxa', ¿wẽemeegá'? Pan mẽ' jĩna.
Nawa Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—I'kwe'sxa' jiimeei'kwe adx kĩh ũ'wa'j ji'phtewa.
Txã'jĩte', puutx paapẽyi'tx txãawe'sx pwe'sx:
—Meeçxa' ¿maa nasa puuçya' kũhwá'ntakx? jĩna.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Adx Tata jxthãasçxa mjĩiya' kaahni's kxtey yuuniçxáa, adx ũ'ni na'wẽsa'.
Ũ' thẽ'jwa'j pahz a'tey peejxa' jĩ'i'kwe i'kwe'sxa'. Nawa txã'wẽme'. Mjĩinisu mthegwe wakx, jxuka thẽ'jniyã'j ũsa', aça' pkhakhwa'jçxáa yã'j peejxa'.
Pkhakhna mjĩisa' deweni's jxpa'gawa'j ji'pha', aça' txãa pkhakhnisa' pçuwa'jmée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'jsata', kxah uuhsa' pkhakhsa yakh ja'daçxah weçxweçxa yajkxna neeyũutxna e'zíi.
Teeçxsa' uja'k, naapkaçxha' vxite' pkhakhe'k jĩni' isa yuja'.
I'kwe'sxa' uuhsameei'kwe, nawa adxa' pkhakhya' kaath vxite nasa uuhnisu jĩk.
Txã'wẽ txãa u'y ũ'kwe ma'wẽ fxi'zeni'swa jxuka jiyuk jĩna pta'sxpa'ga, txãa çxhabte nasa kuhsa' Jesusa's ũuste jxpa'gatx.
Sa' Jesus ũsnite thegya' pa'jçxa', Jesusa's wala neevxisxatx txãawe'sx yakh kxtee pta'sxna neeyũukahn. Aça' e'z enku kxtee fxi'ze, Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna.
Aça' txã's wẽse'jçxa', Jesusa's ũuste jxpa'gasa' jweeíiçxáatx pehna.
Sa' txãa u'ya's na'wẽtx we'we:
—I'kwe pta'sxniçxá's jiyumée, kwe'sx yuutha'w txajx we'weni's wẽse'jçxa jiyu Dxus tasxu yuusa Kristotewa, maatxwa jxuka nwe'wesa.
Txajũ' e'z en skhẽwniijũ', Jesusa' Samariajũ kasehna u'kh Galilea kiweníi.
Jesusíi we'weçxawa: Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa' maa yuhwa peekx kiwetey yu' wedxni fxi'ze'çmeeta' jĩk txãasak Galilean u'j.
Aça' Galileate pa'the', kxteewe'sx yu' wala weçxana jxpa'gatx, Jerusalen fxiestan u'jsa' uyne'ta Jesusa' ma'wẽ yũutewa txãasatx txã'wẽ yũu.
Jesusa' Galilea kiwete pa'kh Kaná çxhabte, yu'a's vxino vxitku nyafxíi kxtee. Aça' kxtey teeçx piçthẽ'j ũsu'k ne'jwe'sxa's jxkaah pu'çxsa. Txã' teeçx nçxi'k wala ãça'sa ji'phu'k Kapernaum çxhabte.
Sa' Galileatey Jesus sxawedna pa'jni's jiyuçxa', txãa piçthẽ'ja' puutx uyna kũhçxa', na'jĩnak pxthaa we'we:
—Adx yatna mejka, adx nçxi'ka's nuykatxhiya'. Txã'wẽme', uuçyã'ja' jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—I'kwe'sxa' adx ãjani's kaavxya'ja'jmeete yu', adxa's jiyumeene'kwe kimtewa.
Txã'jĩte', txãa piçthẽ'j yu' na'jĩk:
—Dud myuh, adx nçxi'k uumeyna.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Yatna sxawedna me'j. Iidx nçxi'ka' katxhiyã'jçxa ũsa'.
Txã'jĩte', txãa piçthẽ'ja' Jesusa' isa yuh we'wene' sũhna yatna sxawedna u'kh.
Sa' yatte pa'jaçte', txã'sna selpisaawe'sx pu'thegya' kasehçxa' na'wẽtx pta'sx:
—Iidx nçxi'ka' katxhiyã'kh jĩna pta'sxte',
txãa piçthẽ'ja' pẽjxku:
—Adx nçxi'k ãçã'sa' ¿ma'wẽga wẽtkuẽ' yajkx? jĩte':
—Jũ'na la unatek kakwesek ũçxha jĩnatx pta'sx.
Aça' neya' yajkxku txãa oratey Jesusa': Iidx nçxi'ka' katxhiyã'jçxa ũsa' jĩni's. Txajũ' txãa piçthẽ'ja' Jesus kimtewa jiyuçxa' txajx ũuste jxpa'gak, yattewe'sxwa txã'wẽy.
Txã'wẽ Judeajũ sxawedna Galileate pa'jçxa ãça'sa's nuykatxhini yakha' e'z usyã'ja' Jesus ãjani's kaavxya'ja'jni'.
Txãa e'su' judiuwe'sx fxiesta en ãjaçku yu', aça' Jesusa' Jerusalenna ki' u'kh.
Txãa çxhabte' ĩikha'jni yu' ji'phu'tx piisxáa ka'ga'jni vxitx utxate. Txã' Betesda yaase' hebreo yuwete. Ãça'sa pa'jçxa ũswa'j tahç ahtek txudeni yu', yat pwa' na'wẽsa.
Kxte' wala kuh ãça'sa ũsu'tx, uyya' ãjasamée, çxida puuplesa, vxite' ẽseya' ãjasamée txã'wẽsatx ũythasna ũsu', yu' ẽseçpkaçxha' kxtee khẽeya' sũhna.
Txã'wẽ maa enteya' Dxus angel kĩhçxa yu'a's kẽese'je'k, naapkaçxha' maa yaçte khẽjena txã' jxuka katxhiçxak neeyũ' kĩh wee ji'phçxawa.
Kxteea' teeçx piçthẽ'j treinta y oçxo anxu ãça'na ũssak txkaa ũsu'.
Aça' txã'sna Jesus uyçxa' txakwe txaçx ãça'na ũste jiyuçxa', pẽjxku:
—¿Katxhi wẽega'? jĩte',
ãça'sa pasçxa':
—Yu' ẽseçpkaçxha' yu'te adxa's akhwa'jsa kim yuhwa meeta'. Adx khẽe wẽjeçpkaçxha' vxite khuẽ'y khẽje'tx jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩnak jxkaah:
—Kiiteçxa iidx pusçxa deeni's tũ'sçxa me'j jĩçpkaçxha',
naa dudtey txãa piçthẽ'ja' katxhiyã'jçxak neeyũu. Sa' txajx pusçxa deeni's tũ'sçxa u'kh.
Nawa judiuwe'sx ki'sni ente txã'wẽ dee pusni's tũ'sçxa u'jweçte uyçxa',
judiuwe'sxa' na'wẽtx pẽjx txãa piçthẽ'j katxhisa's:
—Ãçxha' ki'swa'j ena' aça' txã'wẽ tũ'sçxa u'juwa'j ji'phmeeg jĩte',
txãa piçthẽ'ja' pasçxa na'jĩk:
—Adxna nuykatxhisaíik txã'wẽ jxkaah: Iidx pusçxa deeni's tũ'sçxa me'j jĩpa'ga txã'wẽ tũ'sçxa u'jweçthu.
Aça' judiuwe'sxa' ki'kin paapẽjxtxi:
—Txã'wẽ jxkaahsa' ¿kimga yu'? jĩte',
txãa piçthẽ'j katxhisa' jiyuya' ãjame' kim txã'wẽ nuykatxhitewa. Kxteea' nasa wala kuh ũste', txãa katxhisa' jiimeek yu' maa dxi'j kasehçxa Jesusa' u'thewa.
Txãa e'su' Jesusa' dxuus yatte txãa piçthẽ'j katxhisa's puutx uyçxa', na'jĩk:
—Ãçxha' katxhgu neeyũu na', naa weete jxthaakwe nxussa pa'khamen pa'yajkx mfxi'ze, ewmée yũuna u'jumée jĩte',
txãa piçthẽ'j u'jçxa' judiuwe'sxtxi pta'sxku:
—Adxna nuykatxhisa' Jesusga yu' jĩna.
Txãa pa'gatx judiuwe'sxa' Jesusa's ahçeçxa ikh wẽe, ki'sni ente txã'wẽ ãça'sa's nuykatxhipa'ga.
Txajũ' Jesusa' judiuwe'sxtxi na'wẽk we'we:
—Adx Tata' naa entewa mjĩina ũsa', txãa pa'gath adxwa mjĩ'.

Txã'jĩte', judiuwe'sxa' jweeíiçxáatx Jesusa's ikh wẽena kiite. Txã'wẽ ki'swa'ja' jĩna jxkaahni leyçxá's nwẽese'jmée adx Tata' Dxusa' jĩ'k na' txãawa Dxus na'wẽysath jĩ'ne' sũhçxatx txã'wẽ ikh wẽena kiite.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Isath we'we', adxa' Dxus Nçxi'kthu, nawa adxçxáa yu' mjĩiya' ãjame'nja. Adx Tata ma'wẽ mjĩite', txajx mjĩini's thegçxa yuuçxáath txã'wẽy mjĩiya' ãja'.

Txãa pa'gatey Tata' adxa's peeygãhçxa txãa kĩh mjĩiççxawa jxuka pta'sxi'k adxa's. Txãasa ãçxh uyi'kwe txãate jweeíiçxáa walasatx kaavxya'ja'jana, aça' txãatx uyçxa' i'kwe'sxa' kuh yajkxna neeyũune'kwe.
Tata' ma'wẽga uusaatx ĩtxi vxitu', txã'wẽy adxwa ĩtxi vxitu'nja maatxwa.
Ãçxha' Tata' yuuwesatx kastigãywa'ja's jxuka adxçxaçxáanak nvxiht, txãasa ãçxha' yuuwesatx kastigãywa'ja's Tata' kim yuhtxwa thegwa'jsame'.
Tata'swa ma'wẽta nwẽese'je', txã'wẽy adxnawa jxukaysa nwẽese'khanku txã'wẽ yũu. Adxna nwẽese'jsame' adxna kaahsa Tata'swa nwẽese'jsameeçxa txã'wẽ yuutxna.

Isath we'we': Maawa adx pta'sxni's jxpa'yajkx wẽse'jçxa adxna kaahsa's ũuste jxpa'gasa', bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutxna. Txã'wẽ yũusa' ewmeete nvxiitni yuumée, uuwa'ju kutxi'jçxa bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'the nvxiitnisa yuuna.
Isath we'we': Pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'j en pa'jana jĩ'th txãa ena' ãçxhíia'. Aça' uusaawe'sxa' Dxus Nçxi'k we'weni's wẽse'jçxa kxtey yuusá' ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutxna.
Txãa pa'gatey adx Tata' ĩtxĩ vxit-ya' ãjãwa'ja's ji'pha', sa' adxnawa ũsku txã'wẽ ĩtxi vxit-ya' ãjãwa'ja's.
Sa' yuuwesatx kastigãywa'ja'swa adxa'síiçxáak ũs, adxa' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusath naa pa'ga.
Txã'wẽ Dxus Nçxi'k we'weni pthũusete', uusaawe'sxa' pedaniijũ kasehwa'j en pa'jana jĩna pta'sxte', fxiy yuh we'we'k sũhna yaakxnuwe.
Txãa en ãhte', uusaawe'sxa' pedaniijũ ĩtxi yuuçxa kasejetxna, ew yũuna fxi'zesa' ewte u'jya', naapkaçxha' ewmée yũuna fxi'zesa' ewmeete u'jya' ĩtxi yuutxna.

Adxçxáa yu' kĩjxa'wa ãjame'nja. Adx Tata jxkaatheçxáath yuuwesatx kastigaĩ'. Adx ũuste peekxçxáa yajkxçxa txã'wẽ yu'çmeeth, txãasa adx kastigãyni' isasata'. Adxna kaahsa ma'wẽ jxthãaste' txãaçxá'sthu kxtey yu'.
Adx ma'wẽsatewa kimwa pta'sxwa'jsa ji'phmée peekxçxáa txã'wẽsath jĩte', isa yuhna sũhwa'ja's ya'ji'phu'çme'.
Nawa txã'wẽ ãjawa'jsa yuja' jĩna adx ju'gu we'wesa ũsa', aça' adxa' jiith txajx we'weni' isasa yuja'.
I'kwe'sxa' Juan tasxte paapẽjxya' kaaji'kwe, aça' txã' isa yuh pta'sxku adx kimtewa.
Adxa' naa kiwetewe'sx adx ju'gu we'weni's peejxmeeth. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' Juan pta'sxni's jiiyã'jçxa', thẽymée ewte neeyũuwa'ja's pakwekahnçxáath txã'jĩ.
Juana' eena'te kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa's tuuthe'jsak yu', aça' i'kwe'sxa' wa'lmée i'kwe Juan pta'sxni's jxpa'gana ũsu' maz ençxáawa.

Nawa adxna tuuthe'jna isa pta'sxsa yu' mazwa ji'pthu, Juan pta'sxnite jxthaakwesa. Adx mjĩini' adxna tuuthe'jna isa pta'sxsata'. Na'wẽ mjĩith nawa adx Tata jxkaahniçxáatxthu txã'wẽ yu', Dxus kaahnisa yuh yu'ne' sũjkahn.
Txã'wẽy adxna kaahsawa isak pta'sxi' adxa's tuuthe'jna. Txã'wẽtewa, i'kwe'sxa' bagaçxte yuhwa txajx we'weni's iiwẽse'jmeene'kwe, sa' txã'sa' iiuywameene'kwe.
Sa' txajx kaapiya'jni'swa i'kwe'sx ũuste ji'phmeene'kwe, txãasa i'kwe jxpa'gaya' ãjã'çmée, adxa's Tata kaathewa.
I'kwe'sxa' jxpa'yajkx i'kwe leeĩ', pçumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phuya'. Aça' txãa libru' adxa's pta'sxsaíiçxá'.
Makwe txã'wẽçxawa, i'kwe'sxa' adx tasxte utxa'çmeei'kwe ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phuya'.
Naa kiwete nasa adxa's tuuthe'jni's jxthãasu'çmeeth.
Adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi ew jiith, i'kwe'sxa' Dxusa's wedxi'çmée i'kwe.
Tata kaathe' yuwe'th, nawa i'kwe'sxa' adxa's jxpa'ga'çmée i'kwe. Nawa Dxus kaahnisamée vxite pa'jwaça', txãa yu'sa' jxpa'gane'kwe.
¿Ma'wẽ yũuçxa adxa's jxpa'gaya' ãjaki'kwe, nasaa pwe'sx puutx ew tuuthe'jniçxáana jxthãasçxa, Dxus teeçxçxáasa tuuthe'jni yu'sa' jxpa'gameeçxa'?
Adx Tata tasxte i'kwe'sxtxi ewmée yuwe ũswa'jsana sũjuwá'kwe adxa' txã'wẽmeeth. Txã'wẽ i'kwe'sx ma'wẽsatewa adx Tata tasxte pta'sxsa' Moisesíiçxá', i'kwe'sx nakwe wala ewçxáa we'we'i'kwe txãa.
Moises we'weni's jiyuwaça', adxa's jxpa'gane'kwe, Moisesa' adxnaíiçxáak tuuthe'jna fxi'j naa pa'ga.
Nawa txajx fxi'jni's jxpa'gameeçxa', ¿ma'wẽ adx we'weni's jxpa'gaya' ãjaki'kwe?
Txãa ensu' Jesusa' Galilea ĩkh kuten u'kh, txãa ĩkha's Tiberias jĩ'tx.
Txã'wẽ naa kiwete kim yuhwa vxit-ya' ãjanimeesa's kaavxya'ja'jna ãça'satxwa nuyçxhãçxhapa'ga, nasa wala kuh pkhaakhena Jesus e'stey u'jtx.
Aça' Jesusa' thã'j vxiçna u'jçxa kxtee kaçxku txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yã'jçxa.
Txajũ' Judiuwe'sx fxiesta Paskua en ãjaçku yu' txãa ensu'.
Aça' nasa wala pkhaakhena yuhte uyçxa', Jesusa' Fxelipe's na'jĩnak pẽjx:
—¿Mtee ũ' weyuukxtha'w nasa jxukaysatx puuçwa'j?
Nawa Jesusa' Fxelipe ma'jĩtewa jiyuya'çxáak txã'wẽ pẽjx, ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa jxuka jiiyã'jçxawa.
Aça' Fxelipe' na'wẽk pas:
—Dos cientos peso pan weyçxa jxukaysatx pe'ltedeçxa peesu'swaçwa, ãhmeena jĩte',
Jesus yakh u'jusa Simon Pedro nyakh Adresa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Ayte teeçx kuẽ e'z wedx tahç cebada pan ji'phsa ũsa'. Nawa kxazçxáasa yuja' ¿ãhma'k? jĩte',
Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi': Mkaaçxi'jwe jxukaysatx jĩnak jxkaah. Aça' cinko mil piçthẽ'jsa kxaazkuẽesay txaksu kaçxna skhẽwtxi.
Aça' Jesusa' pantxi' jxpa'gaçxa', Dxusna weçxana'wa txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi ũsu'sku. Aça' txãawe'sxa' kxaazkuẽesaytxi puuçna skhẽwtxi subapkaçx. Wedxnawa txã'wẽytxi yũu, makwe ũ'çxawa txikpkaçx.
Txajũ' jxukaysa txikna skhẽwte', Jesusa' jxkaakh txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi':
—Jxuka mepkhakhwe pe'la kijxasaatxi' kĩhwa vxitukahmen jĩte',
doce kanastate utatx pkhakh txãa tahç cebada pan kijxasaatxi'.
Txã'wẽ Jesus yuuçxáa maa yuhwa ãjanimeesa's vxitte uyçxa', nasa' na'wẽtx weçxana we'we:
—Naa yuuçxá' isa Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa yuh yu'ga, naa kiwete pa'jana jĩ'tx txãaga yu' jĩna weçxaçxa', ãadxijimée jxkaahwa'jsa ki'pxa'watx yu'. Aça' Jesus jiyuçxa',
txãaçxáa txuteena u'kh thã'j vxiçte pa'j.
Çxhi'dxna kĩinite', Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' ĩkh pukate kĩhçxa,
barkote khẽena'wa ĩkhuy ktejkana u'jtx Kapernaumte pa'jya'. Txã'wẽ jxuka çxhi'dxni yã'thewa Jesusa' sxawedna kĩhmeyna,
barko ĩkhuy u'jweçpkaçxha', wejxaa wala kiiteçxa ĩkha's seena' wala kẽese'kh.
Txã'wẽ seena' yuuçtewa ĩkh pxãhsu jxu'j u'jweççxa', Jesusa's ĩkh kajkwesu yuhte uytxi, sa' wala ũukhtxi.
Aça' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Ũukhnuwe, adxthu jĩte',
wala weçxana jxpa'gatx barkote. Sa' yaakxnimeete naa dudtey ĩkh kutete pa'jtx.

Kuskuskhẽ' Jesusa' kxtee meeyã'the', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxwa meete', nasa' barkote khẽena' u'jtx Kapernaum çxhabna Jesusa's pakweya'. Txã'wẽ Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sx teeçx barkote khẽeçxa u'the', Jesus yu' txãawe'sx yakh u'jmeetewa jiyuçxane'ta pakweya' u'jna ũsu' ĩkh kuteju nasa neeyũusa'. Jesusa' Dxusna weçxaçxa pan puuçku txãa ja'date barko pa'jne'ta Tiberias çxhabuh yuusa, aça' txãatetx khẽeçxa pakweya' u'j.

Kuskuskhẽ' Jesusa' kxtee meeyã'the', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxwa meete', nasa' barkote khẽena' u'jtx Kapernaum çxhabna Jesusa's pakweya'. Txã'wẽ Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sx teeçx barkote khẽeçxa u'the', Jesus yu' txãawe'sx yakh u'jmeetewa jiyuçxane'ta pakweya' u'jna ũsu' ĩkh kuteju nasa neeyũusa'. Jesusa' Dxusna weçxaçxa pan puuçku txãa ja'date barko pa'jne'ta Tiberias çxhabuh yuusa, aça' txãatetx khẽeçxa pakweya' u'j.

Kuskuskhẽ' Jesusa' kxtee meeyã'the', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxwa meete', nasa' barkote khẽena' u'jtx Kapernaum çxhabna Jesusa's pakweya'. Txã'wẽ Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sx teeçx barkote khẽeçxa u'the', Jesus yu' txãawe'sx yakh u'jmeetewa jiyuçxane'ta pakweya' u'jna ũsu' ĩkh kuteju nasa neeyũusa'. Jesusa' Dxusna weçxaçxa pan puuçku txãa ja'date barko pa'jne'ta Tiberias çxhabuh yuusa, aça' txãatetx khẽeçxa pakweya' u'j.
Sa' ĩkh kutete pa'jçxa Jesusa's uyçxa pẽjxtxi:
—Idxa' ¿ma'wẽnga ayte pa'j? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—Isath we'we', i'kwe'sxa' pana's txikpkaçx ũ'çxaçxáa i'kwe txã'wẽ adxa's pakwé'. Nawa adx txã'wẽ maa yuhwa ãjanimeesa's vxitthu txã's yu' jiyuçxa txã'wẽ yu'çmeei'kwe.

Txik ũ'çxa fxi'zewa'jçxá's pakwewa'jme', wejxwa ũ' bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa's pakweewa'ja'. Aça' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' txã'wẽ pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ũsu'nja, txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's adx Tata' ũsku naa pa'ga jĩk.
Txã'jĩte', na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—¿Ma'wẽ yũukxtha'w Dxus jxkaahnitxi' kxtey yuuna fxi'zeya'? jĩte',
Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Dxus jxkaahnitxi' kxtey yuu wẽeçxa', adxa's mpa'gawe, adxa' Dxus kaahnisath naa pa'ga jĩk.
Aça' ki'kin pẽjxtxi:
—Idxa' Dxus kaahnisane'ga sũhna kwe'sx ew jiyukahn ãçxha' ¿kĩh kaavxya'ja'jya'waga?
Kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx manteywe'sxa' nasa u'pnimée kiwesu u'juçxa', ũ' maná yaasesa's ũ'tx. Aça' txã'wẽ yũuni's Dxus librute na'wẽk we'we': Dxusa' cielujũ ũ'a's puuçku jĩ'k.
Aça' txã'jĩte', Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—Isath we'we', cielujũ ũ'a's Moises puuçme'. Cielujũ ũ'a's adx Tatak puuç.
Aça' Dxus puuçni ũ' cielujũ kĩisa' naa kiwetewe'sxtxi pçumée ĩtxi kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa'.
Txã'jĩte', na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa, cielujũ kĩisa ũ'a's pejka puuçune'ga kwe'sxtxiwa jĩte',
Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Ũ' ĩtxi kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa' adxthu. Aça' maazkuẽesawa adx tasxte pa'jsa' bagaçxte yuhwa wẽemeetxna. Sa' txã'wẽy adxna ũuste jxpa'gasa' peena yu' yũ'wẽemeetxna.
Adxa' kimçxawa i'kwe'sxtxi pta'sxyã'th, nawa i'kwe'sxa' makwe uyçxawa, adxa's cielujũ kĩisana sũju'çmée i'kwe.
Makwe i'kwe'sx yu' adxa's jxpa'gameetewa, adx jxpe'khan Adx Tata dukhnisawe'sx yu' jxukaysa adx tasxteçxaçxáa pa'jatxna. Aça' maawa adx tasxte pa'jsatxi' ahçemée weçxana jxpa'ga'nja.
Txã'wẽ cielujũ kĩhçxawa peekx adx ũus yaakxniçxá's kxtey yuuya' yuwe'çmeeth. Adx Tata ma'wẽ yũukaathe' txã'sçxáanath kxtey yuuya' yuwé'.
Adx Tata' adx jxpe'khan dukhnisatxi' teeçxçxáa yuhwa ivxiitu jxthãasu'çme', kxajíi adxa' nmeh ente' ki' ĩtxi vxitu'nja.
Adxna kaahsa jxthãasni' na'wẽ': maawa jxukay Dxus Nçxi'ka's ũuste jxpa'gasa' pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phu jxthãasu'k. Txãa pa'ga txã'wẽ ũuste jxpa'gasatxi' adxa' nmeh ente' ki' ĩtxi vxitu'nja.
Txã'wẽ adxíi ũ' cielujũ kĩisath jĩpa'ga judiuwe'sxa' Jesusa's açewe'weya' takhtxi:
—¿Naa pihçíi Jose nçxi'kmeená'? Sa' ¿ma'wẽga cielujũ kĩisath jĩna we'we'? Txã'jĩkahmeníi kwe'sxa' txajx neywe'sxtxi ew jiitha'w.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txã'jĩni's jiyuçxa', na'wẽk we'we:
—Maa yuhwa txã'wẽ açewe'wen ũswa'j ji'phmeei'kwe.
Adxa' Tata jxkaahnisath aça' txãaíi adx tasxte kuutxa'the yuuçxáa txãatxi' jxukaysatx nmeh ente' ĩtxi vxitu'nja.

Txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa librute na'wẽ fxi'jni ũsa': Dxusa' kaapiya'jana jxukaysatx ¿jĩ'çmeená'? Kxajíi maawa adx Tata kaapiya'jni's wẽse'jçxa txajx jxkaahnitx kxtey yuusa yuuçxáa adx tasxte pa'jatxna.
Maa yuhwa Dxusa's iiuymeeta'. Adx yuuçxáa Dxus tasxu yuusath na' txã'sna iiuythu.
Adxa' isath we'we': Adxa's jxpa'gasa' pçumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutxna,
txãasa pçumée ĩtxĩ kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa ũ'a', adxthu.
Kwe'sx yaçga manteywe'sx nasa u'pnimée kiwesu u'juçxa' maná yaasesa's ũ'çxawa, pejka uu ena's ji'phutx.
Nawa adxa' cielujũ kĩisa ũ'a'sthu pta'sxi', txã'sna ũ'çxa' uukahmen.

Adxíi cielujũ kĩisa ũ' ĩtxisath. Maawa txãa ũ'a's ũ'sa', bagaçxte yuhwa uumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutxna. Aça' ũ' adx ũsu'nja txã' adx kakwe', kxah maa nasawa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phukahn txã'wẽ adx kakwe's ũsu'nja.
Txã'jĩte', judiuwe'sxa' na'wẽtx puutx ya'paapẽyi':
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿ma'wẽ txajx kakwe's kwe'sxtxi puuçya' ãjakx? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Adxa' isath we'we': Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusáa kakwe's ũ'çxa txajx eenawa tudxmeeçxa yu', pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phumeene'kwe.
Aça' maawa adx kakwe's ũ'çxa adx eenawa tudxçxa yuuçxáa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutxna, kxah txã'wẽ yũusatxi' adxa' nmeh ente' ĩtxi vxitu'nja.
Txãa pa'gatey adx kakwe' peena yu' kwẽeje'jmeena, aça' adx eewa peena yu' kxũ'wẽ'jmeena.
Maawa adx kakwe's ũ'na txã'wẽy adx eenawa tudxsa', bagaçxtewa adx yakh ih ũsuna, aça' adxwa txãa yakh ih ũsu'nja.
Tata' adxna kaakh txã' ĩtxĩsa'. Txãa pa'ga adxwa ĩtxĩsath. Aça' adxwa Tata yakh ma'wẽ ĩtxĩsatka'w, txã'wẽy ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutxna maawa adx kakwe's ũ'sa'.

Cielujũ kĩisa ũ'a'sthu pta'sxna we'we'. Kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx manteywe'sxa' maná yaasesa's ũ'çxawa pejka uu ena's ji'phutx. Nawa naa ũ'a' txãa maná na'wẽsame'. Maawa naa ũ'a's ũ'çxa', bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutxna jĩnak pta'sx.
Jesusa' txã'wẽk pta'sx Kapernaumte judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenite.
Aça' txã'wẽ kaapiya'jni's wẽse'jçxa', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx maaíi yu' na'wẽtx we'we txãawe'sx pwe'sxçxáa:
—Na'wẽ pta'sxni', wala thẽya' jiyuwa'j, aça' ma'wẽ yuhwa ya'jiyu'çme'.
Nasa jiyumeeçxa kuh jwed we'wena ũste Jesusa' jiyuçxa', na'jĩk:
—Adx pta'sxni's jiyumeeçxa ũusçxa yaaki'wá'kwe.
Txã'wẽ jiyumée ũsçxawa, Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' cielun teekaçte uyçxa', ¿maa sũjuki'kwe?
Na'jĩ'th na': Dxus Espiritu' ĩtxi kaafxi'ze'jsa', aça' txãaçxá'sthu we'wena pta'sxi', naa kiwete ũ'çxa ĩtxĩ fxi'zeni's pta'sxi'çmeeth. Adxa' isath pta'sxi' Dxus yakh ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's.
Nawa maaíi yu' isane' pta'sxi' sũju'çmeei'kwe jĩk.
Jesusa' dxiikhẽy jiiyã'kh yu' maa txã'wẽ açeçtewa, sa' kim ikhkahn dukhwa'jsatewa, txãa pa'gak dxiikhẽy txã'jĩna we'we.
Sa' ki' we'weçxa':
—I'kwe'sx maaíi yu' açeçte jiiçxath adx Tata kuutxa'the yuuçxáa txãawe'sxa' adx tasxte pa'jatxna jĩna we'we.
Jesus txã'wẽ pta'sxteçxáa, txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx maaíi yu' txuteena u'jtx.
Txajũ' Jesusa' pẽjxku docesatx:
—¿I'kwe'sxwa adxa's txuteeçxa u'jya'wakwe'? jĩte',
Simon Pedro' na'wẽk pas:
—Kwe'sxa' ¿kim yakh u'jwekxtha'w? Idx yuuçxáa pçumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's pta'sxna ũsgu aça'.
Txãa pa'gatey kwe'sxa' idxa's jiyutha'w, txãasatha'w idxa' Kristo, Dxus ĩtxisa Nçxi'kne'ga sũju'.
Txã'jĩte', Jesus we'weçxa':
—Adxa' i'kwe'sx docesatx txhitxhçxa pa'yatewa, teeçxsa' eçxthẽ'j jĩia' jĩnak pta'sx.
Jesusa' Simon nçxi'k Judas Iskariote's we'weçxak txã'jĩ, Judas txã'wẽ docesatewe'sxçxawa Jesusa's ikhkahn dukhya'wak yu' naa pa'ga.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Galilea kiwesuk u'ju'. Judea kiwesu yu' u'ju wẽeme', kxteea' judiuwe'sx ikhya' pakwenatx ũsu' naa pa'ga.
Judiuwe'sx fxiesta wa' vxitni en ãjaçku yu',
aça' Jesus nyakhwe'sxa' na'wẽtx we'we:
—Ayte ũsmée Judea kiwen me'j, kxah nasa iidx ju'guh ũssawe'sx uyuutxna idx na'wẽ yũ'g txã'sa's.
Maawa ãate tuuthe'j jxthãasuççxa', paaçsu u'jumeena. Na'wẽ kimwa ãjanimeesa's kaavxya'ja'g na' txãatxi' ãate mkaavxya'j maawa uykahn jĩnatx we'we'.
Nyakhwe'sxíi yuhwa Dxus Nçxi'kna sũju'çmeene'ta, txãasatx ũuste jxpa'gameeçxa' txã'wẽ we'we.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Adx u'jwa'j ena' ãhmeya', nawa i'kwe'sx yu' kĩh entewa u'jya' ewuçxáane'kwe.
Naa kiwetewe'sxa' i'kwe'sxtxi' açe'çmeeta', nawa adxa's açe'tx, txã'wẽ txãawe'sx ewmée yũuni's ãateth pta'sxi' txãa pa'ga.
I'kwe'sxa' fxiestan me'jçxáawe. Adxa' yuhme'nja, adx u'jwa'j en ãhmeya' aça'.
Txã' we'weçxa', Jesusa' Galileatee neeyũuk.
Nawa txajx nyakhwe'sx u'jni e'su', Jesuswa fxiestan u'kh, kimwa jiyunimeete.
Aça' judiuwe'sxa' na'jĩnatx txãa fxiestate Jesusa's pakwena ũsu':
—¿Mtee ũski txãa piçthẽ'ja'? jĩna.
Txãa fxiestate' Jesusa's nuywe'wesa yuuçxáatx susna ũsu'. Vxiteíi yu': Jesusa' ewsa yuja' jĩçpkaçxha', vxite yu': Ewmeesa', nasatx ĩsxiina u'jusaçxá' jĩnatx nuywe'we'.
Nawa Jesusa's ew we'wesa yu' maa yuhwa ãate yu' we'weçmeeta', judiuwe'sxtxi ũukhçxa.
Fxiesta pçuuna u'jweçpkaçxha', Jesusa' dxuus yatte u'kaçxa kaapiya'jya' takhku.
Aça' judiuwe'sxa' kuh yajkxnatx ũsu' txãawe'sx pwe'sxçxáa na'jĩna:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿ma'wẽçxa txakwe wala jiina, maa kaapiya'jsa yakh yuhwa u'jusameeçxawa?
Aça' txã' we'weni's jiyuçxa', Jesusa' na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Na'wẽth kaapiya'ja' txã' adx peekx yajkxçxa kaapiya'jnisame'. Adxna jxkaakh txajx we'weni'sthu kaapiya'ja'.
Maawa Dxus jxthãasni's kxtey yuuwa'jsa ũsçxa', naa kaapiya'jni's jiyuna Dxus we'wenitewa, meeçxa' adx peekxçxáa yajkxçxa kaapiya'jnitewa.
Peekíiçxáa yajkxçxa we'wesa', jxtuhthesa yuuwa'jçxá'sku jxthãasu'. Nawa Dxusçxáana tuuthe'jsa', Dxus jxkaahniçxá'sku isa we'wena pta'sxi'.
Moisesa' leya's fxi'jçxa ¿i'kwe'sxtxi ũsyuhmeena' wakx? Txã'wẽtewa i'kwe'sxa' maa yuhwa ley jxkaahni's kxtey yu'çmeei'kwe. Txãasa i'kwe adxa's ikhya'çxáa yaaki' jĩte',
nasa' na'wẽtx pas:
—Eçxthẽ'j yakh ũsne'ga. ¿Kimga idxa's ikh wẽje'?
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—Ki'swa'j ente teeçx nasa ãça'sa's nuykatxhith txãa pa'gaçxáa i'kwe txakwe susya' kiite.

Nawa i'kwe'sx yu' ki'swa'j entewa luuçx pihçtxi cirkuncidaĩ'i'kwe, Moises jxkaahni's nwẽese'jçxa. Naa kxah i'kwe ãça'sa's adx nuykatxhini yu'sa' txakwe susu'. (Nawa ew jiyute yu', Moises txã'wẽ cirkuncidãywa'ja's jxkaahna takhme', jwee yaçgawe'sxtxi txã'wẽ jxkaah.)
I'kwe'sxa' Moises leya's kxtey yuuya' sũhçxa i'kwe ki'swa'j entewa cirkuncidaĩ' luuçx pihçtxi'. Sa' ¿kĩjxa'kwe txakwe ũusçxa' adx teeçx piçthẽ'j ãça'sa's ki'swa'j ente nuykatxhiçxa nvxiitpa'gaçxáa?
I'kwe'sxa' ew jiyumey yu' fxiyfxiyçxáa yajkxna we'wenuwe, naasáa ew jiyuçxa yuuçxáa txã'wẽ dxih yu'ga sũhna we'wewa'ja' jĩnak pta'sx.
Txajũ' Jerusalente nasa maaíi yu' na'wẽtx puutx paapẽyi':
—¿Naa piçthẽ'ja'síi ikhya' pakwe'çmeetxna'?
Txã'wẽ pakweeçtewa, nasaa ksxavxyte yajkxyajkxmée we'wena ũsa', kim yuhwa ma'jĩnimeete. Meeçxa' ¿kwe'sx npiiçthẽ'jwe'sxa' ew yuh jiyuwá'ntakx naa piçthẽ'ja' Dxus tasxu yuusa Kristotewa?
Naa piçthẽ'ja' majuwe'sxtewa jiitha'w, aça' isa Dxus kaahni Kristo dxihwaça', txã'sa' txãa kiwejuwe'sxa' jĩni yuumeena jĩnatx we'we'.
Aça' Jesusa' dxuus yatte kaapiya'jna ũsíi, sus we'weçxa na'jĩk:
—Adxa'sa' jiiyuji'kwe majũwe'sxtewa. Nawa adxa' peekx yuu wẽeçxaçxáa yuwe'çmeeth, Dxus kaahni ayte ũsthu. Txãa yuuçxáa isa we'wesa' txãa kaahsa's yu' i'kwe'sxa' jiyu'çmeei'kwe.
Txã'sa' adx yuuçxáa jiith, txajx tasxu kaahni ayte ũsthu naa pa'ga jĩk.
Txã'jĩte', tudçxa preesu jxũna u'j wẽetx, nawa kim yuhwa tud yu' meeta', txã'wẽ yũuwa'j en ãhmeyne' yu' naa pa'ga.
Txã'wẽtewa, wala kuh jiyutx Jesusa' kimtewa sa' na'jĩ'tx:
—Dxus tasxu yuusa Kristo kĩhçxa', ¿naa piçthẽ'the jxthaakwe kĩjkĩhwa kaavxya'ja'jya' ãjãma'k? jĩnatx we'we'.
Nasa txã'wẽ Jesusa's tuuthe'jna ũste fxariseowe'sxa' wẽse'jçxa', sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx yakh puutx we'weçxa', dxuus yat thegsawe'sxtxi kaahtx Jesusa's tudçxa jxũna yuukahn.
Aça' preesu'jya' kaahni's jiyuçxa', Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—Adxna kaahsa tasxna sxawedna u'jya'wath na' i'kwe'sx yakh txaçxmeeçxáa pi'kxna ũsya'wath.
Aça' adxa's pakweçxawa uymeene'kwe, txãa pa'gatey adx u'jweçthu kxte' pa'jya' ãjãmeene'kwe naa pa'ga.
Txajũ' judiuwe'sxa' na'wẽtx puutx ya'paapẽjxya' takh:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿mtee u'the txã'wẽ kwe'sxa' uymée yuukxtha'w? Meeçxa' ¿judiuwe'sx ũsta' vxite kiwesu griegowe'sx ksxavxysu aça' txãa griegowe'sxtxi wáa pta'sxya' u'jweçnakx?
Adxa's pakweçxawa uymeene'kwe, txãa pa'gatey adx u'jweçthu kxte' pa'jya' ãjãmeene'kwe naa pa'ga jĩnak we'we' sa' ¿ma'jĩçxaki'k txã'wẽ we'we'? jĩ'tx.
Fxiesta pçuuya' nmeh en yuuçte', Jesusa' yujuçxa na'jĩnak sus we'we':
—Maawa yũ'wẽesa ũsçxa', adx tasxte myuhwe tudxya'.
Adxa's ũuste jxpa'gasatxi's txãawe'sx ũuste yu' pçuwa'jmeesa kasehna nes yuuna, Dxus librute we'we'k txã'wẽ.
Jesusa' txã'jĩna we'weçxa', txã'sna yaakxsa' Dxus Espiritu's jxpa'gawa'ja'sku pta'sxna txã'jĩ'. Txãa ensu' txãa Dxus Espiritu' pa'jmeyku yu', Jesus yuu cielun tejkameyku yu' naa pa'ga.
Nasa wala kuh pkhaakhena ũsnite maaíi yu' Jesus pta'sxni's wẽse'jçxa', na'wẽtx we'we:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' isa Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa yuhna jĩ'tx.
Aça' vxite yu' na'jĩ'tx:
—Na' Dxus tasxu yuusa Kristona jĩ'tx. Nawa vxite we'weçxa':
—Galileajũ yuja', ¿Kristo' kasehma'k?
Txã'wẽmeeteíik Dxus librute we'weçxa': Kristo' jxkaahsa Davxid nwe'sxçxa', Davxid upxni çxhab Belentey kasejena jĩ'k jĩnatx we'we'.
Txajũ' maaíi yu' Jesus ju'gu we'wenatx neeyũu, aça' vxite yu' Jesusa's ahçenatx neeyũu.
Aça' maaíi yu' preesu'jçxa jxũna u'j wẽeçxawa, maa yuhwa txã'wẽ yu' yũumeeta'.
Dxuus yat thegsawe'sxa' ki'kin sxawedna pa'the', sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' fxariseowe'sxa' na'jĩnatx pẽjx:
—¿Mjĩitekwe txãa Jesusa's preesu'jçxa jxũna yuwe'çmée? jĩte',
txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Bagaçxte yuhwa naa piçthẽ'j na'wẽ zhiçxkwe pta'sxi'k txã'wẽsa yu' iiwẽse'jmeetha'w. Txãasatha'w preesu'jmée.
Txajũ' fxariseowe'sxa' wẽesxũ we'weçxa', na'jĩtx:
—¿I'kwe'sxwa vxitesa na'wẽy ya'ĩsxiijaçwá'kwe?
¿Kwe'sx npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx meeçxawa fxariseowe'sx maaçxá' txãa piçthẽ'j kaapiya'jni's jxpa'gaçxa ũste i'kwe'sxa' jiikwe'?
Nawa txãa piçthẽ'ja's nwẽese'jsa' leya's jiimeesata' na' iiméh seena' ewmeesa nwe'wewa'jmeesa yã'tha'.
Txã'jĩte', kxtee ũssa teeçx fxariseo Nikodemo yaasesa Jesus tasxte kus pa'jya' u'ju'ga txãa we'weçxa na'jĩk:
—Yuuwesa's pa'yaçxa pẽjxmey yu', kastigãyya' ãjame'nja'w, kwe'sx leya' txã'wẽ jxkaaja'çme' jĩte',
txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—¿Idxwa Galileajũwe'sxwá'ga? Dxus libru's mtheg wakx, sa' jiyune'ga: Galileajũ yu', bagaçxte yuhwa Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa iikasehmeeta' jĩnatx açewe'we.
Txã'jĩçxa', puutx txuteena u'jtx txãawe'sx yatna.
Naapkaçxha' Jesusa' Jerusalenu kasehçxa Oliwos vxiçnak u'j.
Sa' kuskus kusíiçxáa dxuus yatte sxawedna pa'kh. Txajũ' nasa jxukaysa utxaate', Jesusa' kaapiya'jya' kaçxku.
Txajũ' ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx vxite' fxariseowe'sxa' teeçx u'y kazx yũuna ũste kpajkxçxa Jesus tasxte nuypa'jtx sa' pxãhte txahçxa'
na'jĩtx:
—Kaapiya'jsa, naa u'ya's kazx yũuna ũsíin kpajkxtha'w.
Txã'wẽ yũusatxi' Moises leya' kwet wãatatahçxak ikhkaja'. Aça' idxa' ¿ma'wẽ jxkaajaki'g? jĩnatx pẽjx.
(Kxtee ãhmée we'wete', paatxhĩ'khya' sũhçxatx txã'wẽ paapẽyi'.)
Nawa Jesusa' kĩiçhuçxak kiwete kuseju fxi'ja'.
Aça' maz uswa jwee pẽjxte', Jesusa' kaphuteçxa na'jĩk:
—I'kwe'sxa' maaçxáawa pkal ji'phmeesa ũsçxa', txãa khuẽ'y naa u'y kakwete kwet mwãatahwe jĩçxa',
ki' kĩiçhuçxa kiwete fxi'kh.
Aça' txã'jĩni's wẽse'jçxa': Kwe'sxwa pkalsane'tka'w sũhçxa, kasehna u'jtx teeçxteeçxçxah, nyafxte' jwee ĩisxsa khuẽ'ytxi kaseh. Txã'wẽ jxuka kasehna u'the', txãa u'yçxáak kxtee neeyũu Jesus ũsnite.
Aça' Jesusa' kaphuteçxa ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx jxuka kasehna u'jnite' txãa u'yçxáa ũste uyçxa', na'jĩk:
—I'kwena paatxhĩ'khsawe'sxa' ¿mteeta yuu? ¿Maawa i'kwe's ewmeete nvxiht-ya' ãjãmeewá'nta? jĩte',
txãa u'ya' na'jĩnak pas:
—Maa yuhwa ãjãmeeta' jĩte', Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Adxwa i'kwe's ewmeete nvxihtme'nja. Me'jwe, nawa peena yu' ewmée yũuna u'junuwe jĩk.
Ki'kin nasa pkhaakhete', Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—Adxa' eena'te kaafxi'ze'jsath, aça' maawa adx yakh yuusa' eena'te fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutxna, sa' bagaçxte yuhwa çxhi'dxte fxi'zemeetxna.
Txajũ' fxariseowe'sxa' na'wẽtx we'we:
—Idxa' peekíiçxáa ya'tuuthe'jna ũsgu aça' txã' kxul yuhna jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':

—Makwe peekíiçxá'ntka ya'tuuthe'je', nawa adx pta'sxni' ĩsxiinisame'. Txãa pa'gatey adxa' jiith majũwe'sxçxa' ki' maa dxi'j u'jweççxawa. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' jiimée i'kwe adx majũwe'sxtewa sa' maa dxi'j u'jweçtewa.
I'kwe'sxa' peekx ũus yaakxnijũçxáa i'kwe txã'wẽ we'we', adx isa we'weni's jiyumey. Nawa adxa' jiimeeçxa yu' we'we'çmeeth.
Nasa ma'wẽsatewa isa jiyuçxath we'we', Tata' adxa's kaakh txãak ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa adxa's pu'çxhi' txãa pa'ga.
I'kwe'sx leyte' na'jĩ'k: Yuwe's jiisa e'zíi txãa na'wẽçxaçxáa we'wenisaçxáa selpiina jĩ'k.
Aça' isa we'wesa teeçxsa' adxíiçxáath. Aça' vxite' adxna kaahsa Tataíiçxá'.
Txã'jĩte', fxariseowe'sxa' na'jĩtx:
—Iidx Tata' ¿mtee ũsna? jĩte', Jesus pasçxa':
—I'kwe'sxa' adxa's jiyu'çmeei'kwe, sa' adx Tatanawa jiyu'çmeei'kwe. Adx kimtewa jiyuwaça', adx Tatanawa jiyune'kwe jĩnak pta'sx.
Dxuus yatte ofxreda ãsxni kaja pukate kaapiya'jna ũsçxa', txã'jĩnak pta'sx Jesusa'. Nawa maa yuhwa preesu'jya' ãjãmeeta', preesu'jwa'j en ãhmeyne' yu' naa pa'ga.
Jesusa' ki'kin we'weçxa na'jĩk:
—Adxa' u'jweçthu, aça' i'kwe'sxa' makwe pakweene'kwe, nawa adxa's uymey i'kwe'sx pkalte uune'kwe. Txãasa adx u'jweçthu kxteea' pa'jya' ãjameene'kwe jĩna we'wete',
judiuwe'sxa' na'jĩtx:
—Meeçxa' ¿peekx kusetey uuya'wawáanakx, txãasa wá' adx u'jweçthu kxteea' pa'jya' ãjameene'kwe jĩna we'we'kx? jĩte',
Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—I'kwe'sxa' aytewe'sxi'kwe, naapkaçxha' adxa' ẽejũwe'sxthu. Aça' i'kwe'sxa' naa kiwetewe'sxi'kwe, naapkaçxha' adxa' naa kiwetewe'sxmeeth.
Txã'wẽçxaíith i'kwe'sx pkalte uune'kwe jĩna pta'sxi'. Txã'wẽ Dxus kaahnisa' adxçxáath jĩna pta'sxtewa jiyumée yã'jçxa', i'kwe'sx pkalte uune'kwe jĩna pta'sxte',
na'jĩnatx paapẽjx:
—Txã'wẽçxa' ¿idxa' kimga? jĩte', Jesus pasçxa' na'jĩk:
—Adxa' kimçxawa nyafxíi pta'sxyã'th.
Txãasa wala pta'sxwa'j ji'pthu i'kwe'sx ma'wẽsatewa ãate pta'sxna, txãa pa'gatey adxna kaahsa' ĩsxiisame', aça' adxa' txajx we'weni's wẽse'jçxa txã'wẽ íiçxáath pta'sxi' maawa jiyukahn jĩnak we'we.
Txã'wẽ Dxusa' adx Tata' jĩna Jesus pta'sxtewa jiyumeeta'.
Txãa pa'gak Jesusa' na'jĩna we'we:
—I'kwe'sxa' Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's ẽete txahçxa yuuçxáa jiyune'kwe kimtewa, sa' peekxçxáa yu' we'wemée, wejxwa Tata kwe'we'jniçxá'sne' kaapiya'j sũjune'kwe.
Txãa pa'gatey adxna kaahsa', adx yakh ih ũsa', Tata' adxçxáa yu'sa' nvxiitu'çme', txajx jxthãasniçxá'sthu kxtey yu' naa pa'ga jĩk.
Txã'jĩna we'wete', nasa kuhsa Jesus ju'gu yuutx.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txajx ju'gu yuusaawe'sxtxi' na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Adx kaapiya'jni's jxpubamée nwẽese'jçxa', adx nasa yuuçxa
ewsa's jiyune'kwe, aça' txãa ewsa' ewmeesajũ nwe'wena jĩte',
txãawe'sxa' na'wẽtx pas:
—Kwe'sxa' Abrahan ji'tha'w, sa' bagaçxte yuhwa ewmeete yu' fxi'zesameetha'w. Aça' idxa' ¿ma'wẽga ewmeesajũ nwe'weni yuune'kwe jĩna we'we'? jĩte',
Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Isath we'we', maawa ewmée yũuna fxi'zesa', ewmeete fxi'zesata'.
I'kwe'sxa' peekx jii i'kwe: selpisa' yat namu na'wẽsame', naasáa peekx nçxi'k yuuçxáa yat namu na'wẽsa'.
Txãa pa'ga yat namu na'wẽsa Dxus Nçxi'k txã'wẽ ewmeesajũ nwe'wete yuuçxáa, isa ewmeete fxi'zesamée yuh yuune'kwe.
I'kwe'sxa' Abrahan ji'thewa jiith, nawa adxa's ikh wẽje'i'kwe, adx kaapiya'jni's nwẽese'j wẽemeeçxaçxáa.
Adx Tata kwe'we'jniçxá'sthu pta'sxi', naapkaçxha' i'kwe'sxa' i'kwe'sx tata jxkaahniçxá's i'kwe kxtey yu' jĩte',
txãawe'sxa' na'wẽtx pas:
—Kwe'sx tata' Abrahana' jĩte', Jesus pasçxa':
—Abrahan luuçxwaça', Abrahan na'wẽy yũune'kwe.
Txã'wẽtewa, adxna ma'wẽ Dxus kaapiya'the', txã'sçxáath isa pta'sxi'. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' adxa's ikhya' yuuçxáa i'kwe pa'pçxu'. Abrahana' bagaçxte yuhwa txã'wẽ yũume'.
I'kwe'sx tata ma'wẽ yũute', i'kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy i'kwe yũ' jĩte', na'wẽtx pas:
—Txã'jĩkahna', kwe'sxa' ¿ptamunimeesa luuçx wá'ntka'w? Kwe'sxa' teeçx tataçxáa ji'ptha'w, txã' Dxusa' jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—Isa Dxusa' i'kwe'sx tatawaça', adxa's ahçemeene'kwe, adxa' Dxus tasxu kaahnith yuwé' txãasa ayte ũsthu. Adxa' peekxçxáa yu' yuwe'çmeeth, adxa'sa' Dxusku kaah.
Na'swa adx kaapiya'jni's jiyu'çmeei'kwe, txã'wẽ adx we'weni's nwẽese'je'çmeei'kwe, txãasa i'kwe jiyu'çmée.

I'kwe'sx tata', eçxthẽ'ja', aça' i'kwe'sxa' txajx luuçxi'kwe. Txã'wẽçxaíi i'kwe txajx jxthãasni's kxtey yuu wẽje', eçxthẽ'ja' nyafxiitey nasaa kiikhe'jsa' naa pa'ga. Eçxthẽ'ja' bagaçxte yuhwa ewsa's yũ'çme', sa' bagaçxte yuhwa isa we'we'çme'. Txãa yuu txã'wẽesana na' ĩsxiinaçxáak we'we', sa' kaaĩsxiija'jsa'.
Nawa adx isa we'weni yu's nwẽese'je'çmeei'kwe.
I'kwe'sxa' ¿maaçxa' adxa's pkalsa' jĩna ukhe'jya' ãjama'kwe? adxa' isasaçxá'sthu pta'sxi' aça'. Adx isasa's kaapiya'jaçte', ¿ma'wẽtekwe adx we'weni's nwẽese'je'çmée?
Dxus luuçxa' Dxus we'weni's nwẽese'je'tx. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' nwẽese'je'çmeei'kwe na' Dxus luuçx meei'kwe jĩk.
Txajũ' judiuwe'sxa' Jesusa's na'wẽtx açewe'we:
—Idxa' Samariajũwe'sxgu, txãasa eçxthẽ'j yakh ũsgu aça' isatha'w txã'jĩ' jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—Adxa' eçxthẽ'j yakh ũsmeeth, naasáa adx Tata's tuuthe'jsaçxáath. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' adxa's açe'i'kwe.
Adxa's weçxana tuuthe'jni's pakwe'çmeeth. Nawa teeçx ũsa' adxa's tuuthe'jsa txã' adx ma'wẽsatewa jiia'.
Isath we'we': Adx we'weni's kxtey yuusa', bagaçxte yuhwa uu ena's ji'phumeetxna.
Txã'jĩte', judiuwe'sxa' na'wẽtx we'we:

—Ãçxhtha'w wejx ew jiyu, eçxthẽ'j yakh ũstewa. Abrahana' uuk sa' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sxwa uutx. Naapkaçxha' idxa' na'jĩ'g: Maawa adx we'weni's kxtey yuuçxa', bagaçxte yuhwa uu ena's ji'phumeetxna jĩ'g.
Kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx Abrahana' uuk sa' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sxwa uutx, aça' idxa' ¿Abrahante jxthaakwesa wá'ga? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—Adxíiçxáa ya'tuuthe'jna pta'sxi'nja na' txã' selpimeena. Nawa adxa's tuuthe'jsa' adx Tata' txã's i'kwe kwe'sx Dxusa' jĩna we'we'.

Nawa i'kwe'sxa' txãa Dxusa's jii yuuwa meei'kwe. Nawa adxa' txã'sa' ew jiith. Txã'wẽ txã'sa' ew jiiçxa jiimeeth jĩ'nja na', i'kwe'sx na'wẽy ĩisxihsa yu'nja. Nawa adxa' ĩsxiimée Dxusa's jiith, sa' txajx jxkaahni's kxteythu yu'.
I'kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx Abrahana' adx naa kiwete pa'jwa'ja's jiyuçxa', wala weçxana yajkxku, sa' kxtey yuuni's jiyuçxa' wejxku wala weçxa.
Txã'jĩte', judiuwe'sxa' na'wẽtx weeçx we'we:
—Idxa' cinkwenta anxu yuhwa mée ji'phgu, sa' ¿ma'wẽga txã'wẽ Abrahana's uy? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Isath we'we', Abrahan meeíin, adxa' ũsyã'th yu'.
Txã'jĩte', judiuwe'sxa' ũusaçxaçxa', Jesusa's kwet wãatatajxa'watx yu'. Nawa Jesusa' txãawe'sx ksxavxysuy dxuus yatu kasehna u'kh, kim yuhwa jiyunimeete.
Jesusa' u'jweççxa', teeçx piçthẽ'j naa kiwete upxhí uyya' ãjasame'sku puutx uy.
Aça' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' Jesusa's na'wẽtx paapẽjx:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' ¿kĩh yuupa'gaki'k txã'wẽ yafx ji'phmée upxna ũsu'? ¿Txajx pkalpa'ga ma'k txã'wẽ nxus ji'phu, meeçxa' neywe'sx pkalpa'ga wá' txã'wẽ yuu? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa' na'jĩk:
—Txajx pkalpa'gawa me', sa' neywe'sx pkalpa'gawa meek txã'wẽ yuu, naasáa Dxus ewuni's ãate kaavxya'ja'khançxáak txã'wẽ yuu.
Txãa pa'ga kaahsa mjĩia's ãate kaavxya'ja'jna mjĩiwa'j ji'pthu nee en ũsiyna. Txã'wẽme' kus yã'the', kim yuhwa mjĩiya' ãjameena.
Adxa' naa kiwete nee ũsíiçxáawa, nasatx eena'te kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsath.
Txã'jĩçxa', kiwe's fxne'sxju tuupha'çxa txãa piçthẽ'j yafxte sxũsxna'wa,
na'jĩnak jxkaah:
—Me'j pkhi'kxya' Siloé yu'kafxte. (Txãa Siloea' Jxkaahnisa jĩni'.)
Txajũ' txãa piçthẽ'ja' u'jçxa', yafxtxi pkhi'kxku, sa' uyna yã'kh sxawedna kũh.
Aça' txajx yat utxasuwe'sx vxite' nyafxíi txã'wẽ yafx ji'phmée upxsatewa ew jiisa' na'wẽtx we'we:
—Naa piçthẽ'jí ¿nyafxí' lmusxnu pẽjxna u'psa meená'? jĩte',
maaíi yu':
—Txãaíik jĩ'tx. Naapkaçxha' vxite':
—Txãa na'wẽ yuh thegu'k, nawa txãame' jĩ'tx. Nawa txãa piçthẽ'j yu':
—Adxíith jĩk.
Txajũ' pẽjxtxi:
—Idx upxnijũjx uyya' ãjameeçxa', ãçxha' ¿ma'wẽ yuuçxaga uyya' ãja'? jĩte',
pta'sxku:
—Teeçx piçthẽ'j Jesus yaasesa' kiwe's fxne'sxju tuupha'çxa adx yafxte sxũsxna'wa na'jĩk: Me'j pkhi'kxya' Siloé yu'kafxte jĩte', u'jna'wa pkhi'kxthu, aça' adx yafxa' phatetx aça' uyu'th jĩte',
paapẽjxtxi:
—Idxa's txã'wẽ kaahsa' ¿mtee ũsna? jĩte':
—Jiimeeth jĩnak pas.
Txajũ' txãa piçthẽ'ja's pe'jna u'jtx fxariseowe'sx tasxna.
Jesus txã'wẽ kiwe's fxne'sxju tuupha'jçxa uyya' ãjasame's yu'çe'jni' ki'swa'j enne' yu'.
Aça' fxariseowe'sxa' ki' paapẽjxtxi txãa piçthẽ'ja's:
—¿Ma'wẽ yũuçxaga ãçxha' uyya' ãja'? jĩte', na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Kiwe's fxne'sxju tuupha'çxa adx yafxte sxũsxku, aça' pkhi'kxthu sa' uyya' ãjath jĩk.
Txajũ' fxariseowe'sx maaíi yu' na'wẽtx we'we:
—Txã'wẽ yũusa' Dxus luuçx meena, ki'swa'j ena's ki'su'çme' na' jĩte', vxite' na'wẽtx we'we:
—Pkalsaçxa', ¿ma'wẽ txã'wẽ kim yuhwa ãjãnimeesa's kaavxya'ja'jya' ãjãkx?
Txajũ' txãawe'sxíiçxáa txã'wẽ we'weçxa', puutx puiidxi'tx neeyũu.
Sa' txãa piçthẽ'ja's ki' paapẽjxtxi:
—Iidx yafxa's yu'çe'jsa' ¿kimna sũju'ga? jĩte':
—Txã' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsana sũju'th jĩnak pas.
Txã'wẽ upxnijũjx uyya' ãjasameeçxawa ãçxha' uyu'th jĩtewa, judiuwe'sx yu' txã'wẽne' yu' sũju'çmeeta'. Sa' txãa piçthẽ'j neywe'sxtxi pa'yaçxa',
paapẽjxtxi:
—¿Naa txã'wẽ i'kwe'sx luuçx upxnijũjx uyya' ãjasameena wakx? Sa' ¿ma'wẽ yũuçxaga ãçxha' uyya' ãja'? jĩte',
neywe'sx pasçxa':
—Na' kwe'sx luuçx yuja', txã'wẽ upxhíi uyya' ãjasameetewa txã'sa' jiitha'w.
Nawa jiimeetha'w ma'wẽ yũuçxane' ãçxha' uyya' ãja'. Sa' kim txã'wẽ yafxtxi' yu'çe'thewa txã'snawa jiimeetha'w. Txã's yuu mpẽjxwe, txã' thẽ'jsayã'ja' na' txãa pta'sxina.
Paapẽysatxi' ũukhçxatx txã'wẽçxáa pas. Txã'wẽme' maa txã'wẽ Jesusa' Dxus kaahni Kristo' jĩna tuuthe'jena txã'sa' fxariseowe'sxa' ahçeçxa peena yu' txãawe'sx pkhaakhenite kaapa'ja'jya'méetx ũsu'.
Aça' txã'wẽ yuuya'watetx ũukhçxa: Na' thẽ'jsayã'ja' na' txãa pta'sxina jĩnaçxáa pasu'.
Txajũ' fxariseowe'sxa' txãa piçthẽ'ja's ki' pa'yaçxa' na'wẽtx we'we:
—Dxus dxi'pte ĩsxiimée mpeeta'sx. Kwe'sxa' jiitha'w iidx yafxtxi yu'çe'jsa' pkalsatewa jĩte',
txãa piçthẽ'j pasçxa' na'jĩk:
—Pkalsa wáana nawa adxa' jiimeeth. Adxa' na'wẽçxáa jiith: nyafxí' uyya' ãja'çmeeth, nawa ãçxha' uyu'th jĩte',
ki' paapẽjxtxi:
—¿Kĩhga yũu? sa' ¿ma'wẽçxah yũuçxaga iidx yafxtxi' yu'çe'j? jĩte',
txã' na'wẽk pas:
—Pta'sxyã'th, nawa pta'sxtewa açewe'we'çxáa i'kwe. Sa' ¿kĩjxa'kwe peena pta'sxkaja'? ¿I'kwe'sxwa txãa yakh u'ju wẽje'wá'kwe? jĩte',
na'jĩnatx wẽesxũu:
—Idxa' txãa yakh u'jusag. Nawa kwe'sxa' Moises jxkaahni's nwẽese'jsatha'w.
Kwe'sxa' jiitha'w Dxusa' Moises yakh puutx we'wek. Nawa txãa thẽ'ja's majũwe'sxtewa jiimeetha'w.
Txajũ' txãa piçthẽ'ja' na'wẽk we'we:
—Wala yuh fxiya', adx yafxtxi yu'çe'jsa's majũwe'sxtewa i'kwe'sxa' jiyumeete'.
Maawa jiitha'w Dxusa' pkalsawe'sx we'weni's pasu'çme', naasáa Dxusna yajkxçxa txajx jxkaahni's kxtey yuusaçxáatxku Dxusa' pasu'.
Bagaçxte yuhwa iiwẽse'jmeetha'w upxhíi uyya' ãjasameetx ki' kaauyu'jni yu'sa'.
Adx yafxtxi yu'çe'jsa' Dxus kaahnisameewaça', txã'wẽ kaauyu'jya' ãjawa'jmeene' yu' jĩte',
na'wẽtx wẽesxũu we'we:
—Idxa' upxhí iidx ũuste pkalçxaçxáa uta ji'ph upxsag na' ¿ma'wẽtega kwe'sxtxi yu'kxpeh wẽje'? jĩna açewe'weçxa', neeutx peena yu' jxpa'gaya'mée.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãa piçthẽ'ja's neeuni's jiyuçxa', ki' puutx uyçxa' na'wẽk pẽjx:
—¿Dxus Nçxi'k kimtewa jiigá'? jĩte',
txãa piçthẽ'j pasçxa':
—Mpeeta'sx adx jiyukahn jĩna pẽjxte',
Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Idxa' Dxus Nçxi'ka's iiuyyã'jg. Adxíith, aça' idxa' txãa yakhgu puutx we'we'.
Txã'jĩte', txãa piçthẽ'ja' Jesus tasxte peejxũkweçxa':
—Idxa' Dxus Nçxi'k yuh yu'ga sũju'th jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Adxa' na'wẽ yuuya'íiçxáath naa kiwete kĩh, uyya' ãjasameeçxawa uyya' ãjãkahn, aça' makwe uysaaçxawa uyya' ãjãkahmén.
Txajũ' fxariseowe'sx kxtee ũssa' txã'wẽ wẽse'jçxa', na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—Kwe'sxwa uyya' ãjasameewá'ntka'w jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—I'kwe'sxa' uyya' ãjãsamée dxihwaça', yuuwesamée yuune'kwe. Nawa uyu'tha'w jĩ'i'kwe na', txãa pa'ga Dxus dxi'pte' yuuwesai'kwe jĩk.
Isath we'we', maawa piisxáa ka'ga'jni vxitxtey u'kamée, vxite ahte vxitxtemée u'kasa' txã' pesweeta'.
Nawa vxitxte u'kasa' piisxáa-thegsaçxa txã'wẽ yuuna.
Aça' kxte vxitxte thegsa' vxitxa's phaade'k u'kakahn. Aça' piisxá' jiyu'tx jxpe'jsa we'weni's, txajũ' teeçxteeçxçxah kxsusna pa'yaçxa kxuuphnijũ kutxi'ji'k.
Sa' jxuka kasxisxçxa', piisxáa-thegsa' yaçtek u'jwe', aça' piisxa' txajx e'ste wa'lmeetx u'jwe', jxpe'jsa pa'yani's jiyu'ne'ta naa pa'ga.
Nawa nasa fxiysa pa'yate yu', u'jmée wejxwa ũphna u'jwe'tx, nasa fxiysa pa'yate jiyuçxatx txã'wẽ ũphu'.
Jesusa' naa ejemplo's pta'sxnak kaapiya'j, nawa nasa' jiyumeeta' txã'wẽ pta'sxni's.
Nasa jiyumeete', Jesusa' na'jĩnak ki'kin pta'sx:
—Isath we'we': Adxíi piisxáa u'kani vxitx na'wẽsath.
Adx pa'jmeyna yaçte pa'jsa' jxukay ĩsxiisa pesweeçxáatx yu'. Aça' piisxá' ũukhçxa utxaameeta'.
Adxíi vxitx na'wẽsath, aça' maawa adx tasxte u'kasa', nwe'weni yuutxna. Txajũyã'ja' ki' kasehn ki' u'kan txã'wẽ yuuna ũsçxawa, sã'jĩni nes yuutxna.
Ewmeesa' pesweena ikhna jxuka pebaya'çxáatx pa'ja', naapkaçxha' adxa' bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zekahnthu yuwé'.
Adxa' piisxaatx ew jxpe'jsath. Aça' ew jxpe'jsa' piisxaatx peeygãhçxa nwe'wepa'gaçxáa txajx ĩtxi fxi'zeni's ivxiituya' ũsa'.

Nawa vxyuu pa'gaçxáa piisxaatx thegna ũssa' yu'kh eçx yuhte uyna'wa, piisxaatx thegmée ũphna u'jwe'tx, piisxáa-thegsa meena sa' piisxa' txãa jĩiwa meetxna, txãa pa'gatx txã'wẽ yũ'. Aça' txã'wẽ yũute', yu'kh eçxa' piisxaatx mazwa ikhe'k, naapkaçxha' ĩtxisa yu' ma'wẽwa ũphu'tx.
Txã'wẽ vxyuu pa'gaçxáa thegna ũsna, txãasane' ũphna u'jwe' piisxaatxi' thegmée.

Adxa' piisxaatx ew jxpe'jsath. Adx Tatawa ma'wẽ adxa's ew jiina aça' adxwa ew jiith Tata's, txã'wẽy adxwa piisxaatxi' ew jiith, aça' adx piisxaawa adxa's jiita'. Adx piisxaatx wedxçxa nwe'weya' adx ĩtxi fxi'zeni's ivxiituya'wath.

Adxa' piisxaatx ew jxpe'jsath. Adx Tatawa ma'wẽ adxa's ew jiina aça' adxwa ew jiith Tata's, txã'wẽy adxwa piisxaatxi' ew jiith, aça' adx piisxaawa adxa's jiita'. Adx piisxaatx wedxçxa nwe'weya' adx ĩtxi fxi'zeni's ivxiituya'wath.

Txã'wẽy piisxáa vxite ji'pthu ayte kxuuphnimeesa txãatxwa nuypa'ja'nja. Aça' txãawe'sxwa adx pa'yani's nwẽese'jetxna. Txã'wẽ yũute', teeçx ahteçxaçxáa jxuka pkhakhni neeyũutxna teeçx jxpe'jsa yakhçxáa.
Txã'wẽ adx ĩtxi fxi'zeni's ya'ivxiituya'wath, nawa ĩtxi yuuwa'ja's ki' jxpa'gaya'wath, txãa pa'gak Tata' adxa's wedxi'.

Adx ĩtxi fxi'zeni's kim yuhwa kusa'jya' ãjameena. Adx yuuth peekíi ya'dukhe'. Sa' adx ĩtxi fxi'zeni's ya'dukhçxa uuya'wa ãja'nja sa' ki' ĩtxi yuuwa'ja'swa ki' jxpa'gaya' ãja'nja. Txã'wẽ yũukahnku adx Tata' adxa's kaah.
Txã'wẽ we'weni's judiuwe'sx wẽse'jçxa, kuh jwedtxi yajkxna neeyũu.
Maaíi yu' na'wẽtx ũusçxawe'we':
—¿Kĩjxa'kwe nwẽese'je' eçxthẽ'j yakh ũsçxa luuku we'weni's? jĩ'tx.
Naapkaçxha' vxite' na'jĩ'tx:
—Eçxthẽ'j yakh ũsçxa', kim yuhwa na'wẽ zhiçxkwe kaapiya'jya' ãjãmeena. Eçxthẽ'jçxa', txã'wẽ uyya' ãjasameetx kaauyu'jya' ¿ãjãma'k?
Dxuus yata's txahna jxã'jni's anxu iisatx fxiesta'ja' Jerusalen çxhabte. Sa' txãa fxiestatetx ũsu' nus ente.
Naapkaçxha' Jesusa' dxuus yat pwa' Salomon jĩi jĩnisuk pekũhna u'ju'.
Aça' judiuwe'sxa' txajx tasxte pkhaakheçxa na'wẽtx pẽjx:
—¿Bagaçxpkaçx kwe'sxtxi kaypuba'jna ũsya'waga? Idxa' Dxus tasxu yuusa Kristoçxa', teehwed mpeeta'sx jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩnak pas:
—Pta'sxyã'th, nawa adx we'weni's jxpa'ga'çmeei'kwe. Adx Tata jxkaathe', na'wẽ kĩhwa mjĩ'th, aça' adx mjĩini' ãate kaajiyu'ju'tx adx kimtewa.
Adx piisxáa meei'kwe jĩ'th na', isa i'kwe'sxa' txã'wẽsa yuji'kwe. Txãasa i'kwe adxa's jxpa'gaya' wa'lu'.
Adx piisxaatx jiith, aça' txãawe'sxa' adx pa'yani'swa wa'lmée nwẽese'je'tx, sa' adx yakh u'jwe'tx.
Txãasath txãawe'sxtxi' pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's peesu'. Aça' kim yuhwa adx kusejũ' kusa'jmeena, sa' bagaçxte yuhwa vxitumeetxna.
Adx Tata maatewa jxthaakwesak adx kusete dukh, aça' kim yuhwa kusa'jya' ãjameena adx Tata kusejũ'.
Tata adx yakha' txãa na'wẽçxaçxáatha'w.
Txã'jĩte', judiuwe'sxa' Jesusa's ki' kwet wãatatajxa'watx yu'.
Aça' Jesusa' we'wek:
—Adx Tata pu'çxte i'kwe'sx dxi'pte mjĩi ewsaçxaçxáa wala kuh kaavxya'ja'th. Aça' adx mjĩi ewsa ¿maaga i'kwe'sxtxi ewmeena' thegu' açkwe adxa's kwet wãatatah wẽje'? jĩte',
judiuwe'sx pasçxa' na'jĩtx:
—Ew yũupa'ga txã'wẽ kwet wãatatajxa'wameetha'w. Nasaçxáag, naa kxahg Dxusthu jĩna Dxusa's weeçx we'we', txãa pa'ga txã'wẽ yũuya'watha'w.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—I'kwe'sx leyte i'kwe'sxtxi we'weçxa': Dxus i'kwe ¿jĩ'çmeena'?
Jiitha'w Dxus librute fxi'jni's maawa weeçx we'wewa'jme'. Maawa Dxus yuwe's jxpa'gasayã'ja', Dxus i'kwe jĩnak we'we Dxusa'.
Nawa adxa' txã'wẽsaçxáameeth. Adxa' Dxus yuu txhitxhçxa naa kiwete kaahnisath, aça' adxa's ¿ma'wẽ Dxusa's weeçx we'we'k Dxus Nçxi'kthu jĩna jĩya' ãjaki'kwe?
Meeçxa' adx Tata mjĩi kaahnimeesaçxáatx wáa mjĩina ũsne'tka aça' adx we'wenitxi' jxpa'ganuwe.
Nawa adx Tata mjĩi kaahnisatx yuh mjĩite', adx yu's jxpa'gameeçxawa, adx we'weniçxáatxwa miipa'gawe. Txã'wẽ yũuçxaçxáa jiyune'kwe, adx Tata' adx yakh ũsa', aça' adxa' Tata yakh ũstewa.
Txã'jĩte', Jesusa's preesu'jçxa jxũna u'j wẽetx. Nawa preesu'jmeyna, kasehna u'kh.
Txajũ' Jesusa' Jordan yu'wala kuten u'jçxa', Juan nyafxíi bautisãyna ũsu'k kxteek ũsu'.
Aça' nasa wala kuh thegya' pa'jçxa', na'wẽtx we'we:
—Juana' kim yuhwa ãjanimeesatx kaavxya'ja'jmeeçxawa, pta'sxku naa piçthẽ'j pa'jçxa ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa, aça' txã' ĩsxiinimée jxuka kxtey yuuk jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' kxtee ũssa nasa' wala kuhsa Jesus kimtewa jiyutx.
Betania çxhabte teeçx piçthẽ'j Lasaro yaasesak ãçã'na ũs yu', npe'sxwe'sx Maria Marta u'pni çxhabte.
Txãa ãçã'sa npe'sx Mariak txã'wẽ Jesus çxidakhẽ wẽt putasa's awçxa txajx dxkhasju adxi'jwa'jsa yu'.
Txãawe'sxa' pxakhíitx dxiy ãçã'na ũste', Jesusa's pta'sxkahn yuwe kaah:
—Iidx namiku wedxnisa' wala ãçã'na ũsa' jĩna.
Txajũ' Jesusa' naa pta'sxni's wẽse'jçxa' na'jĩk:
—Na'wẽ ãçã'na ũsçxawa, uuwa'jsa meea'. Naasáa Dxus ãjãni's ãate kaavxya'ja'jna, txã'wẽy Dxus Nçxi'k ãjani'swa kaavxya'ja'khançxáa txã'wẽ ãçã'na ũsa'.
Aça' Marta Maria txãawe'sx dxiy Lasaro yakha' Jesus wedxnisatx yu'.
Nawa Lasaro' wala ãçã'na ũsa' jĩna pta'sxni's wẽse'jçxawa, nee e'z eníik txajx u'junisu jxthẽeyũu.
Txãa e'z en skhẽwniijũ', Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi:
—Judea kiwen ki' u'jwega jĩte',
txãawe'sxa' na'wẽtx pas:
—Kaapiya'jsa, mwẽese'j. Txãwãsu' judiuwe'sxa' idxa's ikh wẽeçxa kwet wãatatajxa'watx yu', aça' ¿ma'wẽga kxtey ki' u'j wẽje'? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—Isa ena' doce ora ¿ji'phmeena'? Maawa en u'juçxa' yu'spẽ'themée fxi'zetxna, eena' kweethniitene'ta fxi'ze' naa pa'ga.
Nawa kus u'juçxa', yu'spẽ'thetxna, eena' kweethnite u'jupa'gamée.
Txajũ' na'jĩk Jesusa':
—Kwe'sx namiku Lasaro' deeni', nawa adxa' fxĩtxya' u'jwe'nja jĩte',
txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' na'jĩtx:
—Deeniçxáa ũsçxa yu', fxĩtxte' kiiteena jĩtx.
Lasaro' uuni ũstek Jesusa' txã'wẽ we'we. Nawa txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' jiyumeeçxa', ĩ'née deenisaçxá'sne' we'we' sũju'ne'ta.
Txajũ' Jesusa' teehwedku ãate pta'sx:
—Lasaro' uuni' jĩna.
I'kwe'sxa' adx ãjani's uyçxa' adx kimtewa jiyukahn, ewçxá'ntka kxtee ũsu'çmée. Txã'wẽ uuniyã'j ũstewa, thegya' u'jwega jĩte',
Tomas melxisu jĩ'tx txã' na'wẽk we'we vxite pi'kxna u'jusawe'sxtxi:
—Kwe'sxwa u'jwega Jesus yakh ja'da uuya' jĩk.
Jesus kxtee pa'jaçte', Lasaro's pedaní pahz enyã'kh yu'.
Aça' Betania çxhaba' Jerusalen çxhabuh e'z kilometro y medioçxáak jxu'kha ũsu'.
Aça' judiuwe'sxa' wala kuh pa'khu'ta txã'wẽ dxiy uute', npe'sxwe'sxtxi kvxiisxa'jya'.
Aça' txãa entey Jesusa' pa'jaça' jĩni's jiyuçxa', Marta' puutx uyya' kasejk. Nawa Maria' yatte neeyũuk.
Txajũ' Marta' Jesus yakh puutx uyçxa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—Idx ayte ũssawaça', uuwa'jmeene' yu' ũ'kwe dxi'sxa'.
Nawa jiith Dxusa' jxuka ũsuna idx kĩh pẽjxtewa jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—I'kwe dxiya' ĩtxi yuuna jĩte',
Marta' na'wẽk pas:
—Ũ'kwe' jiith, uusaawe'sx ĩtxi yuu ente' ĩtxi yuuyujuna.
Nawa Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Adxíi uuniitewa ĩtxi vxit-sath, sa' pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja'swa adxíi peessath. Maawa adxa's ũuste jxpa'gasa' makwe uuçxawa ki' ĩtxi yuutxna.
Aça' maawa nee ĩtxi ũssa' adxna ũuste jxpa'gaçxa', bagaçxte yuhwa uuwa'jmée ĩtxi fxi'zetxna. Adx we'weni' isa yuhtxna ¿sũju'kwe'? jĩte',
Marta pasçxa':
—Txã'wẽ yuhna sũju'th. Idxa' Kristog, Dxus Nçxi'k naa kiwete kĩisa jĩk.
Txã'wẽ we'wena jxã'jçxa', Marta' yatna sxawedna u'kh nyakha's pa'yaya'. Sa' na'jĩnak susmée we'we:
—Kaapiya'jsa ayte yã'j ũsa', sa' i'kwe's yuu kaakh.
Txã'jĩ'çpkaçxha', Maria' kiitena' wala dud u'kh Jesusa's puutx uyya'.
Jesusa' Betania çxhabte u'kameyku yu', Marta yakh mteene' puutx uy kxtee nee ũsiyçxáak yu'.
Aça' Maria' kiiteçxa wala dud skhẽwte', judiuwe'sx txãa yatte kvxiisxa'jna ũssa' e'stey u'jtx, pedaní kafxte wáa ũ'neya' u'jweçna sũhçxa.
Txajũ' Maria' Jesus tasxte kũhna'wa, peejxũkweçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa, idx ayte ũssawaça', ũ'kwe dxi'sxa' uuwa'jmeene' yu' jĩnak we'we.
Txã'wẽ Maria vxite' judiuwe'sx pi'kxna yuusa ũ'neçte Jesusa' uyçxa', txãawa wala nxusçxa'
pẽjxku:
—¿Mteekwe pedáa? jĩte':
—Myuh wakx thegya' jĩtx.
Aça' Jesusa' ũ'nek.
Txã'wẽ Jesus ũ'neçte uyçxa', judiuwe'sxa' na'jĩtx:
—Mthegwe ma'wẽga wala peeygãja'.
Nawa maaíi yu' na'wẽtx we'we:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' uyya' ãjasameetxwa kaauyu'ju'k na' ¿kĩhçxáawa yũuya' ãjawa'jmée ma'k yu' Lasaro uukahmén?
Txajũ' Jesusa' ki'kin wala nxusna utxaak Lasaro's pedaní kafxte. Txãa kafxa' dxiiga pwa'ja'nik yu', aça' u'kani vxitxte yu' kwetku aphni yu'.
Jesusa' na'wẽk jxkaah:
—Aphni kweta's mkiiswe jĩte', uusáa npe'sx Marta' na'jĩk:
—Uuníi pahz enyã'ja', aça' phadete' ¿kazx putameema'k? jĩte',
Jesus we'weçxa':
—Adx pta'sxnitxi' txã'wẽ yuhna sũhna ũuste jxpa'gaçxa', Dxus ma'wẽsatewa jiyune'kwe ¿jĩçmeetka'?
Txã'jĩte', txãa aphni kweta's kiistxi. Aça' Jesusa' cielute pagayçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Tata, adx pẽyni's pasu'g naa pa'ga weçxa'th.
Adxa' jiith, idxa' bagaçxtewa adxa's pasu'g. Nawa txã'jĩna ãateth weçxá', ayte nasa ũsta' txãawe'sx wẽse'jçxa', adxa'sa' Dxus kaahni yuh yu'ne' sũjkahn.
Txã'jĩçxa', Jesusa' susku we'we:
—Lasaro, txãajũ mkaaseh jĩçpkaçxha',
uusá' ĩtxi yuuçxa kasejk, çxida, kuse petx dxi'p yã'jçxa yapni. Aça' Jesusa' khibkaakh u'jya' ãjãkahn.
Uusá's ĩtxi vxitni's uyçxa', Maria's pi'kxna ũssa judiuwe'sxa' Jesusa's ũuste jxpa'gaçxatx neeyũu.
Nawa vxite judiuwe'sx açesa yu' fxariseowe'sx tasxna u'jçxa', Jesus txã'wẽ uusá's ĩtxĩ vxitni's pta'sxtxi.
Aça' fxariseowe'sxa' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx yakh pkhaakheçxa', na'jĩnatx puutx we'we:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' naa kiwete kim yuhwa ãjanimeesatx kaavxya'ja'jna kĩjkĩhwa yũuna ũsa'. Aça' ¿kĩh yuukxtha'w?
Txãa piçthẽ'ja's kĩhçxáawa yũumeete', nasa' jxukay txãa yakhçxaçxáa u'jwetxna. Aça' Romajũ nasa kwe'sx dxuus yata's ivxiituçxa', kwe'sxtxiwa ivxiitutxna.
Txajũ' txãa anxute sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j Kaifxasa' na'wẽk we'we:
—I'kwe'sxa' ũus yajkxya'çxáa yuhwa ãjã'çmeei'kwe.
Kwe'sx ji'j jxuka yu' vxitukahmen wejxwa jxukasa pa'gate teeçx yuuçxáa vxituwaççxáa wejx ewna. Txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's ũus yajkxya' i'kwe ãja'çmée.

Kaifxasa' txãa anxute' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'kh yu', sa' peekxçxáa txã'wẽ yajkxçxa we'wemeene'. Jesusa' judiuwe'sx jxukaysa pa'gate txãaçxáa uuwa'thene' Dxusa' Kaifxasa's txã'wẽ we'wewa'ja's kaaũusuthe'j.
Nawa judiuwe'sxtxi nwe'weya'çxáameene' txã'wẽ uuya'wa yu'. Dxus luuçx mtee mteewa ũstxna txãawe'sxtxiwa pkhakhya'k txã'wẽ uuya'wa yu'.
Aça' txãajũjx judiu npiiçthẽ'jwe'sxa' Jesusa's ikhya' puutx we'wetx.
Txãa pa'gak Jesusa' Judiuwe'sx ksxavxysu u'juya' ãjãmeeçxa', Judea kiwejũ kasehna u'j txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yã'jçxa teeçx çxhab nasa u'pnimée ja'dasu Efxrain yaasesa ũsu'k kxtee ũsya'.
Txajũ' Judiuwe'sx fxiesta Paskua en ãjaçku yu'. Aça' wala kuh nasa' u'jtx Jerusalenna, Paskua fxiesta ãhmeyna txãawe'sx kakwete pkaltxi yaateçxa ũsya'.
Kxte' Jesusa's pakwena yã'jtx ũs yu' sa' dxuus yatte na'wẽtx puutx paapẽyi':
—¿Ma'jĩki'kwe? Jesusa' fxiestate ũsya' ¿yuhmanx?
Txajũ' fxariseowe'sx vxite' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sxa' neewe'wetx maaçxáawa Jesusa' fxiestate ũste jiyuçxa' txãawe'sxtxi pta'sxkahn tudxa' kaajxa'.
Paskua fxiesta ãjxa' seis en peejiyna, Jesusa' Betania çxhabna u'kh, Lasaro uuniitewa ĩtxi vxitku kxtee.
Kxteea' ũ'wa'j pheu'jtx Jesusna weçxana, naapkaçxha' Marta yu' puuçuçsak yu'. Aça' Lasaro' Jesus yakh kaçxku ũ'ya'.
Txajũ' Maria' teeçx libra ãjk wẽt putasáa wala pa'gasa's jxũna pa'jçxa', Jesus çxidakhẽ sxũsxçxa', txajx dxkhasjuk adxi'. Aça' yat dxiite txãa wẽt putasaçxáa jxuka utak.
Txajũ' Jesus yakh u'jusa Simon nçxi'k Judas Iskariote yaasesa' Jesusa's ikhkahn dukhwa'jsa' na'wẽk we'we:
—¿Ma'wẽteki'k naa u'ya' wẽt putasa's tres cientos pesote txweyçxa nasa puuplesatx peesu'çmée? jĩk.
Nawa Judasa' puuplesatx pees jxthãasçxa txã'jĩçme'. Txã' vxyuu jxaawsak yu', nawa vxyuu pkhakhnitx kim yuhwa jiyunimée paaçte nkuutxi'ji'u'ga, txãasak txã'wẽ we'we'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Naa u'ya's txã'wẽ yuja' we'wewa'j ji'phmeeg. Naa wẽt putasa's adx kakwe's pedaaçtewe'sxku jxaawni ji'phu'.
Puuplesa' bagaçxtewa i'kwe'sx yakh nes yuutxna. Nawa adxa' jwee yu' i'kwe'sx yakh nes yuuwa'jsameeth jĩnak pta'sx.

Jesusa' Betaniate ũsa' jĩni's jiyuçxa', judiuwe'sx wala kuhsa pkhaakheçxa Jesusa's thegya' txãa çxhabna u'jtx. Nawa Jesusçxá's thegya' u'jmée, Lasaro's ja'datx thegya' u'j, txã'sa' uuniitewa Jesusa' ki' ĩtxi vxitku txãa pa'ga.
Txajũ' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sxa' puutx we'wetx Lasaro'swa ikhya',
txã's Jesus ĩtxi vxitpa'gaçxáa judiuwe'sx wala yã'j txuteeçxa Jesus yakhtxi u'jweç yu' naa pa'ga.
Jerusalente Paskua fxiestate nasa wala pa'tha. Sa' kuskus enkhẽ' Jesuswa Jerusalente fxiestate pa'jana jĩni's jiyuçxa',
lamus eç spẽ'thçxa Jesusa's pu'thegya' kasehtx. Sa' na'jĩnatx sus we'we':
—¡Dxus txakwe ewte, teeçx yuja' Dxus kaahni, Israelwe'sxtxi Jxkaahsa wala ewsa'! jĩnatx weçxá'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' teeçx buçxu ũste uyçxa', txãatek a'jçxa u'j, Dxus librute na'wẽ fxi'jni' txãa kxtey yuukahn:
Ũukhnuwe, Sion çxhabtewe'sx.
Mthegwe, i'kwe'sxtxi Jxkaahsa yuja', teeçx buçxute a'jçxa jĩnak fxi'jni yu'.
Txãapkaçxhíi yu', Jesus yakh u'jusawe'sxa' jiyumeeta' txã'wẽ yũuni's. Nawa Jesus cielun u'jnite', jiyutx txã'wẽ fxi'jni' kxtey yuutewa.
Txã'wẽ uusá's Jesus ĩtxi vxitpa'gatx nasa jiyuwẽesa' txakwe wala pu'thegya' kaseh, Lasaro's ĩtxi vxituçte' kxtee ih thegna ũssa' jiimeesatxwa pta'sxne'ta txãa pa'ga.
Txã'wẽ uusá's Jesus ĩtxi vxitpa'gatx nasa jiyuwẽesa' txakwe wala pu'thegya' kaseh, Lasaro's ĩtxi vxituçte' kxtee ih thegna ũssa' jiimeesatxwa pta'sxne'ta txãa pa'ga.
Txajũ' txã'wẽ nasa pu'thegya' kasehpa'gaçxáa fxariseowe'sxa' na'jĩnatx ũusçxa we'we' txãawe'sx pwe'sx:
—Mthegwe wakx, kĩh yuhwa yũuya' ãjaçmeetha'w, naapkaçxçxáa nasa' jxukay Jesus yakhçxaçxáa u'jweçta' jĩ'tx.
Jerusalente fxiesta ente jxu'j kiwe Greciajũwe'sx pa'jçxa ũsu'tx.
Txajũ' Greciajũwe'sxa' Galilea kiwesu Beçaidatewe'sx Fxelipe's utxaana kũhçxa', na'wẽtx pxthaa we'we:
—Jesusa'stha'w puutx uy wẽje' jĩte',
Fxelipe' u'jçxa Adresa's pta'sxku, sa' txajũ' e'zsay Jesusa's pta'sxya' u'jtx.
Aça' Jesus we'weçxa':
—Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' uuçxa ki' ĩtxi yuuwa'j en ãjaça'.
Na'jĩ'th na': Teeçx skuutxh nxinxa' kiwete weteçxa uumeeçxa yu', pehnamée teeçxçxáa nes yuuna. Nawa uuçxa buçxaçxa', jweeíiçxáa penana.
Maawa naa kiwete ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'jçxá's yaakxsa' pçuwa'jmée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ivxiitutxna. Nawa naa kiwete ĩtxĩ fxi'zeni's yaakxsame', pçuwa'jmée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutxna.
Maawa adxa's selpíi wẽeçxa', adx yakh yuweena, sa' adx mtee ũste' txãawa kxtey ũsya' ãjana adxna selpiisa'. Aça' maawa adxna selpisaatxi's adx Tata' tuuthe'jena.
Ãçxha' wala nxusna ũsthu, sa' ¿ma'jĩtka? Meeçxa' Tata, adxa's meen nwe'we pxthaa yuukahmen jĩte, ewwáanakx. Nawa txã'wẽ pxthaa yuuya'íiçxáath yuwé' na' txã'jĩme'nja.
Tata, maawa idxna jiyuwa'jçxá's mkaavxya'ja'j.
Txajũ' cielujũ we'weni na'wẽk pthũuse:
—Adxna jiyuwa'ja's kaavxya'ja'jyã'th. Nawa maawa adxa's jiyukahn ki' kaavxya'ja'jya'wath jĩnik pthũuse.
Aça' nasa' txã'wẽ cielujũ we'weni's wẽse'jçxa':
—Kpi'sxne' txã'jĩ jĩ'tx, naapkaçxha' vxite yu':
—Teeçx angelne' txã'wẽ we'we jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—Txã'wẽ we'weni' adxna pta'sxna we'weme', i'kwe'sxtxi pta'sxnak txã'wẽ we'we jiyukahn.
Ãçxha' naa kiwete jxukaysa yuuwesa yuuwa'j en ãjk, naapkaçxha' naa kiwete jxkaahna ũssa eçxthẽ'j yu' peena yu' jxkaajxa' ãjãwa'jmeete neeyũuna.
Txã'wẽ adxa's ẽekhẽ ki'pnijũ', jxukaytxi nwe'weya' ãjã'nja.
Txã'wẽ we'weçxak kaajiyu'j ma'wẽ uuya'waçxawa.
Txajũ' nasa' na'wẽtx we'we:

—Kwe'sxa' Dxus librute leya's iiwẽse'tha'w, aça' Kristo' bagaçxte yuhwa uuwa'jmée ĩtxi u'juwa'jsa' jĩ'k. Aça' idxa' ¿ma'wẽga Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa's ẽekhẽ ki'pni yuuna jĩna we'we'? Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' ¿kimna? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩnak pas:

—Eena'sa' i'kwe'sx yakh nee ũsuna, nawa maz ençxáa ũsuna. Txã'wẽte' eena'te fxi'zewa'ja's mpa'gawe, eena'sa nee ũsiyna, kxah çxhi'dxsa' i'kwe'sxtxi kpajkxmeena. Txã'wẽme', çxhi'dxte u'jusa' maa dxi'j ewsatewa jiyuya' ãjã'çme'.
Nee i'kwe'sx yakh ũsiyna, eena'sa's mjiyuwe, kxah eena'te fxi'zesa yuune'kwe.
Txã'wẽ we'wena jxã'jçxa', Jesusa' u'jçxa vxyaame'.
Kim yuhwa ãjanimeesa's txakwe wala kaavxya'ja'thewa, nasa' jiyuya' ãja'çmeeta' Jesus kimtewa.
Nawa Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Isaías fxi'jçxa nvxiitni' kxtey yuukahntxi txã'wẽ yuu: Kxte' na'jĩ'k:
Kwe'sx pta'sxni's ¿kimçxá' jxpa'gata'?
Dxusa' txajx ãjani's ¿kimtxiga kaavxya'ja'j? jĩ'k.
Kristo's jiyuya' ãjawa'jsameene'ta yu', txãa pa'gak Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Isaiasa' txã'wẽ fxi'jçxa nvxiht.
Sa' Isaiasa' ki' we'weçxa':
Dxusa' txãawe'sx yafxtxi aphku uyya' ãjãkahmén.
Sa' txãawe'sx ũustxiwa nuywejik jiyukahmen,
Sa' Dxus tasxte sxawedçxa katxhiwa'ja'swa nvxihtme' jĩ'k.
Jesus ma'wẽ yuuwa'jsatewa jiyuçxak Isaiasa' txã'wẽ we'wena fxi'j.

Txã'wẽtewa, judiuwe'sx wala kuhsa Jesus kimtewa jiyutx, maaíi yu' npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx yã'jçxa. Nawa fxariseowe'sx ahçeçxa txãawe'sx pkhaakhenijũ kutxi'jçxa peena yu' pa'jwa'jmée vxitkahmen, ãate yu' pta'sxi'çmeeta' ũukhçxa.
Txãawe'sxa' nasaa tuuthe'jniçxá's wejx ji'phu wẽeçxatx txã'wẽ yu'.
Txajũ' Jesusa' na'jĩnak we'we:
—Maawa adxna ũuste jxpa'gasa', adxçxáana jxpa'gamée, adxna kaahsa Tatanawa jxpa'gana.
Txã'wẽy maawa adxna uysa', adx Tata'swa uysáa yuuna.
Adxa' nasatx eena'te kaafxi'ze'jya'th kĩh, kxah adxna ũuste jxpa'gasa' çxhi'dxte neeyũumeetxna.
Nawa maawa adx pta'sxni's wẽse'jçxawa kxtey nwẽese'jmeete', txã'wẽ yũusa's ewmeete nvxiitwa'jsa' adxmeeth. Adx yu' naa kiwetewe'sxtxi ewmeete nvxihtxa' yuwe'çmeeth, wejxwa nwe'weya'th yuwé'.
Adxa's wa'lçxa adx pta'sxnitxi' kxtey yuumeete', txã'wẽ yũusatx ewmeete nvxiitwa'jsa ũsa': ãçxh na'wẽ adx pta'sxna we'we'th txãa pta'sxnisa íiçxáa ewmeete nvxiitwa'jsata' nmeh ente'.
Txãa pa'gatey adxçxáa we'wena pta'sxiçmeeth. Adxna kaahsa Tataíik txã'wẽ pta'sxkaja',
kxah adxa' jiith adx Tata we'weni' bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsatewa. Aça' adx Tata ma'wẽ pta'sxkaathe', txã'sna íiçxáath adxwa pta'sxi' jĩnak we'we Jesusa'.

Paskua fxiesta ãjxa' teeçx ençxáa pejiiçku yu'. Aça' Jesusa' jiik yu' naa kiwe's nvxihtçxa Ney tasxna u'jwa'j en ãani's. Sa' naa kiwete txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxtxi' nyafxiitey ma'wẽne' peeygãh na', nmeh entepkaçxku peeygãh.
Jesusa' txãa yakh u'jusawe'sx yakh ũ'na u'ppkaçxha', eçxthẽ'ja' Simon nçxi'k Judas Iskariote's kaaũusuthe'jeçyã'kh yu' Jesusa's ewmeesa kusete dukhkahn.
Aça' Jesusa' jiik yu' Dxus tasxune' yuusa yu' sa' ki' Dxus tasxnay u'jwa'ja's. Sa' txã'wẽy jiik yu' Dxus ma'wẽçxah jxkaahwa'ja'swa txãaçxaçxá's dukhni'swa.
Txajũ' Jesusa' ũ'na u'píi kiitena'wa, atxhna ki'pçxa, toalxa's jxtuhdku.
Sa' kuse khweeçxaniite yu' awna', mesate ih ũ'na u'psa çxidatx pkhi'kxna', toalxaju adxi'k.
Sa' Simon Pedro çxidatx pkhi'kxya'wate', txã' na'wẽk we'we:
—Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa yuja', ¿adx çxidatx pkhi'kxma'g? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'wẽk pas:
—Ãçxhíi yu' jiyumeene'ga na'wẽ yũuni's. Nawa e'su' jiyune'ga.
Txã'jĩtewa, Pedro' ki' na'jĩk:
—Idxa' adx çxidatx pkhi'kxwa'jsameeg jĩte', Jesusa' na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Idxa's pkhi'kxmeete', adx yakh ũsya' ãjameene'ga jĩte',
Simona' na'wẽk pxthaa we'we:
—Txã'wẽyã'the', çxidaçxáatx pkhi'kxmée, kuse petx dxikthé yã'jçxa meen pkhi'kx jĩk.
Nawa Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—U'se pẽwçxa ũssa', jxuka ateyã'tha', kxah çxidaçxáatx pkhi'kxwa'j peejxta'. I'kwe'sxa' ateyã'ji'kwe, nawa jxukasa yu' ate ũsmeei'kwe.
Jxukaysa yu' ate ũsmeei'kwe jĩnak we'we, txã's ikhkahn dukhwa'jsa's we'weçxak txã'jĩ.
Txajũ' Jesusa' txãawe'sx çxidatx pkhi'kxna jxã'jçxa', atxha's jxkahçna' mesate ki' kaçxçxa na'jĩnak paapẽjx:
—¿I'kwe'sxa' jiyu'kwe' adx txã'wẽ i'kwe'sx çxidatx pkhi'kxte'?
I'kwe'sxa' adxa'sa' kaapiya'jsa, jxpe'jsa, jĩçxa', isa yuh we'we'i'kwe, adxa' txã'wẽsa yuhth naa pa'ga.
Adxa' kaapiya'jsa, jxpe'jsaçxawa i'kwe'sx çxidatx pkhi'kxthu aça' i'kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy çxidatx puutx ya'pkhi'kxna mfxi'zewe teeçxsa na'wẽçxaçxáa.
Adx na'wẽy yũuna fxi'zekahnthu i'kwe'sxtxi txã'wẽ selpíi.
Isath we'we', maawa selpisa' txajx patronte jxthaakwesame', aça' txã'wẽy kaahnisawa txã's kaahsate jxthaakwesame'.
Na'wẽ selpiwa'ja's jiyuçxa kxtey yuuna fxi'zeçxa', weçx weçxa fxi'zene'kwe.

I'kwe'sx jxukaysa yuutxi' txã'jĩ'çmeeth. Jiith kimçxah adx txhitxhnisatewa. Nawa Dxus librute na'wẽ fxi'jni ũsa': Adx yakh ih ũ'saçxawa, adxa's ahçeçxa kiikhe'jya'wa' jĩna fxi'jni' kxtey yuukahnthu txã'jĩ'.
Ãçxhíi pta'sxiçthu, kxah kxtey yuute', adxa's ew jiyune'kwe Dxus Nçxi'kdxihtewa.
Isath we'we': maawa adx kaahnisa's jxpa'gaçxa', adxa'swa jxpa'gasa yuuna. Sa' adxçxáana jxpa'gamée, adxa's kaahsanawa jxpa'gasa yuuna.
Txã'jĩna jxã'jçxa', Jesusa' nxusnxus yajkxçxa ãatek we'we:
—Isath txã'jĩ', i'kwe'sx yakh u'jusa teeçxsa' adxa's ahçeçxa ewmeesa kusete dukhya'wa' jĩk.
Txajũ' kimna txã'jĩtewa jiyumeeçxa', dxi'p iisaçxáatx puutx thegu' txãawe'sx pwe'sx.
Teeçxsa' Jesus pukate ih u'psa' Jesus wedxnisak yu'.
Aça' Simon Pedro' kimna txã'jĩtewa jiyu wẽeçxa', txãa ih u'psa's kuseju pta'sxku paapẽykahn.
Aça' Jesus pukate ih u'psa' tuphiçxa na'jĩnak paapẽjx:
—Jxpe'jsa, mpeeta'sx ¿kim idxa's txã'wẽ ahçeçxa dukhwa'jsana? jĩte',
Jesusa' na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Pana's tuupha'jçxa maana ũsu'nja txãa adxa's dukhwa'jsa' jĩçxa', pana's tuupha'jna'wa Simon nçxi'k Judas Iskariote'sku ũs.
Aça' Judasa' pana's jxpa'gaçpkaçxha', eçxthẽ'ja' txajx ũuste u'kak.
Aça' Jesusa' Judasa's na'jĩnak we'we:
—Kĩh yũuya'waçxawa, dud kxtey myuu jĩte',
mesate ũ'na u'psa' maa yuhwa jiyumeeta' txã'wẽ we'weni's.
Maaíi yu' na'wẽtx yaaki': Judasa' vxyu jxaawsate', kxah wá' Jesusa' fxiestate peejiwa'ja's weykaja', meeçxawa puuplesatx wá' kĩhçxáawa peeskaja' sũju'tx.
Naapkaçxha' Judasa' pana's ũ'na'wa kasehna u'kh. Txã'wẽ yuuçte', çxhi'dxni yã'kh yu'.
Judas u'jni e'su', Jesusa' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusá's ãçxha' tuuthe'jnik yuu, aça' Nçxi'kwa Neya's tuuthe'kh.
Dxus Nçxi'k Nasa Yuusa' Neya's tuuthe'jeçpkaçxha', Neywa Nçxi'ka's tuuthe'jena, nawa ãçxhíi txã'wẽ yuuya'wa'.

Adx nçxi'kkuẽwe'sx, jwee yu' txaçx ũsme'nja i'kwe'sx yakh. Adxa' judiuwe'sxtxi nyafxíi we'weçxa': I'kwe'sxa' adxa's pakweene'kwe. Nawa adx u'jweçthu kxte' yujxa' ãjameene'kwe jĩnath we'we, sa' i'kwe'sxtxiwa txã'wẽyçxáath we'we'.
I'kwe'sx yakh nvxiituçthu u'se jxkaahnisa's, puutx ya'peeygãhna fxi'zewa'ja's. Adx ma'wẽtka i'kwe'sxtxi peeygãhna fxi'ze', txã'wẽy i'kwe'sxwa puutx ya'peeygãhna mfxi'zewe.
Txã'wẽ puutx ya'peeygãhna fxi'zete', maa nasawa jiyutxna i'kwe'sx adxa's nwẽese'jsatewa.
Txajũ' Simon Pedro' na'jĩnak Jesusa's paapẽjx:
—Jxpe'jsa, ¿mtee u'jweçga? jĩte', Jesusa' na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Adx u'jweçthu kxte' yujxa' ãjameene'ga ãçxhíi yu'. Nawa e's yu' yuweene'ga jĩtewa,
Pedro' ki'kin paapẽjxku:
—Jxpe'jsa ¿kĩh yuuçxa ãçxhíi yu' yujxa' ãjamée yuuki'th? Adx uuwa'ja's yuhwa ũukhya'mée ũsthu, idxa's peeygãaweete jĩte',
Jesus we'weçxa':
—¿Isaga txã'jĩ'á'? Nawa adxa' na'jĩ'th na': atalx we'wemeyna, adxa's jiimeeth jĩna tekh us ĩsxiijaçyã'j yuune'ga jĩk.
Jesusa' na'jĩk:
—I'kwe'sx ũuste fxĩikãhna nxusmée meswe. Wejx yuuwa Dxusçxá's yajkxna meswe, sa' adxnawa txã'wẽyçxáa yajkxna meswe.
Adx Tata ũsnite', jxkaasena ũswa'j wala ũsa'. Txã'wẽ méewaça', meea' jĩna pta'sxni yã'j yu'nja i'kwe'sxtxi. Txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sx kxtee pa'jwa'ja's pheu'jya' u'jweçthu.
Sa' u'jçxa kxtee i'kwe'sx pa'jwa'ja's pheu'jçxa', ki' sxawedu'nja i'kwe'sxtxi pe'jna u'jya', kxah i'kwe'sxwa adx ũsnitey adx yakh ih ũsune'kwe.
I'kwe'sxa' jii i'kwe mtee u'jweçtewa, sa' dxi'jnawa jii i'kwe.
Txajũ' Tomasa' na'jĩnak pẽjx:
—Jxpe'jsa, mtee u'jweçne'ga nawa kwe'sxa' jiimeetha'w, sa' dxi'ja'swa jiimeetha'w jĩte',
Jesusa' pta'sxku dxi'ja's:
—Adx yuuçxáa Dxus tasxte kaapa'ja'jwa'jsath, sa' adx yuuçxáa kaypuba'jwa'jsameeth, sa' adx yuuçxáa ĩtxi kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsath. Aça' adxpa'ga yuuçxáa maawa adx Tata tasxte pa'jya' ãjatxna.
I'kwe'sxa' adxa's jiyuwaça', adx Tata ma'wẽsatewa jiyune'kwe. Txã'wẽçxawa ãçxha' jiyu i'kwe, uyna ũsi'kwe txãa adx Tata'.
Txãa adx Tata' jĩte', Fxelipe' na'wẽk pẽjx:
—Jxpe'jsa, iidx Tata's ãate mkaavxya'j kwe'sx uykahn. Txã'wẽçxáa peejxtha'w jĩte',
Jesusa' pta'sxku:
—Adxa' i'kwe'sx yakh nakwe txaçx ũsthu aça' ¿ãçxh pa'jwa adxa's jiyumey wá'ga? Adxna uysa', adx Tatanak uyu'. Aça' ¿ma'wẽga Tata's mkaavxya'j jĩna pẽyi'?

Jiyu'çmée wá'ga, adxa' Tata yakh bagaçxtewa nesthu yu', aça' txã'wẽy Tatawa adx yakh nesa'. Na'wẽ we'we'th na' peekx ũusuh yajkxçxa txã'wẽ we'we'çmeeth. Tata adx yakh ũssa txãa we'wekaatheçxáath we'we'.
Jiyuçxa mneeyũuwe: Bagaçxtewa adxa' Tata yakh e'zsay ih nestha'w yu'. Txã'wẽ e'zíi ihne'ta fxi'ze' sũhmeeçxawa, adx mjĩinisaçxáatxwa uyçxa', Tata yakh ũssaçxak txã'wẽ ewsatx mjĩ' sũhna mneeyũuwe.
Isath we'we', adxna ũuste jxpa'gasa' adx na'wẽy mjĩiya' ãjatxna. Nawa txã'wẽçxáamée, adx mjĩinite jxthaakwe wala mjĩiya' ãjatxna, txã'wẽ ãjakahníiçxáa adxa' u'jweçthu Tata tasxna.
Sa' i'kwe'sxa' Tata's kĩh pẽywa'j ji'phçxawa, adxa's pẽyine'kwe aça' adxa' i'kwe'sx pẽyni's jxuka kxtey yu'nja, kxah Nçxi'kpa'gate Tata weçxani yuuna.
Na'jĩ'th na': adxa's kĩh pẽjxtewa jxuka kxtey yu'nja.
I'kwe'sxa' adxa's peeygãjaççxa', adx jxkaahnitxi' nwẽese'jna kxtey myuuwe.
Aça' adx Tata's i'kwe'sx pa'gate neewe'we'nja, i'kwe'sxtxi pu'çxwa'jsa teeçx adx na'wẽysa's kaakhan. Txã' Dxus Espiritu isasaçxá's kaajiyu'jsa' txã' bagaçxtewa i'kwe'sx yakh nes yuuna.

Naa kiwetewe'sxa' txãa Espiritu's uyya' ãjameeçxa' jiyuya'wa ãjameetxna, txãasa jxpa'gaya'wa ãjameetxna. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' jii yã'ji'kwe, txãa Espiritu i'kwe'sx yakh ũstewa, sa' bagaçxtewa txutemée nes yuuna.
I'kwe'sxçxáatx nvxihtxa'wameeth. Ki' sxawedu'nja i'kwe'sx yakh ũsya'.
Naajũ' txaçxmeynaçxáa nasa' adxa's peena yu' uymeetxna. Nawa adxa' uuwa'jsameeth, txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxwa uuwa'jsameei'kwe, txãasa i'kwe'sx yu' adxa's uyuune'kwe.
Txajũ txãa ente ew jiyune'kwe adxa' Tata yakh nes yuusatewa, naapkaçxha' i'kwe'sxa' adx yakhi'kwe nes yu' aça' adxa' i'kwe'sx yakhthu nes yu'.

Adx jxkaahnitx nwẽese'jna kxtey yuuna fxi'zesa' adxa's isa ũusuh jxuka yaakxsaçxa txã'wẽ yuutxna. Aça' adx Tata' txã'wẽ yũusatxi' peeygãjana, aça' adxwa txã'wẽ yũusatxi' peeygãhçxa ãate vxyaana nes yu'nja.
Txã'jĩte', Judas Iskariotemée, vxite Judasa' na'wẽk pẽjx:
—Jxpe'jsa, ¿kĩh yuuçxa kwe'sxçxáatx ãate vxyaaçxa', vxite nasa naa kiwetewe'sx yuutxi' vxyaamée yuuki'g? jĩte',
Jesus pasçxa':
—Adxa's ũusuh jxuka yaakxsa' adx jxkaahnitx nwẽese'jna kxteytxi yu'. Aça' txã'wẽ yũusatxi' adx Tata' peeygãja'k. Aça' txã'wẽ nwẽese'jsa yakh yu' nes yu'nja'w Tata yakh.
Nawa adx jxkaahnitx nwẽese'jsame', adxa's yaakxsameeçxa txã'wẽ yuuna. Na'wẽ adx kaapiya'jnitx wẽse'ji'kwe txã' adxçxáa kaapiya'jnimeeta'. Adx Tata kaapiya'jnita'.
I'kwe'sx yakh nee ũsíi na'wẽ pta'sxiçthu.
Nawa Dxus Espiritu's Tata' kajana adx na'wẽy i'kwe'sxtxi pu'çxna ũskahn txã' jxuka kaapiya'jana. Sa' na'wẽ kĩhwa pta'sxthu txãatxi'sa' jxuka kaayaki'jina.

I'kwe'sx ũuste wẽt yajkxna fxi'zewa'ja's peesuçthu. Naa kiwete wẽt fxi'zewa'ja's nasa ũsu'tx txã'wẽsaçxá's peesuçmeeth. Adx ma'wẽtka ũuste wẽtçxáa yajkxna fxi'ze' txã's i'kwe'sxtxi peesuçthu. Txãa pa'ga fxĩikãhna ũukhmée meswe.
U'jçxa ki' sxawedu'nja i'kwe'sx yakh ũsya' jĩni's wẽse'jyã'ji'kwe na', adxna isa wedxdxihçxa', weçxweçxa yaakine'kwe, txãa pa'gatey adxte jxthaakwesa adx Tata tasxna u'jweçthu naa pa'ga.
Dxiikhẽy pta'sxiçthu, kxah adx pta'sxni kxtey yuuna pa'the', isa yuh pta'sxi'ga sũjune'kwe.
I'kwe'sx yakh jwee yu' we'wena ũsya' ãjame'nja, txãa pa'gatey naa kiwete jxkaahna ũssa eçxthẽ'ja' adxa's kĩhwa yũuya' ãjane'jmeeçxawa, yuja'.
Makwe ãjane'jmeeçxawa kxtey yuuna, kxah naa kiwete nasa jxukaysa jiyutxna, adx Tata's nwẽese'jçxa txajx jxkaahni's kxtey yuusatewa.
Txã'jĩna jxã'jçxa', kiiteçxa ayjxu u'jwega jĩk.
Adxíi ũ'tasx na'wẽsath, aça' adx Tata' txãa tasxa's pheu'jsa na'wẽsa'.
Ku'ta yũnsameetxi' spẽ'the'k, nawa ku'ta yũnsatxi' sũupi'jna pheu'ju'k jxthaakwe yũnkahn.
I'kwe'sxa' pheu'jniyã'j ũsi'kwe adx kaapiya'jni's nwẽese'pha'ga.

Adx yakh txutemée meswe, adxwa ma'wẽ i'kwe'sx yakh txutemée ũstka txã'wẽy. I'kwe'sxa' peekx jii i'kwe: ku'ta çxpiteçxa ũssa' yũnu'çme'. Txã'wẽy i'kwe'sxwa adx yakh txuteeçxa ũsçxa', Dxus dxi'pte selpiiya' ãjameene'kwe.

Adxa' ũ'tasx na'wẽsath aça' i'kwe'sxa' ũ'tasx ku'ta na'wẽsa i'kwe. Adx yakh txutemée ũsçxa', wala selpiine'kwe. Aça' adxwa i'kwe'sx yakh txutemée fxi'ze'nja. Adx yakhmée yu', i'kwe'sxa' kĩh yuhwa yũuya' ãjameene'kwe.
Aça' ũ'tasx ku'ta yũnsameetxi' ma'wẽga spẽethe'thçxa ya'kabu', txã'wẽy ya'yuuna adx tasxu txutesatxi'.
I'kwe'sxa' adx yakh txutemée fxi'zeçxa adx kaapiya'jni's peçxkanameeçxa', kĩhwa pẽyine'kwe, aça' ya'ũsuna.
Adx kaapiya'jni's nwẽese'jçxa' Dxus dxi'pte wala selpiiya' ãjane'kwe. Aça' txã'wẽ yũute', adx Tata's wala tuuthe'jni yuuna.
Adx Tata' adxa's wala peeygãja'k, aça' adxa' txã'wẽythu i'kwe'sxtxi peeygãja'. Aça' adx peeygãanijũ txutemée meswe.
Adx jxkaahnitx nwẽese'jçxa', adx peeygãaniteçxáa fxi'zene'kwe, adxwa ma'wẽtka Tata jxkaahnitx nwẽese'jçxa' txajx peeygãaniteçxáa fxi'ze' txã'wẽy.
Na'wẽth pta'sx kxah adx ma'wẽtka weçxweçxa yajkxna fxi'ze', i'kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy bagaçxwa weçxweçxa yajkxna fxi'zene'kwe.
Adxa' na'wẽth jxkaaja': adx ma'wẽtka i'kwe'sxtxi peeygãja', i'kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy puutx ya'peeygãhna mfxi'zewe.
Namiku's nwe'weya' sũhçxa peekx ĩtxi fxi'zeni's ivxiitunisaçxáa peeygãani yaase'.
I'kwe'sxa' isa adx namiku dxihçxa', adx jxkaahni's kxtey yuune'kwe.

Aça' txã'wẽ yũusatxi' peena yu' selpisáa jĩna kxsusme'nja. Selpisá' txajx patron kĩh yuuya'watewa jiiméek fxi'ze'. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' adx Tata we'wenitxi' jxuka jii i'kwe, txãa pa'ga adxna selpisáa i'kwe jĩna kxsusmée, adx namiku i'kwe jĩnaçxáa kxsuusu'nja.

I'kwe'sx khuẽ'y adxa's txhitxhmeei'kwe, wejxwa adxthu i'kwe'sxtxi txhitxh. Sa' i'kwe'sx mteewa u'jçxa Dxus dxi'pte selpiina fxi'zekahnthu neewe'we', aça' i'kwe'sx txã'wẽ Dxus dxi'pte selpiina u'juni' kxul yuumeena. Txã'wẽ yũusatxi' adx Tata' jxuka ũsuna kĩh pẽjxtewa, adxa's pi'kxçxa pẽjxte'.
Na'wẽ yũuwa'ja'sthu i'kwe'sxtxi jxkaaja': Puutx ya'peeygãhna mfxi'zewe.
Naa kiwetewe'sxa' adxa's nyafxkhẽytxi ahçe na' i'kwe'sxtxiwa txã'wẽyçxáa açetxna, nawa nxusmée meswe.

I'kwe'sxa' naa kiwetewe'sxwaça', nasa' wedxitxna, txãawe'sx pwe'sx ma'wẽta wedxi' txã'wẽy. Nawa adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi txhitxthu naa kiwejũ, txãa pa'gatx naa kiwetewe'sxa' i'kwe'sxtxi açe', naa kiwetewe'sxmée yã'ji'kwe naa pa'ga.

Miiyajkxwe adx na'jĩna we'weni's: Maawa selpisá' txajx patronte jxthaakwesame' jĩni's. Adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsath na's yuhwa ikhya' pakwe'tx na' i'kwe'sxtxiwa txã'wẽyçxáa ikhya' pakweetxna. Sa' adx kaapiya'jni's nwẽese'jsa', i'kwe'sx kaapiya'jni'swa nwẽese'jetxna.
Adx pa'gaçxáa i'kwe'sxtxi pkxuutxna, adxna kaahsa's jiyumeeçxa.
Dxus jxkaahni's adx pta'sxya' kĩhmeewaça', txãawe'sxa' yuuwemeesa yuutxna. Nawa ãçxha' adx pta'sxni's jiyutx na' yuuwemeetha'w jĩya' ãjameetxna.
Adxna açesa' adx Tatanawa açesata'.

Txãawe'sx ksxavxysu kim yuhwa vxit-ya' ãjanimeesa's adx kaavxya'ja'jmeewaça', yuuwemeesa yuutxna. Nawa makwe txã'wẽ adx ãjani's kaavxya'ja'the uyçxawa, adxna açe'tx. Aça' adxna açesayã'j yu' adx Tatanawa açesata'.
Nawa txãawe'sx leyte na'wẽ fxi'jni ũsa': adxna ahçetx kĩhwa yuuwemeetewa jĩ'k txã' kxtey yuukahntxi txã'wẽ yũ'.
Nawa i'kwe'sxtxi pu'çxwa'jsa Dxus Espiritu isa ew kaajiyu'jwa'jsa's adx Tata tasxu kaja'nja txã' adx kimtewa ew kaajiyu'juna.
Aça' i'kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy adx kimtewa pta'sxine'kwe, i'kwe'sxa' nyafxíi i'kwe adx yakh ũssa yu' naa pa'ga.
I'kwe'sxtxi pkxuute', nxusna wala kuh yaakxkahmen na'wẽ pta'sxiçthu:
ahçeçxa judiuwe'sx pkhaakhenijũ kutxi'jçxa peena yu' jxpa'gameetxna i'kwe'sxtxi. Sa' txã'wẽçxáa yũumée i'kwe'sx maaíitxi' ikhetxna, nawa txãawe'sx yu' Dxusa's selpiina ũstha'w sũhna txã'wẽ yũutxna.
Txãa açesawe'sxa' adx Tata's jiimeeta', sa' adxnawa jiimeeta', txãasa txã'wẽ pkxuutxna.
Aça' kxahth yaçkhẽy txã'wẽ pta'sxi' na' txã'wẽ yũuwa'j en ãhte', adx pta'sxni's yaakine'kwe.
Txã'wẽ pkxuuwa'ja's nyafxíi yu' pta'sxmeeth, txãa pa'gatey kĩhwa meek yu' adx i'kwe'sx yakh ũste'.
Nawa ãçxha' adxna kaahsa tasxte u'jweçthu. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' maa yuhwa pẽyi'çmeei'kwe ¿mtee u'jweçga? jĩna.
Txã'wẽ pẽjxmeeçxa ĩ'neeçxáa i'kwe wala nxusu', adx u'jweçthu jĩna pta'sxte'.
Nawa isath pta'sxi': adx u'jmeete', i'kwe'sxtxi pu'çxwa'jsa' kĩhmeena. Nawa adx u'jçxa', txã's kaja'nja. Txãa pa'ga pejka u'jwa'j yuh ji'pthu, i'kwe'sxtxi pu'çxwa'jsa's kaajxa'.

Aça' txã' naa kiwete kĩhçxa', nasatx Dxus dxi'pte yuuwe pkalsa yuhtha'w sũhwa'ja's kaaũusuthe'jena. Sa' Jesusa' kĩhte yuhwa yuuwemée ewsa maatxwa jxuka nwe'wewa'jsa yuh yu'ga sũhwa'ja'swa ew kaajiyu'juna. Txã'wẽy yuuwesatxi' Dxusa' ewmeete yuh nvxiituna sũhwa'ja'swa kaaũusuthe'jena.
Maawa adxa's jxpa'gaya' wa'lpa'ga txã'wẽ pkal yuuwesata'.
Adxa' maatxwa jxuka nwe'wewa'jsaçxaíi nwe'wewa'ja's vxitna uuçxa adx Tata tasxna u'the', peena yu' uymeene'kwe.
Sa' yuuwesa' ewmeete neeyũuwa'jsane'tka'w sũjkahníi naa kiwete jxkaahna ũssa eçxthẽ'j yuja'swa ewmeete yã'kh nvxiitni yuu.
I'kwe'sxtxi wala pta'sxwa'j ji'phíiçxáath, nawa ãçxhíi yu' ew jiyuya' ãjameene'kwe.

Nawa Dxus Espiritu kĩhçxa', txãa ente i'kwe'sxtxi' jxuka ew kaajiyu'juna, txã' isa we'wenisaçxá's kaajiyu'jsa'. Txã' peekxçxáa we'wemée, Dxus kwe'we'jniçxá's pta'sxina, sa' kĩh yuuya'watewa dxiikhẽy kaajiyu'juna.
Adx ma'wẽsatewa ew jiia' na' txãasa i'kwe'sxtxiwa kaajiyu'juna, adxa's tuuthe'jsa' naa pa'ga.
Adx Tata ma'wẽsate', adxwa txã'wẽysa íiçxáath. Txãa pa'ga Espiritu' adx ma'wẽsatewa wejx ew kaajiyu'juna jĩnath pta'sxi'.
Ãçxha' adx Tata tasxna u'jwa'j ãjãça', aça' adxa's uymeene'kwe. Nawa vxite enkhẽ' adxa's ki' uyuune'kwe.
Txã'jĩte', txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' na'wẽtx puutx ya'paapẽyi':
—¿Ma'jĩçxaki'k txã'wẽ we'we'? Ãçxha' adx Tata tasxna u'jwa'j ãjaça', aça' adxa's uymeene'kwe. Nawa vxite enkhẽ' ki' uyuune'kwe jĩ'k sa',
¿kĩh we'weçxaki'k adx u'jwa'j ãjaça' jĩna we'we'? nawa kwe'sxa' jiyu'çmeetha'w.
Txã'wẽ jiyuwẽena ũsni's Jesusa' jiyuçxa' pta'sxku:
—Adx Tata tasxna u'jwa'j ãjaça', aça' adxa's uymeene'kwe. Nawa vxite enkhẽ' ki' uyuune'kwe jĩnath we'we aça' ¿txã'sna wá'kwe i'kwe'sx pwe'sx jiyu wẽena puutx paapẽyi'?
Isath we'we': I'kwe'sxa' nxusna ũ'nene'kwe, aça' naa kiwete nasa yu' wala weçxaatxna. Nawa i'kwe'sxa' makwe nxusna ũsçxawa, nxusu en skhẽwte', weçxweçxa neeyũune'kwe.
Na's mjiyuwe: U'ywa nasa upxya'wate ãça'aççxa', wala pxthaa yu'k akate. Nawa luuçx upxte', weçxaweete txãa aka yuuni's peçxkana'k.
Txã'wẽy i'kwe'sxwa ãçxhíi yu' nxusu'i'kwe. Nawa adxa's ki' uyçxa', weçxweçxa yajkxna neeyũune'kwe. Aça' i'kwe'sx weçxweçxa yaakxni's kim yuhwa kusa'jya' ãjameena.
Txã'wẽ adxa's ki' uyniijũ', txajũyã'ja' jxuka jiisa adxa's paapẽywa'j ji'phumeene'kwe. Nawa adx Tata yu'sa' kĩhwa jxuka pẽjxya' ãjãne'kwe adxa's pi'kxçxa, aça' txã' jxuka ũsuna.
Nawa i'kwe'sxa' ãçxh pa'jwa adx Tata's kĩh yuhwa pẽynimée i'kwe adxa's pi'kxçxa. Mpẽjxwe wakx, sa' jxpa'gaçxa' wala weçxaane'kwe.
Ejemplo yakhçxáath kaaja'da'jna pta'sx i'kwe'sx jiyukahn. Nawa ãate pta'sxwa'j en ãhte', peena yu' ejemplo yakh kaaja'da'jna pta'sxme'nja, wejxwa teehwed ãateçxaçxáa pta'sxi'nja adx Tata ma'wẽsatewa.
Txã'wẽ ãate pta'sxwa'j en ãhte', i'kwe'sx yuu adx Tata's pẽjxya' ãjane'kwe, makwe adx yu' i'kwe'sx pa'gate we'we pu'çxmeetewa.
I'kwe'sxa' adxa's wedxçxa jxpa'gai'kwe, Dxus tasxu yuusana sũhna. Txãa pa'gak adx Tata' i'kwe'sxtxi peeygãja'.
Adxa' Tata tasxu kasehçxa, naa kiwete yuwe'th, sa' ãçxha' naa kiwe's nvxihtçxa ki' u'jweçthu adx Tata tasxna jĩte',
txãa yakh u'jusawe'sxa' na'jĩtx:
—Ãçxh yuuçxa' ejemplo yakh kaaja'da'jmée, teehwed ãate pta'sxna ũsgu.
Ãçxha' jiyutha'w, idxa' kĩhnawa jxuka jiig. Txãa pa'gatha'w ew jiyu Dxus tasxu yuusatewa. Txãasa kim yuhwa idxa's paapẽywa'j ji'phmeeta' jĩte',
Jesusa':
—¿Ãçxha' jiyu'kwe'? jĩnak we'we.
Ãçxha' ena' ãjk, aça' ãçxhíi i'kwe'sxa' teeçxsa na'wẽçxah fxiifxii txuteene'kwe, sa' adxçxáana nvxiitune'kwe. Nawa adxçxáa yu' neeyũume'nja, Tata' adx yakh ũsa' naa pa'ga.

Txã'wẽth adx yakh fxi'zewa'ja's jxuka pta'sxi', kxah adxa's neewe'weçxa', ũukhmée wẽtwẽt yaakine'kwe. Naa kiwete' thẽyte nxuste fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phune'kwe. Nawa adxa's çxhãçxha miiyajkxwe, txãa pa'gatey naa kiwete ewmeesa's adxa' knayyã'th naa pa'ga jĩk.
Jesusa' txã'wẽ pta'sxna jxã'jçxa', cielute pagayçxa Dxus yakh puutx we'wek na'jĩna:
—Tata, ena' ãjk. Iidx Nçxi'k kimtewa nasa jiyukahn ãate mkaavxya'ja', kxah Nçxi'kwa idxa's ãate kaajiyu'juna nasatx.
Nasa jxukaysatx jxkaahwa'ja's adxna ũsgu, iidx ũsni yuutxi' jxukaysatx pçuwa'jmée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ũskahn.
Aça' pçuwa'jmée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phu wẽeçxa', teeçx Dxusçxáa ũsgu txã'sna jiyuwa'j ji'phta', sa' txã'wẽy iidx kaahnisa Jesukristo'swa jiyuwa'j ji'phta'.
