Txajũ' peeswa'ja's pkhakhçxa kaahtx Bernabé Saulo yakh Judeate ancianowe'sxtxi dukhkahn.
Txãn ensu' jxkaahsa Herodesa' pkxuuya' yajkxku Dxus yakh fxi'zesatx.
Sa' kçxilxuh kiikhe'kh Juan nyakh Jakobo's.
Txã'wẽ yũute' Jakobowe'sxtxi açesa judiuwe'sxa' weçxatx jxkaahsa Herodesa's, aça' Pedronawa preesu'khaakh kiikhe'jya'. Pan lewadura ji'phmée ũ'wa'j fxiesta entek txã'wẽ yũu.

Herodesa' Pedro's preesu tudçxa' karcelte ktxaaja'kh. Kuste pahz us yu'pthehna pe'tewa'jsa soldau txajk, yu'ptheh iisa pahz pahz yujukahn. Paskua fxiesta en skhẽwte nasaa ksxavxyte kutxi'jya' sũhçxak txã'wẽ yũu.
Aça' Pedro' karcelte wala ew yupni ũsu'k, nawa Dxus yakh fxi'zesawe'sx yu' Dxus yakh pu'vxituméetx puutx we'wena ũsu' Pedro pa'gate.
Herodesa' Pedro's nasaa ksxavxyte kutxi'jwa'j en ãjaçte', txãa kuste Pedro' dejk e'z soldau pxãhte, e'z kadenaju tudni. Naapkaçxha' vxite e'z soldau yu' karcel vxitxtetx yupna ũsu'.
Txãa dudte Dxus angel vxyaaçxáa yuute', karcelte jxuka eena'k kweeth. Txajũ' angela' na'jĩnak tu'kakana Pedro's fxĩtx:
—Dud yuh mkiite jĩçpkaçxha', çam kadena' çxukwetetx Pedro kuseju.
Aça' ki' we'wek txãa angela':
—Iidx jxtudni's ya'jytudçxa, pelgatxi's mpaath jĩte', Pedro' txã'wẽy yũuk. Txajũ' txãa angela' ki' we'wek:
—Atxha's jxkaaççxa myuh adx e'stey jĩte',
Pedro' angel e'stey kasejk, isa angela' eka kutxi'jiçtewa ksxa'wnawáa ũsne'tka sũhnaçxáa yajkxna.

Nawa nyafx vxitxte soldau yupna ũsnite skhẽwçxa', e'ste vxitxte soldau yupna ũsnitewa skhẽwtxi. Sa' eka kasehwa'j çam vxitxte sẽjeçpkaçxha', txãa vxitxa' peekxçxáa phaatek. Aça' kasehçxa u'jtx klxiikhunsu. Txajũ' angela' Pedroçxáana nvxihtçxa u'kh.
Txajũ' Pedro' naasũjk: Ksxa'wnimeega yu', isa Dxusne' txajx angela's kaah Herodes kuseju adxa's nwe'weya', vxite' judiuwe'sxwa nakwe wala ewmée yũuya' ũythasu'tx txãaju nwe'wekahn sũhnak yajkx.
Pedro' txã'wẽ ew jiyuçxa' u'kh Juan Markos njĩ'j Maria yatna. Kxte' wala kuh pkhaakheçxa Pedro pa'gate Dxusa's neewe'wenatx ũsu'.
Kxte kũhçxa vxitxte uka'kate', teeçx luuçx u'y Rode yaasesak thegya' kaseh.
Nawa Pedro we'weni's jiyuçxa', vxitxa's phaademée weçxana ki' sxawedku dxiigay wuwuuçxáa:
—Pedro' vxitxte ũsa' jĩna pta'sxya'.
Aça' na'jĩnatx we'we:
—Luuku we'wena ũsi'çxa jĩtewa:
—Ĩsxiija'çmeeth, isa yuja' jĩte':
—Pedromée, txãa yakh pi'kxna u'jusa angelçxáana jĩtx.
Txã'wẽtewa, Pedro yu' vxitxte uka'kana nesku yu'. Aça' vxitxa's phaadeya' u'jçxa', Pedro's uyçxa wala kuh yajkxtxi.
Nawa sxuuna' yuukahn Pedro' kuseju pta'sxçxa', Dxus ma'wẽ karceluh nwe'weni's jxuka pta'sxku. Sa':
—Jakobo vxite' kwe'sx yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi mpeeta'sxwe txã'jĩna'wa, txãa yu' kasehna u'kh vxite ahte.
Kuskuuskhẽ khikhynite', wala kuh yajkxna ũukhtxi soldauwe'sxa' txã'wẽ Pedro ma'wẽ yũutewa jiyumeeçxa.
Txajũ' jxkaahsa Herodesa' pakweya' kaakh, nawa uymeete' kxte karcelte thegsa soldautxku ikh kaah. Txãa e'suçxáa Herodesa' Judea kiweju kasehçxa Cesarea kiwetek u'pxa' u'j.

Herodesa' wala puiina ũsu'k Tiro Sidón kiwete nasa yakh. Txãa pa'gatx txãa nasa' Herodes tasxte mjĩisa Blasto yaasesa's vxyu dukhçxa txãa yakh u'j jxkaahsa tasxte utxaaçxa puiimée fxi'zewa'ja's puutx we'weya'. Txã'wẽ yũumeete', txãa nasa' jxkaahsa kiwejuçxáatx ũ'a's jxpa'gana fxi'zesa yu'.
Aça' jxkaahsa Herodesa' pta'sxku kĩh ente txajx tasxte utxaawa'ja'swa. Sa' txãa en ãhte', Herodesa' jxkaahsa athni ropatx athçxa txajx u'pnite kaçxçxa we'wek.
Txajũ' nasa' na'jĩnatx weçxana sus we'we:
—Na'wẽ we'wesa' naa kiwete nasamée, Dxusa' jĩçpkaçxha',
txãa dudtey Dxus angela' akasa ũsku Herodesa's, aça' jxuka wes ũ'te' uuk, txã'wẽ nasaa weçxani's weçxana yaakxpa'ga.
Nawa Dxus yuwe yu' jweeíiçxáak walaana u'j mtee mteewa pta'sxni.
Txajũ' Bernabé Saulowe'sxa' mjĩia's jxã'jçxa Jerusalenuh ki' sxawedtxi Juan Markosa's pe'jçxa.

Antiokía çxhabte pkhaakhena ũssa yakh ũsu'tx Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa vxite' Dxus leya's jiisawa: Bernabé, vxite' khũçx Simon jĩnisa, vxite' Lucio Cirene çxhabuwe'sx, vxite' Manaén Galileate jxkaahsa Herodes yakh ih walaasáa, vxite' Saulo'.
Txãawe'sxa' teeçx ente' Dxusna selpiina yũunaana ũste', Dxus Espiritu' na'wẽk we'we:
—Saulo Bernabé yakh mkaahwe adxa's selpikahn, txãawe'sxa' adx pa'yanisata' mjĩiwa'jsa jĩk.
Txajũ' yũunaana jxã'jçxa', txãawe'sx dxikthesu peekizeçxa Dxusna neewe'wena' kaahtx.
Dxus Espiritu kaathe', Bernabé Saulowe'sxa' Seleucia çxhabna u'jçxa txajũ' barkote khẽeçxa ĩkh pxãhte Çxipre kiwentxi u'j.
Txãa kiwete Salamina çxhabte pa'jçxa', judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yat-su Dxus yuwe's pta'sxya' takhtxi. Sa' Juan Markosnawa iipe'jtx yu' pu'çxwa'jsa.
Çxipre kiwe's pekũhna jxã'jaççxa', Pafxos çxhabtetx pa'j. Sa' kxte' teeçx judiu dxijxuusáa Barjesus yaasesa'stxi uy. Txãa piçthẽ'ja' wala ĩsxiisa yu'k Dxus yuwe pta'sxsath jĩna ĩsxiina.
Txãa dxijxuusá' kxte ne'jwe'sx wala jiisa Sergio Paulo tasxte mjĩisak yu'. Txãa ne'jwe'sxa' Dxus yuwe's wẽse'j wẽeçxa Bernabewe'sxtxi pa'yak.
Nawa txãa dxijxuusáa Elimasa' Bernabewe'sxtxi' kwe'we'j wẽeme', ne'jwe'sxa' Dxus yuwe's jiyukahmen.
Txã'wẽ yũute', Dxus Espiritu's ũuste jxuka ji'phsa Saulo Pablo yaasesa' dxijxuusáa dxi'pte ũusçxa thegçxa', na'jĩk:
—Ĩsxiina fxi'zesa, ewmeesa, eçxthẽ'j luuçx, ewsa yu'sa' jxuka ahçena fxi'zesa ¿mjĩitega Dxus yuwe ewsa's yupmée fxi'ze'çmée?
Txãa pa'ga Dxusa' idxa's ãçxhíi kastigaĩna, aça' uyya' ãjamée fxi'zene'ga naa ensu' jĩçpkaçxha', txãa dudtey uyya' ãjameeçxa' maaçxáatxwa pakwek pu'kisçxa pe'jna u'khan.
Txajũ' kxte ne'jwe'sxa' txã'wẽ yũuni's uyçxa', Jesus kaapiya'jni's isa yuhna sũhna ũuste jxpa'gak.
Pablo vxite' txãa yakh pi'kxna u'jusa yã'jçxa barkote khẽeçxa Pafxos çxhabu kasehtx Panfxilia kiwete Perge çxhabte pa'jya'. Nawa Juan Markos yu' Perge çxhabte pa'jçxaçxáa ki' sxawedku Jerusalennay.
Pablowe'sxa' Perge çxhabu kasehçxa Pisidia kiwete Antiokía çxhabnatx u'j. Kxte pa'jçxa', jxkaase ensu' judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatte u'katx.
Aça' pkhaakheni yatte npiiçthẽ'ja' Dxus ley vxite' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa fxi'jni's lẽeyna jxã'jçxa', na'wẽtx we'we:
—Yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, kĩh we'wewa'j ji'phçxa', myu'kxpehwe nasatx ãçxhíi jĩte',
Pablo' kiitena'wa kuseju sxuuna' yuuwa'ja's pta'sxna'wa we'wek:
—Israel ji'jwe'sx, vxite nasawa Dxusna nwẽese'jsa, jxpa'yakx mwẽese'jwe:
Israelwe'sx Dxusa' kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxtxi txhitxhçxa wala kpeena'kh Egipto kiwete nee ũsiyna, sa' txãa kiwejũ kutxi'kh kĩhwa seena'sa kaavxya'ja'jçxa.
Dxusa' nasa u'pnimée kiwete kuarenta anxu wantãyku nasa ãhmée yũuna fxi'ze'çtewa.
Sa' Kanaan kiwete nasatx jxuka ivxiituk txãa kiwe's kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxtxi ũsya'.
Txajũ' kuatrocientos cinkwenta anxu ãhpkaçx jxkaahwa'jsa ji'phmée kwe'sxtxi thegwa'jsa khuẽsçxáak nvxiht, Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Samwel entepkaçx.
Txajũtx txãawe'sxíi pẽjx teeçx jxkaahwa'jsa, aça' Dxusa' ũsku kuarenta anxu jxkaahwa'jsa Cis nçxi'k Saul yaasesa's. Txãa piçthẽ'ja' Benjamin ji'kh yu'.
Txãa e'su' Dxusíi Saula's jxkaahnijũ kutxi'jçxa, Davxida'sku jxkaahwa'jsa ki'p. Sa' na'wẽk we'we: Isaí nçxi'k Davxid yuuçxáa adx jxkaahni's kxtey yuuwa'jsa uythu txã' adx wedxnisa' jĩk.
Jesusa' Davxid ji'thewe'sxku yu', aça' txã'snak Dxusa' nvxiht Israelwe'sxtxi nwe'wewa'jsa, nyafxiitey Dxusa' ma'wẽne' ũsya' neeyũu txã'sa' kxtey yuuk.
Jesus pa'jmeyna Juana' Israel nasa jxukaysatx pta'sxku: I'kwe'sx pkaltxi jxuka nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte misxawedwe yu'te ya'bautisãyna jĩna.
Sa' Juana' txajx uu en utxaaçte', na'wẽk we'we: Adxa' i'kwe'sx ũythasu'i'kwe txãameeth. Adx e'ste teeçx yuja' txajx pelgatxi wesçxáa yuhnawa adxa' khihbxa' selpimeesath jĩk.
Yakhthẽ'jwe'sx Abrahan ji'j, vxite nasawa Dxusna nwẽese'jsa i'kwe'sx ewte neeyũuwa'ja's pta'sxnik yuu.

Nawa Jerusalente ũssa vxite' txãawe'sx npiiçthẽ'jsawa jiyumeeta' Jesusa' kimtewa. Sa' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa fxi'jni'swa jiyumeeta' pkhaakheni yat-su jxkaase een isa lẽeyçxawa. Sa' txãawe'sxíiçxáa Jesusa's ewmeete nvxihtçxa', Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa fxi'jni txãawe'sx lẽeyni's kxtey yuutx.
Txã'wẽ Jesus ewmée yũuni's uymeeçxawa Pilato's yuwe ũstxi Jesusa's kiikhe'khan.
Txajũ' Dxus librute ma'wẽne' fxi'jni ũsu' txã'sa' jxuka kxtey yuuçxa', Jesusa's kluusu spajkxçxa pedaatx.
Nawa Dxusa' uuniijũ ki' ĩtxi vxitku.
Aça' Jesusa' wala kuh en vxyaak Galileajuwe'sx Jerusalenna pi'kxna yuusatx. Txãasa txãawe'sxa' Jesus kimtewa pta'sxsata'.
Txãa pa'ga kwe'sxwa i'kwe'sxtxi pta'sxiçtha'w nyafxiitey kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxtxi Dxusa' ũsya' neeyũuk txã'sna.

Kwe'sxa' yaçgawe'sx ji'tha'w, txãa pa'gak Dxusa' txajx ũsya' neeyũuni's kwe'sx yakh kxtey yuuçxa, Jesusa's uuniijũwa ĩtxi vxit, salmo doste na'wẽ fxi'jni ũsa' txã'wẽy: Idxa' adx nçxi'kgu. Aça' idxa's uuniijũwa ĩtxi vxitthu ãçxha' jĩk.
Uute' txãa kakwe' suweekahmen ĩtxi yuuwa'ja's Dxusa' pta'sxku txajx librute na'jĩna: I'kwe'sxtxi peeygãawa'ja's Davxid yakh puutx we'weth txã'sa' kxtey yu'nja jĩk.
Txãasak salmo vxite ajkhẽwa na'jĩ': Idxna selpisáa peeygãanisa kakwe's nvxihtmeene'ga suweewe'sxte jĩ'k.
Txã'wẽ we'weni' isa kxtey yuuyujk. Txajíik Davxida' txãn ensu' Dxus jxkaahni's kxtey yuuçxa e'su' uuk, aça' txajx kakwe's yaçgawe'sx pedaniitey pedaate', txajx kakwe' kxtee jxuka pçuuk.
Nawa Dxusa' Jesusa's uuniijũwa ĩtxi vxitku, aça' txãa kakwe' pçuume'.
Ãçxha' yakhthẽ'jwe'sx i'kwe'sxa' mjiyuwe: I'kwe'sx pkaltxi peltunãywa'ja's pta'sxi'tha'w, nawa peltunãywa'jsa' Jesus yuuçxá'.
Nyafxíi Moises leya's nwẽese'jçxawa, perdona's uymeei'kwe. Nawa Jesusna yajkxçxa nwẽese'jçxa', perdona's uyuune'kwe maawa.
Mpa'yajkxwe, txã'wẽme', nyafxíi Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa na'wẽ we'wetx txã' kxtey yuuwe'sxta':
Weeçxsawe'sx, mpa'yajkxwe. I'kwe'sx vxituwa'ja's mũukhwe.
Txã'wẽme', adxíi Dxusthu na',
Txã'wẽ yũuwa'j en ãhte', kĩhwa seena'çxáa yu'nja.
Txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's pta'sxtewa, i'kwe'sxa' jxpa'gameene'kwe jĩnatx we'we jĩk Pablo'.

Txajũ' Pablo' txã'wẽ pta'sxçxa', txãa yakh pi'kxna u'jusa yakh judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatu kasejeçte', kxte ũssa judiu ji'jmeeçxawa Pablowe'sxtxi ki' pi'kxtxi vxite jxkaase ente txã'wẽy pta'sxya' yuukahn.

Kxte pkhaakheni pçuute', judiuwe'sx wala kuhsa vxite' judiu ji'jmeeçxawa judiuwe'sx kaapiya'jni's jxpa'gasa Dxus yuwe's wala ew nwẽese'jçxa', Pablowe'sx kaapiya'jni's nwẽese'jsatx yuu. Aça' Pablowe'sxa' wala yu'kxpehtx Dxus peeygãanite wa'lmée fxi'zekahn.
Vxite ki'su jxkaase ente', çxhabte nasa jxukay pkhaakhetx Dxus yuwe's wẽse'jya'.
Nawa txã'wẽ nasa wala pkhaakhete', kxte judiuwe'sxa' wala ũusaçxaçxa Pablowe'sxtxi açewe'wena wẽesxutx.
Txã'wẽtewa, Pablowe'sxa' ũukhmeetx na'jĩna we'we:
—Dxus yuwe's nyafxte i'kwe'sx judiu ji'j khuẽ'ytxi pta'sxwa'kh yu', kxahtha'w pta'sx. Nawa jxpa'gameeyã'ji'kwe pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's, aça' ãçxha' u'jweçtha'w judiumée vxite nasatx pta'sxya'.
Dxusa' kwe'sxtxi na'wẽk we'wena kaah:
Nasa ksxavxysu eena' kweethwa'jsath nvxiht i'kwe'sxtxi',
Sa' txã'wẽy maa kiwetewa ewsa's pta'sxwa'jsa jĩk.
Aça' judiu ji'jmée vxite nasa txã'jĩni's wẽse'jçxa', Dxus yuwe' wala ewsa yu'ga jĩna weçxaçxa maaçxahne'ta bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'jsa yu' txãa yu' jxukay Dxus yuwe's jxpa'gatx.
Txã'wẽk Dxus yuwe's pta'sxni yuu txãa kiwete jxuka.
Nawa txãa çxhabte judiuwe'sxa' nasa jxtuhthesa petx u'y yã'jçxa kxteeçxah puutx we'weçxa, Pablowe'sxtxi pkxuuya' yajkxtxi txãa kiwejũ kutxi'phkaçx.
Txã'wẽ yũute', Pablowe'sxa' txãawe'sx çxidate kiwe tuhda's sakweekweçxa u'jtx Ikonio çxhabna.
Nawa kxte nasa Dxus yuwe's nwẽese'jsa yu', wala weçxana neeyũutx, Dxus Espiritu's ũuste jxpa'gaçxa.
Pablowe'sxa' Ikonio çxhabte pa'jçxa', judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatte u'kaçxa, Dxus yuwe zhiçxkwesa's pta'sxte', wala jxpa'gatx judiuwe'sx vxite' judiuwe'sxmeesawa.
Nawa judiuwe'sx Jesus kaapiya'jni's açesa yu' judiu ji'jmée vxite nasatx ewmée yu'txwe'weçxa yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi açeyaakxwa'ja's vxittxi.

Txã'wẽ açepa'gaíiçxáatx Pablowe'sxa' jweeíiçxáa kxte txaçx ũsu', Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhna ũukhmée pta'sxna. Aça' Pablowe'sx txã'wẽ Dxus peeygãani's pta'sxte', Dxusa' kxte nasa wẽse'jsa yuutxi' ewku kaajiyu'j Pablowe'sxtxi kĩhwa seena'sa's kaavxya'ja'jya' ãjawa'ja's ũsçxa.
Aça' txãa çxhabtewe'sxa' txuteetx, vxite' judiu açesawe'sx ju'gu, vxite' Pablowe'sx ju'gu.
Txajũ' judiuwe'sx vxite' judiuwe'sxmeesawa khuẽswe'sx yakh puutx we'wetx Pablowe'sxtxi wẽesxuna kwet wãatatahçxa ikhya'.
Nawa Pablowe'sx jiyuçxa', ũphna u'jtx Likaonia kiwete Listra Derbe çxhabna kxsũ jxuka pekũhçxa
Dxus yuwe ewte nvxiitwa'jsa's pta'sxya'.
Sa' Listra çxhabte pa'the', kxte' teeçx piçthẽ'j çxida ãça'sak u'pu'. Txã' upxhíi txã'wẽ yã'kh yu', sa' bagaçxte yuhwa u'juya' ãjasameek yu'.
Txãa piçthẽ'ja' Pablo pta'sxni'sku wẽse'jna u'pu'. Aça' Pablo' txajx dxi'pte thegçxa' jiyuk nuykatxhina sũhni's.
Sa' susku we'we:
—Ku'le myuju jĩna. Naapkaçxha' txãa piçthẽ'ja' ũphçxa yujuna'wa ew yã'kh u'juya' ãja.
Pablo txã'wẽ yũuni's nasa uyçxa', na'wẽtx Likaonia yuweju weyna we'we:
—¡Nasa na'wẽ yuuçxa dxuswe'sx kwe'sx tasxte kĩhtx! jĩçxa',
Bernabea's Jupiter jĩnatx kxsusu', sa' Pablo's Merkurio jĩnatx we'we', wejx thaakwe we'wesa yuupa'ga.

Txãawe'sx dxus Jupiter jĩ'tx txã'sna neewe'wena ũsni yata' çxhab peeku'thek ũsu', aça' kxte selpisáa sacerdote' kla jxũna pa'kh kite zhiçxkwesa khyũ'jũ'jçxa. Aça' nasa' Pablowe'sxtxi weçxana peejxũkweçxa neewe'weya'watx yu' txãa klatx ikhna.
Nawa Pablowe'sx jiyuçxa' txã'wẽ yũute nxusçxa peekx athni ropatx sudena'wa nasaa ksxavxyte kũhçxa na'jĩnatx sus we'we:

—I'kwe'sxa' ¿kĩjxa'kwe txã'wẽ yũ'? Kwe'sxa' nasa i'kwe'sx na'wẽysa íiçxáatha'w. Sa' txã'wẽ yũuna fxi'zenisa' seelpimeesa' naa pa'ga nvxihtçxa Dxus ĩtxĩsa cielu's pheu'kh, kiwe, ĩkh wala kxte kĩhçxah ũstxna txãatx jxuka txã'snaçxáa selpiina neewe'wewa'ja' jĩna pta'sxya' yuusaçxáatha'w.
Txãa Dxusa' nyafxíi ensu' nasatxi' nvxihtku ma'wẽwa yũuna fxi'zekahn.
Nawa Dxus ũsyuhna sũjkahn kaajiyu'jna nesku yu', nus kaapa'ja'jna, uuthasxtxi ew kçxhãaçxha'jna, ũ'wa'ja's peejxmée peesna, wẽt fxi'zewa'ja'swa ũsna jĩnak pta'sx.
Txã'wẽ pta'sxçxak wala thẽyçxáawa pejka nasatx knay, txãawe'sxtxi weçxana kla ikhna peejxũkwekahmen.
Txãa e'su' judiuwe'sx Antiokía Ikonio çxhabuwe'sx pa'jçxa kxte nasatx ewmée yu'txwe'weçxa kwet wãatatahtx Pablo's. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa', uuyã'jne' sũhçxa wezxna u'jçxa çxhab ekahtx wãatãh.
Nawa kxteewe'sx Dxus yuwe's nwẽese'jsa yu', Pablo's thegya' u'the', Pablo' ki' ũus ji'phuçxa kiiteçxa ki' çxhabtey u'kak. Sa' vxite kuskuskhẽ' Bernabé yakh Derbe çxhabnatx u'j.
Derbe çxhabte pa'jçxa', Dxus yuwe ewte nvxiitwa'jsa's pta'sxçxa nasatx wala knaytxi Dxus jĩi. Txã'wẽ yũuçxatx sxawed Listra, Ikonio, Antiokía çxhabsu iipa'j.
Txãa çxhabsu pa'jçxa', Dxus yuwe's nwẽese'jsatx wala yu'kxpehtx Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite u'ka wẽeçxa' Dxus yakh txutemée fxi'zewa'ja', makwe pxthaa nxuswa'j en pa'thewa jĩna.
Sa' kxsũ pkhaakhena ũsnisu jxkaahwa'jsa ancianowa pakweçxa ki'ptxi. Txã'wẽ yũuçxatx yũunaaçxa Dxus kusete neewe'weçxa nvxiht.
Txajũ u'jçxa', Pisidia kiwesu skhẽwçxa Panfxilia kiwetetx pa'j.
Txãa kiwete Perge çxhabte Dxus yuwe's pta'sxçxa Atalia çxhabnatx u'j.
Txajũ' barkote khẽeçxa u'jtx Antiokía çxhabna, majũne'ta Dxus kusete neewe'weçxa mjĩiya' kaahnisa yuu txãa çxhabnay.
Antiokía çxhabte pa'jçxa', kxte pkhaakhena ũssa yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi pta'sxtxi Dxus ma'wẽne' txãawe'sxtxi pu'çxçxa judiu ji'jmée vxite nasatxwa Dxus yuwe's kaajiyu'j txã'sna.
Sa' Pablowe'sxa' kxte wala txaçx ũsu'tx Dxus yuwe's nwẽese'jsawe'sx yakh.

Txãa e'su' Judeajuwe'sx judiu Antiokía çxhabte pa'jçxa kxteewe'sxtxi na'wẽtx kaapiya'jna ũsu': Ya'cirkuncidãywa'j ji'phi'kwe Moises jxkaahni's kxtey yuuna. Txã'wẽ yũumeeçxa', ewte neeyũuya' ãjameene'kwe jĩna.

Aça' txã'wẽ kaapiya'the', Pablowe'sxa' wala juuna' puutx we'wetx txã'wẽ pta'sxsa yakh. Txajũ' kxte pkhaakhena ũssa yakhthẽ'jwe'sxa' Pablowe'sxtxi vxite kaapi'ki'jçxa Jerusalenna kaahtx Jesus jxkaahnisawe'sx vxite' anciano kxteewe'sx yakh txãa yuwe's paapẽjxna puutx we'wekahn.

Antiokía çxhabte pkhaakhesa yakhthẽ'jwe'sx kaathe', Fxenicia Samaria kiwesu skhẽwnatx u'j, judiu ji'jmée vxite nasawa Dxus yuwe's jxpa'gaçxa nyafxíi jxpubana fxi'zeni's nvxihttxi jĩna pta'sxna. Aça' kxsũ yakhthẽ'jwe'sxa' wala weçxatx txã'wẽ jiyuçxa'.

Pablowe'sx Jerusalente pa'the', kxte pkhaakhena ũssa vxite' Jesus jxkaahnisawe'sx ancianowe'sx yã'jçxa jxpa'gatx. Aça' Pablowe'sxa' jxuka pta'sxtxi txã'wẽ judiu ji'jmée vxite nasatxwa Dxusa' ewte neeyũuwa'ja's ũsku jĩna.

Nawa maaíi yu' kxte ũssa fxariseowe'sx Jesus kaapiya'jni's jxpa'gasaçxawa na'wẽtx we'we yujuçxa: Judiu ji'jmée vxite nasa ãçxh u'se Dxus yuwe's jxpa'gasawe'sxtxi' cirkuncidãyçxa, Moises jxkaahni leya's jxuka nwẽese'khan jxkaathe yuuna jĩtx.
Txajũ' Jesus jxkaahnisa vxite' ancianowe'sx yakh pkhaakheçxa txãa yuwe's pheu'jya' puutx we'wetx.
Txã'wẽ wala txaçx txãa yuwe's puutx we'wenijũ', Pedro' kiiteçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, i'kwe'sxa' jii i'kwe Dxusa' adxa's txhitxhku txajx yuwe ewte nvxiitwa'jsa's pta'sxkahn judiu ji'jmée vxite nasatxwa, kxah txãawe'sxwa jiyukahn.
Dxusa' jiia' maaçxah nwẽese'jwa'jsatewa, txãasa íik vxite nasawa txã'sna nwẽese'jwa'jsa yuutxi's txajx Espiritu's ũs, kwe'sxtxiwa ma'wẽga txajx Espiritu's ũs txã'wẽy.
Dxusa' maa yuhtxwa nasa fxiisata' sũju'çme' kwe'sx yakh vxite nasa yakh. Txãasaíiçxáak vxite nasaçxawa Jesusa's yaakxsa yuutxi's txãawe'sx pkaltxi' peltunãy.
Dxus txã'wẽ yũuçxa nwe'wenisatxi's ¿kĩjxa'kwe i'kwe'sxa' jweeíiçxáa thẽysa's yuutxana jxkaah wẽje'? Txãa thẽysa's kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx yuhwa kxtey yuuya' ãjameeta', aça' kwe'sx yu' wejxtha'w ãjãmée.
Txã'wẽ kwe'sxa' txãa thẽysa's kxtey yũuya' ãjãmeetewa, Jesusa' peeygãhçxa yuuçxáane' kwe'sxtxi' nwe'we sũju'tha'w. Txãasane' vxite nasatxwa txã'wẽyçxáa nwe'we.

Pedro txã'wẽ we'wete', jxukaysa sxuuna'tx yuu, Pablowe'sx pta'sxni's wẽse'jya'. Aça' txãawe'sxa' pta'sxtxi Dxusa' txã'wẽk kim yuhwa ãjãnimeesa's kaavxya'ja'jya' ãjãwa'ja's kwe'sxtxi ũsçxa judiu ji'jmée vxite nasatxwa jxuka pu'çx jĩna.
Txãawe'sx pta'sxna jxã'the', Jakobok we'we:
—Yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, mwẽese'jwe.
Simon Pedro na'wẽk pta'sx judiu ji'jmée vxite nasatxwa Dxusa' nyafxçxah peeygãhçxa txãawe'sxtxi txhitxhku txajx luuçx yuuwa'jsa.
Txã'wẽ yuuwa'ja's Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx fxi'jtx txã' kxtey yuuk. Txãa fxi'jni' na'jĩ'k:
Txã'wẽ yũunijũ sxawedçxa, ki' txaja'nja Davxid txaahni yat wetenisa's.
Txãa wetenisa's pheu'jçxa u'se vxitçxa nvxiitu'nja.
Kxah maawa jxuka Dxusa's pakweya' ãjatxna,
Maa kiwejuwe'sxwa adxa's jiyusa yu' jxuka.
Txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's Dxusa' nyafxíi enteyku txã'wẽ we'wena kaajiyu'j.
Txãa pa'gath adxa' naasũju': Judiu ji'jmeeçxawa Dxusna nwẽese'jya' pakwesaatxi' kuçx kwe'sx leytxi nwẽese'jwa'ja's jxkaahmée,

naasáa na'wẽ pta'sxna fxi'theçxáa ewna: Naa kiwega dxus ĩtximeesa's weçxaya' tajkx ikhni çxiçxa's ũ'wa'jme'. Sa' ptammeesa pkal yuuna fxi'zewa'jme'. Txã'wẽy tajkxnawa thukçxa ikhnisa çxiçxa's ũ'wa'jme', eenawa ũ'wa'jme'.
Txã'wẽ yũumeete', Moises leya's nyafxíi enteytxi txãasu we'wena pta'sxna yuhna ũsu' çxhab iisa judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yat-su jxkaase ensu jĩk Jakobo'.

Txajũ' Jesus jxkaahnisawe'sx vxite' ancianowe'sx kxtee ũssa jxukaysa puutx we'wetx Pablowe'sx yakh Antiokía çxhabna kaajxa'. Sa' txhitxhtxi Judas Barsabás yaasesa's vxite' Silas txãawe'sx wala jxtuhthesatx.
Txãawe'sx yakh karta na'jĩna fxi'jçxa kaahtx:

Jesus jxkaahnisawe'sx vxite' ancianowe'sx weçxana yuwe kajaçtha'w ayte ũssa yakhthẽ'jwe'sx jxukaysa yã'jçxa judiu ji'jmée vxite nasa Antiokíate ũssa i'kwe'sxtxi, vxite' Siria Cilicia kiwetewe'sxtxiwa.
Kwe'sxa' jiyutha'w kwe'sx yakh ũssa judiu maaíi yu' kwe'sx jxkaahmeetewa u'jçxa txãawe'sx kaapiya'jni yakh i'kwe'sxtxi kaypuba'jna ũsu'ne'ta Moises leya's nwẽese'jçxa ya'cirkuncidaĩne'kwe jĩna.
Txã'wẽ yũupa'ga kwe'sx jxukaysa na'wẽ yũuya' puutx we'weçxa kwe'sx yakh ũssatx txhitxhçxa i'kwe'sxtxi thegya' kajaçtha'w kwe'sx yakhthẽ'j Pablowe'sx
na'wẽ nxus knaytxi kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo kaapiya'jni's pta'sxpa'ga txãawe'sx yakh.
Aça' kwe'sx kaahni Judas vxite' Silas txãawe'sx pa'jçxa i'kwe'sxtxi pta'sxitxna ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa ew ãate.
I'kwe'sxtxi' jwee yu' thaakwe jxkaahmée na'wẽçxáa yũuwa'ja'sku Dxus Espiritu' kwe'sxtxi kaaũusuthe'j:

Naa kiwega dxus ĩtxĩmeesa's weçxaya' tajkx ikhni çxiçxa's ũ'wa'jme', eenawa ũ'wa'jme', tajkxnawa thukçxa ikhnisa çxiçxa's ũ'wa'jme'. Ptammeesa pkal yuuna fxi'zewa'jme'. Na'wẽ neewe'we'tha'w txãatx kxtey yuuteçxáa ewna. Dxus yakh txutemée mfxi'zewe.
Txã'wẽ kaathe', Silaswe'sxa' Antiokíate pa'jçxa kxteewe'sx yakh pkhaakheçxa karta's dukhte',
txãa karta's lẽeyçxa wala weçxatx txã'wẽ zhiçxkwe yu'kxpehna fxi'jni's uyçxa.
Txãa Silaswe'sxa' Dxus kĩh yũuya'watewa dxiikhẽy pta'sxya' ãjasatx yu', txãasa kxte yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi yu'kxpehna wala kçxhãaçxha'jtx.
Txãawe'sxa' kxte maz en ũsçxa ki' sxaweduuçte', kxte yakhthẽ'jwe'sxa' yuwe wala weçxaa kaahna kaahtx kimne'ta kaah txãawe'sx tasxnay.
Nawa Silas yu' kxte neeyũuya'k yajkx.
Txajũ' Pablowe'sxa' Antiokíate Dxus yuwe's kaapiya'jna nestxi yuu vxite yakhthẽ'jwe'sx yakh.
Txãa e'su' Pablo' Bernabea's na'jĩk:
—Yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi ki' thegya' u'jwega maa çxhabsuçxah ne'tka'w Dxus yuwe's pta'sx kxsũ jxuka, ma'wẽ ũstewa uyya' jĩte',
Bernabea' Juan Markosna pe'jçxak u'j wẽe.
Nawa Pablo yu' pe'jna u'jya' wa'lku, txã'wẽ mjĩi pu'çxna jxã'jmée Panfxiliajũçxáa sxawedsa' sũhçxa.
Txajũ' puutx ũusçxa we'weçxa txuteetx. Bernabea' Juan Markosna pe'jçxa Çxipre kiwenku u'j,
naapkaçxha' Pablo' Silasnak txhitxh, txãa yakh u'juwa'jsa. Aça' kxte yakhthẽ'jwe'sxa' txãawe'sxtxi Dxus kusete neewe'wena jxã'jaçpkaçxha', kasehtx.
Sa' u'jçxa Siria Cilicia kiwesu yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi kçxhãaçxha'jtx Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna.

Pablo Silas yakh Derbe Listra çxhabsu pa'jçxa kxte puutx uytxi Jesukristo's jxpa'gasa Timoteo yaasesa yakh. Txajx njĩ'ja' Jesukristo's jxpa'gasa judiu ji'thewa, Timoteo ney yu' judiu ji'jmée griegok yu'.
Listra Ikonio çxhabsu u'psa yakhthẽ'jwe'sx maawa jxukatx txãa Timoteo's wala tuuthe'je'.
Txajũ' Pablo' txãa Timoteo's pe'jçxa u'jya'k yajkx, sa' kaacirkuncidaĩ'kh txã'wẽ griego nçxi'ka' jĩna kxsũ judiuwe'sx açewe'wekahmén.
Sa' Jerusalente Jesus jxkaahnisa vxite' ancianowe'sx fxi'jni karta's jxukatx pta'sxna u'jwe' maa çxhabsuwa yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi.
Txã'wẽ jiyuçxa', kxsũ pkhaakhesawe'sxa' jweeíiçxáatx çxhãçxha Dxus yakh fxi'ze', aça' nasa yu' een isatx pehnana u'jwe' Jesus kaapiya'jni's nwẽese'jna.
Txajũ' Pablowe'sxa' Fxrigia Galaciasutx ktejkana u'j, Dxus Espiritu' Asia kiwesu jwee yu' Dxus yuwe's kaapta'sxi'jme' naa pa'ga.
Sa' Misia kiwete utxa kũhçxa', Bitinia kiwen u'jwe'nja'w sũhtewa, Espiritu' u'khaahme'.
Txã'wẽ yũuyã'the', Misia kiwen teehwed u'jçxa, Troas çxhabtetx pa'j ĩkh wala pukate.
Kxte ũsçxak Pablo' teeçx kuste ksxa'w teeçx piçthẽ'j Macedoniatewe'sx na'wẽ pxthaa we'wena ũste: Macedoniate ktejkaçxa, kwe'sxtxi myuh pu'çxya' jĩna.
Pablo ksxa'wte txã'wẽ pa'ya yã'the', Macedonia kiwen u'jya' pheu'tha'w, kwe'sxtxi' Dxus txã'wẽ kajaçna Macedoniatewe'sxtxi txajx yuwe ewte nvxiitwa'jsa's pta'sxya' sũhçxa.
Troas çxhabuh barkote khẽeçxa u'tha'w ĩkh pxãhte Samotracia kiwen. Sa' vxite kuskuskhẽ' Neapolis çxhabte pa'tha'w.
Txajũ ki' u'jçxa', Fxilipos çxhabte pa'jçxa maz en ũsu'tha'w. Txãa çxhaba' romanowe'sx iiyamunisa wala jxtuhthesa yu'k Macedonia kiwete.
Teeçx jxkaase ente' çxhab eka kasehtha'w yu'wala pukate Dxus yakh puutx we'weya' pkhaakhenite, sa' Dxus yuwe's pta'sxtha'w kxte u'y pkhaakhesatx.

Aça' kxte pkhaakhesa teeçxsa' Lidiak yaase yu', Tiatira çxhabuwe'sx, tela zhiçxkwesatx txweysáa. Txãa u'ya' Dxusna nwẽese'jsak txã'wẽ Pablo pta'sxni's wẽse'jna u'pu'. Aça' Dxusa' txajx ũuste kaajiyu'kh Pablo pta'sxni's.
Txajũ' txajx yattewe'sx yã'jçxa jxuka yu'te ya'bautisãyçxa', na'jĩnak kwe'sxtxi pxthaa we'wena pi'kx:
—Ũ'kwe' Dxus yakh fxi'zewa'jsate i'kwe'sxa' ew jiiçxa', ũ'kwe yatte myuhwe dejxa' jĩçxa ãadxijimeeçxa pe'jna u'kh.

Teeçx ente nyafxíi ũsnitey u'jweççxa', puutx uytha'w teeçx kna'sa's eçxthẽ'j txajx ũuste kaajiyu'the pta'sxna u'jusa yakh. Txãa kna'sa' patron jxpe'jnisa ku'ga yu', sa' patronwe'sxtxi wala vxyu kaaknayu'ju'ku'ga txã'wẽ kĩhnawa ũuste jiyuçxa nasatx pta'sxna.
Txãa kna'sa' kwe'sx e'stey yuwe'k Pablo's na'wẽ sus we'wena:
—Naa piçthẽ'jwe'sxa' cielute Dxusna selpisaata', txãasatx i'kwe'sxtxi' pta'sxi' ewte u'jwa'j dxi'ja's jĩna.
Maz enwa txã'wẽ yũute', nmehte' Pablo' kuçxçxa na'wẽk we'we txãa kna'sa ũuste u'psa eçxthẽ'ja's:
—Jesukristo jxkaahni's nwẽese'jçxa, txãa kna'sa ũusuh mkaaseh jĩçpkaçxha', eçxthẽ'ja' kasejk.
Nawa patronwe'sxa' txãa kna'sa pa'gaçxáa vxyu knayna fxi'zeni's ivxiituyã'jçxa', Pablowe'sxtxi uweçxa çxhab pxãhte jxũna u'jçxa
kxte khuẽswe'sxtxi na'jĩnatx pãatxhĩ'kh:
—Naa piçthẽ'j judiuwe'sxa' wala kuçx yuuna ũsta' kwe'sx çxhabte.
Kĩhwa kwe'sxtxi selpiwa'jmeesaçxáanatx kaapiya'ja', aça' txã'sa' kxtey yuuya' ãjãme'nja'w, kwe'sxa' romano nasatha'w naa pa'ga jĩte',
nasa' wala ũusaçxana ahçetx. Aça' khuẽswe'sxa' Pablowe'sxtxi ksũupi'jçxa peçxuukwe kaahtx.
Txã'wẽ wala pkxuuçxa', karcelte ktxaaja'jçxa kxte thegna ũssa's wala jxpa'yakx theg kaathe',
kxte thegsa' karcel dxiite jwee dxiiju pe'jna u'jçxa telte çxidatx se'wçxak ki'p.
Nawa Pablowe'sx kuspxãh Dxus yakh puutx we'wena memna u'pte', vxite preesu' wẽse'jna u'ppkaçxha',
ehd seena' çxhãçxha u'the', karcel vxitxa' jxuka phaatetx, aça' preesu tudni kadenawa çxuktetetx.
Txajũ' karcelte thegsa yajkxçxa', karcel vxitx jxuka phaateçxa ũste uyçxa', kçxilxa's kutxi'jçxa peekíiçxáa ya'ikhya'wak yu', preesu' jxuka kasehçxa u'jne'ta sũhna ũukhçxa.
Aça' Pablo' na'wẽk we'we:
—Txã'wẽ yũunu. Jxuka ũstha'w ayte jĩte',
karcelte thegsa' bela pki'taçxa ũukhna wuwuuçxáa kũhçxa, Pablowe'sx tasxte peejxũkwek.
Txajũ' Pablowe'sxtxi kutxi'jçxa na'wẽk pẽjx:
—I'kwe'sxa' mpeeta'sxwe, ¿ma'wẽ yũuçxa Dxusa's uyuuki'th? jĩte',
Pablowe'sxa' na'wẽtx pta'sx:
—Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo's jxpa'gaçxa yuuçxáa Dxus yakh fxi'zewa'ja's uyuune'ga petx iidx yattewe'sx yã'jçxa jxuka.
Txajũ' Dxus yuwe's pta'sxtxi txajx yattewe'sx jxukaysatx.
Sa' karcelte thegsa' txãa kustey Pablowe'sx kpã'tx pkhi'kxna'wa txajx yattewe'sx yã'jçxa jxukaysa ya'bautisãytxi.
Txajũ' txajx yatna pe'jna u'jçxa puuçku, sa' wala weçxana ũsu'k Dxus yakh fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutha'w jxukaysa jĩna.
Txajũ' khuẽswe'sxa' kusíi policia kaahtx karcelte thegsa tasxna Pablowe'sxtxi' txhweetekahn pta'sxya'.
Aça' karcelte thegsa' pta'sxku Pablo's:
—Khuẽswe'sxa' txhweetekaahtx i'kwe'sxtxi'. Aça' kasehçxa ũukhmée me'jwe jĩte',
Pablo' na'wẽk we'we policiawe'sxtxi:

—Kwe'sxa' romano nasatewa ahçeçxa nasa jxuka uyna ũste pkxuuçxa karcelte kxuuphtxi, kĩh yũupa'ga yuuwetewa txã'sa' jiyumey. Sa' ãçxha' paaçte kim yuhwa jiyunimeete txhweete'nja'w ¿sũjuwá'nta? Txã'wẽ yũuya' yu' ãjameetxna. Kwe'sxtxi kutxi'jya' txãawe'sx yuu yuwetxna jĩte',
policiawe'sxa' u'jçxa khuẽswe'sxtxi txã'wẽy pta'sxte', txãawe'sxa' wala ũukhtxi, Pablowe'sxa' romano nasatewa jiyuçxa'.
Txajũ' khuẽswe'sxa' Pablowe'sx tasxna u'jçxa jxpubane'tka'w jĩna pxthaa we'weçxa karceluh kutxi'jçxa çxhabuh kaseh kaahtx.
Aça' Pablowe'sxa' karceluh kasehçxa', kxte çxhabte Lidia yatnatx u'j. Sa' ũukhmée meswe jĩna yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi kvxiisxa'jçxatx txajũ kaseh.
Pablo Silas yakh Anfxípolis Apolonia çxhabsu ktejkana u'jçxa, Tesalónika çxhabtetx pa'j judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatte.
Pablo' jxkaase ensu' tekh ki'supkaçxku Dxus libru ma'wẽne' we'we' txã'sna kaapiya'jna ũsu' judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatte.
Sa' ãatek pta'sx:
—Dxus tasxuh yuusa' wala pxthaa yuuçxa uuçxawa ki' ĩtxi yuuwa'jsak yu', aça' adx i'kwe'sxtxi pta'sxi'th Jesus jĩna txãaíik Dxus tasxuh yuusa Kristo yu'.

Txajũ' judiuwe'sx maaíi yu' txã'wẽ Jesusa' Dxus tasxuh yuusa Kristo yuh yu'ne' sũhçxa Pablowe'sx ju'gutx yuu. Txã'wẽy wala kuh griego Dxusna nwẽese'jsawa utxaatx, vxite' u'ywa wala kuh utxaatx jxtuhthesawe'sx.

Txã'wẽ yũute', vxite judiuwe'sx Pablo pta'sxni's açesa yu' wala ũusaçxaçxa nasa ewmeesatx pkhakhçxa çxhabte wala seena' ksuusu'tx kuçx yuuna. Sa' Jasón yatte Pablowe'sxtxi pakweya' u'jtx txajũ kutxi'jçxa nasaa ksxavxyte dukhya'.
Nawa txãawe'sxtxi uymeeçxa', Jasón vxite' yakhthẽ'jwe'sx kxte ũssaçxáatxwa wezxna u'jçxa çxhabte khuẽs tasxte kuutxa'jçxa na'wẽtx wẽesxu:
—Txãa nasa naa kiwe's jxuka kaypuba'jsawe'sx aytewa pa'tha,
aça' Jasona' txajx yattega jxpa'ga. Txãawe'sxa' jxukaysa açe'tx Romate jxkaahsa leya's, txã'wẽ vxite jxkaahsa Jesus yaasesa ũsa' jĩçxa.
Txã'jĩna we'wete', khuẽswe'sx nasa jxukaysa wala seena' sustxi.
Nawa Jasón vxite' txãa yakh ũssawe'sxtxi vxyu kusa'jçxaçxáa txhweetetx.
Kxte yakhthẽ'jwe'sxa' txãa kustey wala dud kaahtx Pablowe'sxtxi' Berea çxhabna. Kxte pa'jna'wa u'jtx judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatna.
Kxte judiuwe'sxa' wala ew yu'tx Tesalonikatewe'sx na'wẽmée. Dxus yuwe's wala weçxana jxpa'gaçxa, een isatx Dxus librute pakwé' Pablowe'sx pta'sxni isa dxihtewa jiyuya'.
Txã'wẽ kxteewe'sx wala kuhsa jiyutx Pablo pta'sxni' isa yuh yu'ga sũhna, vxite' u'y griego jxtuhthesa petx piçthẽ'j yã'jçxa.
Nawa judiu Tesalonikatewe'sxa' txã'wẽ Pablo' Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna ũsa' Bereate jĩni's jiyuçxa', Berea çxhabna u'jçxa kxte nasatx wala seena' kaaũusçxa'jtx.
Aça' kxte yakhthẽ'jwe'sxa' jwee yu' kaajxthẽeyu'jmée Pablo's kaahtx Atenas dxi'j. Naasáa Silas Timoteo txãawe'sxçxáatx neeyũu Bereate.
Pablo yakh pi'kxna u'jsawe'sxa' Atenas çxhabna pa'jtx u'j. Sa' ki' Bereate sxawedna pa'jçxa', Pablo' i'kwe'sxtxi wala dud yuukaakh txãa yakh ũsya' jĩnatx pta'sx Silaswe'sxtxi'.
Pablo' Atenas çxhabte Silas Timoteo txãawe'sxtxi ũythasna ũsçxa', wala kuh yajkxna fxi'ze'k txãa çxhaba' naa kiwete dxus ĩtximeesaçxaçxáatxku txakwe wala ji'ph yu' naa pa'ga.
Txãasak judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatte judiuwe'sx yakh vxite' judiumeeçxawa Dxusa's yaakxsawe'sx yakh puutx we'we', sa' çxhab pxãhsuwa een isak we'we' Dxus ĩtximeesatx neewe'wesawe'sx yakh.
Txajũ' kxte epikúreo kaapiya'jni's piyana ũssawe'sx vxite' estóiko kaapiya'jni's piyana ũssawe'sx piçthẽ'ja' Pablo yakh puutx we'wetx, naapkaçxha' maaíi yu' na'jĩnatx we'we' txãawe'sx pwe'sx:
—Naa thẽ'ja' ¿kĩjki'k txakwe wala we'we'? jĩ'tx. Naapkaçxha' vxite we'weçxa':
—Dxus jiyunimeesatx kxsusnak pta'sxi' jĩ'tx.
Pablo' Jesus uuçxa ki' ĩtxĩ yuuni's pta'sxpa'gatx txã'jĩna we'we'.
Txajũ' Pablo's teeçx ahte Areópago yaasesate pe'jna u'jçxa paapẽjxtxi:
—Kwe'sxtxi meen peeta'sx na'wẽ yuwe u'sesa pta'sxi'g txã'sa' jiyu wẽetha'w.
Na'wẽ kĩhwa fxiysa pta'sxi'g txã'sa' ew ãate mkaajiyu'j jĩna.
Txã'wẽ Atenastewe'sxa' jxukaysa pkhaakheçxa kĩhwa u'se kaapiya'jni's wẽse'jna puutx paapẽjxnaçxáa fxi'zesatx yu', aça' vxite kiwejuwe'sx Atenaste u'p-ya' pa'jsawa txã'wẽytxi yu'.
Txajũ' Pablo' Areópagote txãawe'sx ksxavxyte yujuçxa we'wek:
—Atenastewe'sx i'kwe'sxa' dxusa's wala yaakxsane'kwe sũju'th.

Msuuwa i'kwe'sx dxusa's neewe'wenisu thegna u'juçxa', uythu teeçx altalte na'wẽ fxi'jnisa: Jiyunimeesa Dxusa' jĩnisa. I'kwe'sx na'wẽ jiyunimeesa dxus jĩna neewe'wene'kwe txãa Dxus jiyunimeesa'sthu adxa' ãate kaajiyu'ju'.
Txãa Dxusku naa kiwe's vxitçxa kxte kĩjkĩhçxah ũstxna txãatxwa jxuka vxit. Txãa pa'ga txãaíi namu' naa kiwe, cielu yã'jçxa. Txã' piçthẽ'jwe'sx txaahni yat-su ũsu'çme'.
Txã' naa kiwete nasa pu'çxni fxi'zewa'jsame'. Txãaíik kwe'sx jxukaysa ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ũs, kĩjkĩhnawa jxuka.
Sa' nasa maazkuẽesawa teeçx piçthẽ'j ji'jçxaçxáa yuuwa'ja's vxitçxa, msuuçxah u'pwa'jsatewa pta'sxna ena'swa txuhdek nus pa'jn ki' sekna yuuwa'ja's.
Dxusa' ũsna sũhçxa pakweçxa' thẽymée uykahnku txã'wẽ yũu. Aça' Dxusa's pakwete yu' kwe'sx yakh jxu'jmeete ũsa'.
Kwe'sxa' Dxus ũste íiçxáatha'w ĩtxi ẽse'sena fxi'zeya' ãja'. Dxus ũste íitx i'kwe'sx ji'j wala fxi'jya' jiisawe'sx na'wẽ we'we: Dxus taki'nitha'w jĩna.
Txã'wẽ Dxus taki'niyã'jçxa', piçthẽ'jwe'sx ũus yajkxçxa nasa na'wẽ piisani ũsta' vxyuu beh, vxyuu çxihme, kwet txã'wẽsa' kwe'sxtxi taki'satxna sũhwa'j ji'phmeetha'w.
Dxusa' nyafxíi ensuy yu' ma'jĩme' nasa' jiimeeçxa ma'wẽwa yũutewa. Nawa ãçxha' jxukaytxi jxkaaja'k pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxusa'sçxáa pakwekahn.
Txã'wẽme', Dxusa' teeçx ente naa kiwete yuuwesatx kastigãywa'jsa txhitxhku. Aça' txãa txhitxhnisa' kxtey yuuyujuna. Txã'wẽ yuuya' íiçxáak uuçxawa ki' ĩtxi yuu.
Txã'wẽ uuçxawa ki' ĩtxi yuuk jĩni's wẽse'jçxa', maaíi yu' weeçxtxi, naapkaçxha' vxite we'weçxa':
—Vxite enkhẽ ki' pta'sxine'ga, txagaçx ki' wẽse'je'nja'w jĩ'tx.
Txã'jĩyã'the', Pablo' u'kh.
Nawa maaíi yu' Pablo pta'sxni isa yuhna sũhçxa txãa yakh utxaatx. Kxte utxaasaawe'sx teeçxsa' Dionisio Areópagote pkhaakhesatewe'sxku yu', sa' teeçx u'y Dámaris yaasesawa utxaak, vxite yã'jçxa.
Txãa e'su', Pablo' Atenasuh kasehçxa Korinto çxhabnak u'j.

Kxte' teeçx judiu Akila yaasesa yakhku puutx uy, Ponto kiwejuwe'sx. Akila txajx nyu Priscila yã'jçxa u'seçxáa Italiaju pa'jçxatx kxte ũsu', Romate jxkaahsa Klaudio' judiuwe'sxtxi txajũ jxuka kutxi'pha'ga. Aça' Pablo' txãawe'sx yatna u'jçxa Akilawe'sx yattek yuju.
Txãawe'sx na'wẽy tultu kaççxak txweyna fxi'zesa yu', txãasak kxte neeyũu txãawe'sx yakh mjĩina.
Sa' jxkaase ensu' judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatna u'jçxa, kxte judiuwe'sx vxite' judiumeesatxwa Dxus yuwe's pta'sxi'k Dxus jĩi knayya'.
Silas Timoteo yakh Macedonia kiweju pa'the', Pablo' vxite mjĩia's nvxihtçxa, Dxus yuwe pta'sxwa'the yuuçxáak yuju een isa, Jesusa' Dxus tasxuh yuusa Kristo yuh yu'k jĩna judiuwe'sxtxi kaajiyu'jna.
Nawa txãawe'sxa' txã'wẽ pta'sxni's jxpeejxmeetha'w jĩçxa ahçena weeçxwa'ja's uytxi. Aça' Pablo':

—Adxa' yuuwemeeth, i'kwe'sxtxi pta'sx yã'th. Aça' yuuwesa' i'kwe'sxi'kwe peekx uuwa'ja's pakwena ũspa'ga jĩna txajx athni ropa's ya'tatak. Sa' txã'wẽ yũupa'ga ãçxha' u'jweçthu judiu ji'jmée vxite nasatx pta'sxya' jĩk.
Txã'jĩna'wa judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatuh kasehna'wa, teeçx piçthẽ'j Justo yaasesa yatnak u'j, judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yat pukateyçxáa. Txãa piçthẽ'ja' Dxusna neewe'wena fxi'zesak yu'.

Txajũ' judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yattewe'sx npiiçthẽ'jsa Krispo' txajx ũuste Jesusa's nwẽese'jya' yajkxku petx txajx yattewe'sx yã'jçxa jxuka. Txã'wẽy Korintotewe'sxwa wala kuhsa Kristo's jiyuçxa ũuste jxpa'gatx yu'te ya'bautisãyna.
Txãa e'su' Jesusa' teeçx kuste na'jĩnak vxyaaçxa we'we Pablo's:
—Weh yuhwa ũukhmée Dxus yuwe's mpeeta'sx. Txã'wẽme', naa çxhabte adxna nwẽese'jwa'jsa wala ũs íiçxáata'.
Txãa pa'ga adxa' idx yakh pi'kxna ũsthu, aça' kim yuhwa idxa's ikhya' yu' ãjameetxna.
Txã'jĩyã'the', Pablo' Korinto çxhabte txãawe'sx ksxavxyte Dxus yuwe's kaapiya'jna ũsu'k anxu y medio ãhpkaçx.
Nawa Akaya kiwete ne'jwe'sx Galión ensu' judiuwe'sxa' Pablo's ahçeçxa khuẽs tasxte jxũna u'jtx.
Sa' na'jĩnatx pta'sx ne'jwe'sxa's:
—Dxusa's nwẽese'jwa'ja's ley jxkaaja'k txãa jxkaahnijũ kasehçxa Dxusa's fxiy nwẽese'jwa'ja'sku kaapiya'ja' naa piçthẽ'ja' jĩte',
Pablo pasya'wagaçxha', ne'jwe'sx Galión khuẽ'y judiuwe'sxtxi we'wek:
—Yuwe ewmeesa's adxa's pãatxhĩ'kheçwaça', pu'çxhiwá'nja i'kwe'sx pãatxhĩ'khni's.
Nawa i'kwe'sx pwe'sx fxi'zeni leyçxá' aça' txã'sa' i'kwe'sx pwe'sx mpheu'jwe. Adxa' txãasu' thegu ji'phmeeth jĩçxa,
txajũ eka kutxi'kh.
Aça' judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatte npiiçthẽ'jsa Sostenesa's uweçxa, pãpatx griegowe'sx jxukaysa ne'jwe'sx dxi'pte. Nawa Galiona' kuçx ma'jĩme'.

Txã'wẽtewa, Pablo' wala kuh en ũsu'k kxte. Txãa e'suk kxte yakhthẽ'jwe'sxçxáatx nvxihtçxa, Siria kiwen u'jwa'j ji'phu barkote khẽeçxa Priscila Akila yã'jçxa. Txãa dxi'j u'jweççxa', Cenkrea çxhabte pa'jçxa barkote khẽemey txajx dxkhasa's jxuka ktxiidxi'k. Dxus yakh yuuçxáa fxi'zewa'ja's Dxus yakh puutx we'wenak txã'wẽ yũu.
Txajũ' Efxeso çxhabte pa'jçxa', Pablo' Priscila Akilawe'sxtxi nvxihtna'wa, judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatna u'kh, kxte judiuwe'sxtxi Dxus yuwe's kaajiyu'jya'.
Aça' txãawe'sxa' wala pxthaa we'wetx kuh en ũskahn. Nawa Pablo' kxtey yuumée,
txajũ ki' kasejk na'jĩçxa:
—Jerusalente fxiesta u'puya'wa' kxte ũswa'j ji'pthu. Nawa ki' sxawedu'nja i'kwe'sxtxi thegya', Dxus ma'wẽ jxthãaste' jĩna we'weçxa, Efxeso çxhabuh barkote khẽeçxa u'kh.
Sa' Cesarea çxhabte pa'jçxa', Jerusalennak u'j kxte pkhaakhesawe'sxtxi weçxaya'. Txajũ' Antiokía çxhabnak u'j.
Kxte maz en ũsçxaçxáa, txajũ ki' kasejk Galacia Fxrigia kiwesu nyafxíi pta'sxnisu jxuka pekũjxa', Dxus yakh fxi'zesawe'sxtxi kçxhãaçxha'jna.
Txãa ensu' teeçx judiu Apolos yaasesa Alejadría çxhabuwe'sx pa'kh Efxeso çxhabte, Dxus libru Moises fxi'jni's ew jiisa kaapiya'jya' sxiigmeesa.
Sa' Jesukristo kimtewa pta'sxni jiik yu', txãasak Juan yu'te bautisãyniçxáana jiiçxawa txajx jiyuni yu'sa' jxpubamée kaapiya'ja'.

Apolosa' judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatte u'kaçxa sxiigmeek pta'sxi'. Aça' Priscila Akilawe'sx jiyuçxa', txãa Apolos txã'sçxáa fxii pe'jna u'jçxa, jweeíiçxáatx ew pta'sx Jesukristo yakh fxi'zewa'ja's jxuka.

Aça' Apolosa' Akaya kiwen u'jweçte', yakhthẽ'jwe'sxa' u'jwa'ja's pu'çxçxa teeçx karta fxi'jtx Akayate yakhthẽ'jwe'sx wa'lmée jxpa'gakahn. Txã'wẽ Akayate pa'jçxa', wala pu'çxku Dxus peeygãhçxa nwe'wenisatx na'wẽ yũuna:
Jesusa' Dxus tasxuh yuusa Kristo yuh yu'k, i'kwe'sx ũythasni txã'sna i'kwe judiuwe'sx jxpuba jĩnak pta'sxi', Dxus librute ma'wẽ fxi'jni ũsna txãa yakh kaaja'da'jna.
Apolosa' Korinto çxhabte ũspkaçxha', Pablo' yaçkhẽy pekũhni kiwesu pa'jna u'jçxa Efxeso çxhabtek pa'j. Kxtea' Jesukristo's iiwẽse'jsa yakh puutx uyçxa',
na'wẽk pẽjx:
—I'kwe'sxa' Jesukristo's jiyunijũ' ¿Dxus Espiritu's jxpa'gakwe'? jĩte', na'wẽtx pas:
—Dxus Espiritu's naa kiwete kaahnik yuu jĩniçxáa yuhnawa iiwẽse'jmeetha'w kwe'sxa'.
Txajũ' Pablo' pẽjxku:
—I'kwe'sxa' ¿kĩh yũuya' sũhçxakwe ya'bautisãy? jĩte', txãawe'sx pasçxa':
—Juan pta'sxçxa': Ya'bautisãywa'ja' jĩk aççxáatha'w ya'bautisãy jĩtx.
Txajũ' Pablo' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Juana' yu'te bautisãyku pkaltxi nvxihtçxa peena yu' pkalte fxi'zemeene'kwe, Dxus tasxuh yuusa Kristo adx e'ste yuja' txã'sna jxpa'gaya' jĩçxa bautisãysak yu' jĩte',
txãawe'sxa' ya'bautisãytxi Jesusa's nwẽese'jya' sũhçxa.

Txajũ' Pablo' txãawe'sx dxikthesu peekizeçxa Dxusa's neewe'wete', Dxus Espiritu' txãawe'sx ũuste khẽek. Aça' vxite yuweju we'weya' ãjawa'ja's jxpa'gatx, sa' Dxus kĩh yũuya'watewa dxiikhẽy pta'sxya' ãjatx.
Txã'wẽ yũusa' doce piçthẽ'jtx yu'.
Pablo' kxte ũsçxa' judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yatna u'jna nesku yu' tekh a'tepkaçx. Sa' nasatx ewku kaajiyu'ju' Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena's.

Nawa vxite yu' txã'wẽ pta'sxni's wẽse'j wẽemeeçxa, açewe'wetx nasaa ksxavxyte. Aça' Pablo' txãawe'sx tasxuh txuteeçxa Jesukristo's jxpa'gasawe'sxtxi pe'jna u'kh Tiranno kaapiya'jni yatna, sa' kxte' een isak pta'sxi' e'z anxupkaçx.
Aça' Asia kiwesu u'psa jxukaysa jiyutx judiu vxite' judiumeesawa Jesus kaapiya'jni's.
Txajũ' Dxus pu'çxte', Pablo' nuykatxhi'k kĩh weete ãça'satxwa jxuka.
Txã'wẽ yũuyã'the', Pablo ropa meeçxa' panxwelo kĩhçxáanawa jxũna u'jwe'tx ãça'sawe'sx jxa'dxkahn. Aça' txã's jxa'dxçxaçxáa kĩh weejuwa katxhi'tx, txã'wẽy eçxwa txãawe'sx ũusuh kaseje'tx.
Txã'wẽ yũute', judiuwe'sx dxijxuuçxa eçxtxi nasaa ũusuh kutxi'jsawe'sxwa Jesus yase's kxsusçxa eçxtxi kutxi'jya' na'wẽtx we'we':
—Pablo kxsusnisa Jesus yasete jxkaajaçthu kasejkahn jĩnatx we'we'.
Txã'wẽ yũusa' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j Escewa nçxi'k sietesatx txã'wẽ yu'.
Makwe txã'wẽ we'wetewa, eçxa' na'wẽk pas:
—Jesusa's jiith kimtewa, sa' Pablo'swa iiuythu. Nawa i'kwe'sx yuutxi' jiimeeth kimtewa.
Txã'jĩna'wa txãa eçx iiyamunisa nasa' jxkaahna we'wesawe'sx kakwete ãaphçxa, txãawe'sx athni ropatx sudena kpã'vxitna yũute', txãawe'sxa' ũphna u'jtx sũpxçxáa.
Txã'wẽ yũuni's Efxeso çxhabte ũssa judiuwe'sx vxite' judiumeesawa jiyuçxa' Jesus yase's kxsusya' wala ũukhtxi, sa' Jesusa's weçxanaçxáatx fxi'ze'.
Txajũ' Pablo pta'sxni' ewsa yuhna sũhçxa maazkuẽesawa utxaatx txãawe'sx ewmée yũuna fxi'zeni's ãate pta'sxna.
Aça' txã'wẽy dxijxuuna fxi'zesawa jxukay txãawe'sx libru ewmeesatx jxũna pa'jçxa', jxukaysa dxi'pte kabtxi. Txãa libru' jxukaçxah yu' cinkwenta mil peso ãhtx pa'gasa yu'.
Txã'wẽ yũute', Dxus yuwe' jweeíiçxáak çxhãçxha walaana u'j.
Txãa e'su', Pablo' Jerusalenna u'jweççxa', Macedonia Akaya kiwesu pa'jna u'jya'k yajkx. Sa' Jerusalenuh Roma çxhabnawa u'jwe'nja sũhnak yajkx.
Txajũ' Macedonia kiwen kaakh txã'sna pu'çxna u'jusa Timoteo vxite' Erasto txãawe'sx e'zsatx. Nawa txãa yu' nee Asia kiwete ũsu'k maz en.
Txãn ensu' wala seena' sustxi Dxus yuwe's ahçeçxaçxáa.
Txãa yuwe kiissa yu' Demetrio vxyuu çxihme's dxus Diana ũsni yat na'wẽ pheu'jçxa txãa yakh mjĩisatx wala vxyu kaaknayu'jsak txã'wẽ yũu.
Sa' txãa yakh mjĩisa vxite' txãa na'wẽy pheu'jsatxwa jxuka pkhakhçxa na'jĩk:
—I'kwe'sxa' jii i'kwe na'wẽ mjĩiçxa' kĩh yuhwa peejxmeetha'w vxyu uyu'.
Nawa i'kwe'sxa' iiwẽse'jne'kwe Pablo jĩnisa' naa çxhab Efxesoteçxáamée, Asia kiwete msuuwa nasatxi' jxuka txajx ju'gu tuphiça', txã'wẽ piçthẽ'jwe'sx pheu'jni dxusa' ĩtximeesata' jĩçxa.

Na'sa' mpa'yajkxwe. Txã'wẽ yũumeete', kwe'sx mjĩiniçxáa vxitumée, dxus Diana ũsni yat txakwe wala jxtuhthesa yuu vxituna. Aça' Asia kiwetewe'sx jwee vxite kiwetewe'sxwa dxus Diana txakwe zhiçxkwesa's jwee yu' nwẽese'jmeetxna.
Txã'jĩna we'wete', wala ũusaçxaçxa na'jĩnatx sus we'we:
—¡Efxeso çxhabte dxus Diana yuuçxáa maatewa jxthaakwe jxtuhthesa'! jĩnatx sus.
Aça' txãa çxhabtewe'sx jxuka ũusaçxaçxa e'z piçthẽ'j Macedoniajũwe'sx Pablo's pi'kxna yuusa Gayo Aristarko txãawe'sxçxáatx uweçxa wezxna u'jtx çxhabte txãawe'sx ũsnite.
Pablo' kxte u'ka wẽek nasatx we'weya'. Nawa kxte yakhthẽ'jwe'sxa' ka'ga'jmeeta'.
Txã'wẽy Pablo namiku khuẽswe'sx jxtuhthesawa Pablo's kuçx kxte u'kakaahmeeta'.
Naapkaçxha' pkhaakhesa yu' kĩjkĩhwa ũusçxa we'wena seena'tx susna ũsu'. Nawa kxte pkhaakhe pu'çxsa jwee kuhsa yu' jiimeetx yu' kĩh yũupa'ga txã'wẽ pkhaakhetewa.

Nawa kxte ũssa maaíi yu' kĩh yũupa'ga ũusaçxana ũstewa jiisa', teeçx piçthẽ'j Alejandro yaasesa's pta'sxçxa nasaa ksxavxyte ukapajkxna nuykũhtx we'wewa'jsa. Aça' txãa piçthẽ'ja' sxuuna' yuuwa'ja's kuseju pta'sxçxa judiuwe'sxa' yuuwemeetha'w jĩna we'we wẽek.
Nawa judiu íiçxáatewa jiyuçxa', jxukaysa ki' sus we'wetx e'z ora ãhpkaçx na'jĩna:
—¡Efxeso çxhabte dxus Diana yuuçxáa maatewa jxthaakwe jxtuhthesa'! jĩna.
Txajũ' çxhabte sekretario' pejka sxuuna' vxitçxa' na'jĩk:
—Efxesotewe'sx mwẽese'jwe. Naa çxhabte nasa' dxus Diana ũsni yata's wala jxpa'yakx thegna vxite' Diana's piisanisa cieluju kĩjk txã'snawa txã'wẽy ew jxpe'jwa'jsatewa jxuka jiita' maa kiwetewe'sxwa.
Aça' ¿ma'wẽ yũuçxa txã'sa' thegmée nvxiht-ya' ãjatxki? Txã'wẽ yu' yuumeetxna. Txãa pa'ga wejx kuh yajkxmée sxuuna' myuuwe.
Txãa pa'gatey e'z piçthẽ'j i'kwe'sx jxũna kũji'kwe txãawe'sxa' i'kwe'sx dxus Diana's suwwameeta' sa' açewe'wenawa ũsmeeta'.

Meeçxa' Demetrio vxite' txãa yakh mjĩisawe'sxçxáa maa yakh iipuiisaçxawa, pãatxhĩ'khwa'j ji'phta', txãa pa'gatey khuẽswe'sx ũsta', aça' txãawe'sx tasxte pãatxhĩ'khya' u'jwetxna, kxah kaapdxi'pu'jçxa yuwe's pheu'jutxna kĩhteçxah yuuwesatewa.
I'kwe'sxa' khuẽs tasxtemée i'kwe'sx pwe'sxçxáa puutx we'wewa'j ji'phçxawa, zhiçxkwe mpuutxwe'wewe txã'wẽ susmée.
Na'wẽ ãçxh susni yuwe's gobierno' paapẽyiwáana aça' seena' ewmeete neeyũuwa'the ũstha'w, kĩhwa yuuwemeete suspa'ga.
Txã'wẽ we'weçxa', kaapçu'juk txãa susni's.
Yuwe susni pçuute', Pablo' Dxus yakh fxi'zesawe'sxtxi pa'yaçxa wala ew yu'kxpehçxak txãawe'sxtxi weçxaçxa Macedonia kiwen u'j.
Txãa kiwesu jxuka pekũjk yakhthẽ'jwe'sx ũukhwe'sxte kçxhãaçxha'jna. Sa' txajũ' Grecia kiwenwa u'kh.

Kxte tekh a'te ũsçxa', barkote khẽeçxa Siria kiwen u'jya'wak yu'. Nawa judiuwe'sx ikhya'wata' txãa dxi'the jĩni's jiyuçxaçxáa, barkote u'jmée çxidaçxáa maa dxi'june' pa'j txã'wẽyku sxawedxa' yajkx, Macedonia kiwejuy uykhẽwna.
Txãa yakh pi'kxna u'jtx Sópater Bereajuwe'sx, Aristarko vxite' Segudo Tesalonikajuwe'sx vxite' Gayo Derbejuwe'sx vxite' Timoteo vxite' Tíkiko Trófximo txãawe'sxa' Asia kiwetewe'sxtxi yu'.
Txãa yakhthẽ'jwe'sxa' dxi'j pxãjũ yaçte u'jçxa Troas çxhabtetx kwe'sxtxi ũythas.
Pan lewadura ji'phmée ũ'ni fxiesta skhẽwniitetha'w kwe'sxa' kaseh, Fxilipos çxhabuh barkote khẽeçxa, sa' tahç ente' kpajkxtha'w Troas çxhabte. Kxte siete entha'w ũsu'.
Ki'sen ente', Dxus yakh fxi'zesawe'sx yakh pkhaakhetha'w kxteçxah pkhaakheçxa ũ'ya'. Naapkaçxha' Pablo' Dxus yuwe's kaapiya'kh. Txã'wẽ kuskuskhẽ' u'jwe ji'phçxa', txaçx kuspxãhnpkaçxku pta'sxna ũsu',
teeçx piesate ẽete wala kuh lampara pki'tanisa ũsu'tx kxtee.
Aça' kxte teeçx piçtakx Eutiko yaasesak wentanate kaçxçxa u'pu'. Txã'wẽ Pablo' wala jxu'j we'wete', txãa piçtakxa' dee wẽeçxa dehna u'píi saapajkxku yat ẽe walaju, aça' uuniisa'stxi kiis.
Txã'wẽ yũute', Pablo' sa'jçxa, txãa uusa's psxa'dçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, nxusnuwe, ki' ĩtxi yuuk jĩnak pta'sx.
Txajũ' Pablo' ki' ẽe yatte tejkaçxa Santa Cena's puuçku. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa khikhyna sẽhpkaçx pta'sxçxak u'j.
Txãa piçtakxa' ki' ĩtxi yuute', pe'jna u'jçxa jxukaysa wala weçxana neeyũutx.
Kwe'sxa' barkote khẽeçxa yaçte u'tha'w Asón çxhabna, Pablo's kxte ũythasya'. Naapkaçxha' txã' çxidajk u'j.
Asón çxhabujk kwe'sx yakh barkote khẽe, aça' txajũtha'w Mitilene çxhabna u'j.

Txajũ ki' kasehçxa vxite enkhẽ' Kío kiwe pukasutha'w skhẽw. Sa' vxite enkhẽ' Samos kiwetek barko' dudte utxaa. Txajũ ki' u'jçxa', teeçx ahte Trogilio yaasesate pa'jçxatha'w jxkaase. Txajũ' vxite enkhẽ' ki' u'jçxa' Mileto çxhabte pa'tha'w.
Pablo' Asia kiwete jxthẽeyuuya'mée, Efxeso çxhabte u'kame', Jerusalente dud pa'jçxa Pentekostes fxiestate ũsya' sũhçxa.
Sa' Mileto çxhabte pa'jçxa', Efxeso çxhabte ancianowe'sxtxi pa'yak na'wẽ we'weya':
—Adxa' Asia kiwete nyafxçxah pa'jíi kĩhtka yũuna fxi'ze ãçxpkaçx txã'sa' i'kwe'sxa' jii i'kwe.
Judiuwe'sx açepa'ga txakwe wala nxuswa'j en pa'thewa, Jesukristo's een isa selpiina bagaçxtewa i'kwe'sxtxi ũ'ne petx khakh pu'çxna nesthu yu' kim yuhnawa iiwejçx we'wemée.
I'kwe'sxtxi selpiwa'jsa Dxus yuwe's pta'sxmée yu' yuumée, nasaa ksxavxysu yat-suwa kaapiya'jna nesthu yu'.
Txã'wẽy judiuwe'sx vxite' judiu ji'jmée txãawe'sxtxiwa jxukaysatx pta'sxthu: Dxus tasxte sxawedxa' pkaltxi nvxihtçxa kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo'swa ũuste miipa'gawe jĩna.
Ãçxha' u'jweçthu Jerusalenna Espiritu kaahni. Nawa jiimée u'jweçthu kxte jwee kĩhçxa yuune'thewa.
Naasáa na'wẽ yuuçxáa jiith: maa çxhabte u'thewa Dxus Espiritu' pta'sxna nesku yu' karcelte kxuuphni wala nxuswa'j ji'phgu jĩna.
Nawa txã'sa' yaaki'çmeeth, sa' adx uuwa'ja's yuhwa ũukhu'çmeeth. Jesukristo neewe'wek Dxus peeygãani's txã'sna uu entepkaçx weçxana pta'sxna fxi'zewaççxáa, txã'wẽena sũju'th.
Ayte i'kwe'sx yakh ũsçxa' Dxus jxkaahwa'j ena's pta'sxthu txã's wẽse'jsa aytewe'sxa' adxa's ãçxhuyã'ja' peena yu' uymeene'kwe sũju'th.
Nawa adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi kaapiya'jyã'th na' yuuwemeeth,
txãa pa'gatey Dxus jxthãasni's paaçte nvxihtmée jxuka ãateçxaçxáath pta'sx naa pa'ga.
Aça' ãçxha' peekíi ya'mpa'yajkxwe, txã'wẽy Jesukristo ee pkawçxa weynisa Dxus luuçxtxiwa ew jxpe'jna, Dxus Espiritu' i'kwe'sxtxik thegwa'jsa nvxiht naa pa'ga.
Jiith adx u'the', vxite pa'jatxna Dxus yakh fxi'zesawe'sxtxi ivxiitu wẽena, sxĩ'j weesweewa ma'wẽta piisxaatx ivxiitu' txã'wẽy yũuya'.
Jxpa'yakxmeeçxa', i'kwe'sx pwe'sxíiwa kasejene'kwe isasa's pta'sxipkaçxte kaypuba'jwa'jçxá's pta'sxna Dxus yakh fxi'zesatx kaypuba'jna.
I'kwe'sxa' miiyajkxwe, adxa' tekh anxuth teeçxsa na'wẽçxah yu'kxpehna ũsu' en petx kus yã'jçxa ũ'ne petx khakh.

Ãçxha' yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi Dxusa's neewe'weçxa txajx kusete nvxiituçthu txajx kaapiya'jni's peçxkanamée fxi'zekahn, txãa pa'gatey txajx yuwe' kçxhãaçxha'jna weçxana kaafxi'ze'jçxa cielute txajx nwe'wenisa jxukaysa yakh ũswa'ja'swa ũsya' ãjawa'jsa'.
Adxa' i'kwe'sx yakh ũsçxa', vxyu, ropa, txã'wẽsa pees jxthãasna fxi'zemeeth kim yuhnawa.
I'kwe'sxa' ew jii i'kwe txã'wẽ yũumée, adx kuseju mjĩiçxath kĩh peejini'swa uyu', vxite' adx yakh u'jusawe'sx jĩiwa txã'wẽy.
Txã'wẽ vxite jxpeejxsatx pu'çxwa'ja's kaapiya'jnath fxi'ze bagaçxtewa. Txã'wẽ yũukahníik Jesukristowa na'jĩ': Peessa yakh wejx weçxa yuja' jxpa'gasate jxthaakwe jĩ'k.
Pablo' we'wena jxã'jçxa', jxukaysa yakh peejxũkweçxa Dxus yakh puutx we'wek.
Txajũ' jxukaysa ũ'nena psxa'dçxa Pablo's weçxatx.
Txã'wẽ peena yu' uymeene'kwe jĩte', wala nxusna ũsu'tx, sa' pi'kxna u'jtx barkote khẽepkaçx.
Yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi nvxihtçxa, barkote khẽena'wa teehwed u'tha'w teeçx ahte Kos yaasesate. Sa' vxite enkhẽ' Rodas kiwete pa'tha'w. Txãajũ Pátara çxhabnatha'w u'j.
Pátara çxhabte pa'jçxa, teeçx barko uytha'w Fxenicia kiwen u'jsa, txãatetha'w khẽeçxa u'j.
Çxipre kiwe's uynatha'w skhẽw, txã' jebu ju'guk neeyũu. Txã'wẽ u'jçxatha'w Siria kiwete pa'j. Sa' Tiro çxhabte u'katha'w barko' kxte karga spãasxwa'kh ji'phu' naa pa'ga.
Kxte' Kristo's nwẽese'jsawe'sxtxitha'w uy, sa' siete entha'w ũsu' txãawe'sx yakh. Aça' txãawe'sxtxi Dxus Espiritu kaajiyu'the', Pablo's pta'sxtxi Jerusalenna u'jmeene'ga jĩna.

Txã'wẽtewa, siete en skhẽuuçpkaçxha', kasehtha'w. Aça' Kristo's nwẽese'jsawe'sx jxukaysa nyuuwe'sx petx luuçx yã'jçxa pi'kxna yuwe'tx çxhab ekaju kasehpkaçx. Sa' kxte ĩkh pukate peejxũkweçxa Dxus yakh puutx we'weçxa,
psxa'dna weçxana'wa barkote khẽetha'w. Naapkaçxha' txãawe'sxa' sxawedtxi yatna.
Kwe'sxa' Tiro çxhabuh barkote u'jçxa, Tolemaida çxhabtetha'w pa'j. Kxte teeçx entha'w ũsu' yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi weçxana.

Vxite kuskuskhẽ' Pablo vxite' txãa yakh u'jusa yã'jçxa kasehtha'w Cesarea çxhabna u'jya'. Kxte pa'jçxa', Fxelipe yatna u'jçxa kxtetha'w deh. Txãa yu' Pedro txhitxhku siete diákono txãatewe'sxku yu' Jesukristo kaapiya'jni's jxpa'gaçxa pta'sxna pekũhsa.
Txãa Fxelipe' pahz niisa kna'sasak ji'phu', Dxus we'weni's pta'sxsa.
Kxte maz en ũspkaçxha', teeçx piçthẽ'j pa'kh, Agabo yaasesa Judea kiwejuwe'sx, Dxus kĩh yũuya'watewa dxiikhẽy pta'sxsa.
Txã' kwe'sxtxi puutx uyçxa', Pablo jxtudni's pẽjxçxa peekíiçxáa çxida petx kuse yakh ya'jytudçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Dxus Espiritu' pta'sxi'k, Jerusalente judiuwe'sxa' naa jxtudni namu's na'wẽ tudçxa vxite nasatx dukhetxna jĩk.
Txã'jĩni's wẽse'jçxa', kwe'sx vxite' Cesareatewe'sx yã'jçxa wala neevxisxatha'w Pablo's Jerusalenna u'khamen.
Nawa Pablo' na'wẽk pas:
—¿Kĩjxa'kwe txakwe nxusna ũ'ne', adxna khaawãsxi'j wẽeçxa? Adxa' Jesukristo's selpiipa'ga tudniçxáa yuumée, Jerusalente uuwa'j ma'k yuu nawa txã'sa' ũukhu'çmeeth jĩk.
Neevxisxaya' ãjameeyã'jçxa', Dxus ma'wẽ jxthãaste' kxtey yuuna jĩnaçxáatha'w we'we.
Txãa e'su', pheu'jna'wa Jerusalenna u'tha'w.

Aça' Cesareate yakhthẽ'jwe'sx pi'kxna yuwe'tx, vxite' txãawe'sx yakh teeçx piçthẽ'j Çxipre kiwejuwe'sx, wala txaçxyã'j Dxus yakh fxi'zesa Mnasón yaasesawa yuwe'k. Aça' kwe'sxa' txajx yatte dejxa'tha'w puutx we'we.
Jerusalente pa'the', kxte yakhthẽ'jwe'sxa' wala weçxana jxpa'gatx.
Vxite enkhẽ' Pablo' kwe'sx yakh u'kh Jakobo yatna pa'jya', aça' kxtea' ancianowe'sx jxukaysatx ũsu'.
Pablo' weçxana jxã'jçxa', pta'sxku judiu ji'jmée vxite nasa ksxavxysuwa Dxus yuwe's pta'sxte', txãawe'sxtxi Dxus ma'wẽ yũuni'swa jxuka.
Aça' wẽse'jçxa', Dxusa's wala weçxaçxa na'wẽtx pta'sx Pablo's:
—Yakhthẽ'j, idxa' jiiyã'jne'ga judiu ji'jwe'sx wala kuhsa Jesus kaapiya'jni's jxpa'gasa ũsta', sa' txãawe'sxa' Moises leya's nvxihtmeete ewna jĩ'tx.

Txãawe'sxa' na'jĩni'sta jiyu: Idxa' judiuwe'sx jxukaysatx vxite kiwejuwe'sxtxi kaapiya'jçxa Moises jxkaahni's nwẽese'jmeene'kwe, sa' i'kwe'sx luuçxtxiwa cirkuncidãimeene'kwe, kĩh yuhnawa kxtey yuuwa'jme', txã'jĩnak pta'sxi' jĩni's jiita'.
Sa' iidx pa'jni's jiyuçxa', txãawe'sxa' idxa's wẽse'jya' pkhaakhetxna, aça' ¿kĩh yũukxtha'w?
Wejxwa na'wẽ yũune'ga: Ayte pahz piçthẽ'j ũsta'. Txãawe'sxa' Dxus yatte u'kaya' ãjawa'ja's Moises ley jxkaaja'k txã'sa' kxtey yuuya' ũsta'.

Aça' idxa' txãawe'sxtxi dxuus yatna pe'jna u'jçxa ley jxkaahni ki'swa'ja's kxtey kxu'ju'june'ga petx idx yã'jçxa. Sa' kxte dukhwa'ja'swa idxçxaçxáa deweene'ga. Txajũ' txãawe'sxa' dxkhasa's ktxiidxi'jitxna idxwa txã'wẽy. Txã'wẽ leya's kxtey yuute', maawa jiyutxna txã'wẽ Pablo' leya's nvxiitwa'ja' jĩnak jxkaaja' jĩçxa' ĩsxiija'ne'ta sũhna.

Nawa judiu ji'jmée vxite nasaçxawa Jesus kaapiya'jni's jxpa'gasawe'sx yu' ley jxkaahni's kxtey yuuwa'j ji'phmeeta'. Txãawe'sxtxi' kwe'sxa' pta'sxna fxi'jyã'tha'w na'wẽ yũuwa'ja's: Dxus ĩtximeesatx weçxaya' tajkx ikhni çxiçxa's ũ'wa'jme', eenawa ũ'wa'jme', tajkxa's thukçxa ikhnisa çxiçxa'swa ũ'wa'jme', sa' ptammeesa' pkal yũuna fxi'zewa'jme' jĩna pta'sxnisaçxá's kxtey yuuwa'jsata' jĩtx.
Txajũ' Pablo' txãa pahz piçthẽ'jtx pe'jna u'jçxa', kuskus enkhẽ' ley jxkaahni's jxuka kxtey yuuçxak dxuus yat dxiite u'ka kĩh entepkaçx ki'sya'waçxawa txãatx pta'sxya'.
Sa' siete en ki'swa'jtx jxuka jxã'jaçpkaçxha', Asia kiwejuwe'sx judiuwe'sx pa'jçxa Pablo's dxuus yatte uyçxa', nasa jxukaysatx kaaũusçxa'jna'wa Pablo's tudçxa
na'wẽtx sus we'we:

—Israelwe'sx, mpu'çxwe. Naa piçthẽ'jíik msuuwa jxuka nasa jxukaysatx kaapiya'jna pekũju' kwe'sx ji'jtx açewe'wena, Moises leynawa txã'wẽy. Sa' dxuus yatnawa açewe'we'k. Sa' txã'wẽçxáa yũumée, ãçxha' judiu ji'jmée griegowe'sxtxiwa dxuus yat dxiite ka'gak kazx vxitna jĩ'tx.
Efxeso çxhabuwe'sx Trófximo yakh Pablo' Jerusalente ũste ne'ta uy, txãasatx dxuus yat dxiite ka'ga'jne' sũhçxa txã'jĩna we'we'.
Txã'jĩna pta'sxni seena' suste', nasa' wala dud kũhçxa Pablo's tudçxa dxuus yat ekaju wezxna kutxi'jiçpkaçxha', vxitxa's aphtxi.
Ikhya'watx yu', nawa komadante' jiyuk Jerusalen çxhabtewe'sx seena' susna ũsta' jĩni's.
Txajũ' komadante' soldau vxite' txãawe'sx pwe'sx jxtuhthesatx pkhakhçxa wuwuuçxáatx kũh nasa susna ũsnite. Aça' komadante vxite' soldauwe'sxtxi uyçxa', Pablo's ikhmeeta'.
Txajũ' komadante kũhçxa Pablo's e'z kadenajuk tudkaah. Txã'wẽ yũuçxak pẽjx ¿kimna sa' kĩhga yũu? jĩna.
Nawa nasa txã'wẽ jxukaysa sus we'wena ũste', komadante jiyuya' ãjameeçxa', kuartel yatna jxũna u'khaakh.
Kuartel yat vxitxte kũhnaçxáa soldauwe'sxa' Pablo's yakhçxatx u'j, txã'wẽ nasa' ikh wẽesa e'ste neeuna:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja's ikhwa'ja' jĩna sus we'wena yuupa'ga.
Pablo's kuartel yatte ka'ga'jaçte', txã' na'wẽk we'we griego yuweju komadante's:
—¿Maz yuweçxáawa kwe'we'jmeema'g? jĩte', komadante pasçxa':
—Idxa' ¿griegowá'ga?
Txã'wẽçxa' ¿nyafxíi entey teeçx Egiptojuwe'sx na'wẽ nasa ikhsaçxaçxáatx kuatro mil ãh nasa u'pnimeete pkhakhçxa puii kiisku txãameene'ga? jĩte',
Pablo' na'jĩk:
—Adxa' judiuth. Cilicia kiwete Tarso çxhab jxtuhthesatewe'sxthu. Aça' naa nasatx we'wewa'ja's ũsune'ga jĩte',
komadante' ũythasku. Naapkaçxha' Pablo' kuartel vxitxte yujuna'wa kuseju sxuuna' yuuwa'ja's pta'sxte', jxuka sxuuna' yuutx, aça' na'wẽk we'we hebreo yuweju:
—Yakhthẽ'j vxite' thẽ'jsawe'sx, mwẽese'jwe adx we'weni's jĩte',
hebreo yuweju we'weni's wẽse'jçxa', wejxtxi sxuuna' yuu. Txajũ' Pablo' na'jĩk:

—Adxa' judiuth, Cilicia kiwete Tarso çxhabte upxsa. Nawa ayte Jerusalente Gamaliel kaapiya'jni walasaath, kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx leya's wala ew nwẽese'jna. Bagaçxtewa Dxusa's ũusuh jxukath selpiina fxi'ze', naa ente i'kwe'sx ma'wẽkwe selpi' txã'wẽy.
Adxa' nyafxí' Jesus kaapiya'jni's nwẽese'jsatx ahçeçxa kiikhe'jna vxitetxi' tudçxa jxũna u'th piçthẽ'j petx u'y yã'jçxa karcelte txajxa'.

Sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx jxukaysa jiita' txã'wẽ Jesukristo yakh fxi'zesatx tudwa'ja's Damaskote yakhthẽ'j judiuwe'sxtxi pta'sxna karta pẽyni's. Txã'wẽ yũuçxath u'j tudçxa ay Jerusalente nuypa'jçxa kastigãyya'.
Nawa adxa' ẽepxãh Damasko çxhabte utxaana pa'jaçpkaçxha', naa dudte ẽe walaju eenak kweeth adx dxi'pte uymeenus.
Aça' kiwega weteeçpkaçxha', na'wẽk we'weni pthũuse: Saulo, Saulo, ¿kĩh yũupa'gaga adxa's ahçeçxa pkxuuya' pakwé'? jĩte',
pẽjxthu: Idxa' ¿kimga? Txajũ' na'wẽk pta'sx: Idx na'wẽ ahçeçxa pkxuuya' pakwe'g txãath Jesus Nasarethuwe'sx jĩk.
Aça' adx yakh u'jsa' txã'wẽ eena' kweethni's uyçxa wala ũukhtxi. Nawa adxa's we'weni yu'sa' jiyumeeta'.
Txajũ' adxa' na'jĩnath we'we: ¿Kĩhga yũu jxthãasu'? jĩte', Kiiteçxa Damaskon me'j, kxte ya'pta'sxina kĩh yũuwa'ja'swa jĩnak jxkaah.
Txã'wẽ eena' kweethnijũçxáa uyya' ãjãmeete', adx yakh pi'kxna u'jsawe'sxa' adxa's pu'kisçxa u'jtx Damaskote pa'j.
Kxtea' teeçx piçthẽ'j u'pu'k Ananias yaasesa, Moises leya's jxuka nwẽese'jsa. Txã'wẽ nwẽese'pha'gatx kxte judiuwe'sxa' txãa Ananiasa's wala jxtuhthesa' jĩna we'we'.
Txãa Ananiasa' adxa's thegya' pa'jçxa', na'wẽk we'we: Yakhthẽ'j Saulo, idxa' uyya' ãjawa'ja's ki' mpa'ga jĩçpkaçxha', thegçxa' uyya' ãjath.
Txajũ' na'wẽk pta'sx: Kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Dxusa' idxa's nyafxiiteyku txhitxh txã'sna nwẽese'jwa'jsa, sa' kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmeesa's yafxju uyçxa txajx yuweju we'weni'swa wẽse'jwa'jsa.
Ãçxha' idxa' naa kiwete jxukaysa dxi'pte Dxus yuwe's pta'sxya' u'jwene'ga sa' ma'wẽçxahne'ga uyna wẽse'jna yuu txã'snawa pta'sxya'.
Sa' ¿kĩjxa'çxáa txakwe wala jxthẽeyuuki'g? Ãçxhíi kiitena'wa yu'te ya'bautisãyçxa Jesukristo's ũusuh jxuka miiyajkx iidx pkal peltunãyni yuukahn jĩnak jxkaah.
Txãa e'su' Jerusalenna ki' sxawedçxa dxuus yatna Dxus yakh puutx we'weya' u'the', Jesusa' adxa's kxte vxyaaçxa,
na'wẽk we'we: Jerusalenuh dudçxáa mkaaseh. Txã'wẽme', idxa' makwe pta'sxtewa nwẽese'jmeetxna jĩte',
na'wẽth pas: Adx txã'wẽ judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yat-su u'jçxa kxsũ idxna neewe'wesatx karcelte txahna vxitetxi' kxuuphsath.
Sa' idxna neewe'wena selpisáa Esteban eea's pkawuuçtewa uynath ũsu', txã'wẽ yũuni ewna sũhna. Sa' ikhsawe'sx atxhtxi thegsath yu' jĩtewa,
Jesusa' na'jĩnak jxkaah: Me'jçxáa, adxa' jxu'j kaajxa'wath judiu ji'jmée vxite nasatx pta'sxya' jĩk.
Txã'wẽ judiu ji'jmée vxite nasatx pta'sxya' jĩni's wẽse'jçxatx, ki' ũusaçxana na'jĩna sus we'we:
—Txãa piçthẽ'ja's ikhteçxáa ewna. Peena yu' ĩtxi fxi'zemeena jĩ'tx.
Txã'wẽ sus we'wena, txãawe'sx atxhtxi ẽete wãatahna kiwe's paçxçxa txã'wẽy yuuteçxáa,
komadante' Pablo's kuartel yatte ka'ga'khaahçxa peçxuukwekaakh, txã'wẽ yũuna khaawãsxi'jçxak pẽjxya'wa yu' kĩh yũupa'ga nasa' txã'wẽ wala ũusaçxana ahçetewa jiyuya'.
Nawa tuduçpkaçxha', Pablo' na'wẽk we'we kpiitana's:
—I'kwe'sxa' romano nasa's peçxujkwete ¿ewmanx? kĩh yuuwetewa jiyumey.
Txã'wẽ we'wete', kpiitana' na'wẽk pta'sxya' u'j komadante's:
—Na'wẽ yũuni's mpa'yajkx. Txã'wẽme', naa piçthẽ'ja' romano nasa' jĩte',
komadante' Pablo tasxte utxaaçxa pẽjxku:
—Isa idxa' ¿romano nasa dxihgá'? jĩna. Aça' Pablo pasçxa':
—Txã'wẽ íith jĩk.
Txajũ' komadante we'weçxa':
—Adxa' wala vxyu dukhçxaçxáa romano nasa yuuna pa'th jĩte', Pablo pasçxa':
—Adxa' upxhíi txãa yã'th yu' jĩk.
Txajũ' Pablo's peçxuukwewa'jsa' kuçx yuumée nvxihttxi. Aça' komadante yuhwa txã'wẽ romano nasatewa jiyuçxa', wala ũukhku txã'wẽ tudpa'ga.

Judiuwe'sxa' kĩh yũupa'gane'ta Pablo's açe' nawa txã'sna jiyu wẽeçxa, kuskuskhẽ' komadante' jxkaakh sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx jxukaysatx pkhaakhekahn. Txã'wẽ yũuçxak kadenatx khihbçxa txãawe'sx tasxte txah Pablo's.
Pablo' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx pkhaakhesatx thegçxa', na'wẽk we'we:
—Yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, adxa' ãçxpkaçx Dxus dxi'pte jxpubath sũhwa'j yu'sa' ji'phmeeth jĩte',
sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j Ananiasa' Pablo yuwega petxa kaakh pukate ih ũssatx.
Aça' Pablo' na'wẽk we'we:
—Ãateçxáa ew we'weçxa' ũuste yu' ewmée yaakxpa'ga idxa's Dxus kastigaĩna. Idxa' ley jxkaahniçxá's kxtey yuusath ¿sũju'gá'? Txã'wẽçxa' ¿kĩjxa'ga adxa's petxakaja'? Leya' txã'wẽ jxkaaja'çme' jĩte',
kxte ũssa' na'wẽtx we'we:
—Dxusna selpisáa sacerdote npiiçthẽ'ja's txã'wẽ wẽesxuwa'j ji'phmeeg jĩte',
Pablo' pasçxa':
—Dxusna selpisáa sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jna sũju'çme'ntka. Jiiwaça', txã'wẽ paswa'jmeene'tka yu'. Txã'wẽ yuukahmeníik Dxus librutewa na'wẽ pta'sxi': Iidx çxhabte jxkaahsa's juuna' we'wenu jĩ'k naa pa'ga.
Txajũ' kxte pkhaakhesawe'sxa' saduceo vxite' fxariseowe'sx txãawe'sxtewa jiyuçxa', Pablo' na'wẽk sus we'we:
—Yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, adxa' fxariseo ji'j, fxariseo íiçxáath. Uusaawe'sxa' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuwa'jsa yuhta' sũhna yaakxsath. Txãa pa'ga yuuçxáa adxa's ewmeesa' jĩna ũsta'.
Txã'wẽ we'wete', fxariseo vxite' saduceowe'sx yakh txãawe'sx pwe'sx juuna' we'weçxa puutx txuteetx.

(Saduceowe'sxa' uusaawe'sxa' ki' ĩtxi yuutxna sũju'çmeeta', sa' uute' nasaa ũus vxite' angeleswe'sx txã'wẽsa ũstxna sũju'çwameeta', naapkaçxha' fxariseowe'sxa' txã'wẽsa jxuka ũstxna sũju'tx, txãasatx puutx txutee.)
Txã'wẽ yũuçxa txãawe'sx pwe'sx wala sustxi ũusçxa we'wena. Aça' fxariseowe'sx ju'gusa ley kaapiya'jsawe'sx maaíi yu' kiiteçxa na'wẽtx we'we:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' ewmée yũusame'. Meeçxa' Dxus angel wá' yu', meeçxa' uusáa ũus wá' txã'wẽ vxyaa, nawa jiimeeçxa' kuçx we'wemeeyuga. Txã'wẽme', jiimeeçxa' Dxusa's wáa açewe'wesa yu'nja'w jĩ'tx.
Seena' ũusaçxana suste', komadante' Pablo's ikhewáatxna sũhna ũukhçxa soldautx yuukaahçxa, Pablo's kutxi'khaakh pkhaakhesa ksxavxyu kuartel yatnay jxũna u'khan.
Txãa kuste', Jesukristo' Pablo's vxyaaçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Pablo, ũukhnu. Ay Jerusalente na'wẽg we'we adxna pta'sxna, txã'wẽy we'wewa'j ji'phgu Romatewa jĩk.
Kuskuskhẽ' judiuwe'sx maaíi yu' Pablo's ikh wẽesa na'wẽtx puutx we'we: Pablo's ikhmeeçxa yu' kĩh yuhwa ũ'me'nja'w jĩna.
Txã'wẽ Pablo's ikhmeeçxa yu' kĩh yuhwa ũ'ya'mée puutx we'wesa' kuarenta piçthẽ'j jxthaakwetx yu'.
Txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's puutx we'weçxatx u'j sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx tasxna na'jĩna pta'sxya':
—Kwe'sxa' Pablo's ikhmeeçxa yu' kĩh yuhwa ũ'me'nja'w jĩnatha'w puutx we'we Dxus dxi'pte.

Aça' ãçxha' i'kwe'sx nthẽ'jsawe'sx jxuka pkhaakheçxa mpẽjxwe komadante's: Kuskusa' Pablo's mkaah kwe'sx tasxte, txajx yuwe's jwee ew paapẽjx ya'watha'w jĩna. Naapkaçxha' kwe'sxa' ayte pa'jmeyna ikhya' dxi'the yupu'nja'w jĩ'tx.
Txã'wẽ puutx we'weçte Pablo npe'sx nçxi'k jiyuçxa', Pablo's pta'sxya' u'kh kuartel yatna.
Aça' Pablo' jiyuçxa', teeçx kpiitana's pa'yaçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Naa luuçxa's meen pe'jna me'j komadante tasxna, txãa yakh puutx we'wewa'j ji'pha' jĩte',
kpiitana' luuçxa's pe'jçxa komadante tasxte kũhçxa pta'sxku:
—Karcelte ũssa Pablo' adxa's pa'yaçxa naa luuçxa's pe'jna kaakh, ayte idx yakh puutx we'wewa'j ji'pha' jĩte',
komadante' luuçxa's kusete pu'kisna u'jçxa paaçte pẽjxku:
—¿Kĩhga we'we wẽje'? jĩte',
luuçxa' pta'sxku:
—Judiuwe'sxa' na'wẽtx puutx we'we: Kuskusa' idxa's pẽyi'nja'w Pablo's kaakhan, judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx tasxna yuuwe's jwee ew pẽjxya'watha'w jĩçxa.

Nawa txã'wẽ dxihna sũhçxa Pablo's kaahmeene'ga. Txã'wẽme', piçthẽ'j kuarenta jxthaakwesa Pablo's ikhmeeçxa yu' kĩh yuhwa ũ'me'nja'w jĩna Dxus dxi'pte puutx we'weçxa dxi'the yupna ũsta'. Sa' idx ma'jĩtewa txã'sçxáan ũythasna ũsta' jĩte',
komadante' luuçxa's na'jĩna we'weçxak kaah:
—Komadante's pta'sxthu jĩna kim yuhnawa pta'sxmeene'ga jĩçxa.

Txajũ' komadante' e'z kpiitantxi pa'yaçxa Cesarea çxhabna u'jya' pheu'khaakh. Doscientos soldau çxidaçxáa u'jwetxna, jibatewe'sx setenta, vxite' lansa ji'phsa doscientos, sa' ayjxu kasejetxna kus las nwewete.
Sa' txã'wẽy Pablo a'jwa'j jibawa pheu'khaakh, ne'jwe'sx Fxelix tasxte ikhmée ew dukhkahn.
Txãawe'sx yakh karta kaakh na'wẽ fxi'jçxa:
Klaudio Lisias fxi'jaçthu ne'jwe'sx Fxelixa's weçxana.
Naa piçthẽ'ja's judiuwe'sxa' karcelte txahçxa ikhya'watx yu'. Nawa romano nasatewa jiyuçxa', adxa' soldau yakh u'jçxa nwe'weth.
¿Kĩh yũupa'gaki'tx txã'wẽ açe'? sũhçxa jxũna u'th judiuwe'sx nthẽ'jsawe'sx tasxna.
Aça' txãawe'sx ley pa'gaçxáata txã'wẽ açe', nawa ikhya' yu' ãjawa'jmeek yu' sa' karcelte txajxa'wa ãjawa'jme'.

Nawa Pablo's ikhya' yuuçxáa jĩna puutx we'weçxa yupna ũsta' jĩni's jiyuth. Txãasa iidx tasxte kajaçthu. Pablo's açesatxwa we'weth kĩh yũupa'gane'kwe açe' nawa ne'jwe'sx tasxte u'jçxa puutx we'wene'kwe jĩth. Txã'wẽçxáath idxa's pta'sxi' jĩnak fxi'j.
Txajũ' soldauwe'sxtxi txã'wẽ jxkaajxã'the', Pablo's pe'jna'wa kusçxáa u'jtx Antípatris çxhabna.
Kuskuskhẽ' soldau çxidaçxáa u'jsa' ki' sxawedtxi kuartel yatna, naapkaçxha' jibatewe'sxa' u'jtx Pablo yakh.
Cesarea çxhabte pa'jçxa', karta's ũsna'wa Pablonawa dukhtxi ne'jwe'sxa's.
Txajũ' ne'jwe'sxa' karta's lẽeyçxa' pẽjxku Pablo's: ¿Majũwe'sxga? jĩna. Sa' Ciliciajũwe'sxtewa jiyuçxa',
na'wẽk we'we:
—Iidx yuuwe's jiyu'nja idxna açesawe'sx pãatxhĩ'khya' pa'the jĩk.
Txajũ' Pablo's Herodes txaahni yatte kxuuphku thegwa'jsa txahçxa.

Tahç ente' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'j Ananiasa' pa'kh Cesarea çxhabte judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx yã'jçxa, sa' teeçx yuwee pu'çxsa Tértulo yaasesa'sku pe'jçxa pa'j. Txãawe'sxa' utxaatx ne'jwe'sx tasxte Pablo' ewmeesa' jĩna pãatxhĩ'khya'.
Txajũ' Pablo's nuykũhte', Tértulo' Fxelixa's pta'sxku:
—Weçx u'pu'ga, ne'jwe'sx. Iidx jxkaahnite, mteewa wẽt fxi'zena ũstha'w.
Mteewa txã'wẽçxaçxáa wẽt fxi'zena ũstha'w, Fxelix idx txã'wẽ ew yũupa'ga. Txãasatha'w wala weçxá'.
Nawa idxa's jwee yu' en kaavxitu'jya'wameeth, dudte meen mwẽese'j kwe'sx we'weni's.
Naa piçthẽ'ja' iiméh seena' ewmeesatewa kwe'sxa' kpajkxtha'w. Maa kiwesuwa jxuka judiuwe'sxtxi txuhdena puii kiisna ũsa'. Sa' txãaíi Nasarethuwe'sxa's nwẽese'jsa npiiçthẽ'ja'.
Dxuus yatte yuhwa nasa pkalsatx ka'ga'jya'wak yu' kazx vxitna. Txãa pa'ga kwe'sxa' tudtha'w, kwe'sx ley ma'wẽ jxkaathe' kxtey yuuya'.
Nawa komadante Lisias kwe'sx yakh ja'da wala juuna' kũhçxa kusa'kh,
sa' açesawe'sxa' ne'jwe'sx tasxte pãatxhĩ'khya' u'jwetxna jĩnak jxkaah. Kwe'sx we'weni' ĩsxiinimée jxuka isatewa jiyuya' idx yuu mpẽjx naa piçthẽ'ja's jĩnak we'we.
Txajũ' judiuwe'sx kxte ih ũssawa txã' jxuka isasa yuja' jĩna we'wete',
ne'jwe'sxa' kuseju pta'sxku Pablo's we'wekahn. Aça' Pablo' na'wẽk we'we:
—Adxa' jiith idxa' wala kuh anxu yã'j kwe'sx kiwete jxkaahna ũsgu. Txãa pa'ga adxa' iidx dxi'pte ũukhmée pasya'wath adx ma'wẽsaçxawa.
Idx yuu mpaapẽjx txãawe'sx we'weni' isa dxihtewa jiyuya'. Dxusa's Jerusalente neewe'weya' adx pa'jni doce ençxáa yuuça'.
Adxa' txãa doce ensu' dxuus yatte nasatx kaapui'jna judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yat-su çxhabte msuu yuhwa txã'wẽ yũuna ũsu'çmeeth.
Aça' ewmée yũunisa' naata' jĩna ãate kaavxya'ja'jya' yu' kim yuhwa ãjameetxna naa nasa'.

Nawa ãateth pta'sxi' Dxus tasxte pa'jwa'j dxi'ja's ãçxh u'se kaajiyu'jnisa' ĩsxiinisa' jĩ'tx txã'snath nwẽese'je' kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Dxusa's selpiina. Sa' txã'wẽ Dxus jxkaahni leyte fxi'jni vxite' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx fxi'jnitx jxukath kxtey nwẽese'je'.
Txãawe'sxwa ma'wẽne'ta Dxusa's nwẽese'jna yaaki' txã'wẽyçxáath adxwa nwẽese'jna yaaki'. Uusaawe'sxa' ki' ĩtxi yuutxna ewsa ma'tx yuu meeçxa' ewmeesa ma'tx yuu nawa ja'daçxah sũhnath yaaki'.
Txãasath Dxus dxi'pte vxite' piçthẽ'jwe'sx dxi'ptewa yuuwemée fxi'zewa'ja's pa'pçxu'.
Adxa' vxite kiwesu maz anxu pekũhna u'juçxa', adx kiwen u'th judiuwe'sxtxi vxyu peesya' kaahnitx dukhna Dxus ofxreda'swa ũsya'.
Adxa' txã'wẽ yũuna ley jxkaahni'swa ki'sna jxã'jçxa dxuus yatte ũspkaçxha', judiuwe'sx Asia kiwejuwe'sx pa'jçxa dxuus yatte uytxi. Nawa nasatx kĩh yuhwa kaapui'jna ũsu'çmeeth.
Txã'wẽ uysaawe'sx ayte pãatxhĩ'khya' yuuwa'j ji'phta', adx ewmée yũuna ũstewa uyçxa'.
Meeçxa' komadante pkhakhte judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx vxite' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx kxte ũssa i'kwe'sxçxáawa adx ewmée yũuni's uywá'kwe na' mpeeta'sxwe.
Adxa' kxte ũsçxa', Uusaawe'sxa' ki' ĩtxi yuutxna jĩnaçxáath we'we txã'sna wá'kwe ewméek yuu sũju'kx jĩk.
Fxelixa's ew yã'kh pta'sxni yu', txãasak txã'wẽçxáa wẽse'jçxaçxáa:
—Komadante Lisias pa'the, txãa yuwe's pheu'ju'nja jĩçxa nvxiht.
Txajũ' Fxelixa' kpiitana's jxkaakh:
—Pablo's txhweetenu. Nawa jwee jxthaakwe juuna' yũumée miipe'j, sa' txajx namikuwe'sx yakh puutx we'wewa'ja'swa mes jĩk.
Maz en skhẽwniite', Fxelixa' txajx nyu Drusila yakh ki' kũhçxa Pablo's pa'ya kaakh, Jesukristo pta'sxni's we'wekahn. Txãa u'ya' judiuk yu'.
Aça' Pablo' pta'sxku Dxus dxi'pte ew fxi'zewa'ja', sa' peekx kakwe's ewmée yũuna jxpe'jwa'jme'. Txã'wẽme', nmeh ente' Dxusa' kastigaĩna jĩna we'wete', Fxelixa' wala ũukhçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Ãçxhíi yu' txã'wẽçxáa mpeeta'sx. Vxite ente adx en ji'phuçxa ki' pa'ya'nja jĩk.
Pablo' vxyu dukhe'nja txhwetekahn jĩwáana sũhçxak txã'wẽ maz uswa pa'ya Fxelixa' txãa yakh puutx we'weya'.

Txã'wẽ e'z anxupkaçx Pablo's karcelte jxpe'jna ũsçxaçxáa Fxelixa' ne'jwe'sx kasejk, aça' vxite ne'jwe'sx Porcio Fxestok u'ka. Nawa Fxelixa' judiuwe'sx yaaçeni fxi'ze wẽemeeçxa, Pablo's karcelte nvxihtku.
Txajũ' Fxesto' Cesarea çxhabte ne'jwe'sx u'kaçxa', tekh ente' Jerusalenna u'kh.
Kxte' sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' judiu jxtuhthesawe'sxa' utxaatx Pablo' ewmeesa' jĩna pãatxhĩ'khya'.
Sa' Pablo's pe'jya' mkaah Jerusalenna yuukahn jĩnatx pẽjx. Txãawe'sx yu' dxi'the ikhya' sũhçxatx txã'wẽ pẽjx.
Nawa Fxesto pasçxa':
—Pablo' Cesareate preesu ũsa'. Aça' maz enteçxáa adxa' txãa çxhabnaíi u'jweçthu.
Txãasath na'jĩ': Txãa piçthẽ'j ewmée yũuni's pãatxhĩ'khwa'j ji'phçxa', i'kwe'sx jxtuhthesawe'sxa' adx yakh yuwetxna Cesarea çxhabna jĩk.
Fxesto' Jerusalente oçxo en jxthaakwe ũsçxaçxáa ki' sxawedku Cesarea çxhabna. Sa' kuskuskhẽ' yuwe paapẽyni yatte u'kaçxa kaçxna'wa, Pablo's yuukaakh.
Sa' kũjuçpkaçxha', judiuwe'sx Jerusalenuh pa'jsawa utxaatx kĩhtewa seena' ewmeesa' jĩna pãatxhĩ'khna. Nawa isasa yuja' jĩna ãate kaavxya'ja'jya' yu' ãjameeta'.
Txajũ' Pablo' na'wẽk pas:
—Adxa' kĩhte yuhwa yuuwemeeth. Judiuwe'sx ley, Dxus yatna, Romate jxkaahsa Cesar maate yuhwa yuuwemeeth jĩte',
Fxesto' judiuwe'sx yakh ewte neeyũu wẽeçxa na'wẽk pẽjx Pablo's:
—¿Jerusalenna u'jwẽega' iidx yuwe's kxte pheu'khan? jĩte',
Pablo pasçxa':
—Adx yuwe's pheu'jwa'jsa tasxte yã'j ũsthu, Cesar ki'pni iidx tasxte. Adxa' judiuwe'sx yakh kĩhte yuhwa yuuwemeetewa idxa' ew jiig.

Meeçxa' adx uuwa'the ãhwáane'tka yuuwe yuu aça' txã'wẽte yu' uuwa'ja's wa'lme'nja. Nawa pãatxhĩ'khnisa kĩh yuhwa isameete yu', kim yuhwa pãatxhĩ'khsa kusete adxa's dukhya' ãjameena. Wejxwa Cesar paapẽyni wejx ewna jĩte',
Fxesto' vxite npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx yakh puutx we'weçxa', na'wẽk pta'sx Pablo's:
—Cesar paapẽyni wejx ewna jĩ'g na' txajx tasxte pa'j u'jwene'ga jĩk.
Txajũ' maz en skhẽwniite', jxkaahsa Agripa vxite' Berenice yakh Cesarea çxhabte pa'jtx Fxesto's weçxaya'.
Kxte kuh entxi ũsu', aça' Fxesto' jxkaahsa's pta'sxku Pablo yuwe's:
—Ayte teeçx piçthẽ'j preesu ũsa', Fxelix nvxiitni.
Adx Jerusalente ũste', sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' judiu nthẽ'jsawe'sx pãatxhĩ'khtxi txãa piçthẽ'ja's ewmeete nvxiitkahn.
Aça' adxa' pta'sxthu: Romanowe'sx leya' maa yuhnawa ikh kaja'çme', pãatxhĩ'khsa yuuwesa yakh kaapdxi'pu'jçxa kim yuuwetewa jiyumey yu'.
Txajíi adxa' jxthẽeyuumée pãatxhĩ'khsawe'sx pa'jaçpkaçxha', kuskuskhẽ' yuwe paapẽyni yatte u'kana'wa txãa piçthẽ'ja's yuukaath.
Sa' ¿kĩh yũupa'ga yuuwekx? sũhna ũythasnath u'pu', nawa pãatxhĩ'khya' utxasaawe'sxa' ma'wẽ yuhwa ewmeete nvxiht-ya' ãjawa'jmeesaçxáanatx we'we.
Txãa piçthẽ'ja's açesawe'sxa' txãawe'sx Dxusa's neewe'wena fxi'zeni vxite' teeçx piçthẽ'j Jesus yaasesa uuçxawa ki' ĩtxi yuuk jĩna Pablo pta'sxni'sçxáatx we'we.
Txãa yuwe's adxa' ma'wẽ pheu'jya'wa ãjameeçxa', Pablo's pẽjxthu: ¿Jerusalenna u'j wẽega' kxte iidx yuwe's pheu'khan? jĩna.
Nawa txãa we'weçxa': Cesar paapẽyni wejx ewna jĩk, aça' txã'wẽ yã'the', aytee preesu ũsune'ga Cesar tasxte adx kaahpkaçx jĩnath we'we.
Txajũ' Agripa' na'wẽk we'we Fxesto's:
—Txã'wẽyã'the', wẽse'je'nja txãa piçthẽ'j we'weni's jĩte', Fxesto pasçxa':
—Kuskusíi wẽse'jene'ga jĩk.
Kuskuskhẽ' jxkaahsa Agripa vxite' Berenice vxite' soldau npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx vxite' çxhabte jxtuhthesa txãawe'sx yakh seena' zhiçxkwe susna u'kana kũhtx Fxesto u'pnite. Naapkaçxha' Pablo's yuu kaahçxa',
Fxesto' na'wẽk we'we:

—Jxkaahsa Agripa vxite' ayte pkhaakhena kwe'sx yakh ũssawe'sx ksxavxyte txajaçthu naa piçthẽ'ja's. Judiuwe'sx maazkuẽesawa naa piçthẽ'ja's açewe'we'tx Jerusalente vxite' aytewa, sa' ikhteçxáa ewna jĩna nestxi yu'.
Nawa txã'wẽ ikhkahnwa kĩhtewa yuuwemeena'k thegu'. Nawa txãaíik Cesar paapẽyni wejx ewna jĩ'. Aça' txajx tasxna kaja'nja sũju'th.

Nawa kĩhte yuuwetewa txã'sna pta'sxna jxkaahsa's fxi'jwa'j yu' uymeeth. Txãasa ãçxha' jxkaahsa Agripa iidx tasxte txajaçthu, vxite' jxukaysa dxi'pte, aça' idx paapẽjxçxa kĩhte yuuwetewa kpajkxçxa pta'sxte adxa' eça's fxi'jçxa kaja'nja.
Txã'wẽme', kxulna'k thegu' preesu kaahçxawa yuuwe yuuni's pta'sxmeete '.
Txajũ' Agripa' na'wẽk Pablo's we'we:
—Idx kĩh yũuna fxi'zeçxawa mpeeta'sx jĩte', Pablo' kuse's kiisçxa na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Judiuwe'sxa' adxa's ewmeesa' jĩnatx pãatxhĩ'khe' txã'sa' jxkaahsa Agripa iidx dxi'pte ãate pta'sxwa'ja's ji'phuçxa' wala weçxa'th.
Idxa' jxuka ew jiig kwe'sx judiu ji'j fxi'zeni vxite' na'wẽ fxiyfxiyçxah yajkxçxa puutx we'we'tha'w txã'sna. Txãasa wejx wa'lmée mwẽese'j.
Adx le'çxkuẽjũjx ma'wẽne'tka fxi'ze adx kiwete vxite' Jerusalente txã'sa' judiuwe'sx jxukaysa jiita'.
Fxariseowe'sxa' seena' juuna' jxkaaja'tx Dxus leya's jxuka kxtey yuukahn adxa' txãatewe'sxthu yu' piçtakxtey, aça' txãawe'sxa' jiita' na' txã'sa' pta'sxya' ãjatxna wa'lmeeçxa yu'.
Dxusa' kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx yakh puutx we'weçxa uusaawe'sxtxi ki' ĩtxĩ vxit-ya' neeyũuk txã'sa' kxtey yuuna sũhnath fxi'ze', naa pa'ga yuuçxáatx paapẽjxya' ayte nuypa'j.

Jxkaahsa Agripa mjiyu: Israelwe'sx docesate ji'j jxukaysatx ki' ĩtxi yuuwa'ja's ũythasu', txãasatx een isa petx kus Dxusa's selpi'. Txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's ũythaspa'ga yuuçxáatx judiuwe'sx adxa's ewmeesa' jĩçxa açe'.
Dxusa' txã'wẽ uusaawe'sxtxi ĩtxi vxituna ¿sũju'çmeekwe' wakx i'kwe'sxwa?
Adxa' nyafxíia' Jesus Nasarethuwe'sxa's ahçeçxa kĩhwa yu'nja sũhçxa,
Jerusalente sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx jxkaathe', Jesus kaapiya'jni's nwẽese'jsawe'sx maazkuẽesatxwa karcelte txahth. Sa' ikheçte uyçxa', ew yuh yuuçta' sũhnath fxi'ze'.
Maazkuẽe uswa iipkxuuth, Jesus yase's açewe'wekahn. Msuuwa judiuwe'sx pkhaakheni yat-su txã'wẽçxaçxáath yuu. Sa' seena' pxũuskwe yuute', vxite kiwesuwa u'th, txã'wẽy ahçeçxa pkxuuya'.
Txã'wẽ yũuya' sũhçxa, Damasko dxi'j u'jweçthu yu', sacerdote npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx kaahni.
Nawa jxkaahsa mwẽese'j: dxi'the u'jweçte ẽepxãh yuuçpkaçxha', sekte jxthaakwe eena'sa ẽejũ kweethku adx vxite' pi'kxna yuusáa jxukaysatx.
Txajũ' jxukaysa wetetha'w, naapkaçxha' adxa' wẽse'th hebreo yuweju na'wẽ we'weni's: Saulo, Saulo, ¿kĩjxa'ga adxa's ahçeçxa pkxuuya' pakwé'? Idxa' peekíiçxáa ya'kpã'yuuwa'ja's pakwena ũsgu jĩte',
pẽjxthu: ¿Idxa' kimga? jĩte', pta'sxku: Adxa' Jesusthu, idx na'wẽ ahçeçxa pkxuuya' pakwe'g txãath.
Nawa ãçxha' mkiite. Ãçxh na'wẽ vxyaath sa' vxite entewa vxya'nja, aça' txã'wẽk vxyaa jĩna mteewa pta'sxya' u'jwene'ga adxna selpiina.
Idxa's nwe'we'nja judiuwe'sx kuseju, sa' judiu ji'jmée vxite nasa kiwesu kajaçthu kxsũwa nwe'we'nja.

Txãawe'sx tasxsu kajaçthu, aça' idxa' txãawe'sx yafxtxi phaadene'ga, peena yu' çxhi'dxte fxi'zemée eena'sa's uykahn, sa' eçxthẽ'j kusete fxi'zemée Dxus yakh fxi'zekahn. Adxa's jxpa'gasa' txãawe'sx pkaltxi peltunãyni neeyũuçxa cielute ũswa'ja's jxpa'gatxna Dxus txhitxhnisawe'sx yakh ja'daçxah jĩk adxa's.
Agripa, idxa'sthu pta'sxi': Txã'wẽ vxyaaçxa we'weni's wa'lmée kxtey nwẽese'jçxa

Damaskote ũssawe'sx khuẽ'ytxi pta'sxthu Dxus yuwe's, e'su' Jerusalente, vxite' Judea kiwesu jxuka. Sa' judiu ji'jmée vxite nasatxwa pi'kxthu, pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxusa's pakweçxa ew yũuna mfxi'zewe jĩna.
Txã'wẽ yũupa'gatx judiuwe'sxa' dxuus yatte adxa's tudçxa ikh wẽe.

Nawa Dxus pu'çxte', ãçxpkaçx Dxus yuwe's le'çxkwe yuhwa jxpubameeth pta'sxna fxi'ze' jxtuhthesa ma'tx yuu ma'wẽsatxwa jxukaysatx. Sa' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx vxite' Moises pta'sxni txãaju bagaçxte yuhwa fxiy yu' pta'sxi'çmeeth.

Txãawe'sxa' na'wẽtx pta'sx: Dxus tasxuh yuusa Kristo' wala pxthaa yuuçxa uuçxawa ki' txãa khuẽ'y ĩtxĩ yuuna, sa' eena'te fxi'zewa'ja's pta'sxina kwe'sx ji'jtx txã'wẽy vxite kiweju nasatxwa jĩnatx pta'sx. Txã'wẽyçxáath adxwa pta'sxi'.
Pablo txã'wẽ we'wete', Fxesto' na'jĩnak sus we'we:
—Pablo, luuku yuunig. Jwee wala piyaçxane'ga txã'wẽ luuku yuu jĩte',
Pablo pasçxa':
—Ne'jwe'sx Fxesto idxa' mjiyu: Adxa' luukumeeçxa íith ũus yajkxçxa jxpubamée isasaçxáana pta'sxi'.
Txãa yuwe's jxkaahsa Agripa ayte u'pa' txãawa ew jiia'. Txãa pa'gath adxa' thaamemée pta'sxi' txajx dxi'pte. Naa yuwe' paaçte sũthçxa we'wenisame'. Txãa pa'ga jxkaahsawa txãa yuwe's ew jiina sũju'th.
¿Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx we'weni's ew jiiyuhmeegá' wakx, jxkaahsa Agripa? Idxa' jiiyuhne'ga sũju'th jĩte',
Agripa' na'wẽk we'we:
—Adxa's Kristo ju'gu vxit-ya' le'çxkuẽeg pejíi jĩte',
Pablo we'weçxa':

—Le'çxkuẽe ma'k pejíi meeçxa' wala ma'k pejíi nawa idxçxáamée, ayte ãçxh wẽse'jna ũsta' txãawe'sx jxukaysatxku Kristo ju'gu yuu jxthãasu' Dxusa', adxwa ma'wẽtka Kristo ju'gu yuu txã'wẽy, nawa kadenaju tudnimée.
Pablo txã'wẽ we'wete', jxukaysa kiitetx, jxkaahsa, ne'jwe'sx, Berenice kxte ih pa'jsa jxuka.
Sa' fxiitx txuteena u'j, na'jĩna puutx we'weya' txãawe'sx pwe'sx:
—Naa piçthẽ'ja' kĩh yuhwa yuuwemeesa' ikhkahn yuuwa. Sa' karcelteçxáa yuhwa ũswa'j ji'phme' jĩçxa',
Agripa' na'wẽk we'we Fxesto's:
—Txã'wẽ txãaíi Cesar paapẽyni wejx ewna jĩmeewaça', naa piçthẽ'ja's txhweteya' ewna jĩk.
Italia kiwen kwe'sxtxi kaajxa' puutx we'weyã'jçxa', Pablo vxite preesu yã'jçxa dukhtxi Batalxón Augusto yaasesate kpiitan Julio kusete.
Txajũ' Adramitio çxhabte barko Asia kiwen u'jsate khẽetha'w, aça' Aristarkowa yuwe'k, Macedonia kiwete Tesalónika çxhabtewe'sx.
Kuskuskhẽ' Sidón çxhabte pa'tha'w. Aça' kpiitan Julio' Pablo's namiku yat-suk pa'jya' kaah txãawe'sx sã'jĩkahn. Txãa kpiitana' Pablo yakh wala ewsa yu'k, txãasak txã'wẽ yũu.
Sidón çxhabuh kasehçxa', Çxipre kiwe's jebu ju'gutha'w nvxihtna khẽw, wejxa yuppa'ga.
Txajũ' Cilicia Panfxilia kiwesu utxa skhẽwna u'jçxa, Lisia kiwete Mira çxhabtetha'w pa'j.
Kxtea' soldau kpiitana' teeçx barko Alejadriajuwe'sx Italia kiwen u'jsa'sku uy. Sa' kwe'sxtxi kxtek kaateka'j txajũ ki' u'jya'.
Nawa txã'wẽ wejxa yupna ũste', wala kuh en tuudkuẽçxah u'jçxa, wala thẽy pa'tha'w Gnido çxhab dxi'pte. Txajũ u'jçxa', Salmon kiwee dxi'psutha'w skhẽw, Kreta kiwesu ta'guna.
Sa' txãa kiwe pukasu wala thẽy u'jçxa, teeçx ahte pa'tha'w Bwenos Pwertos yaasesate. Txã' Lasea çxhab utxatek neeyũ'.
Txã'wẽ thẽy u'jçxa wala en ivxiitpa'ga, nus pa'jwa'j en utxaak ĩkhte u'jwa'j seena' ũukhũukhsa. Txãa pa'gak Pablo' yu'kxpeh
na'jĩna:
—Jxukaysa mwẽese'jwe, kwe'sx u'jwa'ja' wala ũukhũukha'. Barko petx karga vxituna, aça' kwe'sxwa uuwa'ja's ji'phuwá'nja'w.
Txã'jĩtewa, soldau kpiitana' Pablo's nwẽese'jmée barko namu vxite' barko thegsawe'sx we'weniçxá'sku nwẽese'j.

Kxte çxhaba' nus ente ũswa'j ewmeek yu'. Txãa pa'gatx jxukaysa u'jya' yajkx Kreta kiwete Fxenice çxhabte pa'jçxa nus ena's kxte yu'skhẽwya' sũhçxa, Fxenice çxhabte' nus ente ũswa'j ũukhũukh meek yu' naa pa'ga.
Bwenos Pwertos yaasesajũ kasejeçte yu', wejkuẽçxáak wejxana ũsu', aça' Fxenice çxhabte pa'jya' ãjawá'nja'w sũhçxa u'jtx Kreta kiwe pukasu tuudkuẽçxah.
Nawa wejkuẽ u'jweçpkaçxha', wejxaa wala kwe'sx u'jwa'j dxi'puh sẽhçxa barko's yupku.
Sa' txajũyã'ja' ma'wẽwa jxũna u'kh. Aça' barko's kaajxa' ãjameeyã'jçxa', kuçx yuumeetha'w wejxa ma'wẽwa jxũna u'khan.
Ĩkh pxãhte kiwe le'çxkuẽsa Klauda yaasesa e'ssutha'w skhẽw, kxsũa' wejxa txakwe çxhãçxhameek ũs yu'. Aça' barko le'çxkuẽ jxũçxa u'jnisa's wala thẽyçxáawa kaateka'jya' ãjãtha'w barko walate.
Txajũ' barko wala's lasu walaju pxãjũjx tudtha'w suweekahmen. Sa' txitx wala Sirte yaasesate wáa waçuya' u'jwena sũhna ũukhçxa, ẽete tela wala's spajkxtxi wejxa ma'wẽwa barko's jxũna u'khan.
Txã'wẽ wejxa seena' çxhãçxha ũste', kuskuskhẽ' karga's ĩkhkhẽ pũsxya' takhtxi.
Aça' tekh en yuuçte', kwe'sxíiwa ĩkhkhẽ pũsxya' pu'çxtha'w barko ẽseekahn.
Txã'wẽ wejxa seena' yuuna ũste', sek, estrelxa, kĩh yuhwa vxyaameeta' maazkuẽe enwa. Aça' kwe'sx yuuwa ĩtxĩ yuume'nja'w sũhwa'ja'sçxáatha'w ji'phu'.
Txã'wẽ maazkuẽe en kĩh yuhwa ũ'mée yuhna ũssatx Pablo' na'wẽk we'we:
—I'kwe'sxa' adx we'weni's nwẽese'jçxa Kreta kiwejũ kasehmeewaça', na'wẽ nxus knayna ivxiituwa'jmeene'tka'w yu'.
Nawa ãçxha' ũukhnuwe. Ayte u'jsa kim yuhwa uumeetxna, makwe barko yu' suweeçxa vxitutewa.
Adxa' Dxusna selpisaath, aça' ãçxh kus Dxus angel vxyaaçxa
na'wẽk we'we: Pablo, ũukhnu. Idxa' Romate jxkaahsa tasxte utxaawa'j ji'phgu, aça' txãa pa'ga Dxusa' nwe'weya'wa' ay barkote u'jsa jxukaysatx jĩk.
Txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxa' ũukhmée çxhãçxha miiyajkxwe. Adxa' Dxusçxáanath yaaki', angel we'weni' kxtey yuuna sũhna.
Sa' ĩkh pxãhte kiwe le'çxkuẽsate nvxiitni yu'nja'w jĩk Pablo'.
Adria ĩkhte wejxa jxũna u'jni e'z ki'su ãjaçte', txãa kuspxãh yuuçpkaçxha', barkote thegsawe'sxa' kiwe utxasu u'jweççxatx jiyu.
Sa' makhwe ĩkh dxiitewa jiyuya' isatx, aça' treinta y seis metroçxáak dxii yu'. Txajũ' yaç yaçte u'jçxa ki' isatx, aça' kxtea' weintisiete metroçxáak dxii yu'.
Txajũ' penxate wáa iika'nja'w sũhna ũukhçxa, barko's neewewa'jsa pahz çam walatx ĩkhkhẽ akh barko e'skhẽ, wejxa jxũna u'khamen. Sa' wala ũukhna ũythastxi khijkxpkaçx.
Naapkaçxha' barkote thegsawe'sxa' barko yaçkhẽ vxite çam walatx ĩkhkhẽ akheçtha'w jĩnaçxáa barko le'çxkuẽ's ĩkhkhẽ spaakiçtxi yu', txãate khẽeçxa kasehna u'j wẽeçxa.
Nawa Pablo' pta'sxku soldau kpiitan vxite' soldauwe'sxtxi:
—Naawe'sxa' barkojũ kasehna u'the', i'kwe'sxa' ĩtxi yuumeene'kwe jĩte',
soldauwe'sxa' barko le'çxkuẽ tudni lasutx spẽ'thçxa ĩkhkhẽ wãatahtx barko le'çxkuẽ's.
Txajũ' Pablo' kusíitey neewe'wek jxukaysatx kĩhçxáawa ũ'kahn:
—I'kwe'sx dehmée txã'wẽy ũ'wamée ũsni e'z ki'su yã'j yuuça'.
Aça' i'kwe'sxtxi neewe'we'th kĩhçxáawa ũ'kahn. Txã'wẽme', kasejxa' ya'çxhãçxhameena. Ãçxha' ũukhnuwe. I'kwe'sx maa yuhwa vxitumeene'kwe.
Txã'jĩna'wa, Pablo' jxukaysa dxi'pte Dxusa's weçxaçxa pana's ũ'k.
Txajũ' jxukaysa wejx ũukhmée txãawe'sxwa ũ'tx.
Barkote u'jsa jxukaçxah yu' doscientos setenta y seis nasatha'w yu'.
Kĩh ũ' wẽeçxawa txã'sna ũ'na jxã'jçxa', skuutxha's ĩkhkhẽ pũsxtha'w barko jweeíiçxáa ẽseekahn.
Khijkxna jxã'jnite', barkote thegsawe'sxa' jiyumeeta' maa kiwete pa'jçxawa. Nawa ĩkh pukasu kiwe ukwesa u'pte uyçxa', kxte nuypa'jya' ãjãwá'nja'w sũhçxa kxtetx u'jya' yajkx.
Sa' çam wala ĩkh dxiikhẽ akhnisa lasutx spẽ'thna'wa, tela's ẽete ki' kiisçxa, barko's tuudkuẽçxah jxũna u'jtx ukwete pa'jya'.

Nawa teeçx ahte ĩkh jwee yu' dxiimeete yu' seena' çxhãçxha ukapajkxna ũsu'k kxtek kũjxa' u'j barko'. Aça' barko ĩçha' kiwete waçuna kũhte', ma'wẽ yuhwa ẽseme', naapkaçxha' barko e'su yu'tũçxhasáa ujkana kũhçxa jxuka suwuuçku yu'.
Txã'wẽ yuuçte', soldauwe'sxa' preesutx jxuka ikhya'watx yu', pehdna kasehçxa iyuwe'sxte.
Nawa soldau kpiitana' Pablo's nwe'weya' yajkxku, sa' kiikhe'jmeeçxa na'wẽk jxkaah:
—Maawa pehdxa' jiisa' i'kwe'sx khuẽ'y yaçte me'jwe,
