Artemas meeçxa' Tíkiko txãawe'sxtxi iidx tasxna adx kajaçpkaçxha', idxa' dud yuweene'ga Nikopoliste adx yakh puutx uyya', nus en skhẽwpkaçx kxtee ũsu'nja sũju'th.
Iidx ãjani yu'sa' kĩhtewa jxuka mpu'çx yuwee pu'çxsa Zenas vxite' Apolos txãawe'sx dxi'the peejini's, kxah kĩhwa peejimée dxi'the u'jwetxna.
Aça' iidx txã'wẽ yũuni's uyçxa', kwe'sx yakhthẽ'jwe'sxwa selpiiya' piyaatxna ew yũuna peejinisu pu'çxya'.
Adx yakh ũssa jxukaysa yuwe weçxaa kaja'tx. Aça' idxwa yuwe meen weçxa kwe'sx namikuwe'sx Dxus yakh jxpubamée fxi'zesatx. Dxusa' i'kwe'sx jxukaysatx pu'çxhina.
Philemon: Adxa' Jesukristo jxkaahni yuwe ewsa's pta'sxpa'gaçxáa preesu ũsthu, nawa naa karta's fxi'jaçthu yakhthẽ'j Timoteo yakh, kwe'sx yakh mjĩisa Fxilemon idxa's weçxana.
Vxite' kwe'sx npe'sx Apia vxite' yakhthẽ'j Arkipo kwe'sx yakh mjĩisa vxite' iidx yatte pkhaakhesawe'sx txãawe'sxtxi weçxanath fxi'ja'.
Dxus kwe'sx Tata vxite' kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo txãawe'sx pu'çxni wẽt mfxi'ze.
Bagaçxtewa Dxus yakh puutx we'we iisath idxa's yajkxna Dxusa's weçxá'.
Txã'wẽ Jesukristo's yuuçxáa yajkxna yakhthẽ'jwe'sx jxukaysatxku peeygãhna fxi'ze' jĩni's jiyuçxath txã'wẽ weçxá'.
Idx txã'wẽ Dxus yakh fxi'zepa'ga vxitewa Dxusa's jxpa'gasa ũsta' txãawe'sxwa Kristo Jesus kĩhtewa jxuka pu'çxni's ew jiyukahnthu Dxusa's neewe'we'.
Adxa's iiméh wala weçx weçxa ũusuthek yakhthẽ'j iidx peeygãani's jiyute', txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽ iidx pa'gaçxáa vxitewa txãawe'sx ũuste wẽt-sa's jxpa'gatx naa pa'ga.
Adxa' Kristo kaahnisath na' idxa's juuna' jxkaajxa' ãjawa'jsath.
Nawa idx txã'wẽ ewsate jiiçxa', juuna' we'wemée peeygãhnaçxáath we'we', adxa' Kristo Jesusna selpiipa'ga preesu ũsthu thẽ'khwe yã'jsa.
Txãasath idxa's pu'çx jxthãasu' Onesimo's ewçxáa yũuna. Txã'sa' adx nçxi'k na'wẽsath Dxus jĩi knay ay karcelte ũsçxawa.
Nyafxíi yu' idxna selpisáa Onesimo' seelpimeesak yuu. Nawa ãçxha' wala seelpisa' adx yakh vxite' idx yakhwa.
Txã'sna iidx tasxte ki' kajaçthu aça' miipa'ga adx yuu kxtee pa'jaç na'wẽ.
Adxa' Dxus yuwe's pta'sxpa'ga ay karcelte ũsthu aça' adxna pi'kxna ũswa'jsa Onesimo's kaahmeewaç wejx ewna, idxa' adx yakh pi'kxna ũsya' ãja'çmeeg aça' Onesimo ũskahn.
Nawa txã'wẽ yũu wẽemeeth, idxna kaajiyu'jmey yu', kxah idx adxna pu'çx wẽeçxa' pu'çxhine'ga Onesimo's kaapi'ki'jna. Nawa idxa's txã'wẽ myũu jĩna yu' jxthãasuçmeeth.
Onesimo' iidx tasxu maz en yu' txuteene', naajũyã'ja' peena yu' bagaçxte yuhwa txuteeya'mée.

Nawa ãçxha' selpiisáa na'wẽmée, wejxwa selpiisaate jxthaakwe yakhthẽ'j peeygãanisa na'wẽ ew idx jxpe'khan ne' txã'wẽ yũu. Adxa' Onesimo's wala peeygãja'th, aça' idxa' wejx jxthaakwe peeygãawa'j ji'phgu, Onesimo' iidx jxpe'jnisak yu' nawa ãçxha' txã'wẽçxáamée, iidx yakhthẽ'ja' Kristo's jiisapa'ga.
Idxa' adxa's namiku na'wẽ dxih yaakiççxa', Onesimo's miipa'ga, adx pa'jwaç ma'wẽ weçxana jxpa'gaki'g txã'wẽ yajkxna miipa'ga.
Idxa's ãhmée wá' yuu, meeçxa' yuulwáana aça' adxna yuula's pẽyine'ga.
Yuula's dukhe'nja jĩna Pablo adx kuseju fxi'jni's uyçxa', wejx yuuwa adx txã'wẽ Pablo's yuulthu ew yũupa'ga sũjune'ga.
Yakhthẽ'j, txã'wẽ adx neewe'weni's kxtey meen yuu, Onesimo's jxpa'gana Dxusa's jiisa na'wẽ. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa', adx ũuste wẽtwẽt kaayaki'jine'ga.
Txã'jĩnath fxi'ja'. Idxa' kxtey yuune'ga sa' adx jxthãasnite jxthaakwe ew yũuwa'ja's jiiçxath txã'jĩ'.
Txã'wẽçxáa yũumée, adx pa'jwa'ja'swa ũythasna mes. I'kwe'sx txã'wẽ Dxus yakh puutx we'wena ũste', Dxusa' kajawáana aça' maa enteya' sxawedu'nja i'kwe'sxtxi thegya'.
Kristo Jesusna selpiipa'ga karcelte adx yakh pi'kxna ũssa Epafxraswa yuwe weçxaa kaja'k,
vxite' Markos, Aristarko, Demas, Lukas txãawe'sxwa mjĩi pu'çxsata' sa' weçxaa kaja'tx.
Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo' i'kwe'sxtxi pu'çxhina.
Hebrews: Dxusa' txãniitey kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxtxi maazkuẽe uswa we'wek fxiyfxiyçxah txajx yuwee pta'sxsawe'sxtxi jxkaahçxa.

Sa' ãçxh naa nmeh ensu' Dxusa' kwe'sxtxik we'we txajx Nçxi'ka's kaahçxa. Dxusa' txajx Nçxi'ka's jxkaahçxak naa kiwe kĩjkĩhnawa jxuka vxit. Txã'wẽ yũuçxak Dxusa' txãatxi's jxuka Nçxi'k kuseteçxaçxáa nvxiht.

Txãa Nçxi'k íik Ney zhiçxkwe zmeena' kweethnisa yu', sa' Dxus ma'wẽsate' le'çxkweçxáa yuhwa fxiysamée txãa íiçxáak yu'. Sa' txãa íiçxáa naa kiwe ma'k yuu nawa kĩjkĩhnawa jxuka ewçxáa kaafxi'ze'jna ũsa' txajx we'weni yakhçxáa. Sa' txãa íiçxáa kwe'sx pkaltxi yaateçxa Dxus pukate kaçxku cielute.
Dxus Nçxi'ka' angeleswe'sxte thaakwek walasa yu', txãasak Ney ũsni yase jxpa'ga maa angeleswe'sxtewa thaakwe walasa.
Txã'wẽte íiçxáak Dxusa' bagaçxte yuhwa angeleswe'sxtxi' maa yuhtxwa na'jĩna we'wemée:
Idxa' adx Nçxi'kgu,
Txãa pa'gath ĩtxi yuuwa'ja's ãçxha' vxit jĩme'.
Sa' txã'wẽy maa angel yuhnawa na'wẽ we'weme':
Adxa' txajx Ney yu'nja,
Aça' txã' adx Nçxi'k yuuna jĩme'.
Nawa Dxusa' txajx Nçxi'ka's nyafxçxah naa kiwete nuykĩhçxa', na'wẽk we'we:
Dxus angeleswe'sx jxukaysa txã'sçxáana nwẽese'jwa'j ji'phta' jĩnak jxkaah.
Sa' angeleswe'sx fxi'zewa'ja's yu' na'wẽçxáak we'we:
Angeleswe'sxa' wejxa na'wẽ vxyaawa'jsa vxitnisata',
Sa' Dxus jxkaahnitx selpiina ipx beesa na'wẽ vxyaana yuuwa'jsa vxitnisata' jĩ'k.
Nawa Nçxi'k fxi'zewa'ja's we'weçxa yu' na'jĩ'k:
Dxus, iidx jxkaahna ũswa'ja' bagaçxtewa nes yuuna,
Idxa' ew yuuçxáa jxkaahna ũswa'jsag.
Sa' ewmeesa yu'sa' jxpa'gamée, ewsa yuuçxá'sgu pakwe.
Txãa pa'gak iidx Dxusa' iidx wẽt fxi'zewa'ja's iiméh wala pees,
Naa kiwete iidx nwe'sxte jxthaakwe jĩ'k.
Vxite ajkhẽ' na'jĩ'k Dxus Nçxi'ka's we'weçxa':
Idxgu kiwe's pheu'j nyafxte,
Sa' cieluwa iidx kuseju vxitnisata'.
Nawa txã'wẽsa' pçuutxna, naapkaçxha' idxa' bagaçxtewa nes yuune'ga.
Kĩjkĩhwa jxuka ropa na'wẽçxáa ĩisxitxna.
Aça' jxuka yu'pthehni yuutxna.
Nawa idx yu' bagaçxtewa txã'wẽesa nes yuune'ga.
Iidx ĩtxi fxi'zeni' bagaçxte yuhwa pçumeena jĩ'k.
Nawa Dxusa' maa angeleswe'sx yuhtxwa txã'wẽ yu' na'jĩna we'weme' bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa:
Adx pukate paçu ju'gte mkaaçx,
Idxna açesa maatxwa jxuka idxçxaçxáana nwẽese'jwa'ja's vxitna jxã'phkaçx jĩme'.
Jxukay angeleswe'sxa' kwe'sx na'wẽ kakwe ji'phmeesa naa kiwete maaçxah ewte neeyũuwa'jsa ũstxna txãawe'sxtxi pu'çxya' kaahnisaçxáata'.
Txãa pa'ga wala jxpa'yakxwa'j ji'ptha'w, na'wẽ Dxus Nçxi'k yuu kwe'sxtxi we'wete yuwe ewsa's wẽse'tha'w txãajũ txuteeya'mée.
Dxus yuwe's angeleswe'sxçxáa pta'sxni yuhwa ĩsxiini yuumée kxteyku yuu. Txãa pa'gaíiçxáatx nwẽese'jmée pkalte wetesawe'sxa' kastigãyni yuu txãawe'sx ãhmée yũupa'ga.

Txãaçxáa yuhwa kxteyku yuu, aça' kwe'sx ewte neeyũuwa'j txakwe walasa's Dxus Nçxi'k Kristo txajx yuweju yuuk pta'sx txã'sa' jxpa'yakxmeeçxa', ¿ma'wẽ Dxus kastigo seena'sajũ iyukxtha'w? Aça' Kristo pta'sxni's nyafxte wẽse'jsawe'sxa' kwe'sxtxitx pta'sx, isasa yuja' jĩna.

Txãawe'sxçxáa isasa yuja' jĩmeeta', Dxus yuuk isasa yuhna sũhna jiyukahn kim yuhwa ãjanimeesa's kaavxya'ja'j. Sa' Dxus Espiritu pu'çxte kĩhte yuhwa sxiigmée selpiina fxi'zewa'jtx ũsku teeçxsa na'wẽçxah, txajx ũs wẽeni yu's jxuka.
Na'wẽ Kristoçxaçxá's nwẽese'jwa'j en pa'jana jĩ'tha'w txãa ente jxkaahwa'ja's angeleswe'sxtxi nvxihtme' Dxusa'.
Txã'wẽ meek yu' txajíiçxáak na'jĩna teeçx ajkhẽ pta'sxi' Dxus librute:
Nasa' ¿ma'wẽsana açga txã'sa' peeygãja'?
Nasa pçuwa'jsaçxá's ¿kĩjxa'ga txakwe wala pa'pçxuna yaaki'?
Nasa's maz en yu' angeleswe'sxte ãhmeekwesa na'wẽg nvxiht,
Nawa jxthaakwe walasa yuuwa'j vxitçxag nvxiht,
Txã'wẽ yũuçxa iidx vxitnitxi' txãaçxaçxáa jxkaajxa' ãjawa'ja's ũsgu.
Kĩhwa jxuka txãaçxaçxá's nwẽese'jwa'ja's vxitgu jĩ'k.
Dxusa' txã'wẽ jxuka txãaçxaçxá's nwẽese'jwa'ja's vxit yã'jçxa', kĩh yuhwa nwẽese'jwa'jsamée yu' nvxihtme'. Txã'wẽtewa ãçxpkaçx txãaçxaçxá's kĩhwa jxuka nwẽese'jni yu's iiuymeetha'w.

Na'wẽ maz en yu' angeleswe'sxte ãhmeekwesa vxitku txã' Jesusa' txã'snak Dxusa' kwe'sx jxukaysa pa'gate uuwa'jsa vxit. Nawa ãçxha' Dxus pukate u'pa', txãaçxaçxáa jxkaahwa'jsa yuuçxa txã'wẽ pxthaa yuuçxa uupa'ga.
Kĩjkĩhnawa jxuka vxit-sa Dxusku txajx luuçx yuuwa'jsa yuutxi' jxuka nwe'weçxa txajx tasxte nuypa'jya' Jesukristo's pxthaa yuuçxa uuwa'j vxit, kĩhte yuhwa sxiigmée nwe'wesa yuukahn.

Txã'wẽ pkaltxi peltunãynisa vxite' pkaltxi peltunãysa txãa yakh e'zsa' teeçx Neytewe'sxçxaçxáata' txãa Neya' Dxusa'. Txã'wẽ teeçx Neytewe'sxçxáa ne'tka'w, txãa pa'gak Dxus Nçxi'ka' kwe'sxtxi's thaamemée Adx nyakh jĩna we'we'.
Txã'snak Dxus librute na'jĩ':
Idx ma'wẽsatewa adx nyakhwe'sxtxi pta'sxi'nja,
Sa' adx nyakhwe'sx ksxavxyte idxa's weçxana tuuthe'je'nja jĩ'k.
Sa' vxite ajkhẽwa na'wẽk we'we':
Adxa' Dxusçxáana yajkxna fxi'ze'nja.
Sa' ki'kin we'weçxa':
Dxus ũsni luuçx ayte ũsta' txãa yakh ayte ũsthu jĩ'k.

Nasawa pxakhsa jĩnisa' maazkuẽeçxawa kxazíi teeçx ney kakwe petx ee jxpa'gaçxa yuuçxáatx pxakhsa yu', txãa pa'gak Jesuswa pxakhsa yuuya' nasaa kakwe's jxpa'ga uuya' ãjaya'. Txã'wẽ yũuçxak kluuste uuçxa uuwa'j vxit-sa's knay. Txã'wẽ nasatx uuwa'j vxit-sa' eçxthẽ'kh yu'.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxak Jesusa' jxukaysatx nwe'we bagaçxtewa uuwa'ja's ũukhna yuuçxáa fxi'zenijũ.
Txã' angeleswe'sxtxi pu'çxya' kĩhme', wejxwa nasa Abrahan ji'jtxku pu'çxya' kĩh.

Txã'wẽ nasatx pu'çxya' ãjaya'k kwe'sx na'wẽsa yuu kĩhtewa jxuka. Txãasak nyakh na'wẽ yuuna pa'jçxa kwe'sxtxi peeygãawa'ja's ji'phuçxa pkalsawe'sx pa'gate Dxus tasxte we'wewa'jsa yuu. Sa' nasaa pkaltxi jxuka peltunãyya'k pxthaa yuuçxa uuwa'j ji'phuna ũsu'.
Txã'wẽ nasaa kakwe's jxpa'gaçxak pkalte kwe'sx çxhãçxhamée fxi'zeni's jxuka jiyu. Txãasa ãçxha' pkalte çxhãçxhamée fxi'zesatxi's kĩhte yuhwa sxiigmée nwe'weya' ãjawa'jsa'.

Yakhthẽ'jwe'sx i'kwe'sxa' Dxus pa'yanisa i'kwe yuu txãa jĩi yuuwa'jsa, txãa pa'ga wala ew mjiyuwe Kristo Jesusa's. Txã' Dxus kaahnisa', pkalsawe'sx pa'gate Dxus tasxte we'wewa'jsa, sa' Dxus yakh kwe'sx fxi'zewa'ja's pta'sxsa'.
Jesusa' kĩhtewa jxuka kxtey yuuk ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja's ne' Dxus jxkaah txã'sa' jxuka. Moiseswa ma'wẽga Dxus luuçxtxi jxpe'jwa'ja's jxuka kxtey yuu, txã'wẽyku Jesuswa kxtey yuu.
Nawa Jesusçxáa Moiseste thaakwe jxtuhthesa', ma'wẽga yat namuçxáa jxtuhthe yu' aça' yatte selpiisáa yu' jxtuhthe meek yu', txã'wẽy Jesusçxáa jxtuhthesa'.
Yata's kimçxáawa txahte yujk yat yuuna pa'ja', nawa namu yu' Dxusa'.
Moisesa' selpiisaaçxáaçxawa txã'wẽk kĩhte yuhwa peejxmée jxuka kxtey yuu Dxus luuçxtxi jxpe'jna, nawa txajx selpiini yu' e'su Dxus kĩh yũuya'watewa txãatx kaajiyu'jsaçxáak yu'.
Naapkaçxha' Kristo' selpiisamée Dxus Nçxi'k yuuk yu', txãasa Dxus luuçxa' kwe'sxtha'w txãatx kĩhte yuhwa peejxmée jxpe'jwa'jsa', kwe'sx yuu uu entepkaçx txutemée txã's yuuçxáa weçxana fxi'zete yu'.
Txãa pa'ga txãa yakhçxáa fxi'zewa'ja's na'wẽk pta'sxi' Dxus Espiritu':
Ãçxh Dxus we'weni's wẽse'jyã'jçxa',
I'kwe'sx ũuste wa'l yaakxnuwe. I'kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxwa na'wẽtx wa'lna ũsu' txã'wẽ yũunuwe.
Txã'wẽ wa'lçxa txãawe'sxa' Dxusa's kvxissatx na'wẽ yuu nasa u'pnimée kiwete.
I'kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxa' kxtee ũsçxa',
Txakwe kuarenta anxupkaçx txãawe'sxtxi adx kĩjkĩhtewa ew yũuna pu'çxni's uyçxawa,
Adxa's wa'ltxi.
Txãa pa'gath txãa nasa yakh wẽt fxi'zeya' ãjameeçxa na'jĩna we'we:
Adx kaapiya'jni's wa'lçxa, txãawe'sx ũuste jxpubanaçxáatx fxi'ze'.
Aça' txã'wẽ yũupa'ga, txãawe'sxa' adx yakh jxkaasena ũswa'the u'kameetxna jĩnath jurãy jĩ'k.
Txãa pa'ga, yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, wala mpa'yajkxwe, txã'wẽ Dxus we'weni' weh yuhwa isameesana sũhna ewmée yajkxçxa Dxus ĩtxisa tasxu txuteeya'mée.
Txã'wẽ yũumée, jweeíiçxáa çxhãçxha yaakxwa'ja's een isa puutx pu'çxna mfxi'zewe, kxah i'kwe'sxtxi' maa yuhtxwa pkala' kaypuba'jmeena, aça' i'kwe'sx ũuste ewmée yaakxwa'ja's ji'phumeene'kwe.
Nyafxíiwa ma'wẽtka'w Kristo yakh jxpubamée fxi'ze txã'wẽesa nmeh entepkaçx fxi'zeçxa', txãa yakh ũswa'ja's ji'phu'nja'w.
Txã'wẽ wa'lkahmen na'wẽk we'we':
Ãçxh Dxus we'weni's wẽse'jyã'jçxa',
I'kwe'sx ũuste wa'l yaakxnuwe. I'kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxwa na'wẽtx wa'lna ũsu' txã'wẽ yũunuwe jĩ'k.
¿Kimta txã'wẽ Dxus yuwe's wẽse'jçxawa e'su yã'ja' wa'lna ũsu'? Egipto kiwejũ Moises kutxi'kh txãawe'sx jxukaysatx txã'wẽ yũu.
Dxusa' ¿kim yakhga kuarenta anxupkaçx pxũuskwete fxi'zena ũsu'? Pkalte wetepa'ga nasa u'pnimée kiwete uutx txãawe'sx yakhku txã'wẽ pxũuskwete fxi'zena ũsu'.
Dxusa' ¿kimtxiga txã'wẽ adx yakh jxkaasena ũsya' u'kameetxna jĩna we'we? Nwẽese'jsameetxku txã'jĩna we'we.
Dxus we'weni's nwẽese'jmeeçxa', u'kaya' ãjameeta' txã'sa' ãçxha' jiyutha'w.
Txãa pa'ga wala jxpa'yakiga. Txã'wẽme', i'kwe'sxwa maaíi yu' ivxiituwá'kwe Dxus yakh jxkaasena ũswa'the pa'jwa'ja's ji'phçxawa.

Txãawe'sxtxiwa ma'wẽga jxkaasena ũswa'the pa'jwa'ja's pta'sxni yuu, txã'wẽy kwe'sxtxiwa pta'sxnik yuu Dxus yuwe ewte nvxiitwa'ja's. Nawa txãawe'sxtxi' txãa pta'sxni' selpiime', Dxus yuwe' isa kxtey yuuwa'jsana sũhna ũusuh jxuka nwẽese'jmeeta' naa pa'ga.

Dxus we'weçxa: Adx yakh jxkaasena ũswa'the u'kameetxna jĩna jurãyku. Nawa kwe'sx yu' pejka u'kawa'jsatha'w, Dxus yuwe' isa yuhna sũhnatha'w jxpa'gaçxa nwẽese'j naa pa'ga. Na'wẽ adx yakh jxkaasena ũswa'j jĩna we'wek txãa yu' nyafxiitey naa kiwe's vxitna jxã'jçxa jxkaasek, sa' ãçxpa'jwa jxkaasena ũsa' kxte u'kawa'ja's we'weçxak txã'jĩ'.
Txajx mjĩia's vxitna jxã'jçxa jxkaaseni's Dxus librute na'jĩnak we'we':
Dxusa' txajx mjĩia's jxuka jxã'jçxa', siete ensa's jxkaasek jĩ'k.
Sa' kxte txajx jxkaaseni's we'weçxak:
Adx yakh jxkaaseya' u'kaya' ãjameetxna jĩ'.
Makwe txã'wẽtewa, maaíi yu' kxtee jxkaasena ũswa'the u'katxna. Nyafxiiwe'sxa' ewte neeyũuwa'ja's pta'sxte wẽse'jçxawa, Dxusa's nwẽese'jmeeçxa jxkaasena ũswa'the u'kameeta'.
Txã'wẽ yũuni en skhẽwniijũ wala txaçxtek Dxusa' Davxida's na'jĩna kwe'we'j:
Ãçxh Dxus we'weni's wẽse'jyã'jçxa',
Wa'lna nwẽese'jmée yu' yuunuwe jĩ'k.
Txãa yu' ãçxh naa ensuwe'sxwa txã'wẽy yũuwe'sxtek txã'jĩ.
Jxkaasewa'j jĩna we'we'k txãa jxkaasewa'ja' Joswé entewe'sxwaça', Dxusa' e'su txaçxte ki' we'wewa'jmeene' yu' ãçxh jĩna.
Txãa pa'ga jxkaasewa'j thaakwe ewsa nee ũsíiçxá' Dxusa's nwẽese'jsawe'sx jĩi.
Txãa pa'gatey Dxus yakh jxkaasewa'the u'kasa' txãawe'sx mjĩinijũ jxukatek jxkaase', Dxuswa ma'wẽga txajx mjĩini's jxã'jçxa jxukate jxkaase txã'wẽy.
Txãasa Dxus yakh jxkaasewa'the u'kaya' pa'pçxuwa'j ji'ptha'w, Dxus we'weni's nwẽese'jmeeta' txãawe'sx na'wẽ yũumée.

Txã'wẽme', Dxus we'weni' ĩtxisa', kĩhtewa jxuka seelpisa. Dxus we'weni' kçxilx pdxi'p seena' zeksate jxthaakwe zeksa', txãasak ũus dxiite kĩh pkal ji'phtewa jxuka ãate kpajkxwe'we'. Sa' ũusteçxáa yaakxni kĩh yuhnawa paaçte nvxiitu'çme'.
Dxus vxitnisa' kĩh yuhwa txajx dxi'pte paaçte uynimeete yu' neeyũumeetxna. Kĩjkĩhwa jxuka ãateçxaçxáa ũsta' kwe'sxtxi kastigãywa'jsa ũsa' txajx dxi'pte.
Dxus Nçxi'k Jesus txã'wẽ Dxus tasxte kwe'sx pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxwa'jsa cielute u'kak, txãa pa'ga txajx tasxuh txutemée fxi'zega.
Txãa pa'gatey cielute kwe'sx ju'gu yuusa' txãa yu' pkalte yu' wetemeeçxawa, pkalte kwe'sx çxhãçxhamée fxi'zeni yu'sa' jxuka jiyuk, txãasa kwe'sx ãhmeekwesatx jxuka peeygãhna pu'çxwa'jsa'.
Txãa pa'ga Dxus tasxte ũukhmée utxaaga, Dxus peeygãani's ji'phuçxa kwe'sx thẽyte fxi'zenijũ nwe'weni yuuya' kĩh entewa.
Pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxwa'jsa txhitxhçxa naa kiwete nvxiitnisa' txãa íiçxáa pkalpa'ga tajkx ikhçxa Dxus altalte kabwa'jsa'.
Pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxsa' txãa íiwa pkalte nxuste fxi'zesaçxa', nxuste fxi'zeni ma'wẽtewa jxuka jiia'. Txãasa jiimeekwesa vxituna fxi'zesatx wala peeygãhna ju'gu yuuwa'jsa'.
Sa' txãa íiwa ãhmeekwe pkalsaçxa', peekx pkalpa'gawa tajkx ikhçxa Dxus altalte kabwa'j ji'phu'k, vxitesa pa'gatewa txã'wẽy.
Pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxwa'jsa' nasaa pwe'sxçxáa yajkxçxa ki'pnisa yu'çmeeta'. Txãawe'sxtxi' Dxusku txhitxhçxa nvxiitu', Aaronwa ma'wẽga Dxus txhitxhnisa yuu txã'wẽy.
Aça' Kristowa txã'wẽy yũunisaíiçxáak yuu. Txã' peekxçxáa yu' pkalsawe'sx ju'gu Dxus tasxte we'wesa yuume'. Txã'sa' Dxusku txhitxhçxa nvxiht. Txajíik Dxus librutewa na'jĩ':
Dxus we'weçxa':
Idxa' adx Nçxi'kgu,
Txãa pa'gath ĩtxi yuuwa'ja's ãçxha' ũs jĩnak we'we'.
Sa' vxite ajkhẽwa Dxus librute na'jĩnak we'weni yuu:
Idxa' pkalsawe'sx ju'gu Dxus tasxte we'we pu'çxwa'jsag bagaçxtewa,
Melkisedekwa ma'wẽga yuu txã'wẽysa jĩ'k.
Kristo' naa kiwete ũsçxa', txajx uuwa'j en jxuka utxaaçte', Dxus nwe'weya' ãjawa'jsa dxi'pte wala pxthaa sus neewe'wek ũ'nena, aça' Dxusa' wẽse'kh txajx pxthaa we'weni's.
Kristo' makwe Dxus Nçxi'kçxawa, iiméh wala pxthaa yuuwa'ja's jiyuçxa, nwẽese'jwa'ja'swa piyak.
Txã'wẽ kĩh pxthaa yuunisatewa jxuka jiyuna jxã'jçxak, bagaçxtewa nwe'wena nes yuuwa'jsa yuuna pa'j jxukaysa nwẽese'jsa yuutxi's.
Txã'wẽ yũunijũk Dxusa' pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxwa'jsa vxit, Melkisedek na'wẽysa.
Na'wẽ pta'sxi'th txã'sa' wala we'wewa'j ji'phíiçxáath, nawa i'kwe'sxa' jiyuya' ãja'çmeei'kwe, aça' wala thẽya' ew pta'sx wẽete yu'.

Dxusa's jiyuni txakwe txaçxte', i'kwe'sx yuu kaapiya'jsa yuupkaçxte, nee peejíiçxáa i'kwe Dxus kaapiya'jni thẽymeekwesa's ki' peena ew pta'sxwa'j. I'kwe'sxa' luuçx na'wẽysaçxáa i'kwe, kĩh ũ'a'swa ũ'wepkaçxte, luuçx ũ'ni leçxi'sçxáa i'kwe ũ'we'.
Txã'wẽ leçxiçxá's ũ'sa' luuçx le'çxkwe kçxu'çxu'jnisa na'wẽsaçxáata', txãasatx Dxus yakh ew fxi'zewa'j yu'sa' jiyu'çmée.
Nawa thẽ'jsa yã'ja' thẽ'jsa ũ'nisatx jxpa'gawa'ja', kĩh ewsatxna vxite' kĩh ewmeesatxna nawa txãatx jxuka jiyuya'.

Txãa pa'ga Kristo kaapiya'jni nyafxte thẽymeekwesatx pta'sxtha'w txãa yakhçxáa fxi'zemée, jweeíiçxáa wala piyana u'jwa'j ji'ptha'w, sxiigna fxi'zeya'mée. Nyafxte kaapiya'jnisa yakhçxáa yu' fxi'zemeeyuuga. Txã' naata': pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedni, Dxusa' ũsyuhna sũhna ũusuh jxuka yaakxni,
yu'te ya'bautisãyni, Dxusna selpiwa'jsatx txhitxhçxa Dxus kusete neewe'weni, ki' ĩtxi yuuwa'ja's kaapiya'jni, Dxus kastigo iiméh seena'te pa'jwa'ja's pta'sxni, txãa nyafxte kaapiya'jnisata'.
Dxus pu'çxte' jweeíiçxáa piyana u'jwe'nja'w.
Txã'wẽme', maawa Dxus yakh fxi'zewa'ja's ew jiisa, Dxus peesku ewte neeyũuwa'ja's txã'snawa ew jiisa, Dxus Espiritu'swa ũuste jxpa'gasa,
txã'wẽy Dxus yuwe ewsatewa jiisa, nmeh ente' Kristoçxaçxáa jxkaahwa'ja'swa jiisa,

txã'wẽ kĩhtewa ew jiisa Dxus tasxuh txutesaatxi' peena kaasxwedu'j wẽete ya'ãja'çme'. Txãa pa'gatey txãawe'sxa' Dxus Nçxi'ka's ew jiiçxawa ahçena weeçxçxa kluuskhẽ ki' ki'psa na'wẽ yuusaata' naa pa'gak ya'ãja'çmée.
Txãawe'sxtxi' na'wẽtha'w kaaja'da'ja': Kiwe mjĩinisa' nus pa'jni yu'a's jxuka çxazxate', uuthasx ewsak kaseje', Dxus pu'çxte mjĩisawe'sx jĩi.
Nawa ewsa kasehmée jxũth kĩhte yuhwa seelpimeesaçxáa buçxate', kiwe txã'wẽsa's nmehte' thegnimée yuuna. Txã'wẽy maawa Dxusa's jiiçxa ki' txutesá' kĩhte yuhwa seelpimée, ivxiituni yuutxna.
Nawa i'kwe'sx yu' txã'wẽ yuumée, Dxus nwe'wenijũyã'ja' jweeíiçxáa wala ew yũuna fxi'zene'kwe sũju'th.
I'kwe'sx txã'wẽ ew yũuna yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi peeygãhna pu'çxna ãate kaavxya'ja'jna ãçxpkaçx txã'wẽ ew yũuna nes txã'wẽ i'kwe, naa pa'ga Dxusa' i'kwe'sx ew yũuni's peçxkanameena.
Nawa adxa' nmeh entepkaçx txã'wẽ kaavxya'ja'jna pa'pçxuna nesthu yũu jxthãasu' teeçxsa na'wẽçxah. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa', kxulmée pa'pçxusa yuune'kwe.
Wa'lwa'j yu'sa' le'çxkwe yuhwa ji'phunuwe, yaçgaywe'sxwa ma'wẽta Dxusa' kxtey yuuna sũhna ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa Dxus peesni's jxpa'ga txã'wẽy myũuwe.
Miiyajkxwe, Dxusa' Abrahana's pu'çxwa'ja's puutx we'weçxa' peekx yase'síiçxáa kxsusna jurãyku, vxite txãate jxthaakwesa yu' meek yu' naa pa'ga.
Sa' na'jĩk: Isa, iidx ji'jtx wala nuypehnana idxa's pu'çxwa'jsath jĩnak jurãy.
Aça' Abrahana' wa'lmée ũythasçxa', jxpa'gak Dxus ma'wẽne' yũuya' neeyũu txã'sa' jxuka.
Aça' nasawa juraĩççxa', txãawe'sxte jxthaakwe walasa's kxsusnatx juraĩ', kxtey yu'nja jĩna. Txã'wẽ yũute', ĩsxiimée kxtey yuuna sũhwa'jçxáak ya'ji'phu'.

Txãa pa'gak Dxuswa txã'wẽy jurãy: Adx puutx we'weni's kxtey yu'nja jĩna. Dxusa' txajx puutx we'weni's le'çxkweçxáa yuhwa yu'pthehmée kxtey yuuya'k ũsu', aça' txã'sna jxpa'gawa'jsa' kxtey yuuyujuna sũhnaçxáa ũskahnku txã'wẽ yũu.

Dxus jurãyni' e'z jwedtxi yu': Kxtey yu'nja jĩna we'weni vxite' txajx yase's kxsusni. Txãa pa'ga txajx puutx we'weni' yu'pthehmeetxna. Kxahtha'w Dxusa' txajx puutx we'weni's kxtey yuuyujuna Dxusna pakwesaatxi's sũhna çxhãçxha yaakxwa'ja's ji'phu'.
Dxusa' txajx puutx we'weni's kxtey yuuna sũhnisak kwe'sxtxi's jxpubamée çxhãçxha kaafxi'ze'je', txãa pa'gatey kwe'sxa' cielute ũssa Dxus puutx we'weni kxtey yuuwa'ja's jiiçxatha'w ũythasu' naa pa'ga.
Jesusa' cielute Dxus ũsnitek u'ka, Dxus tasxte pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxçxa kwe'sxtxi kxtee ka'ga'jya'. Txã' Melkisedek na'wẽsak yu'.

Naa Melkisedekha' Salem çxhabte jxkaahsak yu', nawa txãaíiçxáa pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxsak yu'. Aça' teeçx ente' Abrahana' gweçxate puiina ũsçxa', naa kiwete jxkaahsa ewmeesatx knayçxa sxawedna pa'jaçte', Melkisedekha' pu'thegya' kasehçxa bedicion akhte',

Abrahana' diesmo dukhku makwene' dukhwa'j ji'phu' txãa yu's jxuka. (Hebreo yuwete' Melkisedek jĩnisa' Ew Jxkaahsa jĩnisa', aça' Salem jĩnisa' wẽt fxi'zeni jĩnisak yu'. Txãasa Melkisedekha' wẽt fxi'zenite ew jxkaahsa' jĩnisa'.)

Sa' txajx ney txajx njĩ'j txajx yaçgawe'sx txãatxi's ya'jiyu'çme', txajx upxhni en txajx uuni txã'wẽsaçxa yuhtxwa. Txãasa Dxus Nçxi'k pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxna nes yuusa na'wẽysak yu' Melkisedekha'.
Ãçxha' ew mjiyuwe: Melkisedekha' iiméh wala jxtuhthesa yu'k. Txajíik kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx Abrahan yuhwa diesmo's txã'sna dukh gweçxate puiiçxa txajx jĩitxi's ki' kusa'jni's.
Moises leya' naasáa Levxi ji'j yuuçxáatxku jxkaaja' txãawe'sx nwe'sx diesmotx jxpa'gawa'jsa.
Txã'wẽtewa, Melkisedekha' Levxi ji'jmeeçxawa Abrahan dukhni diesmo's jxpa'gak, sa' Abrahana' makwe Dxus txhitxhnisatewa Melkisedekha' bedekĩyku.
Bedekĩysa' bedekĩynisate jxthaakwe walasa' txã'sa' txã'wẽme' jĩya' ãjameetxna kim yuhwa.
Ãçxh naa ensu kwe'sx pwe'sx dukhni diesmo's jxpa'gasa' nasa uuwa'jsaçxáata'. Nawa Dxus librute Melkisedekha's we'weçxa': Bagaçxte yuhwa uumée ĩtxi ũssa jĩna we'weç na'wẽk pta'sxi':
Levxi ji'jwe'sx jxukaysa na'wẽ diesmo's jxpa'ga'tx txãawe'sxwa diesmo's dukhsatx yuu Melkisedekna. Ew jiyute yu', txãawe'sx jxukaysa pa'gate Abrahanku dukh.
Txã'wẽk yuu jĩkahníi Abrahana' Melkisedek yakh puutx uyçxa diesmo's dukheçte', Levxi ji'j yuuwa'jsa' Abrahan kakweju kasehmeytxi yu'.
Ley nvxiitnisa Aaron ji'j levxiwe'sxçxáa txã'wẽ nasa pkalsatx Dxus tasxte kuutxa'jya' ãjawaça', vxite kaahwa'j peejxmeene' yu', Melkisedekwa ma'wẽga Aaron ji'thewe'sxmée yu' txã'wẽysa.
Txã'wẽ pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxsa levxiwe'sxtxi kutxi'jçxa', leynawa phu'se'jwa'ja'.
Na'wẽ vxite kaahwa'ja's we'we'k txã' kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo's we'weçxak txã'jĩ'. Jesukristo' Israel nwe'sxçxawa, Aaron ji'thewe'sx meek yu'.

Judá ji'thewe'sxku yu' txã'sa' ew jiitha'w. Aça' Judá ji'thewe'sxa' kim yuhwa pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxwa'ja's ji'phmeeta'. Txajíik Moisesa' txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's Judá ji'thewe'sxtxi' maa yuhtxwa kxsusmée.
Aytek isa ew ya'jiyu' leya'swa phu'se'jwa'ja's. Txã'wẽ phu'se'khaníi pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxwa'jsa' ley nvxiitnisamée, Melkisedek na'wẽsak yu'.
Txã' ley txhitxhçxa nvxiitnisamée, bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'jsak yu'.
Txajíik Jesusa's we'weçxa na'jĩ Dxusa':
Idxa' bagaçxtewa pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxna nes yuune'ga,
Melkisedek na'wẽsa jĩ'k.

Txajíik Moises leya' nasa pkalsatx Dxus tasxte kuutxa'jya' ãjamée ma'wẽçxáa yuhwa, txãa pa'gak txãa leya's phu'se'jni yuu. Aça' ãçxha' txãa leyte jxthaakwe ewsa ji'ptha'w txãa yakha' Dxus tasxte utxaaya' ãja'tha'w.

Txajíik Moises leya' nasa pkalsatx Dxus tasxte kuutxa'jya' ãjamée ma'wẽçxáa yuhwa, txãa pa'gak txãa leya's phu'se'jni yuu. Aça' ãçxha' txãa leyte jxthaakwe ewsa ji'ptha'w txãa yakha' Dxus tasxte utxaaya' ãja'tha'w.
Dxus tasxte kuutxa'jya' ãjawa'ja's Dxusa' nvxiituççxa' juraĩmée yu' nvxihtme'.
Dxus tasxte kuutxa'jya' ãjawa'jsa jĩnisa nyafxiiwe'sxtxi' Dxusa' juraĩmeek nvxiht. Nawa Jesusa's txã'wẽ yuuwa'jsa nvxiituççxa', jurãyçxak nvxiht. Txajíik Dxus librute na'jĩna we'we':
Idxa' bagaçxtewa pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxna nes yuune'ga jĩnak Dxusa' txajx we'weni's jurãy na' yu'pthehmeena.
Txãa pa'ga Jesusa' jxthaakwe ew puutx we'weçxa nvxiitnisa'.
Pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxsa nyafxiiwe'sxa' wala kuh yu'tx, txãa pa'gatey uunatx u'jwe'. Txãasatx teeçxçxáa yu' u'pxa' ãja'çmée.
Nawa Jesusa' uuwa'jsame', txãasa pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxna ũswa'ja's vxitetx nvxihtmeena.

Sa' txã'sna pi'kxçxa Dxus tasxte utxaawa'ja's pakwesáa yuutxi's nwe'weçxa, bagaçxte yuhwa vxituwa'jmeete nvxiht-ya' ãjana, txãa pa'gatey txã' bagaçxte yuhwa uumée ĩtxi nes yuuwa'jsa', pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxna.

Pkalsawe'sx ju'gu Dxus tasxte we'we pu'çxsa' Jesus na'wẽsa ewsatha'w peejx yu'. Txã' kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmeesa, bagaçxte yuhwa ewmée yũuna fxi'zesamée, naa kiwetewe'sx na'wẽsa meek yu'. Txãasak Dxus pukate kãhpkaçx jxũna u'jnisa yuu.

Pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxwa'jsa nyafxiiwe'sxa' na'wẽtx een isa tajkx ikhçxa Dxus altalte kabu' txã'wẽ yũuwa'jsa meek yu'. Txãawe'sxa' nyafxte' peekx pkalpa'ga khuẽ'y txã'wẽ tajkx kabçxatx nasaa pkalpa'gawa txã'wẽy yũ'. Nawa Jesusa' een isa txã'wẽ tajkx ikhme', txãa yuuk uu tee dxi'jçxáa jxukaysa pa'gate.

Pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxwa'jsatx Moises ley nvxiituççxa', naa kiwete nasa ãhmeekwesaçxáatxku nvxiitu'. Nawa ley skhẽwnite Dxus jurãyçxa txã'wẽ yũuwa'jsa nvxiituççxa', txajx Nçxi'k iiméh thaakwe ewsa'sku nvxiht bagaçxtewa nes yuuwa'jsa.
Na'wẽ pkalsawe'sx ju'gu Dxus tasxte we'we pu'çxsa jĩ'tha'w txã' maatewa jxthaakwe ewsa cielute Dxus pukate kaçxçxa
pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxna ũsa' Dxus ũsnite yuu u'kaçxa. Txãa Dxus ũsni' nasaa txaahnisame', txã'sa' Dxus yuuk txah.
Pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxna ũssa nyafxiiwe'sxa' pkalpa'ga tajkx ikhçxa Dxus altalte kabna nes yuuwa'jsa jĩçxa nvxiitnisatx yu'. Txãa pa'gak Jesukristowa kĩhçxáawa nuykũuwa'j ji'phu.
Jesukristo' naa kiwetee txã'wẽ pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxna ũswa'ja's vxit wẽewaça', ãjawa'jmeene' yu', txã'wẽ ãjakahmeníi Moises ley nvxiitnisatx ũs yu' pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxsa.

Nawa naa kiwete txã'wẽ pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxsa' naasáa cielute ma'wẽçxah yũuwa'jna txã'sna kaajiyu'jniçxá'stxi selpi'. Txã'wẽ cielutewe'sxa's kaajiyu'jnisate íiçxáak Dxusna neewe'wena ũswa'j yat Moises txajaçte', Dxusa' na'jĩna we'we: Ew mtheg, sa' thã'j vxiçte adx ma'wẽ kaavxya'ja'the', txã'wẽy yũune'ga jĩk.
Nawa Dxus tasxte kwe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxsa Jesukristo selpiini' thaakwe ewa', txãa pa'gatey Dxus thaakwe ew pu'çxwa'ja's iiméh ew puutx we'wek txã'sna selpiina ũsa'.
Nyafxíi puutx we'weni' ew kasehwaça', e'su ki' puutx we'wewa'j peejxmeene' yu'.
Nawa txã'wẽ ew kasehpa'gamée, nasa' ewmée fxi'zepa'ga, Dxusa' na'jĩk:
Israel vxite' Judá yakh adxa' ki' u'se puutx we'wewa'j en pa'jana,
Egipto kiwejũ peeygãhna kutxi'jçxa i'kwe'sx yaçgawe'sx yakh puutx we'weth txã'wẽmée yuuna.
Txãa ente' adx puutx we'weni's kxtey yuumeeta',
Txãa pa'gath thegmée nvxiht.
Nawa txãa e'su' Israelwe'sx yakh na'wẽ puutx we'we'nja jĩ'k Dxusa':
Adx jxkaahnitxi's txãawe'sxtxi kaajiyu'jçxa, ũuste fxi'jçxa nvxiitu'nja.
Sa' adxa' txãawe'sx Dxus yu'nja,
Aça' txãawe'sxa' adx jĩi yuutxna.
Dxusa's jiyukahn teeçxsa na'wẽçxah kaapiya'jwa'j ji'phumeetxna, txãawe'sx nwe'sx vxite' txãawe'sx nyakhçxáa yuhtxwa,
Txãa pa'gatey le'çxkwesa ma'tx yuu meeçxa' thẽ'jsa ma'tx yuu nawa thẽymée jiyuya' ãjatxna adxa's.
Sa' txãawe'sx pkaltxi peltunãyçxa, peena yu' bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa yajkxme'nja txãawe'sx pkaltxi's jĩ'k.
Dxusa' ki' vxite u'se puutx we'wewa'j ji'pthu jĩçxa', yaçíiwe'sxa' selpiime' jĩçxane' txã'jĩ'. Aça' selpimée yuuna pa'jsa' skhẽwwa'jsana.
Dxus puutx we'wenisa nyafxiiwe'sxa' jxkaahni ji'phuk Dxusna neewe'wena kxtey nwẽese'khan dxuus yat naa kiwetewe'sxçxáaçxawa.

Txãa yata' e'z jwedku txudeni yu': nyafxte u'kana kũunisate Dxusna neewe'wena ũsni jĩnisatetx bela txaahnisa vxite' pan ãsxni mesa vxyuu bee altal incienso kabnisa txã'wẽsa ũsu'. Aça' e'ste txudenisate' kim yuhwa u'kanimeesa naasáa Dxus yuuçxáa ũsni jĩnisak yu'. Kxteea' kaja vxyuu behçxaçxá's jxuka skadnisak ũsu'. Txãa kaja dxiite yu' teeçx vxyuu bee jaçxu maná ji'phsa, vxite' Aaron khaabu ye'çxku txãa, vxite' Dxus jxkaahni kwet taplate fxi'jni yuuk txãatx jxaawni ũsu' kaja dxiite.

Txãa yata' e'z jwedku txudeni yu': nyafxte u'kana kũunisate Dxusna neewe'wena ũsni jĩnisatetx bela txaahnisa vxite' pan ãsxni mesa vxyuu bee altal incienso kabnisa txã'wẽsa ũsu'. Aça' e'ste txudenisate' kim yuhwa u'kanimeesa naasáa Dxus yuuçxáa ũsni jĩnisak yu'. Kxteea' kaja vxyuu behçxaçxá's jxuka skadnisak ũsu'. Txãa kaja dxiite yu' teeçx vxyuu bee jaçxu maná ji'phsa, vxite' Aaron khaabu ye'çxku txãa, vxite' Dxus jxkaahni kwet taplate fxi'jni yuuk txãatx jxaawni ũsu' kaja dxiite.

Txãa yata' e'z jwedku txudeni yu': nyafxte u'kana kũunisate Dxusna neewe'wena ũsni jĩnisatetx bela txaahnisa vxite' pan ãsxni mesa vxyuu bee altal incienso kabnisa txã'wẽsa ũsu'. Aça' e'ste txudenisate' kim yuhwa u'kanimeesa naasáa Dxus yuuçxáa ũsni jĩnisak yu'. Kxteea' kaja vxyuu behçxaçxá's jxuka skadnisak ũsu'. Txãa kaja dxiite yu' teeçx vxyuu bee jaçxu maná ji'phsa, vxite' Aaron khaabu ye'çxku txãa, vxite' Dxus jxkaahni kwet taplate fxi'jni yuuk txãatx jxaawni ũsu' kaja dxiite.

Txãa vxyuu bee kaja kajkwete yu' Dxus angel na'wẽysatx piisaçxa txaahni ũsu', Dxusa' ayte nesku yu' jĩna kaajiyu'jsata'. Sa' txãawe'sx fxuu ku'taju jxukatx aphna ũsu', na'wẽ pkalpa'ga tajkx ikhçxa txãa eea's jxũna kũhçxa txaja'tx txã'sna. Nawa txã'wẽsatx ew ãate pta'sxwa'j en ji'phmeeth ãçxhíi yu'.
Sa' txãa yatte txã'wẽ pheu'jni nyafxte u'kana kũunite yu' pkalsa ju'gu we'we pu'çxsawe'sxa' u'kana nestxi yu', ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa kxtey yuuna.

Nawa vxite ahte e'ste yu' txãawe'sx npiiçthẽ'j teeçxçxáak u'ka', anxute tee dxi'jçxáa. Sa' kxtee u'kaççxa', perdon pẽjxya' takx eea's jxũçxak u'ka', peekx pkalpa'ga vxite' nasaa pkalpa'ga jĩi yã'jçxa.

Txã'wẽ nyafxte u'kanisa Dxusna neewe'wena ũsni jĩnisa' selpiina nesku yu' Dxusa's neewe'wewa'j. Nawa vxite ahte Dxus yuuçxáa ũsni jĩnite u'kawa'j dxi'j yu' phatemeyku yu' txã'wẽk Dxus Espiritu' kaajiyu'ju'.
Kĩhwa jxuka txã'wẽ yũunisa' ãçxh naa ensuwe'sxa's kaajiyu'jsaçxáak yu'. Kxtee tajkx ikhçxa Dxusna weçxana kabnisa' txãawe'sx pkaltxi khukhya' ãjawa'jsame'.
Txã'wẽ yũunisa' Dxus yu'pthehpkaçxçxáatx selpiwa'jsa yu', txãasatx kajkwekhẽ ãakhẽwe'sxa'sçxáa jxkaaja' ũ'nisu, tudxnisu, kakwete ate fxi'zewa'j txã'wẽsatx.

Nawa ãçxha' pkalsa ju'gu we'we pu'çxsa thaakwe ewsa ũythasnisa pa'kh txã' Kristo'. Sa' txajx yujuni' nasaa vxitnisa naa kiwetewe'sxmée, cielute iiméh ewsate u'kaçxa kxtee pkalsa ju'gu we'we pu'çxna selpiina ũsa'.

Sa' Kristo' Dxus yuuçxáa ũsnite kĩh pkal yuhwa meetek u'ka. Nawa txã' kapla ee vxite' klaa luuçx ee txã'wẽsatx jxũçxa Dxus tasxte u'kame'. Txajx ee yuunak pkawçxa u'ka tee dxi'j yuuçxáa. Nawa jxukaysa bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa vxitumée ewte neeyũuwa'ja's vxit-ya'k txã'wẽ yũu.
Na'wẽ klaa ee kapla ee vxite' klaa luuçxa's altalte kabnisa khuuç txã'wẽsatx nasaa kakwekhẽ pẽ'çhuçte', ãakhẽ kazx pẽetheni's yaatesaa dxihte',

Kristo ee yu' wejx thaakwe yaateya' ãjawa'jsana. Txã'wẽ yaateya' ãjakahníi, Dxus Espiritu pçuwa'jmeesa pu'çxte Kristo' peekíi ya'dukhçxa kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmeek txajx eea's pkaw pkalsa pa'gate. Txãasa txajx eea' kwe'sx ewmée ũus yaakxni dxiitewe'sxa's khukhwa'jsa', Dxus ĩtxisa's selpiiya' ãjakahn.

Dxusa' kwe'sxtxi nwe'wewa'ja's u'se puutx we'wek txã'sna Jesukristo' kxtey yuuna ũsa', na'wẽ nyafxte Dxus puutx we'wek txã'sna nwẽese'jmeeçxa pkalte wetetha'w txãa pkalwa peltunãynik yuu Kristo uupa'ga. Txah Jesukristo nwe'wenisawe'sxa' jxpa'gaya' ãjatxna Dxus jĩi bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa pçuwa'jsamée kwe'sx jĩiçxaçxáa yuuwa'ja's nvxihtku txã'sna.
Nawa na'wẽsa's miiyajkxwe: Adx uute', adx ji'phuni's idx uweene'ga jĩna puutx we'weçxa eçte fxi'jçxa nvxiitnisa', selpiiyujuna.
Nawa txã'jĩna nvxiit-sa uuteçxáa txãa eça' selpiina. Txã'jĩna nvxiit-sa uumeyte yu', txãa eça' selpi'çme'.
Txajíik Dxusa' nyafxíi puutx we'wena fxi'jçxa nvxiitnisa'swa ee pkawçxa nvxiht selpiina neeyũukahn.

Txã'sa' na'wẽk yũu Moisesa': Nasa jxukaysatx pta'sxku ley jxkaahni ma'wẽtewa jxuka. Txã'wẽ yũuçxak khas beh vxite' ẽjxa ku'ta yakh klaa luuçx ee vxite' kapla eete yu' ka'dnisate akhçxa Dxus puutx we'wena fxi'jçxa nvxiitni eç kajkwesu pẽ'çhuç. Sa' nasatxwa jxukaysatx txã'wẽyku yũu na'jĩna:
Dxusa' na'wẽ i'kwe'sxtxi jxkaahna puutx we'wena fxi'jçxa nvxihtku txãa eça' ãçxha' i'kwe'sxtxi jxkaahna selpiiya' ãjana, ee pkawni yuupa'ga jĩk.
Sa' Dxusna neewe'wena ũsni yat vxite' kxtee kĩhçxah ne'ta ũsu' txãatxwa txã'wẽyku ee yakh pẽ'çhuç Moisesa'.
Ley we'weçxa': Kĩhnawa jxuka ee yakh yuuçxáa yaatewa'j yuuna, aça' ee pkawmeete yu', pkala' peltunãynimée yuutxna jĩnak jxkaaja'.

Txã'wẽ cielute ma'wẽna txã'sna kaajiyu'jsa naa kiwetewe'sxçxáa yuhtxwa yaatena ũswa'j peejxtxi yu', tajkx ikhçxa txãa ee yakh. Aça' cielute ũswa'jsatx yaatewa'j yu' wejxku thaakwe ewsa peejx yu', tajkx ikhe'tx txã'wẽsamée.

Kristo' naa kiwete nasaa txaahnisateçxáa u'kame'. Txã' cielute yuuk u'ka, sa' ãçxha' kxtee Dxus tasxte kwe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxna ũsa', aça' Dxusna neewe'wena ũsni yat naa kiwetewe'sxa' cielute ma'wẽna txã'sna txã'wẽy piisanisaçxáak yu'.

Pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxsa npiiçthẽ'jsa' aanxu isa tee dxi'jçxáak u'ka', Dxus yuuçxáa ũsni jĩnisate. Nawa peekx eemée, takx eeçxá'sku jxũçxa u'ka', kxtee pẽ'çhuçya'. Nawa Kristo' uuçxa kujus Dxus tasxte u'kame'.
Txã'wẽ yũuwaça', naa kiwe's vxitiyna aanxu isa uuna nesne' yuuwa'jsa yu'. Nawa txã'wẽ yũumée, Kristo' tee dxi'j yuuçxáak kluuste uuya' vxyaa jxukaysa pkaltxi khukhya'.
Txãa pa'gak nasatxwa tee dxi'jçxáa jxukaysatx uuwa'jsa vxitçxa txãa e'su' ma'wẽsaçxawa Dxus tasxte paswa'j vxitni yuu,

txã'wẽy Kristowa tee dxi'j yuuçxáak kluuste uu maazkuẽesa pkaltxiwa jxuka khukhya'. Sa' txãa e'su' ki' vxyaana, nawa pkaltxi khukhya' ki' uuya'mée, naasáa txã'sna ũythassatx pe'jna u'jya'çxáa txã'wẽ vxyaana.

Moises leya' naasáa thaakwe ewsa vxyaaya' ũsu'tx txãatx kaajiyu'jsaçxáatx yu' txã' isa ewsa yã'j yu'çmeeta', txãasa na'wẽ Dxus tasxte utxaaya' aanxu isa tajkx ikhna nestxi yu' txãawe'sxtxi' pkal ji'phmeesa vxit-ya' bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa ãjawa'jsa meek yu' leya'.

Txãa leya' nasatx pkal ji'phmeesa vxit-ya' ãjasaawaça', na'wẽ pkalpa'ga maazkuẽe uswa tajkx ikhna nestxi yu' txã'wẽ yũuna nes yuuwa'j peejxmeene' yu'. Txãa pa'gatey pkalpa'ga tee dxi'j tajkx ikhçxa kabnijũyã'j yu', pkalsatha'w sũhwa'j peena yu' ũusuthemeena.
Nawa txã'wẽ yũupkaçxte, aanxu isa pkalsatha'w sũhna nesku ya'yũ',
txãa tajkx ikhnisa klaa ee vxite' kapla ee txã'wẽsa' pkaltxi khukhu'çmeeta' naa pa'ga.
Txãa pa'gak Kristo naa kiwete pa'jaççxa', na'jĩna we'we Dxusa's:
Tajkx ikhçxa kabni's jxpa'gameeçxa, adx kakwe yakh uuwa'ja'sgu vxit.
Pkaltxi khukhya' tajkx ikhçxa kabnisatx weçxa'çmeeg.
Txahth na'jĩ: Dxus, iidx jxthãasniçxá's kxtey yuuya' yuhth,
Adx fxi'zewa'ja's ma'wẽ fxi'jni ũsna txã'sa' kxtey yuuya' jĩk.
Na'wẽ Kristo we'weçxa': Pkaltxi khukhya' tajkx ikhçxa kabnisatxi's weçxa'çmeeg, (txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's makwe ley jxkaahnisatewa),
txãa pa'ga: Dxus, iidx jxthãasniçxá's kxtey yuuya' yuhth jĩk Kristo'. Isa ew jiyute yu', naa tajkx ikhna ũsni's ivxiituçxa, txãa pa'gate vxite uuwa'jsath nvxiitu' jĩçxane' txã'jĩ'.
Jesukristo' Dxus jxthãasni's kxtey yuuçxa txajx kakwe's peekíi ya'dukhçxa kluuste uuk jxukaysa pa'gate tee dxi'jçxáa. Txãa pa'gak Dxusa' kwe'sxtxi's txãa jĩi vxit.
Pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxsa judiuwe'sxa' txã'wẽ yuh een isa maazkuẽe uswa tajkx ikhçxa altalte kabna nestxi yu' jxkaasewa'jmée, makwe txã'wẽ yũunisa' bagaçxte yuhwa pkaltxi' khukhwa'jsameetewa.
Nawa Jesukristo' pkalpa'ga tee dxi'j yuuçxáa kluuste uuni yakhçxáa jxuka jxã'jnik yuu txãaçxáa bagaçxtewa selpiwa'jsa. Txãasak cielute Dxus pukate kaçx.
Sa' ãçxha' kxtee ũsa', txã'sna açesa jxukaysa txã'sçxaçxáana nwẽese'jwa'ja's Dxus vxitna jxã'phkaçx.
Txãa pa'gatey tee dxi'j kluuste uuníi yakhçxáa jxuka jxã'jnik yuu txajx nasa yuuwa'jsawe'sx jĩi bagaçxtewa selpiwa'jsa.
Txã'wẽ Kristo tee dxi'j kluuste uuniçxáa bagaçxtewa selpiwa'jsateíiçxáak Dxus Espirituwa na'jĩna we'we:
Txãa en skhẽwniijũ' na'wẽ yũuya' puutx we'we'nja jĩ'k Dxusa':
Adx jxkaahnitxi's txãawe'sx ũuste kxu'akhe'je'nja peçxkanakahmén.
Sa' txã'wẽ yũunijũ', txãawe'sx ewmée yũuna fxi'zeni pkaltxi's bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa yajkxme'nja jĩ'k.
Txã'wẽ pkaltxi's jxuka peltunãynijũyã'ja', peena yu' pkalpa'ga tajkx ikhçxa kabna ũswa'j peejxme'.
Txãa pa'ga, yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, ãçxha' kĩh pkal yuhwamée Dxus yuuçxáa ũsnite u'kawa'ja's ji'ptha'w, txã'wẽ Jesukristo' ee pkawçxa
Dxus tasxte u'kawa'j dxi'j u'sesa's phaadek. Kxtee Dxus ũsnite' kim yuhwa u'kakahmén txudenik ũsu', nawa txãa yuuk kluuste uuçxa kxtee txudeni's phaade kwe'sx u'kakahn.
Txãasa Jesusa' Dxus tasxte we'we pu'çxna ũsa' Dxus luuçx jxukaysa ju'gu.

Txãa pa'ga Kristo' pu'çxyujuna sũhna ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa Dxus tasxte ũukhmée utxaaga, txãa pa'gatey Kristo' kwe'sx ũuste pkaltxi' jxuka yaatek, aça' kwe'sx kakwewa bautismote akhnik yuu, yuuwemeesatha'w sũhnaçxáa yaakxkahn.

Ãçxha' Dxus tasxte utxaawa'ja's jiiyã'tha'w na' Dxus yakh txutemée txãa yakh yuuçxáa çxhãçxha fxi'zega. Txãa pa'gatey Dxusa' kwe'sxtxi bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ũsya' puutx we'wek txã'sa' kxtey yuuna.
Sa' ew yũuna peeygãhna fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phuya' puutx ya'pu'çxhiga kxteeçxah.
Vxite na'wẽtx kwe'sx pkhaakheçte pa'ja'çmée txã'wẽ yũumée, wejxwa teeçxsa na'wẽçxah kxteeçxah puutx kçxhãaçxha'jna fxi'zega, na'wẽ Kristo kĩiwa'j enwa utxaaçyã'ja' naa pa'ga.
Txã'wẽ ewsa's ãate pta'sxni wala ew jiiçxa txã'sa' ahçena txute'nja'w, aça' txã'wẽ yũusa's peena yu' peltunãywa'jmée yuuna.
Naasáa iiméh seena' ũukhũukhsaçxáak ũythasu', Dxus kastigo ipx seena'sa jxuka ivxiituwa'jsa Dxusna açesawe'sxtxi.
Ma'wẽga Moises leyçxáa yuhwa txã'sna nwẽese'jsameetxi' e'z meeçxawa tekh nasa txã'wẽ yũuni's jiisatx pẽjxçxa isa dxihte', peeygãawa'jmée ikhwa'jçxá's vxitu'.

Aça' Dxus Nçxi'ka's ahçeçxa weeçxina, sa' txajx eea's pkawçxa uuni'swa kĩhte yuhwa seelpimeesa na'wẽ weeçxina, sa' txã'wẽy Dxus Espiritu peeygãasa'swa açesa', wejx seena' kastigãyni yu'nja'w sũhwa'ja's mji'phuwe, txã'wẽ Jesukristo eea' Dxus puutx we'weni's kxtey yuuwa'ja's vxitwa'jsa' txãa eeíiçxáa i'kwe'sx pkaltxiwa peltunãysa' na's txã'wẽ açepa'ga.
Dxusa' na'jĩnak we'we txã'sa' mpa'yajkxwe: Adxçxáa kastigãywa'jsath, txã'sa' adx jiine'tka jĩ'k. Sa' ki' we'weçxa': Adx jxpe'jni nasatxi's kastigaĩ'nja jĩ'k.
Txãa pa'ga seena' yuh ũukhũukha', Dxus ĩtxisa kusete kastigãywa'j wetena pa'the'.
Nawa txã'wẽ yũuya'mée i'kwe'sxa' nyafxiitey fxi'zeni's miiyajkxwe: nyafxçxah Dxus yuwe's jxpa'gaççxa', wala pxthaa yuui'kwe txakwe wala thẽysa pa'thewa.
Sa' i'kwe'sx maaíia' wẽesxuna nasaa ksxavxyte pãpani i'kwe yuu, aça' vxitewa txã'wẽy nxussawe'sx yakh ja'daçxah nxussa i'kwe yuu.

I'kwe'sxa' karcelte ũssawe'sx pa'gate peeygãawa'ja's ji'phui'kwe, sa' i'kwe'sx ji'phunitx kusa'jaçte', ũusaçxamée weçxanai'kwe neeyũu. Cielute bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa pçuwa'jsamée thaakwe ewsa's jiiçxai'kwe txã'wẽ yũu.
Txã'wẽsa's jiiyã'jçxa', peçxkananuwe, txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽçxáa yajkxna fxi'zepa'ga txã'wẽ seena' wala ewsa's jxpa'gawa'jsai'kwe.
Dxus jxthãasni's kxtey yuuya' nxuswa'ja's wa'lmée jxpa'gawa'j ji'phi'kwe. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa', Dxus peesni seena' wala ewsa's jxpa'gane'kwe.
Txã'wẽme', Dxus librute na'wẽk we'we':
Wejx jxthẽeyuumée dud yuh kĩijana
Txãa kĩiwa'jsa' txaçxhimeena.
Aça' Dxusçxáana yajkxna fxi'zesa' ewte neeyũuna.
Nawa txã'wẽ yũumée txuteete', txãa yakha' wẽt fxi'zeme'nja jĩ'k.
Nawa na'wẽ txuteeçxa vxituwa'the ũsta' txãatewe'sxmeetha'w kwe'sxa', wejxwa kwe'sx ũus vxitukahmén Dxusa'sçxáa yajkxna fxi'zesatewe'sxtha'w.
Dxusa's ũuste yaakxsa' yafxju ãate yu' uymeeçxawa, ũuste yu' jiik ya'fxi'ze' kxtey yuuyujuna sũhna ũythasna.
Kwe'sx yaçgawe'sxa' txã'wẽ yaakxwa'ja's ji'phutx, txãasatx Dxus dxi'pte ew fxi'zesa yuu.
Sa' kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy yaakxwa'ja's ji'ptha'w, txãasatha'w ãçxh na'wẽ kiwe ũsa' txã'sa' Dxusa' txajx we'weni yakhçxáa vxitne' nyafxíi yu' kĩhwa meetewa sũju'.

Abela' tajkx ikhçxa kabte', Dxusa' weçxayujuna sũhna ũuste jiiçxak txã'wẽ yũu, Kain jĩite thaakwe ewsa. Aça' txã'wẽ yũunisa' Dxus yakha' ewsane' yu' naa pa'ga Dxusa' jxpa'gak. Aça' Abel yu' uuni', nawa Abela' txã'wẽk Dxusa's ũuste jxpubamée yajkx jĩni yu' ãçxpa'jwa ũsa'.

Enokwa txã'wẽ Dxusa's ũuste ew jiiçxa Dxus yakhçxáa fxi'zepa'ga, uumey pe'jna u'jnik yuu cielun. Txãa pa'ga peena yu' uymeeta', txã'sa' Dxusku pe'jna u'j txãa pa'ga. Aça' Dxus librute Enokha's we'weçxa': Nyafxíi uumey Dxus yakh weçxanak fxi'ze' jĩ'k.

Nawa ũuste Dxusa's yuuçxáa yaakxwa'ja's ji'phmeete', Dxus yakh weçxana fxi'zeya' ya'ãja'çme', txãa pa'ga txajx tasxte utxaasa' Dxusa' ũsna sa' txã'sna pakwete', nwe'wena sũhwa'ja's ũuste ji'phuwa'ja'.

Noewa txã'wẽy Dxus we'weni' kxtey yuuyujuna sũhwa'ja's ũuste jiik yu'. Txãasak kastigo nus pa'jyujuna sũhçxa Dxus jxkaahni's nwẽese'jçxa barko's vxit, txajx yattewe'sxtxi jxuka nwe'weya'. Sa' Dxusa' kxtey yuuyujuna sũhwa'ja's ũuste ji'phupa'ga, Dxusa' kxtey yuute', naa kiwetewe'sxa' ya'kastigãytxi aça' Dxusa' Noea's ewsa' jĩnak we'we.
Abrahanwa txã'wẽy Dxusa' kxtey yuuyujuna sũhwa'ja's ũuste jiiçxak, Dxus kiwe ũsya' pa'yate', nwẽese'jçxa kasehna u'j, nawa mtee pa'jwa'ja'sçxáa yuhwa jiimeek yu'.

Txã'wẽ Abrahana' Dxus kiwe ũsya' neeyũune' txã'sa' bagaçxteçxáawa kxtey yuuyujuna sũhwa'ja's ũuste jiiçxak maa sũhmée txagaçxhíi yu' pa'jsa na'wẽçxáa tultu txahçxa fxi'zena ũsu'. Aça' Isaak, Jakob txãawe'sxwa txãa kiwe's jxpa'gawa'jsaçxawa, txã'wẽyçxáatx pa'jsa na'wẽ fxi'zena ũsu'.
Txãa pa'gatey Abrahana' cielute Dxus vxitni çxhaba's jxpa'gawa'ja'sku ũythasna ũsu', txãasak maa sũhmée fxi'ze'.
Abrahana' txã'wẽ Dxus we'weni' kxtey yuuyujuna sũhwa'ja's ji'phupa'gak Sara' txakwe wala thẽ'khwe luuçx ji'phuwa'jsamée yã'jçxawa, luuçx ji'phu.
Txãasak Abrahana' txajx ji'j iiméh wala kuh ji'phsa yuu, cielute estrelxa vxite' yu'pukasu kwetmusetx ma'wẽga isate ya'ãja'çmée txã'wẽk kuh ji'phu, txakwe iiméh wala thẽ'khwe yã'jçxawa.

Na'wẽ Dxusna yaakxsa nakwe wala kuh kxsustha'w txãawe'sxa' Dxus ũsya' neeyũuk txã'sa' jxpa'gamey uutx, txãasatx e'su txaçxteçxáawa Dxusa' kxtey yuuyujuna sũhna weçxana yaaki'. Sa' txãawe'sxa' naa kiwete tudtewe'sxçxáa ne'tka'w jĩnatx we'we.
Txãawe'sxa' txã'wẽ we'weçxa' ew jiyute yu', vxite ahte ũsya' u'jwa'ja's pakwesáa ne'ta yu'.
Txãawe'sxa' maa kiweju yuusaaçxawa txã'sna yajkxna ũswaça', txãa kiweníi sxawedwa'j ne'ta yu'.

Nawa txãawe'sx ũswa'j thaakwe ewsa's ne'ta pakwesáa yu' cielutewe'sxna, txãasatx sxawedmée. Txã'wẽ sxawedmeeta' txãa pa'gak Dxusa' thaame'çmée txãawe'sx Dxusthu jĩna ya'kxsuswa'ja's, txãasa txãawe'sx ũswa'j pheu'jni ji'pha'.

Abrahana' txajx nçxi'k Isaakha's ikhtewa Dxusa' ki' ĩtxi vxituna sũhwa'ja's ũuste jiiçxak ikhya' jxũna u'j. Dxusa' Abrahan kĩh yũutewa jiyuya' sũhçxa txajx nçxi'k teeçxçxáasa's ikh kaathewa, wa'lmée kxtey yuuya'wak yu'. Makwe Dxus txãa yakh puutx we'weçxa':
Iidx ji'j Isaaktewe'sx txã'wẽ wala penatxna jĩna we'wetewa, ikhya'wak yu'.
Nawa Abrahana' txajx ũuste yu' uutewa Dxusa' ki' ĩtxi vxituna sũhwa'ja's ji'phu'k. Txãasa isa ew yajkxte yu', Abrahan nçxi'ka' uusaawe'sx ksxavxyu ki' ĩtxi yuusáa na'wẽsa'.
Isaakwa Dxusa' kxtey yuuna sũhwa'ja's ũuste ew jiiçxak txajx nçxi'k Jakob Esau txãawe'sxtxi' bedicion wala jxpa'gane'kwe jĩna we'we.
Jakobwa Dxusa' kxtey yuuna sũhwa'ja's ũuste ew jiiçxak uuçyã'jçxa', José nçxi'ktxi teeçxsa na'wẽçxah jxukaysatx wala bedekĩni yuune'kwe jĩna we'we, sa' Dxusa's neewe'wek kĩiçhuçxa.
Josewa Dxus pu'çxte' Israelwe'sxa' Egipto kiwejũ kasejetxna sũhwa'ja's ũuste ew jiiçxak, uuya'wayã'jçxa txãawe'sxtxi neewe'we txajx kakwe's mtee jxũna u'jçxa pedaawa'ja'swa.
Moises neywe'sxwa Dxusa' nwe'wena sũhwa'ja's ũuste ew jiiçxatx tekh a'te uta Moisesa's sũth, luuçxa' wala zhiçxkwe yu'ne' txãa pa'ga. Makwe Egipto kiwete jxkaahsa yu' ikh kaathewa ikhmeeta'.
Moiseswa Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'ja's ũuste ew jiiçxak, Egipto kiwete jxkaahsa niisa nçxi'k jĩna kxsusni yuuwa'j yu'sa' wa'l, walaana kãhçxa'.
Sa' naa kiwete pkalte weçxana fxi'zepkaçxte, wejxwa ũukhmée Dxus txhitxhnisa yakh ja'daçxah pkxuuni yuuwa'ja'sçxáak yajkx.

Txãa pa'gatey cielutewe'sxa's jxpa'gawa'ja'sçxáak yajkxçxa fxi'zena ũsu'. Txãasak Egipto kiwete iiméh seena' wala ji'phuni's yaakipkaçxte, Kristo na'wẽy yaaçeni pkxuuni fxi'zeni's ji'phuya'çxáa yajkx.

Dxus pu'çxwa'ja's ũuste ew jiiçxak Moisesa' jxkaahsa ũusçxani yu'sa' ũukhmée Egipto kiwejũ kasehna u'j, sa' Dxus tasxu le'çxkweçxáa yuhwa txuteméek fxi'ze, Dxusa' vxyaasameetewa yafxju uyna ũs na'wẽ yajkxna.
Dxusa' nwe'weyujuna sũhwa'ja's ew ũuste jiiçxak Moisesa' Paskua fxiesta's vxitçxa eea's vxitxkhẽ sxũsx kaah, ikhwa'jsa angel sẽhçxawa Israelwe'sx luuçx nthẽ'jsa maa yuhtxwa ikhkahmen.

Israelwe'sxwa Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'ja's ũuste ew jii yuupa'gaçxáak, mar bejuy uykhẽwwa'j dxi'j phaate txãawe'sx uykhẽwkahn. Aça' Egiptowe'sxwa txã'wẽy uykhẽu'nja'w sũhçxawa txãawe'sxa' ĩkhtee uutx yu' afxihbte.
Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'ja's ũuste ew jiiçxatx Israelwe'sxa' Dxus we'weni's nwẽese'jçxa txã'wẽ siete enpkaçx Jeriko çxhabte muralxa peeku'j tadxina ũsu', aça' txã'wẽ nwẽese'pha'gak muralxa' wete.
Rahabwa Dxusa' nwe'weyujuna sũhwa'ja's ũuste ew jiiçxa, Israelwe'sx e'zsa kxtee peethegu'jya' pa'jsatx ewku jxpa'ga. Txãa pa'gak uumée, Dxusa's nwẽese'jsameewe'sx vxite yu' uutewa.
¿Kĩh jwee yu' pta'sxitka? En ji'phwaç yu' pta'sxwa'j yu' walaíiçxáa ũsa', Gedeon, Barak, Sansón, Jefxté, Davxid, Samwel, Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx txãawe'sxtxi we'wewa'j.
Txãawe'sxa' Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'ja's ũuste ew jiiçxatx maaíi yu' gweçxate puiiçxa knay, vxite' ewtxi jxkaahna fxi'ze, vxite' Dxus pu'çxni's jxpa'gatx, vxite' león yuwetxwa aphtxi,
vxite' seena' ipx walajuwa çxhavxymeeta', vxite' ikhsa kusejuwa iyutx, vxite' puiiya' çxhãçxhameekwetewa kçxhãaçxha'jnisa yuuçxa, gweçxate iiméh kuhsatxwa knaytxi.

Naapkaçxha' u'ywe'sxwa txãawe'sx luuçx uunisatx ki' ĩtxi vxitni jxpa'gatx. Vxite' seena' wala pkxuuni yuuçxa uutx, ki' ĩtxi yuuwa'ja's ji'phuçxa thaakwe ewte fxi'zeya' sũhçxa, nwe'wewa'j yu'sa' jxthãasmeeta'.
Naapkaçxha' vxite' weeçxna peçxujkweçxa çam kadenaju tudçxa karcelte txaahnitx yuu.

Vxite' kwet wãatatahçxa ikhnitx yuu. Maaíi yu' pxãhsu pẽçnitx yuu. Vxite' iiméh seena' wala kxũusu'jni yuutx. Vxite' kçxilxuh ikhnitx yuu, naapkaçxha' vxite' ahçeçxa neeuni yat ji'phmeetx pekũhnaçxáa ũsu', kĩhwa ji'phmeeçxa piisxáa kha'tx kapla kha'tx txã'wẽsaçxá's pã'çxçxa, nxuste pkxuunitx fxi'zena ũsu'.
Txã'wẽ pkxuunisawe'sxa' nasa u'pnimée kiwesuçxáatx fxi'zena ũsu' yu'khsu, kiwe kafxsu. (Nasa txã'wẽ Dxus yakh zhiçxkwe fxi'zesa yakha' naa kiwe' ũsweçxte yuuwa meena.)
Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'ja's ũuste ew jiiçxa txãawe'sx jxukaysa txã'wẽ seena' yũuni yuuçxawa, Dxus ũsya' neeyũuk txãa yu'sa' txagaçxhíi yu' jxpa'gameeta',
txãa pa'gatey Dxusa' thaakwe ewsane' ji'phu' ãçxh naa ensu kwe'sx jĩi yã'jçxa. Aça' txãawe'sxa' kwe'sx yakh ja'daçxah jxpa'gawa'jsaçxatx txagaçxhíi yu' jxpa'gamée.

Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'ja's ũuste yaakxsawe'sx nakwe wala kuh ũsta' aça' kwe'sxa' txãawe'sx ksxavxyte ũstha'w. Txãa pa'ga pkal kaypuba'jwa'jsa's nvxihtna, kĩhwa Dxus yakh fxi'zewa'ja's suwwa'jsa yu'sa' jxuka nvxihtçxa, makwe thẽytewa Dxus yakh yuuçxáa fxi'zega, uu entepkaçx.

Jesukristo yuuçxá's pu'vxitumée yajkxna fxi'zega, txãa pa'gatey txãa yuuçxáak Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'ja's ũsu', sa' txãa yuuçxáak Dxusna yaakxni jxuka kxtey yuuna pa'phkaçx pu'çxhi'. Txã'wẽ yũuya'k Jesusa' thaamewa'j yu'sa' yajkxmée kluuste uu, txakwe wala nxusnxustewa. Txãa pa'gatey pxthaa yuuni en skhẽwniijũ' wẽt weçxana ũswa'ja's jiik yu', txãasak cielute Dxus ũsni pukate kaçx.
Jesusa' nakwe wala pxthaa yuuk pkalsawe'sx kusete txã'sna i'kwe'sxa' yajkxçxa txãa na'wẽy nxuswa'j en pa'thewa Dxus tasxu txutemée mfxi'zewe.
I'kwe'sxa' pkala's nvxihtçxa Dxus yakh fxi'zepa'ga iiméh seena' nxusnxus uuwa'j yu'sa' ji'phumey i'kwe.
Sa' txakwe dud yu' peçxkanawa'jmeena Dxusa' txajx luuçxtxi's na'wẽk yu'kxpeje' txã'sna:
Dxus yu'kxpehna kastigãyni's açenu, adx nçxi'k,
Sa' juuna' we'wete', nxusna ũusçxanu.
Txãa pa'gatey Dxusa' txajx peeygãanisatxi's yu'kxpeje'k ew fxi'zekahn,
Sa' txajx luuçx yuutxi's jxukaysatxku kastigaĩ' jĩ'k Dxus librute'.
I'kwe'sxa' kastigãyni's mwantaĩwe, txãa pa'gatey Dxusa' i'kwe'sxtxi' txajx luuçx na'wẽk jxpe'je'. Miiyajkxwe: ¿Maa luuçxçxá' ney yu'kxpehna kastigãynimeesa ũstxmanx?
Dxusa' txajx luuçx yuutxi's jxukaysatxku yu'kxpehna kastigaĩ', nawa i'kwe'sxa' yu'kxpehna kastigãynimeesa yuuçxa', txajx luuçxmée vxitesate luuçxçxa txã'wẽ yuune'kwe.

Kwe'sx le'çxkuẽyte', naa kiwete kwe'sx tata yu'kxpehte', kxtey nwẽese'je'tha'w na' ãçxha' wejx thaakwe ew nwẽese'jwa'j ji'ptha'w kwe'sx Tata cielutewe'sxa's. Txã'wẽ nwẽese'jçxa', pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phu'nja'w.

Naa kiwete kwe'sx tatawe'sxa' txãawe'sx ũuste ma'wẽne' wejx ew ũusuthe' yu'kxpehna jxpe'jwa'ja's txã'wẽytxi yũuna jxpe'je', naa kiwete txaçxmée fxi'zewa'ja'sçxáawa. Nawa Dxusa' kwe'sxtxi iiméh wala selpiwa'ja's kaapiya'jnak yu'kxpeje', txãawa ma'wẽ pkal ji'phmeena txã'wẽy yuukahn.
Ãçxh kastigãy íina yu' wala yuh akata', txãa pa'gatha'w jxpa'gaya' wa'lu'. Nawa txãa kastigo's jxpa'gaçxa ew fxi'zeya' piyate', wala yuh ewsa', jxpubamée weçxanak ya'fxi'ze' naa pa'ga.
Txãa pa'ga wa'lmée çxhãçxha miiyajkxwe, ewmeete fxi'zena ũsçxawa txãajũ mkaasehwe.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxa', dxi'j ewsaju peena yu' jxpubameene'kwe.
Jxukaysa yakh ew fxi'zewa'jçxá's pa'pçxuna meswe, pkalte fxi'zemée. Txã'wẽ pkalte fxi'zeçxa', kim yuhwa Dxusa's uyya' ãjameena.
Dxus peeygãhçxa nwe'wenijũyã'ja', wala mpa'yajkxwe. Txã'wẽ jxpa'yajkxçxa yuuçxáa i'kwe'sx maa yuhwa txã'wẽ vxitesatx kaypuba'jna ewmée yũusa yuumeene'kwe.

Txã'wẽme', maaíi yu' ptammeesa kazx pkal yũuna fxi'zesa wáa yuune'kwe kĩhwa ewsa's weeçxna ahçena. Miiyajkxwe Esaua' txã'wẽk ewsa's weeçxsa yuu, teeçx ũ' plaatu pa'gaçxáa peekx wẽt fxi'zewa'ja's txweyku.
I'kwe'sxa' peekx jiine'kwe Esaua' txã'wẽ yũuni e'su' ney bediciona's ki' jxpa'ga wẽek, nawa ũsnimeek yuu. Aça' wala nxusna ũ'nek, nawa txajx txweyni's ma'wẽ yũuçxa yuhwa ki' kaasxwedu'jni yuume'.
Israelwe'sxa' Sinaí thã'j vxiçte utxaatx kxte' ipx yuuçxáak seena' behna ũsu', sa' seena' yuh wala ũukhũukh çxhi'dxna ũsu'k kpi'sx we'weni na'wẽ susna.
Sa' korneta susni vxite' txãawe'sxtxi jxkaahna we'weni's wala ũukhçxa jwee yu' we'we kaahmeeta'.
Txãa jxkaahni' na'wẽk yu': Maawa naa thã'the teeçx çxidaçxáawa txajana txã'sa' kwet wãatatahçxa meeçxawa we'thu yãjaçxa ikhwa'j yuuna, kĩh tajkx ma'k yuu nawa jĩ'k.
Seena' yuh ũukhũukhsaçxáa vxyaana ũsu'k, txajíiçxáak Moises yuhwa na'jĩ: Ũukhnite yayanaçxáa ũsthu jĩ'k.

Nawa i'kwe'sxa' txã'wẽsateçxáamée thaakwe seena'sa tasxte utxasáa i'kwe: Teeçx thã'j Sion yaasesate Dxus ĩtxisa ũsnite, cielute Jerusalen çxhabte, angeleswe'sx iiméh seena' kuhsa pkhaakheçxa Dxusa's tuuthe'jsawe'sx tasxte,
Dxus luuçx cielutewe'sx tasxte, Dxus nwe'wenisawe'sx tasxte, Dxus seena' juuna' jxukaysatx jxkaahsa tasxte,
Dxus u'se puutx we'weçxa nvxiitni's kxtey kxũ'ju'jwa'jsa Jesus tasxte, Abel ee na'wẽsamée Jesus ee pkawnisa' thaakwe ewsate txã'wẽsa tasxte utxasáa i'kwe.

Txãa pa'ga wala mpa'yajkxwe, kwe'sxtxi we'wesa cielujuwe'sxa's weeçxya'mée. Miiyajkxwe, Dxus jxkaahna we'weni Sinaíjũwe'sxçxá's weeçxçxawa iyumeeta', aça' kwe'sxa' wejx iyuya' ãjame'nja'w, cielujũ yuu we'weni's nwẽese'jya' wa'lçxa'.
Dxus Sinaí thã'j vxiçte we'weni' naa kiwe's kẽese'kh. Nawa ãçxha' txã'wẽçxáamée na'jĩ'k: Ki' peena thaakwe kẽese'je'nja nawa kiweçxá'smée, petx cielu yã'jçxa kẽese'je'nja jĩ'k.
Isa ew jiyute yu', ki' peena thaakwe kẽese'je'nja jĩçxa', Dxus vxitnisa ẽsesa yu' jxuka ũsxitxna, aça' ẽsesaméeçxáa neeyũutxna jĩçxane' txã'jĩ'.
Nawa Dxus tasxte kwe'sx ũswa'j yu' kẽese'jnimée yuuna. Txãa pa'ga Dxusa's weçxana neewe'wega, txajx dxi'pte ew yuuçxáa yũuna.
Txã'wẽme', kwe'sx Dxusa' jxuka ivxiituwa'jsa' ipx na'wẽsa.
Teeçxsa na'wẽçxah puutx peeygãhna fxi'zewa'ja's peçxkananuwe.
I'kwe'sx yat-su pa'jsatx weçxana mpa'gawe. Txã'wẽ yũusa' maaíia' angeleswe'sx yuhtxwa jiyunimeete jxpa'ga'ta.

Preesu ũssatx peeygãhna mfxi'zewe, i'kwe'sx yuu preesu ũssa na'wẽ yajkxna. Pkxuuni fxi'zesatxwa peeygãhna mfxi'zewe, kwe'sxwa kakwe ji'ptha'w na' naa kiwete txã'wẽy pkxuuni yuuwa'jsatha'w sũhna miiyajkxwe.
Kabaçxa fxi'zeni' wala yuh ewsa', txãa pa'ga kabamey yu' pkal yũunuwe. Sa' kabayã'jçxa', vxitesa yakh pkal yũuna fxi'zewa'jme'. Txã'wẽme', Dxusa' kastigaĩna txã'wẽ pkal yũusatxi'.
Vxyuçxá's yajkxna fxi'zewa'jme'. Ma'wẽkuẽ ji'phuni yakhçxáawa wẽt mfxi'zewe, txãa pa'gatey Dxus we'weçxa': Bagaçxte yuhwa i'kwe'sxçxáa yuutxi'sa' nvxihtme'nja jĩ'k.
Txãa pa'ga txãa yuuçxá's pi'kiga, kxtey pasyujuna sũhna na'jĩna:
Dxusa' kĩhtewa jxuka txãa yuuçxáak pu'çxhi',
Txãa pa'ga weh yuhwa ũukhme'nja naa kiwete nasa ewmée yũusatxi'.
Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa i'kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsatx miiyajkxwe: Txãawe'sx ma'wẽ ne'ta Dxusa's yajkxna fxi'ze txã'wẽy mfxi'zewe.
Jesukristo' bagaçxte yuhwa yu'pthehsame'. Nyafxíiwa ma'wẽsaga yu', sa' ãçxwa txãaíiçxá', sa' bagaçxtewa txãaíiçxáa nes yuuwa'jsa'.

Txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxa' fxiy kaapiya'jni's nwẽese'jna fxi'zenuwe, wejxwa Dxus peeygãaniçxá's ũuste jxpa'gaçxa çxhãçxha fxi'zeni ewsa', aça' ũ'nisu jxkaahnisa' bagaçxte yuhwa selpiwa'jsame' txã'wẽsatx nwẽese'jsawe'sxtxi's.
I'kwe'sxa' ew miiyajkxwe altal ji'ptha'w txã'sa'. Txãa altaltewe'sxa's ũ'we'çmeeta' kxtee selpisaawe'sxa'.

Pkalsawe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxsa judiu' tajkx ikhnisa eea's Dxus yuuçxáa ũsni jĩnitek txajxa' jxũna u'jwe' jxukaysa pkaltxi peltunãyni yuukahn, nawa takx kakwe yuutxi'sa' txajũ jxũna u'jçxa ekajutx kabu'.
Jesuswa txã'wẽyku çxhab ekaju kasehçxa uuna ũsu', txajx eeju nasaa pkaltxi' jxuka peltunãyya'.
Txãa pa'ga kwe'sxwa Dxusna neewe'wena ũsni yat nyafxiiwe'sxa's nvxihtçxa, Jesus yakh fxi'zeya' kasejega, txãawa ma'wẽga pxthaa yuu txã'wẽy yaaçeni yuuya'.
Kwe'sxa' nyafxíi ũsni yata's nvxihtçxa, çxhab bagaçxte yuhwa pçuwa'jsamée ũsna txã'sna pakwena ũstha'w, naa kiwete' bagaçxte yuhwa pçuwa'jsamée çxhab ji'phmeetha'w naa pa'ga.

Txãa pa'ga Dxusa's tuuthe'jna nes yuuwa'j ji'ptha'w Jesukristo's pi'kxçxa bagaçxtewa. Dxusa's weçxana tajkx ikhçxa kabupkaçxte, kwe'sx ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa txajx yase's kxsusna weçxana nes yuuwa'j ji'ptha'w.
Txã'wẽ yũusa' kĩhçxáawa i'kwe'sx ji'phuni's vxitesatx jxtxuhdena fxi'zewa'ja's peçxkananuwe, txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽ yũuni'sku Dxusa' weçxá'.

Sa' i'kwe'sxtxi kaapiya'jna jxpe'jsatxi's kxtey yuuna mwẽese'jwe, txãa pa'gatey txãawe'sxa' i'kwe'sx ũustxi vxituwe'sxte thegsata'. Txãawe'sxa' cielute Dxus tasxte utxaaçxa pta'sxwa'j ji'phta', txãasatx txã'wẽ yũ'. Aça' txãawe'sx mjĩini's weeçxsa na'wẽ yuunuwe, ewçxáa yũuwa'ja's mpa'pçxuwe. Txã'wẽ yũumeete', txãawe'sx mjĩini' i'kwe'sxtxi's kĩhte yuhwa selpiimeena.
Kĩhtewa ewçxáa fxi'ze wẽeçxa bagaçxte yuhwa pkalte yu' fxi'zesameetha'w, naa pa'ga kwe'sx pa'gate Dxus yakh mpuutxwe'wewe.
I'kwe'sxtxi's Dxus yakh puutx we'we jxpi'ki'th, kxah Dxusa' adxa's txaçxmeyna ki' kaasxwedu'juna i'kwe'sx yakh ũsya'.
Jesukristo' iiméh ew txajx nasatx jxpe'jsa yu'k, txajx eek txã'wẽ u'se puutx we'weni bagaçxte yuhwa yu'pthehwa'jme's vxitçxa nvxiitni's kxtey kxũ'ju'jwa'jsa yuu.

Sa' Jesukristo uutewa ki' ĩtxi vxit-sa Dxusa' i'kwe'sxtxi's kĩhte yuhwa peejxmée ewçxáa kaafxi'ze'jena, txajx jxthãasni's kxtey yuukahn. Sa' txã' i'kwe'sxtxi ma'wẽ yuuweçxtewa kxtey yuuna, Jesukristo pu'çxte txajx dxi'pte ew yũusa yu's. Jesukristo yuuçxáa bagaçxtewa jxtuhthesa yuuna.
Yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi neewe'we'th, wa'lmée jxpa'gakahn maz yuwe jxu'jmeekuẽ yu'kxpehna fxi'jni's.
Sa' pta'sxiçthu kwe'sx yakhthẽ'j Timoteo' karceluh txhweteni yã'j ũsa', sa' dud wáa pa'jana, aça' pe'jçxa yuwe'nja i'kwe'sxtxi puutx uyya' yuhçxa'.
Dxuus yatte i'kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsawe'sxtxi' jxukaysatx yuwe meen weçxawe, sa' Dxus yakh fxi'zesawe'sxtxiwa txã'wẽy. Italiajũwe'sxwa yuwe weçxaa kaja'tx.
I'kwe'sx jxukaysatx Dxusa' pu'çxna nes yuuna.
James: Israel nasa doce ji'jsa naa kiwete msuuwa jxuka ũssatx weçxana fxi'jaçthu Jesukristo vxite' Dxusna selpisáa Santiago yaasesa.
Adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, nxusmée meswe weçxweçxa yajkxna ma'wẽsawa thẽysa vxyaatewa.
Mjiyuwe: Dxusa's jweeíiçxáa çxhãçxha yajkxya' piyakahníiçxáak txã'wẽ thẽysa' vxya'.
Aça' thẽysa vxyaatewa ũukhnuwe, txãa thẽysa' i'kwe'sx kĩhte yuhwa sxiigmée jxuka Dxus yakh çxhãçxha fxi'zewa'ja's kaapiya'jsa'.
Maawa Dxus yakh fxi'zewa'ja's sxiiguuççxa', Dxusa'síiçxáa mpẽjxwe, aça' txã' wa'lmée maatxwa jxuka kaajiyu'juna i'kwe'sx pẽynite thaakwe.
Nawa kuh jwed yajkxmée ũsyujuna sũhna yuuçxáa mpẽjxwe. Txã'wẽme', kuh jwed yaakxsa' tee jwedteçxáa ũsmée ĩkh wala's wejxaa kẽese'jni na'wẽ yuutxna.
Aça' txã'wẽ tee jwedçxáa yaakxsame' Dxusa' ũsuna sũhwa'j ji'phme'.
Maawa Dxusa' pasmée wáanakx sũhna e'z jwed yajkxna pẽysa' bagaçxte yuhwa Dxus yakhçxáa fxi'zeya' yu' ãjameena.
Maa yakhthẽ'jwa kĩhwa ji'phmeesaçxawa weçxweçxa yajkxna fxi'zewa'j ji'pha', Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhna.
Aça' txã'wẽy ji'phsawa txajx ji'phuni pçuwa'j en pa'thewa, wẽtwẽt yaakxwa'j ji'pha', txãa pa'gatey naa kiwete ji'phsa' kitewa ma'wẽga txaçxmeyna udxi' txã'wẽysaçxá'.
Sek açxaate', jxũth tasxa' udxi'k, naapkaçxha' kitewa ubu'k, aça' zhiçxkwesa' kxtee pçu'k. Txã'wẽy naa kiwete ji'phsawa txajx ji'phuni yakh pçuwa'jsaçxá'.

Ewmeete kweete'jwa'jsa vxyaatewa, txã'sa' nwẽese'jsame' wala yuh wẽtwẽt yaakxwa'j ji'pha'. Txãa pa'gatey txã'wẽ yũusa' bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's Dxus ũsya' neeyũuk txã'sa' jxpa'gawa'jsa' Dxusna nwẽese'pha'ga.
Maawa ewmeete weteçxa', Dxus ne' txã'wẽte wetewa'ja's vxit sũhwa'jme'. Dxusa' ewmeete wetewa'ja's bagaçxte yuhwa ũsmeena. Txã' ewmée yũusame'.
Wejxwa peekx ũus ewmée yaakxni's nwẽese'pha'gaçxáatx ewmeete wetena pa'ja'.
Na'wẽ ewmée ũus yaakxnik pkalte kweete'je', aça' txãa pkalku jweeíiçxáa walaana u'jçxa nmehte' uuwa'jçxáa vxitna pa'ja'.
Yakhthẽ'jwe'sx mjiyuwe:
Na'wẽ Dxusa' cielute eena' kweethsatx jxuka vxitku sa' txã' ãçxpkaçx le'çxkweçxáa yuhwa yu'pthehmée ũsa', aça' txajx tasxuçxaçxáa yuusata' kĩhwa ewsa yu' jxuka.
Txãak kwe'sxtxi peeygãhçxa txajx yuwe isasa's pta'sxçxa ewte fxi'zewa'ja's ũs, kwe'sx nyafxte txãa yakh utxasáa yuukahn.
Txãa pa'ga adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sx kĩhwa pta'sxni ewsa yu'sa' bagaçxtewa wa'lmée jxpa'gaya'çxáa meswe. Nawa we'wewa'j yu'sa' ũus yajkxçxa jxpa'yajkx mwe'wewe, sa' ũusçxawa'j yu'sa' wejx wala mpa'yajkxwe.
Txã'wẽme', ũusçxanisa' Dxus dxi'pte ewmeesa', aça' Dxusa' txã'wẽsa's jxpa'ga'çme'.
Txãa pa'ga kĩhwa ewmeesa nakwe wala pehnaya' duda' txãa yu'sa' jxuka nvxihtçxa, Dxus yuwe ewsa pta'sxni yuuk txã'sçxáana wa'lmée ũuste myu'akhwe. Dxus pta'sxni' i'kwe'sx ũusa's nwe'weya' ãjawa'jsa'.
Nawa Dxus yuwe ma'wẽ jxkaathe' txã'sa' kxtey myuuwe. Wẽse'jsaçxáa yu' yuunuwe. I'kwe'sxa' jxpubanuwe. Ĩ'neeçxáa wẽse'jnisa' kxulsa'.
Maawa txã'wẽ Dxus pta'sxni's kxtey yuumée ĩ'neeçxáa wẽse'jsa', peekx dxi'pa's speejute thegçxa
khũçxte uyçxawa txãa dudtey khukhmée u'jyã'jçxa' ma'wẽ peçxkanakx txã'wẽysa'.
Nawa wẽse'jçxa peçxkanamée, Dxus ley ewte nvxiit-sa jxkaahni's kxtey nwẽese'jsa', jxpubamée wẽt fxi'zena Dxus jxkaahni's nwẽese'jna.
Maawa Dxus dxi'pte ewsath sũhçxawa ma'wẽwa we'weni's jxpa'yakxmeeçxa', peekíiçxáa jxpubasáa yuuna. Aça' Dxus dxi'pte ew fxi'zesath sũhni' kxul yuh yuuna.

Dxus dxi'pte kĩhte yuhwa jxpubamée ew fxi'zesa' na'wẽ yũuwa'ja': Nmi' ji'phmée puuplesatx pu'çxna nxuste fxi'zesatx kvxiisxa'jna luuçx wakçxahtxwa txã'wẽy yũuwa'ja', sa' naa kiwete ewmeesa peekx ũuste khẽewe'sxte wala jxpa'yakxwa'ja'.
Adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sx i'kwe'sxa' Jesukristo txakwe ewsana ũuste jxpa'gayã'jçxa', nasa maatxwa puutx ja'daçxah txãa na'wẽçxaçxáa ew yũuwa'j ji'phi'kwe.
Meeçxawa na'wẽ wáa yuune'kwe: I'kwe'sx pkhaakheni yatte teeçx piçthẽ'j ropa wala ewsa athçxa, vxyuu bee sultxhikha paatçxa u'kana, naapkaçxha' vxitewa pa'jana kĩhwa ji'phmée ropa ĩisxkwesa athçxa.
Aça' txãa ropa ewsa ĩijxũusa's ew jxpa'gaçxa kaçxni ewsate kaçx kajane'kwe. Nawa kĩhwa ji'phmée pxthaakuẽesa's yu': Ayte myuju meeçxa' kxtee kiwete mkaaçx jĩne'kwe.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxa', puutx ja'daçxah txãa na'wẽçxaçxáa ew yũusamée, vxite yu'sa' açeyaakxsaçxa txã'wẽ yuune'kwe.

Adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sx ew mwẽese'jwe: Naa kiwete makwe kĩhwa ji'phmée pxthaakuẽesaçxawa txãawe'sxa' Dxusa's yu' ma'wẽçxáa yuhwa peçxkanamée ũuste yajkxna fxi'zeçxa Dxus jxkaahna ũsnitewe'sxa's Dxusíi ũsya' neeyũuk Dxusna yaakxsatxi' txã'sna jxpa'gawa'jsata'.
Txã'wẽtewa, i'kwe'sx yu' txãa ji'phmée pxthaakuẽesatxi' weeçxçxa ji'phsaçxáatx i'kwe ew we'we'. Nawa ji'phsaíiçxáa i'kwe'sxtxi pkxuuçxa ¿khuẽs tasxsu kuutxa'jsamée wáatxna?
Txãawe'sxíiçxáa Kristo yase's ¿açewe'wesamée wáatxna?
Dxus ley maatewa thaakwesa we'weçxa': Vxite nasatxwa peeygãawa'ja' idx ma'wẽga ya'peeygãja' txã'wẽyçxáa jĩ'k. Aça' txã'sa' kxtey nwẽese'jna fxi'zeçxa', ewsaçxah txã'wẽ yuune'kwe.
Nawa maatxwa jxuka txãa na'wẽçxaçxáa ew yũumeeçxa', pkalte weteene'kwe, sa' Dxus jxkaahni leya's yuuwesa yuune'kwe, leya's jxuka nwẽese'pha'gamée.
Maawa Dxus jxkaahni leya's ew yuh nwẽese'jçxawa teeçx ahte le'çxkuẽçxáawa jxpubaana aça' txãa pa'gaçxáa Dxus jxkaahni ley makwetewa jxukak yuuwesa yu'.

Miiyajkxwe wakx Dxus leya' na'wẽk we'we': Ptamsayã'ja' vxitesa yakh pkal yuuwa'jme' jĩ'k. Sa' nasanawa ikhwa'jme' jĩnak jxkaaja'. Txã'wẽ yã'the', nasa yu's ikhmeeçxawa, vxitesa yakh yu' pkal yuuwáana aça' txãa pa'gaçxáa Dxus jxkaahni ley makwetewa jxuka nwẽese'jsamée yuuna.
Txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxa' we'wewa'j ma'k yuu, meeçxa' ũus yaakxni yakhçxáa ma'k yuu, nawa wala jxpa'yakxmeete', i'kwe'sxtxi nwe'wesa leya' kastigaĩna.
Vxitetx peeygãhmée fxi'zesatxi' txã'wẽy Dxuswa txãawe'sxtxi' peeygãhmée kastigaĩna. Nawa vxitetx peeygãhna fxi'zesatxi' Dxuswa peeygãhçxa kastigaĩmeena.
Adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sx miiyajkxwe: Maawa Dxus yakh fxi'zesath jĩçxawa ew yũuna fxi'zeni yakh kaavxya'ja'jmeete', txã'wẽ yuwejuçxáa we'weniçxáa ¿seelpimanx?
Na'wẽ ũus yaakiga: Maa yakhthẽ'jwa ropa ji'phmée txã'wẽy ũ'wa'jwa peejxsa ũsuna,
aça' txã'wẽsa's i'kwe'sxa' uyçxa': Pxthaaga yuuna fxi'ze'. Nawa ãçxha' wẽemée kumamée ew mfxi'ze jĩçxawa, txajx kakwete peejini's kĩhçxáawa kaatu'jmeeçxa yuwejuçxáa txã'jĩni' ¿kĩhçxá' selpiima'k?
Txã'wẽ Dxus yakh fxi'zesath jĩsa' ãate kaavxya'ja'jwa'ja'. Txã'wẽme', yuwejuçxáa txã'jĩnisa' kxul yuja'.

Nawa na'jĩwáatxna: Idxa' Dxus yakh fxi'zesaçxa', ¿ma'wẽ kaajiyu'juki'g Dxus yakh yuh fxi'zesan sũjkahn? Aça' kĩhwa yũumeeçxawa mkaajiyu'j aan ãjane'ga. Aça' adxa' ew yũuna pu'çxnisa yakhçxáa Dxus yakh fxi'zeni's ãate kaavxya'ja'jya' ãja'nja jĩtxna.
Idxa' teeçx Dxusçxáa cielute ũstewa txã'sa' ew jiine'ga ũuste. Txã'wẽ yũuni' ew yuja'. Nawa eçxthẽ'jwa Dxus ũste ew jiita' idx na'wẽy. Txã'wẽçxaíitx ũukhna yaya'.
¿Ma'wẽtega jiyu'çmée? Yuwejuçxáa Dxus yakh fxi'zesath jĩni' kxul yuh yuuna, Dxus yakh fxi'zeni's ãate kaavxya'ja'jmeete yu'.
Kwe'sx yaçgathẽ'j Abrahana' Dxusna yaakxni's ãate kaavxya'ja'jna txajx nçxi'k Isaakha's altalte ikhya'wak yu'. Txã'wẽ Dxusna yaakxni's ãate kaavxya'ja'pha'ga, Abrahana's Dxusa' yuuwemeesak vxit.
Ãçxha' ¿jiyugá'? Abrahana' ãate kaavxya'ja'kh Dxusna yaakxni's sa' yuwejuçxáa Dxusna yaaki'th jĩmée, Dxusa's ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa ãate kaavxya'ja'kh.
Abrahana' Dxusa's ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa kxtey yuupa'ga, Dxus librute na'wẽk fxi'jni neeyũu: Abrahana' Dxus dxi'pte ewtek neeyũu jĩna. Sa' txã'wẽy Abrahana' Dxus namiku' jĩnik neeyũu.
Ãçxha' jiyui'kwe, yuwejuçxáa Dxusa's yaaki'th jĩmée, Dxusna yaakiççxa' ãate kaavxya'ja'jwa'ja'.

U'y kazx yuusáa Rahabwa Dxusna yaakxni's ãate kaavxya'ja'kh na'wẽ yũuna: Txajx yatte piçthẽ'j peethegu'na pa'jsatx jxpa'gaçxa', txãa piçthẽ'jtx nwe'weçxa vxitee dxi'jsuk kaah txãa u'ya'. Aça' txã'wẽ ew yũupa'ga txã'sa' Dxus dxi'pte ewtek neeyũu.
Kwe'sx kakwewa ma'wẽga ũus ji'phmeeçxa' uuníi yu', txã'wẽy Dxusna yaaki'th jĩnisa' seelpimeesa', ew yũuna pu'çxnisa yakh ãate kaavxya'ja'jmeete yu'.
Adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, maawa jxuka kaapiya'jsaçxa' jiisatha'w sũhçxa nuywe'wenuwe. Kaapiya'jsaçxawa jxpa'yajkx mfxi'zewe. Txã'wẽme', kaapiya'jsaíiçxáa thaakwe yuuwesa yu'nja'w.
Maa yuhwa jiisa yu' meetha'w. Txãasa íitha'w kĩhtewa jxuka jxpuba'. Nawa maawa txajx we'weni's jxpa'yakxya' ãjana txã' ewsaçxah txã'wẽ yuuna. Sa' txã'wẽ yũuçxa', txajx kakwe'swa jxuka neeweya' ãjana.
Nwẽese'khantha'w jiba yuwete fxrenu paathe', aça' txã'wẽ yũuçxa' jiba kakwe's ewsu kaajxa' ãja'tha'w.
Mjiyuwe, barko txakwe seena' walasa's wejxa wala fxiisu jxũna u'juçtewa, barko's kaahsa' timon le'çxkwesajuçxáa tuphyna ku'lek kaja'. Aça' barko txakwe seena' walasaçxawa nwẽese'je'k ma'wẽ kaathewa.
Txã'wẽy kwe'sx kakwete thune wala le'çxkuẽesa ji'ptha'w, nawa seena' yuh walasa na'wẽ we'weya' çxhãçxha'. Txã'wẽy ipx makwe le'çxkuẽesaçxawa, yu'kh makwe seena' walatewa jxuka kabuna.
Kwe'sx thunewa ipx na'wẽysaçxá', kwe'sx kakwe's jxuka suwçxa naa kiwetewa jxuka ãawa'jsa's kwe'sx kakwete ki'pni ji'ptha'w. Bagaçxte yuhwa ũçxhamée infxiernote ipx na'wẽsa'.
Yu'kh niimal vxite' ẽega fxuusa vxite' yu'gawe'sx eçx ma'wẽ seena' juuna'satxwa nasa' kaastxaja'jya' ãja'tx.
Nawa thune yu'sa' kim yuhwa kaastxaja'jya' ãja'çmeeta'. Txã' weneno ikhsa', txãa pa'ga kaastxaja'jya' ya'ãja'çme'.
Txãa thuneju Dxus kwe'sx Tatanawa weçxana tuuthe'je'tha'w, sa' txãa thunejujxçxáa nasatxwa wẽesxuna ewmée açewe'we'tha'w Dxus taki'jçxa nvxiitnisatx.
Adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, txã'wẽ yu' txãa yuwejujxçxáa Dxusna tuuthe'jna ki' açewe'wena yuuwa'jme'.
Teeçx yu'ĩçteçxáa yu' sxũusa kasehna ki' yu' yaasawa ¿kasehma'k?
Adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, miiyajkxwe: Sxlala tasxa' ¿uhçe yũnya' ãjama'k? Aça' uçe tasxa' ¿sxlala yũnya' ãjama'k? Txã'wẽy teeçx yu'ĩçteçxáa yu' e'z jwed kasejxa' ãja'çme'.
I'kwe'sx ksxavxyte kĩhtewa wala jiisa ũsçxa', kĩhtewa puiimée zhiçxkwe fxi'zewa'ja's mkaavxya'ja'jwe. Txã'wẽ wala jiisa' kĩhtewa juuna' iiwejçx yajkxna fxi'zewa'jme'.
Nawa i'kwe'sx ũuste ewmée yajkxçxa pui'nja sũhna yaakxsa' txã'wẽ wala jiith sũhna iiwejçx yaakxwa'j ji'phme'. Txã'wẽ yaakxsa' kĩhte yuhwa jiimeesa ĩsxiisa yuuna.
Txã'wẽ ewmée yũuwa'jçxáa ũusuthenisa' Dxus kaaũusuthe'jnime'. Naa kiwetewe'sx peekx i'kwe'sx ũus yaakxnisaçxá' eçxthẽ'j kaaũusuthe'jnisa.
Mteewa iiwejçx yaakxwa'j kasehnijũ' puiiwa'jçxáak vxya'. Aça' txajũyã'j yu' jxuka suweena ewmeesaçxaçxáak kaseje'.
Nawa Dxus kaaũusuthe'jni's ji'phsa' kĩhtewa pkal yuumée fxi'zena, ewçxáa yũuna, puiimée nasatx peeygãhna, ĩsxiimée isa we'wena.
Aça' puiimée ewçxáa yũuna fxi'zewa'ja's pa'pçxusa' ew wẽt fxi'zewa'ja's uyuuna.
I'kwe'sx pwe'sx puii jxpakwena fxi'zeni' ¿majũga kaseje'? I'kwe'sx ũusujk kaseje', ewmée yũuwa'ja's yaakxpa'ga.

Vxitee ji'phunitx iiyamu wẽeçxawa ãjameeçxa', ikhya'çxáa i'kwe yaaki'. Vxite nasa kĩhçxáawa ji'phte', txã'sna kusa'jya' ãjameeçxa', puiiya'çxáa i'kwe pa'pçxu'. I'kwe'sx peejini's Dxusna pẽjxmeeçxa i'kwe uyya' ãja'çmée.
Pẽjxçxawa, jxpa'gaya' yu' ãja'çmée i'kwe, txã'wẽ ewmeete kseelpi'jya'çxáa pẽypa'ga.
Dxus yakh weh yuhwa ewmée fxi'zesa mwẽese'jwe: Naa kiwetewe'sxa's selpiina fxi'zesa' Dxus yakh puiinisate jiimeewá'kwe. Maawa naa kiwetewe'sx yakhçxáa wẽt fxi'zeya' yaakxsa' Dxus yakh puiisak yu'.
Txã'wẽtewa, kwe'sx ũuste nvxiitnisa Dxus Espiritu' wala kçxhãaçxha'jna ũsa' jĩ'k Dxus librute fxi'jnisa' txã' ĩsxiinisame'.

Naapkaçxha' Dxusa' jweeíiçxáak kwe'sxtxi peeygãhçxa pu'çxhi' kĩhtewa. Txajíik Dxus libru' na'wẽ pta'sxi': Dxusa' pu'çxhi'çme' iiwejçx yaakxsatxi', nawa iiwejçx yajkxmée fxi'zesatxi' wala peeygãhna pu'çxhina jĩ'k.
Txãa pa'ga Dxusçxáana nwẽese'jçxa eçxthẽ'ja's nwẽese'jmée çxhãçxha miiyajkxwe, aça' eçxthẽ'ja' i'kwe'sx tasxu ãjameeçxa txuteena u'jwena.
Dxus tasxte mutxaawe, aça' txãawa i'kwe'sx yakh utxaana. Pkalsawe'sx, ewmée yũuni kusetx miiyaatewe. Txã'wẽy Dxusa'sçxáa yajkxmée e'z jwed yaakxsa i'kwe'sx ũusa's miiyaatewe.
Sa' txã'wẽ ãhmeene'tka'w yũu sũhna miiyajkxwe, sa' sxijkana fxi'zepa'ga ãçxha' ũ'newa'ja's miiyajkxwe, sa' weçxana fxi'zepa'ga ãçxha' nxuswa'ja's miiyajkxwe.
Ãçxha' Dxus dxi'pte seena' yuh ãhmeekwesa myuuwe, aça' txã'wẽ yũusa's walasa vxituna Dxusa'.

Yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, i'kwe'sx pwe'sx puutx ewmée ya'nuywe'wenuwe. Maawa yakhthẽ'ja's ewmée nuywe'wesa' Dxus jxkaahni ley peeygãawa'ja's we'we'k txã'sna weeçxsa yuuna. Aça' Dxus jxkaahni leya's weeçxsa' txãa leya's nwẽese'jepkaçxte leya's jxkaahsa na'wẽsa yuuna.

Txãa pa'gatey leya's nvxiit-sa' teeçx yuuçxáa ũsa'. Txãaíiçxáa ewmeete nvxiitwa'jsa' sa' txãaíiçxáa ki' nwe'weya'wa ãjawa'jsa'. Txã'wẽte', ¿idxçxáa jwee kimçxaga txã'wẽ yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi' ewmée nuywe'we'?
Ãçxha' i'kwe'sx na'wẽ we'we'i'kwe txã's mjiyuwe: I'kwe'sx we'weçxa': Ãçxh u'jmeeçxa' kuskusa' u'jwe'nja'w çxhab walan. Kxtee pa'jçxa teeçx anxu mjĩiçxa vxyu wala knayna ũsu'nja'w jĩ'i'kwe.
Nawa kuskus fxi'zewa'ja's jiimée i'kwe. Kwe'sx ĩtxi fxi'zeni' na'wẽsaçxá': Yu' ahwa ma'wẽga tudteçxáa vxyaaçxa' ẽekhẽe pçu', txã'wẽysaçxá' ĩtxi fxi'zenisa'.
Txãa pa'ga na'wẽçxáa yaakxwa'ja': ĩtxi fxi'zewa'j Dxus peesuwáana aça' ma'wẽçxáawa mjĩ'nja'w jĩwa'ja'.
Nawa txã'wẽ yajkxmée ũuste iiwejçxçxáa i'kwe yajkxçxa we'we'. Txã'wẽ yajkxçxa we'wenisawa ewmeesaíiçxá'.
Maawa ew yũuwa'ja's jiiçxa ew yũumeeçxa', Dxus dxi'pte yuuwesa yuuna.
Ãçxha' wala ji'phsawe'sx mwẽese'jwe: I'kwe'sx ji'phuni pçuute seena' yuh nxussa pa'jana txã'sna yajkxçxa weyna mpebeewe.
I'kwe'sx ji'phunisa' kĩh yuhwa seelpime' jxuka wa'wani', aça' i'kwe'sx ropa ewsawa txã'wẽy jxuka wes ũ'ni'.

I'kwe'sx vxyuu beh vxyuu çxihmewa jxuka iz ũ'ni', aça' txãa vxyu iz ũ'nisaíiçxáa i'kwe'sxtxi' seena' wala ewmée nxus kiwete akhwa'jsa'. Txãa vxyu' i'kwe'sxtxi ivxiituya'wa' ipx na'wẽ. Naa nmeh ensu' i'kwe'sx ji'phuni's iiméh wala jxaaw i'kwe.
I'kwe'sx uuthasxte mjĩisa yuul pẽyni's Dxus cielute jxkaahna ũssa' wẽse'kh, aça' i'kwe'sx piuntxi yuulunisa txã'wẽ i'kwe'sxtxi ewmeete nvxiht-ya'wa'.
I'kwe'sxa' naa kiwete ji'phunisa yakh wala wẽt weçxana fxi'ze'i'kwe tajkx na'wẽ niisxna txãa pa'ga ikhwa'j en pa'jya'wa'.
Nasa ewmeesata' jĩçxa i'kwe'sxa' ewteçxah ikhe'i'kwe yuuwemeesatewa, aça' txãawe'sxa' kxulteçxáa uuwa'ja's ji'phu'tx.

Txã'wẽ pkxuuçtewa, yakhthẽ'jwe'sx nxusmée çxhãçxha miiyajkxwe, kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo naa kiwete kĩhpkaçx. Ma'wẽga mjĩisawa uhçxa' kuçxwa'jmée ũythasu', nus en skhẽwte', ũ'a's wala pkhakhe'nja sũhna.
I'kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy kuçx yajkxmée çxhãçxha yajkxna mũythaswe. Txã'wẽme', kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo kĩiwa'ja' utxaaça'.
Yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, puutx ũusçxawe'wena fxi'zenuwe, Dxusa' i'kwe'sxtxi ewmeete nvxiitkahmen. Txã'wẽme', yuwee ku'le'sa khuẽs pa'jwa'j en utxa yã'j ũsa'. Txã' Dxusa'.
Txãniitey Dxus yuwe's pta'sxsawe'sxwa ma'wẽta pxthaa yuuna fxi'zeçxawa Dxusçxáana yajkxna fxi'ze', txã'wẽy thẽysa nxuswa'j vxyaatewa, Dxusçxáana yajkxna mfxi'zewe yakhthẽ'jwe'sx.

Txã'wẽ pxthaa nxuste fxi'zesatxi' Dxus yakh wẽt fxi'zesata' jĩ'tha'w. Job pxthaa nxuste wantãyna fxi'zete', nmehte' Dxusa' wala peeygãhçxa pu'çxni's iiwẽse'ji'kwe i'kwe'sxa'. Dxusa' peeygãasa', txãasa pu'çxya' ũsa'.

Adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, wala mpa'yajkxwe. Isasa's jiiçxa' jiith jĩwa'jçxá', sa' jiimeeçxa' jiimeeth jĩwa'jçxá'. Txã'wẽ Dxus uyte jiimeeth jĩwa'jme', sa' cielu kiwe txã'wẽsatxwa kxsusna pta'sxwa'jme', Dxusa' ewmeete nvxiitkahmen.
I'kwe'sx pwe'sx maawa nxuste fxi'zena ũsçxa', Dxusçxáana neewe'wena meswe. Maawa wẽt fxi'zena ũsçxa', Dxusa's weçxana memna meswe.
Maawa akate uuya' ũsçxa', ancianowe'sxtxi mpa'yawe, aça' txãawe'sxa' Dxus kusete neewe'weçxa aceite ki'putxna.
Txã'wẽ Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhçxa oraĩte', ãça'sa pkala' peltunãyni yuute, ãça'sa' ewte neeyũuna, txajũ' Dxusa' nuykatxhina.

Dxus dxi'pte ãhmée yũuni's puutx ya'mpeeta'sxwe, aça' Dxusa's yakhthẽ'jwe'sx neewe'wete', ãça'sa' katxhine'kwe. Dxusna nwẽese'jsa txã'wẽ ũusuh jxuka Dxusna yajkxçxa neewe'weni', kĩhtewa jxuka pu'çxwa'jsa'.
Ma'wẽga Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Eliaswa kwe'sx na'wẽysaçxáaçxawa, nus pa'khamen Dxusna ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa neewe'we, aça' nus pa'jme' tekh anxu y medio ãhpkaçx.
Txajũ' ki'kin Dxusna neewe'wek nus kĩikahn, aça' naa kiwete ki' nus pa'the', uuthasx çxhãçxhatx.

Adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sx mjiyuwe: I'kwe'sx maawa Dxus dxi'pte jxpubate', jxpubasame' txãa jxpubasa's ewmée dxi'ju kaasxwedu'juna. Sa' txã'wẽ yũuçxa' jxpubasá ũus jxukate vxituwa'j yã'j ũstewa, nwe'wesa yuuna, sa' maazkuẽe pkaltxiwa kaapeltunaĩ'jsa yuuna.

Adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sx mjiyuwe: I'kwe'sx maawa Dxus dxi'pte jxpubate', jxpubasame' txãa jxpubasa's ewmée dxi'ju kaasxwedu'juna. Sa' txã'wẽ yũuçxa' jxpubasá ũus jxukate vxituwa'j yã'j ũstewa, nwe'wesa yuuna, sa' maazkuẽe pkaltxiwa kaapeltunaĩ'jsa yuuna.
I Peter: Adxa' Jesukristo jxkaahnisa Pedro yaaseth. Naa karta's fxi'jaçthu vxite kiwesu u'p-ya' u'jsawe'sxtxi, Ponto, Galacia, Kapadocia, Asia, Bitinia txãa kiwesuwe'sxtxi.

I'kwe'sxtxi txhitxhwa'ja's Dxus kwe'sx Tata' nyafxiitey ma'wẽne' pheu'jçxa ji'phu' txã'sa' kxtey yuuk. Txãasak Dxus Espiritu' i'kwe'sxtxi ewmeejũ txuhdeçxa Jesukristo eeju nuyaate Jesukristoçxá's nwẽese'khan. Txã'wẽ Dxus pu'çxpa'ga ãçxha' seena' wala wẽt mfxi'zewe.

Ãçxha' kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo Tata's weçxana tuuthe'jega. Txã' kwe'sx ewmeesatewa peeygãhçxa ki' u'se upxsa na'wẽ yuuwa'ja's vxitku, nawa Jesukristo kwe'sx pa'gate uuçxa ki' ĩtxi yuupa'gaçxáak txã'wẽ yũu.
Txãa pa'gak ew jii ya'fxi'ze', Dxusa' cielute kwe'sxtxi ũswa'j jxaawni ji'pha' txã'sa' jxpa'ga'nja'w sũhna ũythasna. Txã' bagaçxte yuhwa pçumeena sa' suweewameena sa' vxituwameena.
I'kwe'sxa' Dxusa's ũuste jxpubamée yaakxwa'ja's ji'phi'kwe, naa pa'ga txã' i'kwe'sxtxi jxaawuuna nmeh en ãhte i'kwe'sx cielute pa'jwa'ja's pheu'jçxa ji'pha' txã'sa' jxpa'gakahn.
Txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxa' iiméh wala weçxana meswe, makwe maa enteya' nxuswa'j en ma'wẽsawa pa'thewa.

Txãa pa'gatey nxuswa'j en thẽysa pa'ja'tx txã' Dxusa's jxpubamée jwee íiçxáa çxhãçxha yaakxwa'ja's pheu'jsata', vxyuu beja'swa ew zhiçxkwe neeyũukahn ma'wẽga ipxte kabçxa ya'pheu'ju' txã'wẽy. Aça' makwe thẽysa nxuswa'j en pa'thewa Dxusa's jxpubamée yaakxni's ivxiitusame' vxyuu beh pçusaate jxthaakwe pa'gasa yuuna. Txã'wẽ yũusa' isa weçxana jxtuhthesa yuune'kwe naa kiwete Jesukristo kĩi ente'.

I'kwe'sx yafxju yu' Jesukristo's uymeeçxawa, peeygãhçxa nwẽese'je'i'kwe, sa' uymeeçxawa txã'sna yajkxçxa iiméh seena' wala ũuste weçxweçxa yaaki'i'kwe. Txã'wẽ ũuste iiméh seena' wala zhiçxkwe wẽtwẽt yaakxni's pta'sxya' ya'ãja'çme'.
I'kwe'sxa' txã'wẽ Dxusa's jxpubamée yaakxwa'ja's ji'phupa'ga i'kwe'sx ũusa' ewte neeyũuna.
Dxus peeygãhçxa i'kwe'sxtxi ewte nvxiitwa'ja's jiyuçxa pta'sxsa nyafxíi enteywe'sxa' wala paapẽjxna atxahtx ewte neeyũuwa'j jĩni's.

Txã'wẽ Dxus Espiritu' txãawe'sxtxi' dxiikhẽy kaajiyu'kh ewte nvxiitwa'jsa' wala pxthaa yuuçxawa txãa e'su' wala jxtuhthesa yuuwa'jsa' jĩna. Txãa pa'gatx Dxusna selpisaawe'sxa' jiyu wẽe txã'wẽ yuuwa'jsa' kimki sa' bagaçxki açki'k Dxus Espiritu' txã'wẽ pta'sxi' sũhna.

Txã'wẽ paapẽjxna ũste', Dxusa' txãawe'sxtxi pejka kaajiyu'kh txã'wẽ pta'sxnisa' i'kwe'sx jĩi meea', vxite ensuwe'sx jĩia' jĩk. Txã'wẽ ewte neeyũuwa'j seena' wẽtwẽt-sa's Dxus ũsku txã'sa' angeleswe'sx yuhwa jweeíiçxáa wala jiyuwaça' sũju'tx, txã'wẽ seena' zhiçxkwesa pa'ga.
Txãa pa'ga ew miiyajkxwe ma'wẽ ew fxi'zewa'ja'swa wala jxpa'yakx. Dxusa' i'kwe'sxtxi peeygãhçxa Jesukristo vxyaa ente' ũsya'wa' txã'sçxáana ũythasna meswe.
Nwẽese'jsa luuçx na'wẽ myuuwe. Nyafxiia' Dxusa's jiimeeçxa' ma'wẽkwe peekx ũus yaakxni ewmeesateçxáa fxi'ze' txã'wẽ yũunuwe,
wejxwa ũusuh jxuka ewmeejũ txuteeçxa ũuste kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmée mfxi'zewe, txãa pa'gatey i'kwe'sxtxi pa'yasa Dxuswa kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmeesa' naa pa'ga.
Txajíik Dxus librute na'wẽ we'we': I'kwe'sxa' kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmeesa myuuwe, adxwa kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmeesath naa pa'ga jĩ'k.
Miiyajkxwe Dxusa' kwe'sx Tata' jĩna kxsusu'i'kwe txã' kim yuhtxwa nvxihtmée jxuka pẽywa'jsate jiiçxa', ũukhna mfxi'zewe naa kiwete makwe txaçx ĩtxi fxi'ze'ççxawa.

Yaçgawe'sx ma'wẽ ewmée fxi'zete', i'kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy ewmée fxi'zenijũ Dxusa' nwe'wek. Sa' i'kwe'sxa' ew jii i'kwe txã'wẽ nwe'wepa'ga kĩh yuhwa ya'dukhme' naa kiwete pçuwa'jsa ũsta' vxyuu beh vxyuu çxihme txã'wẽsa yakhçxáa yuhwa.
Naasáa Jesukristo ee yakh yuuçxáak dukhnisa yuu. Txã' piisxakuẽ kĩhte yuhwa ãça'meesa ewsa's ikhçxa pkaltxi yaateya' kabnisa na'wẽk yuu.
Kristo' txã'wẽ yuuwa'kh txhitxhnisa yuu naa kiwe meetey, nawa naa ensuçxáak txã'wẽ yuuya' vxyaa i'kwe'sxtxi nwe'weya'.
Kristo txã'wẽ yũupa'ga i'kwe Dxusa's jiyuya' ãja. Dxus íik Kristo uutewa ĩtxi vxitçxa tuhthe nvxiht, Dxus yuuçxáana yajkxna ũythasna fxi'zekahn.

Ãçxha' i'kwe'sxa' Dxus Espiritu pu'çxte', isa pta'sxni's wẽse'jçxa', i'kwe'sx ũustxi yaate i'kwe ũusuh jxuka yajkxçxa yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi peeygãjxa'. Txã'wẽ yã'jçxa', puutx teeçxsa na'wẽçxah ya'mpeeygãhwe ũusuh jxuka yajkxna.

Txãa pa'gatey i'kwe'sxa' nasa naa kiwete pkalsa ji'jmée, kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmeesa ji'ji'kwe yuu. Dxus yuwe bagaçxte yuhwa pçuwa'jsame's wẽse'jçxa i'kwe txã'wẽ yuu. Dxus yuwe' bagaçxte yuhwa pçuwa'jsame'.
Txajíik Dxus libru' na'wẽ pta'sxi':
Naa kiwete nasa' jxukaysa skhẽwwa'jsaçxáata'.
Txãawe'sxa' makwe seena' wala jiisaçxawa, jxũth tasx na'wẽsaçxáata'.
Jxũthwa uhdxte', kitewa wete'k txã'wẽysaçxáata'.
Nawa Dxus yuwe' bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée nes yuuwa'jsa' jĩ'k.
Txãa Dxus yuwe's íik i'kwe'sxtxi pta'sxni yuu.
Txãa pa'ga ewmée yũuya' yaakxni's jxuka manvxihtwe. Ĩsxiinisa, yuwejuçxáa ew we'weçxa' ũuste yu' ewmée yaakxni, vxitetx açeyaakxni, e'sgaçxáa ewmée nuywe'weni txã'wẽsatxi' nvxihtçxa,
luuçx u'se kasehsawa ma'wẽga leçxi ewsaçxá's jxpa'ga', txã'wẽy i'kwe'sx ũuste ew kçxhãaçxha'jwa'jsaçxá's mpaakwewe. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa Dxus yakh çxhãçxha fxi'zene'kwe ewte neeyũuya'.
Txã'wẽ myũuwe, kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa ewsatewa ew jiyu dxihçxa'.
Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa tasxte mutxaawe. Txã' kwet ĩtxisa na'wẽsa'. Txã'sa' naa kiwete nasa' ahçetx, nawa txãaíik kwet jxthaakwe ewsa Dxus txhitxhnisa yu'.

I'kwe'sxwa kwet ĩtxisa na'wẽ i'kwe naa pa'ga Dxusa' i'kwe'sxtxi' txajx ũswa'j yat na'wẽsak vxitu', sa' txã'wẽçxáamée kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmée txajx tasxte yuuçxáa selpiina ũswa'jsak vxit, txãa pa'ga txajx tasxte utxaaçxa ewsa yuuçxá's kxtey myuuwe. Jesukristo pu'çxte', i'kwe'sx txã'wẽ yũuni's Dxusa' jxpa'gana.
Txã'sna we'weçxak Dxus librute na'jĩ':
Yat txaahwa'j kwet txhitxhnisa iiméh ewsa nvxiituçthu Sion judiuwe'sx kiwete,
Aça' txã'sa' maawa jxpa'gasa' jxpubasáa yuumeena jĩ'k.
I'kwe'sx ew jiyusa yakh yu' txãa kweta' iiméh wala ewsa'. Nawa jiyusamée yakha' na'wẽçxáak ya'yu' txã'wẽ yũuni's Dxus librute na'wẽk we'we':
Yat txaahsawe'sxa' kweta's ahçeçxa wãatãhtewa,
E'suyã'ja' txãaíik thaakwe ewsa yuuna pa'j jĩ'k.
Vxite ajkhẽ' txãa kweta'síi we'weçxa':
Kweta' kxu'çxafxi'jçxa pẽtxsaçxá' jĩ'k.
Dxus yuwe's pta'sxtewa, txãawe'sxa' kxtey nwẽese'jsame' jxpubasaata', jiyuwa'jsamée ne'ta yu' naa pa'ga.

Nawa i'kwe'sxa' Dxus txhitxhnisai'kwe, txajx tasxte yuuçxáa selpiina ũswa'jsa. Dxus kusetewe'sxi'kwe, kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmeesa. Txãa pa'ga Dxus txakwe wala i'kwe'sxtxi ewte nvxiitni's pta'sxwa'j ji'phi'kwe. Txã'wẽ yũukahnku pa'ya, jiimée jxpubana çxhi'dxte ũsnijũ kasehçxa zhiçxkwe eena'te pa'khan.
I'kwe'sxa' nyafxiia' Dxus jĩi yu'çmée i'kwe, nawa ãçxha' Dxus jĩi i'kwe. Nyafxíia' kim yuhwa peeygãanisamée i'kwe yu', nawa ãçxha' Dxus peeygãanisa i'kwe.
Adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxith neewe'we': I'kwe'sxa' naa kiwetewe'sxmée yã'ji'kwe, txãa pa'ga peekx kakwe ewmée yũuya' yaakxnitxi's nwẽese'jnuwe. Txã'wẽme' ũusa's suwsaata'.

Dxusa's jiimeesawe'sx ksxavxysu wala ew mfxi'zewe. Txãawe'sxa' ãçxhíi yu' wala açewe'we'tx i'kwe'sxtxi ewmeesa na'wẽ. Nawa Kristo kĩi ente' i'kwe'sx ew yũuni's uyçxa', Dxus luuçx yuh yu'ta jĩna tuuthe'jetxna.
Dxusa's jii yã'jsa' jxuka mwẽese'jwe naa kiwete jxkaahwa'jsa nvxiitni ũsta' txãawe'sxtxi, jxkaahsa npiiçthẽ'jsa ma'k yuu,
meeçxa' jxkaahsa nuuçxsa ma'tx yuu nawa jxuka. Txãawe'sxa' Dxus kaahnisata' ewmée yũusatxi' kastigãyna vxite' ew yũusatxi' nwe'wesa.
Txãa pa'gatey Dxusa' i'kwe'sxtxi' ewku yũu jxthãasu' vxitetx, txã'wẽ yũuçxa açewe'wesatx sxuuna' vxit-ya'.
Dxus nwe'wenisa yã'jçxa', ew mfxi'zewe. Nawa nwe'wenisa yã'tha'w aça' kimwa ma'jĩmeena sũhçxa ewmée yũunuwe, wejxwa Dxus kusete selpisaatha'w sũhna ew yũuwa'jçxá's yajkxna mfxi'zewe.
Jxukaysa yakh ewçxáa mfxi'zewe, yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi peeygãhna, jxkaahsawe'sxtxi nwẽese'jna, Dxusnawa txã'wẽy nwẽese'jna.
Selpisaawe'sxa' i'kwe'sx patrontxi wala jxpa'yakx nwẽese'jna kxtey myuuwe. I'kwe'sx patron ewsaçxáatx txã'wẽ yũumée, patron seena' juuna'satxwa ewçxáa myũuwe.
Kĩhwa ãhmée yũumeete Dxus yakh fxi'zepa'gaçxáa patronwe'sx txã'wẽ kastigãyte', txã'sa' nxuswa'jme'.
Nawa i'kwe'sx ãhmée yũute kastigãyte', yuuwesatha'w naa pa'gatx kastigãy sũhwa'jçxá'. Nawa i'kwe'sx ew yũupa'gaçxáa nxuswa'j ena's ji'phute', Dxusa' peeygãjana.
Txã'wẽte fxi'zekahnku Dxusa' pa'ya, i'kwe'sx pa'gate Kristo' yuuwemeesaçxawa pxthaa yuuk txãa na'wẽy yuuwemeesaçxawa pkxuuni yuukahn.
Txã' kĩh pkal yuhwa yũume', sa' kim yuhnawa ĩsxiime'.
Wẽesxusatxi's ka'tuwa wẽesxuuna pasme'. Pkxuusaatxi's txã'wẽ yũupa'ga i'kwe'sxwa ewmeete neeyũune'kwe jĩna pasme'. Txã'wẽ yũumée wejxwa Dxusçxáanak neewe'we.
Kwe'sx pkaltxi's Kristok kluuste uuçxa ivxiitu, kwe'sxa' peena' yu' pkalte fxi'zemée Dxus dxi'pte ewçxáa fxi'zekahnku txã'wẽ yũu. Kwe'sx pkala' yaateni yuukahnku txã' pkxuuni pxthaa yuu.
I'kwe'sxa' nyafxiia' piisxáa vxitusa na'wẽ i'kwe ũsu', nawa ãçxha' Kristo tasxte sxawedi'kwe, txã' piisxáa thegsa na'wẽk jxpe'je' i'kwe'sx ũustxi.
U'ywe'sx iimi'sawa, i'kwe'sx nmi'tx kxtey nwẽese'jna mfxi'zewe. Txã'wẽ yũute', i'kwe'sx nmi' maaíia' Dxus yuwe's wẽse'jya' wa'lsawa
i'kwe'sx ew fxi'zeni's uyçxa', Dxusa's jiyuna pa'jatxna, Dxusa's mpaakwe jĩna we'wemeetewa.
I'kwe'sxa' peekx kakwe ãakhẽwe'sxçxá's txakwe wala zhiçxkwesa ki'pna pheu'jwa'j ji'phmée i'kwe,
wejxwa ũuste txã'wẽ zhiçxkwe mpheu'jwe, ew yũuwa'jçxá's yajkxna, vxitesa yakh puiimée fxi'zewa'ja'sçxáa pakwena. Txãaçxáa thaakwe ewsa' Dxus dxi'pte.
Nyafxíi entey u'ywe'sxa' txãawe'sx ũustetx txã'wẽ zhiçxkwe pheu'ju' Dxusçxáana neewe'wena txãawe'sx nmi'tx nwẽese'jna.
