Sara' txã'wẽsak yu'. Abrahana's ũ'kwe's jxpe'jsa' jĩnak nwẽese'je', aça' i'kwe'sxwa txãa na'wẽysa yuune'kwe, txã'wẽy ew nwẽese'jçxa yu', ãhmeeth yũu sũhna ũukh yajkxna fxi'zemeene'kwe.

Txã'wẽy nmi'we'sxwa i'kwe'sx nyuu yakh jxpa'yakx ewçxáa mfxi'zewe, u'ya' wejxkuẽ' çxhãçxhameekweta' txãa pa'ga. Sa' txã'wẽçxáamée, i'kwe'sx na'wẽyçxáa Dxus yakh fxi'zesata' txãa pa'ga txã'wẽ ew mfxi'zewe, Dxus yakh puutx we'weni' kxul yuukahmen.
Jxukaysa i'kwe'sxa' ewçxáa yũuna mfxi'zewe, vxitesatxwa teeçxsa na'wẽçxah peeygãhna. Weeçx yajkxmée zhiçxkwe puutx we'wena yakhthẽ'j pwe'sx na'wẽ mfxi'zewe.

Ewmée yũusa's ka'tuwa txã'wẽy ewmée yũuwa'jme', sa' wẽesxute', txã'wẽy ka'tuwa wẽesxuwa'jme', wejxwa txã'wẽ yũusatxi' ka'tu yu' ewçxáa myũuwe. Txã'wẽ ewçxáa yũukahn íiçxáak Dxusa' i'kwe'sxtxi pa'yaçxa txakwe wala ew yũu.
Txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's na'wẽk pta'sxi' Dxus librute:
Maawa ewçxáa wẽt fxi'ze wẽeçxa',
Peekx thune's ewmée we'wekahmen jxpa'yakxçxa
I'kwe'sx yuweju ĩsxiinuwe.
Ewmeejũ txuteeçxa, ewçxáa yũuna
Puiimée fxi'zewa'jçxá's pakweçxa uu entepkaçx txã'wẽ yuuçxáa fxi'zewa'ja'.
Txãa pa'gatey Dxusa' jxpe'je'k ew yũusatxi',
Sa' Dxusa's pakwen neewe'weni's wẽse'je'k.
Nawa ewmée yũusatxi' txã'wẽ yũ'çme' jĩ'k.
Bagaçxtewa i'kwe'sxa' ewçxáa yũuçte', ¿kim txã'wẽ ka'tu' ewmée yũukx?
Ew yũuna fxi'zepa'ga nxuswa'j en ji'phuçxawa, weçxana wẽtwẽtçxáa meswe. Kim yuhtxwa ũukhnuwe kuh yajkxna,
wejxwa i'kwe'sx ũuste jxkaahsa Kristoçxá's weçxana mneewe'wewe. Na'wẽ i'kwe'sxtxi kaapiya'jni's jii i'kwe txã'sna paapẽysatxi's pasya' thaamemée meswe bagaçxtewa, sa' ũusçxa we'wemée ewçxáa mpaaswe.
Txã'wẽ ew yũuçxa mfxi'zewe, i'kwe'sx ũuste yuuwemeetha'w sũhwa'jçxáa ũusuthekahn, kxah Kristo yakh ew fxi'zesatx e'sga ewmée nuywe'wesawe'sxa' thaameetxna, txã'wẽ i'kwe'sxtxi ewmée nuywe'weçxa'.
Wejxwa ewmée yũuçxa nxus knayupkaçxte, ew yũupa'ga nxus knayni wejx ewa', Dxus yuu txã'wẽ jxthãas yã'the'.
Kristowa txã'wẽyku pxthaa yuuçxa uu, tee dxi'jçxáa jxukaysa pa'gate. Txã' ewsak yu', nawa kwe'sx ewmeesa pa'gate pxthaa yuuk Dxus tasxte nuypa'jya'. Txã' isa uuyujk kakwe yu', nawa ũus yu' uume'.
Txãasak u'j uusaawe'sx ũus preesu ũsu'tx kxtee pta'sxya'.
Txãawe'sxa' nyafxíi Noé ente' nwẽese'jsameetx yu' Dxusa's. Txãa ente' Noea' barko's pheu'ju'çpkaçxha', Dxusa' wala yuh ũythasku txãawe'sxtxi' nwe'weya'. Nawa oçxo nasaçxáatx yu'ju nwe'wenisa yuu.

Noé ente yu'a' ãçxh yu'te ya'bautisaĩ'tha'w ewmeejũ jxukate txuteeya' sũhçxa txã'wẽsak yu'. Nawa bautismo' pkala's yaate'çme', naasáa Dxus dxi'pte peena yu' pkalte fxi'zeya'mée sũhçxaçxáak ya'bautisãynisa yu'. Aça' Jesukristo uuçxa ki' ĩtxi yuunisa yuuçxáak kwe'sxtxi' nwe'we.
Ãçxha' txã' cielun u'jçxa Dxus pukate jxkaahna ũsa', aça' txã'sa' angeleswe'sx ma'wẽsawa txã'sçxaçxáanatx nwẽese'je'.

Kristowa ma'wẽga txajx kakwete akasa's jxpa'gana pxthaa yuu, txã'wẽy i'kwe'sxwa pxthaa yuuwa'jsatha'w sũhna meswe, txãa pa'gatey peekx kakwete ewmée yũuya' yaakxni pkala's nvxihtçxa, Dxus jxthãasniçxá's uu entepkaçx kxtey yuuya' yaakxpa'gak pxthaa yuuwa'j en pa'ja'.

Kristowa ma'wẽga txajx kakwete akasa's jxpa'gana pxthaa yuu, txã'wẽy i'kwe'sxwa pxthaa yuuwa'jsatha'w sũhna meswe, txãa pa'gatey peekx kakwete ewmée yũuya' yaakxni pkala's nvxihtçxa, Dxus jxthãasniçxá's uu entepkaçx kxtey yuuya' yaakxpa'gak pxthaa yuuwa'j en pa'ja'.

Pkala's nwẽese'jmée nvxiht-ya'íi nyafxíi entey wala yã'jne'kwe nwẽese'j Dxusa's jiimeesawe'sx yakh ja'daçxah. Txãa ensu' i'kwe'sxa' ewmée i'kwe yũuna fxi'ze peekx kakweju ewmée yũuya' yajkxna, tũuna, ku'jna, pkhaakheçxa tudxna, Dxus ĩtximeesatx neewe'wena.
Txã'wẽ yũusai'kwe yu'. Nawa ãçxha' i'kwe'sxa' peena yu' txãawe'sx yakh txã'wẽ iiméh seena' ewmée yũuna fxi'ze'çmeene'kwe, txãa pa'ga ne'ta i'kwe'sxtxi' ewmée nuywe'wena açe'.
Nawa txãawe'sxa' Dxusna paswa'j ji'phutxna, ĩtxisa ma'tx yuu meeçxa uuniisa ma'tx yuu nawa jxukaysatx paapẽywa'j ente'.

Uusaawe'sx ma'tx yuu nawa paapẽy ente' kakwe ji'phsa na'wẽyçxáa paapẽyni yuutxna. Aça' uute' ũus yu' Dxus na'wẽyçxáa ĩtxi ũskahnku txã'wẽ pta'sxni yuu. Txã'wẽ yuuwa'jsate íiçxáak uusaawe'sxtxiwa Dxus yuwe's pta'sxni yuu txãawe'sx uumeyna.
Naa kiwe pçuwa'j ena' utxaaça'. Txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxa' wala jxpa'yakx meswe, naasáa Dxus yakh yuuçxáa puutx we'wena mfxi'zewe.
Nawa i'kwe'sx pwe'sx puutx peeygãawa'ja's wejx jxthaakwe mpa'pçxuwe, txãa pa'gatey peeygãanisa' pkal makwesanawa jxuka kaapeltunaĩ'kh jĩ'k.
Yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi yat mpeeki'jwe wa'lmée.

Teeçxsa na'wẽçxah puutx ya'mpu'çxwe, i'kwe'sx selpiiya' ãjawa'ja's Dxus ma'wẽne' ũs txã'sa' kxtey yuuna. Dxusa's selpiwa'ja's nakwe wala kuh jwed ũsni yuuk txã'sa' jxpa'gaçxa', ew kaaselpi'jsa myuuwe.

Maaíia' pta'sxwa'j ji'phçxa', peekx ũuste yaakxni's we'wemée Dxus we'weniçxá's pta'sxwa'ja'. Maawa vxitetx pu'çxya' yaakiççxa', Dxus makwe kçxhãaçxha'jana txã's yu' jxuka kxtey yuuwa'ja'. Kĩh yũuççxawa Dxusa's weçxaawa'ja'sçxáa yajkxna txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja' Jesukristo's pi'kxçxa, txãa pa'gatey kĩjkĩhwa jxuka Dxus jĩiçxaçxáata' bagaçxtewa nes yuuwa'jsa.
Yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, Kristo's nwẽese'pha'ga nxuswa'j en pa'the', fxiy yuh yu'k sũhna kuh yaakxnuwe,
wejxwa Kristo na'wẽy nxuswa'ja's ji'phuçthu sũhna wẽt miiyajkxwe. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa', txajx kĩi ente' weçxaawa'ja's wala uyuune'kwe.

Kristo yakh fxi'zepa'ga ahçena wẽesxute', i'kwe'sxa' nxusmée mweeçxawe, txãa pa'gatey Dxus Espiritu' i'kwe'sx ũuste ũsa' nxusmée weçxweçxa kaayaki'jwa'jsa. Kristo' txãawe'sx yaaçenik fxi'ze', nawa i'kwe'sx yu' txã'sa' weçxana i'kwe fxi'ze'.

I'kwe'sxa' maa yuhwa nxus knaywa'j ji'phuwa'j ji'phmée i'kwe, na'wẽ yũuçxa: nasa ikhna, pesweena, ewmée yũuna, ĩsxiina yuwe ksuusu'jna fxi'zena. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa nxus knaywa'j yu'sa' ji'phunuwe, wala thaampa'sa'.
Nawa Kristo's selpiipa'ga nxuswa'j en ji'phuçxa', thaamewa'jme', wejxwa Dxusa's weçxana tuuthe'jwa'ja'.
Txã'wẽme', makwe Dxus luuçxte yuhwa nxuswa'j ena' txãawe'sx yakh khuẽ'yku takh na' ãçxh nmeh ente' ¿ma'wẽ seena' thaakwe nxus yujkx Dxus yuwe's nwẽese'jsamée yakha'?
Dxus luuçx yuhwa wala nxus knayçxa nwe'weni yuute', pkalsa ewmeesa yu' ¿mtee yuuya' u'jwetxki?
Txã'wẽ Dxus jxthãasnite nxuswa'j en ji'phuçxa', nxusmée fxi'zewa'ja' peekx ũustxi Dxus kusete neewe'wena. Txãak kwe'sxtxi taki'j na' txãaíiçxáa nwe'wena.
Ancianowe'sxtxi yu'kxpejeçthu, adxwa txãawe'sx na'wẽysa íiçxáath, sa' Kristo pxthaa yuuni'swa uysaath, sa' txãawe'sx na'wẽy cielutewa ũswa'jsath.

I'kwe'sx kusete neewe'weni ũsta' Dxus luuçx txãatx jxpa'yakx miipe'jwe, piisxáa-thegsa na'wẽ. Sa' vxyuu jxpa'gawa'jçxá's yajkxna txã'wẽ yũumée, Dxus jxthãasniçxá's kxtey myuuwe, wa'lmée weçxana ewçxáa yũuna.
Sa' Dxus luuçx i'kwe'sx jxpe'jnitx juuna' we'wenawa jxkaahwa'jme', kxah i'kwe'sx fxi'zeni's piyaatxna.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxa', kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa jxthaakwe jxtuhthesa vxyaate', i'kwe'sxa' jxpa'gane'kwe peesni iiméh zhiçxkwesa's txã' naa kiwega peesnisa pçu'tx txã'wẽsa meeta'.

Piçtakxwe'sxwa txã'wẽy ancianowe'sx we'weni's kxtey myuuwe. Jxukaysa puutx ya'nwẽese'jna fxi'zewa'ja' iiwejçx yajkxmée. Txã'wẽme', Dxusa' pu'çxhi'çme' iiwejçx yaakxsatxi's, nawa iiwejçx yaakxsameetxi's peeygãhnak pu'çxhi'.
Txã'wẽ yã'the', Dxusa's mwẽese'jwe, txajx kuseteçxaçxáa jxuka ya'dukhna, kxah i'kwe'sx txã'wẽ yũunijũ', Dxusa' i'kwe'sxtxi' walasa vxituna.
Txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxtxi kĩh thẽysa vxyaatewa, txã'sa' jxuka Dxus kuseteçxaçxáa manvxihtwe, txãa pa'gatey txã' i'kwe'sxtxi thegsa' naa pa'ga.
I'kwe'sxa' jxpa'yakx meswe. Txã'wẽme', i'kwe'sxtxi açesa eçxthẽ'ja' kimçxáanawa ikhya' sũhna león na'wẽ seena' pebeena pakwena u'ju'.
Nawa eçxthẽ'ja's weh yuhwa nwẽese'jnuwe Dxusa's çxhãçxha yajkxna, txãa pa'gatey i'kwe'sxçxáamée txã'wẽ pxthaa nxusna ũsi'kwe, yakhthẽ'jwe'sx msuuwe'sxwa jxuka txã'wẽçxaçxáa pxthaa yuuna ũsta'.

Nawa i'kwe'sx maz en pxthaa yuuniijũ', Dxus kĩhtewa jxuka pu'çxsa' kçxhãaçxha'jana jxpubana sxiigmée ew fxi'zewa'ja's pu'çxna. Txãa Dxusíiçxáak kwe'sxtxi pa'ya, Jesukristo yakh bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ũswa'the.
Txãa pa'ga bagaçxtewa txã's yuuçxáana weçxaaga.

Naa karta's fxi'jçxa kajaçthu ew fxi'zesa yakhthẽ'j Silwano yakh. Kxteea' jxu'jmeekweth yu'kxpeje', na'wẽ Dxus pu'çxni's jxpa'gai'kwe txã' Dxusa' peeygãasa yuhna sũhwa'ja's ew kaajiyu'jsata'. Aça' txã'wẽ ũusutheni's peçxkanamée mfxi'zewe.
I'kwe'sx na'wẽy Dxus txhitxhnisa Babilonia kiwete ũsta' txãawe'sxwa yuwe weçxaa kaja'tx, aça' adx nçxi'k na'wẽsa Markoswa yuwe weçxaa kaja'k.
Puutx pta'sxna yuwe meen weeçxawe, teeçxsa na'wẽçxah ya'peeygãhna.
Jesukristo's nwẽese'jsa i'kwe'sx jxukaysa ewçxáa mfxi'zewe.
II Peter: Jesukristo's selpisáa Simon Pedro yaaseth, txajx jxkaahnisa. Txãasa naa karta's fxi'jaçthu, i'kwe'sxwa kwe'sx na'wẽyçxáa i'kwe Dxusa's yaakxwa'ja's ji'phu naa pa'ga. Txã'wẽ yuukahníi kwe'sxtxi nwe'wesa Jesukristo nwe'wek.
Dxusa's jiyui'kwe sa' kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesusa'swa jiyupa'ga, wala ew mfxi'zewe.
Txãa pa'gatey kwe'sxtxi pa'yasa's jiyupa'ga txã' jxuka ũsku kwe'sx kĩh peejini'swa, sa' kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmée fxi'zewa'ja'swa txã'wẽy.

Txã'wẽ Dxusa' kĩhte yuhwa sxiigmée pu'çxwa'ja's ji'phçxa íiçxáak kwe'sxtxi's nwe'weya' puutx we'we. Txã'wẽ yũute', i'kwe'sxa' naa kiwete jxuka ewmeesa kazx yajkxna fxi'zenijũ txuteeçxa, txãa ma'wẽsate' txãa na'wẽysa íiçxáa yuuna pa'khanku txã'wẽ yũu.
Txãa pa'ga Dxusa' pu'çxhina sũhwa'ja's ji'phçxa', jweeíiçxáa ew fxi'zewa'ja's mji'phuwe. Sa' ew fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phuçxa', Dxusa's jweeíiçxáa ew jiyuwa'ja's mpaakwewe.

Dxusa's ew jiyuwa'ja's ji'phuçxa', peekx kakwe ewmée yũuya' yaakxni's nwẽese'jmée fxi'zewa'ja's mji'phuwe. Peekx kakwe's nwẽese'jmée fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phuçxa', nxuswa'j pa'thewa çxhãçxha fxi'zewa'ja's mpaakwewe. Sa' txã'wẽsana ji'phuçxa', Dxusa'sçxáa neewe'wena fxi'zewa'ja's mpaakwewe.
Dxusa'sçxáa neewe'wena fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phuçxa', yakhthẽ'jwe'sx yakh ewçxáa wẽt fxi'zewa'ja's mpaakwewe. Txã'wẽsa's ji'phuçxa', peeygãawa'ja's mji'phuwe.
Txã'wẽsatx i'kwe'sxa' jxpa'gaçxa jxuka nwẽese'jçxa', kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo's kxulteçxáa jiyuçxa en ivxiit-sa yuumeene'kwe.
Nawa maawa txã'wẽsatx ji'phmeesa' uyya' ãjasamée na'wẽsa yuuna, sa' Dxusa' pkaltxi's peltunãytewa peçxkanasa yuuna.
Txãa pa'ga Dxusa' i'kwe'sxtxi txhitxhçxa pa'yayã'the', txã'wẽsatx i'kwe'sx ũuste bagaçxtewa ji'phuwa'jçxá's mpa'pçxuwe. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa' bagaçxte yuhwa Dxus tasxu txutemeene'kwe.
Txã'wẽ yũusatxi' thẽymée ũsni yuuna Jesukristo kwe'sxtxi nwe'wesa tasxte u'kawa'ja's. Kxteea' bagaçxte yuhwa pçuwa'jsame'.
I'kwe'sxa' txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's ew jiiçxa ãçxh naa ensu isa pta'sxnijũ txutemée ũsne'kwe, nawa adxa' txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's kaayaki'jna nes yu'nja.
Adx uumeyçxáawa i'kwe'sxtxi' yu'kxpehna nes yuuni ewna sũju'th peçxkanawe'sxte.
Txã'wẽme', txaçxmeyna adx uuwa'ja's kaajiyu'kh kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo'.
Txãa pa'ga nee uumey txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's yu'kxpehna nes yu'nja, kxah adx uutewa i'kwe'sx ũuste neeyũute', peçxkanamée kxtey yuuna nes yuune'kwe.

Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo kĩhtewa jxuka ãjasa sxawedna kĩiwa'ja's pta'sxtha'w txã' ũus yajkxçxa ĩsxiinisameek yu'. Txãa pa'gatey kwe'sx yafxju yuu uytha'w txakwe seena' zhiçxkwe walasa yuuçxa vxyaate.
Txã'wẽ Dxus kwe'sx Tata' Jesukristo's weçxana zhiçxkwe eena' kweethni'stha'w uy, sa' Dxusa' na'wẽk we'we: Na' adx Nçxi'k wedxnisa', txãa pa'ga wala weçxana ũsthu jĩ'k.
Cielujũ txã'jĩna we'weni's kwe'sx yuutha'w wẽse'j, thã'j vxiçte Dxus vxyaak kxte kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo yakh ũsçxa'.

Txã'wẽçxáamée, vxite ji'ptha'w txãak wejx ãate pta'sxi'. Txã' e'su Dxus ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa dxiikhẽy pta'sxna fxi'jçxa nvxiitnisa'. Txãa pta'sxnisa's i'kwe'sxa' nwẽese'jçxa', ew yũusáa yuune'kwe. Txãaíi kus çxhi'dxtewa eena' kweethsa', khikhiiçte estrelxa na'wẽsa i'kwe'sx ũuste pki'tapkaçx.
Nawa i'kwe'sxa' ew mjiyuwe: Dxus yuwe dxiikhẽy pta'sxna fxi'jçxa nvxiitnisa' maa yuhwa peekx ũusuhçxáa yajkxçxa fxi'jnisa yuumeeta'.
Txãa pa'gatey Dxus kĩh yũuya'watewa dxiikhẽy pta'sxsawe'sxa' Dxus yakh fxi'zesatx yu', sa' peekx ũusuhçxáa yajkxçxa we'wemée, Dxus Espiritu kwe'we'thetx txã'wẽ fxi'jna ũsu'.

Txã'wẽtewa, ĩsxiisawa ũsu'tx Dxus yuwe pta'sxsatha'w jĩsa Israelwe'sx ksxavxysu, sa' i'kwe'sx ksxavxysuwa txã'wẽy ĩsxiisa kasejetxna. Txãawe'sxa' kaypuba'jwa'jçxá's yajkxçxa i'kwe'sx jiyunimeete kaapiya'jatxna. Txã'wẽ yũuna nwe'wesa Kristo's yuu açesa yuutxna. Nawa txã'wẽ yũusa' peekíiçxáa wala dud vxituwa'j ji'phutxna.
Txã'wẽ yũute', maazkuẽesawa txãawe'sx ewmeesa's kaapiya'jniçxá's kxtey yuuna fxi'zetxna, aça' txãawe'sx pa'gaçxáa Dxus yuwe isasa yu' açewe'weni yuuna.

Txãawe'sxa' i'kwe'sxtxi vxyuu wala kutxi'j wẽeçxa kĩhçxáawa ĩsxiina kaapiya'jatxna. Nawa txãawe'sx vxituwa'j en pa'jana. Txãa ente' iyumeetxna. Txã'wẽ ewmeete pa'jwa'theçxáa yã'j nvxiitni ũsta' nyafxíi.
Dxusa' txajx angeleswe'sx yuhtxwa peltunaĩme' ewmée yũusa yã'txhi's. Txãasaíik infxierno iiméh seena' wala çxhi'dxte nvxihtna ũsu' kastigãywa'j en ãhtewe'sx.

Dxusa' nyafxíi enteywa peltunaĩme' nasa ewmeesawe'sxtxi'. Txãasaíik nasa ewmeesawe'sxtxi ivxiituya' nus kaahna ũsu'. Naasáa Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa Noé yuuçxáanak nwe'we vxite' txajx yattewe'sx sietesa yã'jçxa.
Txã'wẽy Dxusa' Sodoma vxite' Gomoçxa çxhabtxi kastigãyçxa jxuka khuuççxáa yuupkaçxku ivxiitu. Txã'wẽ yũunisa yu' maawa nasa ewmeesa yuutxi' txã'wẽçxaçxáa kastigaĩ'nja jĩna pta'sxnisak yu'.
Nawa Lot yu'sa' nwe'wek, txãa piçthẽ'ja' Dxus dxi'pte wala ew fxi'zesa yu'k, txãasak iiméh wala ewmée fxi'zesatx uyçxa', wala nxusna fxi'ze'.
Txãa piçthẽ'j ew fxi'zesa' seena' ewmeesawe'sx yakh ũsçxa', txãawe'sx ewmée we'weni's wẽse'jna ewmée yũuna fxi'zeni'swa uyçxa een isak txajx ũuste wala nxusna fxi'ze'.
Txã'wẽk Kristo' nwe'we', txãa yakh utxaaçxa txutemée fxi'zesa nxuste fxi'zesatxi's, sa' ewmée yũuna fxi'zesatxi's kastigãywa'j vxitçxak nvxiitu' kastigãywa'j en ãhtewe'sx.

Sa' Dxusa' txã'wẽçxaçxáa kastigaĩna ewmée yaakxniçxá's nwẽese'jçxa kazx yũuna fxi'zesatxi's. Txã'wẽ yũukahníi txãawe'sxa' Kristo jxkaahni's weeçxna nwẽese'jmée juuna'çxáa yũusaata', sa' ũukhmeetx wẽesxu' ma'wẽsatxwa jxuka.
Naapkaçxha' angeleswe'sxa' txãa wẽesxusaate jxthaakwe çxhãçxha juuna'sata' naa yuhwa txãa wẽesxusaatxi's wẽesxuna Dxus dxi'pte ewmeete nvxiitu'çmeeta'.
Txã'wẽtewa txãa nasa' tajkx na'wẽsaçxáata' ew eena' yaakxwa'j yu'sa' ji'phmeeta', sa' ma'wẽsawa uweçxa ikhkahn upxsaçxáata'. Dxusa's açewe'wepa'ga tajkx na'wẽçxáa uutxna.

Vxitetx pkxuupa'ga txãawe'sxwa pkxuuni uutxna. Weeçx weeçxtxi yaaki' naa kiwete pçuwa'jsa yakhçxáa ũsçxawa. Sa' txãawe'sxa' i'kwe'sx yakh ũsçxa', i'kwe'sxtxi kaythame'jna yuwe susnatx fxi'ze' i'kwe'sx pkhaakhenite pa'jçxa.

Txãawe'sx ũuste ewmée yajkxmée yu' neeyũ'çmeeta' u'y pu'jykhẽwçxa'. Pkal yũuwa'ja's watxi'çmeeta'. Peekx kakwe's açxamée çxhãçxha pa'yakxsatxi's thẽymeetx pkalte kweete'je'. Vxyua's iiméh wala ji'phu wẽesaçxáata'. Txãawe'sxa' Dxus dxi'pte vxituwa'jsata'.
Ewsa's nvxihtçxa jxpubana ũsta', Beor nçxi'k Balaan na'wẽy yũusaçxáata'. Txãa Balaana' ewmée yũuçxak vxyu's wala ji'phu wẽe.
Naa pa'ga txajx a'jni jiba' nasa na'wẽk juuna' we'we txajx pkal yũu wẽeni's. Txã'wẽ yũuçxak Balaan ewmée yaakxni's kaanvxiitu'j.
Txãa nasa' pusu yu' ji'phmeesa na'wẽsata', sa' tãaphnawa ma'wẽga wejxa jxũna u'jwe' txã'wẽysaçxáata'. Txãawe'sxa' infxierno iiméh seena' wala ũukhũukh çxhi'dxte ũswa'jsata'.
Txãawe'sxa' selpiiwa'jmeesaçxáana wala iiwejçx we'we'tx, sa' txãawe'sx kakwe pkal yũu wẽeniçxá's nwẽese'jni yakh vxitetx pkalte kweete'je'tx, jxpubana fxi'zenijũ kasehçxa ũssatxwa.

Txãawe'sxa' kĩh yuhnawa nwẽese'jmée fxi'zewa'ja' jĩ'tx, nawa txãawe'sxíi yuuwa kxtey yuumée ewmée pkal yu'sa' pejka yuhtx nwẽese'jna fxi'ze'. Txãa pa'gatey nasa maawa kĩja's wejx yaakina na' txã'sna nwẽese'jna selpisaaçxa txã'wẽ yuuna.
Txã'wẽ nwe'wesa Jesukristo's jiyuçxa naa kiwete ewmée yũuna fxi'zenijũ kasehsaçxawa, ki' txãatxiçxáa nwẽese'jya' sxaweduuna. Aça' txã'wẽ yũusa' nyafxíi fxi'zenite jxthaakwe ewmeetek wetena pa'ja'.
Txãawe'sxa' isa kaapiya'jni's jiyumeewaçne' wejx ew yu', txã'wẽ Dxus jxkaahni's jiyuçxa ki' txuteena ũsya'mée.
Txã'wẽ yũusatx we'weçxak na'jĩ': Alku' pugaçxawa, ki' sxawedku txajx puganitey. Aça' kuçxi' ew ateçxawa, txitx khũçxtek pẽw jĩ'k.
Yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, naa karta' e'su fxi'jnisa yã'ja'. Nawa e'z kartatey i'kwe'sxtxi yu'kxpehna fxi'jaçthu, ew jxpa'yakx ũskahn.
Na'wẽ Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx nyafxiitey we'wetx nasa ewmeesa pa'jwa'ja's, naapkaçxha' Jesus jxkaahnisawe'sxa' Jesukristo jxkaahni's i'kwe'sxtxi kaapiya'jtx txãatx peçxkanamée ũskahn yu'kxpejeçthu.
Na'wẽ yũuwa'ja's khuẽ'y mpa'yajkxwe. Nmeh en yuuçte', nasa kasejetxna txãawe'sx kakwe pkal yũu wẽeniçxá's nwẽese'jçxa Dxus jĩi yu'sa' açesa.
Sa' na'jĩna weeçxna paapẽyitxna: Kristo' sxawedu'nja jĩçxa', ¿mteega yuu? Sa' naa kiwewaçwa kĩh yuhwa yu'pthehnimée ũsa', nyafxíi ma'wẽne' pheu'jni yuu txã'wẽesa ũsa' ãçxpkaçx jĩtxna.
Txãawe'sxa' yaaki'çmeeta' na'wẽ yu'pthehni yuuk txã'sa'. Nyafxíi entey Dxus jxkaahnite pheu'jni yuutx cielu, kiwe, vxite' yu'. Aça' e'su yu'pthehçxa yu'a's fxiik nvxiht kiwenawa txã'wẽy.
Sa' vxite ente' Dxusa' we'wena jxkaahçxa' nusa'sku kaah, aça' kiwe txãa entewe'sxa' vxituk yu'te. Txã'snatx jiyumeeçxa yu'pthehnime' jĩ'.
Sa' ãçxh neeyũusáa ũsta' cielu vxite' kiwe txãatxi' Dxusíik we'weçxa nvxiht nasa ewmeesatx jxuka naa kiwete ivxiituwa'j ente ipx naa kiwe's jxuka kabuna jĩna.
Yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, vxite na'wẽsa'swa mjiyuwe: Kristo yakha' teeçx ensaçxáa ma'k yuu meeçxa' mil anxusa ma'k yuu nawa txaçxsa yu' meea', txãa na'wẽçxaçxáata'.

Txãa pa'gatx maaíia' naa sũju': Kristo' sxawedu'nja jĩçxawa iiméh wala txaçx jxthẽeyuuça' jĩnatx we'we'. Nawa Kristo' txã'wẽ jxthẽeyuuçme'. Txã' teeçxçxáa yuhwa vxitumée ewmée yũuna fxi'zenijũ dud sxawedwaça' sũhna ũythasnaçxáa ũsa'.

Txãasa Kristo kĩiwa'j ena' ãhçxáa yuuna yajkxmée ũsiyna, pesweewa ma'wẽga kus yaakxnimeete pa'ja' txã'wẽy. Naapkaçxha' cielu' jxuka suweetxna seena' susniite, aça' kĩjkĩhwa jxuka ipxte çxhavxyna pçuutxna. Kiwewa txã'wẽy çxhavxiina kxtee kĩhçxah ũstxna txãa jxuka.
Txã'wẽ seena' jxuka pçuwa'jsa' txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxa' iiméh wala ew fxi'zewa'j ji'phi'kwe, Dxus yakh utxaaçxa bagaçxte yuhwa txutemée.
I'kwe'sxa' Dxus kĩiwa'j ena's wala pa'pçxuna mũythaswe. Txã'wẽme' txãa ente' cielu' jxuka vxitutxna ipxte, naapkaçxha' kĩjkĩhwa jxuka yu'watxna ipx açxate.
Naapkaçxha' kwe'sxa' cielu u'sesa kiwewa u'sesa'stha'w ũythasu', Dxusa' txã'wẽsa's ũsya' neeyũuk txã'sna. Kxteea' kĩhwa jxuka ewsaçxáa ũs yuuna.
Txãa pa'ga txã'wẽ yũuwa'ja's ũythasna ũsçxa', wala jxpa'yakx meswe, kxah i'kwe'sxa' Dxus dxi'pte yuuwemeesa ew fxi'zesa yuune'kwe txãa ente'.

Peçxkananuwe na'wẽ kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Kristo jxthẽeyuuça' nawa txãa yu' maawa ewte neeyũuwa'ja's pakwekahn txã'wẽ ũythasna jxthẽeyuuça'. Kwe'sx yakhthẽ'j Pablowa txã'wẽyçxáak we'wena fxi'j Dxus kaaũusuthe'jni's.

Txajx fxi'jni karta jxuka naatxiçxáak we'wena fxi'j, nawa maaíi yu' wala thẽyta' jiyuwa'j, aça' açxamée Dxus yakh çxhãçxha fxi'zesa' jiyumeeçxatx txãa jiyunimeesatx txãawe'sx ũuste fxiy yajkxçxa yu'ptheje', txãasatx Dxus libru ma'snawa yu'ptheje', aça' txã'wẽ yu'pthehnisaíiçxáa selpi'k txãawe'sx vxituwa'ja's.
Txãa pa'ga, yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, wala mpa'yajkxwe dxiikhẽy pta'sxni neeyũuçi'kwe txã'wẽsatx, txã'wẽ ewte yã'j fxi'zenijũ txuteeçxa ewmeesa ĩsxiina kaapiya'jnite weteya'mée,
wejxwa jweeíiçxáa kwe'sxtxi nwe'wesa Jesukristo's ew jiyuçxa peeygãawa'jçxáana ji'phuya' mpa'pçxuwe. Txã'sa' bagaçxtewa weçxana nes yuuwa'jsatha'w.
I John: Nyafxiitey ũsyã'kh yu' txã'sna kaajiyu'jna fxi'jaçthu i'kwe'sxtxi. Kwe'sxa' iiwẽse'tha'w sa' kwe'sx yafxju yuu iiuytha'w. Ĩ'neeçxáa uymée, kwe'sx kusejuwa iijxa'dxtha'w Dxus Nçxi'k ĩtxi kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa's.

Itxi kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa' vxyaak, aça' uyçxa' txãa vxyaani's kwe'sxa' pta'sxi'tha'w. Txãasatha'w ãçxha' i'kwe'sxtxiwa kaajiyu'ju', bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa Ney yakh ũssa kwe'sxtxi vxyaapa'ga.
Kwe'sx wẽse'jçxa yafxjuwa uyni's ãate pta'sxiçtha'w, i'kwe'sxwa kwe'sx yakh utxaaçxa fxi'zekahn, kwe'sxwa ma'wẽtka'w Dxus kwe'sx Tata yakh vxite' Nçxi'k Jesukristo yakh utxaaçxa fxi'ze' txã'wẽy.
Txã'wẽtha'w kaajiyu'jna fxi'ja', i'kwe'sxwa weçxana fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phukahn.
Jesukristo na'wẽk kaapiya'j txã'sna i'kwe'sxtxi pta'sxiçtha'w: Dxusa' eena'sa'. Txãa pa'ga txajx tasxte' kĩh yuhwa çxhi'dxsa meea' jĩ'k.
Aça' maawa Dxus yakh fxi'zena ũsthu jĩçxawa, Dxus jxkaahni's nwẽese'jmée çxhi'dxte fxi'zeçxa', ĩsxiisa yuuna.
Nawa Dxuswa ma'wẽ eena'te ũsna txã'wẽy kwe'sxwa eena'te fxi'zete', kwe'sx pwe'sx puutx puiimée zhiçxkwe fxi'zewa'j kasejena, aça' Dxus Nçxi'k Jesukristo eea' kwe'sx pkaltxi jxuka khukhuna.
Txã'jĩte', kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmeetha'w jĩwá'nja'w na' peekíiçxáa ya'ĩsxiisa yu'nja'w.
Nawa txã'wẽ yajkxmée, pkalsayuhth sũhna Dxusa's perdon pẽyi'nja'w aça' txã'wẽ yũusa's kim yuhnawa wa'lmée jxuka kxtey peltunãyçxa ewmeesa's jxuka nuyaateena.
Txã'jĩte' kĩh yuhwa ewmée yũusameetha'w jĩ'nja'w na' Dxus we'weçxa': Ewmeesata' jĩçxa' ĩsxiija'k jĩsa yu'nja'w.
Adx luuçxwe'sx, pkalte fxi'zekahmenthu pta'sxna fxi'ja'. Txã'wẽtewa maaíi yu' pkalte wetewá'kwe nawa Dxus tasxte kwe'sx ju'gu we'we pu'çxsa ji'ptha'w, txã' Jesukristo' isasa yu's jxuka kxtey yuusáa.
Jesukristok kwe'sx pkal pa'gate vxite' naa kiwete nasa jxukaysa pkal pa'gate yã'jçxa ya'dukhçxa uu.
Dxus jxkaahnitxi's kxtey yuuna fxi'zeçxa yuuçxáa Dxusa's jiiyuhth sũhwa'ja's ya'ji'phuna.
Nawa maaíi yu' Dxusa's jiith jĩwáana nawa txajx jxkaahnitx kxtey nwẽese'jsame' txã' ĩsxiisa yuuna.
Maawa Dxus jxkaahnitx kxtey nwẽese'jena txã' Dxus peeygãani's ũuste jxuka ji'phsaçxa txã'wẽ yuuna. Txã'wẽ yuuçxáa Dxus yakh fxi'zena ũsne'tka'w sũhwa'ja's ya'ji'phuna.
Dxus yakh fxi'zena ũsthu jĩsa', Jesukristo na'wẽy kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmée fxi'zena.
Adx peeygãanisawe'sx, i'kwe'sxtxi' Dxus jxkaahni u'sesa pta'sxna fxi'jaçmeeth, Dxus jxkaahni nyafxíi pta'sxte iiwẽse'jyã'ji'kwe txãaíiçxá'.

Txã'wẽçxawa na'wẽ nyafxíi jxkaahni's kaayaki'jna fxi'jaçthu txã' u'sesa na'wẽ yuh kaseje'k. Txajíiçxáa i'kwe'sxa' Kristo's ũusuh jxuka peeygãhçxa', i'kwe'sx pwe'sxwa txã'wẽy yũuna fxi'zeçi'kwe. Txãa pa'ga ãçxha' skhẽuuça' jxpubana çxhi'dxte fxi'zenisa', aça' jxpubamée fxi'zeni eena'sa vxyaaça'.
Maaí' jxpubamée eena'te ũsthu jĩçxawa txajx yakhthẽ'ja's açena, txã' jxpubana çxhi'dxte fxi'zesaçxa txã'wẽ yuuna.
Jxpubamée eena'te fxi'zesa' txajx yakhthẽ'ja's ahçemée peeygãhna fxi'zena, kĩh yuhwa pkalte kweete'jwa'j yu'sa' vxitmée.
Nawa txajx yakhthẽ'ja's ahçena fxi'zesa' çxhi'dxte uyya' ãjamée mtee pa'jwa'ja's yuuwa jiimée jxpubana fxi'zesaçxa txã'wẽ yuuna.
Adx luuçxwe'sx, i'kwe'sx pkala' peltunãynitx yuu Jesukristo uute', txãa pa'gath fxi'ja'.
Txã'wẽy thẽ'jsawe'sx, i'kwe'sxa' na'wẽ nyafxíi entey Jesukristo' ũsyã'kh yu' txã'sna jiyupa'gath fxi'ja'. Sa' piçtakxwe'sx, eçxthẽ'ja's knayi'kwe txãa pa'gath fxi'ja'.
Adx luuçxwe'sx, Dxusa's jiyui'kwe txãa pa'gath fxi'ja'.
Thẽ'jsawe'sx, na'wẽ nyafxíi entey Jesukristo' ũsyã'kh yu' txã'sna jiyupa'gath fxi'ja'. Sa' piçtakxwe'sx, Dxus pta'sxni's ũuste yu'akhçxa eçxthẽ'ja's ũukhmée knayi'kwe txãa pa'gath fxi'ja'.
Ãçxha' kxazsay mpa'yajkxwe, naa kiwetewe'sxa's yajkxya'mée. Maawa naa kiwetewe'sxa's yaakxsa' Dxusa's yaakxsameeçxa txã'wẽ yuuna.

Txãa pa'gatey naa kiwete' na'wẽ yaakxnisaçxáa ũsta': naa kakwe' kazx yũuna fxi'zeni, yafxju uyçxa kazx ũus yaakxni, kĩhwa ji'phçxa' iiwejçx iiwejçx yajkxna fxi'zenisaçxáa ũsta'. Txã'wẽ ewmeesa yuuçxá'sku naa kiwe' ũsu', aça' txã'wẽsa' Dxus jxthãasnisame'.
Naa kiwete txã'wẽ yũuwa'jçxáana yajkxna fxi'zesa' jxuka pçuwa'jsata' petx naa kiwe yã'jçxa. Nawa Dxus jxthãasniçxá's kxtey yuusa', bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phutxna.
Adx luuçxwe'sx, ãçxha' nmeh en ãjk. I'kwe'sxa' iiwẽse'jne'kwe Kristo's açesa pa'jana jĩni's. Txãasa ãçxha' wala kuh ũsta' Kristo's açesa. Txãa pa'gatha'w jiyu' nmeh en yuuçtewa.
Txãawe'sxa' kwe'sx yakh ũswa'jsamée ne'ta yu', txãasatx kwe'sx ksxavxyuh kaseh. Kwe'sx yakh ũswa'jsawaça', txuteewa'jmée ne'ta yu'. Jxukay yu' kwe'sx yakh fxi'zewa'jsameetxna, txãasatx txã'wẽ txutee.
Nawa i'kwe'sxa' Dxus Espiritu's ũuste ji'phi'kwe, txãasa maa isasatewa txã'sa' jxpubawa'jsamée i'kwe.
I'kwe'sxa' isasa's jxpubawa'jsamée i'kwe naa pa'gaíiçxáath fxi'ja', peekx jii i'kwe ĩsxiinisa' bagaçxte yuhwa isa kaseje'çme'.
¿Kim txã'wẽ ĩsxiisa yuukx? Jesusa' Dxus kaahnisame' jĩna we'wesa txã'wẽ ĩsxiisa yuuna. Txã'wẽ we'wesa' Dxus Nçxi'knawa jxpa'gamée yã'jçxa', Neynawa jxpa'gasameeçxa txã'wẽ yuuna.
Maawa Dxus Nçxi'ka's açesa', Neynawa açesa yuuna. Nawa Dxus Nçxi'ka's jxpa'gasa', Neynawa jxpa'gasa yuuna.
Txajíi nyafxíi pta'sxni Dxus yuwe isasa's i'kwe'sx ũuste ew mjxaawwe. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa' Dxus Nçxi'k yakh txutemée fxi'zene'kwe, sa' Ney yakhwa txã'wẽy txutesamée yuune'kwe.
Aça' txã'wẽ yũusatxi' Jesukristo' peesya' neeyũuk bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's.
I'kwe'sxtxi maawa kaypuba'jwe'sxteth pta'sxi' jxpa'yakxkahn.

Nawa i'kwe'sxa' Dxus Espiritu's ũuste ji'phi'kwe na' maa ĩsxiinisana aça' vxite' maa isasatewa thẽymée jiyune'kwe, txãa pa'gatey Dxus Espiritu' kĩhtewa jxukak kaajiyu'ju', sa' txajx kaapiya'jni' ĩsxiinisameeta'. Txã'wẽ jiyuçxa', Kristo yakh txutemée fxi'zene'kwe.
Adx luuçxwe'sx, ãçxha' Kristo yakh txutemée mfxi'zewe. Txã'wẽ fxi'zeçxa', thaamemée weçxana jxpa'ga'nja'w Kristo' naa kiwete kĩhçxa vxyaatewa.
I'kwe'sxa' jiiyã'ji'kwe Jesukristo' kĩhtewa jxuka ew yũusaatewa, aça' maawa txãa na'wẽy kĩhtewa jxuka ew yũuna fxi'zeçxa', Dxus luuçxçxa txã'wẽ yuuna.

Dxus peeygãani' seena' yuh wala' txã'sna miiyajkxwe. Txã'wẽçxaíik adx luuçxwe'sx jĩna kxsusu' kwe'sxtxi'. Aça' kwe'sxa' txajx luuçx yuhtha'w. Txãa pa'gatx naa kiwetewe'sxa' kwe'sxtxi' jiyu'çmée, Dxusa's jiimeeta' naa pa'ga.

Adx peeygãanisawe'sx, kwe'sxa' Dxus luuçx yã'tha'w. Nawa Kristo kĩhte', ma'wẽ seena' zhiçxkwe neeyũuwa'jsa ne'tka'w txãa yu'sa' ũus yajkxçxa kpajkxya' yu' ãja'çmeetha'w. Nawa Jesukristo vxyaate', txãa ma'wẽsate' weh yuhwa fxiymée txãa na'wẽy neeyũuwa'j yu'sa' jiitha'w.
Aça' maawa txãa na'wẽy yuu wẽesa' pkal ji'phmée fxi'zena, Jesukristowa ma'wẽ kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmeesana txã'wẽy.
Maawa pkalte fxi'zesa' Dxus jxkaahnitx nwẽese'jmée ũsçxa txã'wẽ yuuna, aça' Dxus jxkaahnitx kxtey yuumée ũsni' pkal íiçxá'.
I'kwe'sxa' jii i'kwe Jesukristo' kwe'sx pkaltxi txuhdeya'k naa kiwete kĩh, nawa txãa yu' kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmeesak yu'.
Txãa pa'ga maawa Jesukristo yakh fxi'zesa' pkalte fxi'ze'çme'. Aça' maawa pkalte fxi'zesa' Jesukristo's iiuymeena, sa' txãa ma'wẽsatewa jiimeesaçxa txã'wẽ yuuna.
Adx luuçxwe'sx, mpa'yajkxwe, i'kwe'sxtxi maawa kaypuba'jwe'sxte. Jesukristo na'wẽy ew yũuna fxi'zesa yuuçxáa, ewsa yuuna.
Nawa pkalte fxi'zesa' eçxthẽ'j yakh ũssaçxa txã'wẽ yuuna, txãa pa'gatey eçxthẽ'ja' nyafxiitey pkalsak yu'. Txajíiçxáak Dxus Nçxi'ka' eçxthẽ'j mjĩini's ivxiituya' kĩh naa kiwete.
Dxus luuçxa' maa yuhwa pkalte fxi'ze'çmeeta', txãa pa'gatey txãawe'sx ũusa's Dxus yu'pthehçxa nvxiitnisata' naa pa'ga. Txãasa pkalte fxi'zewa'jsameeta' Dxus luuçx yã'ja'.
Txãa pa'gak ya'jiyu' maa Dxus luuçxtewa. Sa' maa txã'wẽ eçxthẽ'j luuçxtxiwa ya'jiyu'k: Maawa ewmeeçxáa yũuna txajx yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi ahçena fxi'zesa' txãawe'sxa' Dxus luuçx meeta'.
I'kwe'sxa' Kristo kaapiya'jni's iiwẽse'jne'kwe txã' na'wẽk yu': Teeçxsa na'wẽçxah puutx ya'peeygãhnak fxi'zewa'j yu'.
Eçxthẽ'j yakh ũssa Kaina' txajx nyakha's ikhku, nawa kwe'sxa' txãa na'wẽy yuuwa'jsameetha'w. ¿Kĩh yuutega ikh wakx? Kain mjĩini' ewmeek yu', aça' nyakh mjĩini' ewsak yu' txãa pa'ga yuuçxáak ikh.
Adx yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, kuh yaakxnuwe naa kiwetewe'sx ahçetewa.

Txãa pa'gatey kwe'sxa' vxituwa'ju kasehçxa bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'the pa'jsatha'w, txãasa íiçxáatha'w yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi peeygãja'. Nawa maawa txajx yakhthẽ'ja's peeygãasame', txãa vxituwa'ju kasehsameeçxa txã'wẽ yuuna.
Maawa txãawe'sx yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi ahçena fxi'zesa', nasa's ikhsa na'wẽysa íiçxá'. Aça' i'kwe'sxa' jii i'kwe nasaa ikhsa' kim yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phumeetxna.

Jesukristo' kwe'sxtxi peeygãhçxa nwe'weya' txajx ĩtxi fxi'zeni's ivxiituk. Txãa txã'wẽ peeygãani yaase'. Aça' kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy kwe'sx yakhthẽ'jtx peeygãhçxa kwe'sx ĩtxi fxi'zeni's ivxiituwa'j ji'ptha'w.
Nawa kwe'sx yakhthẽ'j peejiina ũste uyçxawa kĩhçxáawa iijxtxuhdemeeçxa', ¿ma'wẽ Dxus peeygãani's kwe'sx ũuste ji'ptha'w jĩya' ãjakxtha'w?
Adx luuçxwe'sx, kwe'sx peeygãani' yuwejuçxáa peeygãa we'wewa'jme'. Isa peeygãjaççxa', ãate kaavxya'ja'jwa'ja' kĩhçxáawa pu'çxna.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxa', isa Dxus luuçxçxa txã'wẽ yu'nja'w, sa' Dxus dxi'ptewa jxpubamée ũsne'tka'w sũhwa'ja's ji'phu'nja'w.
Nawa kĩhteçxáawa jxpubaaçte', kwe'sx ũusçxáa yuhwa kaayaki'ji'k aça' Dxusa' kwe'sx ũuste jxthaakwe ew jiisa' aça' txajx dxi'pte ĩsxiiya' ãjame'nja'w.
Adx peeygãanisawe'sx, kwe'sx ũuste ewçxáa ũusuthena aça' Dxusa' pasuna sũhçxa
Dxusa's pẽyi'nja'w aça' txã' jxuka ũsuna txajx jxkaahnitx nwẽese'jçxa Dxus jxthãasni's kxtey yuuna fxi'zesatxi'.
Dxusa' na'wẽ yũuwa'ja'sku jxkaaja': txajx Nçxi'k Jesukristo's ũuste jxpa'gaçxa, teeçxsa na'wẽçxah puutx ya'peeygãhnak fxi'zekaah.
Dxus jxkaahnitx nwẽese'jsa' Dxus yakh fxi'zesa yuuna, aça' Dxuswa txãawe'sx yakh fxi'zena. Dxusa' kwe'sxtxi txajx Espiritu's peesku, txãa pa'ga kwe'sxa' jiitha'w Dxusa' kwe'sx yakh ũswa'jsatewa.

Adx peeygãanisawe'sx mpa'yajkxwe, txã'wẽ Dxus Espiritu's ji'ptha'w jĩsatxi' txã'wẽ yuhtxna sũhmée mfxi'zewe. Txã'jĩsatxi' ew jiyuwa'ja' Dxus Espiritu's ũuste ji'phdxihtewa jiyuya'. Txã'wẽme' naa kiwete iiméh wala penaçta' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsatha'w jĩna ĩsxiina u'jusa.
Na'jĩsaçxáa Dxus Espiritu's ũuste ji'phsa yuuna: Dxus Nçxi'k Jesukristo' kwe'sx na'wẽy nasaa yuuçxak vxyaa jĩsa yuuçxáa isa we'wesa yuuna.

Aça' Jesusa' kwe'sx na'wẽy nasaa yuuçxak vxyaa jĩsame', txã' Dxus Espiritu's ũuste ji'phmeena, wejxwa Kristo's açesa yuuna. I'kwe'sxa' iiwẽse'jne'kwe txã'jĩna we'wesa pa'jatxna jĩni's. Txãasa ũsyã'tha' naa kiwete.
Adx peeygãanisawe'sx, i'kwe'sxa' Dxus luuçxi'kwe, txãasai'kwe ĩsxiisatxi' knay, txãa pa'gatey Dxus Espiritu i'kwe'sx ũuste ũssa' thaakwe çxhãçxhasa' naa kiwete ĩsxiisawe'sx ũuste ũssameeçxa'.
Txãa ĩsxiisa' naa kiwetewe'sxta'. Txã'wẽçxaíitx naa kiwetewe'sxçxáana pta'sxi', aça' nasa naa kiwetewe'sxa' nwẽese'je'tx.

Nawa kwe'sxa' Dxus luuçxtha'w, aça' maawa Dxusna jiisa' kwe'sx pta'sxni's nwẽese'je'tx. Nawa Dxus luuçxmeesa', kwe'sx pta'sxni's nwẽese'je'çmeeta'. Kxah kwe'sxa' jiyu'nja'w kim Dxus Espiritu's isa ũuste ji'phtewa, txã'wẽy kim kaypuba'jsatewa.
Adx peeygãanisawe'sx, puutx ya'peeygãhna fxi'zewa'j ji'ptha'w, txãa pa'gatey peeygãhna fxi'zewa'ja's Dxusku pees naa pa'ga. Aça' maawa peeygãhna fxi'zesa' Dxus luuçxta' Dxusa's jiisa.
Dxusa' peeygãasa', aça' peeygãawa'ja's ji'phmeesa' Dxusa's jiimeesaçxa txã'wẽ yuuna.
Dxusa' kwe'sxtxi peeygãani's ãate kaavxya'ja'kh txajx Nçxi'k teeçxçxáasanawa naa kiwete kaahçxa, txãa nwe'wete' pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's kwe'sx ji'phukahn.
Na'wẽ yũunisaçxáa peeygãani' yaase': Kwe'sxa' Dxusa's açesatewa, txãa yu' kwe'sxtxi peeygãhçxak txajx Nçxi'k makwe teeçxçxáasatewa kwe'sx pkalpa'gate uuwa'jsa vxitçxa kaah.
Adx peeygãanisawe'sx, Dxusa' txã'wẽ kwe'sxtxi peeygãhte', kwe'sxwa txã'wẽy puutx ya'peeygãhna fxi'zewa'j ji'ptha'w.
Kim yuhwa Dxusa's uysa yu' meetxna. Nawa kwe'sxa' puutx ya'peeygãhna fxi'ze'nja'w aça' txã'wẽ yũute', Dxusa' kwe'sx ũuste nes yuuna, aç yuuçxáa kwe'sxwa txãa na'wẽy ew peeygãasa yu'nja'w.
Kwe'sxa' Dxus yakh nes yuute', txãawa txã'wẽy kwe'sx ũuste nesku yu', txãa pa'gaíiçxáak txajx Espiritu's kwe'sx ũuste nvxiht.
Kwe'sxa' iiuytha'w Dxusa' txajx Nçxi'ka's kaakh naa kiwete nasatx nwe'wekahn, txãasatha'w kwe'sxa' ãate pta'sxi'.
Maawa Jesusa' Dxus Nçxi'ka' jĩna we'wesa' txã' Dxus yakh ũssaçxa txã'jĩna, aça' Dxuswa txajx ũuste nes yuuna.
Ãçxha' jiyutha'w Dxusa' kwe'sxtxi txakwe wala peeygãani's. Dxusa' peeygãasa', aça' maawa peeygãhna fxi'zesa', Dxus yakh fxi'zesa yuuna, aça' Dxuswa txãa yakh nes yuuna.
Txajuk kwe'sx peeygãawa'ja's isa jxukate ya'ji'phuna ya'pa'ja'. Txã'wẽ yũunijũ' kastigãywa'j ente' ũukhme'nja'w, txãa pa'gatey naa kiwete kwe'sxa' Jesukristo na'wẽy peeygãasa yu'nja'w naa pa'ga.

Dxus txakwe wala peeygãasa's ¿ma'wẽ ũukhwa'j yuukx? txãa pa'gatey txajx peeygãanisa' kwe'sx ũukhni's jxuka ivxiitu'k. Aça' ũukhsa' kastigãywa'jne'tka sũhçxa ũukhuna, sa' txã'wẽ yaakxsa' kwe'sxtxi Dxus txakwe wala peeygãani's açxa ew jiimeeçxa txã'wẽ ũukhuna.
Dxus khuẽ'yku kwe'sxtxi peeygãh, txãa pa'gatha'w ãçxha' kwe'sxwa Dxusa's peeygãja'.
Maawa Dxusa's peeygãja'th jĩçxawa yakhthẽ'ja's ahçena fxi'zesa', ĩsxiisa yuuna. Peekx yakhthẽ'j uyna fxi'zenisa's ahçeçxa', ¿ma'wẽ yũuçxa Dxus uynimeesa's peeygãjxa' ãjakx?
Dxusa' na'wẽk jxkaaja': Dxusa's peeygãjaççxa', txã'wẽy peekx yakhthẽ'jnawa peeygãawa'ja' jĩ'k.
Maawa Jesusa' Dxus tasxu yuusa Kristona sũhnaçxáa ũuste yaakxsa', Dxus luuçxçxa txã'wẽ yaakina. Dxusnawa peeygãjaççxa', Dxus luuçxtxiwa peeygãhna fxi'zewa'ja'.
Dxusa's peeygãhna txajx jxkaahnitxi' nwẽese'jçxa', Dxus luuçxtxiwa peeygãasaçxa txã'wẽ yu'nja'w.
Dxusna peeygãani txã'wẽ txajx jxkaahnitx nwẽese'jnisa'. Txajx jxkaahni' jxthaakwe yu' thẽysameeta'.
Maawa Dxus luuçxa' naa kiwete ewmeesa's nwẽese'jmée jxuka knayu'tx. Jesukristo's ũusuh jxuka yaakxpa'ga yuuçxáak naa kiwete ewmeesa's ya'knayu'.
Maawa Jesusa' Dxus Nçxi'kna sũhna ũusuh jxuka yaakxsa yuuçxáa, naa kiwete ewmeesa's nwẽese'jmée knayuutxna.

Jesukristo naa kiwete kĩisa' Dxus Nçxi'ktewa kaajiyu'jsa' naata': Yu'te bautisãyni vxite' kluuste uuni. Nawa yu'te bautisãynijũçxáa yu' açxaméek ew ya'jiyu', naasáa kluuste uuniisa yakh txãa e'z jwedsa yakh yuuçxáak isa ew ya'jiyu' Dxus Nçxi'ktewa. Txã'sa' Dxus Espirituk txã'jĩ'. Txajx we'weni' isasata'.
Jesukristo' Dxus Nçxi'ktewa jiisa cielute' tekhta': Dxusa', vxite' Jesukristo íiçxá', vxite' Dxus Espiritu'. Aça' txãa tekhsa' txãa na'wẽçxaçxáatx we'we'.
Txã'wẽy Jesukristo' Dxus Nçxi'ktewa jiisa naa kiwete' tekhta': Dxus Espiritu, vxite' yu'te bautisãynisa vxite' kluuste uuniisa. Aça' txãa tekhsa' txãa na'wẽçxaçxáatx we'we'.

Piçthẽ'jwe'sx pta'sxniçxáa yuhnawa isa yuh we'wene' sũhnatha'w jxpa'ga'. Aça' Dxus we'weni yu' wejx jxthaakwe isasa yuhna sũhna jxpa'gawa'j ji'ptha'w, txãa pa'gatey Dxus yuuk we'weçxa': Jesukristo' Adx Nçxi'ka' jĩ' naa pa'ga.

Jesukristo' Dxus Nçxi'ka' sũhna fxi'zesa', Dxus Nçxi'ka's ũuste jxpa'gasaçxa txã'wẽ yaakina. Nawa Dxus we'weçxa': Jesukristo' Adx Nçxi'ka' jĩni's maawa jxpa'gasame', Dxusa' ĩsxiija'k jĩsa yuuna, txã'wẽ Dxusa' isane' we'we' sũhmeeçxa.
Jesukristo' Dxus Nçxi'ka' jĩna we'weçxa', Dxusa' kwe'sxtxi' pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's peesku jĩnisa', txãa yuuçxáa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phsa' naa pa'ga.
Txãa pa'ga maawa Dxus Nçxi'ka's ũuste jxpa'gasa', pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phsa yuutxna. Nawa Dxus Nçxi'ka's ũuste jxpa'gasame', pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phmeesa yuutxna.
Dxus Nçxi'ka's ũuste jxpa'gasa', pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phne'tka'w sũhna jiyukahnthu i'kwe'sxtxi pta'sxna fxi'ja'.
Aça' txã'wẽ yaakxsatxi' Dxusa' pasu'k txajx jxthãasniçxá's pxthaa we'wena pẽjxte' txã'sa' ew jiitha'w.
Kwe'sx pxthaa we'weni's Dxusa' wẽse'jna ũstewa ma'wẽ ew jiitka'w txã'wẽy kwe'sx pẽyni's jxpa'gawa'ja'swa ew jiitha'w.

Yakhthẽ'j pkalte fxi'zena ũstewa txãa pkala' perdon ji'phte uyçxa', maawa Dxusa's neewe'wewa'ja' txãa pkalsa pa'gate, aça' yakhthẽ'j txã'wẽ fxi'zesa's Dxusa' ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's peesuna. Nawa pkal perdon ji'phmeesa ũsta' txã'wẽsate fxi'zena ũste yu', Dxusa's neewe'wewa'ja's jxkaja'çmeeth.
Kĩhwa ewmée yũuni' pkalçxaçxáata', nawa perdon ji'phta'.
Kwe'sxa' jiitha'w maawa Dxus luuçx yã'ja' peena yu' pkalte fxi'ze'çme'. Txã'wẽ yũuwe'sxte Dxus Nçxi'ka' txajx kusetek jxaawu' eçxthẽ'j suwkahmén. Txãa pa'gak pkalte fxi'ze'çmée.
Kwe'sxa' Dxus luuçx yuhtha'w, nawa naa kiwete nasa jxukaysa Dxusna yajkxmée fxi'zesa' eçxthẽ'j kusetewe'sxta' txã'sa' jiitha'w.

Jiitha'w Dxus Nçxi'k naa kiwete kĩhçxa', Dxus ĩtxisa's jiyuwa'ja's kwe'sxtxi ũsku. Txãa pa'ga Dxus ĩtxisa Nçxi'k Jesukristo yakh fxi'zena ũstha'w. Txãa Dxus ĩtxisa' bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's kwe'sxtxi peessa'.
Adx luuçxwe'sx, mpa'yajkxwe dxusmeeçxá's yaakxni's.
II John: Naa karta's fxi'jsa' na'wẽ thẽ'j jĩna kxsusu'tx txãath fxi'ja', pe'sx Dxus txhitxhnisa vxite' i'kwe luuçxtxi. Adxa' txãawe'sxtxi' isa peeygãayuju'th. Aça' adxçxáa txã'wẽ yu'çmeeth. Dxus we'weni isasa's jiyusa yu' jxukaysatx txã'wẽ peeygãja'.
Dxus we'weni isasa' kwe'sx yakh nesku yu', sa' bagaçxtewa kwe'sx ũuste nes yuuna. Txã'wẽ Dxus we'weni isasa's ũuste ji'phçxath i'kwe'sxtxi peeygãja'.
Kwe'sx Tata vxite' txajx nçxi'k Jesukristo txãa e'zsa wala peeygãhçxa i'kwe'sxtxi pu'çxhitxna ewçxáa fxi'zekahn.
Txã'wẽ luuçx maaíi yu' Dxus kwe'sx Tata jxkaahni's kxtey nwẽese'jna fxi'zena ũste uyçxa' wala weçxa'th.
Sa' ãçxha', pe'sx, mpa'yajkxwe, puutx ya'peeygãhna fxi'zewa'ja's neewe'weçthu. Na'wẽ fxi'jni' u'se jxkaahnisame'. Nyafxíi jiyutha'w txãaíiçxá'.
Dxus jxkaahnitxi' kxtey nwẽese'jna fxi'zete', puutx ya'peeygãhna fxi'zewa'j kasejena. I'kwe'sxa' nyafxíi iiwẽse'jyã'ji'kwe Dxus jxkaahnitxi' txã' puutx ya'peeygãhna fxi'zewa'ja'.
Naa kiwete ĩsxiisa wala kuh kasehçxa u'juta'. Txãawe'sxa' Dxus Nçxi'k Jesukristo' kwe'sx na'wẽy nasaa yuuçxak vxyaa jĩ'çmeeta'. Txã'wẽ we'wesa' ĩsxiisa yuuna, sa' Kristo's açesaçxa txã'wẽ yuuna.
Txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sxa' mpa'yajkxwe, Dxus yakh fxi'zepa'ga cielute dukhwa'ja's ivxiitumée, wejxwa makwetewa jxuka jxpa'gawa'ja'sçxáa myajkxwe.

Kristo ma'wẽ kaapiya'the' maawa txã'wẽy kaapiya'jsame' Dxus yakh fxi'zesameeçxa txã'wẽ yuuna. Nawa Kristo kaapiya'jniçxá's nwẽese'jna fxi'zesa', Dxus yakh fxi'zesaçxa txã'wẽ yuuna, sa' Dxus Nçxi'k yakhwa txã'wẽy fxi'zesa yuuna.
Txã'wẽ maawa i'kwe'sx yat-su pa'jçxawa Kristo kaapiya'jni'sçxáa pta'sxsame's weçxana jxpa'ganuwe.
Txã'wẽ weçx u'jwe'ga jĩna txãawe'sxtxi jxpa'gasa' ewmée yũuya' pu'çxsa yuuna.
I'kwe'sxtxi wala we'wewa'j ji'pthu, nawa eçte txã'wẽ we'wena fxi'jya'wameeth. Adx yuu peekx yujxa'wath i'kwe'sx yakh teeçxsa na'wẽçxah puutx uyya', sa' puutx uyçxa' jxukaysa weçxweçxa yaaki'nja'w.
I'kwe yakhthẽ'jwa Dxus txhitxhnisa' aça' txajx luuçxa' yuwe weçxaa kaja'tx. Txã'wẽçxáa fxi'jaçthu.
III John: Thẽ'j jĩna kxsusu'tx txãath fxi'ja' naa karta's adx peeygãanisa Gayo's weçxana.
Yakhthẽ'j peeygãanisa, adxa' iidx pa'gate Dxus yakh puutx we'wena ũsthu kĩhtewa ewçxáa ãça'mée fxi'zekahn, ma'wẽga Dxus yakh çxhãçxha fxi'ze' txã'wẽy.
Idxa' Dxus we'weni isasa's jxpubamée Dxus yakh ew fxi'zeni's yakhthẽ'jwe'sx pa'jçxa pta'sxte', wala weçxath.
Adxa' kĩh yuhnawa txã'wẽ yu' weçxa'çmeeth, naasáa adx luuçxwe'sx txã'wẽ Dxus we'weni isasa's jxpubamée ũsta' jĩna pta'sxni yuuçxáak jxthaakwe ya'weçxa'.
Yakhthẽ'j peeygãanisa idxa' bagaçxtewa pu'vxitumée selpiina ũsgu vxite kiweju yakhthẽ'jwe'sx kxtee pa'jsatx pu'çxna.
Txãawe'sxa' ayte yakhthẽ'jwe'sx pkhaakhenite pta'sxtxi iidx peeygãhna pu'çxni's. Txãasa bagaçxtewa meen pu'çx txãawe'sx dxi'the u'jwa'j peejini's Dxus weçxakahn.
Txãawe'sxa' kasehtx Jesukristo kaapiya'jni's pta'sxna u'juya', nawa dxi'the u'jwa'j peejini's pẽyi'çmeeta' Dxusa's jiimeesa yuutxi's.
Txãa pa'ga kwe'sxa' kĩh peejiiçtewa pu'çxhi ji'ptha'w Dxus we'weni isasa's pta'sxsatxi'. Txã'wẽ yũunisa Dxus yuwe's jxukaysa ja'daçxah mjĩini yaase'.
Adxa' teeçx karta fxi'th kxtee pkhaakhesawe'sxtxi, nawa Diótrefxes yu' nwẽese'jme' kwe'sx we'weni's txãaçxáa jxkaahna ũs wẽeçxa.

Txãa pa'ga adxa' pa'jçxa txã'sa' pa'yaçxa we'we'nja, txã'wẽ yuwe susna kwe'sxtxi nuywe'wena u'jupa'ga. Txã'wẽçxáa yũumée, vxite ekaju yakhthẽ'jwe'sx pa'jsatx jxpa'ga'çme', sa' vxite jxpa'ga wẽesa yuutxi's ahçeçxa txãa pkhaakhenijũ kutxi'ji'k.

Yakhthẽ'j peeygãanisa, ewmeesa na'wẽy yu' fxi'zewa'jme', naasáa ewsa ma'wẽ fxi'zeçte', txã'wẽ yuuçxáa fxi'zewa'ja'. Ew yũuna fxi'zesa' Dxus yakh fxi'zesa'. Nawa ewmée yũusa', Dxus yakhmée fxi'zesaçxa txã'wẽ yuuna.
Demetrio' wala ewsa' jĩnatx we'we' jxukaysa. Txã'wẽ ew fxi'zete', txajx ew fxi'zeni íiçxáa nwe'we'k. Aça' kwe'sxwa jiitha'w txã'wẽ ew fxi'zeni's. I'kwe'sxa' peekx jii i'kwe kwe'sx isa we'weni's.
Adxa' wala puutx we'wewa'j ji'pthu, nawa fxi'jçxa kajaçmeeth,
dud puutx uyçxa puutx we'we'nja sũhçxa.
Ayjxuwe'sx namiku idxa's wala yuwe weçxaa kaja'tx. Kxsũ namikuwe'sxtxiwa teeçxsa na'wẽçxah yuwe meen weçxa. Dxus yakh mfxi'ze.
Jude: Jesukristo's selpisáa Jakobo nyakh Judas naa karta's fxi'jaçthu Dxus pa'yanisawe'sxtxi. I'kwe'sxa' Jesukristo jxpe'jni wala ew ũsi'kwe.
Txãasa Dxus peeygãani wẽt yuuçxáa mfxi'zewe.

Kwe'sxtxi na'wẽ Dxus nwe'wek txã'sçxáana wejx ãate kaapiya'jna fxi'jya'wath yu' i'kwe'sxtxi. Nawa txã'wẽ yũumée fxiy yu'kxpehwa'kh kaseh txã'sna wejx dud fxi'jaçthu i'kwe'sxtxi neewe'wena, na'wẽ Jesukristo's ũuste jxpa'gaçxa nwẽese'jwa'ja's kaapiya'jni yuuk txã'sa' jxpa'gayã'jçxa', weh yuhwa yu'pthejkahmen.

Txã'wẽme' maa nasaíi yu' ĩsxiina fxiy kaapiya'jsa ũsyã'tha', nawa txã'wẽ yũusa' Dxus kastigo seena'te khẽeya' u'jwa'jsata' jĩna txãniitey pta'sxni yã'kh yu' Dxus librute. Txãa nasa' wala kazx ewmeesata', txã'wẽçxaíitx kwe'sxtxi taki'sa Dxusnawa weeçxna naa kiwete ewmeesa yuuçxáana kxtey yuuna fxi'ze'. Sa' kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristonawa txã'wẽytxi weeçxi'.
I'kwe'sxa' jiiyã'jne'kwe nawa ki' kaayaki'jya'wath na'wẽ yũuni's: Dxusa' Israelwe'sxtxi Egipto kiweju kutxi'jçxawa, maaíi yuutxi's ivxiituk nwẽese'pha'gamée.
Txã'wẽy angeleswe'sxwa jxpa'yakxpa'gamée txãawe'sx yujuni's nvxihttxi, aça' Dxusa' txãawe'sxtxi' preesu'jçxa ji'pha' çxhi'dx walate kastigãywa'j en ãhtewe'sx.

Txã'wẽy Sodoma Gomoçxa vxite' txãa ja'dasuwe'sx çxhabwa iiméh kazxsateçxáatx fxi'zena ũsu' peekx kakwe's suwsaçxáana nwẽese'jna. Txã'wẽ kazx yũupa'ga bagaçxte yuhwa pçuwa'jmée ipx wala seena'te kastigãynitx yuu txãa angeleswe'sx na'wẽy. Txã'wẽ kastigãynisa' kaajiyu'jsata' maawa txã'wẽy yũukahmen.
Txã'wẽtewa txãa nasa ĩsxiisawe'sxa' ewmée yajkxna txãawe'sx kakwe's pkaltetx kaafxi'ze'je', sa' jxkaahsawe'sxtxiwa weeçxna wẽesxuna Dxusnawa weeçxi'tx.
Angel npiiçthẽ'j Migwel yuhwa txã'wẽ yu' wẽesxumeea' Moises kakwe's eçxthẽ'j jxũna u'j wẽjeçte, txãa yakh puutx we'wena ũsçxawa. Naasáa idxa's Dxus jiina jĩnaçxáak we'we.
Nawa txãa piçthẽ'j ĩsxiisawe'sxa' jiimeeweete ewmeetx açewe'we'. Txãawe'sxa' tajkx na'wẽçxáawa yajkxya' ãjani yu'sa' txãawe'sx ivxiituwa'the íiçxáatx kaaselpi'ji'.

Kainwa ma'wẽga yuu txã'wẽyçxáa yũusaata' naa pa'ga txãawe'sxa' wala yuh nxuste pa'jwa'jsata'. Vxyu wala ji'phu wẽeçxa Balaan na'wẽytxi jxpuba. Sa' Koréwa ma'wẽga ewmée açewe'wepa'ga uu txã'wẽy vxitutxna.

I'kwe'sx weçxana pkhaakhenisu kaythame'jya' pa'jsaçxáata'. Txãawe'sxa' kxsũ pa'jçxa thaamewa'ja's ji'phmeetx ũ'na tudxna fxi'ze', i'kwe'sx ksxavxyte thaamewa'jmée. Txãawe'sx ew fxi'zewa'jçxá'stxi yaaki' vxite yuutxi's peeygãhmée. Tãapha's wejxa mteewa jxũna u'jnisa na'wẽsaçxáata' seelpimeesa. Fxtũu tasx yũnsamée na'wẽsata'. Txãa fxtũu tasxa'swa ma'wẽ peena yu' ye'çxkahmén petx weçe jxuka khubeni yuukx txã'wẽsaçxáata'.

Mar weeswée seena' bu'çxisa na'wẽtx yu' txãawe'sx ewmée thaampa' yũuni yakh. Estrelxa txajx u'jwa'j dxi'ja's jxpubasáa na'wẽsata'. Bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa kasehwa'jmée ewmée seena' nxusnxus çxhi'dxte nvxiitni yuuwa'jsata'.

Adan nçun sietetewe'sx Enokha' na'jĩk Dxus kaaũusuthe'jni's: Txã'wẽ ewmée yũuni's jxukaysatx paapẽjxçxa nasa seena' ewmeesatxi's jxukaysatx kastigãyya' Dxusa' txajx nasa iiméh wala kuhsa yakh yuhte uythu, txãawe'sx makwethẽ'jne'ta ewmée yũuna fxi'zeçxa txã'wẽy Dxusnawa açewe'we txãa pa'ga kastigãyya' jĩ'k Enokha'.

Adan nçun sietetewe'sx Enokha' na'jĩk Dxus kaaũusuthe'jni's: Txã'wẽ ewmée yũuni's jxukaysatx paapẽjxçxa nasa seena' ewmeesatxi's jxukaysatx kastigãyya' Dxusa' txajx nasa iiméh wala kuhsa yakh yuhte uythu, txãawe'sx makwethẽ'jne'ta ewmée yũuna fxi'zeçxa txã'wẽy Dxusnawa açewe'we txãa pa'ga kastigãyya' jĩ'k Enokha'.
Nasa txã'wẽsa' e'sga nuywe'wena fxi'zesaçxáata', sa' peekx kakwete wẽt fxi'zewa'ja'sçxáatx pakwe', txã'wẽ e'sga yu' açewe'weççxawa ãate yu' ewçxáatx we'we', txãawe'sxtxi wa'lmée pu'çxkahn.
Nawa yakhthẽ'jwe'sx miiyajkxwe: Jesukristo jxkaahnisawe'sxa' nyafxíi pta'sxtxi na'jĩna:
Nmeh en yuuçte' nasa' pa'jatxna Dxus jxkaahni yu'sa' weeçxna txãawe'sx ũus yaakxni ewmeesaçxá's nwẽese'jsawe'sx jĩnatx we'we.
Txãawe'sx txã'wẽ nasatx kaapui'jsa yuutxna, txãawe'sx ũus yaakxni ewmeesa's nwẽese'jsa, Dxus Espiritu yu's ũuste ji'phmeesa.
Nawa yakhthẽ'jwe'sx, i'kwe'sxa' Jesukristo's ũuste jxpa'gaçxa nwẽese'jwa'ja's kaapiya'jni yuuk txã'sa' jii yã'jçxa', txãajũ yu' peena kasehnuwe. Dxus Espiritu's jxpi'kxçxa, Dxus yakh mpuutxwe'wewe.
Dxus peeygãanijũ txutemée ũythasna meswe, kwe'sx ãhmeekwetewa Jesukristo peeygãhçxa bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée ĩtxi fxi'zewa'ja's ũswa'j en ãhpkaçx.
Vxitewa jxpubawe'sxte ew mkaajiyu'jwe.
Vxitetx peeygãhçxa menwe'wewe ipx walate khẽeya' yã'j ũssatx. Nawa ewmeesa's jxpa'yakx. Txã'wẽme' ropa yuhwa jxuka ewmeesaçxáa pẽethenita'.

Dxus kwe'sxtxi nwe'wesa txãa yuuçxáa kĩhte yuhwa sxiigmée jxpe'jsa i'kwe'sx ewmeete wetekahmen ewte jxpe'jya' ãjawa'jsa'. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa i'kwe'sxtxi kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmée txajx weçxana ũsnite nuypa'jana. Txãa yuuçxáa jxtuhthesa', maatewa jxthaakwe walasa, kĩhtewa jxuka ãjasa'. Txãa yuuçxáa jxkaahsa'. Sa' Dxus ũsnite i'kwe'sx pa'jya' ãjakahn kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo' pu'çxhina. Nyafxiiteywa txã'wẽk pu'çx na' ãçxwa txã'wẽy íiçxáa pu'çxhina, sa' bagaçxtewa pu'çxna nes yuuna.

Dxus kwe'sxtxi nwe'wesa txãa yuuçxáa kĩhte yuhwa sxiigmée jxpe'jsa i'kwe'sx ewmeete wetekahmen ewte jxpe'jya' ãjawa'jsa'. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa i'kwe'sxtxi kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmée txajx weçxana ũsnite nuypa'jana. Txãa yuuçxáa jxtuhthesa', maatewa jxthaakwe walasa, kĩhtewa jxuka ãjasa'. Txãa yuuçxáa jxkaahsa'. Sa' Dxus ũsnite i'kwe'sx pa'jya' ãjakahn kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo' pu'çxhina. Nyafxiiteywa txã'wẽk pu'çx na' ãçxwa txã'wẽy íiçxáa pu'çxhina, sa' bagaçxtewa pu'çxna nes yuuna.
Revelation of John: Naa txã'wẽ Dxus kaajiyu'jnisa' Jesukristo's, aça' Jesukristo' txã'sna selpisaatxku kaajiyu'jwa'jsa yu' naa ensu seena' yũuwa'ja's, kxajk Jesukristo' txã'sna selpisáa Juana's kaajiyu'j teeçx angela's kwe'we'jçxa.
Txãa pa'gak Juana' Dxus yuwe isasa's we'we Jesukristo kaavxya'ja'the uyni's jxuka, txãasa ĩsxĩinisame'.

Naa pa'ga na'sna leeĩsa' nxusmée weçxana yaakxwa'jsata', aça' Dxus yuwe ayte na'wẽ fxi'jni' txã'sna leeĩçte wẽse'jsawa isasa yuhna sũhna yajkxçxa kxtey yuusa' weçxana yaakxwa'j ji'phta'. Txã'wẽme' kĩhwa seena' kxtey yuuwa'j ena' utxaaça'.

Juan yaasesa adxthu fxi'ja' Asia kiwete Dxus luuçx siete ahte pkhaakhesawe'sxtxi weçxana. Dxus yakh ewçxáa mfxi'zewe. Txã' nyafxíiwa txãaíiçxáak yu', sa' ãçxwa txãaíiçxá', sa' txãaíiçxáa bagaçxtewa nes yuuna. Sa' Dxus tasxte ũssa siete espiritusawe'sx pu'çxnitxwa mpa'gawe.

Sa' txã'wẽy Jesukristo pu'çxni'swa mpa'gawe. Txã' Dxus yuwe's jxuka pta'sxsa' txãak uuçxawa ki' ĩtxĩ yuu nyafxte, sa' ãçxha' txãa jxkaajxa' ãjãwa'jsa' naa kiwete jxkaahsawe'sxtxi. Kristo' kwe'sxtxi's peeygãhçxa kwe'sx pkaltxi's txajx eeju pkhi'kxku.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxak kwe'sxtxi's jxkaahsa vxite' sacerdote vxitçxa nvxiht Dxusa's selpikahn. Sa' Kristo yuuçxáa kĩhtewa jxuka ãjãsa jxtuhthe yuuwa'jsa' bagaçxtewa.
Txã'sa' mthegwe, tãaphte yuja'. Txã'sa' jxukaysa uyuutxna, txã'sna kpã'vxit-sawa. Sa' uyçxa' naa kiwete nasa jxukaysa ũ'netxna. Isath we'we', txã'wẽ yuh yuutxna.

Kwe'sxtxi nwe'wesa' ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa ãjãwa'jsa we'weçxa': Adxa' naa kiwe meetey ũsyã'th yu', sa' bagaçxtewa nes yuuwa'jsath pçuwa'jsamée jĩ'k. Txã' nyafxíiwa txãak yu', sa' ãçxwa txãaíiçxá', sa' txãaíiçxáa bagaçxtewa nes yuuna.

Adxa' Juan i'kwe'sx yakhthẽ'th. Txãasa i'kwe'sx na'wẽy ja'daçxah pxthaa yuuwa'ja'swa jxpa'gasath, sa' Dxus jxkaahni ena'swa jxpa'gasath i'kwe'sx na'wẽy. Sa' Jesukristo' kĩhtewa wantãywa'ja's ũsku txã'snawa i'kwe'sx na'wẽy jxpa'gasath. Nawa naasáa Dxus yuwe's Jesukristo kaajiyu'kh txã'sna pta'sxpa'ga yuuçxáa adxa' preesuth ũsu' kiwe Patmos yaasesa yu'pxãhte u'pu'k kxtee.
Sa' teeçx ki'sen ente' Dxus Espiritu aphniith yuu, sa' adx e'ste trompeta's tukani na'wẽ seena' sus we'weni wẽse'th.
Txã' na'jĩ'k:

—Kĩh yuhwa meetey adxa' ũsyã'th yu', sa' bagaçxtewa nes yuuwa'jsath. Aça' idx uyuuçgu txãatxi's eçte fxi'jçxa mkaah Dxus luuçx siete ahte pkhaakhena ũssa Asia kiwetewe'sxtxi, Efxeso, Esmirna, Pérgamo, Tiatira, Sardis, Fxiladelfxia, Laodicea txãa çxhabtewe'sxtxi jĩte',
¿Kimki'k txã'wẽ we'we? sũhçxa yu'thegçxa', uythu bela txaahnisa sietetx ũsu' vxyuu behçxaçxáasa.
Sa' txãa bela txaahnisa ksxavxyte Dxus Nçxi'k nasa yuusáa na'wẽsak ũsu', ropa çxida vxiçte kĩhsa athçxa, jxtudnisawa vxyuu behçxaçxáasa peçxute kãh tapesak ji'phu'.
Sa' dxkhas yu' khas ew çxihme na'wẽtx yu', meeçxawa yãdx na'wẽ çxihme. Sa' yafx yu' ipx beesa na'wẽtx yu',
naapkaçxha' txajx çxida yu', çama's ipxte aaçxa'jni na'wẽtx zhiçxkwe kwentete'. Aça' txajx we'weni yu' yu'wala seena' susni na'wẽk pthũuse'.
Txajx kusete yu' siete estrelxatxku ji'phu', naapkaçxha' txajx yuwesu yu' espada pdxi'p seena' zeksak sẽhna ũsu'. Aça' txajx dxi'p yu' sek kweethni na'wẽk eena' khikhyna ũsu'.
Aça' txã'wẽ uyçxa', txajx tasxga uuníi na'wẽth wete. Nawa txajx kuse paçuwe'sxa's adx kajkwete peekizeçxa na'jĩ'k:
—Ũukhnu, naa kiwe meetey adxa' ũsyã'th yu', sa' bagaçxtewa nes yuuwa'jsath pçuwa'jsamée.
Uuçxawa ki' ĩtxĩ yuusath. Uuwa'ja's peena yu' ji'phuya'mée adxthu knay, sa' uu kiwetewa kaafxi'ze'jme'nja, txãasa ãçxha' bagaçxtewa ĩtxĩçxáa nes yuuwa'jsath.
Na'wẽ idx uygu txãatxi' mfxi'j, ãçxh uynisa ki' e'su vxite uyuune'ga txãatxwa.

Adx paçu kusete siete estrelxatx uygu vxite' bela txaahni sietesatx txã'wẽsa' na'wẽ kaajiyu'jsata': Txãa estrelxa' Dxus luuçx siete ahte pkhaakhena ũssatx yuwee pta'sxsa angeleswe'sxta', naapkaçxha' siete bela txaahnisa' Dxus luuçx siete ahte pkhaakhesawe'sxta' jĩ'k.
Dxus luuçx Efxeso çxhabtewe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Dxus angela's mfxi'j na'jĩna: Paçu kuseju siete estrelxatx atçxa siete bela txaahnisa vxyuu behçxaçxáata' txãa ksxavxysu u'jusa we'weçxa' na'jĩ'k:

Dxus dxi'pte i'kwe'sx ma'wẽ fxi'zesatewa jxuka jiith. Wala yuh çxhãçxha mjĩina wantãyna fxi'zesa i'kwe, sa' ewmeesa yuutxi'sa' jxpa'ga'çmée i'kwe. Txã'wẽ Jesus jxkaahnisatha'w jĩna pa'jsawe'sxtxi'sa' jxpa'gamée kimtewa ew jiyuya' yuwe paapẽyi'i'kwe, sa' txã'wẽ yũuçxa' Jesus jxkaahnisamée ĩsxĩisatewa jiyu'i'kwe.
Wahtxmée adxna selpiipa'ga wala pxthaa yuuna wantãyna mjĩiwa'j ji'phu'i'kwe txã'wẽ yũuni's adxa' jiith.
Nawa i'kwe'sx ãhmée yũuni's we'wewa'j ji'pthu. Nyafxíi na'wẽ i'kwe wala peeygãawa'ja's ji'phu' txãa yu'sa' ãçxha' ji'phmée i'kwe.

Txãa pa'ga kĩhtene'kwe jxpuba txãa pkala's nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte misxawedwe, sa' nyafxíi ma'wẽne'kwe peeygãasa yu' txã'wẽy myũuwe. Txã'wẽ yũumeete', tud yuwe'nja i'kwe'sxtxi kastigãyya', sa' i'kwe'sx ksxavxyu bela txaahni's jxũna u'jçxa vxite ahte txaja'nja, pkaltxi nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedmeete'.
Txã'wẽçxawa na'wẽ yũuwa'j yu'sa' ew i'kwe yũ'. Nikolaitawe'sx fxi'zeni yu'sa' açe'i'kwe txã'wẽsa yu'sa' adxwa açe'th.

Kxtey nwẽese'jwa'jsa ũsçxa', mwẽese'jwe Dxus Espiritu' na'wẽk we'we' Dxus luuçxtxi: Dxus ũsnite fxtũu tasx ũsa' bagaçxte yuhwa peejxmée yũnna nes yuusa txã' uumée kaafxi'ze'jsa'. Txã'sa' puuçu'nja ewmeesa yu'sa' nwẽese'jmée jxuka knaysawe'sxtxi'sa' jĩ'k.
Dxus luuçx Esmirna çxhabtewe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Dxus angela's na'jĩna mfxi'j: Naa kiwe meetey ũsyã'kh yu' sa' bagaçxtewa nes yuuwa'jsa uuçxa ki' ĩtxĩ yuuk txã' na'jĩ'k:

Dxus dxi'pte i'kwe'sx ma'wẽ fxi'zesatewa jxuka jiith. I'kwe'sx pxthaa yuuna kĩhwa ji'phmée fxi'zeni txã'wẽ yũuni's jiith. (Nawa ew yajkxte yu' wala ji'phsa i'kwe.) Sa' Dxus luuçx meeçxawa Dxus luuçxtha'w jĩna weeçx we'wesatxwa jiith. Nawa txã'wẽ yũusa' eçxthẽ'j nasa yuuçxáata'.

Pxthaa yuuwa'j pa'jana txã'sa' ũukhmeene'kwe. Eçxthẽ'ja' i'kwe'sx maaíitxi's karcelte txajana, i'kwe'sx jxukaysa ma'wẽ yũutewa jiyuya'. Aça' diez enpkaçx wala pxthaa yuuwa'j ji'phune'kwe. Nawa Dxus yakh txutemée mfxi'zewe uu entepkaçx, aça' adxa' ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'ja's ũsu'nja txã'wẽ ew fxi'zepa'ga.

Kxtey nwẽese'jwa'jsa ũsçxa', mwẽese'jwe Dxus Espiritu' na'wẽk we'we' Dxus luuçxtxi: Ewmeesa yu'sa' nwẽese'jmée jxuka knaysawe'sxa' Dxus yakh bagaçxte yuhwa peena yu' puutx uywa'jmeete yu' u'jmeetxna jĩ'k.
Dxus luuçx Pérgamo çxhabtewe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Dxus angela's na'jĩna mfxi'j: Espada pdxi'p zeksa's ji'phsa' na'jĩ'k:

Dxus dxi'pte i'kwe'sx ma'wẽ fxi'zesatewa jxuka jiith. I'kwe'sxa' eçxthẽ'j jxkaahna ũsni ksxavxyte ũsçxawa, adx tasxu yu' txutemée i'kwe fxi'ze'. Adx kaapiya'jni's pta'sxsa Antipas nakwe wala seena' pxthaa i'kwe'sx ksxavxyte ikhni yuuk txãa enteçxáa yuhwa ũukhçxa adx yase's kxsusmée yu' yuumée i'kwe, kxteek eçxthẽ'j ũsu' nawa.

Txã'wẽtewa i'kwe'sx ãhmée yũuni's we'wewa'j ji'pthu: Balaan kaapiya'jni's nwẽese'jsawe'sxtxi i'kwe'sxa' iipe'ji'kwe Pérgamo çxhabte. Txãa Balaana' Balakha's ewmeek yu'kxpeh Israelwe'sxtxi's kaypuba'khan, txãasak Dxus ĩtxĩmeesatx weçxana tajkx ikhni çxiçxa's ũ'kaah, sa' pkal kazx yuuna fxi'zewa'ja'swa kaapiya'kh.
Sa' Nikolaitawe'sx kaapiya'jni's nwẽese'jsawe'sxtxiwa iipe'ji'kwe. Txã'wẽsa yuutxi's adxa' açe'th.
Txãa pa'ga pkala's nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte misxawedwe. Txã'wẽme' adxa' dud i'kwe'sx tasxna yuhçxa, txã'wẽ ewmée fxi'zesawe'sxtxi kastigaĩ'nja espada pdxi'p zeksa ji'pthu txãaju.

Kxtey nwẽese'jwa'jsa ũsçxa', mwẽese'jwe Dxus Espiritu' na'wẽk we'we' Dxus luuçxtxi: Ewmeesa yu'sa' nwẽese'jmée jxuka knaysawe'sxtxi's ũsu'nja maná ũ'nisa jxaawni ũsa' txã'sna. Sa' teeçx kwet çxihme ũsu'nja, sa' txãa kwette yu' yase u'sesa's fxi'jni yuuna kim yuhwa jiyunimeesa naasáa txãa kweta's jxpa'gasa yuuçxáa jiyuna jĩ'k.
Dxus luuçx Tiatira çxhabtewe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Dxus angela's na'jĩna mfxi'j: Dxus Nçxi'k yafx ipx beeni na'wẽsa ji'phsa txajx çxida çam na'wẽ kwentetesa ji'phsa na'jĩ'k:

Dxus dxi'pte i'kwe'sx ma'wẽ fxi'zesatewa jxuka jiith. I'kwe'sx peeygãani, ũuste jxpubamée Dxusa's yajkxna fxi'zeni, wa'lmée selpiina fxi'zeni txã'wẽ yũuni's jiith. Sa' nyafxíi meeçxa' ãçxha' thaakwe mjĩina ũsi'kwe.

Nawa i'kwe'sx ãhmée yũuni's we'wewa'j ji'pthu: Txãa u'y Jezabela's ma'jĩ'çmée i'kwe, txãa u'ya' Dxus kwe'we'jni'sthu pta'sxi' jĩçxa adxna selpisaatx kaypuba'ja'kh pkal kazxsate kaafxi'ze'jna, sa' tajkx ikhçxa Dxus ĩtxĩmeesatx weçxawa'ja' jĩnak kaapiya'ja'.
Adxa' txãa u'ya's en ũsthu txãa pkala's nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte sxawedkahn. Nawa txã'wẽ yũuya' wa'lçxa txãa pkal kazxsateyçxáak fxi'ze'.
Txãa pa'ga adxa' txãa u'ya's kastigaĩ'nja, aça' txãa u'y kaapiya'jni's nvxihtmeeçxa', txãawe'sxwa seena' yuh pxthaa yuuwa'j ji'phutxna.

Sa' txãa u'y luuçxtxi's ikhe'nja. Txã'wẽ yũute Dxus luuçxa' jxukaysa jiyutxna adxa' txãawe'sx ũus dxiiju yaakxni's jxuka jiyusatewa. Sa' i'kwe'sx teeçxsa na'wẽçxah kĩh yũusatewa, ka'tuwa txã'wẽy yu'nja.
Nawa Tiatira çxhabte ũssa maawa txãa u'y kaapiya'jni's nwẽese'jsamée vxite' na'wẽ eçxthẽ'j kaapiya'jni kim yuhwa jiyunimeesa jĩ'tx txã'snawa nwẽese'jsameewe'sxa' adx yu'kxpehwa'j peejxmeei'kwe.
Nawa ew fxi'zewa'ja's peçxkananuwe adx sxawedpkaçx.
Sa' ewmeesa yu'sa' nwẽese'jmée kĩhtewa jxuka knayçxa adx jxthãasniçxá's nmeh entepkaçx kxtey yuuna fxi'zesa yu'sa' nasa mteewe'sxtxiwa jxuka jxkaajxa' ãjãwa'ja's ũsu'nja,
adx Tatawa ma'wẽga adx jxkaajxa' ãjãwa'ja's ũs txã'wẽy. Aça' nasa jxukaysatx seena' yuh juuna' yuuna jxkaajana, kiwee mitxh açxamée ewsa's ma'wẽga ya'udu' txã'wẽyçxáa yuuni yuutxna.
Sa' khikhiiçte kãasa estrelxa'swa ũsu'nja.
Kxtey nwẽese'jwa'jsa ũsçxa', Dxus Espiritu' na'wẽk we'we' Dxus luuçxtxi txã'sna mwẽese'jwe jĩ'k.

Dxus luuçx Sardis çxhabtewe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Dxus angela's na'jĩna mfxi'j: Dxus tasxte ũssa sietesatx jxkaahsa txajx kusete yu' siete estrelxatx atçxa ũssa na'jĩ'k: Dxus dxi'pte i'kwe'sx ma'wẽ fxi'zesatewa jxuka jiith. Ĩtxĩ ũstha'w jĩna jxtuhthe i'kwe fxi'ze', nawa uuníi na'wẽ ũsi'kwe.

Çxhãçxha fxi'zewa'ja's miiyajkxwe. Txã'wẽme', Dxus yakh fxi'zewa'j yu'sa' kĩhnawa jxuka ivxiituwa'theçxáa yã'j ũsi'kwe. Iiuythu Dxus dxi'pte i'kwe'sxa' ewmée i'kwe fxi'ze'. Pkala's nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte misxawedwe.
Sa' i'kwe'sxtxi ew kaapiya'jni's yajkxçxa txã's yuuçxáana kxtey yuuna mfxi'zewe. Txã'wẽ jxpa'yakxmeete', adxa' kus peswée na'wẽçxáa pa'ja'nja i'kwe'sx tasxte, kim yuhwa jiyunimeete.
Txã'wẽçxawa kxtee Sardis çxhabte maz nasa yu' athni ropa khũuçxhi'jnimeesatx ji'phi'kwe, aça' txãawe'sxa' adx yakh fxi'zetxna ropa çxihmesa athçxa, txãawe'sxa' txã'wẽ fxi'zewa'jsata'.

Ewmeesa yu'sa' nwẽese'jmée kĩhtewa jxuka knaysawe'sxa' ropa çxihmesa kaathe'jni yuutxna. Aça' txãawe'sx yasetxi's khukhme'nja bagaçxte yuhwa uuwa'jmée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'j libruju, wejxwa txãawe'sx yasetxi's pta'sxna kaajiyu'ju'nja adx Tata vxite' txajx angeleswe'sx dxi'pte.
Kxtey nwẽese'jwa'jsa ũsçxa', Dxus Espiritu' na'wẽk we'we' Dxus luuçxtxi txã'sna mwẽese'jwe jĩ'k.

Dxus luuçx Fxiladelfxia çxhabtewe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Dxus angela's na'jĩna mfxi'j: Jxkaahsa Davxid lxavxi's ji'phsa txãa phadeyã'the', kim yuhwa apha'çme', sa' txãa aphte', kim yuhwa phade'çme' txã'wẽ isasa's pta'sxsa' na'jĩ'k:

Dxus dxi'pte i'kwe'sx ma'wẽ fxi'zesatewa jxuka jiith. I'kwe'sx fxi'zewa'j dxi'ja's phadeçxa nvxihtthu txã'sa' kim yuhwa aphya' ãjãmeena. I'kwe'sxa' Dxus dxi'pte açxamée i'kwe çxhãçxha fxi'ze', nawa adx pta'sxni yu'sa' kxtey yuuna ũsi'kwe adx yu'sa' ahçemée.
Aça' txãa pa'ga i'kwe'sx tasxte peejxũkwekahn kaja'nja eçxthẽ'j nasa judiumeeçxawa judiutha'w jĩna ĩsxĩisawe'sxtxi, kxah txãawe'sxa' jiyutxna adxa' i'kwe'sxtxi's peeygãasatewa.
Kĩhtewa jxuka wantãywa'ja's adx jxkaahni's kxtey nwẽese'ji'kwe, txãa pa'ga adxa' jxaawu'nja i'kwe'sxtxi's naa kiwete jxukaysawe'sx ma'wẽ yũutewa jiyuya' nxuswa'j en pa'jana naa kiwe uta txãa ente.
Txaçxmey sxawedu'nja. Ew fxi'zeni's mpa'yajkxwe, kxah txã'wẽ fxi'zepa'ga i'kwe'sxtxi ũswa'j ũsa' txã'sna kim yuhwa kusa'jmeena.

Ewmeesa yu'sa' nwẽese'jmée kĩhtewa jxuka knaysawe'sxtxi's adx Dxus tasxtewe'sx seena' çxhãçxhasa vxitu'nja, aça' bagaçxte yuhwa kasehmeetxna txãajũ. Sa' txãawe'sx kakwete fxi'jçxa ki'pu'nja adx Dxus yase vxite' adx Dxus yujuni çxhab yase Jerusalen u'sesa cielutewe'sx txãatx. Sa' adx yase u'sesa'swa txãawe'sx kakwete yuu fxi'jçxa ki'pu'nja.
Kxtey nwẽese'jwa'jsa ũsçxa', Dxus Espiritu' na'wẽk we'we' Dxus luuçxtxi txã'sna mwẽese'jwe jĩ'k.
Dxus luuçx Laodicea çxhabtewe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Dxus angela's na'jĩna mfxi'j: Ĩsxĩisamée kĩhtewa jxuka isasaçxá's we'wesa kĩh yuhwa meetey ũsyã'kh yu' txã' na'jĩ'k:

Dxus dxi'pte i'kwe'sx ma'wẽ fxi'zesatewa adxa' jxuka jiith. Dxusa's ũusuh jxuka yaakxpa'gamée fxizewa meei'kwe, sa' açxawa meei'kwe. Txã'wẽ yã'jçxa', jxukate fxize yuuwaç wejx ewna, meeçxawa açxa yuuni ewna.
Nawa fxizewa meei'kwe, sa' açxawamée wejkuẽçxáa bajxi'kwe, txãa pa'ga adx yuwejũ i'kwe'sxtxi pugaya'wath.
I'kwe'sxa' wala ji'phsaçxa kĩh yuhwa peejxmée wala ewçxáa fxi'zena ũstha'w jĩ'i'kwe. Nawa kĩh yuhwa ji'phmée sũpxçxáa uyya' ãjãmée nxuste wẽtmeete yuuçxáa fxi'zeni yu'sa' jiyumée ũsi'kwe.
Txãa pa'gath na'wẽ yu'kxpeje': Wala ji'phsa yuu wẽeçxa', adxa'sçxaçxáa mweywe vxyuu beh ew pheu'jnisa. Sũpxçxáa fxi'zeya'mée athwa'j ropa çxihmesanawa mweywe. Sa' yafxtewe'sx yu'çewa mweywe.
Adx peeygãanisatxi's juuna'th we'wena yu'kxpeje' jxukaysatx. Txã'wẽ Dxus yakh çxhãçxha fxi'zeya', pkala's nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte misxawedwe.
Mwẽese'jwe, adxa' vxitxte pa'yana ũsthu. Aça' maawa adx we'weni's wẽse'jçxa ka'ga'the', kxtee u'kaçxa txãa yakh fxi'ze'nja, aça' txãawa adx yakh fxi'zena.
Ewmeesa yu'sa' nwẽese'jmée kĩhtewa jxuka knaysawe'sxtxi's adx jxkaahna ũsnite ih ũswa'jsa vxitu'nja, adxwa ma'wẽtka ewmeesa's nwẽese'jmée jxuka knayçxa adx Tata jxkaahna ũsni pukate kaçx txã'wẽy.
Kxtey nwẽese'jwa'jsa ũsçxa', Dxus Espiritu' na'wẽk we'we' Dxus luuçxtxi txã'sna mwẽese'jwe jĩ'k.
Txãa e'su' ki' thegçxa' uythu cielute vxitx phateçxa ũste. Aça' nyafxíi we'weni na'wẽy we'weni ki' wẽse'th trompeta's seena' sus tukani, sa' na'jĩ'k:
—Ay ẽete myuh, kxtee kaavxya'ja'jya'wath naa e'su kĩhçxa yuune'thewa txãatx.
Txã'jĩçpkaçxha' txãa dudtey Dxus Espiritu aphniith yuuna pa'j, sa' uythu cielute jxkaahna ũsnisa's.
Txãa jxkaahna ũsnite yu', teeçx kaçxçxa u'pu'k, sa' kxtee u'psa yu' iiméh seena' zhiçxkwe zmeena' kuh jwed khikhyna u'pu'k. Sa' txãa peeku'jsu yu' kxthũus iiméh zhiçxkwe kweethna ũsu'k.
Txãa jxkaahna ũsni pukasu yu' vxite jxkaahna ũsni weintikuatro ãhtx ũsu', aça' kxsũ yu' Dxus luuçxtxi jxkaahsa weintikuatrosatx u'pu', ropa çxihme athçxa dxikthesu yu' vxyuu bee korona ji'phsa.
Txãa jxkaahna ũsnijũ yu', kpi'sx kweneni na'wẽsak kasehna ũsu' seena' susna, sa' jxkaahna ũsni dxi'pte yu' siete ipx pki'tanitx behna ũsu' txãa yu' Dxus tasxte ũssa siete espiritusawe'sxtxi yu'.
Txãa dxi'pteyçxáa mar na'wẽsak zhiçxkwe khikhyna ũsu'.
Txãa jxkaahna ũsni pxãhsu vxite' peeku'jsu yu' Dxus vxitnisa ĩtxĩsa pahztxi ũsu', kakwete jxuka yafxçxaçxáa ji'phsa.
Txãa pahzsa nyafxtewe'sxa' león na'wẽk yu'. E'stewe'sxa' tulu na'wẽk yu'. Tekhtewe'sxa' nasa na'wẽk dxi'p ji'phu'. Aça' pahztewe'sxa' uh na'wẽk fxuusa yu'.
Txãa Dxus vxitnisa pahzsa' teeçxsa na'wẽçxah seis fxu ku'tatx ji'phu', sa' yafxçxaçxáa kakwete jxukatx ji'phsa yu'. Txãawe'sxa' kus ma'k yuu en ma'k yuu nawa bagaçxte yuhwa wahtxmeetx na'jĩna ũsu':
Dxus iiméh seena' walasa,
Kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmée iiméh seena' atesa,
Nyafxíiwa txãak yu', sa' ãçxwa txãaíiçxá',
Sa' txãaíiçxáa bagaçxtewa nes yuuna jĩnatx we'wena nes yu'.
Sa' kxtee jxkaahna ũsnite kaçxçxa bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa uumée nes yuuwa'jsa's Dxus vxitnisa txã'wẽ tuuthe'jna weçxaaçpkaçxha',
Dxus luuçxtxi jxkaahsa weintikuatrosawe'sxa' bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa uumée nes yuuwa'jsa tasxte peejxũkweçxa txãawe'sx koronatx txajx tasxte ki'pçxa na'jĩnatx weçxana tuuthe'je':
Kwe'sx Dxus idx yuuçxáa jxpa'gawa'jsag weçxana tuuthe'jni's,
Txãa pa'gatey idxçxaçxáag kĩhnawa jxuka vxit,
Aça' iidx peeygãhçxa taki'jnisaçxaçxáa ũsta' jĩ'tx.
Jxkaahna ũsnite kaçxçxa u'psa' paçu kuseju teeçx eç fxi'jnisa atçxa u'pteth uy. Txãa eç yu' ekaju dxiiju jxuka fxi'jçxa wala ew pelçxa siete selxo yakhku aphni yu'.
Sa' teeçx angel iiméh seena' çxhãçxhasa ũste uythu, txãa yu' na'jĩnak paapẽyi' sus we'wena:
—Txãa eç siete selxo yakh aphnisa's ¿kim sudeçxa phadeya' ãjãkx? jĩ'k.
Nawa cielutewe'sx, naa kiwetewe'sx, naa kiwe dxiijuwe'sx kimçxáa yuhwa txãa eça's phadeya' ãjãwa'jsameetx yu', sa' thegya'çxáa yuhwa ãjãwa'jsameetx yu'.
Txã'wẽ txãa eça's phadeçxa thegya'çxáa yuhwa ãjãwa'jsamée yuupa'ga, adxa' wala ũ'nena ũsu'th.
Aça' kxtee jxkaahna ũssa teeçxsa' na'jĩ'k:
—Jwee yu' ũ'nenu. Teeçx ũsa' Juda nwe'sx, jxkaahsa Davxid ji'thewe'sx wala jxtuhthesa txã' ewmeesa's jxuka knayku, txãa siete selxotx sudeçxa eça's phadeya' ãjãya' jĩ'k.

Txajũ' jxkaahna ũsni pxãhte vxite' Dxus vxitni ĩtxĩsa pahz ũsu'tx vxite' Dxus luuçxtxi jxkaahna ũssawe'sx txã'wẽsawe'sx ksxavxyte Piisxakuẽ na'wẽsa yujuçxa ũste uythu. Txãa yu' kpã'vxitçxa ikhni snxalwa ji'phu'k, sa' siete kaaçxu siete yafxku ji'phu'. Txãa siete yafx yu' na'wẽ Dxus tasxte ũssa siete espiritutx naa kiwete jxuka kaahni yuutx txãatx yu'.
Txajũ' txãa Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa' u'jçxa jxpa'gak na'wẽ jxkaahna ũsnite u'psa' paçu kusete eç yaat yu'k txãa eçna.

Txajũ' txãa eça's jxpa'gaçpkaçxha', Dxus vxitni pahz ĩtxĩsa vxite' Dxus luuçxtxi jxkaahsa weintikuatrosawe'sxa' peejxũkwetx txãa Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa tasxte. Txãa jxkaahsawe'sxa' teeçxsa na'wẽçxah tukani arpa ji'phu'tx, sa' vxyuu bee kopawa ji'phu'tx. Txãa vxyuu bee kopasũ yu' dxuus yatte kabnisa inciensoçxaçxá's uta abnisa'stxi ji'phu'. Aça' txãa yu' Dxusa's peçxkanamée puutx we'wena ũsni jĩnisak yu'.
Sa' memtxi teeçx mem u'sesa na'jĩna:
Idxa' txãa eça's jxpa'gaçxa selxotx sudeya' ãjãwa'jsag,
Txãa pa'gatey ikhni yuuçxa iidx eeju kwe'sxtxi's weygu
Maa nasa ma'wẽsa, yuwe ma'wẽ we'wesa, mteewe'sxwa jxuka Dxus luuçx yuuya' ãjãkahn.
Sa' kwe'sxtxi's jxkaahwa'jsag vxitna pa'j vxite' sacerdote kwe'sx Dxus tasxtewe'sx,
Aça' naa kiwete jxkaajxa' ãjã'nja'w jĩ'tx.

Txajũ' ki' thegçxa' wẽse'th angeleswe'sx iiméh seena' kuhsa we'weni's. Txãawe'sx yu' jxkaahna ũsni peeku'jsu vxite' Dxus vxitni ĩtxĩsa vxite' Dxus luuçxtxi jxkaahna ũssawe'sx peeku'jsutx ũsu'. Txãawe'sxa' iiméh seena' wala kuh yu'tx.
Sa' na'jĩnatx sus we'we':
Piisxakuẽ na'wẽ ikhni yuunisa's bagaçxtewa pu'vxitumée weçxana tuuthe'jna ũswa'ja'.
Sa' txãaçxaçxáa jxuka jxpa'gawa'jsa', jxkaahsa yuuwa'j, wala seena' ji'phsa yuuwa'j.
Kĩhtewa jxuka jiisa, iiméh çxhãçxhasa txã'wẽ yuuwa'jsa' jĩ'tx.
Sa' Dxus taki'jni cielutewe'sx, naa kiwetewe'sx, naa kiwe dxiijuwe'sx, martewe'sx kxtee kĩhçxah ũstxna txã'wẽsa jxuka na'jĩna we'weni'swa wẽse'th:
Weçxana tuuthe'jwa'ja' jxkaahna ũsnite kaçxçxa u'psa's vxite' Piisxakuẽ na'wẽ ikhni yuuk txã'sna.
Sa' jxtuhthe jxkaajxa' ãjãwa'jsa' bagaçxtewa jĩ'tx.
Aça' txã'jĩçpkaçxha', Dxus vxitni ĩtxĩsa pahzsa':
—Txã'wẽ kxtey yuuna jĩ'tx. Naapkaçxha' Dxus luuçxtxi jxkaahsa weintikuatrosawe'sxa' peejxũkweçxa weçxana tuuthe'je'tx bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa uumée nes yuuwa'jsa's.
Txajũ' uythu Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa' siete selxo nyafxtewe'sxa's sudeçte, sa' wẽse'th Dxus vxitni ĩtxĩsa teeçxsa' seena' sus na'jĩna:
—Yuhçxa mtheg jĩni's.

Aça' txã'wẽ wẽse'jçxa', thegçxa uythu teeçx jiba çxihmesa's, kxtee a'jsa yu' kusete ũpanisa arko yaasesa'sku ji'phu'. Txajũ' txã'sa' teeçx koronak ũsni yuu, aça' txãa yu' kĩhtewa jxuka puiiya' jiisak kaseh, mteewa puiiçxa knaywa'jsa.
Txajũ' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa' vxite selxo's sudek e'stewe'sxna, aça' wẽse'th Dxus vxitni ĩtxĩsa e'zsatewe'sx na'jĩna:
—Mtheg jĩni's.
Sa' uythu vxite jiba behsa kasejeçte, aça' kxtee a'jsa yu's jxkaahnik yuu, naa kiwete wẽt fxi'zeni's ivxiitute nasaa pwe'sx puutx ikhna u'khan. Sa' teeçx espada walasak ũsni yuu.
Txajũ' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa' vxite selxo's sudek tekhtewe'sxna, aça' wẽse'th Dxus vxitni ĩtxĩsa tekhsatewe'sx na'jĩna:
—Mtheg jĩni's. Aça' uythu vxite jiba khũçxsa's aça' kxtee a'jsa yu' kusete isanisa balansa yaasesa'sku ji'phu'.
Sa' wẽse'th Dxus vxitni ĩtxĩsa ksxavxyu teeçx na'jĩna we'weni's:
—E'z libra skuutxhçxáana teen mjĩinite ãhpa'ga txweywa'j yuuna, sa' seis libra cebada'swa txakwey pa'gate txweywa'j yuuna. Nawa aceite vxino txã'wẽsa yuutxi'sa' ivxiitupu'n jĩ'k.
Txajũ' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa' vxite selxo's sudek pahztewe'sxna, aça' wẽse'th Dxus vxitni ĩtxĩsa pahzsatewe'sx na'jĩna:
—Mtheg jĩni's.

Aça' txã'wẽ wẽse'jçxa' thegçxa uythu teeçx jiba seena' ũukhũukhsa's, aça' kxtee a'jsa yu' Ikhsa jĩna kxsusni yasek ji'phu'. Naapkaçxha' txãa e'ste' uusaawe'sx yujuni jĩnisak vxyaa. Txãa jibate a'jsa yu'sa' jxkaahnik yuu naa kiwete nasatx puupxãhn ãatuw ikhkahn gweçxa vxitçxa wẽjẽ kaapa'ja'jçxa weewa txã'wẽy kaapa'ja'jçxa yu'kh eçx juuna'sawa kaapena'jçxa.
Txajũ' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa' vxite selxo's sudek tahçtewe'sxna. Aça' Kristo's selpiipa'ga ikhni yuutx txãawe'sxçxaçxáa altal tasxte ũsteth uy.
Sa' txãawe'sxa' na'jĩnatx sus we'we':
—Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa atesa idxa' kĩhtewa kxtey yuusáa ¿makwe txaçx jxthẽeyuuya'waga, kwe'sxtxi ahçeçxa ikhtxi txãawe'sxtxi kastigãyya'? jĩte',
pasçxa':
—Ãçxhíi yu' ũuçxkwe uythãsna jxkaasena meswe, Kristo's selpiipa'ga i'kwe'sx na'wẽy ikhni yuuwa'j peejxta' txãawe'sxtxi kxtey yuuna jxã'phkaçx jĩçxa', ropa çxihmesatx kaathe'jni yuu.
Txajũ' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa' vxite selxo's sudek seistewe'sxna. Aça' uythu seena' ehd u'jweçte seka' jxuka khũçx kãjk kweethmeepkaçx, a'tewa jxuka ee na'wẽk beh yuu.
Naapkaçxha' cielute estrelxa' ũsxitx naa kiwete, fxtũ yũnwa ma'wẽta wejxa çxhãçxha kẽese'the jxuka ũsxi' txã'wẽtx yuu.
Aça' cielu' eç na'wẽ jxuka pelni yuuçxa vxyaame'. Naapkaçxha' thã'j vxiç vxite' ĩkh pxãhsu kiwe u'psa jxuka upenitx yuu ẽse'sete.

Aça' naa kiwete jxkaahsawe'sxa' wala ũukhçxa kiwe kafxsu vxite' kwet kafxsu jxuka jxsũuthtxi, walasawe'sx, ji'phsawe'sx, npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx, jxtuhthesawe'sx, vxite' patron kusete selpiina fxi'zesawe'sx vxite' patron ji'phmée wẽt fxi'zesawe'sx jxukatx txã'wẽ yũu.
Sa' txã'wẽ yũuçxa thã'j vxiç vxite' kwet penxatx na'jĩnatx we'we':
—Kwe'sxtxi jxuka akaaçxçxa kaavxya'ja'jnu na'wẽ jxkaahna u'pa' txajx dxi'pte, vxite' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa seena' yuh kastigãyya' ũsa' txã'wẽsa dxi'pte.
Txã'wẽme', txã'wẽ seena' kastigãywa'j en ãjk, aça' ¿kim kxte' wantãyya' ãjãkx? jĩ'tx.

Txãa e'su' pahz angeleswe'sxtxith uy, txãawe'sxa' naa kiwe peeku'the puutx pahz ahtetx yujuçxa ũsu', naa kiwete pahz ajũ wejxa kasehsatx ka'ga'jmée yupna, naa kiwete, marte, yu'khsu mtee yuhwa wejxakahmen.
Sa' vxite angel uythu txãa yu' sek kãani ju'guk yuh yu', Dxus ĩtxĩsa selxo's atçxa. Txãa Dxus angela' susku we'we pahz angeleswe'sx ũsu'tx naa kiwe vxite' mar txãatx suwwa'jsatx na'jĩna:
—Naa kiwe, mar, yu'kh mtee yuhwa ãçxhíi yu' suwnuwe, Dxusna selpisaawe'sx dxikthesu kwe'sx iisawa'jmeyna yu' jĩ'k.
Txajũ' wẽse'th Israelita ji'jwe'sx iisawa'jnisa jxuka yu' ciento kuarenta y kuatro miltxi yu'.
Judá ji'j, doce mil; Rubén ji'j, doce mil; Gad ji'j, doce mil;
Aser ji'j, doce mil; Nefxtalí ji'j, doce mil; Manasés ji'j, doce mil;
Simeón ji'j, doce mil; Levxí ji'j, doce mil; Isakar ji'j, doce mil;
Zabulón ji'j, doce mil; José ji'j, doce mil; Benjamín ji'j, doce mil; txãawe'sxtxi jxukaçxah yu' txazkuẽe yu'.

Txãa e'su' ki' thegçxa' nasa iiméh wala kuh uythu. Txãawe'sxa' maa nasa ma'wẽsa majũwe'sxwa jxukatx yu', yuwe fxiyfxiyçxah we'wesa. Sa' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa jxkaahna u'pni peeku'jsutx yujuçxa ũsu'. Txãawe'sxtxi' kim yuhwa isaya' ãjãmeeta', iiméh wala kuh yu'tx txãa pa'ga. Sa' ropa çxihmesa athçxa kusesu yu' lamus eçnatx yaat yu'.
Txãawe'sx jxukaysa na'jĩnatx sus we'we':
Kwe'sx Dxus jxkaahna u'pa' vxite' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa txãawe'sx yuuçxáatx ewte neeyũuwa'ja's ũs jĩ'tx.

Aça' Dxus jxkaahna ũsni peeku'jsu vxite' Dxus luuçxtxi jxkaahsawe'sx peeku'jsu vxite' Dxus vxitni ĩtxĩsa pahz ũsu'tx txãa peeku'jsu angeleswe'sx yujuçxa ũssa' jxkaahna ũsni ju'gu kiwete pa'j kĩiçhuçxa Dxusa's na'jĩnatx neewe'we':
Weçxana tuuthe'jwa'ja' kwe'sx Dxusa's.
Txãaçxáa kĩhtewa jxuka jiisa'.
Txã' bagaçxtewa çxhãçxhasa jxtuhthe jxkaajxa' ãjãwa'jsa' jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' Dxus luuçxtxi jxkaahsa teeçxsa' na'jĩnak adxa's pẽjx:
—Na'wẽ ropa çxihme athçxa ũsta' txãawe'sxa' ¿kimtxna, sa' majũ yuusatxna? jĩte':
—Txãawe'sxtxi' idxíiçxáa jiine'ga jĩnath pas. Aça' txã' na'wẽk pta'sx:
—Txãawe'sxa' iiméh seena' wala nxuste skhẽwsaata', sa' txãawe'sx athni ropatxi's thethçxa Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa ikhni yuuk txajx eete yaatesata'.
Txãasa Dxus jxkaahna ũsni tasxte ũsta', en ma'k yuu meeçxa' kus ma'k yuu nawa bagaçxtewa selpiina nes yuuwa'jsata'. Aça' kxtee jxkaahna u'psa yakh ũssa' kĩhte yuhwa peejxmée fxi'zetxna.
Txãa pa'ga txãawe'sxa' ãçxha' pxthaa yuumeetxna wẽena yũ'wẽena. Sa' sektewa çxhavxyna yaaçxana fxi'zemeetxna,
txãa pa'gatey Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa jxkaahna ũsni ksxavxyte ũsa' txajx jxpe'jni yuutxna. Sa' yu' bagaçxte yuhwa pçuwa'jmeesa's yusni yuutxna. Aça' Dxusíi txãawe'sx ũ'neni yafx yu'txi's khukhuna jĩ'k.
Txajũ' txãa Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa' vxite selxo's sudek sietetewe'sxna. Naapkaçxha' cielute kĩh yuhwa susmée sxuuna'k yuu, media ora ãhpkaçx.
Txã'wẽ yũuni skhẽwniijũ' siete angeleswe'sxtxi uythu Dxus tasxte yujuçxa ũste, aça' txãawe'sxtxi'sa' jxukaysatx tukani trompeta ũsnitx yuu.

Txã'wẽ yuuçpkaçxha' Dxus angel vxite kũjk vxyuu bee kopa's atçxa, sa' altal tasxtek yuju. Aça' seena' wala ũsni yuuk txãa vxyuu bee kopate abçxa kabwa'ja's. Txãa yu'sa' vxyuu bee altal ũsu'k jxkaahna ũsni tasxte kxtee kabwa'kh yuu, Dxus luuçx jxukaysawe'sx Dxus yakh puutx we'weçpkaçxha' kabkahn.
Aça' Dxus angel txã'wẽ kabte', txãa ah yu' Dxus tasxte pa'kh tejka, Dxus luuçx jxukaysawe'sx Dxus yakh puutx we'weni yã'jçxa.

Txajũ' txãa Dxus angela' txãa vxyuu bee kopate utak çxhã'çxha ipx ji'phsa's ãsx kxtee altaltewe'sxna, sa' txã'wẽ yũuçxak kiwe kajkwesu ẽesu yahta. Aça' txã'wẽ yuuçpkaçxha', kpi'sx seena' kwehnena sus we'wena, ehdwa txã'wẽk seena' u'j.
Txajũ' txãa siete angeleswe'sxa' trompetatx tujkaya' yujutx.
Aça' Dxus angel nyafxtewe'sxa' txajx trompeta's tujkak, naapkaçxha' naa kiwete kwetuba ãsxku ee ka'dnisa vxite' ipx yã'jçxa. Aça' naa kiwe pxãhn ãatuwku çxhavxy, yu'khwa txã'wẽy jxuka.
Txajũ' Dxus angel e'ztewe'sxwa txajx trompeta's tujkak, naapkaçxha' thã'j vxiç wala na'wẽsa ipxçxaçxáak behna ũsu' txã'snak marte akhni yuu. Txã'wẽ yuute', mara' pxãhn ãatuwku eeçxaçxáa yuu.
Aça' kxtee kĩhçxah ne'ta ĩtxĩsa ũsu' txãa yu' jxuka uutx mar eeçxaçxáa yuunisatewe'sx yu'. Aça' barkowa pxãhn ãatuwtxi vxitu.

Txajũ' Dxus angel tekhtewe'sxwa txajx trompeta's tujkak, naapkaçxha' cieluju teeçx estrelxa seena' walasa wetek ipxçxaçxáa behna. Yu'walasu vxite' yu'le'çxkuẽsuwa naa kiwete pxãhn ãatuwku pẽethehna wete.
Txãa estrelxa' Seena' Yaasak yaase yu', aça' naa kiwete pxãhn ãatuwtxi yu'a' yaasaçxaçxáa yuu. Aça' nasa' seena' wala uutx, txã'wẽ yu' yaasaçxaçxáa yuupa'ga tudxya' ãjãmeeçxa.

Txajũ' Dxus angel pahztewe'sxwa txajx trompeta's tujkak, naapkaçxha' sekwa puupxãhn ãatuwku kweethmée neeyũu. Aça' a'te, estrelxawa txã'wẽyçxáatx puupxãhn ãatuw kweethmée neeyũu. Aça' txãa suwenisa yu' kweethmeeta'. Aça' en yu' wejkuẽ yuuçxáak khikhyna neeyũu, naapkaçxha' kus yu' jweeíiçxáak seena' çxhi'dxsa yuu.
Txajũ' thegçxa' uythu Dxus angel cielusu fxuhna u'jweçte seena' sus we'wena na'jĩna:
—Dxus angel tekhsawe'sx trompeta's tukani susuçpkaçxha', seena' yuh ũukhũukhsa yuuna naa kiwete ũssa yakha' jĩ'k.
Txajũ' Dxus angel tahçtewe'sxwa txajx trompeta's tujkak, naapkaçxha' uythu cieluju estrelxa naa kiwete weteeçte. Aça' txãa wetesa estrelxa's lxavxi's ũsnik yuu, kafx seena' dxiisatewe'sxna.
Txajũ' txãa kafx seena' dxiisa's phadek, naapkaçxha' orno walate ah na'wẽk kaseh, sa' txãa aja' jxuka nuyçxhi'dxku sekna vxite' ẽesu jxuka.
Txãa ahte yu' khã'sxtxi kaseh naa kiwete jxuka fxuhna. Aça' txãa khã'sx yu' yãjaya' ãjãwa'jsatx yu', usmitx ma'wẽta aka yãja' txã'wẽ.
Nawa naa kiwete fxtũ tasx, jxũth tasx çẽysa yu'sa' kĩh yuhnawa suwwa'jsameetx yu', naasáa Dxus selxo's dxikthesu maa yuhwa ji'phmeesaçxaçxá'stxi yãjawa'jsa yu'.
Nawa nasatx ikhwa'jsa yu' yu'çmeeta', naasáa tahç a'te ãhpkaçx seena' wala kaaka'jwa'jsaçxáatx yu'. Sa' txãa akasa yu' usmitx yãjani na'wẽ seena' aka yuuwa'jsatx yu'.
Txãa ensu' nasa' uuwa'ja's pakweçxawa, uymeetxna. Makwe uuwa'ja's pakwetewa, txãawe'sxtxi' uu en pa'jmeena.
Txãa khã'sxa' jibatx gweçxate puiiya' u'jweççxa pheu'jnisa na'wẽtx yu'. Dxikthesu yu' vxyuu bee korona na'wẽsatx ji'phu', sa' dxi'pa' nasaa dxi'p na'wẽtx yu'.
U'y na'wẽtx ya'iidxkhas yu', sa' txãawe'sx ki'tha' león ki'th na'wẽsatx ji'phu'.
Txãawe'sx kakwe yu' çam na'wẽsaçxaçxá'stxi ya'iiphuph yu', sa' txãawe'sx fxujaçte susni yu' kaçxetilxa jiba wezxnisa kuhsa u'jweççxa ma'wẽ susukx txã'wẽtx susu'.
Sa' txãawe'sx mez yu' usmitx mez na'wẽtx yãjawa'j ji'phu', nasatx yãjaçxa tahç a'te uta kaaka'jwa'jsa.
Txãa khã'sxa' teeçx ne'jwe'sx ji'phu'tx, kafx seena' dxiite ũssa. Txãa ne'jwe'sxa' hebreo yuwete yu' Abadonku yaase yu', sa' griego yuwete' Apolionku yaase yu' meeçxawa Ivxiitusa jĩnisa.
Txajũ' Juan we'weçxa':
—Nyafxte seena' ũukhũukhsa yu' skhẽwku, nawa e'zíi peejxta' jĩ'k.
Txajũ' Dxus angel seistewe'sxwa txajx trompeta's tujkak, naapkaçxha' Dxus tasxte vxyuu bee altal pahz vxiçsu we'weni pthũusek.
Sa' Dxus angel seistewe'sx trompeta ji'phu'k txã'sa' na'jĩnak jxkaahni yuu:
—Pahz angeleswe'sx tudni ũsta' Eufxrates yu'wala pukate txãawe'sxtxi' mitxhwete jĩna.

Txajũ' txãa angeleswe'sxtxi'sa' txhwetenitx yuu, nasa naa kiwetewe'sxtxi puupxãhn ãatuw ikhkahn. Txã'wẽ yũuwa'jsa ne'ta pheu'jni ũsu', kĩh ora, maa ente, kĩh a'te, maa anxute txã'wẽ yuuwa'jsaçxawa txãa en ãhtewe'sx.
Txajũ' txãa jiba seena'su a'jsatx jiyuth. Txãawe'sxa' seena' wala kuh yu'tx, dos cientos milxones.

Na'wẽ jiba seena'satx uythu, aça' txãa jibate a'jsa yu' puiiwa'j txãawe'sx peçxusu ya'phuphnisa ji'phu'tx tekh jwed, teeçxsa' beh, vxite' çẽy, vxite' lemsa. Aça' jiba yu' león na'wẽtx ya'iidxiktheh yu', sa' yuwesu yu' ipx vxite' ah vxite' asufxre txã'wẽsatx kasehna ũsu'.
Aça' naa kiwete nasa puupxãhn ãatuwtxi uu, txã'wẽ jiba yuwesu tekh jwed kasehçxa ikhpa'ga.
Txãa jiba' yuweju vxite' mezuhtx ewmée yũuwa'ja's ji'phu'. Txãawe'sx meza' ul na'wẽtx yu' dxikthé ji'ph, txãasatx txãaju ikhya' ãjã'.

Nawa txãa ewmeesa vxyaatx txãate uusaamée nasa yu' txãawe'sx ewmée yũuna fxi'zeni's nvxihtmeeta'. Eçxthẽ'j jxkaahni'swa peçxkanamée nwẽese'jna nestxi yu'. Sa' vxyuu beh, vxyuu çxihme, çam, kwet, fxtũ, txãatxtxi nasa na'wẽ piisaçxa neewe'wena nes yu'. Txãa piisanisa' uysaawameeta', sa' wẽse'jsawameeta', u'juya'wa ãja'çmeeta'.
Sa' ikhna fxi'zeni'swa nvxihtmeeta', sa' dxijxuuna, kazx pkal yuuna, pesweena txã'wẽ yũunisatxwa nvxihtmeeta'.
Txajũ' Dxus angel vxite uythu seena' çxhãçxhasa cieluju tãaph pxãhte kĩjaçte, sa' dxikthete yu' kxthũusku ji'phu'. Txajx dxi'pa' sek na'wẽk kweethe', sa' txajx çxida yu' ipx na'wẽçxaçxáatx yu'.
Kusete yu' libru le'çxkwesa'sku phadeçxa ji'phu', sa' paçu çxidaju yu' martek yuju, sa' jebu çxidaju' kiwetek yuju.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxak sus we'we león pebeeçxa ma'wẽ sus seena' pebeekx txã'wẽ. Sa' txã'wẽ seena' pebeeçpkaçxha', siete kpi'sx we'wenik pthũuse.
Txã'wẽ siete kpi'sx we'weni's jiyuçxa', fxi'jya'wath yu'. Nawa cielujũ na'jĩna we'weni'sthu wẽse'j:
—Txãa siete kpi'sx we'wenitx jiyug txãatxi's kim yuhtxwa pta'sxna fxi'jnu jĩ'k.
Txãjũ' txãa Dxus angel marte vxite' kiwete yujuçxa ũssa' paçu kuse's cielute kiisçxa
jurãyku bagaçxte yuhwa uumée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'jsa na'wẽ kĩjkĩhtxwa jxuka vxitku txajx yase's kxsusçxa na'jĩna:
—Ãçxha' jwee yu' jxthẽeyuumeena.

Dxus angel sietetewe'sx txajx trompeta's tujkaya' takheçpkaçxha', nmeh ente ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja's ne' Dxusa' pheu'jçxa ji'phu' txã' jxuka kxtey yuuna. Sa' Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna selpisaawe'sxtxi ma'wẽne' pta'sx txãa yu' jxuka kxtey yuuna jĩk.
Cielujũ we'weçxa' eçte kuçx fxi'jnu jĩk txã' ki' we'wek adx yakh na'jĩna:
—Dxus angel na'wẽ paçu çxida's marte txahçxa vxite çxida's kiwete txahçxa ũssa' kusete libru ji'pha' txãa libru's jxpa'gaya' me'j jĩte',
Dxus angel tasxte utxaaçxa txãa libru's pẽjxthu. Aça' na'jĩnak pta'sx:
—Jxpa'gaçxa mẽ'. Nawa iidx yuwete yu' mil na'wẽ nxusxa pẽethejena, naapkaçxha' iidx tutxhte yu', wala seena' yajana jĩ'k.
Txajũ' Dxus angel kuseju jxpa'gaçxa libru's ũ'th, aça' adx yuwete yu' mil na'wẽk nxusxa pẽetheeh, nawa adx tutxhte yu' seena' wala yaak.
Txajũ' na'jĩnak jxkaah adxa's:
—Na'wẽ Dxus kaajiyu'kh txã'sa' pta'sxya' ki' u'jwene'ga, çxhaab iisa, nasa msuuwe'sxwa, fxiyfxiy we'wesa, jxkaahsawe'sx txã'wẽsatx jĩ'k.
Txajũ' isani khĩh ũsçxa na'wẽk jxkaah:
—Dxuus yat vxite' altal txãa makwetewa jiyuya' miisa, sa' Dxusna neewe'weya' kxtee u'kasa maazkuẽetewa jiyuya' miisa.
Nawa Dxus yatte patxu ekajuwe'sx yu'sa' isanu. Txã'wẽme' txajuwe'sxa's vxite nasatxku ũsni yuu, aça' txãawe'sxa' jxuka suwuutxna Dxus çxhab atesa's kuarenta y dos a'te ãhpkaçx.
Naapkaçxha' adxna selpisáa e'z kaja'nja, adx yuwe's mil doscientos sesenta en ãhpkaçx pta'sxna ũskahn. Txãawe'sxa' nasa uute nxusna athnisa ropa khũçxsa ji'ph yuutxna.
Txãa e'zsawe'sxa' e'z oliwo fxtũ tasx ũsu'tx txã'wẽsata', vxite' bela txaahni e'z ũsu'tx naa kiwete Dxus tasxte txã'wẽsaíiçxáata'.
Txãawe'sxtxi' maaíi yu' pkxuu wẽjẽwáatxna, nawa txãawe'sx yuwesu ipx kasehçxa jxuka kabuna açesawe'sxtxi's. Aça' txã'wẽ yũute', maawa pkxuu wẽesa' uu en ji'phutxna.

Aça' txãa selpisaawe'sxa' cielu's aphya' ãjãwa'jsata', Dxus yuwe's pta'sxwa'j en pçuupkaçx nus pa'khamen. Sa' yu'a'swa eeçxaçxáa vxit-ya' ãjãçxa seena' wala kxũusu'jwa'jsata' naa kiwete kĩh weewa nuypa'jna, txãawe'sxtxi ma'wẽ yũuweçxtewa txã'wẽ yũutxna.
Nawa txãawe'sx mjĩia's jxã'jaçpkaçxha', eçx iiméh seena'sa kafx seena' dxiijũ kãhçxa txãawe'sxtxi puiiçxa knayçxa ikhena.
Txãawe'sx uuníi kakwe's na'wẽ kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa kluuste uuk txãa çxhab wala klxiikhunsu wãataani yuutxna. Txãa çxhaba's Sodoma vxite' Egipto na'wẽsa' jĩ'tx.
Aça' tekh en ẽepxãh ãhpkaçx nasa maa çxhabuwe'sx, ma'wẽsa fxiyfxiy we'wesa, maa kiwejuwe'sxwa jxukasa txãa uuníi kakwetxi's uyuutxna, nawa kaapeda'j yu' meetxna.

Txajũ' nasa naa kiwetewe'sxa' seena' wala weçxaatxna txã'wẽ uupa'ga, sa' txã'wẽ weçxaweete txãawe'sx ji'phuni's puutx peesutxna. Txãawe'sx yakh yu' iiméh seena' wala ewmeesa na'wẽsa yuutxna txãa e'z piçthẽ'jsa Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna ũssawe'sxa', txãa pa'ga uute' wala weçxaatxna.
Nawa uuníi tekh en ẽepxãh skhẽwniijũ', Dxusa' ĩtxĩ vxitku aça' ki' kiitetx. Txã'wẽ yũute', iiméh seena' wala ũukhtxi jxukaysa uyna ũssawe'sxa'.
Txajũ' txãa e'z selpisaawe'sxa' wẽse'jtx seena' sus we'weni cielujũ na'jĩna:
—Ayte cielute ẽete myuhwe jĩçpkaçxha', tãaph pxãhte u'jçxa cielute tejkatx, txãawe'sxtxi açesawe'sx uyna ũste.

Txã'wẽ yuuçpkaçxha', seena' wala ehd u'jçxa txãa çxhaba's ma'wẽ yu' suwçxa ejx jxũna u'kh, aça' siete mil nasatx uu txãa ehd u'pha'ga. Txã'wẽ yũute', nasa neeyũusa' iiméh seena' wala ũukhçxa Dxus cielute ũssa's pxthaa we'wena tuuthe'jtx.
Txajũ' Juan we'weçxa': Seena' ũukhũukhsa e'ztewe'sx yu' skhẽwku, nawa jxthẽeyuumeena tekhtewe'sxwa jĩ'k.
Txajũ' Dxus angel sietetewe'sxwa txajx trompeta's tujkak, aça' seena' sus we'wenisa pthũuse'tx cielujũ na'jĩna:
Naa kiwete jxkaahna ũsnisa' jxuka kwe'sx Tata vxite' txajx Txhitxhnisa Kristo txãawe'sx jĩiçxaçxáatx yuuna pa'j.
Aça' ãçxha' txãaçxaçxáa jxkaajana bagaçxtewa jĩnatx we'we.
Txajũ' Dxus luuçxtxi jxkaahsa weintikuatrosawe'sx Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite ũssa' kiwete kĩiçhuçxa Dxusa's neewe'wetx na'jĩna:
Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa idxa's weçxa'tha'w, Dxus iiméh seena' walasag.
Idxa' nyafxíiwa idxíiçxáag yu', sa' ãçxwa txãaíiçxáag, sa' bagaçxtewa idx yuuçxáa nes yuuwa'jsag.
Txãa pa'gatey kĩhtewa jxuka ãjãwa'ja's idxçxaçxáa ji'phgu,
Txãasa ãçxha' jxkaahna ũsgu.
Naa kiwete nasa' idxa's ahçetx, nawa txãawe'sxtxi kastigãywa'j ena' ãjk.
Aça' txã'wẽy uusaawe'sxtxiwa kastigaĩne'ga.
Sa' walasa ma'tx yuu meeçxa' le'çxkwesa ma'tx yuu nawa idx yakh txutemée fxi'zeçxa iidx yase's açewe'wesameewe'sxtxi' deweene'ga ew yũuna iidx yuwe's pta'sxna selpiina fxi'zepa'ga.
