Naapkaçxha' naa kiwete suwna ũssawe'sxtxi's ka'tu' ivxiitune'ga jĩnatx we'we.

Txajũ' cielute Dxus ũsni phatek, aça' na'wẽ Dxusa' nasa yakh puutx we'wek txãa puutx we'weni's fxi'jçxa kajate jxaawni yuuk txãa kaja' vxyaak. Naapkaçxha' kpi'sx kwehneçxa seena' susku kwetuba seena' wala ãsxna, aça' ehdwa u'kh.
Txajũ' ẽe walaju na'wẽk seena'sa vxyaa: teeçx u'y txajx kakwete yu' sekçxaçxáa ji'phsa a'tete yujuçxak ũsu', sa' dxikthete yu' teeçx korona doce estrelxa ji'phsa'sku ji'phu'.
Txãa u'ya' nasatek ãçã'aç yu', sa' seena' wala pxthaa yakana pebe'k.
Txãa e'su' ẽe walaju ki' vxite na'wẽk vxyaa: eçx behsa iiméh seena'sa siete dxikthé ji'phsa, diez kaaçxuk ji'phu', sa' dxikthé iisa teeçx koronak ji'phu'.
Txajx mezu yu' estrelxatx puupxãhn ãatuwku suwçxa naa kiwekhẽ pũsx. Sa' txãa eçx seena'sa yu' u'y nasa kasejxa' ũsu'k txãa yaçtek ũythasna yuju, nasa kasejeçpkaçxha' luuçxa's ũ'ya'.
Txajũ' txãa u'ya' teeçx luuçx pihçku ji'phu, txãak naa kiwete jxuka jxkaahwa'jsa yu' iiméh wala juuna'. Txajũ' txãa luuçxa's kusa'jçxa, Dxus jxkaahna ũsnitek jxũna u'jni yuu.
Aça' txãa u'ya' nasa u'pnimée kiwetek ũphna u'j, txãa jĩi Dxus pheu'jçxa ji'phune' kxtee ũsya'. Kxtee pa'the', mil doscientos sesenta en ãhpkaçx sã'jĩni ũswa'jsa'.
Txãa e'su' cielute puiiwa'kh u'pu', aça' Dxus angel npiiçthẽ'jsa Migwela' txajx angeleswe'sx yakh puiitx eçx seena'sa yakh. Aça' eçx seena'sawa txãa yakh ũssawe'sx yakh kasejk puiiya'.
Nawa eçxa' knayme', sa' txãawe'sxa' cielute ũswa'j ji'phmeetx neeyũu.

Txãa pa'ga eçx seena'sa's ekaju wãataanik yuu, txãaíik txãniitey ul jĩnisa yu', naa kiwetewe'sx jxukaysatx ĩsxĩina kaypuba'jsa Eçxthẽ'kh yaase yu'. Txãa eçxthẽ'j vxite' txãa yakh ũssa jxukaysatx naa kiwekhẽ wãataanitx yuu.
Txajũ' cieluju sus we'wena na'jĩni'sthu wẽse'j:

—Ewte neeyũuwa'j en pa'kh, kwe'sx Dxus txãaçxaçxáa jxkaahwa'j en vxite' Dxus txhitxhnisa Kristowa txã'wẽy jxkaahwa'j en. Txãa pa'gatey kwe'sx yakhthẽ'jwe'sxtxi ewmeesata' jĩna pãatxhĩ'khna ũssa's ekaju wãataanik yuu, txãaíik bagaçxtewa pu'vxitumée nes yu' kwe'sxtxi pãatxhĩ'khna.

Txã'wẽtewa, kwe'sx yakhthẽ'jwe'sxa' eçx ewmeesa's knaytxi, na'wẽ Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa ikhni uuk txajx eeju vxite' txajx kaapiya'jni's pu'vxitumée pta'sxna fxi'zepa'ga. Txãawe'sxa' Kristo's selpiipa'ga uu en pa'thewa txã'sa' nxusmée uuya'çxáatx ũsu'.

Txã'wẽ ewmeesa's knaypa'ga weçxweçxa miiyajkxwe, cielute fxi'zesawe'sx jxuka. Nawa seena' yuh wala ũukhũukha' naa kiwete mteewe'sxwa jxukaysa yakha'. Txã'wẽ ũukhũukh yuukahníi eçxthẽ'ja' i'kwe'sxtxi pkxuuya' kĩjk seena' wala ũusaçxana, sa' kuh enmée ũswa'ja's jiia' txãasa txã'wẽ ũusaçxana ũsa'.
Sa' txãa eçx seena'sa' kiwekhẽ wãataani yuuçxa', txãa u'y luuçx ji'phusa's ikhya' pakwek.
Nawa txãa u'ya's uuh wala fxu ku'ta na'wẽsa's ũsnik yuu, eçx seena'sa tasxu iyuna u'jçxa nasa u'pnimée kiwete txajx ũswa'the fxuhna u'khan, kxteea' tekh anxu pxãhtepkaçx sã'jĩnik fxi'zewa'jsa yu'.
Txajũ' txãa eçxa' yuwesuk yu' nuysẽh, yu'a's seena' wala nuywalaaçxa txãa u'ya's yu' jxũna u'khan.
Nawa txãa eçx yuwesu yu'sẽesa's kiwe' jxuka çxazxaçxa txãa u'ya's nwe'wek.

Txã'wẽ yũute', txãa eçx seena'sa' txãa u'ya's jweeíiçxáak seena' wala ũusaçxa. Sa' txãa u'y ji'jwe'sx yakh puiiya'k u'j Dxus jxkaahnitxi's nwẽese'jna Jesukristo kaapiya'jni's jxpubamée nwẽese'jsawe'sx yakh.

Txã'wẽ yũute', txãa eçx seena'sa' txãa u'ya's jweeíiçxáak seena' wala ũusaçxa. Sa' txãa u'y ji'jwe'sx yakh puiiya'k u'j Dxus jxkaahnitxi's nwẽese'jna Jesukristo kaapiya'jni's jxpubamée nwẽese'jsawe'sx yakh.

Txãa e'su' mar pukateth yujuçxa ũsu', sa' uythu eçx seena' kazx ũukhũukhsa mar pxãjũ kasejeçte, sa' siete dxikthé ji'phçxa diez kaaçxuk ji'phu', kaaçxu iisa teeçx koronak ji'phu'. Sa' txãa dxikthesu yu' Kristo's seena' kazx açewe'wenak fxi'jni yu'.

Txãa eçx seena' kazx ũukhũukhsa' txiklxi na'wẽk jxkajkwe yu', çxida yu' oso na'wẽtx yu', sa' yuwe yu' león na'wẽk yu'. Aça' eçxthẽ'ja' txãa eçx seena' kazx ũukhũukhsa's kĩh yũuya'wa ãjãwa'ja's ũsçxa txajx jxkaahna ũsni'swa dukhku, sa' kĩhtewa jxuka pu'çxya'k neeyũu.

Txãa eçx seena' kazx ũukhũukhsa dxikthé teeçxsa yu' uupçxãjk kpã'yuuni yu', nawa txãa kpã' yu' wẽetniyã'kh yu', aça' naa kiwete nasa jxukaysa txãa eçx seena' kazx ũukhũukhsaçxá'stxi weçxana utxaaçxa neewe'we.
Sa' eçxthẽ'ja'swa weçxana neewe'wetx, txã'wẽ eçx seena' kazx ũukhũukhsa's jxkaahwa'jsa vxitçxa ki'ppa'ga. Sa' eçx seena' kazx ũukhũukhsa yu'sa' na'jĩnatx neewe'we':
—¿Kim naa na'wẽy seena'sa ũski, sa' kim txãa yakh puiiya' çxhãçxhakx? jĩ'tx.

Sa' eçx seena' kazx ũukhũukhsa's kwe'we'jnik yuu, Dxusa's wẽesxuuna açewe'wekahn. Aça' kxtey yuuçxa, Dxusa's wẽesxuuçxa açewe'wena Dxus ũsni'swa açewe'wek, cielute ũssawe'sxtxiwa txã'wẽyku açewe'we. Sa' txãak jxkaahwa'jsa yuu kuarenta y dos a'te ãhpkaçx.

Sa' eçx seena' kazx ũukhũukhsa's kwe'we'jnik yuu, Dxusa's wẽesxuuna açewe'wekahn. Aça' kxtey yuuçxa, Dxusa's wẽesxuuçxa açewe'wena Dxus ũsni'swa açewe'wek, cielute ũssawe'sxtxiwa txã'wẽyku açewe'we. Sa' txãak jxkaahwa'jsa yuu kuarenta y dos a'te ãhpkaçx.
Sa' Dxus luuçxtxi ahçeçxa gweçxa'swa vxit kaahnik yuu knaypkaçx. Txãasak naa kiwete jxukaysawe'sxtxi jxkaahwa'jsa yuu, nasa ma'wẽsawa maa çxhabuwe'sxwa fxiyfxiy we'wesawa jxukaysatx.

Aça' na'wẽ Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa ikhni yuuk txã' libru ji'pha' bagaçxte yuhwa uuwa'jsamée yasetx fxi'jni, aça' naa kiwetewe'sx jxukaysa txãawe'sx yase's naa kiwe's vxitiynaçxáa yuhwa txãa librute fxi'jnimeesa' jxukaysa txãa eçx kazx ũukhũukhsa's neewe'wetx.
Txãa ente' na'wẽ seena' yuutxna txã'sa' mwẽese'jwe:

Nasatx preesu'jsa' txãawe'sxwa preesu'jni yuutxna. Aça' nasatx kçxilxuh ikhsa' txãawe'sxwa kçxilxuh ikhni yuutxna. Txãa pa'ga Dxus luuçxa' Dxus yakh yuuçxáa çxhãçxha fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phuwa'j peejxta'.
Txãa e'su' vxite eçx seena' kazxsa kiwe dxiijũ kãjaçte uythu. Txã' piisxáa kaaçxu na'wẽsa e'zku ji'phu', nawa txãa eçx seena' kazx ũukhũukhsa na'wẽyku Kristo's açewe'we'.
Sa' eçx kazxsa nyafxtewe'sx na'wẽy jxkaajxa' ãjãwa'ja'sku ji'phu', txãasak naa kiwete nasa jxukaysatx jxkaaja', eçx na'wẽ dxikthete kpã' seena'sa ji'phuçxawa wẽetku txã'sna neewe'wekahn.
Sa' kĩjkĩhwa seena'sa'swa kaavxya'ja'jya' ãjã'k, cielujũ ipx wala seena'sa kaakĩiji'jna naa kiwete nasa uyna ũste.

Eçx kazxsa nyafxtewe'sx tasxte seena'sa's kaavxya'ja'jya' ãjãçxa, naa kiwete nasa jxukaysatx kaypuba'kh Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa na'wẽ kĩhwa kaavxya'ja'jçxa. Sa' seena' dxikthete kpã' ji'phçxawa uumée çxhãçxhak txãa na'wẽysa piisakaakh ĩtxĩmeesa.
Sa' eçx kazxsa kiwe dxiijũ kãasa' txãa piisanisa ĩtxĩmeesa's ĩtxĩ vxit-ya' ãjãwa'ja's ji'phu'k. Aça' txãa ĩtxĩ vxitnisa's neewe'wesamée yuutxi'sa' kiwe dxiijũ kãasa eçxa' kiikhe'jwa'jsak yu'.

Txajũ' eçx kiwe dxiijũ kãasa' na'wẽk yũu jxukaysatx: le'çxkwesa, walasa, ji'phsa, ji'phmeesa, patron ji'phsa, patron ji'phmeesa, teeçx yuhwa nvxihtmée jxukaysatx iisawa'khaakh paçu kusete meeçxawa dxi'pte.
Sa' txãa eçx kiwe dxiijũ kãasa yaseju iisawa'jni's meeçxawa txãa yase numero's ji'phmeesa yu', kĩh yuhwa weyya' ãjãmeetxna, sa' txweyya'wa ãjãmeetxna maa yuhwa.
Sa' txãa eçx kazxsa numero' kwe'sx jiyunisa'. Aça' txã'sa' jiyuwa'jsa ũsçxa', ũus miiyajkxwe: txãa numero' seiscientos sesenta y seisa'.

Txãa e'su' uythu Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa Sion thã'j vxiçte yujuçxa ũste. Txãa yakh vxite ũsu'tx, ciento kuarenta y kuatro mil nasa, txãawe'sx dxikthesu yu' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa yase vxite' txajx Tata yase's ji'phsa.
Txajũ' cielujũ susni pthũusek yu'wala kuhsa susni na'wẽ vxite' kpi'sx çxhãçxha we'weni na'wẽ susni, iiméh wala kuhsa txãawe'sx arpa tukani na'wẽk pthũuse'.

Txãa nasa' mem u'sesatx memu', Dxus jxkaahna ũsni vxite' Dxus vxitni ĩtxĩsa pahzsawe'sx vxite' Dxus luuçxtxi jxkaahsawe'sx txãawe'sx tasxte. Txã'sa' kim yuhwa piyaya' ãja'çmeeta', naasáa naa kiwetewe'sx ksxavxyu ewte neeyũusáa ciento kuarenta y kuatro mil txãawe'sx yuuçxáatx ãjã'.

Txãawe'sxa' Dxus yuuçxáana selpiina fxi'zesatx yu', sa' txãawe'sxa' nasaa ksxavxyu nwe'wenitx yuu Dxus jĩi vxite' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa txãa jĩi yuuwa'jsa, nyafxte nwe'wenisa. Txãasatx Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa ikhni yuuk txãa mtee u'thewa txãa yakh ja'da u'jwe'.
Sa' kĩhçxáa yuhwa ĩsxĩisa yu'çmeeta', sa' Dxus jxkaahna ũsnite kĩh pkal yuhwa ji'phmée ũsta'.

Txajũ' Dxus angel fxuhna u'jweçteth uy ẽe walasu. Sa' ewte neeyũunisa bagaçxte yuhwa pçuwa'jsame's pta'sxwa'ja'sku ji'phu' naa kiwetewe'sx mtee mteewe'sxtxiwa, nasa ma'wẽsa, fxiyfxiyçxáa we'wesa, maa çxhabsuwe'sxtxiwa jxuka.
Sa' na'jĩnak sus we'we':
—Dxusa's mtuuthe'jwe ũukhna. Txã'wẽme' jxukaysatx kastigãywa'j ena' ãjxã'kh. Mneewe'wewe cielu, kiwe, mar, yu', kĩjkĩhnawa jxuka vxit-sa's jĩ'k.
Txajũ' Dxus angel vxite na'jĩnak sus we'we:
—Babilonia çxhab txakwe çxhãçxhasaçxawa, Dxus kastigo's jxpa'gawa'the yã'j ũsa'. Txã'wẽ yuukahníi naa kiwete nasa mteewe'sxtxiwa jxukaysa pkal kazxte fxi'zewa'ja'sku kaapiya'j naa pa'ga jĩ'k.
Txajũ' Dxus angel tekhtewe'sxku na'jĩna sus we'we:
—Maawa eçx seena'sa vxite' txãa na'wẽy piisani yuuk txãatx neewe'weçxa, txajx iisawa'jni's kaaki'pu'juna dxi'pte meeçxawa kusete na',
txã'wẽ yũusa' Dxus kastigo seena' nxussa's jxpa'gatxna txã'wẽ yũupa'ga. Sa' seena' yuh kastigãyni yuuna asufxre ipx walate, Dxus angeleswe'sx vxite' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa ikhni yuuk txãawe'sx dxi'pte.

Kastigãyni ipx wala aja' bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée sxi'tana nes yuuna. Aça' kxteea' en ma'k yuu kus ma'k yuu nawa bagaçxte yuhwa jxkaasewa'ja's ji'phumeetxna, txã'wẽ eçx seena'sa vxite' txãa na'wẽy piisani yuuk txãatx neewe'weçxa txajx yaseju iisawa'jni's kaaki'pu'pha'ga.
Txãa pa'ga Dxus luuçxa' txajx jxkaahni's kxtey nwẽese'jna Jesus yakh yuuçxáa çxhãçxha fxi'zewa'ja's ji'phuwa'j peejxta' jĩ'k.
Txajũ' ki' wẽse'th we'weni cielujũwe'sx, txã' adxa's na'jĩ'k:

—Naa skhẽwniijũ Kristo's jxpa'gaçxa uusaawe'sxa' wala yuh wẽtwẽt fxi'zesa yuutxna jĩni's mfxi'j jĩte', Dxus Espiritu pasçxa': Txã'wẽ yuja', txãawe'sxa' jxkaaseetxna Dxusna selpiina pxthaa yuuna fxi'zenijũ, sa' cielute uyuutxna txãawe'sx mjĩini's jĩ'k.
Txajũ' thegçxa uythu tãaph çxihme kajkwete nasa yuusáa na'wẽsak teeçx kaçxçxa u'pu'. Dxikthete vxyuu bee koronak ji'phu', sa' kusete yu' skuutxh wakani zeksa'sku ji'phu'.
Cielute Dxus ũsnijũ vxite angel sus we'wena kasejk tãaphte kaçxçxa u'psa's na'jĩna:
—Skuutxha's wakaçxa mepkhakh. Txã'wẽme' jxuka thẽ'kh aça' pkhakhwa'j en ãjk jĩte',
tãaphte kaçxçxa u'psa' naa kiwete skuutxha's wakaçxa jxuka pkhakhku.
Txajũ' cielute Dxus ũsnijũ vxite angelwa kasejk uwa udeni zeksa's atçxa.
Naapkaçxha' Dxus altaluh vxite angel kasejk txã' ipxa's kaahwa'jsak yu'. Sa' uwa udenisa's ji'phsa's na'jĩnak sus we'we:
—Uwa's uhdeçxa mepkhakh. Txã'wẽme' jxuka thẽ'jni yã'j ũsta' naa kiwete jĩte',
Dxus angela' naa kiwete uwa's jxuka uhdeçxa pkhakhku, sa' teeçx ahteçxaçxáak jxuka ãsx kxtee ku'sya'. Txãa yu' Dxus kastigo' na'wẽ seena' yuuwa'jsa' jĩnisak yu'.
Txãa uwatxi's çxhab ekajk ku'sni yuu, aça' eeçxaçxáak uwu jiba fxrenusu kãhpkaçx, tres cientos kilómetro peeku'jsu pkaçxku txã'wẽ uta.
Vxite seena' ũukhũukhsa cielute uythu: siete angeleswe'sxa' siete kastigo's pta'sxsatx yu'. Txãa siete kastigosa' nmehsatx yu' Dxus kastigo.

Mar ipx ka'dni na'wẽsa zhiçxkwe speeju na'wẽ khikhyna ũste uythu. Aça' eçx seena'sa vxite' txãa eçx na'wẽy piisani yuuk vxite' txajx yase numero txã'wẽsatx nwẽese'jsameewe'sx yu' txãa mar pukate yujuçxatx ũsu', tukani arpatx Dxus ũsku txãatx atçxa.
Sa' Dxusna selpisáa Moises mema's memu'tx, vxite' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa'swa weçxana memu'tx na'jĩna:
Dxus, kĩhtewa jxuka ãjãsa,
Seena' yuh wala pu'çxgu kĩhtewa jxuka.
Naa kiwete jxuka jxkaahsa iidx mjĩini' jxuka ewçxaçxáata'.
Kwe'sxtxi jxkaahsag aça' ¿idxa's kim ũukhmée yuukx?
Sa' ¿kim idxa's tuuthe'jmée yuukx?
Idx yuuçxáa pkal ji'phmée atesag, aça' maa kiwejuwe'sxwa jxuka idxçxaçxá's neewe'wetxna,
Txãa pa'gatey idx ew yũunisa' ãatek yuu jĩnatx memu'.
Txã'wẽ yũunijũ' ki' vxite uythu, cielute Dxus ũsnite Dxus leytxi jxaawni vxitx phateeçte.
Aça' txãa Dxus ũsnijũ yu' siete angeleswe'sxtxi kaseh, siete kastigo seena'satx jxũçxa. Txãawe'sxa' athni ropa ate kwentetesatx ji'phu'. Sa' jxtudnisa yu' vxyuu behçxaçxáa peçxun kãhsatx ji'phu'.

Txajũ' Dxus vxitni ĩtxĩsa pahzsatewe'sx teeçxsa' vxyuu bee kopa ũsku teeçxsa na'wẽçxah txãa siete angeleswe'sxtxi. Kxtee yu' kastigo seena'saçxaçxáa utatx ji'ph yu' Dxus bagaçxtewa nes yuuwa'jsa kaahni.

Aça' txãa Dxus ũsnite yu' jxuka ahçxaçxáa utak, Dxus kĩhtewa jxuka ãjãwa'jsa tasxu yuusak yu'. Aça' kxtee yu' kim yuhwa u'kaya' ãjã'çmeeta', siete kastigo siete angeleswe'sx ji'phu'tx txãa pçumeyna yu'.
Txajũ' siete angeleswe'sxtxi na'jĩna sus we'weni wẽse'th Dxus ũsnijũ:
—Dxus kaahni kastigo seena'satx siete kopate ji'phi'kwe txãatx me'jwe pkawya' kiwete jĩte',

Dxus angel nyafxtewe'sxa' u'jçxa txãa kopatewe'sxa's kiwete pkawku. Aça' txã'wẽ yũute', nasa jxukaysa eçx seena' kazxsa vxite' txãa eçx na'wẽy piisani yuuk txãatx neewe'wesawe'sxtxi's kakwete wã'jy seena' akasa pa'kh.
Dxus angel e'stewe'sxa' txãa kopatewe'sxa's martek aw, aça' txãa mara' nasaa ee na'wẽçxaçxáak yuu jxuka. Txã'wẽ yũute', txãa marte ũssa ĩtxĩsa jxuka uutx.
Txajũ' Dxus angel tekhtewe'sxa' txãa kopatewe'sxa's yu'walasu vxite' yu'le'çxkuẽsu kxsũuk aw, aça' yu' ma'wẽsawa jxuka eeçxaçxáatx yuu.
Txajũ' Dxus angel yu'a's thegsa' na'jĩna we'weni'sthu wẽse'j: Dxus, nyafxíiwa idxgu yu' sa' ãçxwa txãaíiçxáag, Dxus atesa. Txãasag txã'wẽ kastigaĩ'.
Iidx yuwe's pta'sxpa'ga ahçeçxa idx yakh fxi'zesawe'sxtxi ee pkawtxi, txãa pa'gag txã'wẽ yũusatxi's ka'tuwa ee yusu'. Txãawe'sxa' kastigo's jxpa'gawa'j ji'ph yuhta' jĩ'k.
Naapkaçxha' Dxus altaluh na'jĩna vxite we'weni'swa wẽse'th:
—Dxus kĩhtewa jxuka ãjãsa idxa' peekxçxáa kastigaĩmée, isag kastigaĩ' jĩnik pthũuse.
Txajũ' Dxus angel pahztewe'sxa' txãa kopatewe'sxa's sektek aw. Txã'wẽ yũute', seka' nasatx iiméh wala açxa kweethkahnku txã'wẽ yuu.

Aça' jxukaysa iiméh seena' wala çxhavxytxi. Nawa pkala's nvxihtçxa Dxus tasxte yu' sxawedmeeta' txã'sna neewe'weya'. Txã'wẽ Dxusna yaakipkaçxte, jweeíiçxáatx txã'sna açewe'we' txã'wẽ seena' kastigãyya' ãjãsa's.

Txajũ' Dxus angel tahçtewe'sxa' txãa kopatewe'sxa's eçx seena' kazx ũukhũukhsa jxkaahna ũsnitek aw, aça' txãa jxkaahna ũsni kiwe' çxhi'dxteçxáak yuu. Txã'wẽ seena' yuute', nasa' ũusçxaniite thune's ya'wa'ki'tx kastigo txakwe seena'sa pa'pha'ga.
Makwe txã'wẽ yuutewa, txãawe'sx ewmée yũuna fxi'zeni yu'sa' weh yuhwa ivxiitu'çmeeta'. Txã'wẽ wã'jy seena' akasa pa'thewa, jweeíiçxáatx cielute Dxusa's açewe'we'.
Txajũ' Dxus angel seistewe'sxa' txãa kopatewe'sxa's Eufxrates yu'walatek aw. Aça' txã'wẽ yũute', txãa yu'wala' uhdxku jxkaahsawe'sx sek kãani ju'gu yuusa uykhẽwya' ãjãkahn.

Txajũ' na'wẽsath vxite uy: Eçxthẽ'j yuwejũ vxite' eçx seena' kazxsa Kristo's açewe'wesa yuwejũ vxite' eçx kazxsa Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa na'wẽ kĩhwa kaavxya'ja'jçxa kaypuba'jsa yuwejũ tekh eçxtxi kaseh sap na'wẽsa.

Txãa eçx sap na'wẽsa yu' kĩjkĩhwa seena'satx kaavxya'ja'jya' ãjã'tx, sa' txãawe'sxa' naa kiwete jxkaahsa jxukaysatx pkhakhya' u'jtx, nmeh ente Dxus txakwe çxhãçxhasa yakh puiiya' sũhçxa. Sa' jxkaahsawe'sx jxukaysatx pkhakhtxi hebreo yuwete Armagedón jĩ'tx teeçx ahte kxtee. Kristo we'weçxa': Yajkxmée ũsiyna, peswée na'wẽçxáa pa'ja'nja, aça' txãa ente thaamena ũsya'mée, Dxus yakh txutemée fxi'zesa' wala yuh wẽtwẽt neeyũutxna jĩ'k.

Txãa eçx sap na'wẽsa yu' kĩjkĩhwa seena'satx kaavxya'ja'jya' ãjã'tx, sa' txãawe'sxa' naa kiwete jxkaahsa jxukaysatx pkhakhya' u'jtx, nmeh ente Dxus txakwe çxhãçxhasa yakh puiiya' sũhçxa. Sa' jxkaahsawe'sx jxukaysatx pkhakhtxi hebreo yuwete Armagedón jĩ'tx teeçx ahte kxtee. Kristo we'weçxa': Yajkxmée ũsiyna, peswée na'wẽçxáa pa'ja'nja, aça' txãa ente thaamena ũsya'mée, Dxus yakh txutemée fxi'zesa' wala yuh wẽtwẽt neeyũutxna jĩ'k.

Txãa eçx sap na'wẽsa yu' kĩjkĩhwa seena'satx kaavxya'ja'jya' ãjã'tx, sa' txãawe'sxa' naa kiwete jxkaahsa jxukaysatx pkhakhya' u'jtx, nmeh ente Dxus txakwe çxhãçxhasa yakh puiiya' sũhçxa. Sa' jxkaahsawe'sx jxukaysatx pkhakhtxi hebreo yuwete Armagedón jĩ'tx teeçx ahte kxtee. Kristo we'weçxa': Yajkxmée ũsiyna, peswée na'wẽçxáa pa'ja'nja, aça' txãa ente thaamena ũsya'mée, Dxus yakh txutemée fxi'zesa' wala yuh wẽtwẽt neeyũutxna jĩ'k.
Txajũ' Dxus angel sietetewe'sxa' txãa kopatewe'sxa's ẽesuk pkaw, naapkaçxha' Dxus ũsni cielujũ na'jĩnisak sus we'weni pthũuse txajx jxkaahna ũsnijũ:
—Na' Dxus kastigo nmehtewe'sxa' jĩ'k.
Txajũ' kpi'sx kwehnena we'weni seena' susku, aça' ehd iiméh seena' çxhãçxha u'kh, naa kiwe yuuiyna bagaçxte yuhwa txã'wẽ yu' ehd çxhãçxha u'jweçmeene'.
Txã'wẽ ehd u'pha'ga naa kiwete çxhab jxuka pçuutx. Aça' çxhab iiméh seena' walasawa tekh ahsutx upe. Aça' Dxusa' yajkxku Babilonia çxhab wala's jxukate kastigãyya', seena' ewmée yũupa'ga.
Txajũ' mar pxãhsu kiwe u'psa vxite' vxiç wala jxuka vxitutx.
Naapkaçxha' cielujũ kwetuba nasaa kajkwekhẽ ũsxitx seena' walasa pahz açxoba ãh duhsa. Aça' txã'wẽ seena' yũute', nasa yu' jweeíiçxáatx Dxusa's açewe'we', txã'wẽ kastigo seena'sa's kaapha'ga.
Txajũ' siete angeleswe'sx na'wẽ siete kopa ji'phu'tx txãatewe'sx teeçxsa's uythu, aça' adxa's na'wẽk we'we:
—Ayte myuh, na'wẽ u'y kazx yũuna fxi'zesa mar kajkwete kaçxçxa u'pa' txã'sna kastigãywa'ja's pta'sxya'wath.
Maa kiwete jxkaahsawe'sxwa txãa u'y yakhçxaçxáatx kazx pkal yũuna fxi'ze', aça' naa kiwete nasa' txãa kazx fxi'zewa'j yuuçxáanatx piyana ũsu'.

Txajũ' adxa' Dxus Espiritu aphniith yuu, aça' Dxus angela' adxa's pe'jna u'kh nasa u'pnimée kiwete. Kxteea' teeçx u'y eçx beh seena' kazxsa kajkwete a'jçxa u'pteth uy. Aça' txãa eçx seena' kazxsa kakwete yu' Dxusna açewe'wena fxi'jnisaçxáa utak ji'phu', sa' siete dxikthé diez kaaçxuk ji'phu'.

Txãa u'ya' athni ropa iiméh ew behsak ji'phu', vxyuu beh vxite' kwet zhiçxkwesa vxite' perla iiméh pa'gasa txã'wẽsa atxhku iijxũ yu'. Sa' kusete yu' vxyuu bee kopa ewmée kazxsaçxaçxáa uta ji'phsa'sku ji'phu'.
Sa' dxikthete yu' na'wẽk fxi'jni yu': Babilonia çxhab kazx jxtuhthesa kazx yũuwa'ja's kaapiya'jsa jĩnak fxi'jni yu'.
Txajũ' jiyuth, txãa u'ya' tũunik yu' Dxus luuçxwe'sx ee vxite' Jesus kaapiya'jni's pta'sxpa'ga ikhni yuutx txãawe'sx ee yakh. Sa' u'y txã'wẽsa's uyçxa', wala ũukhthu.
Txajũ' Dxus angela' na'jĩ'k:
—¿Kĩh yũuçxa ũukhna ũsga? Kaajiyu'jya'wath txãa u'y ma'wẽsatewa vxite' txãa eçx seena' kazxsa tũ'sna u'jweça' siete dxikthé ji'phçxa diez kaaçxu ji'pha' txã'sna.

Eçx seena' kazxsa's uygu txã' nyafxíi yu' ũsu'k, nawa ãçxha' meea'. Txã'wẽçxawa kafx iiméh seena' dxiisajũ kasejena vxituya'. Aça' naa kiwetewe'sx jxukaysa txãawe'sx yase's bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa uuwa'jmée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'j librute fxi'jnimeesa yu' wala yuh ũukhutxna txãa eçx seena' kazxsa ki' vxyaana txã'sna uyçxa.
Na'sa' jiyuwa'jsa ũsçxa', mjiyuwe: U'y kaçxçxa u'pa' txãa eçx dxikthé sietesa' siete vxiç walata'.

Sa' txãa dxiktheíiçxáa siete jxkaahsata'. Txãa jxkaahsawe'sxa' tahçsa yu' vxituyã'jtx, aça' ãçxha' seistewe'sxa' jxkaahna ũsa', nawa nmehtewe'sx sietesa yu' jxkaajxa' takhmeya'. Nawa txãa nmehtewe'sxa' jwee yu' txaçxmée jxkaajana.
Eçx seena' kazxsa nyafxíi yu' ũsu'k nawa ãçxha' meea' txã' jxkaahsa sietesak yu'. Nawa ew jiyute yu', txãaíiçxáa jxkaahsa oçxotewe'sx yuuwa'jsa'. Txãa e'su isa jxukate vxituna.
Sa' diez kaaçxu uygu txãa yu' diez jxkaahsawe'sxta'. Nawa txãawe'sxa' jxkaajxa' takhmeyta'. Nawa jxkaahsa yuuwa'ja's jxpa'gatxna wala txaçxmeekuẽçxáa, eçx seena' kazxsa yakh ja'daçxah.
Txãa diez jxkaahsawe'sxa' ma'wẽ yũuwa'ja'swa kxazíi ja'daçxah puutx we'weçxa ũsta'. Txãasa eçx seena' kazxsa's kçxhãaçxha'jatxna kxteeçxah jxkaah pu'çxna.

Txã'wẽ yũuçxa Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa yakh puiitxna. Nawa Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa yuh pejka knayuuna txãawe'sxtxi', txãa pa'gatey txã' Maatewa Jxthaakwe Çxhãçxhasa', sa' Maa Jxkaahsatewa Jxthaakwe Jxtuhthesa'. Aça' txãa yakh ũssa' Dxus peeygãhçxa nwe'wenisata' txãa yakh txutemée fxi'zesa.
Txajũ' Dxus angela' vxite na'wẽsa'swa pta'sxku:
—Na'wẽ u'y kazx pkal yũuna fxi'zesa kaçxçxa u'pni mar uygu txã' naata': maa kiwete çxhabwa jxuka, nasa majũwe'sxwa fxiyfxiyçxah we'wesa txãata'.
Sa' eçx seena' kazxsa dxikthesu diez kaaçxu uygu txã' jxkaahsa yuuwa'jsata', sa' u'y kazx pkal yũuna fxi'zesa's ahçeçxa sũpxçxáa wãatajatxna. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa, kakwete çxiçx yu'sa' ũ'çxa ipxte kabutxna.
Txãa u'ya's txã'wẽ yũuçxa ivxiitukahn, Dxus ne' jxthãas. Txãa pa'ga txãa jxkaahsawe'sxa' eçx seena' kazxsa's kçxhãaçxha'j pu'çxçxa txã'wẽ yũutxna, Dxus we'weni' kxtey yuukahn.
Aça' u'y kaçxçxa u'pte uygu txãa yu' Babilonia çxhab kazx jxtuhthesa', naa kiwete jxkaahsa jxukaysatx txãaçxaçxáa jxkaahna ũssa.
Txãa e'su' Dxus angel cielujũ kĩjaçteth uy seena' juuna' jxkaahwa'jsa, naa kiwete zhiçxkwe eena' kweethna.
Sa' na'jĩnak sus we'we:
—Babilonia çxhab txakwe çxhãçxhasaçxawa, Dxus kastigo's jxpa'gawa'the yã'j ũsa'. Sa' ãçxha' eçxthẽ'j jxkaahni espiritu ewmeesa vxite' vxiçxakwe kazxsaçxaçxáa ũswa'j yuuna pa'kh.

Txã'wẽ yũukahníi maa çxhabwa jxukaysa txãa pkal kazxsateçxaçxáatx fxi'zena ũsu'. Aça' naa kiwete jxkaahsa jxukaysawe'sx pkal kazx yũuwa'ja's yuuçxáatx piya. Txã'wẽy txweysawe'sxwa wala ji'phsa yuutx, pkalte fxi'zewa'jçxá's txweyna jĩ'k.
Txajũ' cielujũ na'jĩna we'weni wẽse'th:
—Adx nasa yã'ja' txãa çxhabu mkaasehwe, txãa pkalsawe'sx yakh ũsya'mée, kxah txãa çxhabte kastigo' i'kwe'sxtxi's kpajkxmeena.
Na'jĩ'th na': txãawe'sx pkala' iiméh seena' walani' cielute kãhpkaçx, kxajk Dxusa' txãa çxhaba's kastigãyya' yajkx txã'wẽ kazxsapa'ga.
Txãawa vxitetx ma'wẽga ewmée yũu txã'wẽy ewmée myũuwe ka'tuwa. Sa' txãawa ma'wẽga vxitetx juuna' yũu, txãate e'z us thaakwe juuna' myũuwe.

Pkxuuna makxũusu'jwe, txãawa makwega iiwejçx yajkxna pkalte fxi'zena ũsu' txãatey ãh. Sa' txã' na'wẽk yaaki' txajx ũuste: Ayte jxkaahsa na'wẽ kaçxçxa u'pthu. Nmi' ji'phmeesameeth, sa' pxthaa yuuna fxi'zeme'nja sũhnak iiwejçx yaaki'.
Txãa pa'ga teeçx enteçxáa kastigo pa'jatxna na'wẽsa: nxuswa'j, wẽjẽ, uu en, sa' ipxte kabni yuuna. Txãa çxhaba's Dxus çxhãçxhasa' jxuka ivxiituna.
Aça' naa kiwete jxkaahsawe'sx txãa çxhabte kazx pkal yũuna fxi'zesa' wala nxus we'wena ũ'netxna, txãa çxhavxyni aja's uyçxa.
Sa' txã'wẽ kastigãyni's ũukhçxa, jxu'juçxáa thegutxna na'jĩna:
—Seena' yuh pxthaa yuuk, Babilonia çxhab txakwe seena' çxhãçxhasa. Naa dudte jxuka vxitunik yuu jĩtxna.
Naa kiwete txweyna fxi'zesawe'sxwa txãa çxhaba's yajkxçxa wala pxthaa we'wena ũ'netxna. Txã'wẽ yũukahníi ãçxyã'ja' peena yu' kim yuhwa weymeetxna makwe tũ'sna pa'thewa:

vxyuu beh, vxyuu çxihme, kwet zhiçxkwe wala pa'gasa, tela zhiçxkwesa iiméh pa'gasa, fxtũu wẽt putasá, marfxil zhiçxkwesa, fxtũu ewsa wala pa'gasa, bronce yaasesa, hieçxo yaasesa, marmól yaasesa, kĩjkĩhwa txã'wẽ zhiçxkwe vxitnisa.

Vxite' ũ'nisate wẽt pẽethẽsa, kabte wẽt putasá, wẽt putakahn kakwete sxũsxnisa, vxino, aceite, skuutxh ũ'we ewsa. Vxite' tajkx ktũ'se'jnisa, piisxáa, jiba, kaçxetilxa jiba wezxnisa. Vxite' nasa txweynisa kĩh yuhnawa ya'txweymeena.
Sa' txãa çxhaba's na'jĩtxna:
—¡Txakwe wala weçxana fxi'zeni's ji'phméek neeyũu, sa' txakwe zhiçxkwe ji'phuni'swa jxukate ivxiituk! jĩtxna.
Txãa çxhabte kĩjkĩhwa txweyçxa wala ji'phsa yuusaawe'sxa' jxu'juçxáa thegna neeyũutxna kastigãyni's ũukhçxa. Sa' wala nxus we'wena ũ'netxna
na'jĩna:
—¡Txãa çxhab txakwe walasa seena' yuh yuuk! Nyafxíi yu' u'y na'wẽk zhiçxkwe iijxũçxa fxi'ze', ropa iiméh pa'gasa, vxyuu beh ki'pna yuunisa, kwet zhiçxkwesa iiméh pa'gasaçxaçxáatx txã'wẽsatxku iijxũ'.
Nawa txãa ji'phunisa naa dudte jxuka pçuuk jĩtxna. Txã'wẽy barko namuwe'sx, vxite' kxtee mjĩisawe'sx jxukaysa jxu'juçxáa thegna neeyũutxna.
Sa' txãa çxhab çxhavxyna sxi'tasa aja's uyçxa', na'jĩna sus we'wetxna:
—Mtee yuhwa naa çxhab na'wẽy walasa yu' meea' jĩna,
nxusweete dxikthekhẽ kiwe ya'fxihbna sus ũ'nena na'jĩtxna:
—Seena' nxusnxus knayku çxhab txakwe walasa txajx ji'phuni yakh wala ji'phsa vxitku barko ji'phsa yuutxi' jxukaysatx. Nawa naa dudte jxuka vxitunik yuu jĩtxna.

Nawa cielute ũssawe'sx wala yuh mweeçxawe txãa çxhaba's kastigãyni's uyçxa, Jesus jxkaahnisawe'sx vxite' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx, Dxus yakh fxi'zesawe'sx jxukaysa. Txãa pa'gatey Dxusa' txãa çxhaba's kastigãyyã'kh, i'kwe'sxtxi ewmée yũupa'ga jĩnik pthũuse.
Txajũ' Dxus angel teeçxsa' seena' wala çxhãçxhasa ũ'khni kwet na'wẽsa's kiisçxa, markhẽk wãatah na'jĩna:
—Babilonia çxhab txakwe walasa txã'wẽ wãataaní yuuna, aça' txã'sa' bagaçxte yuhwa peena yu' uymeetxna.
Aça' txãa çxhab klxiikhunsu tukani músika arpa, kuvxy, trompeta txã'wẽsa pthũusemeetxna. Sa' txãa çxhabte kĩh mjĩisa yuhwamée yuutxna, sa' ũ'khniçxáa yuhwa pthũusemeena.

Kxtee pki'taniçxáa yuhwa kweethmeena, sa' boda fxiesta vxitna susniwa peena yu' pthũusemeena. Txãa çxhaba' txweyna ũssawe'sx wala yuh çxhãçxhasatx ji'phu'k, sa' naa kiwetewe'sxtxi jxuka kaypuba'kh dxijxuuçxa. Nawa ãçxha' kĩh yuhwa ji'phmée yuuna jĩ'k.
Txã'wẽ yuukahníi Dxus yuwe pta'sxsawe'sx vxite' Dxus yakh fxi'zesawe'sx vxite' naa kiwete mtee mteewa ikhnisawe'sx eea' jxuka txãa çxhabteçxaçxáak ũs yu'.
Txãa e'su' cielujũ nasa wala kuhsa sus we'weni wẽse'th na'jĩna:
Kwe'sx Dxus çxhãçxhasa txãa yuuçxáa ewte nvxiit-sa',
Sa' txãa yuuçxáa jxtuhthesa',
Txãa pa'ga kwe'sx Dxusa's weçxaaga.
Txãasaíik çxhab txã'wẽ kazx yũuwa'ja'sçxáa kaapiya'jsa's kastigãy,
Naa kiwete kazx yũuna suwna ũssa's.
Sa' Dxusna selpisaatx ikhpa'ga ka'tuwa Dxusa' kastigãyku jĩ'tx.
Txajũ' ki'kin we'wetx na'jĩna:
—Kwe'sx Dxusa's weçxaaga. Txãa çxhab çxhavxyni aja' bagaçxte yuhwa pçumée sxi'tana nes yuuna jĩ'çpkaçxha',
weintikuatro jxkaahsawe'sx vxite' Dxus vxitni ĩtxĩsa pahzsawe'sxa' Dxus jxkaahna u'psa tasxte peejxũkweçxa weçxatx na'jĩna:
—Txã'wẽ yuh ew yuuk. Txãa pa'ga Dxusa's weçxaaga jĩ'tx.
Txãa e'su' Dxus jxkaahna u'pnijũ teeçx na'jĩna we'wenik pthũuse:
Kwe'sx Dxusa's mtuuthe'jwe, txã'sna selpisaawe'sx
Le'çxkwesa ma'k yuu meeçxawa walasa ma'k yuu nawa txã'sçxáana nwẽese'jna jxukaysa jĩ'k.
Txajũ' nasa wala kuhsa we'weni na'wẽsa'sthu wẽse'j txãa yu' kuh yu' susni na'wẽk pthũuse', vxite' kpi'sx sus we'weni na'wẽ. Sa' na'jĩ'tx:
Dxusa's wala yuh weçxaaga, txãa pa'gatey kwe'sx Dxus kĩhtewa jxuka ãjãsa txã' jxkaajxa' takhyã'kh.
Aça' seena' wala weçxana txã'sa' tuuthe'jega, txãa pa'gatey Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa nyuu yuuwa'jsa' ya'pheu'kh,
Aça' boda fxiesta ena' ãjxã'kh.
Txãa nyuu yuuwa'jsa' ropa iiméh zhiçxkwe çxihmesa's kaathe'jnik yuu jĩ'tx.
(Txãa ropa ewsa yu', Dxus dxi'pte jxpubamée ew fxi'zeni jĩnisa'.)
Txajũ' Dxus angela' na'jĩnak fxi'khaah:
—Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa boda fxiestate pi'kxnisawe'sx yakha' wala yuh weçxa yuja' jĩna kfxi'ja'jçxa', na'jĩnak we'we:
—Na'wẽ we'wenisa' Dxus kwe'we'jnisa isasata' jĩte',
adxa' Dxus angel tasxte neewe'weya' peejxũkweth. Nawa txãa yu' na'jĩ'k:

—Adxa's peejxũkwenu. Adxa' Dxusna selpisáa idx na'wẽysaíiçxáath, iidx yakhthẽ'jwe'sxwa ma'wẽta Jesus kaapiya'jni isasa's jxpubamée pta'sxna pekũjũ' txã'wẽysath. Aça' Dxusçxáana mneewe'we. Na'wẽ kĩhwa yũuna jĩna kaavxya'ja'th txãa yu' Jesus ma'wẽsatewa kaajiyu'jsata' jĩ'k.
Txãa e'su' cielu phateçxa ũsteth uy, aça' teeçx jiba çxihmesak vxyaa. Kxte a'jsa yu': Isasaçxá's Kxtey Yuusáa jĩnak kxsusni yu', txãa pa'gatey isasa yu'sa' jxuka kxtey yuuna puiiçxa knayku naa pa'ga.
Sa' txajx yafx yu' ipx beesa na'wẽk eena' kweethe'. Dxikthete yu' wala kuh korona ji'phu'k, sa' vxite yase fxi'jni ji'phu'k txãa yase's txãa yuuçxáak jiisa yu'.
Txajx athni ropa yu' eete akhnisa'sku jxaath yu'. Sa' txãa yu' Dxus ma'wẽsatewa txã'sna kaajiyu'jsa' jĩnisak yu'.
Aça' txãa yakh u'jsa yu' cielutewe'sx jxukaysa jiba çxihmesatetx a'jçxa u'jweç yu', ropa ewsa çxihme atesa's athçxa.

Sa' txajx yuwesu yu' espada seena' zeksak sẽhna ũsu', txãa yakh maa kiwetewe'sxtxiwa knaywa'jsa. Txã'wẽ yũuçxak maa kiwetewa jxuka juuna' yuuna txãaçxaçxáa juuna' jxkaahwa'jsa yu'. Sa' ewmeesa yuutxi's seena' kastigaĩna kxũusu'jna, uwatx ku'ssawa ma'wẽga seena' yũ' txã'wẽy yũuna Dxus kĩhtewa jxuka ãjãsa txã'wẽ seena' kastigaĩna.
Sa' txajx athni ropate vxite' jĩ'besu na'jĩna fxi'jnik ji'phu': Maa Jxkaahsatewa Jxthaakwe Jxtuhthesa', sa' Maatewa Jxthaakwe Çxhãçxhasa' jĩna.
Txãa e'su' Dxus angel sekte yujuçxa ũsteth uy, txã' na'jĩnak sus we'we uuniisa çxiçxtxi's ũ'sa vxiçxakuẽtx:
—Jxukaysa pkhaakheçxa myuhwe ũ'ya' i'kwe'sx ũ'wa'j Dxus ũsku txã's.

Sa' ũ'wene'kwe uusaawe'sx çxiçx, jxkaahsawe'sx ma'k yuu, npiiçthẽ'jwe'sx ma'k yuu, nasa iiméh jxtuhthesa ma'k yuu, jiba uuniisa ma'k yuu, jibate a'jsa uusaawe'sx ma'tx yuu, patron ji'phsa ma'k yuu meeçxa' patron ji'phmeesa ma'k yuu, le'çxkwesa ma'k yuu walasa ma'k yuu nawa txãatx jxuka pkhakhçxa mẽ'we jĩnak we'we.
Txajũ' uythu eçx seena' kazxsa vxite' naa kiwete jxkaahsawe'sx txajx nasa yã'jçxa jxukaysa pkhaakheçxa txãa jibate a'jsa yakh vxite' txajx nasa yã'jçxa pdxi'puçxa puiiya' ũste.

Nawa eçx seena' kazxsa Kristo's açewe'wesa vxite' eçx kazxsa Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa na'wẽ kĩhwa kaavxya'ja'jçxa kaypuba'jsa txãa yakh e'zíi tudnitx yuu, txã'wẽ Kristo's açewe'wesa iisawa'jni's kaaki'pu'jna eçx seena'sa piisani yuuk txã'snawa neewe'wekahn kaypuba'pha'ga. Txajũ' txãa e'zíitx ipx wala asufxre yakh behna ũsa' txkhẽe wãatãanitx yuu ĩtxĩtey.
Txajũ' jibate a'jsa yuwesu espada seena' zeksa sẽhna ũsu'k txãa espadaju ikhnitx yuu nasa ewmeesa yuutxi's, aça' uuniisa çxiçxtxi's vxiçxakwe' txikpkaçxtxi ũ'.
Txãa e'su' Dxus angel cielujũ kĩjaçte uythu, kafx iiméh seena' dxiisatewe'sx lxavxi's atçxa, vxite' çam kadena walasa'sku ji'ph yu'.
Sa' txãa angela' eçxthẽ'ja's tudku mil anxu ãhpkaçx. Txã' txãniitey ul weeswée Satanasku yaase yu'.
Txã'wẽ yũuçxa kafx seena' dxiisate kxuuphçxa vxitxte yu' selxok ki'p, maa kiwetewe'sxtxiwa peena yu' ĩsxĩiya' kasejkahmén mil ãnu ãhpkaçx. Txãa mil anxu ãhte', txhweteni yuuna txaçxmeeçxáawa.

Txajũ' jxkaahna ũsnisatxthu uy, aça' kxsũ yu' kastigãyya' ãjãwa'jsatx kaçxçxa u'pu'. Vxite' Jesus kaapiya'jni's nwẽese'jçxa Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna fxi'zepa'ga dxikthe's spẽ'thçxa ikhni yuutx txãawe'sxtxiwa uythu. Txãawe'sxa' eçx seena' kazxsa vxite' txãa eçx na'wẽysa piisani yuuk txã'sna neewe'wesameetx yu', sa' txãa eçx iisawa'jni's dxikthesu meeçxawa kusesuçxáa yuhwa kaaki'pu'jsameetx yu'. Txãawe'sxa' ki' ĩtxĩ yuuçxa mil anxutx jxkaahna ũsu' Kristo yakh ja'daçxah.
Txãawe'sxa' uuçxawa ki' ĩtxĩ yuusaata' nyafxte, nawa vxite uusaawe'sx yu' ĩtxĩ yuumeeta' txãa mil anxu skhẽwpkaçx.

Dxus yakh yuuçxáa fxi'zeçxa uuniijũwa txãawe'sx khuẽ'y nyafxte ĩtxĩ yuusáa yakha' seena' yuh weçxa yuja'. Txãawe'sxa' bagaçxte yuhwa Dxus yakh puutx uywa'jmeete yu' u'jmeetxna. Txãa pa'ga txãawe'sxa' mil anxupkaçx jxkaahna ũsutxna, Dxus vxite' Kristo txãawe'sx tasxte selpiina.
Mil anxu skhẽwniijũ' eçxthẽ'ja' tudnijũ txhweteni yuuna,
sa' ĩsxĩina kaypuba'jya' kasejena naa kiwetewe'sxtxi jxuka, Gog vxite' Magog txãawe'sxtxi. Txã'wẽ yũuçxa puiiya' pkhakhena Magogwe'sx nasatx. Txãawe'sxa' iiméh seena' kuhta' kwetmuse na'wẽ.
Txãasatx kiwe makwetewa jxuka ãhçxáa kxaaduu Dxus luuçxtxi vxite' Dxus peeygãani çxhabnawa. Naapkaçxha' Dxusa' cielujũ ipx kaahçxa txãawe'sxtxi' jxuka kabku.

Sa' eçxthẽ'j ĩsxĩisa's ipx wala asufxre yakh behna ũsu'k kxteek akhni yuu, na'wẽ eçx kazxsa Kristo's açesa vxite' Dxus yuwe pta'sxsa na'wẽy yuuçxa kaypuba'kh txãawe'sxtxi akhni yuutx kxtee. Kxteea' en ma'k yuu kus ma'k yuu nawa bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa kaasewa'jmée çxhavxyna nes yuutxna.
Txajũ' jxkaahna u'pni çxihmesa seena' walasa'sthu uy, vxite' kxtee kaçxçxa u'psa's. Txajx yafxju thegniteçxáa kiwe vxite' cielu wantaĩmeeçxa jxuka vxitutx, sa' peena yu' vxyaameeta'.

Txajũ' uusaawe'sxtxi uythu, walasa ma'k yuu le'çxkwesa ma'k yuu nawa jxuka Dxus tasxte yujuçxa ũste. Aça' librutx phadenitx yuu, vxite' bagaçxte yuhwa uuwa'jmée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'j libru yã'jçxa. Txajũ' uusaawe'sxtxi Dxus tasxte kuutxa'jnitx yuu, txãawe'sx ma'wẽ yũuna fxi'zesatewa librute ma'wẽne' fxi'jni ũsu' kxtee thegçxa kastigãywa'ja's pta'sxya'.
Yu'khẽ khẽeçxa uusaawa ĩtxĩ yuuçxa kiitetx, naapkaçxha' kiwe dxiiga pedanisawa ĩtxĩ yuuçxa kiitetx. Aça' jxukaysatx teeçxsa na'wẽçxah ma'wẽ yũuna fxi'zesatewa pta'sxçxa kastigãywa'jtx yuu.
Txajũ' uu en vxite' uusaawe'sx yã'jçxa infxierno ipx walate akhnitx yuu. Txãa infxierno ipx walate khẽenijũ' bagaçxte yuhwa Dxus yakh peena yu' puutx uywa'jme'.
Aça' kxteetx akhni yuu bagaçxte yuhwa uuwa'jmée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'j librute txãawe'sx yasetx fxi'jnimeesatxi's.
Txãa e'su' cielu u'sesa vxite' kiwewa u'sesath uy. Txã'wẽ yuukahníi nyafxiitey cielu vxite' kiwewa nyafxiiteywe'sxa' skhẽwniitx yuu, aça' kĩh mar yuhwa meek yuu.
Juan yaasesa adxa' uythu Dxus çxhab Jerusalen u'sesa txã'wẽ Dxus tasxu cielujũ kĩjaçte. Txãa çxhaba' seena' ew pheu'jni yu'k, novxia iimi'ya' pheu'jçxa ũythãsna ũs na'wẽ.
Sa' cielujũ sus na'jĩna we'weni wẽse'th:
—Mtheg, ãçxha' Dxusa' nasaa ksxavxyte ũsa' txãawe'sx yakh fxi'zeya', aça' nasa' Dxus jĩi yuutxna. Dxusa' txãawe'sx Dxus yuuya' txãawe'sx yakh fxi'zena.
Txãasa Dxusa' kĩh nxusniijũwa jxuka nwe'wena, aça' peena yu' uuwa'jmée yuuna. Ũ'newa'j enwa pa'jmeena, nxus we'wewa'jwa pa'jmeena, akasawa pa'jmeena, txãa pa'gatey nyafxíi fxi'zeni ena' skhẽwku jĩ'k.
Txajũ' jxkaahnite kaçxçxa u'psa' na'jĩ'k:
—Mtheg, kĩhtxwa jxuka yu'pthehçxa u'seçxaçxáath vxit jxuka jĩçxa', ki' na'wẽk we'we:
—Na'wẽ we'wenisatxi' mfxi'j, txãa pa'gatey txã' isa kxtey yuuwa'jsata' jĩçxa',
ki' we'wek:

—Adx we'weni' jxuka kxtey yuunik yuu. Adxa' naa kiwe meetey ũsyã'th yu', sa' bagaçxtewa nes yuuwa'jsath pçuwa'jsamée. Aça' maawa yũ'wẽesa's kĩh yuhwa vxyuu pa'gamée ũsu'nja yu' bagaçxte yuhwa uumée kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsana.
Maawa ewmeesa yu'sa' nwẽese'jmée jxuka knaysawe'sxa' kĩhwa Dxus jĩi yu'sa' jxuka txãawe'sxçxaçxáa jxpa'gatxna. Aça' adxa' txãawe'sx Dxus yu'nja, naapkaçxha' txãawe'sxa' adx luuçx yuutxna.

Nawa maa nasawa Dxusa's çxhãçxha yaakxsamée yã'ja' ya'skaçxa fxi'zesa, kĩhtewa kazxçxáa yũuna fxi'zesa, nasa ikhsa, kazx pkal yũuna fxi'zesa, dxijxuuna fxi'zesa, Dxus ĩtxĩmeesatx neewe'wesa, ĩsxĩisa txãawe'sxa' infxierno ipx wala asufxre yakh behna ũsa' kxtee khẽeya' u'jwa'j ji'phutxna, bagaçxte yuhwa Dxus yakh peena yu' puutx uyya'mée.
Txajũ' Dxus angel sietesawe'sx na'wẽ Dxus kastigo nmeh sietesatx ji'phu'tx siete kopate txãa sietesawe'sx teeçxsa' kũhçxa na'wẽk we'we:
—Myuh thegya', pta'sxya'wath Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa nyuu yuuwa'jsa's jĩ'k.
Naapkaçxha' Dxus Espiritu aphniith yuu, aça' Dxus angela' pe'jna u'kh, teeçx thã'j vxiç seena' wala ẽete. Sa' kxtee kãhçxa', kaavxya'ja'kh Jerusalen çxhab wala Dxus tasxu cielujũ kĩisa's.
Txãa çxhaba' zhiçxkwe zmeena'k kweethna ũsu', Dxus kweethniju. Sa' txãa zmeena' kweethnisa yu' kwet iiméh zhiçxkwe kwentetesa na'wẽk yu'.

Sa' txãa çxhab peeku'j yu' kwetçxaçxáak uphni yu', wala ẽete jxu'j umnisa, sa' doce vxitxku ji'phu'. Sa' txãa vxitx iisa teeçx angeltxi ũsu'. Txãa vxitxsu yu' Israel ji'j docesawe'sx yasetx fxi'jnitx u'pu'.
Sek kãani ju'gu tekh vxitxtxi u'pu'. Sek khẽeni ju'guwa tekh vxitxtxi u'pu'. Sa' thakwe ju'guwa tekh vxitxtxi u'pu', vxite' tasxu ju'guwa kxaz vxitxíi.
Txãa çxhab peeku'j doce kwet ki'pçxa txãa kajkwesuk kwet uphni yu' txãa iisa doce yasetx fxi'jni yu', na'wẽ Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa jxkaahnisa docesawe'sx yasetx.
Adx yakh we'wesa Dxus angela' ji'phu'k isani metro vxyuu behçxaçxáasa txãa çxhaba's isawa'j, vxite' kxtee vxitx vxite' txãa kwet uph txã'wẽsatx isawa'j.

Çxhaba' puutx txakhweçxaçxáak yu' jxu'jya'wa txakhuẽy, tapeya'wa txakhuẽy. Aça' Dxus angela' txãa çxhaba's isani metro yakh isate', dos mil doscientos kilómetro ji'phu'k jxu'jya' txakhuẽy, tapeya'wa txakhuẽy, khẽete ẽetewa txakhuẽy, puutx txakhweçxaçxáatx yu'.
Txajũ' kwet upha'sku isa, aça' sesenta y kuatro metrok ji'phu' khẽete ẽete. Kwe'sx isani metro jiitha'w txãa yakhíiçxáak Dxus angela' isana ũsu'.
Txãa upha' kwet jaspe yaasesa yakhçxaçxáak umni yu', aça' çxhab yu' vxyuu behçxaçxáak yu', txãasak seena' zhiçxkwe zmeena' vxya'.

Kwet upha's kaaçxida'jnisa kwet yuutxi'sa' kwet fxiyfxiy zhiçxkwesa yakhçxaçxáatx pheu'jni yu' txã' naata': nyafxtewe'sxa's, jaspe yaasesa yakh; e'stewe'sxa's, safxiro yaasesa yakh; tekhtewe'sxa's ágata yaasesa yakh; pahztewe'sxa's, esmeralda yaasesa yakh;

tahçtewe'sxa's, ónice yaasesa yakh; seistewe'sxa's, kornalina yaasesa yakh; sietetewe'sxa's, krisolita yaasesa yakh; oçxotewe'sxa's, berilo yaasesa yakh; nwewetewe'sxa's, topacio yaasesa yakh; dieztewe'sxa's, krisoprasa yaasesa yakh; oncetewe'sxa's, jacinto yaasesa yakh; docetewe'sxa's amatista yaasesa txã'wẽsa yakhtxi skadni yu'.
Doce vxitxsa yu', perlaçxaçxáatx yu', teeçx perlaçxáa teeçx vxitxte ãjk yu'. Aça' çxhabte klxiikhun wala yu' vxyuu behçxaçxáak yu', txãasak zhiçxkwe zmeena' vxyaana nes yu'.
Kxteea' pkhaakheni dxuus yat uymeeth, txãa pa'gatey kwe'sx Dxus kĩhtewa jxuka ãjãsa txãa çxhabte jxuka ãhçxáak ũsu', Piisxakuẽ jĩnisawa txã'wẽy.
Txãa çxhaba' sek, a'te, txã'wẽsa eena' kweethwa'jsa peejxmeek yu', txãa pa'gatey Dxus zmeena' khikhyni yakhçxáa jxukak eena' kweethe', aça' vxite zmeena' kweethsa' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisaíiçxáak yu'.
Maa kiwetewe'sxwa Dxus nwe'wenisa' txãa çxhab eena' kweethnisu fxi'zetxna, aça' maa jxkaahsawe'sxwa txãa çxhaba's weçxana wala tuuthe'jetxna.
Txãa çxhabte vxitxa' maa enteçxáa yuhwa aphni yuumeena, txãa pa'gatey çxhi'dxwa'j enwa mée yuuna.
Kxteea' wala yuh txãa çxhaba's weçxana tuuthe'jetxna maa kiwejũwe'sxwa.

Nawa kazxsa yu' kĩh yuhwa u'kameena, ahçena ĩsxĩisa kĩjkĩhwa ewmée yũusa. Naasáa Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa libru ji'pha' txãa librute txãawe'sx yasetx fxi'jnisa yuuçxáa u'katxna bagaçxte yuhwa uuwa'jmée ĩtxĩ fxi'zewa'jsa.

Txajũ' Dxus angela' teeçx yu'wala seena' zhiçxkwe çxihme atesa's pta'sxku, bagaçxte yuhwa uumée kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa's. Sa' txãa yu'a' Dxus jxkaahna ũsni vxite' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa txãawe'sx jxkaahna ũsnijũk kasehna ũsu'.

Çxhabte klxiikhun walasa pxãhte vxite' yu'wala pukate puutx pdxi'p fxtũutasx buçxaçxa walaana kãhtx, bagaçxte yuhwa uumée kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa. Sa' txãa fxtũutasxa' a'te iisak yũnna nes yu', txãasak anxute' doce weces yũnu', naapkaçxha' eç yu' yu'çek selpi' maa kiwejũ nasatxwa jxuka.
Kxteea' ewmeesa yu' kĩh yuhwamée yuuna. Txãa çxhabte' Dxus vxite' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa txãawe'sx jxkaahna ũsutxna, naapkaçxha' txãawe'sxtxi selpisaawe'sxa' weçxana neewe'wena nes yuutxna.
Kxteea' Dxus yakh pdxi'puçxa puutx uyya' ãjãtxna, sa' Dxus yase's txãawe'sx dxikthesu ji'phsa yuutxna.

Kxteea' çxhi'dxwa'j enmée yuuna, aça' kxtee fxi'zesa' pki'tawa'jwa peejimeetxna, sa' sek kweethniwa peejimeena, txãa pa'gatey eena' kweethsa' Dxusíiçxá'. Aça' kxtee ũssa' bagaçxtewa weçxana nes yuutxna.
Txajũ' Dxus angela' adxa's na'jĩnak we'we:

—Na'wẽ pta'sxnisa' isa kxtey yuuwa'jsata', aça' txãatxi's isasa yuhtxna sũhna wa'lmée jxpa'gawa'ja'. Txãa pa'gatey nyafxíi txajx yuwe's pta'sxsawe'sxtxi kaaũusuthe'kh txãa Dxus íiçxáak ãçxwa txajx angela's kaah, na'wẽ kĩhwa yũuya'wa' jwee yu' jxthẽeyuumée txãatx kaajiyu'khan ãçxh naa ensu selpisaawe'sxtxi.
Txajũ' Jesus we'weçxa':
—Txaçxmey yuwe'nja, aça' naa librute Dxus yuwe's fxi'jni ũsta' txãatx kxtey yũusa' seena' weçxana neeyũutxna jĩ'k.
Juan yaasesa adxa' txã'wẽsatxthu uyna wẽse'jna yuu. Sa' txã'wẽ uyna wẽse'jçxa', Dxus angel kaavxya'ja'kh txajx tasxte peejxũkweth neewe'weya'.
Nawa txãa yu' na'wẽk we'we adxa's:

—Adxa's peejxũkwenu. Adxa' idx na'wẽysaíiçxáath, iidx yakhthẽ'jwe'sxwa ma'wẽta Dxus yuwe's pta'sxna fxi'ze' txã'wẽsath, vxite' Dxus librute fxi'jni ũsa' txã'sna kxtey yuusawe'sx na'wẽysaíiçxáath Dxusna selpisáa. Aça' wejxwa Dxusnaçxáa mneewe'we jĩ'k.
Txajũ' ki' we'wek na'jĩna:
—Naa librute Dxus yuwe's fxi'jni ũsa' txã'sa' pta'sxmée yu' yuunu. Txã'wẽme' kxtee we'wenisa kxtey yuuwa'j en ãjxa'wa'.
Aça' txãa en ãanijuyã'ja', pta'sxni's nwẽese'jsamée yu' jweeíiçxáa ewmée kazx yuuna fxi'zetxna, naapkaçxha' pta'sxni's nwẽese'jsa' jweeíiçxáa Dxus yakh txutemée çxhãçxha fxi'zetxna.
Txajũ' Jesus ki' we'weçxa':
—Txaçxmey yuuyuju'nja. Sa' teeçxsa na'wẽçxah kĩh yũuna fxi'zesatewa txã'wẽ fxi'zepa'ga deweni's jxũçxa yuwe'nja.
Adxa' naa kiwe meetey ũsyã'th yu', sa' bagaçxtewa nes yuuwa'jsath. Adxthu nyafxte ũsya' takh, sa' jxuka skhẽwtewa adx íiçxáa neeyũuwa'jsath pçuwa'jsamée.
Maawa athni ropa's yaateçxa ji'phsa yakha' wala yuh weçxa yuja', Dxus çxhabte vxitxte u'kaçxa kxtee fxtũutasx bagaçxte yuhwa uumée kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa's ũ'ya' u'kasa yakha'.

Nawa kazx ewmeesawe'sx, dxijxuuna fxi'zesa, kazx pkal yũuna fxi'zesa, nasa ikhsa, Dxus ĩtxĩmeesatx neewe'wesa, kĩhtewa jxuka ĩsxĩiwa'jçxá's yajkxna fxi'zesa txã'wẽ yũusawe'sxa' u'kaya' ãjãmeeçxa ekaju neeyũutxna.

Jesus ki' we'weçxa': Adxa' adx tasxte selpisáa angela's kaath, Dxus luuçxwe'sxtxi txã'wẽsa's jxuka pta'sxkahn. Adxa' nyafxtewe'sxthu, sa' jxkaahsa Davxid ji'the kasehsath. Sa' khikhiiçte estrelxa zhiçxkwe eena' kweethsath jĩ'k.
Aça' Dxus Espiritu vxite' Piisxakuẽ jĩnisa nyuu txãawe'sxa' pi'ki'tx:
—Myuh jĩna.
Aça' txã'wẽ pi'kxni's wẽse'jsa' jweeju mpa'yawe. Aça' yũ'wẽesa' utxaaçxa mpa'gawe yu' bagaçxteçxáa yuhwa uuwa'jmeete kaafxi'ze'jsa's, kĩh yuhwa vxyuu pa'gamée.

Dxus yuwe naa librute fxi'jni ũsa' txã'sna nwẽese'jsa jxukaysatx adxa' na'wẽth yu'kxpeje': Dxus yuwe naa librute fxi'jni ũsa' txãate kĩhçxáawa yutxawáatxna aça' txã'wẽ yũusatxi's na'wẽ naa librute kastigo fxi'jni ũsta' txãatx jxpa'gawa'j vxituna Dxusa'.

Meeçxawa Dxus yuwe naa librute fxi'jni ũsa' txã'sna kĩhçxáawa ivxiituwáatxna aça' txã'wẽ yũusatxi's Dxusa' puuçmeena txãa fxtũutasx bagaçxte yuhwa uumée kaafxi'ze'jwa'jsa's. Sa' na'wẽ pta'sxna fxi'jni yuuk txãa çxhabtewa ka'ga'jmeena.
Txã'wẽ yũuwa'jsa' na'jĩ'k:
—Txaçxmey yuuyuju'nja jĩte', passa':
—Txã'jĩwaççxáawa, wẽt yuuna. Nawa dud myuh, Jesus.
Kwe'sxtxi jxpe'jsa Jesukristo' i'kwe'sx jxukaysatx pu'çxhina.
